2a1(dkon brtsegs):
2a2(dkon brtsegs): nug du dul pa ste dang ldan ga tse bzhi pa'i 'khor ldan pa sa brnas
2a3(dkon brtsegs): nang ldan pa/ ba rol pha rol tu phyi d+hA'i 'khor da ldan pa/ / ba kyi
2a4(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge slong dang dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ 
2a5(dkon brtsegs):
2a6(dkon brtsegs): nga ga myong gi 'khoms ldanapa/ rjes pa rgyal kyi rnam dzi khyu nga ldan pa mas lamangs pa'i 'kham
2a7(dkon brtsegs): ga la mas ca shel la na du na rgyu 'as nyam pa ga
2a8(dkon brtsegs): sgrogs pa pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rgan gyis pa rlo nyin mongs su byung ba khyim du ldang gi/ sa lcug d+hA nim bA nI su ma yin lag lnga rnam mer rgyal po'i'
2b1(dkon brtsegs): dang rdzupa/ skye pa rnam par rnas bsgru pa ma pa rnam pa 'a' na sa na / yin sa rdzu rnam
2b2(dkon brtsegs): drug deng ldan pa'i 'al nga ldamapa/ baHsems pashin pa myed rgya rgyaH rnam pa snyen slong du sa du dum rkye ma
2b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ dran pa'i sgo spangs phun su tshigags pa/ dran pa'i b+h+rUM myongs phrams mya rgyags pa'i 'khor bam+bu rten pa po ni dang ldan po'i'i kho ra ldan po/ li tse po 'don pa sprul pa/ nyi rtse ba 'dzin// 
2b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid mas pa 'dag cid rnams pa'i 'kho dang ldan pa/ kum bya dag ga pa kun tu na pa'i rnag pa med pa'i 'jo ldan pa/ rnam pa nas pa ma ba rnam
2b5(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa yangs rgyang pa'i 'a'ar dang ldan pa/ lus kyi 'du byed bas can la pa lus kyi 'du tun mkha'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ migs pal mdza pa rnams pa/ mi gam pam mngamapar
2b6(dkon brtsegs): mas pa'i 'khoms ldan pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems shin turnam par grol ba'i 'khor dzi ldan pa/ shes shin carnam par tshus pa/ shes rab shin tu rnam par thal pa
2b7(dkon brtsegs): de' 'od dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa phags pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sel gAdang / lo ma dang bu ma dang / thus mdze/ kun grags kyi skyon dang bral ba dag pa/ snying pa la gnas pa/ shAkya'i yul nas
3a1(dkon brtsegs): skye'o sanas shi rtsa grwa nga'i ku ma ngas ra l-I ste dza/ na po sbyin dran 'tsha dzin ljongs rgyas 'od spangs pan ka ya 'od srungs dang / chu rlung 'od srungs dang / 'ang srung
3a2(dkon brtsegs): po dang / sha ri'i bu dang / me'u 'grel gyi bu la stsogs pa/ dge slong steng nyis rgya lnga bcu'i/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ 
3a3(dkon brtsegs): nyom mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol bA/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po khya ba byas lug byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ 
3a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi don rje su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongasu zad po/ yang dag po'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha phrag dang / 
3a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs bcig ze/ de'i tshemam kyi tho byas kyis ma btsum lA ma 'das sa 'dun gyis yo skar gyidage slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu lhas te/ bla gas med pa ma bzhugaso/ 
3a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar/ thams cad dang lhun po'i druge slong gli s+ye'i dum cang mi smra ba la gang gzigs so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'du mal bzims nas/ / 
3a7(dkon brtsegs): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong gis rgyal po'i zas gtsang ma/ mngon dad par gyur pa de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshul cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan po kun shos ko'u di mya ston langs te// 
3a8(dkon brtsegs): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus ma byin mrang bu l+le lha'i su 'i rgyags te/ tso mya ljo nu 'dres gal ba rdo thal ge su thal mo sbyar ba tung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
3b1(dkon brtsegs): de n+ya khyod ni thas tha mar bya mchis ldan pa kyi kyis 'dus shig/ mau ldan bums bya maung rnaMm rdzogs pa nga/ ljongs rgyas 'a shAr du dru/ 
3b2(dkon brtsegs): srungs dang / ka ya 'od srungs dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / che dpya lngam padz+ra rI'i bu dang / me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cos gsol to// tsamu lAn 'das
3b3(dkon brtsegs): bangadag gis rgyal po zas rtsa bam mngon par da par bgyi'o// de rgyas gya so'o bye / bcam lda mnyas kyis tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces rba tho ka ma sprul che// mtsho/ 
3b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gal gyi zu khrod kyang/ bla mo bu ma ri b+hA ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis/ 'dug shig/ ra nas tshe dang ldam pa me'u 'bal gyi bu chen po la 'di snyam du sems te// rgyal po zas rtsa ma/ 
3b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad pa'i dge slong gang zhigabacom ldan 'das bzhed snyam ste/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ ting nge 'jim 'i rnam pa de lta bu mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar
3b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'tshar ka la gnas shing / dge slong 'tshar ka 'di rgyal po zas rtsang ma mngon par dad par byed de/ zhes dgongs
3b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper ma khang pa brtsegs pa 'am/ khang rtsegs pa'i khrims sgo byang phyog sun lta ba'i shar phyogs kyi sar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba ste/ nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos
4a1(dkon brtsegs): u ba ra ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal byin chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la shar cing / dge slong 'char ka 'di/ 
4a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal blo zas rtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do// zhes dgongs pa mthong / de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba debasong nas
4a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas rtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar nu so// zhes dgongs shing bzhed do// 
4a4(dkon brtsegs): che lda pa 'jarag da lta yin ges khyod gyis/ rgyal po mas cangs mngon par dad par bya ba dang bskyed cin/ nad ces smras pa dang / tshe nga ldan pa 'am ra kas/ tsheng ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sa 'dzim
4a5(dkon brtsegs): ces smras/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gas kyi chen po/ rigs rnams byang byang shin tu dana' dra/ rgyam zar rigs ni shin tu bkang/ ci'i phyi chen/ rnam brgyam che ky-i'i nas dang skur
4a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni mgu bar dkal nga sa/ tshe dang ldan pa me 'gal kri zla chen po 'di sa mes dper ma shing wa bcu ma/ nyi shu 'am/ suM bcu'am/ bani 'argyalam/ lnga bcu ma/ shing khu d+ha mangs zhenas
4a7(dkon brtsegs): bag med cing nam la po mang du lon pa zhig yod de la mi la la zhig gis me gang nas/ mo'i phung po chen po 'ang bar 'gyur ro// del yangal la zhig mar ram/ 'jam pa tshig gis gto na/ ma dzu
4a8(dkon brtsegs): rgya chum che 'ab / de'i gling ma drung mi 'dzang du ladu bya kyi su gyi// ca pa suM ru 'anas kyi rgyan rob rgyam chenas skye rnas chun rnamapa na macu pa dz+ra/ mang 'a ma ma
4b1(dkon brtsegs): nucan po 'jam su/ dper mthang 'cha 'cha ba cam khadang pa'os ras tu ba de zhin tu bya'o// che ljin pa mo 'u dgal gyi blo chen por bzhin du/ rgyas brgyal chenas skye rdzasangs sur ba rnams mgu ba / 
4b2(dkon brtsegs): dka'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa'i tshor ka l-I 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa 'amam/ de mi de lta mod kyi 'on kyang khyod ni/ dge slong 'cha
4b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dis/ rgyal po zas rtsa ma mngom par rang bar bya bar nus so zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs shing bzhed pa yin no// spras pa chedang ldan pa me'u 'tshal gyi bu chematho/ bcom ldan 'ongs bdag la rgya mtho
4b4(dkon brtsegs): zas rtsang ma mngon par dang bar byed par dgongs sam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa 'chad de de bzhin te/ dzabacom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'char ku ni rgyal po zas rtsang ma ni dad par byed do zhes dgangs so// 
4b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'tsharo li bka' stsal ba/ 'char ka rgyal po/ zas rtsang ma dang bang gyis shi / de ci'i byir zhe na/ 'char ka rgyal ba zas rtsi ma ni yeng ngas dang
4b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya yis/ yang na khyod kyis dad par bya/ 'char ka nga'i nyam thos ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi nang na/ khyod ni 'di ltar rigs dang pa'i mchog yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa
4b7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka bzang po du las nyan par byos// khyod ni rigs dang byed pa mchog rab yin// shAkya'i rigs rnams dpa' bar skyes pa'i// rgyal po'i dam pa rab tu dang par byos/ rgyal ma
4b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dad par byas nas ni/ rigs kyi bu lha ngas dang ni mi rnams la/ mtha' dpung med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis/ mi'i dam pa myur du dad par yar byos// de lta na ni shAkya'i bdag po do/ mngon
5a1(dkon brtsegs): 'i nga rgyal rtog pas bkrugs shing nyams/ phyi ngos nas dpa'i 'grel mi bzhin du/ brtsom 'grus bcom pa thams cad btang skye gnas/ dbang phyug nyams pa rje su dran byed pas// yid la
5a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod 'gyur sems dang yid kyang stor// rgyal ba'i snyam pa mngon par mi shes shing / tshe dper mchong po nor dang bral ba dag// rje su dram zhing nyon mongs pa bzhin/ lha'i gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing // 
5a3(dkon brtsegs): lha rdzas 'dod pa rje su dran pa bzhin/ rgyal bu smon pa mngon par mi shes shing / rgyal po bde nyams snying rje spro sngags 'angan// nga'i rin po che ma sna bdun dang / mi'i phum su 'tshogs pa bzhi po dang / longs
5a4(dkon brtsegs): spo ba me rjes dran byed cing // sa 'das de ni snying rje gle sags 'don/ mdus 'phrog byed pa'i srin po stobs can gyis/ ji skur mi zhis yong sun mgyur na/ 'angs kyang mi shes gzhan kyang mi shes ldam
5a5(dkon brtsegs): sa'i dngag pade yang de bzhin no// tis gangs kyi ri 'os bsgrings gyur na/ ji ltar mi gas bya mi mdzang ba/ de bzhin pargyal chen pos bsgribs pas na/ rgyal pos lta bar bya bar mi 'dzu
5a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyid kyis log gam shi bas myos 'gyur ba'i/ mis ni dzA gi sems kyang mi shes te// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos 'gyur bas// rgyal po des kyang dge ba mi shes so// dper na khyim
5a7(dkon brtsegs): thab shi bas myos pa'i// bud med smre sngabs 'don byed pa// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas// rgyal po de yang snying rjer smre sngags 'od na// de lta bas ma'o char ka thabs mkhas pas// khyod kyis
5a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni rgyal po dang par gyis/ nga rgyal rgyal mtsham rab tu bskul byar byos/ chos kyi rgyal mtsham dam pa bslang bar gyis/ 'char ka khyod ma rtogs par srid pa'i/ 'gro bdag ma skal mthun spad med pas
5b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i sems ni rab tu dang bya bar/ gang gis rus pa 'i dge slong gang yang med// bya char ka sngon gyi dus na byung bris// 'das pa'i dus ma sa'i bdas po zhig/ ming mi bden pa 'phewa zhes bya ba ste/ 
5b2(dkon brtsegs): sa sung byed pa rnam par grags pa 'byung / de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan// srog chags bye ba khrag rjes rnams kyis mchod/ rgya mtsho mtha' mar thug pa'i sa 'di ni/ chos dang ldan pa'i tshul sa
5b3(dkon brtsegs): des kyang bskyangs/ grong dang zong khyer dag byung 'dab na zhing / bza' ming 'bras d+ha mo tA gargyas la su dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo ngas kyang sheng las skyes/ sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu snang / drim
5b4(dkon brtsegs): rgya mang ngag gis gang ba ste/ snong dum cher ma myo shing ngan pa med/ 'jam pa zhing dge sbyong masakyis rab tu stsas/ nu zung 'thab stes bde bas rab tu brgyan/ skye bo bkar chos rnams kyis kun / 
5b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs/ ngam song lam ngan rnas ni rab bcad// de nas sems can thams cad lha gnas da/ rgyal po de lta bu dag med pa ni/ sdom gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mthong ba ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni
5b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa tsan/ yon tam mang pos smos/ pa blo gros ldan/ ming ni blo gros snying po zhes smra ste// srog tshogs bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/ 'dod pa rnams la skyor du lta ba cam/ mi bdag khyim la gan
5b7(dkon brtsegs): byeng dben la dpa'/ rgyal po bdin le rje thob zhes bya ba des/ lha'i 'o brang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog 'dir/ na tshugs kyis kun nas mdun bdar to// 'dod pa'i yon tan zang la spyod ces sA/ bu'iH
5b8(dkon brtsegs): pakhyod lang yis ni/ ji ltar 'do pa'i bya ba bes byas// 'dod pa rnams la khyod nyid ci'i phyir/ ma mos pal chu khyod myur du spros/ phreng ba 'an 'am ma mngan mkhas kyis te/ ru khyod rin chemakhyes/ 
6a1(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba skyed/ bud med rin tshe mo 'khor dod ma grogs gyis te/ yul la dga' zhing mos pa bskyed par gyis/ dka' thung nags ma 'khod pa'i drang srong dag/ der btang nas ni phyir yang 'dzi/ 
6a2(dkon brtsegs): dag na/ dka' thub 'atang zhing 'dod pa'i dgal lo stong+ka kaM 'dod pa de dag lu cig khyod la 'o skabs// de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// nga dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang mthun// rnam thos bu'i gnas mchog 'dras
6a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang gi rgyam can khyim 'dir spyod/ 'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzungs ldan zhing / lha mo 'dral sbyar brtsil char phyin pa/ rol mo sgra'i tshul dang thu la mkhas/ bsnyen bkur snyoms shing yon tan yid kyang
6a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrog/ mig ni pad ma'i 'dra bya ste/ thim pa'i mdog 'dra ma chu mdzes yid du 'ong / sa dang nimadag dri ma med cing bzang / bral ba smin ma legs shing 'gul pa sdug/ brla ni glang po che'i sna yang 'dra/ 
6a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags so sha rgyas thel gang legs dang ldan// lag dang rkang pa'i mthil ni bzangs kyi mdog/ ser mo byin gyis 'phra ba legs dang ldan/ lce ne bzangs mdog 'dra ba srab cing dag/ tshin ran 'jam
6a6(dkon brtsegs): par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan/ so ni thags bzangs so ni rang rod med/ mche ba rab bkar mchog gi rgyan dang ldan// lto ba phyang der 'dug cing lte ba sdug/ ska zur yangs shing rkang pa rdo rje 'dra/ byin pa glang chen
6a7(dkon brtsegs): sa 'dra zhing / mda'i rgyu'i snying po legs par bskyes pa bzhin/ dregs bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'dres dang ldan/ bzhin du mi sems yid kyis khyod la lha/ brtse ba 'dod cing dor lo bob dza ldan// gnon
6a8(dkon brtsegs): nu snying rje stobs la rab tu byos/ bu cig / khyod dang bud myed 'dre dag gi/ mngagu rdzab dang dar lo bab pa dang / shing gi rtse mo me tog bzhin lhung gis/ ngargyal thong la 'dod pa snyen por gyis/ blo gros snyingan
6b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan nges smras pa'i ka pa dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad smras/ yab cig khyod ni dam par gsung ba lags/ gang dag tshig gis bsgrags pa ma smang mang / yon tan rnams la mos bya bdag gi rtsin/ 
6b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam te btan la dbab pa rgyal po som/ ji ltar rmi lam ma yang 'dod lo ba na// sems mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra gson/ sa'i bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni/ mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma legs/ to// 
6b3(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhas skye bo dag gis yang dag bsams/ mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rtag tu sna / long bla ma lags ci'i rgyu zhig gis/ long ba'i tshig gis lam gol 'dzin par gyis/ zad la gnas pa su
6b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig ji ltar ni/ mgon med chus khyer ba la gnod pa snyed/ bral ba ji lta bur na bcings pa yin/ tshig gis po car der ni 'jug par rnyi/ sa gan gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar ne/ nyom ra
6b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid// sa bdag 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing // 'dod/ pa'i longs spyod bdag gis chus khyer ba/ long ba chus khyer btsan rang gnas pa dang / nyam rang gnas/ 
6b6(dkon brtsegs): 'drar bdag ni ngo snyam bgyid/ mi'i 'das po khyod ni long ba bzhin/ bdag ni mig can khyad mthong ba lags/ khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags/ bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la rnam par spong/ 
6b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dag mi dug gi la ma bzhin/ sbrul gi mag 'dra sdug sAl bgyid pa ste/ rtse gsum pa dang ral dri mdung thung 'dra/ me'i phung po shin tu 'bar ba bzhin/ blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du/ smre sngags
6b8(dkon brtsegs): 'don pa'i pha dang 'khor la swAs/ rin chem sna 'dum dag gris ma bslabs par/ rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung / sbrul gyi pags pa rnying brjes pa ci 'dra dang / rang skabs rdzus pa'i thal ba bzhin spangs
7a1(dkon brtsegs): blo gros snying po ldan pa chags med pargya/ smig dang rnam par bral te rab tu byung la bzhon du de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas/ sbom po bu zhig rab tu rjesu rab tu byung / ming mi zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste/ 
7a2(dkon brtsegs): blo gros snying po'i chesu rab tu byung / bzhom mu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa ba ni lo srung nas ni/ grogs dang bcas pas mngom par shes pa lnga/ ma lus mtha' ngag sred par byas par 'gyur/ 'dzad
7a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la skyon du lta bas ma/ mi'i seng ge de ni 'dod 'khams 'das/ tshangs pa yang dag nyid mi thob bya'i phyir/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor bar bya/ de ltar bzhon mu rab tu byung bas no// pha de bu la ma dang gyur/ 
7a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / zla bas byin pa de'i gan song nas/ legs par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji ltar sems/ de tshe blo gros gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am// nga nyid de'i tshe na des
7a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ bden pa 'phel ba bzhin zhig ma yin nam// mi bdag zas gtsang 'di nyid de'i tshe/ rgyal po bden pa
7a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phel zhes bya bar 'gyur/ 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ rjesu rab byung zlas kyim sa zham sam 'am/ khyod nyid de che de'i dus na ni/ bden po 'phel ba dang par byed pa yin/ de lta bas na 'chang na khyod kyis
7a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dir/ rgyal po zas rtsang dad pa mngon bskyed cig/ sa skyong byed pa de ni dang 'gyur na/ skyid pa chen po phun sum 'tshogs par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sa bcom ldan 'das la mi smra ba khas blangs/ 
7a8(dkon brtsegs): detshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zhag de 'das nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe// chos gos dang shum thabs 'arkos// lhung gzeng thogs te/ sor skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po zas cing mu btsun ma
7b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi nang na/ shAkya stong tsam zhig dgongs pa zhig gi ched du 'dus shing 'khod ngo // rgyal po zas rtseng mas kyang / bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gan su byon cing / ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid ma/ shing n+ya kro ta'i
7b2(dkon brtsegs): kun das 'or ba ma bzhug so// zhes thos nas/ dro 'di snyam du sems te/ bzhon mu do rab tu byung bas/ bdag mi dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byaso// gal te bzhon mu de khyim na gnos na// 
7b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba// chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rim po che sna bdu ma dang ldan par gyur te// de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin pa
7b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rta rin po che dang // nor bu rim po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po tsho dang / blun po rin po che ste 'di bdun ma/ ril bu dpal ba// rgyal phong pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang
7b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ gzhan gyi snga rab tu 'joms pa/ srong yang tshang bar gyur pa zhig des/ gling chen ga bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing / mtshan gyis mnga' ba med la/ mnyam ste/ 
7b6(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam pa med cing / chos dang mthun pas legs par phab nas/ bskal pa rdzogs par sbyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste/ de ltar gyur na bdag cag kyang 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal srid la dbang sgyur/ 
7b7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig na/ phyag gi dang dang ldan zhing // rim 'gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti skang du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa dang / dbang phyug gi dbang po chen po yang rnyed par gyur pa zhig na/ 
7b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bdag cag ni gzhon/ nu rab tu byung bas// de lta bu'i long spyod kyi dbang chen po bral bar gyur to snya mo// des de snyam du bsams nas shAkya rnams la ska bas/ nga'i bu de lta bu 'am/ snyen bkur byed par
8a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ang ma 'gro cig/ la la zhig nga'i bu de la lta ba'i rman bsnyem bsrur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na/ da'i lus la gnod pa'i chang pas btsang ngo // de'i tshe shAkya'i lu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes byab
8a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes 'khor de nas song bar gyur te/ shAkya'i bu dgal ba'i bzhin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'tshor ka ga la ba der dong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'cha
8a3(dkon brtsegs): ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa chur byon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs// tshe dang ldan pa 'char kA yun yang reng zhing byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char kA bcom ldan 'das la
8a4(dkon brtsegs): snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mngal 'am/ de la nyam du ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar khyon tam/ shin tu ma gnyel tam/ 
8a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyis la ma tshul tam/ de srad ces smras pa dang/ tshedang ldan pa 'char gas/ shAkya'i bu dpa' zhin la 'di skad ces smras+ho/ dga' bzhi mi de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan mi mdang / 
8a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugaso// mi bde ba mi mang // de la nyam drab tshe ying mi mnga'/ bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do/ bsod snyoms kyis la rgyal ba med do/ shAkya li bu legs par sa
8a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhi mtshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas/ 'khor de nas byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang / 
8a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan bu'i char ka tshur byon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa lebaso/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kayun yang re po dus ma byom pa to// tshe dang ldan pa 'am m+ba ka bcom ldan 'angs na
8b1(dkon brtsegs): sum mi mnga' 'am/ spobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar zhugs sam mi bde ba mi mnga'o 'tshe dral nyim pab mo'ang mi mngal 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bang bar khyom tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyi
8b2(dkon brtsegs): 'o ma rgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'tshur kas/ shes kyu'i yus shin tu legs par sang la/ 'di skad ces smras// shin tu legs par sdud pa/ de de bzhin te/ 
8b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' stobs dang ldan nos bde bar bzhugs/ mi bde ba mi mnga'o// la nyam ldan gyi yong mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsad snyoms kyis 'o rgyal ba med do// gyis
8b4(dkon brtsegs): bu mya ngam med dang / mya ngam bral gyis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhi na dang / shAkya'i bu bzhan shim tu lags par sang dang / gnas dben pa ma/ 'khod pa mdzang nas/ tshe dang ldan
8b5(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nAr spyad/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ton pa legaso// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun pa zhig mabyon/ 
8b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la spun mi mnga' 'am/ skyabs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mngal de la nyam nga bci yang me mnga'/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu mi
8b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyel tam/ de sad ces smras pa dang / che dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAsh+ya'i shA myu na med dang / mya ngan thal la 'di skad ces smra'o// myang ma med dang / mya ngan bral/ bcom ldan 'das la sun mi mngar/ gabs da
8b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan no// bde bar bzhugs// me ba pe mi mdzaje/ dro lnga 'am pab ci yang mi mnga'/ bde bar byan te/ mnyal ba med de/ bsod snyoms kyis 'argyal ba med/ da ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal pa bzhi/ 
9a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po rgya byin dadu/ mi 'dred kyi bdag pa tshangs pa dang / macom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir pa brtson par byed do/ de skad ces smras pa dang / shAkya'i bu de dag gis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'cha ka
9a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras/ btsun pa 'char ka/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bar 'dod na/ bdag cag gis de ltar mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas rtsang mas pa'i bu la/ 
9a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir su yang ma 'dro zhig la la zhig de la lta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song na/ lus la gnod pa'i chad pas bcad do zhes bka' stsal to// de bas na 'phags pa
9a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshar ka/ de ltar bdag cig rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la lta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong bar mi nuso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ 
9a5(dkon brtsegs): kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni shin tu yang nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na/ ji ltar bdag gis de'idrung du 'gro bar bya snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsam so// 'on tang des bdag gis nam mkha
9a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyis// shing ta la bdun srid du/ 'phags nas steng gi bor snang la dkyil mo dkrung btsas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan b+ha k+kas/ 
9a7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lka bu la bzhag s+ho/ sems mnyam par bzhan pa des/ nam mkha' la shing ta lu bdun srid du 'phags te/ bar snang la dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ rgyal lo bas
9a8(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ma ga la ba der song ngo / rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kaM/ rgyang ring po nas nam mkhar la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la
9b1(dkon brtsegs): dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'ong ba mthong / de la tham ma srur // tshigasu bcang ras mthong ngo // spas pa/ brtsan sbyar gros can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs// khyod la ci dgas myur du bar byas/ 
9b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod la gang dgos de yang myur du byin/ brtul shugs grub pa mthong ba shin tu bka'// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshig su gcad pa 'di slar
9b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu/ bdag la chos gos rgyal lnga glang ni rnga bzhugs/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'a shos skyel to// bde bar gshegs pa bskyab pa'i bshes
9b4(dkon brtsegs): bskur// yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba/ khyod la mi mchog sras mngar grags pa thob/ gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar/ ston gi nyi ma gung gi
9b5(dkon brtsegs): 'a dang 'adz+ra/ ji ltar srin med mnam mkha'i nyim ne/ phyugs rnams kun tu'o/ byed rnam par 'gyur/ de bzhin rnam pa blang ba khyod kyi sras/ ye shes
9b6(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bas thonas rnams kun tu snang / je ltar snyan gyi nyi ma shar ba na/ srin bu me khyer zil gyis gnam cing snang / de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyisras
9b7(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom ldam mer bzhugs/ ji ltar nyi mas zil gnon skar ma rnams/ 
10a1(dkon brtsegs): nor tong mdzad// dge ba yong su bzung bas sdig bcom// nyon mongs zhi mdzungad dge ster bkar stsol bas// lha dang lha myin bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// rgyal po khyed kyi sras mchog rje bur mdzes// rdul khrimasri
10a2(dkon brtsegs): sran blo gros glog 'byin cing // yan lag brgyad lam char chen rlon gyis sbrengs// thub po gces pa'i lo tog 'bras bur stsol// khyed kyi sras ni klu chen 'brug sgra sgrogs// rgyal pos smras pa// gong zag mchog de bde bar
10a3(dkon brtsegs): 'angs sam chi// bsod snyoms rgyubs 'dren pa mngal lam// de'i lus la bas bdub myed dam// thang nas ud pa la bzhin ma snyings sam 'dra rAkas smras pa/ rdzu 'phrul spobs mang sa sa spyong yul can/ 
10a4(dkon brtsegs): dges shing bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te// thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms drug gnas bcas pas// gser gri pad ma lta bur rgyalamyi rnyings/ rgyal pos smras bya// sngan chad rdza rnga rnga bran sgras bskul zhi
10a5(dkon brtsegs): grang du sgra snyan nga res bskul byas te// bud ba myed klu'i dbyangs kyis bsrang ba slang nas// da ltar sang na sug bsngal mya myong ngam// 'char kas smras pa// bsamartan de gengs pus ting 'dzin bzhi yul can// tinga'i
10a6(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste// rnal tam bzhengs sam bzhud deb bzhugs pan// sdug bsngal myi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dges// rgyal pos smras pa// che ba'i rkye mtho ma la mchog pa shes bra la// me mar snang sa
10a7(dkon brtsegs): kun nas mtha' bskor te// bud med tshogs kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na// da ltar mu n+ya bar nyal na ces myi rmongs// 'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags pa gzims lam la gzims pa na// byis pa'i bdan pang
10a8(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje 'de bar bzhengs// dga' gis so// sred myod btang skyes can la rmongs myi mnga'o// shig kya dpa' bos de rtag mdun du 'dang // bstan bcos mkhas dang rtse zhing dag 'byas
10b1(dkon brtsegs): kaunis byed lung du'i khyi du dwags smras pa/ chos kyis byung gA'i ni sems lan nas kyis// 'i ri'i chugs pa 'a sa bdun du bdag / zhi ringan
10b2(dkon brtsegs): babasnyen mang bas// don pa ngogs rje don du sus ngan mi skyes pa/ srin ma du gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i rtse// yan lagasus kyi 'brum zhing drugs de// rgyam sa rkyen du'os pas khrus byas nas
10b3(dkon brtsegs): nags kyisatha thu dasu'is zla// 'char kas smras pa// khrims kyi 'di grogs chos ma jing ste// thung pa 'akrug na ya krub mang+ge// rmus sbyin na mas dang cas su 'jig
10b4(dkon brtsegs): ba' mchor smrog// rgyal pos smras pa/ gser gi srung po nor dri 'phreng byas brgyan// rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gas mchog pazang po med// tsan dan nim mi sa shing nang bu migs pa dris// mags rkyen de gsuM thu
10b5(dkon brtsegs): su'is brgyan// 'char kas smras pa/ tshul khrims skyes byugs so na tan 'dring brgyan// khre yod nam 'thar tisajingo sa rten de brgyas/ mngom nyes rig pardzub brgyan mi smra
10b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol ga'i mang srung bdu pa mes sna gA rje gnas tshan rkyen rdzogs // da sa sa ma mangs / rnags kyis sa
10b7(dkon brtsegs): cig zugs na gnas na srings srung // 2ba dgas smras ni/ byas pa'i skabs kyis tha 'i bye // de lung 'i zhes nyan rjes 'phyi nga gsos// yon tan tshogs kyi sa na 'dzin pa kyi / 
10b8(dkon brtsegs): bamang sa ning myi ririgs nas// rgyal bas smras pa/ ri'i bu'i yon tam byed kyis smos// rgyas legasu spyod ci bdu byed brjid pa thos// khyed kyang ban rdzo bse skyengs bgur ba kyi skye/ dag kyang 'i'i lung
11a1(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smos so// rgyal po bcom ldan 'das de ni/ tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mche// dge slong gis yongasu sdud pa/ 
11a2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po ste/ dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ dge sbyong gi rgyal po lam me lhan ne ltang nge'o/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba yang gri ngo chos bcwo lnga la d+hA nya ste/ yongasu rgyas pa'i chog skar
11a3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba rdo khyim me ltang de'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang / dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs ma/ lum me lhan ne lteng re'o/ ngo rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper nanyi mi'i ston gi dus
11a4(dkon brtsegs): na shin tu lam me lhan ne ltung de'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang / ge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ shin tu lham me lhan ne lhangar de'o// 'di lta ste dper na / ri'i rgyal po ri rang rgya mtsho nang mo 'dug pa na
11a5(dkon brtsegs): lAm me lhar ne ltung ngor/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang / dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nangan bzhugs na lham me lhan ne ltu bong ro// 'di lta so dper ma / lha'i dbang po brgya byi ni chos bzangs lha'i
11a6(dkon brtsegs): mdun sa na gnas na/ lham me snyan me ltang de re/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang / dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na// lham me lhan mo ltang de'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ lta bu rang 'thab bral
11a7(dkon brtsegs): rang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan nga / lha'i bu 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i bug non 'phrul dang byed lha'i tshogs kyi nang na gnas/ lham me lhan na ltung ba'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi
11a8(dkon brtsegs): nang na bzhugs na lham me lhan me lung de'o// 'dil+la sa dpe / mya marjen chu mo dag to tshangs pa chungs yi ma bye ba phrag sangad gyis bskor nas/ lham me lhan ni ltang / de bzhim du brtsi ldan 'das de yang
11b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang ma bzhugs na/ lham me la na mo stong nge'o// dra nas rgyal po byas rtsa 'ams/ bco ldan 'das kyi yon ta rnyed lta bu brjod pa ni thos nas/ 'di snye du sems te/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos su za
11b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu chen po/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags ma/ bcoM ldan 'das thog ma btsas pa nyid kyi tshe/ sa chen po 'di rna la drug du g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul ra
11b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'gul / kun du ba tu 'gul ba/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu sde / chemache ma rab tu chemachem/ kun du rab du chem ches 'ung rung rab tu lu 'ung/ kun tu rab tu 'ama'ang / 'khrugs pa tu
11b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs ku tu rab tu khrugs shing snang 'a dra ga du med pa byung ba la ni snres / mtshas ma thag tu sus kyang matan la dras la gas 'dun byer ba dang / steng gi byur sA la chu'i rgyun drang drin bu gnyis bya
11b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de gnyis kyis lus byas pa dang / de ltar khri bzang po us gser las byas pa byung ba dang / seng gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs dang / rnga yab dang bcas pa lta yang ni smos/ ces ma thag tu lta thos cang
11b6(dkon brtsegs): 'arnam par gyu dang / gong gi che btsas sa/ gang gi rje mngon par byung ba / blanam yang chu myed pa/ rtag tu dam nas pa sbyir du dri ma rnas pa 'izhin bye r+b+ba d+hAn ni gan
11b7(dkon brtsegs): btsun 'grus sa yang dag par snang / srubaskyed pa sa ci gas/ gang gi blang myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang du tu mngon pa rdzogs pangasadus byang myi senas pa la phyir byu sa sa
11b8(dkon brtsegs): mdzi com thamanas kyang drub memam pa'i byu ba'i da tshus bye du so// tshigs su chud pa dag smras so// brim tshig ldan gang nig stsam pa thas ni kyin myed ga
12a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid ches// gang zhig ltam par gyur ma thag nyid du// 'jig rten rtso bor gyur par bya'o zhes// mgon pos mnye ba myed pa'i gas
12a2(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa// de la mkhas pa su zhag yid mi ches// su zhig rmi lam rmi ba'i dus na yang // ba rdzun gi tshig ni nam yang ma gsungs te/ ji skad gsungs pa de ltar mdzad mdzad pa/ de la mkhas pa su zhig
12a3(dkon brtsegs): mi ches// gser gi phung po gangs ri mnyam pa yis// gang zhig chags par bya bar myi nus shing // gang zhig chags las rnam par 'da' 'gyur ba/ cho srid la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ mtshon non 'dra ba'i
12a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtsub tshig rjes kyis// gang zhig 'gro bar bya ba ma nus shing / zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// chags par gyur dang zhe sdang rmongs 'gyur ba
12a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig thul bar nus par ma gyur te// shes rab rgyal po dang ni lA rten gyur te// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid ma ches/ 'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang // meng spyod dag la rton
12a6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i rnam pa yis// gang zhig bcing bAr nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhos pa su zhig yid mi ches// rmad du byung ba rje lnga brgyad dag gis// de mtshar 'dzin bzhug me yang ma nus te// dpal sdug ldan zhing rtag tu
12a7(dkon brtsegs): mi dam pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// mkhas pa dag gis brjod pa'i tshig snyan pa// rje ba sna tshogs du ma'i tshig gis kyang // gang zhig brling bar nus par ma gyur ro// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid
12a8(dkon brtsegs): myi ches// don gi tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang // chos dang 'dod pa nges pa'i tshig rjes kyis// gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// dri myeng mthu stobs mtha' yas lam
12b1(dkon brtsegs): gang shig glang rgyakyis me ng+yas gyur cig/ de'i gsung lasu zhig yid kyi ches// bya chung dan pa mngon par med pa'i d+hI// gang zhig 'dong ba'i 'a
12b2(dkon brtsegs): pram nas // 'di byed / myi ring gas stod pa mang // di ga sungs su nig 'i mi chis// byang chub dam pa mngon par banid pa'i phyir// zhan du yin pargyas can gang zhig gis// drug par da
12b3(dkon brtsegs): srung ba// der gsungs sro zhig yid myi rjes// 'jig rten lnga ni phan dang bde ba'i phyir// byang chu rnam pa don du gnyer ba na// 'a drug lon pa'i ba mar chong khu'i gsol// de'i gsungal su zhig yid kyi
12b4(dkon brtsegs): sa// gang la' drug par du 'dud kyos ni// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brangs te grags btsal yang // de la klags ni rnyed par ma gyur pa// de'i gsungal su zhig yid mi ches// gang 'azhig
12b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags zhe sdang bral 'gyur zhing // su la cung zad tsam yang / myi spang la// 'jig rten dag gi don ni mdud gyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ gang zhig gzhan la
12b6(dkon brtsegs): gsan ngas 'ang da/ rigs pa du dag rab sbyin pani// byang chu blo me sa na rdzogs spangs rgyas pa/ de rgyus mangs su zhig nyid mas/ gag ga rnangs pa da kyi
12b7(dkon brtsegs): btab bas// bco ldan 'das kyis de'i tshig gsun te// nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad pa na// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi rjes// gang zhug pang dgu 'a thugs rtse drin gyi phyir/ byugs kyi grong
12b8(dkon brtsegs): khyi du byom gyur to// sheg kyi'i tshogs rnams grol 'ar mdzad pa ro// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// rgal bar gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das gang gis/ slong gi thugs das cas po ga sa myo
13a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag srid pa'i rgyun las sgrol mdzad na// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// de dus 'da' ba 'di ltar dus mkhyen pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus ma khyer te// 'dren pa dus
13a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa po// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// myi'i 'dren pa'i ni sku mchog la// lha ba'i don du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes// rgyal po des ni rang gi sems kyis su// nga snya du ni rje su bsam pa byas
13a3(dkon brtsegs): de zas gtsang mas// de ltar ring zhig rjes su bsas nas su// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa// dge slong khyod la ci zhi ga dgongs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang
13a4(dkon brtsegs): kas// rgyal po zas rtsang ma la tshigasu bcad pa de smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyi don du bsas byas te// khyed nyid dad par bya phyi ra bdag 'dir 'ongs// stobs bA nu mnga'al dang pi
13a5(dkon brtsegs): na// skyes pa bud med dag kyang mtho res 'deng // stobs bcu mnga' zhang yon tan tshad med ldan// drang srong chen po shag kya dga' mdzad pa// 'dir byin rgyal po thugs dang skyed cig dang // khyed kyi grags
13a6(dkon brtsegs): tshad mod 'jig rten 'byung // khyod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste// stobs bcu thugs rje thugs rtse che mnga' ba// chu khrod pad ma ji bzhin chags myed par// stobs bcu chags myed thugs mnga' spyong
13a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa// srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las rgal 'gyur nas// 'gro ba mang po thu bo che las sgrol// rkang gnyis rtso bo myi 'jigs thang don gyis// 'dron dmyi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// sred pa'i zug rngu
13a8(dkon brtsegs): po kun bton te// sman pa'i gtso bo skye rgya zug rngu 'byin// gso ba myed pa mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog/ 'dren pa myi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bdud kyi sde chen dpag myedo'apham mdzad de// nag
13b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs rnams sder bcas yongs mnan nas// mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chul brnyes 'gyur gyis// 'dren pa myi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// 'gro ba grol zhing chos kyang bstan pa dang // 'chi myed zhi 'akyil bshad gsol
13b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes// myi bang la ni lha dbang gras la 'debs kyis// 'dren po myi mchog la ni dang paskyed// phas kyi rgol ba'i chags rnams zil mnan te// ston pa dpag yas 'khor la rab skor nos// sems can bye baH
13b3(dkon brtsegs): myed du la mdzod gyis// 'dren pa myi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// rnam dag spyan mnga' 'gro ba dag/ mun pa rab ri' sreg pas bsgribs pa yi// myig sbyong rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyis// 'dren pa
13b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog la ni dad paskyed// rke dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa nyan mongs rol// rga shi myed mchog myi la ston mdzad cing // 'chi mya dgonaso su sems can 'don mdzad kyis// 'dren pa myi mchog
13b5(dkon brtsegs): la ni dad pa skyed// me chen gsuM gis bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'de// mes tshogs la bsrin tshon char pa bzhin// bin gnyis dam pa'i srin gri tshar 'bobs kyi / 
13b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni dad pa skyod// dri gsum dri ma spangs cang skyon rtsal te// dri ma gsulas skye bo grol mdzad cing // stobs bcu rno par snang ba spyod mdzad kyis// 'dren pa myi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ 
13b7(dkon brtsegs): thugs gartsogs// stangs bcu thugs rje ma ngar bar byas pa dgas// thugs rtsi thugs rgyas sems can gam sadras kyis// 'dre na po mchogs ni dang skyed/ sprin na
13b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dul// thugs rje mngar ba ma'i'i mdzad cing // rgod pa rnams kyang nyon mongs ni mdzas kyis// 'dren pa phyi mchig la ni dang bskyed// skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i phyim gyi skyen sa// / rgya ma ze rnaMm dus
14a1(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu thugs rje che mnga' sbrel mdzad kyis// 'dren pa myi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ tshad med yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes 'gyur pa// thugs rje chen po dang ri'i thugs kyis spod// yun ring 'khrugs
14a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye bo 'dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa myi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// nor bu rin chemachu 'dang byed pa bzhin// rgyal ba skye bo 'dang bar spyod mdzad cing // mi'i 'thab rtog rab tu 'das mdzad kyis// 'dron pa myi mchog li na dang
14a3(dkon brtsegs): skyed// nod bu rin chen rang bizhin yongs dgod// ma khas pa skye dga' ba yongs su bskyed// rgyal ba de bzhin skye gsol dag pa'i thugs/ mkhas pa'i skye bo dag nga yongs skyed// 'jig rten po 'dzud padzang gyu
14a4(dkon brtsegs): b+ha dang byings sugapas zhu yang 'ad// srid gi bye sngog thamachog tu 'dang/ 'a phyimam ga bskyed// bdag gis mam tshud phyogs tshig ngo pa'i// rnams
14a5(dkon brtsegs): byas la mkhor mi rjem pazhin te// bdag ni rgyal ma mamathar byen mid// 'dren pa ma mtshigs ni dang bskyed/ nas rgya me mas gcing ma pa// ci dang lda pa 'cha ma mas
14a6(dkon brtsegs): da ma sa/ du sus rgyu yos pa nga sa skyol phrog/ de ltu snyid kyi na mdu yongs dun sa skye na
14b1(dkon brtsegs): su te/ ma snyi sa po do du gyur // denas rmongs na bya sa rje'aras kyi nas khyeng nas/ ba ldan das payang de ba nas/ bdag gis bya pa rnams mas
14b2(dkon brtsegs): lags to// jings bco mo ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char kal legs so nas bya ba gnang ste/ 'phang ka legs so legs so// di ring rgyal po bas gtsang ma mngon pa dang par byas pas khyod kyi sangams
14b3(dkon brtsegs): mang du bskyed do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ring dge slong 'chang klas rgyal po zas gsang mo mngon par dad par byas par bsod nams kyi phung po 'u skyed pa del
14b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te gzugs shig yod na ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khaMs gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khas su yang bsod nams kyi phung po de mi shong ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po
14b5(dkon brtsegs): de tsam du dpag tu myed do// / bam pa gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas
14b6(dkon brtsegs): phyag bcabs ldum gzed bkrus te/ mtshan ma'i rna ba 'di lta bu mdzad do// mtshan ma'i rnam pa de mdzad pas/ rgyal po chen po rje thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sra yongasu bskor cing mdun du 'a
14b7(dkon brtsegs): nos 'di ga ste pa na skyes du skabs dang ldan pas lag bskum pa las brkyang ba'am// brkyang b.las bsku ba tsam gyis/ rgyal potshoran dri rnam thos kyi phung gi gnas nas myi snang ba rgyangs/ tsam ldan
15a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par byas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ byang phyogs su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la gnod sbyin gi phyogs kyis bskor te thAH
15a2(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyor te// bcoM ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal ba chen po yul 'khar srung yang dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor n+de mdun du 'dar nas snga ma
15a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bco ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogs log su rten to// steng gi bar snang la dri zla 'khar gyis bskor
15a4(dkon brtsegs): nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcoM ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'a/ dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'ang gas skyes po yang grul bu byeb khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu
15a5(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing / mdun du bdang nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcoM ldan 'das kyi zha sa la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ lho phyogs su brten te/ steng ga
15a6(dkon brtsegs): bar snang la grul 'bum gi tshogs kyis bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par bya'o// rgyal po chen po myig mi bzang yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
15a7(dkon brtsegs): dums yongs su bskur cing mdun du ma dudu nas/ snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogs lags
15a8(dkon brtsegs): su brten te// steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshegs kyis bskor nas/ thal mo sbar te bocom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mched cing 'dug par gyur to// lIl dbang po rgya byin yang su bcu rtsa gsu ngas
15b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi lci'i bu bye ba khrag khrig pargya stong dus mo yong su bskor cing mdur ru nas// snga ma bzhin du steng gi bang snang la thal mo sbya / bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la ma chod cing 'jug par cu
15b2(dkon brtsegs): dri bzhin du lha'i dbang por ba 'thab bral dang // yongs su dgara' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i dbang po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / myi mched kyi 'dag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po dgas la dang / 
15b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma ris kyi lha'i bu rjes kyang / gnas rtsang ma'i lha'i ris nas/ myi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ra' khod por gyur nas/ bco ldan 'das kyi zhabs
15b4(dkon brtsegs): a 'ge bos phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi bar snang la re re zhing yang g.yog lnga'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cag tu bcoM ldan 'das dang / dga' slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par
15b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// lha ma yin gi dbang pad thag zangs ris kyang / lha ma yin khrag khrag phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lagra pa bsku ba las brkyang ba'i brkyang
15b6(dkon brtsegs): lus bsku ba tsam gyis lAm yin gi dbang pa zag 'angs ris lha ma yi gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bco ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas brtsoldan 'das kyi nothos su gre zhes phyag 'tshal to// 
15b7(dkon brtsegs): co sa dang ni rlung gi dges durna ma mdzod cing 'jug par gyur to// kyi tshul pa ma sa brgya 'i rje zung rang gi gan sangs kyi byang gyu ma dris kyi spyan
15b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal kyibs ldan das kyi na ngas la 'ag yos phyag la la / ma na da ni slong yu la mtshang 'dun rgya / gnan du seMgs can kun tu na thaM
16a1(dkon brtsegs): lhags pa byed khrag brgya na yang 'dus par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mamakha' yongasu dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du/ ma lus rdzogs 'gyur zla ba nya yis/ skar ma'i tshugs rjes zil gis mnananas
16a2(dkon brtsegs): ni/ nam mkhar zla ba dri ning du rje bar mdzes// zla ba dri phyed dkyil 'khor zham mang rag / mun pa rang ring sel cing drig su 'joms// rtog ge ca tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni// mkhar la skar mi'i bdag po'i na
16a3(dkon brtsegs): 'du mdzes// nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya'i lus 'dzin pa// stong gi dus na mun sel ni mdzes shing // lha myin chags rnams drim gis mnan nas ni// nyi ma de'i pang ma la yang 'byed// nyi ma'i rong
16a4(dkon brtsegs): nga rgya dri'i mum nga rangs// snong gsu po dgi rje li gas man ni// myi nyi mi rna par mangs 'gyur cing // nyan thos yang mi'i mtshal mchos yang 'byed// snyi rgyal ba dbang byin
16a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun sa pa 'i tshigs kyis yongs bskor ba// lha'i 'khor rnams zil gis mnan nas na// bedade phyogs khyim 'thab la sbyin ldam rno par mdzes// rkeng gnyis dbang po dngal sug stobs bcu yang // dge slong
16a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi mdun dadang stong gsun// tog ge rdzogs rnams zil gris mnan nas ni// dge sbyong tshogs gi us na rnobar mdzes// lha'i rgyal po 'thang bral dbang byed pa// 'thab bzang po lta zhes man byas pa/ 
16a7(dkon brtsegs): mang yang ban chags dang sa// rang tha rnams kyi jug mangs// gzi 'dzi mthar mas pa na ma ba nga // du 'gror she nga sa// na
16a8(dkon brtsegs): brgyad parab tu stonam nga cing // skabs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mangs// 'i rgyal po yongs su dag sngar ro// gnas ra lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskong / lha tshig sa mang po lil gis mnan na si/ pra
16b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag por 'phrul de// la tshigs yang popol shes panan nas su// da m+b+hi pod rnams mthu'os la gnas 'i// gangs shi nga bdud ni rnam par 'angs// de bded ca mongs rnagapas rnam kyi
16b2(dkon brtsegs): bas banum sa nyid mongs thas da // mdu 'dus ma nga 'dus pa'i tshul ba yang // skye bo chel gis mnan nas rnam par nges// phyi rgyal po dang ltar byed pan// lha gnas 'dug cing mchogs
16b3(dkon brtsegs): da // blor gi dag pa gan kyi// rngam pa shin tu ngas pa zhin // das rgyal pa yongs btsun / sngal mas ma ma la // shAni gas pas
16b4(dkon brtsegs): mi'i gzi 'arjid kyis / rgyal 'di ni rab tu rje bar mongs// ca nas pa'i 'jig rten na ni tshangs pa yang // tshangs pa'i 'ja pa rnams rang giso zim mnan te// shin tu snyan pa san lag 'argya
16b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan ga/ yong su brjod pa byed cing mngos du ma nges// de ltar rgyabazangs pa 'drar gyur pa// dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis// sa dun su bdar te 'dzin pa'i tam gsung zhing // 'jig
16b6(dkon brtsegs): gsuMng ga da tungs// nya 'du da byernas padang // 'byecher po dag de 'dus ma bye ngas/ skyes su myom chog spyan lag kyang sung rjes kyis byin sngo byangs
16b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mams pa du kyang mi// rgya zu sa gnang su dru srid// bras rgya ga chu da/ sangs tu ma phyin turnam par drug tu
17a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mngon par dad par bya ba'i le'u sde dang po'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sod nas/ rang po ma lon par rgyal po zas rtsang mashig kyi rjes la bsgo ba
17a2(dkon brtsegs): grags po dag 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma 'char ba'i sA las ni gang 'dir ma reng 'char ba'o// dam re nga nang mi nyi ma 'char bar shes so// grogs po dag de bzhim thu'i dge' slong 'cha ro ka yang / bco ldan 'das thas
17a3(dkon brtsegs): tshang mkhyen pa'i rdzugs yin te/ dge slong nga dwags yin ta gang brjod pa de dag ni// nges pa thos cang mkhyer ni thos rba yon ni yi na gyigs byed sa dris na gan macig rnam sa
17a4(dkon brtsegs): te sa gon gyis shin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ di ring gi na 'dag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu 'a lta na/ sdug pa de zhig 'dong / lce leg ci so zhes gsol nas/ shag kya rnas
17a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis rgyal po zos rtsang mi'o ltar nyan ting / theg pa'i mchog rnams myur du bstad to// de'i rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya gnas dang / n+ya gre da'i kun dga' nge ba'i bar de dag thas cad rgyal po gshegs shum
17a6(dkon brtsegs): dum nye bar byed du bcu ga cing sa bye ma cings bdal du bcug ste/ nyams dga' ba dang me tog gi sil mas gang ba dang / rang gi lA lI dang / 'bring bamang pos brgyan te/ skabs skabs su gang ma par dang / 
17a7(dkon brtsegs): klu mkhan dang / byang dang bum thogs pa dang / sim snyan dang / rim mo das/ klu ri tha byang dang / yo byad thos cang thogs pa dag/ bkang par gyur to// de nas rgyal po zas sringam gzhan pa'i mchog dang cas pa
17a8(dkon brtsegs): dog ny-i nga ban cig ma / med kyi'i gdus kyi grod kyi rjen pangs rgyas so// rgya grong ring su dang ngagal 'ding song // de rimanag kyal la'i 'od pa'i mchog ni na pa dzin du ste/ 'di
17b1(dkon brtsegs): rta dag kyang thams cad sde'o// 'i rnams kyis dngas shing / rgyan rnams kyang stsol// dril bu g.yeng ga dra bas brgyad pa/ 'khor rgyan sngon potson gyis bskor de/ gdugs dparas gring/ rje
17b2(dkon brtsegs): nang byas zhing ya dang / las rgya sdin pa dang spo pa/ 'dzi du ma ba ngas sngon pa rtser cing / rgya sngon po thogs pa'i rnal ta pa rnams zhal du skyed/ byar sten tha~Mng gi lhag thogs padadang / 
17b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng ban stag ste/ shing te re re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gi mi 'argya phrag ri ngas paskong bar gyur te/ ga kyil la'i non pa ni rnaM ba 'di lta ru ste/ 'di ma shing rtsadag kyang tham sa
17b4(dkon brtsegs): dus sa/ nga / thams cang dug sa ca du kra nga/ gis de ning ya rgyam naga'i mas na rgyas gyi / sa du
17b5(dkon brtsegs): riri'i phyi nan du yang glang po che brgyad khri gas gi rgyang gis brgyan gser gi rgyal mtshan cin/ gser gi drangs g.yogs na sdug ba ba rgya na rtswa grang khyong rgyu khri ma drug gi ste du
17b6(dkon brtsegs): che sde bdun gi khang pa brtsegs pa/ bkra lnga na sdug pa brgyad khri shams nas/ 'dong par gyur to// glang po cha brgyad khro bo dag gi phyi bzhin rtsa gser gi rgyam gris drargya na pa/ gser gri dril bu gis gas brgyas pa/ 
17b7(dkon brtsegs): rin rtse che sde bdun gi rgyan dang ldan pa/ brgyad khri shams te 'dong bar gyur to// de ngas bcoldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAg kya rnams kyang rgya ning po nas 'o ma gzigasan sa/ dge slong rnams la
17b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyar pa/ dge slong dag khyed ga dag gis sum bcu rtsa gsuMgi lha skyed po tshal du 'dod pa ma mthong byed dag gis/ shag kya ser skya'i gnas nus 'bu 'di dag la smos shis kyim phyir zhe dge slong dgashas tu
18a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams sor skyer gnas nas byung ba dag ni/ dum bcu ma gsum gyi zhi'i skyed mos tshul du 'dong ba da rjes su mthun no/ dem 'di skad nas ste/ skyer rgyas byin khye sa su
18a2(dkon brtsegs): zas rdzang ma'i khrumatshug ste// rakhong dang bcas de ji ltar 'di 'gyur ba// da ltar bsan gyis khyed rnaMs denin cig/ shing \u0f7fbrgya snang mtshag dang bcas bla na segs parlob rgya rgya chos parda smras nas
18a3(dkon brtsegs): ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas// myi'i dbang po dam pa byung bar gyur// shing rta sngo zhing rgyan kyang sde ba dang // rta yang sde zhing sngon po'i 'khor dang brgyas// mtshan mo lnga po dag kyang sngo ba ste// de na
18a4(dkon brtsegs): gos kyi rim pa dag kyang sngo// lcag kyang sngo zhing thag srang rnams/ kyang sngo// dril bu g.yor ka'i dra ba rnaMs dang bcas/ mi rjes kyang ni sngon po'i gas nan rto/ rgyal mtshan sngon po
18a5(dkon brtsegs): bas mdzes par byas// shing ta ser shing rgyan yang ser ba dang / rta yang ser zhing ser po'i la' dang bcas// mtshan ma po dag kyang ser po smin // de bzhin gos kyi dpe padag kyang ser/ 
18a6(dkon brtsegs): ga kyang ma ning po gagrang rje kyang meng/ rjes drug yeng shi nga brnams dang bcas// ni rnams kyang ni ser brdzogs ca // rgyal mtshan pa mi steng ngas mangs par byas// shing ta ma
18a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang dam rab dang // rta yang dam zhing dmang po khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi ngam pa dag kyang dmang // mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste/ 
18a8(dkon brtsegs): kya ma nas bya tsug se ga nyid sa// khyims kyang ni 'a rogs / rgyam rna ngas
18b1(dkon brtsegs): Sh+TA ste/ dgas kyi ldas kyang / lug 'i mo k+Sha sa/ drug me rnam // phyimams kyi ni kwa'i na
18b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mtshar 'ad bsgreng bas mnges par byas// kyi dug rnangs kyi phyi ming du grang ba ba rgyad khri chang ba sananapa dade// gseng gro rgyal mtsha rnams kyis legasapa sa bya/ 
18b3(dkon brtsegs): mas pa'i/ rjel pa rgya gyu/ dge rjengs kya ra // dug shA ts+tshas kyi ni sa/ gyu gyis
18b4(dkon brtsegs): rje thegs rnams kyis mdzes par byas// rab mi rnam pa cig phyi pa 'ad/ ngas ning khyor byung bya 'i chud rgyas
19a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po zas mang ma dang / shas kya rnaMs ta babs pa'i 'dudu/ gnon pa dang dong sa phyin / bzhon pa las bzlas ste// dang thang gi 'khod kyis ma dung rgyaste cing mdun du ma / 
19a2(dkon brtsegs): gronga'i kun da 'du bar 'dong ngo // de'i che bco ldan 'das kyis rgyal po rdzas kya sa brgyal che'ang mkhyen nas/ myi gang lhagacas gyi bar snang ra/ rgyal 'i rdzas kyang ma mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir/ 'cha ga cing tsu
19a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ de'i tshe de ltar 'chag pa'i g.yas phyogs nas/ mya bajed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zham 'bring du 'chag cing 'gal/ g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zham 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// de ltar bcos
19a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'chag pa'i zham 'bring du lha'i dbang po rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnaMs/ bco ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ rdugs
19a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin cing bsil yab kyis g.yob par gyur to// rgyal po chen gyi rnaM thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang / brtsa ldan 'das 'chag pi'i shor phyogs logs kyi thog ma la zla gas
19a6(dkon brtsegs): cig A ts+tsha/ rnam me pa'i sadi spyong sa/ 'an nas gas pada'i gsumam po skye nga / bcom ldan rnam la byagang tshal ni sa / rgya nas
19b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lci'i bu rjes kyang / bcoM ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar po dang / lha'i man dngang
19b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / man dang nga chen po dang / lha'i sras kyi phyem rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das mchad pa bye ba'i phyir/ lha rim mo sim stan dang / grwa dbyangs dag kyang stong gre bar snang las sgra'i bying bar gyur to// mi'i
19b3(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i sku pas yang song gi bar spong las byung bar gyur te/ smin las thos kyi tshang bam rim yang 'obab par gyur to// lci'i mo tog u dpa lo dang / lha'i tsan danige skyo mar char yang 'bab par gyur // denas
19b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan medas kyis rdzu tshul gin pa gang ma na pa yang pas lha dang nas kyang gcig gis gcig yang dpapa mi bang byung ba lta phrul mngo / de nas rgyal ba zas
19b5(dkon brtsegs): lce de dag pa cime 'das so bad yang mthong / lha'i rin pos 'du gi rgyu las gru de'i 'ang ba brtsegs pa dag kyang ma gang bang mthod pa de 'di ste du sems te/ ci cam du brjom
19b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs legs par gsungs pa ni ngamatshar me ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis gnon nur gyur pa'i tshe/ 'di skad dung la ni gling chem po ba'i pa'i dbang byug la dbang bar gyur gyi ma ste/ rgyu sa ni stong gsu gi
19b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha dang myi'i nang du ches kyi dang phyug la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos dang phyug la dbang bde ni 'di yin pa la ste/ bdag ni myi'i khe ca du zad/ bcom
19b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ni lha dang myi'i 'khor can du gyur to// denas rgyal ba ras mang ngas pra gos phyogs gcig tu 'gos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i stangs la btsugs so// bcom ldas myos kyi zhangs la spyi bos phyag
20a1(dkon brtsegs): u/ na kyi smrangs/ pad+ma rdzas sa rna chis ma di
20a2(dkon brtsegs): 'i nga ste/ m+b+ha // 'ji ya du byung ngo // zhes 'asungs pa de ci yang lda su khyoms gnyis la 'a
20a3(dkon brtsegs): yun na shes raba'i 'i gro nga sa/ ram ti dil na zhunapa 'i tshe/ TIs ma 'a byung ma dri bringasas chos nam sa kyi ma
20a4(dkon brtsegs): zuganon du drug hral mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhi nge khang par gyur de/ 'i tshe/ yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag kyi/ so/ da yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang la ni gsum du phyag 'a
20a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gang tshe rkang gnyis rtse bo khyod lham nas// sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhud de// de ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs/ 
20a6(dkon brtsegs): de tse mkhas pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang tshe thub chen zhing pa'i grong bzhud de// 'dzam bu'i grib mas bzhugs pa ma btang zhing // lta bu gzhun nu drug gis btud gyur pa// de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyas
20a7(dkon brtsegs): dayod 'di dang 'od pa la ra gsun// thung khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'thugs rje rje mngar lta mis mchod patso// khyod 'dra 'jig ce ma mchis lhag ci smos// mtshan ni ngon gyu
20a8(dkon brtsegs): lagasasas sa semasas kyi so las/ kyid kyimam tshigs lung kyi nyis pas// der thung gas ya gi ni mang po // da sa 'a pa gru 'i
20b1(dkon brtsegs): so/ A sa ma pa/ rnams cad da 'i ma ma mas 'i
20b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi rna pa sa na sa rgyag / mAng sa la 'ad par 'di la 'di ni chos nyid mi / da pa'i di skad ces nga/ seng skye nas 'i'i'i grong byed pa'ir// rgya gro
20b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bang // rgyal po zas kyang de dang gang gi tshe/ 'jig rten 'gon po'i / phrad pa de'i tsha hA/ skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus 'gyur te// lha ma yin dang mkha' lding dbang po dang / klu tshogs rnams dang de
20b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin grul 'bum dang // dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par 'gyur// de bzhin gsang pa'i bdag po rjes 'dus te// myi 'am ci'i tshogs dang myi rnams drang // de bzhin 'dod pa dag ma spyod pa'i lha// rab tu dag
20b5(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyang 'dus par 'gyur// de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su rtogs pa'i// tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang // 'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas pa dag dang // 'bras bu rtse bar rtogs dang gnas rtsa
20b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus// dge sbyong dag dang de bzhin bri ze dang // spyod pa ca dang kun tu byung ba dang // garjer bu pa dang mu sregs gnam mang po// yig lam rjes su'i phreng ba rnams kyang 'dus/ rgyas po ni po khrus rdzab
21a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i sems// yongs su smi par bya ba'i don gi phyir// de'i tshe na 'dus pa chen por 'gyur// sngan chang bcom ldan 'das kyis legs mi shad pa'i// tshig ga mi rnams yongs su tshim par
21a2(dkon brtsegs): mangs// dan rgyal brgyam po zas rtsangs// rgyal ba'i mthu ni drang tu stor ba byed// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ras cang gyis// gcod du 'ong ris badrog chen po yi// rgyal por gyur zhes mkhas pas nga
21a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan gyis// khab nas ma byung shig ces sngon gsol pa// gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba ste/ srog/ chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// // rin chen sna bdun dag dang ldan par 'gyur// ke 'byor pa rin
21a4(dkon brtsegs): dang yang ldan par 'gyur// chos la gnas shings yang sbyang ba skye// gling bi na dbang brgyal rigs rgyal cher 'gyur/ mi'i badrag dang mi'i sa mu dzad par 'os// lto 'phye ches mchog 'gyur
21a5(dkon brtsegs): nas bsom pa ga/ danas de ci byang chub sdes dang das na/ la pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag byed nas// bdag ninan 'di 'i tshig smras kyis// rgyal po bdag gcig la gas
21b1(dkon brtsegs): rlabs kyis bkur bkur te// khron pa 'dir rmi'i ring por bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho rlabs che mid ni phyir log song// nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus te// nga ni rlabs dang bral bar gyur pa na// ru stsal khyod kyi khrod
21b2(dkon brtsegs): par mal 'tsha'o// de la khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal gyis// rgya mtsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam 'am// 'on tu khron pa 'di bas che ba zhig/ dris la nang la myur du smos zhes smras// rgya mtsho'i ru sbal dri rgya chen po des/ 
21b3(dkon brtsegs): khron pa'i busbal de la tshig smras pa// khron pa'i ru sbal khyed ni bus pa ste// dro rgya chung zhing shes pa rab du zhan// nga ni lam ca tsam gi chu der bcas// yun ring dus na den skye skye yang // rgya mtsho man
21b4(dkon brtsegs): ma shes par ma nus pan// us lta shes par ga la/ sa spras// de ltar myi'i bdag po khyod kyis kyang / bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chud de// gling bzhi pa'i mchod
21b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis ni// khyod kyis bdag la slu bar mdzad pa bzhed/ bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal bar gyur/ wa/ mi gcang mtsho mchas 'dab par ba myod par// snong gsu mi mched khams 'di skyang ba du/ 
21b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod 'a thob par 'gyur // rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgos pa'i bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon cig srung bzhed nas/ daphyir 'kho chen pon dadag dag gi sems can nos
21b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thugs kyi dgongs pa mngang// rgyal po zas rgya mes rim gu byi'i phyir// thugs kyis yeng su 'phrul ba mdza ba dang // 'jig ton gsu sa' 'dug cu lus par // de'i mi 'dus par 'gyur/ 
21b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste gsum par// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ri'i tshe lha ma yin gi rgyal bye thag 'angs ris// bcom ldan 'angs yin skye bya'i sems thog mar skye
22a1(dkon brtsegs): byur bden ma nas ma dang // de nas snya ma yi gi dbang po phyag sangs dris snyam yin khrag Sh+Tis nas drus bcu dang/ ma ming gi ma wag khrig nga rdzus chu dab ces
22a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pabrog ma byas ste/ des rgyam chechen po na na/ rin po che ri thang song ba dang / rI thang byed pa'i snyed cig yod pa de dgra tham sa cad/ bcom ldan 'das la mcho rje'i byo dul lo// ngin rje
22a3(dkon brtsegs): gnam rgya mtsho chen po de na myed pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te/ ma ched pa phul lo// rin po rje sna bdun gi rang bzhi macan gyi shing ta khrag khrig phrag drug mu yang mngon par sprul to// shing
22a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag re re zhing yang rta cang shes khrag khrig drug bcu drug bcu mngon par sprul te/ rta de dag kyang rin po ches bdun gi dril bu ga yer ka'i dra ba tsam/ rke lag gi rgyan gser las byas nga'i ri
22a5(dkon brtsegs): be sems bdun gis smras pa dang ldan pa/ rin po ches 'dun las byas pa'i dbyar 'dab can gseng ga rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go/ cang shes de dag gi rgyam du bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gi bla
22a6(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang mngon nga snga te/ shing dadag kyang gse gi rgyal mdza na/ gas gi rgya rigs 'argya bcusdud na/ ring ba'i dgi ror byi'i dri dag kyang meng gi 'a sna bas shing dus ga byi ba'i 'a
22a7(dkon brtsegs): 'a sa kyi ga su na/ dzi rang # du gi tshu
22b1(dkon brtsegs): baspyod de/ sna sta cing mi da nga / mnyanan de shes pa 'a bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste per na/ rlom mo'i mi ma snyan mang leg brkyang dang 'anapa/ mkhas pas su byung ma sba lar cing mi
22b2(dkon brtsegs): 'angag das mnyan na ngang 'byung ba da bzhin du/ shing rta'i rgya de dag dang / rta'i rgyan de dag dang / yid bzhin gi nor bu'i dra ri'i rgyon de dag rlung gis bskyod na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'odul/ mnyan na 'de ba
22b3(dkon brtsegs): stag 'byung bar gyur te/ shing d+hade dag gi 'phang gyis kyang bar snang la dang ma tshang drug bcu bsgribs te// 'khang bapar gyur to// shing rta de dag gi phyi ba zhin yang rol mo'i sil snyan sna tshogs rjesu 'brang 'gyur / 
22b4(dkon brtsegs): gang na de dag thams cad la yang lha ma yin gyi bu'i rgya na gis rkyen bdaka' me do// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya 'i phying/ pA la ni rab mi byed/ ni mis snar byed/ la la ts+li ma
22b5(dkon brtsegs): len/ la la ni gang byed/ la la ni tsan dan dang ud pa la'i phye mas 'a8/ la la ni a ka ru dang / ta ma li'i lo ma'i phye ma 'aHraM/ la la ni pA ma yin gi lha rdzas kyi phye ma 'thor/ la la ni
22b6(dkon brtsegs): gsong rdul gi phye mas 'thor/ lal ni ma na dang 'dang / man da 'chen podang / nimardzun ka dang / man ru shag chen po dang / pi mun dang / ba sug ka rkyen po das/ mdog gang dun mdag kar chen po dade/ skye snar dang / 
22b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sa pa ga // de nyi rgya ma nga/ sa tshangs phyi bye 'i na ma na ngas
23a1(dkon brtsegs): la lin sku rags dang zhabs kyi rgyan dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / ser rngub dang / lhu'u dang / dbu rgyar rtse gsul dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod panu dang / grwa s+yer skud dang / mu tig go do shal dang / se me do dang
23a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya do dang / 'gul rgyan sna tshogros 'thor bar gyur to/ lA la ni tsheng tshong bshings pa/ la la ni 'ge rgyad/ la la ni rdza Na lU kor/ la la mi gser gri 'breng ba rin po ches bsangs pa/ yul na nor du rin po che'i 'phreng
23a3(dkon brtsegs): gser gas bsros pa/ lI li ni gseng gi dra ba/ la la ni gseng gi 'breng ba dang / nor bu'i 'breng ba dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs so// la l-i na gser gi rdugs dang / dul gi rdugs dang / be dU r+ya thugs dang / 
23a4(dkon brtsegs): shel gi thugs dang // rdo'i snying po'i thugs dang / mu tig dmar po 'i rdugs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / ring po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs the dad pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi
23a5(dkon brtsegs): bdan kha dog sna tshogs dang / mtshon sna tshogs mang po thog so// la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to// la la ni bco ldan 'das la tshags su bcad pa 'di dag kyis mngon
23a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bstod par gyur to// myi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// myi yul khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rkang gnyis rtso la phyag 'tsha'o// khyod la do zla yod ma mchis// 'jig rten gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// 
23a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes gcel phyag 'tshal lo// dngal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs sel la phyag 'chal lo// spyod dag khyong la phyag 'tsha'o// sems dag khyongs bya
23a8(dkon brtsegs): 'atul lo// gnas sa myi meng zhum gyi mdzad// brtson 'grus ba rgyalal shing rdul mi nya'o// nges par rtags sa phyag 'tshal lo// rin po'i tshe'i brjong gangal ya sug pa ngas pa/ rin 'i che gA na
23b1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin can/ khrag khrig phrag drug nu yang mngon par sprul te/ rin po che'i pho brang gi rngal de dag rerare zhing yang bzhugs/ sa khrag khrig phrag drug su mngon par sprul te/ bzhugs so de dag re re zhing yang yo
23b2(dkon brtsegs): blta na stug pi rin po che sna bdun gi rang bzhin can phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul te/ ba gam de dag re re la yang khang pa bstegs pa bkra ba lta na stug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gi rang bzhin can bye ba khrag khrig drug bcu
23b3(dkon brtsegs): drug bcu mngon par sprul ti/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang 'khyis bkrab lta na sug pa/ rim po che sna bdun gi rang bzhin can/ khrag khrig drug bcu drug bcu mngon par sprul to// de la gseng gi khyu rna
23b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rung byas ni rdul/ gral bu dang sgo 'drar ni be du r+ya/ them pa dang / khye ni shel/ ka ba ni sug/ gzhun mu tig dmang // sa gzhin na'i snying po'i rang bzhin ca sha stag go// rdul gi 'khyos rje
23b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rung du mini gsod/ gral bu dang sgo 'bar ni bdu / them pa dang 'khyem she la/ kwa 'i sugags gzhi ni gtsun sri tig dmapa'i/ sa gni ni de'i snying po'i rang bzhi ca gsag// bya
23b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi drung 'byami shes/ gral bu dang sgo 'drar ni gser/ them pa dang / 'a khyer ni rdul/ ka ba mi mug/ gzhin du tig dmang po/ sa gni rdo'i snying rtsi zhin n+yam gyi b+hag+sa ga~M/ shIlI ka mas mangs kyi
23b7(dkon brtsegs): bya / klum zu sus/ ma dpa' khye ni jo ba po/ gzi gseng/ kAnu rdul/ sa gzhi ni sa byig dngum po zhin kyican stsan rgya bug gi rgyangs rjes kyi
23b8(dkon brtsegs): bral bu dang sgo mang ti ga dmang po/ ther pa dang khal khyer ni gser/ ka'i dus/ kazhu ni rje da byi ngas bzhi can na stug go// mu nyigan mau byor khyim tshungs kyi rlong bya'i spos gros ni
24a1(dkon brtsegs): snying ngo // them pa dang khal khyer ni rdul/ ka ba ni gser / ka'u mi bye bu rgya/ sa gzhi ni ke ke ru'i rang bzhin can// sha stag go// rdo'i snying po'i khyams rjes kyi rung byam ni mu dag dmang po gral du n-i
24a2(dkon brtsegs): 'badzin gsor/ thom la dang 'khyer ni rdul/ ka 'a ni du phyo/ ka 'u ni ke ke ru/ sa gni ni shel gi rang bzhin can sha stag go/ khyis de dag du yang sing ge'i khririn po che sa 'dun ga rang bzhin nu // lha ma yin gyi
24a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs bting ba/ ka rtsa lini 'di'i steng g.yogs can/ mtha' gnyis rkyen ma bzang po bkod pa khrag khrig drug bcu drug bcu mngon par sprul te/ sing ge ri khri de dag gi rka rkye ma rin po ches bduran ging
24a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin can dag le// ras bcos bu sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ shing ba la las byas pa shin du 'phrab cu dang / srin pal las byas pa na ma tu 'phra ba dang / zar ma'i shun pa las byas pa shin du 'phra ba dang / 
24a5(dkon brtsegs): shun drugs las byas bzhin du 'dra ba dang / ka she kA las byas bzhin tu'adra dbyer phrag drug du drug bcu ting bar gyur to// seng ge khri dag re re ngas gnyis su yang lha ma yin gi su ma rgyan thos
24a6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis 'byung pa/ rin pa ma lu las byas pa'i sil yang legs pa/ gsu gnyis pa na mang sur te/ srang ge'i khri dag la mA ma yina'i bu mo gnan du 'khod pa dgul g.yer po// byams do dag nga'i
24b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams pa de/ ma sa ba mi gas gas gas pas na rnas su rgyal / rkye phyugase gis 'a/ ri ce
24b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyadres pa na/ supa'i rnams kyi klung mas grus kyi sa nga 'gron/ su slo'i stongs kyang sa
24b3(dkon brtsegs): sa rgyal du nyi da 'dzin go// de'i nang du'i drang gi dang de dag kyang bar snang gi rnam pa'a' la lde ba zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsu sa 'byed de/ rin po che'i mo brang gi dam de dag dang pa gas de dag dang / 
24b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs sa de dag dang / 'bas brtsegs pa de dag dang / khyams de rag dang / sing ge'i khri dag dang / rdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / bdam de dag las lha'i tsa mdan dang / ud pa la dang / u ga zu bye ma'i rgya
24b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bab par gyur te// me tog man dang ba dang / man dam pa chen po dang / mam dzu sha ka dang / mamadzun ka chen po dang / ba ru sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen me / mdog kar dang / mdog klar chen po dan skye sar dang / skya wA rak+Sha
24b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / skya sdang bkratso rigi ca mang bden para'abar par gyur te/ gser ba tshul dang / dre'u rkye du/ she ba dang sug dang / ro snying dang / muthig dang bo dag rim 'i ni skyes cad kyis gyi / ga dang gas bye
25a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gi ras bcos bu'i char yang mngon par sa 'bab par gyur to// yid bzhin gi ner bu'i bla re de dag gi mthus lha ma yin gi bu de dag rin po che gang gi cha 'bab par 'dred bye na/ de dag las madros pa
25a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bab par gyur to// de'i che ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ khor yug tu ni dpag tshad drug khri/ 'phang du yang dpag tshad drug khri la ma yin gi mchod pa po lta bus rgyas par dge bar gyur to// rin po che
25a3(dkon brtsegs): brang gi rngal de dag gis kyang / bcoM ldan 'das la lanagasuM bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to// ser skya'i gnas gi grong khyer chen po yang mi 'geng bdun tsam du me tog ma ma da radwa
25a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par gyur te/ spos chus kyang rngab du gyur to// sangs rgyas kyis dathus stong gsuM gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khas kyang se sa rmyi rdzab kyi dri des khyab par gyur te// steng gsuM ge steng chem po nga
25a5(dkon brtsegs): rten gi khams 'di'i sems can gang dag gis sus chu'i rngab kyi tshir pa de dag kyang bra ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang bralas phyir myi ldeg par gyur te/ byang chub tu se su dang po bskyed pa dag
25a6(dkon brtsegs): ni spos kyang phyi dgos so// denas lha ma'i ge nga thag pasa'i sa rin pa rje sna bdud gi gi la 'od de/ lan gsu pa sko ra byos das/ bcom ldan 'das la can dang gi phye mas mangs par da // tshogs / 
25a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'ad na go na pa ngas/ bya dzu dang ma / smas kyi pang skul pa// 'ang kyi 'dzin po rigs ma nas// gang 'a dag dir mi kyis pa ring// le gsungs tu rungs
25b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas / rgya che / stsasna 'jos/ skyes ma 'a rig pa ga rnams pa/ tshul ba'i maston pa tshogs kyi po nga di/ gle gi mam ga sa rgya
26a1(dkon brtsegs): shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha dang lha ma yin gi spos chu'i char yang mngon bab po// spos chu'i tshe ri dbab pas ser
26a2(dkon brtsegs): skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ khwar yug tu dpag tshad drug nu man chad spos chu rdzab du gyur te/ sus nu'i rdzab gi dri des kyang steng gsuM gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gI khaMs rgyas pang gong ngam gyur to// sems can grang
26a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis/ spos kyi dri de cod par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bran me rab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir myi ldeg par gyur te/ de ltar lA ma yin gi rgyal me thag zangs ris kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
26a4(dkon brtsegs): lan gsu bsgrer ba byas pa'i tshe/ bar snang las lham yin gi ltungs kyi sil snyad gi sgra dag byung / sil snyeng dag gi sras kyi snying gsu gi sring chen po'i 'jig rten gyi Shas su grag par byer te// rjen
26a5(dkon brtsegs): hrI chen po yang dag par zhugs pa'i mos can gang dag gis sgra thos dang byung ba de dag thams cad blan med du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rgyu ru las byir myi mug par gyur / de dag lha ma yi gi dang po zag zangs
26a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bconan 'das pa lan sasu ba ra dbyas pa'ing/ lce ma yin gi sus 'phyes ba dag bco ldan 'das lasarjed du byung dang / lha'i ma ga bang thas 'ongs ris kyir ba bya gyi ni ma la'i gru med/ kha la dimi ma snang
26a7(dkon brtsegs): byed/ la lin gar byed/ la la ni lus kyi chul sbyar/ la lin tsan dan dang / u pa la dang / a ka ru dang / ta a li'i lo ma'i phyem 'dzar/ la la ni lcir me tog mun dang ba dang / mra mo dang bachen po dang / man dzun ka dang / ma
26a8(dkon brtsegs): dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog kar dang / mdog kar chen po dang / skya sAsnar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya sA khro bo dang / skya snar bkra chen dang / sprul pa'i me tog rjes dang / gser dang rdul dang / be du
26b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / shel dang sug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmang po dang / ri po che thams cad kyi me tog rjes 'thongar zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor / la la ni nab dang / rkang dru dang / sku rags dang / phyaga'i tu rjo
26b2(dkon brtsegs): song nub dang / lca bu dang / 'dulungs pa dang / dbu rgyan dang / rjod par dang / gser skur dang / mu tig gi do zhal dang / se me two dang / gya dro dang / mgul rgyan sna tshogs dang / rna Na 'du ba ker dang / 'gro rgyan dang / 'phreng ba'i lnga ldan
26b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi da sa zhe nga sa kyi / phying chu ga rnas ma / sa 'o// mi gyi pa
26b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni rin po ches snyim pa ba kang / la la ni gser gra snyem pa bkang ste/ bcoM ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// chagasu bcad pa 'di yang smras so// gar rten gang
26b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gnas bcas nas// gang zag mchog la mchod 'gyur la/ de 'gro ba'i grogs po dang // rtag par rgyun tu 'phrad par shog/ lA ma yin gi dbang po thag zang si ris kyis ji ltar byas pa
26b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du/ lA ma yim gi dbang po rang seMs kyis kyang / bcoM ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdu nig shing rta la zhon te/ bcoM ldan 'das la ldan gsu du bskor ba byed rnying // tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis
26b7(dkon brtsegs): bco ldan 'das la mngon par bsnyad pa/ stobs bcu bcan 'dren khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// myi 'jigs pa'i rigs bral khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// tshes la ma 'dres des pang gyu 'i po// ka'agro byin 'drin po khyod la phyag 'argyal
26b8(dkon brtsegs): kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor rgyud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mthar phyin thang nas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gre ba bying bye sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo// seMs can 'grogs kyang rgod pa myi na 'i
27a1(dkon brtsegs): na ldaphra nga // mdze gzhisas chom ny-ichim so// macan 'gyod sbyin du'i gzugs / 'gre smrig rgya dra ba byed kyis ma byur// 'den bya
27a2(dkon brtsegs): sa du byed// gang bag myed cing dadag gi byar byed// chos kun sang zhi byed bkun las pe / rang cini myo cing gami myong ni zhes bstan// su TI ga bder gshegs pasrur pa ding thos te/ rjes sum bya
27a3(dkon brtsegs): pa myed pa'i rlos 'phreng du// de ding 'dren pa'i sras su gyung ba ste// ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yang ltar spyod// rje 'drer khyil 'dag pa snyid bsod nams gang // ji lang rgyal ba'i sa ni mkhyen 'gyur // dge ba'i rtsangs sus
27a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong dag 'dir// 'gro brtsal gyis sangs rgyas grub par shig// bam po gsum pa'o// / lA ma yin gi dbang po shing rtas ji ltar byas pa de bzhin
27a5(dkon brtsegs): lA ma yin gi dang bskabs lda gyis kyang / bco ldan 'das la mdzad pa byas te/ rin po che sna 'duni ga shing rtsa la non nas// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsu bskor byed cing / rdul gi me tog rjes kyis / tshigs kyi
27b1(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'dri dag gis brtsos 'das la mngon par bskyed pas// 'khor ba'i rgyam po'i rnams pa sa rdzas rgal ba// rgal nas skye ba rgyur gi rjes 'gro sgral yang cing // 'de gshegs par mthang bde 'jigs myed sos
27b2(dkon brtsegs): spyan mangs pad par gshegs pa khyod kyi nangs la 'dugs// rje mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thas cad kun du mabyind// byin ci ldog lo 'thibs por rab gis drol te// 'khrul ba phyig rgya la zu sa shes gyur rjes la// mdus
27b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i drug pa rje bskyed sa rtogs par mdza // phye 'chog cad kyis chos rnas thams cad smra ma dang // sreg myung zhing myig yor mtshungs zhes rab tu med// thung ri dam mi spyod kyimachos kyi sgram mchog 'byed/ 
27b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ga na sa sa s+ho// ngas kya na / 'di sa sa kyi kyi khyes sa dzi mas
28a1(dkon brtsegs): zil gis sangang// ris mnan de dag la byed byed// nims tra 'o khril brlag pa'i // lha ma'in gri dbang ba sgra gcang gis ri ltar byas bre pa'i na gu shA mi phyi rje ma rgyol gyis kyi
28a2(dkon brtsegs): btsamam das la med du rgyas napa/ ring po che sna 'dud gag ts+tshal nor sa/ na lda 'das la la gsu bsnying pabyed cing / me tig skya sna thos mngo byor ro/ tshog su ba cad pa dag zon rgyal 'dus
28a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bskyed pa// 'dren pa blo gros zhi ba po// zhi gnas dgyes par 'gro ba yin// 'dod snang rtsi mug rdul bzhin mdzad// char pas rdul rnams zhi bgyid bzhin// 'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad// grugs sbyin gis ni myed
28a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin no// nags btang nags mes shing bsregs ltar// de bzhin nyon mod sa dra ba sreg/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig na// dpag tu mye da par dge rtsa 'dzin// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad do// 
28a5(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsis lus zhugs dug bzhin no// mun pa mun nag sel mdzad de/ mun khung sgren ma 'bar ba bzhin// chos kyi tshul yang ste na mdzad do// nor la la ni ran chem yon tan bzhin// lA ma yin
28a6(dkon brtsegs): gr-i dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gi dbang po yul las mngon par dga' bas kyang / rin po che sna bdun go shing rtsal zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsu bskor ba byed nas/ 
28a7(dkon brtsegs): 'i so// tshigs su cad pa dag gis pa na das mi mngon par to / sum dag yi me mapa 'u gyis la// gsul me sa gsum nga snga la 'o/ du
28a8(dkon brtsegs): bcad dang byis dang dumang // thugs byar gyi skyems byed pa phyag tshal lo// khyod kyi dang mo thu la'i dgra ba tso// gang du'ang myi bsnyengs kyi skyod ba ba bgyis// khyed nyon mongasanas kyis yang 'khrugs
