28b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa kun su drug rlom lus/ ba'o/ mthu chen khyod kyis byis pa legs bsgos te// khyod kyi thugs ni gra dang byes la mnyam// thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros shig/ 'gro ba kun du khyod ni bzhung mi yangar// shes
28b2(dkon brtsegs): rab rdzam grol srid pa'i sred pa skyems// shes rab rnam drug khyod nathugs kyang ngag// chos rjes kun la thugs ni chags mi mang // thams cad zil mnamathung mchog khyod 'dra myed// lha ma yin ga dbang po yul las
28b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' bas ji lta byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yi gi dbang ba myig ba zungs kyis kyang / ban+de ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gi shing rtsa la zhen te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsu bskor
28b4(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / bco ldan 'das la ter chen pos yang phul nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcoM ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dpa'o chen po khyod kyis ni// chos rjes yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen// gang
28b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di tshes shes brjod pa yang // de ni dang btags cig tu zad// chos rnaMs chos kyi de'i yis// rdzab kun tu myi dmyigs so// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni ming tsam zad zhes gsungs// myingan mying gis
28b6(dkon brtsegs): dben pa ste/ mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no// chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste/ mying yang myed ces khyod kyis bshad// rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang // bshad pa ci yang ma mchis te// glang gyis kyang nim bya na bying / 
28b7(dkon brtsegs): su la'ang bshad pa ma mchis so// khyod kyi sras po myi mchog rjes// chos rnams da ltar 'tshal nas ni// chos rjes la yang myi chags par // rdo la spyod de thub pa rtse/ rgyulha ma yin gri drab dropo myog
28b8(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yi gi dbang po'i'ajig rten gsurnam par garten pas kyang / bco ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po ches bdun ni zhing rtenan te// bcoMm lda ngas la 'atsug slom sgo myong
29a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mu tig gi do zhal yang phul nas/ tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// dgra zla ma mchis khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshul khrims dang ni na tsu
29a2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes stobs// des ni 'jig rten gsu na mtshungs ma mchis// de ltar khyod ming thul mtshungs ma mchis// khyed kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pa so na// gzugs kyi stobs kyis loso gsuM zil gyis mnas/ 
29a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i stongs kyis macan de lu gcu 'chags// seM cug su 'jigs shing gzugs kya das// rdul khrims stengs kyis khyod nipa rjod // skye ba mkhas pas sa chunam ma lo // khyo su
29a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldanani dathugs kyang dag// mi'i seng ge mngad pa thos / da 'byor// shes rab stongs kyis byings sus 'ga' ma mchi sa// ngas mi myongs 'jig rten gsuM 'dul nas// 'khor du ming zhes
29a5(dkon brtsegs): bung sgra bsgrags te// rtog ge'i tshigs kyi blo gros zil gis mnan// lha ma yin gi dbang po 'jig gsunam par gden gyis ri lta ngas pi bzhin du// lha ma yin gi dbang po rje snang byed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la
29a6(dkon brtsegs): mched du byas nas/ ri po che sna dun gi shing na la do rtse// bcoM ldan 'das la lan gsubasgrar ba byed cing // rin po ches snyim pa dgrang ste tor nas/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis bco ldan 'das la mngon par ba stong // thub pa ches
29a7(dkon brtsegs): skye bo 'tshogs pa'idi// dadab de yid kyis khyod kyi nal du lta// kun gis rgyal ba mdun na bzhugs par mthod// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la// skye bas
29a8(dkon brtsegs): dri'in mo sor 'chal// zung babyed kyi gsung bye lta byung // de'i rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig 'drab la// padzod kyis tha dad gsungal 'tshal cing // 'grongs
29b1(dkon brtsegs): dor ji lta ba ni du 'tshal// deni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// gsung gcig dang du brjod pa mngad pas ni// gcig le 'dog gi gnang la dgag pa mngang // 'dren pas su dag ma bslabs rtogs pa dang nga// de
29b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres macan// lAm yi gi dbang po rnam par snang byed gis ji ltar byas pa bzhin du// lha ma ying gi dang po tang bathung gis kyang / bco ldan 'das la mched ba byas nas/ rin 'i me sna bdu gi shing bya la nas
29b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lam gsu bskor ba byed cing / mu nying dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste gdor nas tshigs su bcad dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngom par bstod do// rgyags dang brgyal sdig pa'i lha spyod gang // ying dag rab tu dang
29b4(dkon brtsegs): myi nga ba gshegs kyis// blol mngon par dga' ba de dag bag mchis te// mtshungs myed bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras/ chos rjes 'di dag po bo nyid kyis ma mchis te// rmi lam dga' ba thes cang cad
29b5(dkon brtsegs): ma ma lags 'ang // rdzil ma dag spyo mamachis kyang 'dushes pa/ sa// de kyang rgyal bas chos rjes banas cad rab tu gzigs/ sto ka 'i zhin dang ma rungs shing dru'i chung 'du/ byis pa'i dri
29b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyid// gang dag rtag tu bag mchis de gshegs dri mnga' sa// mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni tshungs myi bgyid// rgyal ba khyod kyi skul le rtag du 'ag mchi snga gang / sri mu tshig dam
29b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag mi la yong mi mchi// chos rnaMs thams cad rmi lam 'dra bar rnam lartags nas// yang dag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// de nas thag zangs ris las bstsogs pa lha ma yin gyi rdobang po bye ba phrag drug brgya
29b8(dkon brtsegs): be de dag gis/ mchod pa rdze ba 'di lta bu byas nas/ byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang ying byi 'i skyes te na thal mo sbyar nas bco ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal
30a1(dkon brtsegs): bco ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lha ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i ngos la yang thugs su chud nas
30a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das rjes kyi chos nyid te/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bco ldan 'das gi zhal gi sgo nas 'od zor 'i dos sna tshogs kha dog tu ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / sesom
30a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / dmar po dang / gang po dang / leb rgan dang / nel dang rdul gi kha dog la bu byung nas/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas yang bkang ste phyir log nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ldon gsu bskor ba byas
30a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drug tu rung ngo // de nas che dang ldan ba rta thul snyan las lang swA ste/ bra gos 'phrag pa ga / gtubazar sa/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la bcugs te/ bcom
30a5(dkon brtsegs): ldang 'das ga' 'di ljags su thal ma snang ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dum pa la 'i dranatshigs su ba cad de nus na// 'jig rten ldan pa ne sgra nig ma mchis pang // mi'i mi dge 'dzum la
30a6(dkon brtsegs): myi mdzad na/ drang srong chen po ji slad 'dum pa mdzad/ skyes bu mchog gi 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// lha myin mchod pa rgya chen gzigs 'gyur nas// 'jig rten pa ma band khyod ni 'dzum mdzad ma// lha myi rnams la
30a7(dkon brtsegs): lung bstar bka' bstsal gsol// de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// di ring su yis dogs myed rgya chen sems// 'khor khor yang dag bskyed par 'gyur cig gu// de bzhin gshegs pas gang
30a8(dkon brtsegs): gis bas ma mkhyen nus// mi'i seng ge 'dzum ba ma dang par gyur// de ring yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis su// myi'i mchog la dad pa gang gis bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gis pas mkhyen te// yid du
30b1(dkon brtsegs): yod ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// bder gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// 'di ltar bder gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i tshe// su'is dpung bcas bdud ni de btso zhes// 'khor 'di dri ring the tsom
30b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tsham par 'gyur// drang srong cher po rgyal bgralas rgya// / the tsam 'tshal ba'i so mnyis bcad du gsol// myi mchog khyod kyis di ring 'gro ba'i// be tsom byung te'i gus par bcang dru ga la// de nas che
30b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul gis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig sa su bcad de/ tshe dang ldan pa rtsa thul la bka' rtsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten pa ni phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa
30b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'bras bu ma lus bstan par byas// bstan pa de ni rtse giH/ ga yid kyis nyon// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyi re// lha myin rjes kyis nga mchod 'di byas de// de dag seMs ni
30b5(dkon brtsegs): la'ang chags myed pas// nam mkha'i ngos la lag 'thil chags mad bzhin// lha myin 'tshegs dang pa'i yang byas te// de dgangal mchod pa 'di byas pa// blo can de dag lha myi ni ras bor te/ 
30b6(dkon brtsegs): mdze ris deng nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag phyi nus rgyal ba myi'i seng ge re// gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// bsnyen bskur byas nas yid 'ong stsal ba sa/ de dag thams cad ma tshen ma thun rgya
30b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// de rje bde gshegs khrag khrig drug cu rjes// 'jig rten smon duphyogs su grags pa ste// de dag mi gnas chos mi ston mdza cing / kyai ltung bcas pa'i ma ga skyed 'grel bcur gyur
30b8(dkon brtsegs): dzis ma dag sa kyi / shi mas kyi gyi sa des ga 'i drus
31a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag zhing der dga' bar spyod par 'gyur// brtan de dag myi khos thams cad skyong // bla na myed pa'i theg pa ston par 'gyur// de dag rje'i rgyang du gyur bzhin bskal pa khrag khrig drug du
31a2(dkon brtsegs): bar yang // rnam par 'dren pa de dag tshor bar 'gyur// chags pa myed pa'i chos kyang ston pa mdzad// thub pa de dag mya ngan 'das 'gyur te// 'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu ni 'gyur nas// bskal 'a
31a3(dkon brtsegs): khrig drug nu chang bar ni/ rang 'byung rjes kyi dam chos gnas par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs// ga 'gi bye ma snyed kyi skye bo 'dul// dgra las rgyal ba ro rgyal bar mtshan mthun 'gyur// zhing dang
31a4(dkon brtsegs): dang chos gnas 'gyur ba'ang mthuran// 'dir gshegs de dag khrag khrig drug rnyi// skyes pa bud med yongs su sbyin mdzad do// bla na myong ba'i theg pas 'dems par 'gyur// mkhas pa de dag rgyal 'i 'jung ma
31a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin// rgyal bas lha myin de dag lung bstan pa// 'jig rten na bya drung srong chen po gsungs/ kaulha dang bcas pa 'i 'jig rten de thos nas// yid rangs rgyang cing stongs kyang skyes
31a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// lA mi yan gi lung 'astan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos// lA ma yin gi mchod pa rje ba de lta bu'i di mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di snye du
31a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig mngon par 'du mdzad na// 'di lta bu'i rna bar smin par 'grub bsnyam nas/ de'i tshe seMs ji ltar mnyam par bzhag pas/ 
31a8(dkon brtsegs): bskal ba grangs myed par yang rjes su dran zhing / bcoM ldan 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyud de dang do 'chi'apho dang skye ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag mngon 'du mdzad po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
31b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis phyir myi ldog pa'i bsnyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad rje su dran par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po
31b2(dkon brtsegs): bco ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid rje su dran par gyur nas 'di ste du sems te/ bco ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na/ de'i thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang 'jig rten gi khes gang 'ga'
31b3(dkon brtsegs): klung kyi byem ste dra sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khor pa de dag thes cad ma'i lus thob par gyur te/ lA ma yin gi mchod pa ji snyed du mes can ro res bskal pa gang log krung gi bye ma snyed du ma tshad pa byas kyang / de dag sde
31b4(dkon brtsegs): thugs bskyod pa cig la yang lan len par mi nus so// skye so/ de nas che dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ting nge'i dzin de las langs te/ ngo mtshar dang dang pa thob par gyur nus/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
31b5(dkon brtsegs): su chad po mdzad pa stod nga / zub pa byang chub gnas na/ thugs byu pa 'i ringal dang // lam yi gi mamed du ding // ma myi ngang phyi ma na// de zhi'i ma mthar byin te// mA sde'isam 'gyur ba/ 
31b6(dkon brtsegs): ma da kyi bya/ yang mi du sa yang ba'o// dpa pa ched ba ma sa zug gags
32a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis sa bskal pa khrag khrig rjes su yang // sems can mchod la mchod par 'os// yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba khyod// ngi neng+ge'i rgyal mtshan gyis// phyogs bcu'i rijig rtem khams bad
32a2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bas yas mchod par 'os// mi'i sing ge khyod li ni// bskal pa khrag khrig dpag myed par// gang 'ga'i bye mches mang ba'o// ba dan tshogs kyis mchod par 'os// drang srong chen po smra ba'i stag/ 
32a3(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang // gzhan yang seMs can gang 'tshegs pa// dpag bzung dpe la gnas su gsol// gal te ga nga 'gi' bye snyed gi// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khes rjes kyi// sems can
32a4(dkon brtsegs): thas cad sangs rgyas su// mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan pa// de dag re ri'i 'go la yang // gang 'gil skye ma'i bya snyed 'gyur te// 'go so de dag re re zhing // de snyed kha dang ldan 'gyur la/ 
32a5(dkon brtsegs): kha rnams de dag re re zhing // lce dang kha'i grangs mnyam la// gang 'ga'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// bskul bar bstod pa bgyis kyang ni// rgyal ba de dag spobs myi ngas// khyod kyi yon tan mthar myi phyin// rgyal
32a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar yon tam gi/ pha rol tu mi phyin par 'gyur// der che bco ldan 'das kyis dge slong rjes la bka' stsal lo/ dge slong dag legs so leg so/ nga'i nyan thos rjes mi dang por gyur pa/ ye shes dang ldan pa gyur
32a7(dkon brtsegs): chos su gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshangs par gyur pag stag gnas te/ de dag ni nga'i yon tan gi tshogs la 'jug pa cu stag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dpag tu byung
32a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa ste/ yen tan bas gis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon nan rjes dang / de'i nan gshegs pa'i'o yon tam gi pha rol du phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs par me kyang go ces
32b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gis mi khyab pa'o// dge slong dag de gzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gi tshogs kyang 'jig rten gyi khas gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du shong
32b2(dkon brtsegs): bar myi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gi tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'ga' glang gi bye ma snyed kyis/ bskal pa gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyis tshad bzung bar brjod kyang
32b3(dkon brtsegs): brjod par myi nus/ bses kyang bas par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs la sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa sems na
32b4(dkon brtsegs): gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i seMs can de dag thams cad la/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du ma bskyed pa gcig kyang med de/ so so tsam gi khams ni tshad med pas/ seMs can gi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi
32b5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams de bzhin gshegs ril seMs bskyed pa re re las byung ngo / sems can go khams ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can gi khaMs ji ltar mi bzad pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams
32b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re los byung ngo // sems de ni sems can thams cad lnga phan pa'i don du skyes/ sems can thams cad kyis tshad kyang lan lon par mi nus so// de ni'i phyir zhe na/ 
32b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zong dang bcas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po'i sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du 'byung ba ni/ sems nan 'khor ba la gzhal ba 'di dag myong na las
32b8(dkon brtsegs): pa la ji ltar gzhol bar 'gyur zhes te/ zang zing myed pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rjes kyi don du zang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par
33a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// dge slong dag sngo 'byung gA 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu byed da pagrang du bye / bas gis kyi khyang la/ mtshungs pa myed pa/ brjod du yong ba 'das pa 'in/ rnon dus na ba'i dgan
33a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bci pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes du 'dul ba'i kha la sbyar sa/ bla ma med pa/ lha dang mi rjes kyi snyom pa/ sangs rgyas btsa
33a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ dbang po tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog des/ sos po skyed pa re re zhing gang 'ag ri'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams kyi seMs can rnams la
33a4(dkon brtsegs): phan par dgongs pa mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang / 'jig rten ge khams gang 'gro'i klung gi bye ma snyed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zheng rtsig tu gyur te/ yongs su dag cing ngan song
33a5(dkon brtsegs): dang myi khyong pa thams cing yang su chud pa ste/ de bani na gshegs pa dbang po tog ri'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na log par nges pa'i semasacan gi skye ba med myed par/ gyur te/ lha bi rnam yos med par gyur / 
33a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yang myed par gyur te/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mthar yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yod myed par gyur te// ngan sang ga rgyu lagyur bri'i nye mongs pa dang / las byung ba yong med par gyur
33a7(dkon brtsegs): to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ba'i na gshegs pa des yun ring ponas sems rnaMs dge' ba'i chos rnams la cud cing btams te/ rjes su bstan cing bslangs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dag btso ba yang dag par rdzogs
33a8(dkon brtsegs): mi sangs rgyas dang byag gis/ sas kyi ring da 'thod ba'is sen nus kyang bdeb lnga thob bar 'gyu ste// 'di ltar la 'di 'ad 'i 'ad dang ldan pa gyur / lo lim khyi nas byung ba'i ring ba dang ldan par gyur te// la ni sa
33b1(dkon brtsegs): cha gi bde ba dang ldar par gyur to// la la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag bde ba de la yang spyod la/ bde ba de dag la yang
33b2(dkon brtsegs): bar zhen pa med par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ bung ba me tog gi khubs nye bar 'tsho yang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin du seMs can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongasu spyad kyang de la mngon par zhen po myed do// 'di lta ste dper nga/ 
33b3(dkon brtsegs): bar snang la rgyu ba'i byin par snang la yang de la cha mngon par chags pa myed do// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongasu spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
33b4(dkon brtsegs): ma'akhod pa'i sos can rjes la yid mi 'de bar gyur rir mi dga' ba med/ rmongs par gyur pa med de/ gzhan du ni yid bde bar gyur pa'i dga' ba sha stag la yongs su spyod do// de ni 'di ltar sngon dge ba'i
33b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sos came dag ni de bani ma gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des/ sngon byang chub ses dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ myi dag pa las yongasu bzlog ste dge ba la btsud las de dag
33b6(dkon brtsegs): la las gang gos sdug bsngal gyis tsher myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnabar sbyin pa dang myed par 'byung bami dge ba'i las de lta bu yo myed do/ de ma bsdogs po'i phyir sdug bsngal cher bar 'gyur ba'i rna smin par myi 'thung / de dag gis
33b7(dkon brtsegs): ri rmongs pa'i seMs tsam gis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rjes la sdug bsngal yang ma yid/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshe ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngor bar 'dus ma byas te/ de bsngags pa'i phyir rmod 'ang byung ba'i cho
33b8(dkon brtsegs): ba sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde la yang ma yin pa de myi 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing des rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug/ bsngal mi'i byung bas nyams su
34a1(dkon brtsegs): mi bde ba'i nyi ma 'chang / rlung nyams su mi bye ba myi ldang ngo / char nyams su myi bde ba myi 'bas po de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sngor byang chub sres dpa'i srungs spyod pa'i rtse/ sos ca de dan
34a2(dkon brtsegs): la lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thos cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing / shes pa'i rje su 'brang la ston cing bshad pas sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa de thos nas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thos cad
34a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing / shes pa'i rjesu 'brang bar yongasu bsgrubs pas/ las de'i rje bar smim pa de dag la rmod par 'gyur ba 'am/ yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med do// rmongs la rjes la rgyu gang gis bde ba yang ma yin/ 
34a4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshe ba 'byung ba myed do// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gi tsher med cing / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug sngal ba yang myed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
34a5(dkon brtsegs): der skyes pa'i seMs can de bzhin gshegs pa des btams pa de dag na chos la/ rim 'gror bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to// de dag/ 'chag na yang chos nyid la sems shing chos la mos pas zhen pa'i yid
34a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'chag ste/ chos la mos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de dag la sdug bsngal gi tshor ba myi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du 'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang sad pa dang / spyod la mthas cad du yang sdug bsngal
34a7(dkon brtsegs): myi 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i seMs can de dag la yang pha ma spangs pa myed do// de'i phyir yang pha ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo // yang dag pa'i spongs pa yod pas ro dag la skye ba myed do// de'i phyir
34a8(dkon brtsegs): dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang myed do// sems can de dag la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang myed/ de ni 'di ltar seMs can de dag chos thos cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/ de dag la myi sdug
34b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang 'phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang byed do// sems de ni 'di ltar sos can 'di dag seMs can thos cad la mnye ba nyid kyi seMs nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro// de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang byed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
34b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag chos tham cad la mngon na pa'i phyir / sug bsngal dang bral ba'i sdug 'asngal ni sug pa las 'byung ste/ de'i phyir dag la sug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang gyid/ ma cing dag la srog bsnga
34b3(dkon brtsegs): sug sal phyi/ 'a rje'i sun sa byed pa'i phyi nga/ gzhan du 'du byer gyi mug sabu med de// 'di sa ste me rtag pa'i mug sa da/ 
34b4(dkon brtsegs): padiri dum pa'i chos na/ de ba'i gshegs par da 'i tshig ni bsngal ba gang 'gadi klung kyi rgyam snyi na duzugs pa / ras gsungs pa ma bya pa'i mas cid byung yang sangs rgyas kyi
35a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru cer che ba spangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ seMs camede snyed yongasu smin par bya bar nus so// gsol pa bcoM ldan 'das de mi ma lags so
35a2(dkon brtsegs): bkar stsal ba dge slong dag de la ci snyam du spos dang bzhen pa rnaMs nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang / tshul khrims zhan pa nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi rang dang / thos pa 'am pa nas nye bar bsgrubs yir thos pa'i rlang
35a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus zhan pa nas nye bur bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar dang / dran pa zhan pa nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dran pa bar dang / ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gi bar dang // shes rab zhan
35a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar kyis/ sems camade snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam/ pa 'am/ bde bar bsgribs pa 'am/ sdug bsngal gsal ba 'am
35a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba'amasems can de snyed yongasu smin par bya bar nus sam// gso la ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
35a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal la/ dge slong dag legs so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa bzhan pa dang / seMs zhan pa dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab zhan
35a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gis yongasu bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / nyes pas bsas
35a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nyes bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed kyi dom bya'o ro// de dag la pham par byas sa pa'am/ bde ba bsgrubs pa'o// sdug bsngal bstsal pa'am/ de ltar thag gru me ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
35b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongasasu smin par bya bar myi nus so// dge slong dag de la ji snye du semasade'i tshe de'i dus na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa dbang po tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig
35b2(dkon brtsegs): yin swA/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag cang mi zeng bar khod de/ de'i che shang phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khaMs gang 'gar gru gi byem snyed 'das pas/ 'jig rten gyi khas zla 'i 'o
35b3(dkon brtsegs): zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ don do bzhin gshegs srog zi brjid 'phags 'i lartul ba zhes byang du ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ba zhes te chos kyang sna rtse/ der 'jam dpal gzum nur gyur pa
35b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas/ bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs la gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
35b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar myi bajed kyi 'jig rten gi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs shag kya thub pas chos ston na gyis bco ldan 'das shag tu thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o// de skad
35b6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brji 'phags pa'i rgyal pos 'je pal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 'di skad ces bkar stsal to/ 'jam dpal de'i dus la bab pa
35b7(dkon brtsegs): shes ma song shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sman las langs te/ bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grazi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po ri zhabs laM phyag 'tshal te/ ldan gsu bskor ba byas
35b8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskam pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa 'am tsam gas// 'jam dpal gzhun nur gyur pa 'jig rten ga khyis zla ba'i 'od zer gris rab tu
36a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyan di nas kyi snang bar gyu te/ bco ldan 'das shag kya thul pa'i sum snga pa 'dir gnas par gyur to// denas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs sa ngan tshad rkyen mam te/ phyogs gcog
36a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug no/ phyogs gcig tu gyur phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcoM ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bka' sa bsol te/ bcom ldan 'das glang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag de la ji sa dus
36a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang ba tog ces byar byung ba de gang zhig yin zhes bka' stsal ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das nyid ni de'i ci de'i dus na/ dbang po'i tog ces dgyi ba 'di pa'i na gshegs pa
36a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bco ldan 'das ni bse gis myi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/ sos can yongasu smin par bgyi ba la chog pa myi mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba
36a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis// sos can byang chub sems dpa' chos rnaM sa la dgod pas chog mi mnga' ste/ la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smran/ rgyal ba bco'o// rgyal ba dam pa rgyal ni
36a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog/ rgyal b.rab ces bya ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid lags pa yang dag par brjod pas yang dag par brjod do// dri skad ces smras pa/ dajam dpal gzhun nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshig su bcang
36a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag smras so// dpa' ba rjes ni thabs mkhas te/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing / sos can yongs su smir mang dbyar// dpa' mchan pa rnam par 'phrul/ bye ba brtson rgyal ba nyid/ sangs rgyas nyid
36a8(dkon brtsegs): dus bya byeng // dadung rtsig pa'i 'du shes brgyal/ byang chub mchog tu thunapa kyang 'dug// steng gsu drug nus rtsig go// sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag srung bas/ de ltang thub pa thebs songs pa/ rgyal gakhyod su
36b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam// dadung dang po thugs bskyod dang // de dang der ni yongs bsad de// dadung du yang 'dren pa khyod// sangs rgyas mang po stem pa ma dang // rna ba sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis// gang zag sa dru ga spyo pa
36b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la chags bya mngar// khyod kyis gang yang mkhyen mdzad do// rgya byin tshangs pa'i ma byad dang // la lar bdud gi cha byad kyis// seMs can rnams kyi den mdzad de// 'jig rten rjes kyis rtogs mi nus// bud med
36b3(dkon brtsegs): cha byang spyod pa mdzad// dud 'gro'i skyenas rjes na'ang gdang // 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te// pad ma chus myi chags pa bzhin// 'dren pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi// 'jig rten 'di'i rjes 'jug sadzad// des ma skye su
36b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag rjes// thugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan brjod// la lar lham pa yongasu bstan// la lang mya ngan 'das pa bstan/ la la ni 'a khor lo skor// la lang spyad pa spyod pa mang// so so tsam
36b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i den slad du// dges shing 'gur len rol pa mdzad// bshum sa mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad// seMs can sus kyang yong ma 'tshal// 'jigs pa myi mnga' 'jigs la lhor// sems can rnam par 'dul
36b6(dkon brtsegs): der du// 'dren pa rna bar 'phrul pa mngang// rmongs myed rmongs pa'i tshul bstar te// byis pa ma lags byis tshul gis// sems can rje par 'dul slad du/ 'dren pa rno bar 'phrul pa mdzang // smyos pa ma lags skyes pa'i
36b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul// zhab ma lags zha ba ltar// rna bar 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can rjes ni 'dul bar mdzad // de ltar bse yas 'gon me khyed// dam pa'i chos ni bsam mi khya// dpa' chen khyod la phyog kyang
36b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jal// sos tsamathu chen 'drang gyur cig/ sngon byung po 'di srungs chen pos zhus pa'i le'u ste lnga ba'o// / de nas phyi'i rgyal po 'da' bzangs brgyad khri drug stong gis/ lha mi an gi dbang pyad dag gi na
37a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang mthong nas/ lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ bco ldan 'das la gzhal du myed pa'i dad pa skyes te/ bcoM ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ bcoM ldan 'das mchod pa'i don du rim po
37a2(dkon brtsegs): ches bdun gi khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu bkra ba lta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to// lha'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / be dur+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang
37a3(dkon brtsegs): rdo'i snying po dang / bdun no// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang / rin po che sna bzhi'i lan ka ni ga dra ba ris bkra ba/ lta na stug pa'i rim bdun gis kun nas bskor to// rin po che sna bzhi ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang rdul dang bye du
37a4(dkon brtsegs): r+ya dang shel lo/ gser gi lan ka rnams gi sa rigi ka ba dang / gdang bu rjes ni gser// shar ba rnaMs ni dngul/ rdul gi lan kan rjes kyi rdul ka ba dang / gdang bu rjes mi rdul/ shar ba rnaMs gas
37a5(dkon brtsegs): bai dur+yalan kar rjes kyi kab dang rngang bu rnams ni be dur+ya/ shar ba rnams ni shel/ shel gi la kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / rdang su nas ni shel/ shar ba rnams ni rdul las byas pa'o// khang pa brtsegs pa
37a6(dkon brtsegs): sa can da nga bkrung/ lha dbugs/ ri she nas na // de dag kyi ri nas 'du las byas panas ga ste/ 'di la ste gse sul du sa/ shes mu na
37a7(dkon brtsegs): pang po dang / de'i snying po dang 'dud ni/ khang pa po rtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna 'du gi grab bkrab/ snga na sdug pa/ 'di lta ste gser ga dra ba dang / rdul gi drab dang / bye 'u phyi'i dra ba dang / mu shel gri dra dang / mu tig dmar ze'i
37a8(dkon brtsegs): dra ba dang / spug gi dranga? dang / rdo'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas bkar bar gyur to// rdugs bkra lta ma stug pa brgyad khwa drug snying mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas rdo'i snying po'i b.rig rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs
37b1(dkon brtsegs): ba sha stag go/ rgyal mtshan bkra ba lta ma stug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngom par sprul te/ rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang / rdul dang bye dUr+ya dang / shel rang rinam po che sna bzhi las bsgrubs pa sha stag ste/ rgyal mdza
37b2(dkon brtsegs): sngon po rjes ni tig sar po tsam/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po can/ rgyam mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog kar po cas/ sha stag mngon par sprul to/ ba dam la dog sna tshogs can 'gra ri lta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong la
37b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul par gyur to// bla re bkra ba lA na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mdo na bar sprul bar 'gyur te/ bla me de dag kyang gser skung gi bla re dang ta/ rdul skud kyi bla re dang / bye pur+ya'i bA re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bA re dang / 
37b4(dkon brtsegs): smug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re ste/ rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha sdig go// de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs de dag gi/ sa khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / thugs brgyad
37b5(dkon brtsegs): khri drug snyi po de dag dang / rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / ba dan brgyad khri drug stong pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la yul ba dang // de dag thams steng gi bar sdang la lding zhing bco ldan 'das la lam su
37b6(dkon brtsegs): bskor byas so// 'di lta ste dperar glang po che'i rgyal pos srungs kyi bumi su bcu rtsa gsuMgi lha rnams 'gro bel khyer zhing / nam mkha' la song ste/ yeng sus tol du 'jog go// de ba nim du khang pa rtsegs pa de dag
37b7(dkon brtsegs): drugs ga dang/ rgyam ma ga nga/ ba da gdang / tha de dag tung snang gi rnam sa dza ma'i bring / bcom ldan sul ladagasu 'ano byed par mgyurd te// denas bzus brgyad ni chu stong ba du
37b8(dkon brtsegs): gis bcoM ldan 'das la mchod pa byas ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsubaskor ba byes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing / tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bco ldan 'das la mngon par bstong par
38a1(dkon brtsegs): sa dang thilas rjebral khyong la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' dang 'thilas rje gral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can gnas yas kha lo sbyo sa phyag 'tshal lo// khyed dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag par
38a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis so// bdag cag rnams kyang sred myed bu'i lus ldar zhing // su nurtsa gsum gnyis mtshan gis de yang lag brgyad// dpe byang babang po cu shin du mdzes byas pa'i// sangs rgya smra 'dre pa khyod 'drang
38a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur par shog/ bdag cag 'dem gang 'od kyi zil ldan zhing // rnam don 'phags gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes 'gyur te// su~M dal mchog dang bdag cag ldan 'gyur cig/ 'gro ba rnams spyod mya ngan
38a4(dkon brtsegs): zla bar shog/ badrag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan zhing shes rab ldan pa'i mchog tu gyur par shog/ da ltar rna par 'dren pa khyod lta bur// skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas grub pa
38a5(dkon brtsegs): shig/ 'dren pa 'jig rten mkhas pa kyong la du// bdag can mi 'dra ba stobs ban ldan pa dang / ma 'dres paca rgyar chos kyi mthar phyin cing / 'di ga to ma khas pa thams cad mkhyen pa shog/ 'an
38a6(dkon brtsegs): nga/ lce nga/ khrug me // de sa rgyas shi dug/ dus sa 'as sa kyis
38b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan// ltar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar skyed// rkang gnyis dam las de dag lung bstan gsol// 'gro ba thams cad thal mo rang sbyar cing // dga' ba'i sems dang mgur ba'i sems kyis 'khod// 
38b2(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lding 'gro bcir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal// rkang gonyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol// myi mchog khyed la khong dag mchi ba ni// 'gro ba thams cad the tsam myed 'gyur zhing // the tsom myed pas 'khor du 'jigs
38b3(dkon brtsegs): myed 'gyur// 'dis ni sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyis shes mchi// 'khor 'di 'jigs med rab du dga' bar 'gyur// yongs su spangs shing shin du skyon bsal bas// rgyal bas lung bstan de dag mngon dga' ste/ 
38b4(dkon brtsegs): srab ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin// the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom bcad du gsol// rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su smon pa mdzad// dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'drir 'dus 'gyur gyis// rang 'byung
38b5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka/ 'astsal pa// ta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten
38b6(dkon brtsegs): phan phyir 'dus pa ngas bstan pa// de'i 'bras bu dag 'i re du/ sa nyon// the tsam sa la la rab tu dga' bskyed/ bla ma myed pa'i byang chu'i ni tshol zhing // stobs dang myi 'jigs pa ni ni
38b7(dkon brtsegs): gang rnams kyis// 'dren pa 'jigs myed 'gyur ba btsal ba'i phyir// 'dangab chags dbang nges pa la mchod legs byos// sa 'dres pacu brgyad chos ni swA pa yi// sreng mye du las shin tu 'khrugs par
38b8(dkon brtsegs): phu bcu gnyis patshad da bye parang po rnaMs// ming su bcal phyir rol mchod pa byas// rgyal ba'i rdul khris ti 'didi 'dral ba dang // gan la shes rang dri/ zung gisu nidu ngur phreng rdzag de/ 
39a1(dkon brtsegs): di snye \u0f7f// dgal byin na na gnas rgya cing // rna 'dren thag khrimam rnams mched byas nas// de ga dang tha pa'i tshul ba dzug gan du du ba
39a2(dkon brtsegs): myi 'byung mtshan dang myi ldan med// rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun tu ma sa// ri rang rgyal mtshan bskal la rang 'byung 'gyur// le ni bye ba brgyad bcu bzhi bgrangs pa de// 'jig rten phan
39a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'dren pa de dag bzhugs// 'jig rten phan phyir rnam 'dren ma nye bzhag pas// lus can rjes la mnyam pa'i don mdzad da 'gyur// skyeb pa rdul myed 'gyur ba de dag gi// 'dus
39a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nga rgyal spangs pas brgyad nur 'gyur// de tshe skyob brdul dang bral rnams kyis// shin du seMs dul bye ba brgyad nu 'byung // 'grem po de dag 'gro ba ring bsal phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo ra ba su na
39a5(dkon brtsegs): nga pangs sa lda 'dig sun me dpa sa sa/ rdzu pa gas
39b1(dkon brtsegs): sa 'a da pa'i na na/ sa kyi'i sa 'jug du sus gyu gis/ du ma yi gi ma
39b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzi ni nga 'di dag gig/ tshad pa yang mthod/ lung lda pa 'ang mthong nas/ mchog tung bar bachar ba skyes te/ de dag dag mgu yo ras das/ dag ma gu sa/ dgang dru nga rji bde de byas nam
39b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mched pa phyir batsha par bya ste/ de dag gis ring po ci sna bdu gi gdugs bye phyi'i drab lnga rdzi 'gyur/ mu tig dmang de'i dbus bsgo pa/ gseng gi yub car bye du phyi'i chung me brgya sang dgyeng/ 
39b4(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i chun po sbyangs pa/ bye ba phrag phubacu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// rtswa sngo pa/ kha dog sngon po/ sdod pa lta bur ston pa/ 'odi sngon po 'byung ba/ rgyan sngon pos brgyan pa// be dU ru'i srad kyis bas
39b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// ner bu skar mdogagi bA re 'khor yug tu dpag tshad drug yod pa/ des 'al ra de dag zas cad yog pa gcig kyang steng gi bar snang
39b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par stsar te/ del rin pa kyi sde 'badun gri lnga ldi bkang / gdu mnges pa ltan sdug pa byed phrag dgu bsum drug mngon po ra sprul to// bla re de'i khyer yug du ring po tshe sna bdu gi rdo rje
39b7(dkon brtsegs): gse 'i nga ma na chen ko rgyal chung ni sa // snyan byed zag ga kyi
39b8(dkon brtsegs): dag pa na dam / rin 'i ma sa bdu gi dugs se gi nga ldang 'dzi te/ rnama'a'a' ba 'ding shing / rim po'i sung+yas su su chun pa de dag pa ga 'byo la sa
40a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i tshan 'das kyi phye ma dag kyang bcoM ldan 'das la mngon 'ar 'thong / lha'i a garu dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ud pa la'i phye ma dang / me tog sna tshogs kyang bami ldadu radas la mde por 'byed/ rten
40a2(dkon brtsegs): ud pa la dang / tsam pa ka'i 'brang ba dag kyang 'thor// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba dag kyang 'thor// spos nata ba sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba dang // ma brda'adang rgyam dag kyang 'dul te// lha ma yin gyis ches
40a3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de bzhin du mchod pa rgya cher byas so// de nas de dag gis rol mo dang / sil snyan de dag gis rol mo dang / sil snyam bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug le de dag byas pa'i sgras stong gsum gi stong chen po 'das
40a4(dkon brtsegs): rten khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang gis rol mo/ 'i sgra de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldeg par 'gyur to// rin pu skar mdog
40a5(dkon brtsegs): gi bra re dang / rin po che sna bdud gi lA ldi de dag dang / dril bu g.yer ki dro bo dag dang / khrung khrung de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las/ 'di la ste dper ma rol mo'i sil snyam yan lag brgyad dang ldam pa mkhas pas bkrol ba des
40a6(dkon brtsegs): rung byu sa/ de sa dru 'a du ba ning ma can de pa'i sgra 'byung bar gyur te/ ske des kyang steng gsu gi steng na ba'i 'jig rten gi khams rgyas par gyur te/ sems can gang gis kya ka m+bu de dag thos par gyur bde
40a7(dkon brtsegs): bang bcad kyang med pa sa ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chu las phyi hU~M ga // dengs klu bu mo dag gis po tog dam pa ma tshogs kyis tsha rjod pa gyur / nyi kyi
40a8(dkon brtsegs): sa ni sakyi sa kyi mo la sa ga nga sa pa sa kyi na
40b1(dkon brtsegs): rdza dang / bye ba drag dgu 'asus drug dang / rol po sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu 'acum drug dang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pabyas nas/ rlan bams ca dang ldan pa de dag par snang gi nam mkhalal 'khod de/ bci ldang
40b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnams la ras ces phyag la dang / com ldan 'dus la lan gsum bsgrung brgyus te/ thal mo sbyang nas/ bcom lan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'a'od rang gyur te// de'i tshe tshigs 'acang pa di dag kyi
40b3(dkon brtsegs): klu'i bu mo mkhas pa do dag yi rangs dag mgu yid kyis su// byang chub ni 'tshal zhing shag kya thub la dor ni mchod pa chen de byas// rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye 'chub cu drug gi gdugs nas mngon sprul te// dede bar gshes

40b5(dkon brtsegs): bris cang par gang nga nas thub la ri'is mchod pa byed// klu du ma de dag dang ba'i yid kyis thu lam gos phyag 'jal/ mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu'i gnas ras klu'i sel skar gyis/ mtsho
40b6(dkon brtsegs): sa gyur gas kyi thu de ni mo nga cas// sim sna de dag de gshegs pa mchod pa'i mdo rdzas gas grag/ ska nas 'i semasasar ldag na bya chung mangs ldan pa
41a1(dkon brtsegs): klu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i mdun du mchod pa byas// gzhal du myed pa'i seMs bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi pa tshol byed cing // 'jig rten don byed ba gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa grub por shog// ji ma
41a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu mnga' ba khyed ni sems can sdug bsngal 'grel pa ltar// chos kyang bstan de seMs can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol// chos rnams sgyu ma'i srog rma 'dra zhing dbul rgya bur nye rlung la/ ga/ char rgyun tshul
41a3(dkon brtsegs): phog pa'i chu phu ra la khur 'jig cing bdag po myed// me long nang gi gzugs brnyar 'dra bar 'dro ba thos cad brtags nas ni// 'gro ba dag la chos kyi yang dag de nyid bstan par 'i gyo// sgyu ma bkod pa la lung ma mchis brdzun gyi nyi po
41a4(dkon brtsegs): rmongs bgyid pa// skye bo myi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa// byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnaMs sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs// de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rjes lasan
41a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sa chen de la sprin 'a khrigs gyur na ri ltar rngub yang // yang dag tu ni ri ltang ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis// de ltar 'gro ba tha mas cad rang bzhin dbang po rmongs par 'gyid // shes pas brtags nas
41a6(dkon brtsegs): skye'o mkhas pa dag ni mongs par 'gyur ma mchis// yang drag dun gro ba thams cid rang bzhin ma mchis khyed ston ngas// des na na brgyal ba khyod la skye ro mkhas pa myi byed 'gyur/ khyod kyi sras nas
41a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi mangs rdza ma tha da// 'di kyi 'i bye'i'i yul phyir 'gre 'a di sa phyir nga // de yang rags pas smi sbed ma sa pa pa'i phyis skye 'ar sa no// sgrubs dong slong gnyin gnos de shen
41a8(dkon brtsegs): bzod rgya mag/ kyang su rjod gan 'os kyi tshol ma na pa men pa kyang sa 'a / sangs rgyas kya rtsog pa gyid 'gas rnal pa nga rlung bya
41b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcoM ldan 'das kyis/ la gru'i bu mo de dag gi ngas pathugs su chud nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gis bcoM ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa de gsol pa// 'jig rten mkhas 'ja
41b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren mchod khyod 'dzum mdzad// dpal sdug 'dzub mdzad la rgyu mnyis la ba bdag gis yod ma mthong // myi'i dbang po de la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs// de thos lnga myi lha myi mtshogs dang klu'i bu sa
41b3(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba ba// dri za rjes kyang skyob pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rje 'dren khyod kyis rgyu ches thams cad mkhyed// rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur
41b4(dkon brtsegs): yod ma mchis// de ltar bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thu gas chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs// de thos nas ni 'gro ba thes cad yid rangs dgongs pa chung par 'gyur// thub pa bde bar gshegs
41b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi// 'khor rje sra 'di dag don myong 'gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur// bde gshegs
41b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi 'dzum mdzad don thos rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung // 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod gi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tsom 'tshal// 'gyur te// // sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la sas nyi gang 'tshal ba// de dag
41b7(dkon brtsegs): ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsul the tsam 'gum du gsol// drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsol the tsom khri// rgyal ba gang gis dro ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul// su zhig yang rab
41b8(dkon brtsegs): tshimanas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// 'di ni su'i mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol// thos nas bdag cag yad rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur// khyod ni zhaH
42a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi drung du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag je ces 'tshal// 'dzum rgyu dga' ba bskyed pa thub pa the tsom bsngal du gsol/ thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom ma mchis 'gyur// rgyal ba'i
42a2(dkon brtsegs): sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur// de nas bco ldan 'das kyi ras/ tshe dang ldan pa te thul la tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal pa// rta thul legs rgyal ba'i dgengs pa 'du mal 'di ni legs pa dris/ 
42a3(dkon brtsegs): gru bu mos mchod ce 'jig rten pan phyi ngas ni 'dzum pa bstad de// de'i 'bras bu bstan gis yid gnyis tha la spangs pa'i seMs kyis nyonang // gang gi don bungs ni 'ju 'dir mdzad de'i tshig la nyon// klu ri du mo
42a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag chags myed yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs// 'gro ba thas cad stong par rje par bshig nas blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas// 'di ni byed tsher med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang myed// chos rjes de
42a5(dkon brtsegs): dag brdzun zhing smig rgyu mtshungs shing mi long gzugs brnyan 'dra/ dri dag rjes kyis mchod byas byas pa zo blo gros yang dag ngas shes te// rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba ste zhing bdag po myed mthong meg
42a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa rna bar phyi zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyum 'dra/ byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon la btab pa de yang 'di' drang srong // dral gzhal yas mchod byas pa dang 'gro ba stong gi/ 
42a7(dkon brtsegs): ngam/ glal sa ni 'thos ngas ni sangs kyi byin gan du 'gro bar 'gyur// su dus gsugang ste la'i nga du dge bang rtsi rdzogs ras// sa drang grags dang lda 'i lci ga sa 'bang thas gan 'gro hU~M
42a8(dkon brtsegs): nga bzhi pa chena'i dag 'byed// stong gyung de dag shegs bral nas ra rtse chad po gnas par gyud// rgyal ba'i sras rjes raba' bu dag bsrung nas me tshad ba nga// dag snang gnas su 'i sreng kyi
42b1(dkon brtsegs): lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra zer 'gyur// de dag de na lha'i bu mos bskor nas lha'i dga' ba spyod// pang ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du 'der gshegs mi gnas bre cen gnas// 'gro ba thes cang spong par rtogs rig rje chen las nyes par sa gyu
42b2(dkon brtsegs): skyob pa nas kyi dran pa rdol 'arkos bzhin yod mi nyams// de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te snyir dga' la spyad nas ni// che tshad yongasu zad nas de che rang 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bde gshegs ma spang grags ldan der yang lA mo
42b3(dkon brtsegs): 'i tshitshogs kyis mchod gyur te// mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe tshar bar du gnas na gnas par 'gyur// de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha 'i dga' ba spyang nas ni// mkhas la blo gros ldan pa chos kyi mthar mi phyin par gyur// 'dren pa
42b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dag chags myed yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can// chos dang ldan/ rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lta 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag lta gnas de na gnas shing lha'i dga' ba spyod par 'gyur// bde
42b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur// mya na 'das ltar lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi ba rtogs// bsam nyan pasebs tshangs gnas ma smar grags dang ldan 'gro bar
42b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// tshangs pa'i gnas su bas tan mkhas shing bas can 'bras bu spyad 'gyur nas// dong gnas dpe' med gyu cing byang chub yid kyis bskal bar gnas par gyur// de dag bskal par tshangs gnas mthun par ye shes
42b7(dkon brtsegs): den gnyer brtul zhugs bzang // thub pa mkhas pa mkhas rnams 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed// mkhas thub de dag de na bsam rten spyod yul bsam rten chags pa myed// bas rten bden mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub
42b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir dbang po ba ni// kun tu grol yid drang srong byang chub phyi mi byang chub blo dang ldan// mya ngan 'das pa lta bung bas rten po gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur// bde bar gsheg so bcom ldan nga spos po byed chub ni du yongs myu
43a1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas// kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha sa gdon gi phyir// rang 'byung dgos pa khams gsuMl mo las 'das pa'i nges mar byung
43a2(dkon brtsegs): bsten// tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur// tshangs par bas pa nges 'bying mthar thug shes nas ni// 'de'i gshegs pa'i bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la// de nas chos chu
43a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de lta ro ches kyang ston// de dag tshangs nas de na gnas shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir// phan pa mang po byis nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod// rgyal ba
43a4(dkon brtsegs): kun la mching byed 'jig rten zhes pas khrag khrig 'gre 'gyur/ dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal par spang ma 'dril rgal bar 'gyuralA di mya dang klu dang 'dab bzangs dag dang lha min bcas pa dang / ji
43a5(dkon brtsegs): grul bus myi 'amachi tshogs gnod sbyin 'dred bcas dga' zhing ma gu// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyangs chos kyi sabs rtod pa/ de dag thams cad ming raras thar sbyang bad pa gshegs

43a7(dkon brtsegs): sa da du sangs gi lda kyi migapa pa gsus sa pa yos
43b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim bangags dris pang bya ma rimar mang du rkyong ba// de bani na gshegs pa de rngu 'gyu po'i mthuche ba mngara'o// 'din mchung byed du gyung ba da pa sbyin man pa myi gnas brjes kyis kyang / bcom 'ang las kyis
43b2(dkon brtsegs): bsun pa ya sunapa pa dang / das poldan 'das kyi spong ma dag 'dun yang migs pa zugs pa dang po zhugs pa/ rigs pa zhugs mthu pa zhugs pa/ 'di ma bud med du gyu / 'dod rdzunas sa
43b3(dkon brtsegs): mA ni mug zi pa 'ad sa dang shA du rnams kyang banam ldan 'das kyi gsung dun la 'dug pa ni ngo ma d+he swA ste/ ro rmong thob pa de dag gis bcoman 'das la mchod pa'i phyir// rangs bu 'i byam ze'i ma
43b4(dkon brtsegs): gtugs pa/ thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas g.yogs par byas ste/ thams cad dang ldan po'i 'jig rten 'di ni spos kyi ngang kyis khyab par byas so// spos kyi dri'i dad des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
43b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur na/ sems can gang dag gis so// sa kyi dri de tsher 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang da/ ga par rdzogs par byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// bco ldan 'dra
43b6(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong chen po thams cad kyang de bag tshad drug bcu tshun chad mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub pa tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas so// mgro nga'i kur dga'i dra ba de yang 'i tang myed pa'i
43b7(dkon brtsegs): bu rin po ches char bkang ngo / klur me tog bdun gang brgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gi ka ba dang ldan pa zhig mngon par sprul to// klu'i ril mo sil snyam po'o byed pa dag kyang mngon 'dra sprul te sgra bya
43b8(dkon brtsegs): klu'i me tog gi bdun khang de la yid me tog rna ba sna tsags kyi lA lI bye phrag ba ni dral so// rin po che sna sa bdu rig ke ba de dag kyang / bai du rtsi rnanas legs pa mtshan to// tsum tu de mi gzhi ye dri bang myed ma
45a1(dkon brtsegs): lo drug par du dag thub mdzad pa po// rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsi ma stes kyang // bde gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum ma gyur// thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyad// ji ltar 'dren pa lA ri bla ra
45a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod/ 'gro la phan bzhed dka' thub mdzad de// 'jig rten 'gon po sdug bsngal rtar gyur pa/ de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid myi dga'// thub pa u dang spyan na btang ba dang // byang chub so si na ji ltar sgrub mdzad pa
45a3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na// de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur// gang tshe ka ling rgyal po bzod smras pas// phyag dang zhabs ni dang snyan ni btubs 'gyur te// de bzhin shang sa bcad rgyal
45a4(dkon brtsegs): ra myi ra khrug pa// de thos pos kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// phrug ron skyabs su mchi ba ma btang ste// gang tshe 'dren khyod srang la gcal bar gyur// rgyal ba'i de thos pas ni yid mi bde// bde gshegs
45a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che// bdag cag myi 'tshal ma lags ci zhe na// bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyis pa// ngan song mun par ltung ba bde gshegs kyi// sdug bsngal spyod pa dran nas mya dga' la
45a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang // 'dre gshegs spyod pa myi mtsho thor 'gyur ba// sgrub pa'i tshe na de la myi gnod pa// 'jig rten 'dren pa khyi spyod bde bka' stsal gsol// mtha' ya so bla mnga' bed gshegs sa
45a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la// thub pa zla tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson// ji ltar khyod kyi ka bzhin spyod 'gyur ba// de ltar bde gshegs byang chub lam bstan gsol// rga shi ma mchis gom 'phyang 'thob 'tshal zhing // klu tshogs 'di rjes
45a8(dkon brtsegs): thub pa skaM lar gnas// bgro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul 'gyur ba'i// brtu lo shugs spyod bde bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzugs/ lhag pa'i khas pas
45b1(dkon brtsegs): smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'di ni chos nyid de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog du mi
45b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer/ bco ldan 'das kyi zhal gi sgo nas byung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i sdug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gis// de'i tshe tshigs su
45b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad de gsol pa// brtul shugs bzang po dge slong thub pa rnaMs// rgyu myed rgyal ba 'dzum pa me mdzad na// 'dren pa bde gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba// mtshungs myed bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol// tshogs kyi
45b4(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni// 'dzum rgyu nyan 'tshal khyod kyi zhal du lta// yid ni zhum 'gyur the tsom 'tshal zhing mchis// mkhas pa the tsom rna ba bsal du gsol// 'jig rten mkhas pa ston pashag kya thub// di ring su
45b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig yid ni yongs su dga'// gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong 'gyur te// rmongs par bgyis nas yid ni mi dga' mgyis// tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis// bder gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis
45b6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// shag kyi sing ge bka' rtsol the tsom waM/ sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba 'ger bzhag cing // 'gregro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal dulta// che klas kyi srob dpom the tsom brtsal du gsol/ 
45b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar 'gyur te// rgyal bas rgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rjes tsham 'byas nas// gnam du mi ses nan tan gaT
45b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan po rta thul la tshigasu bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// thub mo khas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gis// tsangs 'ang yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis// thul sbyin mo
46a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis dang byos la// 'dzum mdzad pa'i rgyu de mnyan par gyis// klu'i bdag po de dag dang gyur te// 'gro ba zil gis mnad de mchod pa byas// skye bo bde ba yongs smin bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub
46a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni yongs su tshol// snying rje chen pos med pa'i// 'gro ba ltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi sten// 'gre bas byang chub rgya chen thob bya la// 'dren pa dag ni sko bar yongs myi 'gyur// zhe nas dga' sa ye shes stobs ldan stobs
46a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan myed stong pa de bzhin se na myed pa// rje par sdegasu yongasu bskos nas su pe tra shin du yongs dag yid can bde bar 'gro// 'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam po nyid rtogs te// gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas/ 
46a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'i sems dang byas dang snying rje thob// 'gre la snying rje chen por ba bskyed nas// snying rje ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can// 'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshus
46a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgral nas// de dag dgra bcoM rnam par 'dren par 'gyur// rtag tu bdag myid tshig mi mnyan byed cing // 'jig rten rteni gi rgyud la myi 'dug sa pa de dag bde par gshegs kyi 'chi myed thob// den dung med me stegs
46a6(dkon brtsegs): tsho gas kyang myed// 'dren pa bder gshegs snying rje ldan pa'i// rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba kun myos myed// bder gshegs bka' dang tshig rnaMs thams cad dang // bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la myos byer 'gyur// srid par 'a
46a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rjes kyi spyang spyod cing / rab 'dir 'gro ba yongs sbyin byed par 'gyur// mtshungs me thub pa rgyal ba myur du yang // yongasu 'tshang rgya 'chi med theb par 'gyur// thos nas 'gre ba dag kyang myos par 'gyur/ skye 'o
46a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang gzugs kyi chog dang ldang// 'gro ba thams cad der gshegs de dag gi/ dgongs pa'i tshig ni mjed du shes par 'gyur// zugs dang bya dag gnod sbyin mi de dag/ ra 'byung dashed sa sbyin nung bar byed pa gyur/ 
46b1(dkon brtsegs): tu chos rtogs dran dang ldan// bde bar gshegs rjes 'chi myed thob par 'gyur// de dag cig thos sems can gang yin ni// bstan pa de la myi dga' 'gyur ba myed// bder gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba'i/ 
46b2(dkon brtsegs): ba chi myed yang dag thob par 'gyur// de tse 'gro brgyal ba'i dgongs logs rtogs// rga ba dang ni ma dang 'chi ba dang // mya ngadu smre sngags 'don las yongasu grol// tshig de thos nas dang 'dzin med par 'gyur// hU~M
46b3(dkon brtsegs): khasam bshag kyi seng zhes// yangs nus des rigang de dag nas// gnas gas sa byang chu thong nas thung rnams kyi// ye shes 'jug 'gyur de skad sras la bslad// klunams lung rgyan yid du ra
46b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i gsung thos 'khod rnapa yid dgar so// de la yid ni rab tu ni 'gyur nas// dag ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyangs su song // klu'i lung bas na pa'i le'u sde brgyad pa'o// 
46b5(dkon brtsegs): dri nas grub bum bye ba phrag ba cwa brgyad kyis/ lha ma yin rjes dang / na mkhar lding rjes dang / klu'i bu mo rjes dang / klu rnams ma tshong nga yang mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ 
46b6(dkon brtsegs): tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid du deb skyes nas ngo mtshar thob pa dang / 'di ltar de bzhin ga gegs pa la shes rab kyi mngar rgya chen po mngal rgyu zhing / 'di lta
46b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod kyi rnyed de 'di la bu byas pas kyang ngo mthar du mying gangs te/ 'di lta ste dper na rgyam che chen rjen gyi che zhing // yongasu rgyas pa yin pam mtho b.ram/ dpo skyemamapo na du
46b8(dkon brtsegs): ldang nas kyang chas thams cad pa the ces phyi nga zhing // dzin tud thams cad mongs su rdzogs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mang thos/ mchong pa 'di la bu dag pa zhes kyang / mab+he banas ra na phyir bya
47a1(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar du myi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar che'o ste mo/ de nas grul bu bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag gis bdag nyid kyi mchod pas/ bco ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun go bla re bye ba phrag bco brgyad
47a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste gser ge skud pa'i bla re dang / dngul gi skud pa'i bla re dang / bai dur+ya'i bla re dang / shel gi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bA ro dang / sha stag/ rin po che'i drar
47a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag la yang me tog sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i lnga ldi mngon par sprul te/ gser gi skud pa'i bla re rjes la nI/ rdul gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye// rdul kyi skud pa'i bla re rjes la ni/ gser gi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye// be ru
47a4(dkon brtsegs): r+ya'i bla re rnams la ni shel gri me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga lI ba ti/ shes kyi bla re rjes ni byaM du r+yar me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lA lI kye/ mu tig dmar po'i bla re rjes la ni/ spug gi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga
47a5(dkon brtsegs): bkye/ sug gi bla re rnams la ni mu tig dmar po'i 'phreng ba'i lnga ldi pa kye/ rdo'i snying po'i bla re rnaMs la ni/ shel gyi me tog gi 2phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye ba sha stag mngon par sprul to// shing rta bkra ba blta na sdug
47a6(dkon brtsegs): pabye ba phrag bco brgyad kyang mngon par sprul to// de dag kyang gser nas rdo'i snying po'i brda du shing ta de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun rdugs thur ma brgya pa/ gser ga yu ba tsan/ baidu r+yar yu ba can/ shel gi yu ba nas/ khye
47a7(dkon brtsegs): phrag bco ba brgyad mngon par sprul to// rdugs de dag la yang rin po men pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lnga lnga mngon par sprul te// 'dri lta ste gser gi me tog gi lnga ldi dang / rdul gi me togra gi lA ldi dang / be dU r+ya'i me tog gi lnga lI nga
47a8(dkon brtsegs): shil gi me tog gi lnga lnga dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog ga lnga ldi dang / klu'i nor bu rin po che'i me tog gi lnga ldi sha stag go/ mu tag dmar po'i dri ba dag kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag gi gdugs de dag dang / me tog gi 'phreng
47b1(dkon brtsegs): ki gsus bya'o// hrul bus gi dam mo sam snyan dag kyang mngon par phrusrul to// shing bye dag pa'i bu de dag pe rjes su 'thung ba gyur to// de nas grul bus de dag ri po sa 'du gi shi nga su 'di / 
47b2(dkon brtsegs): bdun gi zhugs dang / bre re dang me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ mchod pa byed cing bco ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang la lan gsu du bskor ro/ bskor nas shing rta de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das
47b3(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la 'gos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thams cad du yang mi snyengs mang dbang can// thub pa chen po mi mtho mi dpa' ste// ri'i rgyal
47b4(dkon brtsegs): pe lhun po'i ri 'dra ba// mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ 'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang // tha snyad tsam mkhye mthub pa chags med mnga'// 'dren pa khyod kyis ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs pas
47b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ldan la dregs pa yongs mi mnga'// rgyal ba khyod kyis 'dra ra rgyu 'drang mkhyen// rang bzhin stong ste rmi le dga' 'dra dang / chu zla nam mkha' smig rgyu lta bu ste// bde bar gshegs pas 'gro re 'di dag
47b6(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang 'gyur kyang // grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun na med// gzhan du grong khyor de na mying tsam ste// de bzhin bde bar gshe sapas 'gro 'di gzigs// mchod pa 'di kun brag ca ji bzhin te// 
47b7(dkon brtsegs): shing rta rdugs dang bra re sil snyan dang // me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa// brag ma ji bzhin de dag de ltar rnga// 'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang // sangs rgyas rkeng gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur sheg/ 
47b8(dkon brtsegs): mi lam 'dra dwa ba 'dre ba 'dag cag gis/ rtogs bgyis rgyal po khyod bzhin bstan pa bgyis// nad dang rga shes yongs su gces 'gyur ba'i// skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rjes kyis kyang // byang chub myu ba na shi myed pa'i gnas/ 
48a1(dkon brtsegs): ma gang thos grol 'gyur 'grol bstan par bgyi// bdag cag byang chub la mchog sangs rgyas nas// seMs can rdo song rnams la bstan par bgyi// thub par khrugs byed chos rjes 'ang skor / 
48a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das mchog sems can bstan par bgyi// de nas bco ldan 'das kyis grul bu de dag gi lhag pa'i bas pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gso
48a3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa rgya med 'dzum pa myi mdzad de// rje 'dren 'jig rten mkhas la mtshar mi mngar// ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na// 'dzum rgya lags par bka' stsal nyan par 'tshal// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum
48a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad mthong nas// 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom som nyis 'tshal// the tshom 'tshal ba rjes kyi the tsom khum// myi'i dbang po 'dzum la'i rgyu yang gsungs// gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag 'gyur// di ring gang gas
48a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal yang mthong // deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mcho dpa bgyis// mi'i dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// de'i 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas// gang gis 'du byed 'gyur ba'i ma
48a6(dkon brtsegs): cig btso// gang zhig yang dag mtha' la myi g.yo gnas// rje dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// di ring su yis 'kho ra bcas bdud rnaMs btso// thub pa ston pa de'ang sus mnyes pA bgyis
48a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa su zhig di ring ting rnyed 'gyur// the tsom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal// 'dzum mdzad de'i dom mi mnyam slad du// 'gro ba kun kyang thal mo sbyar cing gnas// 'dren pa the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom gsol// nang gnyis
48a8(dkon brtsegs): dam pas lung 'di bstan du gsol// de nas bcoM ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad pe byAka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis dri la logs par 'dris// 'dzum la'i rgyud yongasu dris pas ma// 'gro ba'i ngam
48b1(dkon brtsegs): yang khyod kyis byas par 'gyur// de don bstan bya'i sa rta thul mnyam par bgyiste// grul bum tshogs kyis ngal mchod byas te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ mtshar myed nga mthong ras ni ngam 'gyur te// ni ci'i chos
48b2(dkon brtsegs): la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ de dag rjes kyis di ring nga mchod de// zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rje btang // lam stor skye bo rjes la snying brtse zhing // bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed// snying rje bas nangal mchod pa byas
48b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu le stor rjes la byis par bas su// mkhas pa de dag las ni de byas pas pa grul bu skye gnas shi 'phos brtul shugs bzang // brgya byin lci'i drung du 'gro bar 'gyur// thugs rje byams skyob drung du'adi dong // des ni cung zad yang
48b4(dkon brtsegs): rab bstan 'gyur te// phyir zhing chos la the tsom med par 'gyur// de dag bskal pa 'gang 'ga'i bye snyed du// zhing nas zhing du rno bar rgyu bye da cing // bdag nyid chen po chos la mchod pa byed// go mchen po rab tu bgos
48b5(dkon brtsegs): byed cing // de dag skyo ba myed par 'jig rten mkhas// khrag khrig mtha' yas rna bar spong bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po der byed 'dren 'gyur te// ngo mtshar myed ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag zhing rjes gang du 'gro rgyu ba// de ring
48b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bas rgyal ba 'byung bar shes// de dag thabs su ma 'ongs dus dag na// dri ma char myod par skye bo na grol byed// rgyal ba ngo mtshar myed pa zhing skyeng zhing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub bra m+be 'i kha rol// de dag tshul ba la yang mi gnas te/ 
48b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyer bu med byang chub gnas phyi ro// de yar 'dzus rgya rgyal thas lung basbyar cing // bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dor bas pa te// klus zum mdzod par 'bras bus nges thosanas// 'gro ba the com ngasal te dag ba ma
48b8(dkon brtsegs): grum dum lung bstan par 'jum// nuH// / de nas de dri dri'u bye phrag su bsum drug gis// lA ma yid rnaMs dang / nam mkha' lding rjes dang / klu'i bum nas dang / ku rjes dang / grub zirnams kyis
49a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstad pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yid rangs ste/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid ba pa skyes nas/ ngamathang thob par gyur te/ 'di lta de ni mi gshegs pas chos kyi
49a2(dkon brtsegs): sa 'byung ba med par yang dag nga bshA byal// b+ha ba nas byung mang dag par bsnad te/ dge 'i'i rtsa ba 'phel ba yang bstar pa/ chos la ga mang lung bsadon med pa yang dag pa 'di ngom pang / nas de dag gas ma
49a3(dkon brtsegs): drod de// de bzhin gshegs pa la ris 'gror bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas/ bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang tshub tu mos par gyur te/ rab tu dag 'this ming dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtsam pa gyur te/ 
49a4(dkon brtsegs): glang bacher pos srungs kyi su bye ba phrag su bcu rtsa drug mngon por sprul to// grang ba 'dum/ pad ma re la zhing yang 'dab ma bye ba drug su bcun drug 'go bi re tshe zhing // so bye baphran sre banu ma drug drug/ so re re la yang rdzing bu 'dur bdud/ rdzing bu
49a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang bang su bdud bdu/ pad ma rer zhing yang 'das bye phrag stong med/ 'dab pa'i de 'ang lA mo bdu bdud/ snyi bu ma dri zhing yang 'khor rgyan thos cad kyis brgyad pa ltar gdug nas thogs pa bdu 'dur/ bdam la tha mtha'as
49a6(dkon brtsegs): khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul te/ grang po ches srungs kyi mgo re yang / rin po che sna bdum ge rmugs nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi drangs dag gis gzungs byas pa dang / rim po che sna bdun gi lnga ldi bris pa'i rang dang lan
49a7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag suM rbam drug drug mdes par sprul to// glang po tsho'i 'ag thams cad la yang lha'i sras kyi ze sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi lde'i bris pa shanag mngon par tshul to// dengs dri ba de dag phreng po ches srung gi bu bye ba phrag phu
49a8(dkon brtsegs): rtswa drug pa de dag sa non te lu'i ral mo sil srin len cing dam mkha' la r+g+ha ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lam su brtsem drug tu bskor ba byes ngas/ lha ci dang gi bya mas bcom ldar 'das la ter maton ra rtog mang bar nga cu tor te/ lha'i a ga
49a9(dkon brtsegs): du'i byis dang / lha'i tam 'i'i mi ma dang / yungs la'i phyi ma dang / lha'i gso ga phye ma dang / lha'i de tsug ma dar ba dang / mnadar brtson po dang / marang jug ka dang / man mug gachen po dang / bdun ka dang / bamun gachen po dang / mngag sa
49b1(dkon brtsegs): mdog gang chen pa dag gis pacoM ldan 'das la / ma ra/ mngon par rab tu / gser dang rdul da gres dang byed d+ha dang / mug dang mu cig dam po dang / me tog rnams dang / spru ba'i med ga rnams kyis rnam
49b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'gro gan// chos rdzun pa rdzogs kyi rna yang seng ni rjes da ba ba // sa kyang be hU~M'i 'aras kyi grang n+d+he ci po ti yug tsung gas
49b3(dkon brtsegs): drug chu tshun chad sres chu'i rdzab du gyur te/ skyes chu'i rdzib de'i dris stong ga suM gi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa dang / rol
49b4(dkon brtsegs): mo si la snyan de dag gi sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi lon/ bar gyur te/ de lta dri ze re res kyang / bcom ldan 'das dkyil mdzod
49b5(dkon brtsegs): dA'i glang ba ches srung gi zu go su byi ba phrag su bcu rtsa drug la/ lha mo klu len pa dang / gang byed pa ra khong pa de dag gis mchod de/ skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byas so// lha'i du mo de dag re nges ni lus
49b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdul rgyur/ la la ni tsan dan dang / a gA ru dang / ta ma li lo ma'i bye ma 'thor/ la la ni lA ma yin gi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / spos rnob sna tshogs kyi phye ma dang / la lo ni me tog dar ba dang / mamadar 'a chen po
49b7(dkon brtsegs): skya sA bkra chen gi b.rig me tog dang / sprul pi'i me tog rnams 'thor// l-i la ni gseng gi me tog nas rdo'i snying pa'i bar gi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / rina'o che snyim pas blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
50a1(dkon brtsegs): \u0f7f// 'thor// la la ni na bza dag 'thor/ la la nI zhabs kyi rgyun dang / sku rags dang / gser gyi 'phreng ba rIn po rje ste li k+Sha ra te/ smras pa'i bar dag daphrul lo// ma la ri ga seng gi bra ba dag 'dzi
50a2(dkon brtsegs): la la ni gser gi rin po che thas cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / chen sna tshogs can 'dzin/ la la ni lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs te// lha ma yan gi bu mos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
50a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar du sngo bzhin no// de nas dri za de dag glang po che sa srungs kyi bu de dag la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed pa las/ glang po che sa srung gi lu de dag las babs te/ yang
50a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsuM skor ba byas nas zhabs la 'gos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bcom ldan 'angs la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa bcom ldan
50a5(dkon brtsegs): bder gshegs mchod pa mthar 'byin pa// srid pas bcings las gro/ la bar rnam gol mdzad// khyod 'dra srid gsuM gang na'ang ma mchis te// khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mnga'// 
50a6(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog khyod kyis ngas chen 'di snyed du// grags pa mtha' yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan// 'gyur bgyid chos ni gang yang ma mchis la// dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod// bde gshegs 'gyur
50a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa de bzhin nyid// brjod pa tsam ste gzhar ni ci ma mchis// skyang rdzogs dang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis// 'on kyang bder gshegs khyod kyi 'gro ba spyod // bde bar gshegs pa sang myed 'ong ba myed// gnas
50a8(dkon brtsegs): med rang bzhin gis ni steng pa dang // chos rnaMs 'di dag rang bzhin myed ces bstad// rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstam// chos rnams gang yang bya ba byed ma mchis// 'jig nyer rtsa bos bya ba'ang ma
50b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan// bdag dang gzhan gi yon tan myi dgongs la// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba kun kyang bstan// shing rta'i yan lag rna ba sna tshogs dag/ bdag gzhan gyis yon tan myi sems kyang // shis 'i bgyi ba dag
50b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang bgying par 'gyur// de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// chos ni chos la yongs su bskul myi dgyed// chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma mchis// chos rjes chos la nye bar myi nyan te/ 
50b3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams gang yang ma skyes mchi ma mchis// 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon 'ar gsungs// kun rdzob de yang ngam ma mchis te// 'gro ba 'di kun kun rdzob de bzhin zhes// tshogs kyi slong dpon khyod kyis
50b4(dkon brtsegs): dag gsungs// myig gidong bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la// bde bar gshegs pas bya ba rnam par bzhag/ chos rdul 'di 'dra yongs su bstan pas na// 'jig rter mkhas pa shin du mchar mdzang// de'i ni
50b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag dedeng gshegs nyid bya ste// no ba'i 'gro 'brags so// marnams// chos kyis chos kyi rdul la gzung ba byed dazhi 'i'i ge'aphanga'i gyi skyed thob pang ba'i sa/ 'dren pa 'de gses
50b6(dkon brtsegs): grags pa mtha mas pa// thugs rje ldan pa phun bzhed 'dzin na khams// bsod nams brgya'i mtshan dang ldan pa na ga/ ji ltar bder gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ 
50b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bsgribs pa'i 'gro ba sug bsngal ba// 'dod pa'i yon tam mAr gyis rjes 'gro ba// mang b.rang dga' sdug bya sngal brgya lar yongs su 'grol// ji lta 'dre bar gshegs pazhin bdag cag gis
50b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba sdug bsngal bzhin pa phying 'gyur la// g.yo ba'i nags pas zin cing mum mthong // yongs su mthong ste 'u khyer nod ying su 'grol// ji skar pa de gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis 'grub skye ma khas
51a1(dkon brtsegs): myig dang bral ba'i// lha tshogs yongs skyo gnyid kyis log gyur cig/ bdag nyid las kyi 'bras bu chung gson 'grol// de nas bcoM ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag su co mo drug be
51a2(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i ngas pathug su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa thul gyis bcoM ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gsol pa// bder gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pa 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dren pa rgyam pa'i
51a3(dkon brtsegs): dAr myi 'dzub na// bede gshegs 'dun pa'i rgyu mung du gsungs// ram rung gnod 'gyur rjes kyi the n+dom gsol// bdeng gshegs khyed kyi zhal ni 'dum mthong ngas// skye ba 'di dag the tsom rnyed par 'gyur/ 'ju
51a4(dkon brtsegs): r-i da ni dag cad par 'jal// thub cher 'gro ba'i the tsom bsngal du gsam// bde bar gshegs kyi stanas su zhig bzhugs// the tsom bral zhing so ma nyi bsal bar myor// bcoM ldan 'das kyis gang gi da
51a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas// mya'i mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad// su zhig/ bder gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du// bre gros rtogs pa ches bzhin gnas par 'gyur// gang gis blo gros dran rtogs
51a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas// bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad// 'gro ba 'ang dge blo gzhan yongs btang ste// bder gshegs 'dzum don zhal nas thos par dga'// ser bcu thal sbyar mgo la bzhag gri shing / 
51a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i yid kyis snyan pa'i zhal du lta// nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa// dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub chen 'jig rten myag/ 'gro ba'i yid gnyis bsngal du gsol// rgyal po thugs rje ldan pas la
51a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas mdzad pa// khyod kyis don dris mthun zhing legs pa
51b1(dkon brtsegs): nI sa yang bsna pas// skye n+ya tshogs rten da ni / 'dzum sa du myed/ bral la byar ba gyis// ba du rnye napas 'jum pa 'di mngang du/ do pa lag yang mang ngas pastar cil/ ma
51b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis nyon// dri za 'di rnaMs chos kyi rjes bsnyegs shing // bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas// chos nyid byung bar gyur pa myed pa ste// chos nyid zad par gyur pa'ang yod pa ma ma// rgyal brdo
51b3(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma lta bur gnas// rtog par myi byed de dge rmongs par 'gyur// gang gis chos gang rje su brjod bya ba// des ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsungs// de dag pa yi tshig de rtogs gyur nas// rta myed gra
51b4(dkon brtsegs): po mchog gis mchod pa byas// byang chub dga' myed 'chi myed tshol byed cing // dri zi'i rgyal po rjes kyis pa mchod do// nor ba'i 'grel snying rje bskyed nas ni// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag mos// 'di sa
51b5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa rang byas pas// dri zi'i ris par dag pa'i rgyur gyur te// blo gros bzang rnams lta gnas lha yul ba// brgya byin lta 'dus pa ri ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas bder gshegs rdul myed pa// bye ba khrag khrig
51b6(dkon brtsegs): mngal mchod byed 'gyur// zhing nas zhing du rjes su rgyu myed cing // de dag la ni mkhas pas chos kyang nyan// de dag bder gshegs spyod pa yongasu sbyong // de dag zhing yang rtag par yongs dag 'gyur// rgyal po'i gdung
51b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag sems can ni// khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston// 'gro ba 'di dag rang bzhin stong rig nas// bder gshegs 'gro ba dog la ston par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad mkhyer cing kun gzigs pa// rdul mod
51b8(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas tshogs pa ste// sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ri'i// bskal pa rnams su tshul myong gnas parar gyur// tha ma la byung mkhyen pa
52a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di rjes su stom// rkyal ba thub pa nyon mongs btso pa yis// de ltar de tshe dri za mchod lung bstan// rta thul gis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus pa// dri za lung bstan 'i ru bshad pa mdzad// dri za lung bstan yir du 'bar 'gyur
52a2(dkon brtsegs): de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'// der mi bde bar gshegs kyi gsung thos nas// shag kya thub la thos cad skyabasu 'dong // / dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// bab po lnga pa
52a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnod sbyin bye phrag brgya bcus/ lha ma yin rnams myis/ dri zi bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas// tshim zhing mgu la ying rang ste// rab tu dga' zhing dag pa dang / 
52a4(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidanga'i rjeb larim 'gre tshem po bskyed de/ chos nyid la 'jug pa nga thos pas/ smyom pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos
52a5(dkon brtsegs): bco ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das blo zad mi shes bya bar rig nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi
52a6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ brtson par 'gyur te/ tshig su bcad pa dag gis bco ldan 'das mngon par bstod pa// mngon shes stobs ni shin tu mtha' yas so/ 
52a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chus 'dzin pa'is ma 'tshal 'dra// de bas mtshungs myed 'jig rten pan mdzad pa// mi'i sing ge khang la 'di ltar stod// ri rab srang la gzhal bar bsam pa thug su chud// skye bo drang rung rdul myin pa// de dag las kyi rnaM
52a8(dkon brtsegs): ba mad bang ma byed/ de bas mtshungs me gun du mtha' yang las// de dag ri 'dring khams la bsnyen pa dang / nga dag sems rgyad ci 'dra 'byung ba dang / de dag mos pa ci 'dres lus mkhyed/ dang sa ma tshungs med du
52b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mas zhin zhe sang byos kyi sa su gsung de zhin mkhyen/ 'dra ga rnam pa 'ab shings ces te// debusem dus byed ga na pa yang sa 'i
52b2(dkon brtsegs): khyams pa// de dag mtshungs myed khyod kyis rab tu mkhyod// de la ye shes rgyun du rab 'byung bas// de bas mtshungs med kun du mtha' yang yas// badre bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs// chung za'i las rgyud gang
