52b3(dkon brtsegs): du khyams 'gyur cing // byis pa'i stobs las rab tu nyams par 'gyur// de dag ma lus khyod kyis rab tu gzigs// 'gro ba rnaMs ni ji srid dus nas shing // ji 'dri'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyur dang // lus kyi rna bo ji 'dra
52b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chang ba rnams// de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs// mi'i sing ge lta ba ci 'dra dang // gang gis sdug bsngal rna ba thob 'gyur bar// gang la rten cing rim la rnams bgyir 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren
52b5(dkon brtsegs): bas rab tu gzigs// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste// rna mar/ thar pa'i sgo nas gang zhig gis// ji 'dra'i lam la de dag bstan bgyis shing // ji 'dri'i zhi ba thob 'gyur khyed kyis mkhyen// byis
52b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang rnams bder gshegs bstan pa lA// rab tu byung zhing 'jig rten mkhas pa'i// bstan pa rang 'bru ji ltar spong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// 'jig rten pam pa'i stan la brnyas bgyis pas// 
52b7(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba chen por ji snyed gnas pa dang // 'di 'dral sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba// de dag rna bar 'dren pas rab tu gzugs// gang dag rgyal ba rnaMs la dang bskyed de// rab tu byung nas rgyal bar bston 'dzin cing // chos
52b8(dkon brtsegs): kun stong pa nyid du yongs brtags nas// mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bshig bgyis shing // 'ge rgyu kun tu smon pa rnam spangs te// lus 'di sgyu ma 'dra bar rab brtags nas// phung po khrag cha radra bar rtogs gyur te// byang
53a1(dkon brtsegs): a/ rlung sems ldan de dag pa gzigs/ ma gleng ge khyod pa 'byed pa'i bso nanas gang / drung sa med mkhyen gyis ri nang thugs rung ba// do su na byed nas kyis bla srog/ gro bku
53a2(dkon brtsegs): rang 'byung thob 'gyur cig/ de nas bco ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgya bcu po de dag gri lhag par bsam du thugs su chud nas 'jum phra mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rtswa tshul gyis bcoM ldan 'das la
53a3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de gsolnga pa/ mi'i steng gi 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ mye'i zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni// rgyu ma mi chis par 'dzum pa myi mdzad pa// 'dzum pa de'i rgyu ni bka' bgasul gsol// ston pa'i zhalnga nas 'ju ba de mthong
53a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tsom 'tshal// 'gon pos the ma de dag rtsal du gsol// 'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba la yid du 'gyur// de ring su zhig rgyal la dad paskyed// gang gis chos rgya chen po rna
53a5(dkon brtsegs): gas/ gang gi sems ni sgrub la gnas par gyur/ de dag rngu la rAs 'grel bskam du gsol// de ring 'a'i rnams te tsam ma 'chal zhing / bu kyang rgyal po'i zhal du la zhing stong/ sa ma
53a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa kun tu 'gyur// de ltar dpa' bos the tsom gsal du gsol// de rang 'din gangag rje 'phrul lags// gang gis brtson 'grus zang po 'dir bstan lags// gang zhig khyod dang 'drir mjal der marmi gyu
53a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni legs par 'grel bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ra 'gro ba dag la ldan bzhed pa// the tsom 'tshal ba'i yid gnyis legs gsal gsol// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'a
53a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa nya thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs la ri dris// ri ring 'gro ba dag gi don ched byas// rang 'byung 'dzum mdzad khye na/ 
53b1(dkon brtsegs): dra ngas ni// stong pa'i dgongs pa khyod kyis legs par mthong // de dag lung ma ska ma lus bstan par bya// gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzugs gyur nas// 'grol phan 'i'i don du 'dum mdza pa// du pA'i yi
53b2(dkon brtsegs): thul mnyan ra gyis// rgyal ba'i grong drub ni bshes gyur nas// gdod sbyin chags kyis mes 'i'i sems dastod pa// 'byung ba'i tshigs zas sangs rgyas bsod byas nas// rang 'i byung ngom pa nyid kyi hU~M yi kya
53b3(dkon brtsegs): mas byang sa sa nga/ ma na sa ma nasu rdzog tu dgas mad kyi
53b4(dkon brtsegs): dang // su rdzob tsam ci dgangs myi gas te// sring bkru ma pado'i ni// byang chu bcag du de dag mide dag srid pa gang du chags 'gyur ro// nga bang zhig ste zas
53b5(dkon brtsegs): legs rtogs pa/ de nyid rgyal ba'i bu med cung chub ste/ b+h+ya hU~M byin ni dber par 'ardul shugs shes// skye bdang smin yong gis stong ba ste// de ni rgyal ba'i bla myed byang chu'i yang / dngos pa'i dra bzhin mo/ 
53b6(dkon brtsegs): shes gyu ngas// zhe' bu meng byung chub khrod pa 'gyur/ nga de'i nga bu zhi de ning song bgyid// gang spyod do mong ni stong ba ste// ye shes ldan pa sa shes kyi sbyin po byim// me ces rang bzhi nga
54a1(dkon brtsegs): dU me / d+hi gan nga chu yi du / ga / 'di sa das tsha [।]
54a2(dkon brtsegs): 'i 'di ba ga / ni ba rna snad da sa na pa padangos ge ldan / rgya tham
54b1(dkon brtsegs): khyed 'di ltar sems can yang myi dmyigs/ 5/ srog dang skye ba po dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed su dang / gang zag dang / bdag dang bdag gi yang gang yang byed la/ phung po dang khas dang / skye mchod gangam tshwa
54b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes dgas pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched de dag kyang myi dmyigs/ las gang yod pas rna bar smin pa gdags par bya ba'i las de yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang skye
54b3(dkon brtsegs): dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyang myi dmyigs lnga// 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa de ni ngo mtshar to// ci zhig las dgongs te bco ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sas
54b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan mdzad// mi zhig la dgongs te byang chub se mas dpa' yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / zhi bkod pa de skye zhing yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub sems
54b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du 'dong ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa ma/ chod pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang / sems can rnam parabakod pa dang / bskal pa 'di snyed rtsig tu gyis sangs rgyasu 'a
54b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rje mas bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bco lnga na 'das de dag nyan thos 'dus pa ni 'di snyed cig tu 'gyur ro zhes
54b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / de dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas de ba'i chos bskal ba 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyu ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa mdzad// ci zhig la dgongs te seMs can rjes nye bar len pa myed pas mya
54b8(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzadasam sa/ de nas myi 'am ci'i rgyal la ldan pa de la bu'i the tshom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs thel mo sbyar ba 'argyad ce/ 
55a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyi zhu ba zhus pa// rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas// shes rab che mnga' bdag dogs skyes// stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa// bder gshegs bdag gis de ma
55a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// gsung ba'i zla ba chos kyi dbyings// 'gyur ma mchis la stong ba dang / rang bzhin myed gsung ji lta bu// mchod pa 'di ji gang zag mchog/ skye ba 'ang ma mchis byang chub du// sems bskyed pa ni ji lta bu// skyes sum
55a3(dkon brtsegs): gis bka' stsal pa'i// ldem po dag de bdag ma 'tshal// myi dbang stug po ji ltar na// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung // de ni yang dag lung bstan pas// thub pa bdag gi the tsom khum// sgyu ma 'dra la ltar skye zhes// gsung
55a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // shag kyi seng ge bdag la 'tshal// gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la// dge bshes 'dren gsung ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // skyes bu khyu
55a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog ma dag ma 'tshal// g.yo ba ma mchis bgyi ba rjes// rkang gnyis mchog gsu ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // dgra gsal bco ldan bdag ma 'tshal// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs shre
55a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gon gsungs ji lta bu// the tsom rno ba 'di 'dra skyes// shes rab dpe myed bdag ma 'tshal// zhi ba yod zhes bka' stsal la// chos kun zhi gsung ji lta bu// mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po dag/ bdag la rno bar bstan
55a7(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rjes// ni mkha' 'drar gsungs ji lta bu// brtan pa'i mtho ris 'jig rten dang // 'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang / las de bgyid pa ma mchis la// rang las tsanI ji lta bu// 
55a8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal tshul 'di rdzi ba yang // zil kyis myi non bdag ma 'tshal// 'gon po de la bdag dogs na// bder gshegs bdag gi the tsom sol// dge ba'i tshogs 'gyur ma mchis la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa 'a/ 
55b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// dge sbyong rgyal po gsung gi tshul// de skad bkar stsal bdagra ma 'tshal// chos rnaMs zad pa med gsungs la// spong byed las ni zad bstan pa// tshad myed bro mngar 'di la yang // bdag ni ying gnyis the tsom 'a/ 
55b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal la// ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang rab rib bral ba'i// spyan mnga' sdigasungs bstan du gsol// thams cad gzigs pa ma rtogs pang// gzhan gis bdag ga be tsom 'di/ 
55b3(dkon brtsegs): sel nus ma mchis de lta bas// bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dang // de nas bcoM ldan 'das kyis// mi 'aci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tsom dris pa de dag gnang nas/ de lan btab pa'i phyir myi 'i ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la// tshigs su/ 
55b4(dkon brtsegs): bcad de slar gsu bka' stsal pa// stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa bdag gis ma 'tshal ces smras pa// gal te dga' zhing myi stong // rgyal bas de lung bstan mi gsung // ci phyir zhe na 'di lta bur// rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na// 
55b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba myed cing ther drug ste// de la 'phel myeda'i grol pa myed/ me long shin du yongs dag la// ji ltar rang bzhin med pa'i/ gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du// ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis// chos kyi dbyings na
55b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur byed na// mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes// yan lag nas la brtag byos la/ ljon pa mchod pa 'di la spyod// chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du// 'gyur byed skye bo mkhas pas rtogs// byis pa rnams ni
55b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la 'khrul// tho sbyangs pa sa'i myed par shes// skye ba'ang ma mchi sa sems kyang bskyed// de rim 'anas ces smras soka/ stobs bcu yang 'bi'i ldem po dag/ gzhan du mo sems mnyan par gyis// byis pa 'khor
55b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba rnams// 'khor bar mngon dag sems zhon pa// log pa'i sems ca dang 'du shes can// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de dag sngon chad ma thos pa'i// sems myed chos ni ngos bshad na// byas pa'i bro dang
56a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams// 'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang // byang chub la ma yon thos gyur nas// zil gis ma ni mdzo drung sem mo// chu chom ni thob par
56a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gag yo ma mchis 'cha 'pho ba// de ni yang 'tshal ces smras pa// 'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gis// gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis// gang dag rtag 'dzin do dag la// 'di la myi 'gyur/ ther zur/ 
56a3(dkon brtsegs): myed// dngos po 'di dag myi rtag ces pa der gshegs 'chi'i po rna bar ston// sgyu ma 'dral ltar skye ba// ji la bu zhes dogs gyur pa// mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang // skye bo rnam la mtho ris bshad// gas
56a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'ang yod pam yin la// bder gshegs rten gyi sa gang smrab/ gnas dang bral bar bya ba phyir// gnas pa rtse dra ba'i dge ba shes pas no// goyo ba ma mchis bgyi phra rnams/ 
56a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ma 'a la zhes sA ga/ shing yan lag susadang / shing bya bzhin du tshogs// mi gro dag yod yin cing / bya nga dag gi rgya 'dzimapa// de dag la
56a6(dkon brtsegs): dang // g.yo' byed par byeder gshegs bshad// rang bzhin stong sa stong pa yang/ rtogs shes ri'is gang smras so// rgyas pa lo gsor cwo can rnams// rang bzhin stong par myi shes pa// de dag rnams la
56a7(dkon brtsegs): bstad par phyir/ rang ba'i na stong zhes 'deng gshegs son// kun du rtogs par rtogs pam bskyed/ yang dag ma yin cig pas bcings/ zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang / zhi babu mthong shes smras/ 
56a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ migs rmongs par gyur rnams kyi// kun tu rtog la sred pa skye// skom pas ji lhor smrig rgyol// kun tu rtog pas skom pa skye// mi mkhas des ni rtog pa'i rgyu// yod pa myini la log par rnyeg
56b1(dkon brtsegs): chu yin par ni mthong gyur kyang / smyig d+ha la ni mu med do// de bzhin yongasasu byugs pas bstsags// sreg pa mye la sdug par rtog/ byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag/ sdug dang ston pa rang rin
56b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis// sdug myed smig rgyu chu myod de// de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa myed// gzugs de stug pA ma yin na/ byis rwa log pa'i 'du shes can// srog par rtogs par bcings por 'gyur// rjes
56b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang // spong sa dmyal ltung zhes smra ba// myed par mthong bar ma gyur pa// myi mkhas rnams ni skrag pa 'gyur// rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong pa// bdag zhen dus ni mi shes
56b4(dkon brtsegs): de zhes thos gyur ra// bdag myed gyur ni sa smra/ pU ste// de dag bdag du mngon zhan te// nam mtha'il ma/ dpe nas// stong pa bya rom su byed de/ phyi mkhas mams
56b5(dkon brtsegs): dmyal chen por ltung / mtho ris 'jig rten ngas bsnyen dang // skye bo 'gro rgyud gzhan dag dang // las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te/ byed pa po ni rab tu bkag/ yang dag tu na 'gro ba dag/ rmyi
56b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra shad pa shes par gyis// myi lam grang la'ang dngos po myed/ lce gro'i gro ldan mngon patsunan// ngasun las kyi rje bang bstan// byed pa phyogs bcu rnams na myed// shing rjes rlung
56b7(dkon brtsegs): bskul ba las// mi 'byung 'gyur ba ci ban no// bdag cag mo 'di skyed bya zhes// rlung dang shing la sems la myed// 'on kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar// las kyi bang po de bzhin no// bsod
56b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ni yod mir la/ byang chub yang dag bsgru ba dang / legs spyod yod zhes zar ci / nul yang dag mnyan par byos phyi'i mchang lo brgya ste// de sri ma nas brjod mis kyis
57a1(dkon brtsegs): phung por srungs pa myed// sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs// za pa myed ces gang smras tsa// lamra zad ces ni ngas smras pa// stong pa'i tshul du zad pa myed// tha snyad rdul du zad par bstar/ 
57a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mthara' ni ngas bshad pa// phyir ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'// log li'u gro can byis pa rnaMs/ yang dag mtha' ni myi she so// mtshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de// ma tshun cing myed par shes pa lda/ 
57a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi// nges pa ljon pa khyod nyon cig/ yig ge gcig gis 'jug/ pa'i// byang chub blo ldan rnams la bstan// chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa// a'i sgo 'i gzung
57a4(dkon brtsegs): bstand// de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la// mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te// 'di 'dral tshul la 'jug pa ni// a 'ili sgo 'i gzugs su bstan// chos rnams thams cad 'gag myed cing // a'i chos la
57a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par bstan// a'i sgo'i gzu gas bstan pa// de yang ldan pa shes par gyis// chos rnams rnam par/ rtog med pa// de yang chos la 'jug par gsungs// chos kun 'gyur
57a6(dkon brtsegs): bamyed pa dang // a ni chos kun sgra med bstan// a'i sgo'i gzungs 'di dag/ ljon pas do ltar shes par gyis// zad pa dang zad smras pa// chos kun ma zad brjod bya ste// stobs bcu
57a7(dkon brtsegs): mang thams cad kyis/ mi zad sgo'i grazungs su bstan// chos rnams rgal mad+mo med pa// de dag myed pas sgo myi 'byung / 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a lamra brten nas 'jug pa bya/ 
57a8(dkon brtsegs): kun bas kyis myi khyad ces// yang dag ji bzhin pader gshegs pastad/ i skenas gzungs pa srin mo// 'di yang ljon pa shes par gyis// nas kun lus myed byang chub ces// rje sngan rnams la ngam
57b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams 'ong ba myed pa ste// myed pas de dag 'ong ba myed// 'di yang gzugs kyi sgo yin te/ a la rten nas 'jug par bya// 
57b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams rdugs pa myed pa ste// myed pas de dag rtags pa myed// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin tos// oM la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnaMs rang bzhin med pa ste// myed pas de dag rang bzhin myed// 
57b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yan te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan// gzungs gi sgo mo nga las nyon// chos kun yid la bya ba myed// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar gshegs
57b4(dkon brtsegs): pas gzungs su bstan// myed phyir tshe// sa kun sgri ba myed ces// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa mdzad// 'di ya/ gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas shes par bya// chos
57b5(dkon brtsegs): kun thogs pa myed pa ste// thegs pa ra bya ba de myi dmyigs// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yi na te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams thaMs tsad ma skyes par// mkhas mas
57b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gcig shes bya// ches rnams gang dag ma skyes pa// de dag mying myed shes par bya// chos rnams yang dag ma yin te// de dag ma lus rang bzhin myed// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// mam
57b7(dkon brtsegs): brten nas shes pa bya// gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba// de dag mthong myed bstan par bya// swA ba 'o/ ni myed pa dang // de dag rnams kyang myed pa'i phyir// chos kun mnyam myed de pas ma/ mdzan nyid ci gci
57b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhi myed/ nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste/ chos kun yod pa ma yin no// de ltar lhag myed chad pa myed/ mnye bzhag myed cing gnyi su myed// rdung myed bsal myed tsha ba 'ang myed// lta ba'i lam spyan myed phyir ro// rlo
58a1(dkon brtsegs): po ma yin yon po phyin/ mun pa ma yin snang ba sbyin// mthong ba myed cing thos myed de// myed pas gzugs su shes par gyis// g.yo myed drang po'ang myed pa ste// ches rnams gas
58a2(dkon brtsegs): myed g.yo ba myed/ 'khrul pa myed cing 'gro ba myed// ci yang myi byed nye zhi myed/ bsgyel ba myed cing gnas kyang myed/ 'gro myed ldog myed 'gro sems myed/ nyal ba myed cing myi nyal myed// sad pa myed pa / 
58a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyis/ myag can ma yan long ba myin// lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs myan// sbas pa ma yan bzhag pa myin// dul ba ma yin ma dul min// rgod pa ma yin zhi ba myed/ 'khor myin mya ngan 'das pa myin// 
58a4(dkon brtsegs): bden min rdzun min de lta bur/ rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis// 'jig rten 'dul ba'i don phyir gyis// 'di la the tsom gang yang med/ gang gcad bya'i 'the tsam de// dam pa'i don du byung ba myed// de nas
58a5(dkon brtsegs): myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ bco ldan 'das la zhus pa lung bstan pa dang // gzungs nges par bsten pas/ yongasu tshim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ brtson par gyur te/ khang pa
58a6(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs po shing la brten pa dang / bdam la brten pa dang / ril bton pa/ rin po che sna bdun gi rang bzhin can/ rin ze rje'i thugs kyis mdzes par byas/ rdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa// rgyal mtshad
58a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dan gis brgya pa/ bla re dang lnga ldis brgyan pa/ bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/ myi 'am ci'i rol mo bsil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas/ ri spos kyi ngad ldan las skyes par
58a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshul skyes pa'i me tog thas cad kyis bcoM ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ de'i myi'i ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po dag tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das
58b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan gsuMb sa nga rgyas te// thang las skyes pa dang / rdul skyes pa'i ge tog de dag gis/ dem ldan 'das sa to mngo sa so ga/ de sa migs sa rnyed nam mangs te/ na sa da / 
58b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan su bskor ba byas te/ bcoM ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'ge bas phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te// bcom ldan 'das la phyig mi 'dzums par la zhing / rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rje su dra
58b3(dkon brtsegs): pa byed cing / phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa bas pa thugs su chud nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe
58b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa rta thul gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// bder gshegs dri bral sbyin mnga' ba/ rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum myi mdzad// lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu// 'dzum mdzad
58b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu de bka' stsal gsol// thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa/ 'khor gyis mthong nas the tsom 'tshal// zla ba tshes la de bzhin du/ smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du lta// bder gshegs mdzes pa deng su zhig
58b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis myed chos la shes mchog skyes// bdag nithe tsom 'tshal bar 'gyur/ myi mchog dam pa the tsom gsol// badreng gshegs gang gis chos nyid la// dad pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das// ji ltar
58b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jus pa man pa Tha / chog bdag gi ci cog che// thams pa ldan pa la po'i dims/ ldan pas thos mi dag la ni / the tsom mamachis sem men// rje sa stan pa ne gnas pa
58b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar nang gnyis rnams kyis mchod// 'gre' la thugs partse mdzad pa dang // the tsom bcad srad ljon pa dang/ myi ji rnams kyis lung bsam gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa ta thul la
59a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig su bcad te slar bka' stsal pa// skye bo'i tshogs chen rjes nang du// sangs rgyas yon tan bsnyen 'gyur ba// ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa// rta thul khyod kyis legs par dris// ye shes mthong bas sgrib byed pa// bde
59a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can// de khyod dang ba'i yod kyis nyon// skyo myed yid kyis nga las nyon du/ 'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ ljon pa the tsom gang dris pa \u0f7fde'i 'bras bu brjod par bya// the tsom gcad pa pa las nyid pa ljon pa las
59a3(dkon brtsegs): stegs kyi cig bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa// de dag nga la mchod byas nas / 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris 'dong / bskal pa bye ba chubacu de lha mi'i nang du 'khor bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga bsgos nas ka seMs
59a4(dkon brtsegs): la dbang sgyur dbang ldan 'gyur ta myi'i sing ge de dag gis// sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig du sprul pakye rang ni lha gnas na// bas nyan dga' ba'i bde ba myong ste bskal pa bye ba rgu ba nur yang // de dag lha mir la
59a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor nas// rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogasu te byang chub rno bar 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la tamyi'i sing gi 'jig rten 'gon pa chags myed ye shes mthong dpag yas// stobs cul gzi brjid mtha' yas 'gyur// 
59a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin zhing du sos can gang ta yengasu ma smin 'ga' mi skye// nyan thos theg pas gang byung ba pa kun kyang srid pa mtha' ma pa// myi'i sing ge zhing 'dir ni// byang chub seMs dpa' gang skyes pa pa de dag che cig thogs pa ste/ mi mchog byang
59a7(dkon brtsegs): rkung theb par 'gyur ba gang dag rtso bor gyur pa rnaMs te bdag cog dpag myed sangs rgyas shing // yengasu sbyang bar bya'o zhes// de 'dra' bas las rab du zhugs / seMs can rlabs chen de dag ni pa smin la rgya chen yun ring btab// de dag 'di nas shi 'bos
59a8(dkon brtsegs): nas// bsems rang bzhin rno par spyod pa nyon mongs 'ji ba de dag gi nye zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba mo// dga' ldan gnas kyi long sbeng rjes ya ngan seng kun yang yongasu dag/ de dag zhing du rje kun du nyi ma kham gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur teni
59b1(dkon brtsegs): rnaMs yongs sbyangs de dag ni// ses rgyan rnaMs kyang bde bar 'dren pa de ltar 'jig rten 'gon po yis// myi ci rnams kyis lung bstan bshad pa lung bstam de thos 'khor rjes kun// kun kyang yid ni rangs par 'gyur// / d+hi'i ci lung bas
59b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas lta 'phreng ldan glang po brgyad khris/ lha ma yin nas myi 'am ci'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' la dang / 
59b3(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rdos la mos shing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson 'gyur te/ de dag gis ser skyil gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thos cad khor yug tu dpag tshad drug su tshun chad/ me to gsan
59b4(dkon brtsegs): d+ha ra bas pu so mo nub tsam du gang bar byaso// de nas de dag gis bcoM ldan 'das la lan gsu bskor ba byas nas/ tshigasu bcad pa dag gos mngon par bstod pa// zhi ba'i dbang po 'ju ba'i zhal// srog chags kun la thugs brtse
59b5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba gshegs pa thugs rje nan// 'jig rten bdag po myi'i stag tas nges rgyas chos lamos pa'i// 'khor 'di ji srid 'dar gnas par ha zhabs mchog mdzes shing dag ldan pa// thugs rje can la 'gas phyag 'tshal
59b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar chung zla nya ba'i tshe// myi rnaMs zla ba phyag 'tshal ba// de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rjes kyang bcoM ldan 'das kyi zhal tu lta// dpag du med pa'i dge spyad pa// dpag yas ye shes phung por ldan pa gzi brjid dpag
59b7(dkon brtsegs): yas phung po can// blo mchog khyed la 'gos phyag 'tshal// stobs bcu mngayin nga dpal mug sde// bden bzhi mi snyigs dragasuM sel/ rgyal bil bcwo brgyad chos dang ldan// the tsom myi mnga' smra ba'i mchog/ 
59b8(dkon brtsegs): sre bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing / dpe' byad bzang po brgya nu ldan// dbang po rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs// bder gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal// rdul khris stobs kyis mthar phyin pa// ting 'dzun stobs nas myi bskyod/ 
59b9(dkon brtsegs): ye shes stobs kyis mtshon cha can// bdud stobs btso thub rgyal ba lags// ye shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa// ser sna mi mnga' nyan thos btul// zhi ba'i thugs kyis spyod ma dzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul ta smras
60a1(dkon brtsegs): sing ge 'der gshegs khyed// ti mug zhi bgying chos dris pa// bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu'i// chos rjes 'dir yang thob par shog/ ji ltar thub khrod seMs kyang gi// khas mkhyen dang ma po 'di du
60a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang // lha phyir bcas pa'i 'gro dang bgyi// de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du// snying brtse nye bar bzung nas ni// 'gro ba 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying // srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral bar bgyi// bdag cag
60a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar bcas 'jig rten gyi// 'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur cig/ 'dro ba sdug bsngal brgyas nyen pa// srid pa'i sa rgyolas sgrol bar bgyi// de nas bco ldan 'das kyis lta 'breng ldan glang po can rjes kyi
60a4(dkon brtsegs): bas pa thug su chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcoM ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsel po// bder gshegs par 'dren pa po// rgyu ma mchis par myi mdzad pa// stobs
60a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pal// rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gre ba dang bgyid 'byung mthong nas// 'khor kun the tsom 'tshal 'gyur te// 'dzum pa'i don ni mnyan par 'chal// don rjen
60a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzub mdzad pa'i don// bka' stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa mchog// dge sbyong rnaMs kyi rgyal po mchog/ the tsom bcad 'gyur bka' stsol pa// gang gis rgyal ba banyes par bgyis// gang gis deng mched bla med bgyis/ su zhig
60a7(dkon brtsegs): de rang ter thod gyur// bder gshegs bdag gi the tso khu// de ring gang gis bdud kyi gnas// dkrugs g.yangs kun tu 'khrugs par bgyis// deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' zhing yid ldan par rgya
60a8(dkon brtsegs): 'thub pa de lung bsten// 'gro ba'i the tsom myur du khre// de thos bder gshegs 'khor bcas rjes// kun kyang rab tu yang dga' 'gyur// de nas bcoM ldan 'das kyis cig su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la// slar bka' stsal
60b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dreng rdzan glang po can rna ljid// lung bstan d+ha thub byed dris pa// de nas 'gro ba sang po'i// don med shin tu dang byas 'gyur// stongs bcu rgyal ba ma dris par// sras mchod zung chung lung mi snod// de 'gro ba mang don du'i rdzu
60b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis rgyal la zhus// 'breng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis ngal sos dang mchod pas// bskal pa drangs myed 'das 'gru ru// nyon mongs par byas rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// mthun par myi dab sri
60b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la// me tog mchog gis mchod par 'gyur// kun du bde bar gshegs kyi sos// bskyor bar 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur// rang byung myi'i sing ge la// tshig su bcad pas bstod par 'gyur// mo 'angs dus na
60b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di kun gyi// rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang // me tog gis mchod tshigs sprad kyis// mi mchog rnos la bstod byas te// de dag bder gshegs rnaMs mchod cing // mthu bo che'i sku stod nas// rab tu dag pa'i bskal pa la// 
60b5(dkon brtsegs): rna bar 'dren pa 'jig rten 'byung // grags pa ma smad gnas rgyu ba// brgyad khro bo rnos de dag kun// bskal pa gcig la bder gshegs 'gyur// me tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya// de ma dmyal dang dud 'gro dang // ngan song gshin rje'i
60b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten myed// zhing de na ni lha myin myed// mi khom thas cad rab tu ba co// 'breng ldan klang po can lha'i// long spyod su bcu rtsa gsuM gi ci 'dra ba ni de 'drar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i tshe tshad dpag du myed// de tshe mi dge sgra
60b7(dkon brtsegs): myi grag/ myi dge byed pa smos ci dgos// de na rje 'dren mchog rjes kyi sa// skye bo rjes kyang chos can 'gyur// srog chags bye ba khrag/ khrig phrag/ grang 'ga'i bye ma rab mang snyed// grol bar byed 'gyur
60b8(dkon brtsegs): skabs bcu rnas// gnas pa myed pa'i chos kyang stan// grags pa ma smad de dag gi// ring srel drag kyang rgyas par 'gyur// de dag rjes kyi ring srel lnga// rgyal ba'i sku mnga' 'byung bar 'gyur// grags pa man+t+ra yas
60b9(dkon brtsegs): ldan rjes kyi// ring sel che 'phrul sku mthong nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang // byang chub du ni seMs bskyed 'gyur// 'phreng ldan glang po can rjes kyi// lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// thos shing shes nas
61a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor kun yang // de che ses ni rab tu dgal// 'phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le ru ste bcu gsunga'o// // de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha chu khris// lA ma yin rnams nas// 'bre lda glang
61a2(dkon brtsegs): be che'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yang rangs te/ dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde bskyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa drag
61a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/ 'di lta ste dper na/ khaM pa'i gru la zhon pa'i myi zhig tshul dbus su phyin pa na/ gru chag du 'ong zhes tshu rol nA/ pha rol tu 'gro ba bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyed pa/ de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi ris kyi lha chu
61a4(dkon brtsegs): khro bo de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la dad pa skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa drag gi skyes par gyur nas/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol zhing bcoM ldan 'das la
61a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod par phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag rgyal po po bzhi dang lhan cig tu rin ba ci'i bla re bkrab ltan sdug pa chu khri mngon par sprul to// de dag kyang pha la cher mu tig dbang po dang / skar mdog dang / be'u bya dang gser dang / rdo rje
61a6(dkon brtsegs): rang ban cod na nags/ shA'i ngas ma sem snyan du khri yang mchod par smras to// de dag na sri na pa ci tshogs kyi byer chu khri ba dag thogs nas/ ris mo sa la snyam du khri ma de dag byed cing snying gri bang snang las 'a
61a7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bcoM ldan 'das ma lad gsum bskong ba pyod cing / me tog man d+ha ra ba dang / man d+ha ra ba chen po dang / min rdzun ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / ba run ka dang / ba ru sha kwa chen po dang / sbrul bu'i me tog rjes kyis
61a8(dkon brtsegs): btsaldan 'das la tong / mding nga ra te// de dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ btsanan 'das lan gsub skongs byas te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mden par bskyed pa/ rgyal ba'i yod ta mthanga'i mi A ni su na ba das/ 
61b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa khyod kyi spyan snga na thal mo rab tu sbyar nas mchis// rgod pa ma mchis zhu ma mchis// 'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma mchis// phyi blon ngo mtshar ma mchis par// rkang gnyis mchog la phyag kyang 'jal// khyod ni srid
61b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyun rnaMs bkru// myi shes pa ni rna par sbyangs// sred pa'i phur pa rab tu byung // nga rgyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bsnyal// khyod ni zug rngu byung ba ste// thal chug pa khyod kyis spangs// khyod mi mkhyen bzhin spyod pa skye// 'dri chub khyod
61b3(dkon brtsegs): rma rjes sos// khyod kyis nyon mongs thos cad spangs// bcing ba dag ni zas cad bcang // sbyor ba kun dang bral ba ste// thub pa chags pa kun las 'das// rgyal khyod kyi spyod yul ni// snang pa nyid dang mtsham ma myong // bcoM las ts+li
61b4(dkon brtsegs): la smon pa yang // rjeb kun du myi mang ngo 'o// khyod kyis sred pa drung nas byung // ma rig pas ni thugs kyang byung // rje ba bzhi po phyin ci log/ rnab kun du yongasu spangs// gang du 'jig rten mo chung // ri dgas yangon dus ji bzhin du/ 
61b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa'i// yang dag mtha' ni khyod kyis gzigs// seMs can 'jigs tshogs ltar lhung ste// stong pa nyid ni ma 'tshal bas// ma rig pa'i mun pas btabs// 'khor ba'i bcon rang dga' bar bgyid// 
61b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis yang dge ji bzhin du// 'gro 'de 'tshang ba stong 'drar gzigs// / gang gis rje dag myig 'gyur bal// ye shes snang ba rab tu stam// phung po stong yar rje bar bshig/ mying dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra
61b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing // khas rnaMs dang ni skye mched dag/ bdag myong stong par rje par bshig/ chos gang dang mying gang gis// chos gang mngon par brjod dpyi ba// chos de chos des steng ba ste// thub pa khyed kyis stong par bstan// 
61b8(dkon brtsegs): sgyu mi'i mkhan pas myed pa la// skye bo tshegs chen mngon sprul na// de la seMs can rdugs ma mchis// srog dang gang zag ma mchis ltar// de bzhin phung po khas rnaMs dang // dbang po dag dang skye mched dang // yang dag yin
61b9(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma zhes// skyes bu dam las bstan pa mdzad// ji la khong me mkhas zhig gis// bud med gzugs ni rdo dris shing // mnyer ring na mi mnye dang // lI dang yang ba bstan bgyis kyang // byis pa'i phyig ni slus pa ste/ 
62a1(dkon brtsegs): del myi mnye ji ma mchis// de bzhin chos dbyings mnye lags na// byis pa rnams ni de la tshangs// gang shes khyod kyi bslab pa la// legs bslabs tshangs par myi 'gyur la// lag 'thil sgyul ba bzhin
62a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstan// shes rab chen po khyod kyis ni// ye shes sgrom ma rab rus te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor to// sos can rnaMs la chos bstan pa// de ltar bdag cag myur tu ni// bri med byang chub
62a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi thong ste// de ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bgyi// 'khor ba'i le log 'di dag tu// 'khyis par gyur pa'i seMs tsan la// ji ltar 'dren pa bstan pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang ches myur bstan
62a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bco ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rjes kyi lhag pa'i bas pa thugasu chud nas 'dzu ba mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bco ldan 'das la tshagasu bcad de gsol pa/ rgyun ma mchis pa
62a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'dren pa 'dzum pa myi mdzad na// 'dzub mdzad pa'i 'dzum gi rgyu// dpa' bo chen po lung bstan gsel// skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dge// bde gshegs dang bshad mthong nas ni// yid gnyis
62a6(dkon brtsegs): chen pa'i ra 'gyur// de ring su'i sa bdud 'dra bgyis// nam nurang gang gis bcad par gyis// su zhig di ring ces rtogs 'gyur/ skyes bu mchog gis lung bsan gsol// de ring khyongs su yis mchod// ston pa
62a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis// 'gro kun nem rung natshal 'gyur na// rje bar 'dren pas lung bstan gsol// ji ltar gnyis mchog khyod kyis// lung bstan 'di dag thos 'gyur na// 'gro ba the tsom bcad rgyang
62a8(dkon brtsegs): pa// 'dren las de ltar lung bstan gsol// ci nas rna ma thos cad du// kun mkhyen la le gnas pa des// mung du byang chub thob 'gyur ba// de ltar 'dren pas bstan du gsol// de nas bcoM ldan 'das kyis rje
62b1(dkon brtsegs): brta thul la tshigasu bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba rjes la phan pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgrin po la// 'dzu ba'i rgyu rjes dri ba zhes// rta thul khrod kyis dris paM legs// 'jig rten kun la phan po'i phyir / 
62b2(dkon brtsegs): pha yid du 'ong 'gyur zhing // nyes dga' byed pa de bshad kyis// chu khri tha li'i lha rjes kyis// mchod pa rje nga 'di lta bur// di ring de bzhin gshegs pa la// shin du dad pa'i yid kyis byas// sangs rgyas mngon par bstod pa byas// stong pa nyid kyang
62b3(dkon brtsegs): shes par 'gyur// chos rjes la ni nges pa rnyed// nga'i stan la rab tu gnas// sngon yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ brgyad bcu dag la 'di dag mchod// ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas// bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur// 'dren pa de dag ji
62b4(dkon brtsegs): srid du// sangs rgyas byen mang mchod cing // bsnyen bkur byas par ma gyur pa// de srid byang chub sa myi rgya// de bas shin du 'phye ba ni// kun kyang gang zag mchog du 'gyur// mtshan ni 'od zer 'chang ba ste// 'jig rten kun mkhyen thab
62b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'jig rten sgren ma de dag ga// nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba na// bla'i mchog dang ldan pa dag/ 'dus pa brgyad bcu 'byung bar 'gyur// sgrib myed gzi gos pa de dag go// myi rjes de'i dus kyi tshe// la grangs bye ba brgyad
62b6(dkon brtsegs): nu thaM ta srog gi dbang po gnas par 'gyur// shes rab mtha' yas de dag gi// nyan thos 'dod chags bral ba rjes// lus na tha ma 'dzin pa dag/ skyo ba tshad myed 'byung bar 'gyur// sems nan rnaMs la thugs brtse ba// 'jig rten
62b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gon po dpal ldan rjes// mya ngan 'das pa'i ring srel yang // shin tu rgya chen 'byung bar 'gyur// myi dbang mya ngan 'das 'gyur nas// rnam par 'dren pa dpal ldan pa// rgyal ba'i mchod rten rdzas kyis niH sangs rgyas zhang rnaMs legs
62b8(dkon brtsegs): brgyan 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po skyob rjes kyi// mchod rten de dag thas cad la// srog chags brgya dang stong rnaMs dang // khrag khrig rjes kyis mchod byas nas// byang chub mchog tus sa bskyod de// mya ngan 'das pa thob pa rgya
62b9(dkon brtsegs): rang 'byung mya ngan 'das nas kyang // de dog de chos gnas gyur pa// laM grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag// brgyang mu tshang bar gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po sras rnams kyis// bzung zhing yongasu bsrungs par gnas// 'jig rte
63a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rtse mdzad pa dang // shag kya yongasu smin mdzad phyir// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rjes la// 'jig rten sgron mas lung bstan mdzad// de thos nas ni skye bo kun// kun tu dga' zhing rab dga' ste// seMs mgu
63a2(dkon brtsegs): yid kyang rangs 'gyur nas// ston pa la ni mngon par bstod// / rgyal chen bani ris kyis lung bstan pa'i le'u ste ba nu bzhira'o// bam po drug pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin las bsdogs pa// su bsum
63a3(dkon brtsegs): bsu gri lA bye ba phrag brgya nus// lha ma yin dag dang / ni mkha' lding dag dang // klu'i bu mo dag dang / klu dang / grul bum dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / myi 'o ci dag dang / 'breng ldan glang po can dag dang / rgyal
63a4(dkon brtsegs): chen bzhi'i lha dag gis mchod pa yang thos/ lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yid 'byung ba chen po skyes te
63a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i tshal gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la stsogs pa/ bco ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te// de dag gis rin po che'i khang pa bka ba/ lta ma stug pa rin po che sna bdun ge rang bzhin can// mu tig dam sIr po'i 'phreng ba
63a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / be dUphyil 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ gser gi 'breng ba sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che skar mdog gi 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ sa nas rim pa brgyad dang / ba ge dang 'khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung gI brgyan pa/ rdugs dang / rgyal chen
63a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ba dan gis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khris brgyan pa/ bla re chen po dang / dril bu g.yer ki la dra bas brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ snyir rol mo sil snyam sgra rab tu 'byung dbye ba phrag brgya bcu mngon par
63a8(dkon brtsegs): sprul to// rta cang shes kyis drang pi'i shong rta lha rdzas kyi rnams legs par brgyan pa/ rdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba das dag gis mdzes par byas la/ bye ba phrag dum cu yang mngon par sprul to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thos cad dang ldan nI na
63b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad drug cu tshun tshad me tog man d+ha ra ba dang / lha'i mchod pa de dag gis rgyas pa gang ba byas so// glang po ches srung gi bu bye ba phrag brgya bcu yang mngon par sprul te/ glang po rtses srung gi su dag re re zhing yang 'go byer phrag brgyad bcu
63b2(dkon brtsegs): glang po che sa srung gi bu'i 'ge de dag re zhing yang / sa drug drug/ so de dag re re zhing yang / rdzing bu 'dun bdud/ rdzing bu de dag yi ba ning yang / yang mo stong phrag bdun bdun/ pad ma de dag re re zhing yang / 'dab ma brgyad khri brgyad khri/ 'dab mdze'i
63b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor bdun 'dun yod pa/ rgyan thos cad kyis brgyan pa/ sha stag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i 'khang pa de dag bdun du byas te/ us su glang po ches srung gi bu dag
63b4(dkon brtsegs): btsud nas/ phyi bzhin shing rta de ltar bshes pa de dag bkye nas/ bco ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so// rin po che'i khang pa de dag las kyang / lha'i tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / ud pa la dang / ta ma la' lo ma'i phye ma dang / gser gi bye
63b5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lhar me tog man d+ha ra ba dang / man d+ha ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog kar dang mdog kar chen po dang / sbal pa'i me/ 
63b6(dkon brtsegs): tog gri char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// gser dang rdul dang / byed dur+ya dang shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spu ga dang / rdo'i snying po dang / rin po che sna bdun gi me tog gi char yang mngom par bab yar gyur to// lha'i bu mo de dag las
63b7(dkon brtsegs): la la ni klu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la li na rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur/ zhing lA ma yin gi mchod de lta bu dngo// glang po ches srung gi bu de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa rjes kyis mchod pa byas nas/ de'i 'og tu ca we
63b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis drang bir shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad la zhon te/ bcoM ldan 'das la lan gsu bskor bu byas nas/ lha yi byad rdzob sna tshogs mang po yang phul 'a gyur to// lha'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgya bcu yang bar snang las sgra 'byin par
64a1(dkon brtsegs): 6/ gyur to/ shing bye ba phrag brgya na po de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgya nu brgyad bcu mngon par sprul to// lha'i bu de dag kyang la la ni klu len/ la la ni gar byed/ pa la ni ris so byed/ li ni lus kyi
64a2(dkon brtsegs): du rgyu shing / sna pa med ge slo ngis badzin du rgyas so// dengs sum banas sru ris sbyi bye ba phrag rgya nu po dag din du sos / jo ltang yu pa 'i da// sngon 'das la mchod pa byed pa la
64a3(dkon brtsegs): bu shes nas / rjes la the cem myed pa tho byar gyur te/ de dag da ltar the tsom myed cing nem nung myed pas gyur nas/ bcoM ldan 'das la lan gsu ba skor ba byas te/ bco ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs cig tul rang
64a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag chos bris cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing / bdag cag sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / bcoM ldan 'das kyang sprul la dang 'dra 'a mthong gnas bcoM ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de dag kyang stsal pa dang 'dras
64a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par shes/ de dag gis chos thos cad sprul pa lta bur shes nas the tso myed cing nem nur myed par gyur to// de'i tshe bco ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// 'gro ba kun gyis
64a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa gang bgyis dang / sprul pa'i mchod pa gang 'gyis dang / lha rjes kyis ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa/ de ltar chos 'di thos cad sprul pa nyid// 'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang / de 'izhin gshegs las lung bstan
64a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag dang / 'di dag thos cad sprul pa 'dra'o zhes// de ltar lha'i tshogs dag blo gros skyes// bco ldan sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhi du// ston pa 'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra bar ston/ rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas// 
64b1(dkon brtsegs): stsal du // sa gan gan na yus das kyis/ rgya di lung chung bang yo 'i// bya chu mas dpa' 'a da gnags zang nas kyang / khyang pa ma
64b2(dkon brtsegs): da / tsun de pa tsug gas sa sas rgyag rjem// nas byangs pags 'ji na'adas/ sa pa 'di 'du na
64b3(dkon brtsegs): bsa? 'di mA nas rjes gdu gsungs pa// gnas mye ni bsil nyon mongs yod gyung ni// sdug bsngala'i byed mthur thug grangs byed pa// de yangs la pa 'di dag 'dra bzhin// bcoM ldan 'dis la chos nas gang das kyang / A
64b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis// gang tshe kau'u ta ma'i bstan pa 'di// / bdag cag spangs nas the tho tso thas cad spangs/ sprul pa 'di 'drar chos kun mthong nas na// bdag cag rnaMs kyang 'jig rten mgon
64b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// bder gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa rjes// the tsom mchis rang bzhin 'dren par 'gyur// de nas bco ldan 'das kyis su bcu rtsa gsu ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad bcu la de dag gi lhag pa'i bas pa thug su
64b6(dkon brtsegs): chung nas 'dzu ba mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ta thul gris bco ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsal pa// gzhal g.yas gragras yang mtha' yas gzi brjid can// bder gshegs nas ni rgyu myed 'dzumi mdang / rje bar
65a1(dkon brtsegs): zla lar dri myed 'od mnga' mtha' yas gzil// ji nas bder gshegs ka ni 'di thos pas// 'gon po 'greb thos cad dgar gyur ba // rgyal ba lnga tshogs mchod mkhyen bkar stsal gsol// bde gshegs
65a2(dkon brtsegs): lha tshogs 'dir chos rjes kun// sprul pa lta bur rde par rtogs gyur na// stobs bcu mang rabs den 'di bka' stsal col// ri rab bral ba lnga'i slab pa gsungs// skye bo 'di dgra the tshom bral gyur nas// thub pa de ltar
65a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub spyod ci 'gyur// rab du dpa' ba 'khor 'dis thos 'gyur to// dgengs pa rig nas rgya chen bamon par 'gyur// de nas bcoM ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan po rta rdul la cig su bcang de bka' stsal pa// lha tshogs
65a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag rab tu dag 'ashes nas// rna thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'iHsmras pa de'i dus la bab pa ste// 'dzum mi dris pa de ni lung bskur to// lha nas pas shes 'dzum pa de dris pa// des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i
65a5(dkon brtsegs): don chen byas// 'dzub mdzad pa'i rgyu de ngas bsan gyis// dga' zhe dang ba'i sos kyis ngal nyon// lha tshogs rnams kyi chos rje 'di dag ni// ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas// chags myed
65a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing // rab rab bral ba'i 'jig rten 'gon par 'gyur// sred pa'i rgyun ni sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe// myi'i ga 'igang 'ga'i bye snyed mchog/ srid rgyun de ma 'di dag thub pa las// chos
65a7(dkon brtsegs): nas sprul pa la bu mthong ngo // 'di dag ngal mchod mchog 'dir byas pas// chos rjes sprul pa 'dra bar mngom par mthong // bder gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa'i ni// rlung zos myi 'gyur ba chad yongs mi 'gyur
65a8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs 'di yis ngal mchod bus te// tsas nes zas cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas// bskal pa yang ma zhes bya byung ba'i che// smra nga'i zla ba rtsi'i mchog tu 'gyur// khrung mchog ldan pa'i mying mchog 'gyur 'i ni// de ga nam
65b1(dkon brtsegs): rab mkhas dbang po tog rgyal ba// chos rjes thas cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing // 'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'grel par 'gyur// bde gshegs de dag bstan pa bag yod pa// sprul pa 'dra res sa// ni gnas su lto
65b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bag yod pa// myur du bu med byang chub mchog zhi tho'o// / suM bcu rtsa gsu pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste// bco lnga pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gi lha bye ba phrag bcus// lha ma yin rnaMs nas su
65b3(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa gsu ris kyi lha'i dab de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab du dga' dang dgal zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ bco ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thogs
65b4(dkon brtsegs): pa myi mnga' bar shes shing // sangs rgyas kyi chos rdos ni nyes dag ba ste/ de dag thob nam shes pa'i// ma thol pa 'am/ ma rtog/ sa pa'i// mngon dum byas pa'o// skyes pa'o// 'gag pa'o// las sa las
65b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rna ba snyi ba gang yang byed de zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes la 'dod pa skyed do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang / don dab gnyis thug su chud de/ shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang der dpa 'dir zad do/ 
65b6(dkon brtsegs): de yang ban ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid du gzigs// rab su mkhyen leg sa pa mngon par ma da pas// de'i phyir thas cad mkhyen ye zhes bya'o// de la kumadza' ni 'jig rten po spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs
65b7(dkon brtsegs): dag yon byed pa ste/ shes brgya pa shes pa shes par bya yi / thong du shes pa bya sa yi sa pasan pas sun ma sa thos patham nga byas sa
65b8(dkon brtsegs): dbyang shes pas ga nga pa gapa / pa yid do/ nam me nga sug jal bapa yid pa/ stsal ma yid mi lta ba la yin/ gzugs pa yi pa/ gzugs me dpa pe yi dab grang sa med pa 'as
65b9(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dum bajug pa rtogs par ma byas pa/ the par ma byas pa ma thob pa nye bar ma sbyi pa/ mthor pa/ ye banag sa sangs pa/ byang zed pa/ rab sbyin pa med pa/ ma spang ba/ ma 'gyi/ 
66a1(dkon brtsegs): byed ga/ 'jig rten rnyed pa/ sa rkyenas rgam skyed pa/ kunanapa nyon mongs paskyed sa na ba byu ste ga/ 'gar med pa// ldog byed pa/ ma rtags pa/ rjebangs dartags pa/ ma gcos
66a2(dkon brtsegs): sham skyong dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa rje smras pa/ smos pa dang dra ba ste/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mngon ma mi dmyigs pa/ tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / de yang shes pa'i mchad pa mi dmigs pa migs
66a3(dkon brtsegs): rna bdang / rdza pA dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan mi mi dmyigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / dro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan/ mra mi dmyigs/ myi ga rje par shes pa dang / napa dang / sA dang / lce dang / lusan
66a4(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi mtshan ma myi dmyigs // myi gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'amaH/ nam myi dmyigs pa/ myigi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtsham
66a5(dkon brtsegs): ma myi dmigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba'i bAr gri mtshan ma mi dmyigs pa/ gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mya dmyigs pa/ chos kyi bar kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma myi dmyigs pa/ gzugs
66a6(dkon brtsegs): sos pi mtshan ma dmyigs rgyas kyi bdu smos pa'i mtsha sa mi'i myags pa/ yid la byed pa'i mtshan myi dmyigs tra/ sa dang bung ma drang rung dab rab dang / rnab shes pa'i khas kyi bang man+dan mi myigs pa 'do
66a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud gzugs dang / gzugs myed par las kyi mnonam mi dmikriso pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nim+bu dmyigs pa skyed 'di ska co sa gang dang gang gis 'arjod pa'i dang 'arjod pa'i nga ba ni de sa kyi
66a8(dkon brtsegs): pa te// rangs rgyas kyi thos nas ni byad tes dag 'i yinan/ phyis pam ma'i myongs pa khyo dang/ phyog sa masas kyis ches na/ 'jigs shi lda nga na coM Te/ rjes 'dzin pa kyi
66b1(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyes par gyur to// de dag ni lha dang bcas nga'i 'jig ter gis mya ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gi rgyar to// zhes ste/ de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes la 'ad
66b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes kyi don du bco ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ brtson par gyur to// de dag gis su bcu rtsa gsu pa'i mchod pa las khyad par 'phags pas bco ldan 'das la mchod de// bco ldan 'das
66b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la 'gos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcoM ldan 'das la ldan gsu bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas// 'thab bral gi lha de dag gyis/ bco ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa dag gra
66b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod pa// rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs// bas dang skye mched rjes kyang de bzhin te// dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag/ kun kyang thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ 
66b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhas pa'i 'dren pa'i di gnyis te// khyod kyis gzhan la som gas rang gis gzigs// de ni kun rdzob bye na dor dam 'dem/ 9/ bden pa gsupa gsusang ma mchis// gang gis
66b6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba gshegs pa 'gre ba na ngas// nga tu dadang skye laju // rgyal bas 'grob rnaMs kyi deng srangs// 'jig ton pa phyi du rdzobar bsgyur te// seMs can tshogs kyi 'dra drug gang bstan pa sems pa
66b7(dkon brtsegs): da// su rje phyags / rigs pa 'du shA 'i na nas // rgyag de sa su mas dang/ 
66b8(dkon brtsegs): zhing gaminag ga di nga kyigapa kyis mam / pa ring byed ga yas/ mchus kyi kyis 'dzi mangs// sa dbyas mal ma
67a1(dkon brtsegs): myi dam khyod kyis bstan// de la dga' ba 'gro ba'i 'khor ba na// 'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la myi 'byung ste// tho ba dang ma thob snyan dang myi snyan dang // bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsnga'o// thob pa rnyed na de la chags pa skyed
67a2(dkon brtsegs): ma thob gyur na des kyang sku 'khrug par 'gyur// gang gzhan ma bstan tshul 'di shes par bya// nad rnaMs rgyud kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur// kun rdzob de la don de sus smras pa// de dag nor bar blo ldan shes par bya// myi sdug sdug
67a3(dkon brtsegs): dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang // bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra ba dang // myi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing // de ltar dga' ste mtshan mar gang gnas pa// de dag bder gshegs gsung ni thos gyur na// 'jigs shing ji bzhin
67a4(dkon brtsegs): myi rtags spongs 'gyed// de dag bder gsung ni spangs gyur pas// sos can dmyal bar sdug bsngal myi bzad myong // de dag tshul myed bde tshol bgyid kyang // sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong 'gyur na// 'jig rten po rdo rje
67a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa su zhig gis// ma log zos ni rdza dang rtogs gyur na// sbrul gi lags pa rnying ltar rab spangs te// srid pa kun las 'das na zhi bar 'gyur// chos 'di thos cad rang bzhin dben pa ste// stong ba mjan
67a6(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa den ngam shes// gang gis thos na ngagar ba skyed 'gyur ba// de dag myed byang chu thob par 'gyur// ji ltar bde 'a gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos// de la lha rnaMs the sam mchis te/ dgra ba bas cad
67a7(dkon brtsegs): yangasu 'gas phyir phyir// de dag blan med pa'i byang chub kyal// byang chub rje ldan rdo dag zla ca rnaMs// skyes bu mchog gis dga' bru bskyed du gsol// de bas 'gro ba kun la snang phrad du// blun med pa'i byang chub po bar 'gyur
67a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshebacoM ldan 'das kyis 'thab bral ris kyi la bye ba phrag yin bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bas mo pa thugasu chud nas/ de'i tshe 'odzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dengeng ldan pa rta thul gyis bcoM ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de
67b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad pa// khyod ni 'khor ni the tso 'tshal bar 'gyur// myi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol// des ni 'khor ba'i rgyu 'di rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha rnaMs lung bstan de ni thos gyur na// na
67b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la// bde bar nan tan bgyid pa rtsom par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod 'dir 'di ni mchod ldan te// dang srong chen che po sangs rgyas yon tan snod// 'gro ba 'di rnaMs bsdu ba mdzad
67b3(dkon brtsegs): slad du// snyan pa'i gsung ni legs par brjod du gsol// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu dag thos gyur na// skye gu kun la rab tu sman por 'gyur// bde bar gzigs pas lung bstan de thos nas// mkhas pa rnaMs ni tshul bzhin rtsom pa 'gyur// 
67b4(dkon brtsegs): myi'i dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dir // the tsom 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par gsol// 'khor rjes thas cad thos par dgar zhing sdod// lha rjes lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol// kun kyang rim 'gor gus par rna blags
67b5(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyis lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la// sgrib po rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan/ 'jig rten phan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsung // de nas bco ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa// 
67b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa ni phyar mkhas pas 'dzum mjed pa// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba dus dang ldan// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na// skye bo tshogs chen rjes kyi don du 'gyur// sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing // 'dod
67b7(dkon brtsegs): chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang // tshe rabs brgyar ni brtson pa'i blo can dang // rti mug bre can dga' ba skyer myi 'gyur// gang rnams rgyal bas bstand la dga' ba dang // gang gis rgyal ba sngon des dang // gang rjes snying rje tshe dang ldan pa dag/ de kun
67b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang gis 'gro ba gnod zin mthong 'gyur te// mya'i seng ge snying rje skyed byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'dra zas ni// ud pal 'phreng bzhin 'grol khyer bar 'gyur// nga ra 'khor na rab tu dgapa
67b9(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// sngon gi rgyal la snyen bkur sngon byas te// de dag sangs rgyas yid 'ong yon tan 'di// me tog 'phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta// 'thab bral lci'i rnams sngon ga rgyal kun la// bsnyen bkur bas shing chags pa spangs pa ste// nyon
68a1(dkon brtsegs): mongs snang cing sangs rgyas tho ldan 'gyur// snying je ldan pazhing nyen mongs phyed de ldan// rgyal baphyi'i ming ge gang ga'i// bye snyed kun la sngon chad bsnyen bkur byas// drung du blan myed par ston cing / dge mthar mas 'i
68a2(dkon brtsegs): dag kun gyis byas// seMs can nyon mongs 'di bying rig gyur nas// sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying rje bskyed// de dag myi mchog sems can phan mdzad pa// chos tshul mtha' yas yongasu dris par 'gyur// gang thos nas ni rna bar 'dren
68a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// rje 'dren chos la 'jug pa bcad par 'gyur// myi'i nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas// de dag po rnaMs la rgya chen chos kyang 'chang // rje 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog/ de dag/ rang bzhin med la stong pa nyid kyang 'chad// de dag rgyal
68a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsung de khris gyur nas// 'gre ba thos cad stong pa ras su rtogs// ces song zhes na mtshan ma'i rnabs stong // rang bzhin byed cing ma can ma spyod pa smra// rgyal ba'i ches rjes de la ba zhes gyur nas// kun kyang sangs rgyas yon na
68a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams pa gnas/ de dag pa lam kyi byas/ bdag gi chos ni duni lung bstan nas// skang tshogs na nyi 'i brnal pa dmapa la// rdzu 'i nga du thong par 'gyur/ 'drer gshegs pa nyi bye'i grag/ nyi shu nyi
68a6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gang byar gyung/ rdzo gros dag ces byiba'i glang su 'gro// seMsan na bas yas yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur/ 'tha bral 'a kheng ba'i ni rnas pa nas// ta thul gyis ni yongs zhus byas pa/ rgyal ba dgra rgyal
68a7(dkon brtsegs): ba sa/ ma da pa'i nga na dag na zung sa ste// barba g+sa 'o// das ris kyis bye khrag kyang chub 'anam
68a8(dkon brtsegs): ya zlapa sa kyi na'i da dag yang yang/ man pa sa nas 'di du sa te/ gang btsan das kyis rbad med pa ya dag 'dzin pa'i du sa ma gang nig/ ci gzug
68a9(dkon brtsegs): 'a sa 'od te gas pas 'du byed dag/ rkyen shes pa'ig kyi 'das kyis dra med pa sa na pa rdzogs pa kyi yu du mas da do nga ni sdig masapa te// gzugs 'di kyi
68b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rno bar shes pa ni bco ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs
68b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma skyes pa byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ ji ltar skyes pas marje skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par ratshang rgya 'drabya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ de lta ji ltar sa skyes pa
68b3(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar bya/ gzugs 'gag pa myed pa pa byang chub kyang 'gag la myed pa/ rje bar shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa myed pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa myed pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa myed pa/ byang
68b4(dkon brtsegs): chub kyang spros pa myed pa/ rna bar shes pa yang spros pa myed pa/ byang chub kya nga spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa myed pa/ byang chub kyang ga nyi su myed pa/ rje bar shes pa yang gnyi su myed pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa
68b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang g.yo ba myed pa// rna bar shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba myed pa/ gzugs kyang dmyig su myed pa/ byang chub kyang dmyig su myed pa/ rnam par shes pa' bar yang dmyigasu med pa/ byang chub kyang dmyigs
68b6(dkon brtsegs): su myed pa na/ ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang / spros pa myed pa dang / gnyisu myed pa dang / g.yo ba myed pa dang / dmyig su myed pa dang 'gag pa myed pa dang / dmyigasu myed pa'i bar du mngon par rdzogs pa ra tshang rgya bar bya// de ltar chos thos cad mi
68b7(dkon brtsegs): dmyigs na/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang / byang chub seMs dpa' ni grag/ byang chub ni gang / lung bstan pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs ni kyis stong ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa ni rna par shes pas sog/ sangs
68b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis snying / byang chub sras dpa' ni byang chub seMs dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / lung bstan pa na lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos thas cad rang
69a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gis stong pa la gzugs zhes bya ba dang / rje bar shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni tha snyad tsam/ mying che// bda' tsam/ kun rdzob tsam/ brjod pa tsam sna gdags
69a2(dkon brtsegs): pa tsam ste/ de la mkhas pa rjes kyis/ mngon par zhen par bya ba'i phyi cha ste// 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig nyal ba la rmi la ma na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing / rtse rtse ba las de nyal ba lasaM langs nas// 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag myi mthong ste/ rje su
69a3(dkon brtsegs): dran pa yang myi rnyed cing / de ltar ma rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rjes kyang byang chub tshol na de dag chub dang 'phrad par myi 'gyur te/ byang chub ma rnyed cing ro myong
69a4(dkon brtsegs): bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thas cad ni rmyi la lta bu nor ba ste/ chos de dag gi ni don rno bar gzhan la/ so'i skye po de dag kyang rna ba gzhan du zhen to// chos de dag ni de ltar shes par bya
69a5(dkon brtsegs): yin na/ 'di de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yim/ gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos thas cad dmyigasu myed de/ so so'i skye bo yang dmyigasu med/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmyigs
69a6(dkon brtsegs): su myed ga nyan thos kyang dmyigasu med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmyigs med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmyigs su byed/ byang chub seMs dpa' yang dmyigs byed/ byang chub so so pa' yang dbyigs su med// byang chub sems dpa'i chos
69a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang dmyig su myed/ sangs rgyas kyang dbyigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmyigs su med/ byang chub kyang dmyig su byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang dmyigasu med do// bco ldan 'das de la ni thadag cag the tsom mchis/ yi dag
69a8(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis so zhes gsol nas/ dga' ldan gi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag chos de dag the tsom myed cing nem nur myed par gyur te/ bco ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ de dag gis 'thab bral gi mchod pa las khyad par 'phags
69b1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ bcoM ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcoM ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'gos phyag 'tshal nas/ bco ldan 'das lan gsu bskor byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bco ldan na 'das la tsagasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstsas
69b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rang gnas pa// de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ rje thar sgo gsu pa ni rnyed 'gyur bas/ mtshungs pa myed pa'i spyod yul spyodas par 'gyur/ gzugs dang tsher dang / 'du shes ma mchis te/ sos dang / 
69b3(dkon brtsegs): bas pa de bzhin ma mchis pa/ chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul lags/ myi'i seng ge phung po dben la bgyis/ skyes bu de pa mkhas pa de dag gis// byang chub seMs kyang ni yang 'byung ma mchis/ phung po dben pa'i yon tan mong
69b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ sangs rgyas dgongs legs nem nur spangs blo ldan// de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing // byang chub sems la'ang de dag mi smod de// dga' dang zhu bar 'gyur ma mchis// bde gshegs sras rjes spyod pa spyod par bgyid// 
69b5(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs rjes kyi chos rnaMs mnye bar gzigs// de la rgyal sras 'jig/ sa dang bral ba rnaMs// yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod/ cing / mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di la spyod// gzugs kyi mtshan ma
69b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bzhig bgyis shing // mtsham ma'i rje ba thos cad rab spangs te/ srid pa gsu la de dag yod mi smin// dngos po stong pa smon la de dag bgyid// phung po de dag ma skyes rtogs 'gyur cing / lung bsam bde gshegs nyid
69b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma skyes la// byang chub seMs dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes// de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis// skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams// de dag kun dang bder gshegs ma skyes ste// mo'i seng ge de ltar gang 'tshal
69b8(dkon brtsegs): de ni khyod sras khyod ni de'i yab// gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing // khas dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos// byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa// bco ldan 'di kun 'gag myed 'chal ba dang // gang rnaMs byang chub 'tshal zhing
70a1(dkon brtsegs): ga zhing spyod 'gyid pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gug sa mchis// 'gro ba thams cad 'gag myed blor gyur nas// de dIr blo la byang chub rnyed mi 'dag 'o// phung po skye mched dag dang / nges rjes dang // rlung du rgya
70a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bsras myi g.ye ngar// gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal sras ste// de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags// phung nge sos myed de bzhin skye mched dang // khaMs dang byang chub rgyal po brgyal sbas dang // lung bstan de bzhims sa par
70a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis par// gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rang 'byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste// khas dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang // byang chub dang mi lung bstan rgyal sras rnaMs// ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang spyod dang // phung po spros
70a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dre de bzhin khas rjes dang // skye mched rje gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang // lung bsam spros pa myed par gang spyod cing // de ltar gang 'tshal rgyal ba'i sras// gnas pa ma mchis myi gnas ma lags te// mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yongs
70a5(dkon brtsegs): lags// 'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags// de ltar gang 'am de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rgyal ba dang 'gro de ltar yengs mthong zhing// ston pa'i dgongs pas de ltar rartsal gyur la// de ltar bgyis na gang zad
70a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog bgyid cing // 'dren pa 'khor dang bcas bsnyen bkur lags// rnaM bar 'dren sa bskyed pa'i bsod nas gang // ji snyed 'jig rten ma pa ma mdzad mkhye na pa'i// dag pa de yis 'gro bar rang 'byung ba// rgyal ba mtshan mchog ldas
70a7(dkon brtsegs): grub par sheg/ de ras bcoM ldan 'das kyis wA ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pi bas la thug su chud nas/ 'dzum pa mdza// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bco ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsel la// 'dren ba rgyu'i stobs na gang zhig gis
70a8(dkon brtsegs): bas su nyes pa 'di ltar 'dum mngang sa// 'ju ba'i rgyud 'dren pa sa bkara' stsal gsol// des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar 'gyur/ shig kya grub pa'i nas nas 'jum mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'dis mthong ze tsom 'phrul 'gyur ste// nyan pa
70b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhan du myi sos par// kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal lta ba// 'di ltar dper na nang la nang skyo la// sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa// de bzhin 'khor 'di lung bstar thos 'tshal zhing // rkang gnyis dbang po 'dir gshes
70b2(dkon brtsegs): dulta// 'khor 'di thas cad rgya chen ldan pa ste// sangs rgyas dgongs la zhes pa'o yid dang ldan// rgyal pos lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te// kun kyang bder gshegs zhal du lta// zhing bstod// de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // tsin+da
70b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur dang // sangs rgyas dgongs pa bas pa gzhog 'gyur bar// ye shes stobs kyis tho tsam bcad du gsol// mi'i khyu mchog/ lung bstan dus la 'ab// the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tso rtsal du gsol// sangs rgyas
70b4(dkon brtsegs): slar bsngo 'od ne mi mnga' na// rtog ge tshogs kyi sde me shig du gsol// de nas bcoM ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad dgal stsal la// ta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgor mdzad la// 'dzum pa'i don dris
70b5(dkon brtsegs): deni dus dang dang / de ltar 'jig cen 'as la dri bsam// de rang 'gro ba 'di dri cid pa // 'jig rten pan phyir 'dum pa 'di mdzad pa// gang gis chos ngas 'do dag shes 'gyur te// nga mchong pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i// dag man kyi
70b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas mdzad// 'gro ba yang dag togs bzhizhin du mthong // rgyal zhi dgongs pas chos nyid nyes par 'gyur// gang la 'gre 'bras cad rnyes rmongs gyur ci'i// rna ba thar ba'i sku gsungab tu rtogs/ sngo gi rgyam
70b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes la lhag bya byas// bas pA gcig gis zhu ba legs par nus// de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bskos// sngan chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bsta na// de dag de bzhin gshegs dang dang 'phrad cing // skyes bu mchog dang 'grogs
70b8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'thob kyang nas// snang pa nyid kyis 'dren pa snyed byas pas// di ring 'gro ba'i dor cher shin du byas// 'gro ba thos cad skye med ci bzhin du// byang chub rgyal ba de bzhes su bya bstad dang // gang dag zhi thob nas spyod pa dang // 
71a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin de dag skyes pa myed// 'gro ba kun gi chos nyid 'di 'dra ba// de shes byang chub theb par 'gyuraro zhes// lha rnaMs gang yang de ltar the tsom myed// byang chub seMs kyis rtag par de ltar spyod// de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag myed
71a2(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin du// lha tshogs 'di dag rtogs pa'i blo ldan te// mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur myed pas// de ci phyir 'di dag rgyal ba rang 'byung 'gyur// gnas pa myed pa la ni nges gyur nas// g.yo ba med la nem nur med pas na// 'gro ba
71a3(dkon brtsegs): kun la sos la yod myin pa// de la 'ang lha rjes the tsom yang myed do// chos rnaMs nga bo nyid kyis rang bzhin myed// byang chub seMs dang de bzhin byang chub kyang // thas cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin myed// de la 'ang lha rjes the tsom rna bar dag
71a4(dkon brtsegs): blo mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rjes// kun kyang gnas myed de la rab gnas te// de phyir lha rjes byang chub rnyed mi dka'// rang byung nyidri na myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dren pa skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la// 'gro ba mtha' yas rnabang 'grel
71a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag mtshan du gyur pa ni// rang byung ches la rje sa rgyal po'o// de ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnams kyi// na pa mkhyen te 'gre la bstan mdzad pa// de zhes nas ni ltar bcas 'jig rten lnga
71a6(dkon brtsegs): yid rangs gyur cing song bas thob par gyur// / dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste// / bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas de 'i tshe tshig rab 'phrul dga' bye ba bdun nus lha ma yinA rjes nas// dag ldan
71a7(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha de dag go ma chod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid 'ongs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing / de bzhin nyid la the tsom myed par
71a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas stan las langs te/ bcoM ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba bdud de// bcoM ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoM ldan 'das kyis gsungs pal
71b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba lta na/ chos thas cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang / mtha' yas dang / myi gnas pa'i mtha' dang / myi zad pa'i mtha' dang / myi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste/ mtham
71b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'o// macom ldan 'das la de ma nor ba'i srid du/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// mtshan ma mchis pa'i slad bu mtha' yas pa'i mtha' zhes 'gyul// chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtho' lde brgya'o
71b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i sra du// myi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ro gcig pa'i slad du mya gnyis pa zhes bgyi'o// khachis pa'i slad du mtha' mchis pA zhes bgyi'o// bco ldan 'das ya
71b4(dkon brtsegs): phag pa'i mtha' 'di ni thas cad kyi rjesu song ba lags te/ chos gang yang kye dag pa'i mtha' ma lags par chos 'di gang yang ma mchis so// bco ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste// byang chub
71b5(dkon brtsegs): ga na na/ bco ldan 'das chos zas cung rang 'ini dam mchis pa ni/ byang du nga las par rig par gyi'o// ba na 'chis skyed pa nas kyang byang du pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ba coM ldan 'das byang chung ni rang bzhir mchis pa
71b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshas myed pa nas kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas/ de'i srad du 'jams myed pa rjes kyang byang chub rjes 'gyi'o// bcoM ldan 'das phung po ma lus mi ru mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste// mtshams
71b7(dkon brtsegs): myed pa rjes kyang ro'i rang bzhin no// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bco ldan 'das chos thos cad ni phung po ma lus pa'i 'amya ngan las 'dras pa'i dbyings te/ 'tshams myed pa rjes kyang de'i rang bzhi no// bco ldan 'das gang su dag yongasu mya ngan
71b8(dkon brtsegs): las 'das par 'jal ba de dag mi gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te// de ci'i phyir ne ma gal te 'khor ba zhugs pa zhig ma michis nam/ mya ngarnalas 'das pa yang btsal bar gyur na/ yang dge pa'i mtha' la ni 'khor bar 'um
72a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yang ma mchis na/ de mya ngan las 'das pa ci zhig chel bar 'gyur/ bcoM ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyisu ma mchis pa ste/ bcoM ldan 'das de bdag cag som nyis ma mchis/ the tsom pa mchis pa
72a2(dkon brtsegs): bco ldan 'das gang ma la zhig/ chos 'di la nem nur dang the tsam mchis na de ni srin gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnaMs kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
72a3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcoM ldan 'das kyis de'i'achi/ lha'i dbang po rang 'phrul las brdzogs pa/ 'phrul dga' res kyi lha bye ba phrag bdun bcu po de dag rang gis rang lung bstan pa de dag gnas nas/ 'gro ba thos cad pa
72a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir// de'i tshe 'dzub ma dzad de// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ta thul bas bcoM ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol la 'jig rten lan par bzhed pas 'dzub mngang // 'dzum pa rgya ni khyod kyis ma bstan te// ra cung
72a5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu nga dran dang / rgyam mchis ra 'dus pa myim ngang so// / dkyinas des 'dra ba de ma nga ga/ mthang nasu ltung bcas 'jig rten po tso // 'dus pa'i myid gang lags n+tu sa
72b1(dkon brtsegs): skachags 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing / 'gro ba 'di dag zas cad dga' bar mdzod// de nas bcoM ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa thul mtshigs bcad de slar bka stsal pa// das ni 'jig rten pan gyir 'du ma
72b2(dkon brtsegs): rtathul khyod kyis zhu ba de zhus pa// lung bstan de ni khyod lA sa lus par/ bstan par ngas byas dang bar kun kyang nyan// 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di nas kyis// ne pa thAs cad mkhyen par bdag cag lung bas // 
72b3(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs tshogs kyi bas pa zil mnan nas// 'khor 'di sang ge'iri nga ro chen po bsgrags// gan du rdo 'phang sa sa la ltung ba ltar// de la the tsom za bar mi 'gyur te// de ltar the tsom myed pa'i tshul thob pa// bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcu
72b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar shes// nyim nub gyur ni sros gyur pa'i tshe// myi rjes zla ba myur du 'char bar shes// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag/ bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// skar tshogs dbus ma
72b5(dkon brtsegs): ba gnas pa ni// seMs can chungs par 'di la the tso myed// de bzhin rgyu / ba'i sras po rdul thob dag/ bdag nag thas cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar nyam nub par gyur pa'i tshe// nyi ma myi mthong sas
72b6(dkon brtsegs): can de dag shes// de bzhin bder gshegs sras po tshul shes pa// ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes// chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing // rgya mtshor 'bab par mkhas brjes kyis shes// de bzhin 'de gshegs
72b7(dkon brtsegs): sras po dus shes bya// byang chub rgya tsamathon par byar ba shes// de ltar gan du bang ba 'azungs pa de// sal lung badre 'gying du btsom byed/ de brji rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang // 'jig tor mkham pa snang ye shes dun
72b8(dkon brtsegs): gang bos nas dge tsor byed nga rgyang zhing // sangs rgyas yon can gnas yar bdag shes la// rang gis pa lag stong pa ma yin pang // ma'as pa rnams kyis chos nyid btu mthong // gas te bdud kyi tshogs ni rtse dang / sangs rgya
73a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs bsgyur bang cang sbyar byas kyang // chos la mkhas bachos nyid rang mthong ba// de dag byang chub las ni breg kyi rus// de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing // dag gis bdag nyid lung bste
73a2(dkon brtsegs): brjod byed pa// de la 'dren pa cho ga tshul mkhyen pa// de ltar lce tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la// gzhan gi dring myi 'jog par mngon shes shing // de dag bder gshegs 'gyur zhes rang spru la// 'jig rten mkhas pa rjesu
73a3(dkon brtsegs): yid rang mdzad// rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gi rjes// bla med byang chub thob par byar sos pa// de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur pa'i// 'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsnyen par bya// gang dag tshul la 'jug pa rab
73a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing // mkhas pa gang dag dge ba shes rab bkur ba// de dag byang chub lag 'thal 'dra bar gsal// tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur// gang gis bskal pa stong du dka' thub spad// sha khrag pags la ste
73a5(dkon brtsegs): lci byas pa bas// gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na// de ni khyad 'phags dga' thub de lta myin// 'das pa'i rang 'byung gang rjes 'byung ba dang // ma 'ongs sos can pa na bzhed gang byung dang // 
73a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar dus na 'dren pa 'tshul gyis ni rang 'thung thob par 'gyur// kun kya tshul gis bde bar gshegs pa thob// rangab 'phrul lnga tshogs thu pa'i tshub shes nas// 'di dag ngas mchod pa mchog rgyas ni
73a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dres las bzhin sa su gyis sa pan/ chu kyis su me 'byung po par 'gyur// 'jig nyid gakhas pa tid 'dzi tha~M yang mag 'i ga/ dngas rgyas 'byung gnas das// de dag thos cad rgyal 'i tshu ma
73a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul thob rjes kyis spen bsnyen myur du thob// de la ta thul sangs rgyas sras rjes ni// sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med// sangs rgyas tshul la seMs can rdo rtse ba// tshul shes la dag ston pa'i lam la spyod// de ltar nul
73b1(dkon brtsegs): la dang ba'i yid byed te// brtse yang bya ba'i sdug bsngal spyod la myin// rtag tu dge' bshes mkhas pa bsnyen byas na// bla myed byang chub myung du thob par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thob nas ma// 'khor kun
73b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i byang chub yid rangs te// rjes su yid rang the tsom gyur nas ni// mthar phyed blo gros ni zhus par 'gyuraro// / 'phrul dga' la lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe/ lha'i nga rgyal po dang
73b3(dkon brtsegs): skyusbyar las bstsogs pa// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lA bye ba khrag khrig phrag babargyad bcus lha ma yin rjes nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang mthong nas// tshim zhing mgu la yi/ 
73b4(dkon brtsegs): rangs te rab tu dga' zhing rga ba dang // yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan 'das 'phrul dag 'i lha rjes kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gang smras pa de la bdag
73b5(dkon brtsegs): cag gis yang dag pa yang myi dmyigs na/ de'i mtha' lta smos kyang rtsa'atshal// de'i ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcoM ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa'i mtha' dmyigs na ni// mtha' yang des dmyigs
73b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te// de ni gnyis kyis spyod pa'o// de lta bu de ni theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rjes kyi spyod yul ma lags so// bcoM ldan 'das gang la la zhig gnyisu ma mchis pa'i chos rnam
73b7(dkon brtsegs): chos na sa ni gnyis su ma mchis so zhes kyi spyod ma mos na// de 'di ska du bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs dang 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// swa huM sems lpags kyung de de la log par zhugs papa ma mas kyi/ 
73b8(dkon brtsegs): slad byazhe na// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub du smon pa de ni lam log par zhugs pa lags kyi/ bco ldan 'das gang mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos degang yang ma mi chiso// de ci'i srad du ne rab ci ldan
74a1(dkon brtsegs): chos 'gag zhig dmyigs par gyur na/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs papar byang rgya bar myi nus so// bco ldan 'das chos 'di ni 'das pa lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags da ltang byung ba ma lags 'dus sa
74a2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ 'dus ma byas ma lags/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongasasu shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgo bar bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon tu bgyi ba ma lags so// bcom ldan
74a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang chos gang gi gnyen po ma lags/ chos gang chos de'i gnyen po ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ rna bar byang ba ma lagasate/ gang gis chos bzhan
74a4(dkon brtsegs): gis gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gis myi dmyigs la/ gang chos de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de gang yang rang bzhin gis myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thas cad na mtshan
74a5(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba lags/ yongs shes par bgyib ma lags/ spang bar mgyi ba ma lags/ myi srung bar bgyi ba ma la goso// bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon par
74a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags te// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi mtshan ma bral ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rje par shes pa ni rje par shes pa'i mtshan ma bral ba'o// gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtsham
74a7(dkon brtsegs): ma nas rna bar shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang lags pa de yang skye ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas rno bar shes pa'i bar gi 'gag pa gang lags pa de yang / 'gag ma'i mtshan ma bral ba'o// bco ldan 'das
74a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas kyang 'dus kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// 'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'i
