74b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du dmyags te/ de lar myi dmyigs pa ro// mngon par shes par 'gyi na ma lags/ yongasu shes par kyi tsham lags/ srang ba sa gyi 'am lagos/ bswA~M larab kyi sa la gso// btso ldan rangs gang ngos ldanaH
74b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub seMs dpa' theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris gi lha de dag gis// ji ltar shes pa'i chos de dag lung bstan nas/ de'i
74b3(dkon brtsegs): bco ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das sred pa mthar 'byin legs par gsungs// 'dren// pas srid pa'i snying po ma skyes na// skye ba myi mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis/ 
74b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i pha rol bgrod phyir rab tu zhugs// phung po rjes na kun tu myi rim gas te// phung po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid// chos ga gis ni gnyen por 'gyur ba ni// mtshan mos stong ste gang yang ma mchi so / 
74b5(dkon brtsegs): de bo nyid kyis stong phyir dngos po gang // yongasu shes bya ba dang spangs bsgos mngor bya ba// gang ma mchis shing gang du nga myi dmyigs te// dngos po rjes ni dngos myong rang 'byung gsungs// byang chung gang yang mtshar mar myi dmyis/ 
74b6(dkon brtsegs): khung dung phyogs kyi chos nas de rjin no// sangs rgyas gang ya ma ma phyi phyogs te// nga chub sems dang mtshon ma rtogs kyi 'gyur// phyi ma 'os yang dag ma tshan ma mdzad ni pa// de dag byang chu ro
74b7(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed kyang // mtshan ma spyod cing spyang yul log pa ste// rngo gas dadapas byang chub la myi spyong// mtshan mo sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la dan spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas stan la mkhas// mtshan ma de 'di
75a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshanam myed pangs te// sri da myi stong ba ngas dmyigs byed pa// mams pa de dag byang chul gyi spyod// de dag byang chub dam pa'i zag// bas kyi nom bkun kyi sod yul sbyin// gnas de nya thos
75a2(dkon brtsegs): bgrod pa sbyid// nga rgyal rgyan rjes kyang de la myi 'gro ste// rdo grol sems ldan zag skyed tha myed// dgra bco bstan pa 'od la gang brtson pa// de bzhin rang rgyal skyed par gyur pa dag/ mkhas po'i spyod yul de la spyod yul myed// 'gro'ang
75a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni mtshan ma spyod pa dang // nyi tshe'i stong pa nyid la skam pa dang // gang rjes stong bas stob zhes stang smra dang // ces kun rang bzhin yad spras thob myi nus// sangs rgyas ma smang rdzas kyi bslab pa la// slob dang rnam bral sleb pa'i sred
75a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams// mkhas de rtogs pa myed pas byang chub rtogs// ston pas bstan pa bzhin du dges byed lags// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis rtse bo bstod pa naH bdag cag bsod nams myi chung gang thod des// 'gro
75a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa 'chang rgya zhing // myi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas grub pa shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe lci'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur la brtsegs pa/ gzhan 'phrus drabang byed ris lha khrag
75a6(dkon brtsegs): khrig phrag dargyad bcu de dag gi lhag ri'i bas pa thug su chud nas/ skye rebs po che dag zhi dge 'jings par skyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang drA ba te thul gis bcoM ldan 'das la dra gsu bcad dgas
75a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan grus dang byed pa'i sa ma chems// nadu gnyis po'i khyod kyis 'du mang dpa// rdum rdzas 'du gro 'i rdzon pa gsungs // rgyam pa 'dun pa'i rgyuni sbyin du gsol// 'dre myi myed 'du ba sbyim nga / 
75a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khya mchog rnam pas de skad gsungs// 'jig rten don slad 'dzul mad pa'i rgya// 'drem mi sa cana' sbom ze tsom rtsal zhu gsal// drang srong chen po zhal nas 'dus rig nas// thub cheng khyed kying kha~M rjes the tso 'tshal/ 9
75b1(dkon brtsegs): ta ma rgyal ba 'dren du khyod la// 'jig rten spang srad 'jus rgyu srung bstan gsol// 'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyal rgyab phyogs te// mya ngan 'das pa'i seMs kyis thal sbya byed// 'khor 'di yangs pa'i mes ldang tho tsom 'tshas
75b2(dkon brtsegs): sa sa ga 'du / gags 'byur pa ma pa / pa'i spyod / kyi ma 'gra @#
75b3(dkon brtsegs): khum// bder gshegs stan la de dag bder gnas shing // grang lam dang byung rnas pa gshegs gyur pa// la 'do nas ni the tsom mchis micha// de bas skyebo the tshobacad du gasrel// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshed
75b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ta thul la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// skye bo'i tshigs na don dbang brtan byas nas// tshigasu bcad de dus su gang smri zhing // 'dzum don gi mya ni yongs zhus pas// khyod kyi tshig ni dus
75b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yin// rta thul dra ba de'i don dris pas// skye bo'i tshogs che 'di'i don byas 'gyur// khyod kyis de dris skye re tshogs che mdag/ byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pas
75b6(dkon brtsegs): pangs mkhyed te/ khru 'dzug pa 'di ni ngas bskod te// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i bstan bdI pa 'di nas// de muganyer ba de dag de bzhin dong // gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par// smig rgyal mngo ltang rung ni da
75b7(dkon brtsegs): sa pa rmongs pa ga khas pa'i rdul bzhin te// de dag rjes byang chung 'ad pas bslab// mtshan mi 'du shes su zhi mye rjes yang // gsum can ma ma dag 'jigs 'gyur shing // maHna pa'i 'dugs log 'arims
75b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod // mchan ma myed pa byang dung mchog par 'gyur/ byed pa'i tog ldan ma mar na btags nas// ji ltar btags pa de bzhi na cibar yin// mchar ming song bar nas mthong mkhas pa'i// ni dag ni grags ldan dam pa
76a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes mtshan can mi mnyam sems rgyud kyis// sdig pa brgya dag myi mkhas de dag byed// 'gre kun tu sdug bsngal gyi rlung myong // de ltar mkhas mtshan ma btags pa byas// mtshan ma ru
76a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ni nga pa dang// sangs rgyas kyang chung rkyang chub se du mthong // de yang sa ma sa byed ning sang ma tho nga// byang chub gin pa skyed tha~Md byeng ga// 'du shes ma nanus can sa nyon dungs 'as// ba
76a3(dkon brtsegs): pa kun du sbyor ba spong // mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan myed de// kun tu sbyor ba de nyid mtshan nyid yin// gang rjes byang chub 'thob pa bya rtog pa// rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas par chad yan// mkhas pa'i long spong mA nar myed par 'o d+d+ha
76a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnas gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis byed// rna por rtogs pas chos 'bru kun kyang steng // rtog pa myed pas mtshan mod par 'gyur// de nyid byed chung gzhan du mkhas myi smra// rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos gyur nas/ 
76a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tsom rtsal// dper na tsam pa'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa/ ra// mkhas rjes thub pas gsungs la legs ces 'dzin// 'jig sa pa myed pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis// mchod pa 'phags pa bla ma med byas ni
76a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya ba'i byed mu chos grang dashes nas/ dgre ba rdabang 'dren pa kun ma byer 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa lung bsar pa'i ze'u ste/ bsu sung 'o// de nas cangs ris kyi 'a bye brag drug nus lham yin nas nas gzha sum
76b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de bzhin du skyes pa ma yin/ ma skyes pa mi yin/ byung ba yang ma yin/ ma byung ba yang ma yin/ grub pa yang ma yin/ sra grub pa yang ma yin/ 'gags pa yang ma yin/ 'anan
76b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin/ gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang sa yin// rna bar byang ba yang ma smin/ rje su chags pa yang ma yin/ khod la khro ba yang ma yin/ rmongs pa yang ma yin/ 
76b3(dkon brtsegs): marmongs pa yang ma yin/ shes pa po ma yin/ shes pa po myed pa yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin/ mthong ba po myed pa yang ma yin/ tshor ba po yang ma yin/ rtso ba po myed pa yang ma yin/ stong po yang yin/ stong
76b4(dkon brtsegs): po myed pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ myed pa yang yin/ dngos po yang ma yin/ dmyigs pa yang ya yin/ mi rimigs pa yang ma yin/ 'gro ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ sang pa yang ma yin/ 'ongs pa
76b5(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin/ stong la yang ma yin/ myi stong pa yang ma yin/ 'amatshan ma yod pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma myed pa yang ma yin/ smon la yod pa yang ma yin/ smon po myed pa yang mA yino// zhes bya bar shes pa
76b6(dkon brtsegs): dzA k+kA/ na las sa mdu myi gas 'i yid kyi rtsims dmyigs/ sa ya myigs/ sa sbyi gas dag jo 'i sa
76b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dugs pan yang pa yin/ rmugs dum yin/ 'byung ba 'dun sa rjo ma pa ying/ seM zhes ca mamaldan pas bya sa ma pa 'du shes ca sa med par skye
76b8(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pan mang yin/ pas skye ba ma yi mi chos kyi 'dushes ca mang mi cad thos kyi 'du shes ca yang mi yon/ nyan thos pa yid pa'i 'du shes cad yang ma yang/ nyi rapa kyi chos kyi sa skyes tsamam pa'i/ 
76b9(dkon brtsegs): 1 thos yin pa'i chos kyi 'dugs can yang ma yin// rang sangs
77a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas mya yin pa'i// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin
77a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin
77a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ma yon pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las
77a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba myed pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ de ltar thas cad du rtog pa myed pa'i blo can nam mkha' bzhin du dag cing gos pa
77a5(dkon brtsegs): pa myed par gyur nas/ de rnaMs dag pa dang gos pa myed pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe de dag zhi bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhing phyir pa spyod cing pha rol byon
77a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba ston par mdzad cing grol la zhi ba ston rjes su ston// zhi ba'i spyod yul dges shing byang chub zhi la dri dral 'khrug ma mchis// khyed kyis 'chi myeng zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad par myu rang du brnyes// zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam
77a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten// yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klod rnams zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton// sngon gi la bas bstend pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god// de ston sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi ba
77a8(dkon brtsegs): der zhes gsungs// 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsnyen pa'i bslab pa bstan // gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas theb/ bslabs nas zhi zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam 'dong dbang po zhi ba dag/ 'jig
77b1(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhas pa 'gro bzhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro bzhi bgyid pa gang dag gis// 'chi myed zhi ba mtshan ma thas cad zad par rtogs gyur pa// de dag 'dren pa tshul la mkhas pa mchod pa mchog
77b2(dkon brtsegs): gis mchod par 'gyur ka nyon mongs zho zhing mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das// thub pa gang dag zhi las zhi 'dod sems can dpa' deg nyon mongs 'gyur/ 
77b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khyod kun gyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bas myi khyab// thub pa glo ldan 'di las rgal ba de la bdag cag dogs ma mchis// gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshol de la zhi bar rtogs// phung pos 'jigs pa deg shag kya thub pa
77b4(dkon brtsegs): 'i stan la dga' ma lags// dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi ba tshol dag blo 'khrugs 'gyur ba ste// chos kyi mtshan ma'i spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs// thas cad mkhyend pa zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba zhi ba 'di
77b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gsungs// thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kun tu mtshan myi rnyed// dag shag kya thub pa'i bstan po mdzes byed gang dag mtshan gyi de dga'// de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par ma
77b6(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi rtsol las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba'i thos cad mkhyend pa thob// rnam la drin zhi ba mdzad la stod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa// chag sa myed thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen 'gyur ba/ 
77b7(dkon brtsegs): des ni 'gro ba thas cad lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten 'gyur ba// zhi med zhi ba bstend nas mkhas pas mchod pa'i rang 'byung sdig myed shog/ de nas myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnaMs dang / lha rnams kyis
77b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la stod par rig nas/ bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// myi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thas cad ni// log pa rmongs byed chang bu stong 'dra na
78a1(dkon brtsegs): gson gyi sbyin 'ang myin 'phru 'drubs byed/ rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon na myed par mkhyed // ci ltar myi shog mi'am kres gyur pas/ kha zas rod d+ha thos kyang ma 'das pa// de la bkres myed pas med sos can byed/ rlom
78a2(dkon brtsegs): de 'drar chos rnas thams cad gzigs// skom pa'i myi zhig nyal ba'i rmyi lam na// chu bas la dang zhing rnyog pa myed la 'thungs gyur kyang // ngoms myed tsha bzhi par mi 'gyur te// de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thas cad gzigs// 'di la bye
78a3(dkon brtsegs): myed tshor myed sems can myed// byas pa de bzhin myed rnam smin myed// 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba de myed ces// 'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tsom yong mi mnga'// myi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig sma na// dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho babyed
78a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig nyid myed cing dgar gyur da dngos kyang myed// de mkhyen dol the tsom yong mi mnga'// pi bang sgra snyan mnyan na na snyan te// sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod pa myin// de ltar mkhas pas phung po gzigs pa na// phung po'i rang bzhin
78a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yang dmyigs myi mnga'// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa/ gos gi drung bzhag sna tshogs mtshon du 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhi na yongs dag chos rnams kyang // log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar 'gyur/ 
78a6(dkon brtsegs): can dan dri myong skyon dang dral ba dang // rkyen dang sbyar na dI zhim gzhan du 'gyur// da ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang // so so rang gis brtags pa'i ni ba bzhin// ji ltar myi 'is rung gi sgra thos na// sgra 'di ga las byung zhes
78a7(dkon brtsegs): brtag byas kyang // rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos po de de myi dmyigs// myi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar myi zhig gsod pa'i kha zas la/ yan lag srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na// dngos myed yan lag srog kyang de bzhin
78a8(dkon brtsegs): te// drong srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mya zhog nam mkha'i 'ja mthong nas sa/ yun lag bgegs pa rtags rang bzhin myed cing stong // nam mkha'o 'ja bzhin khyod kyis yan lag stong // drang srog chen pos dang ni
78b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kun gzigs// grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnams bzhigs na// grong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin mying myi dmyigs// grong khyer ji ltar de bzhin yan lag stong // myi dbang khyed kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus dag
78b2(dkon brtsegs): ba rnga bzhin brdungs bgyis na// dga' ba skyed kyang sgra'i rang bzhin stong // ji ltar sgra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong // myi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de phyogs su myi 'go 'byung ba
78b3(dkon brtsegs): myed pa phyogs su de bzhin 'gag par myi 'gyur te// myi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de bdungs pa'i tshe// thogs pa myed cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te// khyod kyis yan lag rnga sgra de dang 'dra// myi dbang
78b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de bdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de 'jig rten dga' byar rtog pa myed// ji ltar sgra bzhin / da kyi yan lag stong // myi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs// skyes bus
78b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar dza de brdungs pa'i che// g.yo ba myed cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang myed/ ji ltar rnga bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // myi dbang khyed kyis deb zhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bu ji ltar dza de bdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de yan lag
78b6(dkon brtsegs): ma byung rang dbang myin// ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // myi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de bzhin gzigs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i bas pa thugs
78b7(dkon brtsegs): chud cing zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i sted pa des de ltar bstod pas// 'khor de yang dge' ba'i rtsa ba brtsegs par gzigs nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa
78b8(dkon brtsegs): gsoyong pa ga/ shag kya thub pa'i zhas nas 'dzum mdzad du myed dag mthong nas/ lhar bcas myir bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thas cad ldan pa'i 'gro ba the tsom 'jal// bder gas
79a1(dkon brtsegs): zhal bzangs de la lta zhing thos par dga' ste stong/ rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' rtsol the tsom 'gum du gsol// rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams// rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed
79a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad ma mthong na ka ba der gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum mdzad the tsom rgyu de gsungs// rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di the tsom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar nas 'khod la seMs// bder gshegs
79a3(dkon brtsegs): thub pa'i gsung mchog the tsom gcod pa nyan 'tshal na// rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de dag rjes la gsungs// thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tsom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog myed sangs rgyas yon ta/ 
79a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ka/ sten pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dra la lta// 'dren pa chags myed rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i gsung bsgrag gsol// de thos 'khor rnams the tsom chad cing chos la gnas par 'gyur// khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don lnga/ 
79a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'das rig nas// skye bo dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thos cad mnye nad pas tshim// de dogs bsal sbyang ba'i yid kyis thas cad mkhyen du sgrub// brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dus pa stobs ldan rtsom pa
79a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// de lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan mdzad gsung bsgrags dngo la// rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung ma chog myi gso'i thos nas de'i sa ni dga' ba thob pa'i 'khor 'di mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar// stobs bcus
79a7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa legs par dgongs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka' bstsal pa// rta thul nga'i sa phan byed 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstand pa rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing
79a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byos// de thos 'gro ba yon tan bstsags pa myu rang du 'jig rten don byed pa// phan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bka' bsngal de la brtson 'grus rtsom// tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di la dag dga' zhing chos rnaMs
79b1(dkon brtsegs): the tsom myed// skal pa khrag khrig gang ga'i bye ma snyed du dga' ba legs par spyad// kun tu rna par dag la ma chags yid 'gyur 'du shes 'kha'adra ste// de ltar gyur kyang bder gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sems ma bskyed// 
79b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ma 'ongs dus na skal pa bye ba brgya phrag g.yas pa// gang ga'i bye ma snyed na rdul bsal thas cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas// de dag phyi nas bde bar gshegs pa che ldan sangs rgyas 'dren che ba// sred pa sel cing 'gro ba stong pa
79b3(dkon brtsegs): stonod na bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur// skyob pa dag ji ltar spyod pa sku tshe'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur// bde gshegs mtha' yas grags ldan 'jig rten sdug sngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur// deg rnaMs kyi sangs rgyas zhing no zhing gi
79b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byor da pa gzhal yas te// 'dren pa chen po rnaMs kyi skal po khrag khrig rnab du mar ni// sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnaMs kyis gsungs kyang dag bkod pa zad myi nus// de tshe deg ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur
79b5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba myed cing seMs myed myi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog rnams su skyob pa thams cad mkhyen lam sbyangs pa'i// sems can gcig kyang myi 'byung srid pa de la phan cher mya ngan 'da'/ 
79b6(dkon brtsegs): dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba dag sdug sngal gcig shes te// myi rtag 'du byed sdug sngal rab tu 'jigs pa sems can yid 'byung ngo // de na 'gyur ba'i sdug sngal dang ni sdug sngal yod myi 'gyur// deg thams cad blo mthun 'gyur zhing bas/ 
79b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i la la myur bar 'gyur// de na myi rnams dag ni sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung myi 'gyur// myi sdug myi rtag nyid dang sdug pa de bzhin bdag myed dang // zhi ba stong nyid mtshan myed 'chi myed mya ngan 'das dang byang chub zhi// sgra ska
79b8(dkon brtsegs): dag yang dang yang 'byung dag rna la gnas par 'gyur// sgra gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba gel gnas thob par myi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang gang na'ang yang yod myi 'gyur// gla gam myed dang mkha' dang / 
80a1(dkon brtsegs): gtsug lag khang gnas khang rnams myed// de tshe sangs rgyas mthus yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung // de tshe 'dres pa'i nyes pa myed cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyi nar
80a2(dkon brtsegs): ni dge' ba'i sgra grag 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'ang 'gror 'gyur// de tshe zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa dag skal pa khrag khrig byang chub brtson
80a3(dkon brtsegs): byas nas ka drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gis ni 'byor pa 'di bstsags te// zhing mchog de na sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bder gshegs 'gyur// tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya chen zhi ba 'gro bas mthong 'gyur na
80a4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' bskul bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis ba ste nad gyur pa// de la bslabs nas 'gro ba thas cad thogs// pa myed pa'i 'dren par 'gyur// de dag rgyas pa thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun
80a5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po myed ces stond// de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa bsten par bgyis// tshangs pa lung bstand pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// 
80a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'od gsal gis bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis lA ma yin rnams nos/ tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mtheng / lung bstand pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgul yod rangs te/ rab du dga' zhing dga' ba dang / 
80a7(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes nas/ stan las langs te gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo bskur ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ce
80a8(dkon brtsegs): gsoyong to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub seMs dpa' tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang bslabs nas// ches thams cad snang bar gyu ra pa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te// des chos thams cad
80b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par 'byid ngo // de rtogs pas bsam kyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang thegs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / lam dpal pa'i spabs pa dang / dge' ba'i spobs pa dang / 
80b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i spobs pa can du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa de yang thob par 'gyur ro// 
80b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par spyod pa thos na/ 
80b4(dkon brtsegs): yid la myi bgyid de/ de 'di snyam du chos thas cad ni rnam par rtog pa myed de/ rnam par rtog pa yongasasu chad pa'o// gang rnam par myi rtog pa de ni thams cad du song ba ste/ chos gang yang rnam par nus pa ma mchis so// de ci
80b5(dkon brtsegs): slad du nyo na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang to num mchis pa'i de ji skur rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes ches thos dral rnam par myi rtog par a la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob cing na/ 
80b6(dkon brtsegs): deg a'i sgor zhugs pas/ spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ a zhes bgyi ba ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa kun du mtha' yang / pa ma bgyis pa/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa/ yongasu ma grub pa/ 
80b7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po ma mchis pa/ myi gnas pa myi g.yor ba/ 'du ma mchis pa/ 'phro ba ma mchis pa/ rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ ma sgrubs pa yong su thub pa ma mchis pa/ ma brtags pa gzugs mchi/ 
80b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bstan pa ma mchis pa/ ltar ma mchis pa/ ma mthong ba bas du ma mchis pa/ rnam par myi gnas pa/ ma shes pa rnam par ma shes pa/ ma smos pam snyan pa bas gas myi khyab pa/ khas du ma mchis pa/ song ba ma/ 
81a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa/ 'ongs pa ma mchis pa/ nye ba ma lag pa/ ring ba ma lags pa/ ma btags pa bdags pa ma mchis pa'i chos can/ mying ma mchis pa tha snyad ma mchis pa'i// gnyen po ma mchis pa/ sgrib pa ma mchis
81a2(dkon brtsegs): 'pho ba ma mchis pag 'khrug pa ma mchis pa brtag du ma mchis pa/ myi zad pa gnyis su ma mchis pa/ ma byung ba rdzun pa ma lags pa'i bden pa ma lag pa/ shi bi ma lags pa/ ma skyes pa ma lags pa sbyangs pa ma lag pa/ 
81a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyang bar 'os pa ma lags pa/ bdags su ma mchis pa/ mtshan mas ma bskrad pa/ ma bzung ba ma bor ba/ 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ yong su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa btang du ma mchis pa/ yongs su btang du ma mchis pa ma btang / 
81a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma btang ba ste/ a zhes bgyi ba ni sus kyang ma bgyis/ chos gang gi byed pa po yang ma lag so// a ni ma skyes pa skyes pa ste chos gang meng skye bar bgyid pa ma lagaso// a ni ma skyes pa ste chos gang gyi skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur
81a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang ma lag so// a ni mi 'gags pa ste chos gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyur/ 'gyur ba yang ma leg so// a ni 'gags pa yang ma lagra pa ste/ chos gang gi myi 'gag pa'i rkyend du 'gyur ba ma lag so// a ni gnas pa
81a6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags myi gnas pa yang ma lags/ a ni btags pa yang ma lags/ ma btags pa yang ma lags/ a ni spangs pa yang ma lags me spangs pa yang ma lag so// a ni shes pa yang ma lags/ ma shes pa yang ma
81a7(dkon brtsegs): lags/ a ni dmyigs pa yang ma lags/ ma dmyigs pa yang ma lagra/ a ni stong pa yang ma lags/ myi stong pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmyigs su mchis pa ma lags/ dmyigs su ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni mtshan ma
81a8(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags/ mtshan ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni smon pa yang ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang ma lags ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni a'i tshul lo// ches thas cad ni tshul
81b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa ste/ A'i tshul lo// chos thas cad ni 'gro ba gcig pa ste/ a'i 'gro ba'o// chos thams cad 'jug pa gcig pa ste/ a'i 'jug pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdags pa gcig pa se as bdags pa'o// chos thos
81b2(dkon brtsegs): cad ni tha snyad gcig pa ste a'i tha snyad do// ches thas cad ni brjod pa cig pa ste/ a'i brjod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa dag ni rtogs par bgyid ma lags pa'i tshul gos rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang
81b3(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni ma grub pa'i tshul gis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma 'gags pa dag ni 'gags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gis rtogs
81b4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'du ma bgyis pa de dag ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gis rtogs par bgyi ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa dag gi tha snyad
81b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na rmyil na bya ba sna tsho/ byung ba de bzhin du chos thas cad lta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rmyi lam gi bya ba ni ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba dngos
81b6(dkon brtsegs): bo ma mchis pa ste/ 'on kyang de dag la bdags par gsung so// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na brag cha la tha snyad mchis pa bzhin du chos thas cad kyi tha
81b7(dkon brtsegs): snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thas cad kyi bdags par lta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na smig rgyu la chab du bdag ci
81b8(dkon brtsegs): tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thas cad kyi tha snyad lta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la bud myed gi gzugs so/ skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thos na
82a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tha snyad lta bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnaMs dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ rmyil gi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi'i// rmyi lam bya ba de dag ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ 
82a2(dkon brtsegs): myig sor dang smrig rgyu dang / brag ca'i bya ba thams cad snang ba zhes dag kyang tha skad du bgyi ste/ brag cal bya ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
82a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni chos thas cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzind to// de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal gi lha rnaMs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa dag gis mngon par stod pa/ bder gshegs khyed kyis tshul gcig mkhyend te/ 
82a4(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs / thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no// de la 'jig rten blo myed bdag du lta ba rnaMs kyis yongs myi chud/ bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis
82a5(dkon brtsegs): ni'agro ba stong / sgyu ma gsog dang smyig rgyu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du shes can/ byis/ pa dge blo lag de bzhin 'khrul te bdag du sbyor ba bgyid/ dag yang dag ma 'tshal myi mkhas gnas myin dngos la brten kyang 'cha/ de bzhin
82a6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i skye bo smyig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal/ 'khor bar dga' bas zug rngu cing sdug sngal de'i dbang po 'das/ gang la myi mkhas nges par sdug sngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis/ blo stor yin nor sdug sngal
82a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor ba la/ nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs myed rjes su 'brang / blo stor dag sdug sAl gang
82a8(dkon brtsegs): gis sdug sngal 'gyur ba'i sdug stsal ba// dag rjes 'brang byis pa myi mkhas gnod pa'i khur yang khyer/ de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgor thar bar bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos na/ skyes bu ngan po glo zhan dge bstan ngag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs
82b1(dkon brtsegs): bder gshegs khyod kyis a'i yi ge tshul chen sgo cig de ltar bstand/ de la yang bro tsam sa la shing skyes bzhin du yid skyed cing / bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi pa mngon 'tshang rgya// yan lag brgyad pa'i gru bcas
82b2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol/ bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen des pa rnams ni tshul gi dam pa des// myu rang du nyon mongs dug bsngal byang chub dpag yas zhi ba thob gyur cing // grol nas dug myed 'gyur ba skye bo gzhan
82b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas/ pha rol myur nga phyinang dug myed bde zhing 'dug pa thas cad 'jom par mdzad// bder gshegs thas cad stong yang bdag du rtog rnams tshul myi rtog/ 'gro ba kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul
82b4(dkon brtsegs): myin slab pa dag/ grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags myed yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos de'i tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa deg mthu chen 'gon por 'gyur// 'ching dang bcings pa myed cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnaMs chos nyid myed
82b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi myi dag nyon myi mongs// nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed myed la nyon mongs rnaMs kyang myed// gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thas cad mkhyend du 'gyur// grol zhing
82b6(dkon brtsegs): grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur myi mnga'// bcom ldan ltar bcas dpyid kyi smyig rgya bzhin du 'khrul pa ste// kun rtog bdag nyid zil non bdag dang gzhan myed skyes pa bud myed rtog// 'gro ba sdug sngal de na sna tshos
82b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskyed sems kyis sems kyang na// las dang 'bras bu myed cing myong gang gyur de yang myed// bder gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnaMs kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal// des na de ltar bde gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing des
82b8(dkon brtsegs): ba ste// dga' ba'i blo mnga' dag rtsang dri myed chos kyis rab tu mchod par gyur to// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso bo bstod pas bsod nams gang byung ngo // ji snyed dpal sdug gtso bos rnam par smin yongs su mkhyen 'gyur ba'i// bdag cag dge' rtsa de'is
83a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog// bsod nams 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gi lha dag gi lhag pa'i bas pa yong su dag pa dang / tshul gi rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs
83a2(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thug su chud lag 'khor dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur ba mkhyend nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten don
83a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gyis gnon// bder gshegs thugs rje ldan rnaMs rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa myi mdzad na// rgyal ba dpal stug rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol/ 
83a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'das khyod ji skad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnaMs la gsungs// gtso bo de thos 'gro ba mtha' dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur cig// rnam dbar 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhal yas bgyid par 'gyur// 
83a5(dkon brtsegs): des ni lha myir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sngag sngal nyams thag 'di/ 'phags la yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di las sgo/ la bar 'gyur// dang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan padang
83a6(dkon brtsegs): po 'di thos nas// 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dga' la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur// the tsom dral 'gyur nam dag yod kyis brtson 'grus drag pa'i stobs bskyed cing // bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang mthu/ 
83a7(dkon brtsegs): byung sras su 'gyur// 'khor rnaMs 'di dag brten pa gzhan ma mchis par 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta// 'gro ba rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung bstan bka' bstsamang gsol// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zham
83a8(dkon brtsegs): bring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal// gsung rab legs brjod bdud ci'i char papo gang dag skom pa btsal bar 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ring du song ba'i ma la lta bzhin du khyod kyi zham du/ 
83b1(dkon brtsegs): bder gshegs lha rnaMs lung bstand bka' bstsal bzhad pa'i don kyang bstand du gsol// skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shi nang du thob par 'gyur// thub pa di ring su zhig dge 'phel zhing grags pa don du gnyer ba
83b2(dkon brtsegs): su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan rter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de nyan 'tshal// rgyal ba'i 'khor nas khyod kyis gsungs pa dag thos shing dgar gyur nas// tshul 'di stond cing ting nge 'dzind stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur// de nas
83b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' bstsal pa// rta thul khyed kyis spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shi nang du legs// bder gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyis bla gros
83b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung 'gyur zhing // spobs pa che byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur da pa// deg lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gis// 'od gsal ba'i lha rnasgra sngon gi rgyal ba mthong ba ste// 'jig
83b5(dkon brtsegs): rten 'gon myed yod can 'di dag mthong nas byang chub yang dag zhugs/ byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad spyad pa byang chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston myed lam stor rnaMs la ston par 'gyur// 
83b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul gi daglags pa sgra thun meng ma yin 'di thos na// sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer ba sbyangs dag byang chub 'i thob 'gyur// rig stobs skyos tshul sbyin mkhas shing byang chub yid nges 'gyur// du skyes ma bzhin dga' bas bya
83b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog du dag smon la btab/ 'od gsal lha nas 'di dag byang chub 'dod pa tshul gi sgo bstand te// rnal pa khrag khrig brjod du sred par 'dra'i tshul 'di bstand byas na// seMs can skar ma'i grangs pas ches mang dag byang chub dag byas te
83b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang 'byung skyon bral kun ma khyen 'gyur// deg zhing mchog brjod du myed pazhing nas bye ba brgya grangs par// rangs gi bzhin du dag la mtha' dag bkod pa nas kyis brgyan pa ste// kun gzhi
84a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan song rnams dang de bzhin myi khom yong myi 'byung // bde gshegs rjes thugs brtses sems can thams cad rang 'byung mdzad par 'gyur// zhing rnas reg gang yang nyan thos theg pa stonon par myi 'gyur te// sems can thas cad rang 'byung nyid du
84a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon phyogs 'phrogs pa myed par 'gyur// de rang 'byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi// sku tshe tshad ni skal pa bye ba brgya grangs gang ga'i bye snyed 'gyur// rta thul 'jig rten grag rnga bye khrag khrig khas kyi nyan thos mya ngan zlas
84a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bas// gang skyes pa 'am bud myed gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na// bsod nams de la snga mas grangs pas dper yang bya bar mi nus so// de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gis// rta thul 'di la spe
84a4(dkon brtsegs): ts+tsha pa thos cang mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyed slad myino// de ni u du 'ab ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mangs gsungs// de phyir bla na myed pa'i zhi bde byang chub myi gang 'dod pa'is// shi nad tu blo phra sten bzang mkhyen pa
84a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul mkhas 'dren la bstan par bya// de bzhin gshegs la kyi zhal nas don byed gsung dag de 'dra thos gyur de nas// 'khor rnams thas cad yid rangs mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar 'gyur// khrag khrig lnga rnaMs nam
84a6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' khod nas gos kyi g.yab mo 'dor bar byed// dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyag khyed la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung // zhi ba thugs ni skye ba nyon mongs rgod pas rgod 'gyur zhi ba mdzad// bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum
84a7(dkon brtsegs): zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyug du gsol// khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye dgu drug myed 'gyur zhing dag myed 'gyur// snag sngal rnams kyis 'dren la so tshul thos myi bzang srid pa'i rgyud las grol/ 
84a8(dkon brtsegs): 'od gsal ba lung bstand pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas dge' rgyas ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams/ 'od gsal ba'i b+ha ra dag gi mchod pa yang mthong
84b1(dkon brtsegs): lung bstand pa yang mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs ste/ rab du dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yang brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol nga to// bcom
84b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmyigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing / 
84b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug sngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la/ sdug snga la yang ma lags bde ba yang ma lags pa yang myi myong ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang / bde bar 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / myi'i gnod pas gnod par
84b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / lag pa bcad dam/ rkang pa ba cad de/ rka lag bcad dam/ rna ba 'am sna 'am/ rna ba dang sna btubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / spa lug gis
84b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhungs sam/ spa lcag phyed tshal lam/ lug gis bzhugs kyang bde ba'i 'du she/ sa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / btson rar bcug gam/ lcag sgrog dang / shing sgrog du bcug gam/ btson chad po la rgyas btab bam/ 
84b6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i gtsug phud ltar bcings sam/ dugs kyi snod ltar bdugs sam/ bu ram shing / rdung ba ltar bdungs sam/ 'dam bu gnom pa ltar gzhom 'am/ 'bru mar gi mar me ltar 'bar byas sam/ mir gi mar me dang zho skol ba lta
84b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i nang du bor ram/ seng ge'i khar bstabs sam/ stag gi khar bstabs sam/ skam ril bya ba bzhin del tam/ byi bo'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam/ nyes byung ba
84b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrag pa ltar bsgrags sam/ kar sha pa na tsam du brngubs so// 'bras phye btso ba ltar btsos sam/ glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / myig phyung ngam/ gsal shing gi rtse mo la banags/ 
85a1(dkon brtsegs): bas pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thos cad du 'go gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ bde ba yang ma lags myi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'dushes rnam pa thams cad du myi 'byung ngo // de ci'i slad du na na 'di ltar
85a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur do cig/ gang gis bdag la skom byung ba reg dang gang gis
85a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag la rim 'gro sa pa dang / dkur ste byas pa dang / sti sta byos pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde bathob par gyur cig/ gang yang bdag gsha ba dang phyi bdab byed pa dang / mtshon gis 'debs pa dang / 
85a4(dkon brtsegs): napa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa deg thams cad kyang byad chub kyi bde bar thob cing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ de med
85a5(dkon brtsegs): la bya ba de dag dang ldan zhing de lta bu'i las dang / de lta bu'i las dang / de lta bu 'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba 'du shes la sten cing bsnyen la sgom zhing mang po byed de/ de las de'i rnam par smin
85a6(dkon brtsegs): pas chos thas cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob po/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thos cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud kyi las thams cad kyis myi 'phrogs shing myi 'khrugs par
85a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob pa rig par bgyi'o// de 'tshal na tshe rjes ma thag du byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa
85a8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya'o// de 'tshal na skas pa grangs ma mchis par gnas so// de ji'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / byang chub ses dpas so su
85b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu bstsalang ba dang / 'gro ba drug po kun du skyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thas cad la bslabs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pa de
85b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / bdud kyi las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ba thas cad ni de bzhin
85b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de nas dge' rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzind 'di brjod nas// de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// dge' rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos las mthar
85b4(dkon brtsegs): thug gyu ra pa ste/ ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba mkhyen la 'go bos skyab su mchi/ de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas don mkhyen 'khor ba rgyal 'gyur ba/ thub pa myi 'i'adren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa 'dren la bstod// 'di na rang bani/ 
85b5(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te/ sgyu ma'i 'khan pos sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyi thub pa legs par mkhyend// yan lag sna tshogs sgra brnyan ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin bder
85b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs drang srong khyed kyis ltar min bcas pa'i 'jig rten rab gzig pa// 'di na sems can srog dang shed bu gsor ba gang dag ma mchi sa te// myi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par gshog cing stong par rnam banags
85b7(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa 'ang mdzad// rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'// byis pa dge' snyoms sems can dmyigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas/ 
85b8(dkon brtsegs): bka' bstsal ba// sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can myed par mkhyen// de ltar rkang gnas dam pa rnyog pa myi mnga' the tsom bral thugs ldan// des na rnam brtogs blo ma par mchod 'os khyod pa/ 
86a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod par 'tshal/ bde bar gshegs pa sdug sAl phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu myi dmyigs kyang // lha'i lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje chen bgyi gsungs// de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal bI
86a2(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa ji bzhin kun du 'tshal// des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bskul bgyi sdug sAl ma gzigs la// dges pa skyes nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs
86a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis myi dgyis rnam par gsal// de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bas gis myi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal// des na myi mchog khyod la mchod nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi/ skyon bral khyod la kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug snga la mya ngan 'das
86a4(dkon brtsegs): ma dmyigs// 'on kyang 'khor bar sems can 'azigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed// sems can snag sngal 'gro dang thugs dang mya ngan 'das gnas ma mchis// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'os khyod la
86a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa 'tshal ka/ 'dren pa tshad myed bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyis su myed par bstand/ gang zhig der 'dul ma gzigs gang yang tshad myed pa/ nas pa de ma gzigs// thub pas bag myed gang yang ma gzigs bag
86a6(dkon brtsegs): yod myo yang ma gzigs te/ sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod pa bgyis// thub pa sku ni rnam par spangs pas sku btsal mdza dan ma brnyes kyang // de ltar 'dren pa dran pa gsung ma lags bsnyel ba
86a7(dkon brtsegs): yong myi mngar// bde bar gshegs pas lus la song ba'i sgo ba sgom par bgyis shes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar gshegs pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis// 'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na rnyes
86a8(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur nga la// tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa yang thub pas yongasu btsal nam brnyes te// de ltar gang zhig dran pa sgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yong ma gzigs// sangs rgyas tshul nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis/ 
86b1(dkon brtsegs): thub bas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal nam brnyes la// gang gi nye bar bzhag pa de yang dran pa myed par rab mkhyen yang tha rad pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa myed pa sgom par bgyis shes gsungs// bang bar
86b2(dkon brtsegs): gshes pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas ni ston la mchod pa bgyis// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs// sgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'di ni rang bzhin ma mchis la thar pa 'dod pa rdzas kyis
86b3(dkon brtsegs): chos dus dran pa sgom par bgyis shes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la mchod pa bgyis// gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sa gsum 'am bzhi lta ga la mchis// gang gi gnas su brjod pa'i dra/ 
86b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang gang na'ang ma mchis te// de bas gang gi bde ba 'am sdug sngal yang da ga gang na'ang de ma mchis// stond pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// ston pa'i tshul mchog bzhi po 'di rnaMs rge
86b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gang dag 'dzin bgyid na// 'di dag tha rad pa'i nyid kyi lam ste 'khor ba la sa ni byung bar 'gyur// de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma grol byang chub 'dren pa myin// bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bzhin
86b6(dkon brtsegs): des ni khyod la mchod pa 'am// thar mdzad slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lam bzhi rdzu 'drul rkang pa gsungs// dag bsgoms ni myi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'dab 'gyur// yang dag tu na rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang skom myi dmying+ge te/ 'jan
86b7(dkon brtsegs): par myi 'gyur byaba'ang ston byeng ba po yang gyi dmyigs pa// thas cang mkhyen gyi mastan 'dir ma tshogs bcom gang na'i mchos// des des nem nur ma mchis dbananas ma nyis mchis 'gyur// 'di ni mchod pa 'a'ang po mtshag ces
86b8(dkon brtsegs): mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// des na bder gshegs dpe myed skyed ma par mchod 'os khyed la mchod par 'jam// tha rang par mdzang spab 'jig tan khas pas des 'byung yang po lnga yang gsungs / rtag tu ga yod bya
87a1(dkon brtsegs): la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di bsgoms ces bstan // thub pa dbang po dang ni skom pa po dang tha ra pa'ang myi dmyigs te// 'di lta 'khor the tsom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas rjes kyi mya ngan
87a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das par 'gro ba'i drang la stobs lnga po// de dag nyon mongs zad phyir bgyid thar bar bgyid ces stond pa thub pas gsungs// de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis te// thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang the tsom ma mchis
87a3(dkon brtsegs): de slad khyod la mchod// byang chub yan lag bdun po 'di dag dge' ba la gi dam pa ste// sangs rgyas rnaMs kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang la mchog ces thub pas gsungs// 'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings pa
87a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ang ma mchis to// sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tsom ma ma ches khyod la mchod// rkang gnyis rtse bo khyed kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam seMs can rnaMs la bstan // brtson 'grus ldan par 'phags pa
87a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug sngal mtha' mar 'byin pa sgoms shes gsungs// myi mchog lam nga nga de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te// 'di la lha tshogs the tsom mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod// 'dod chags
87a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyen por ni gnas bka' bsuyang zhe sdang gnyen por byas pa gsungs te/ gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bstanang // 'di dag thas cang g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag myin g.yo'o brgyan
87a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la lha tshogs the tsam mchis thub pa mchog smad rtag tu brtson// sdug sngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang bsgoms shes gsungs// bcom ldan 'das gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri dag zhi/ 
87a8(dkon brtsegs): thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong dra ma thams cad stong pa ste// 'di la lha tshogs gang du yang the tsom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod// stobs bcu sos can rnams la dga' ba bcu'i las lam bstand mdzad de// gsod dang 'khrig dang / 
87b1(dkon brtsegs): ma byin phra ma rdzun dang zhe gcod dmyal tshig dang // gnod sems dang ni myi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin rtog par rtog pa rnams// myi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnaMs la bstan // sems can myi dmyim
87b2(dkon brtsegs): gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra// gnyen po dga' ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis ste// bder gshegs thub pa zag pa myi mnga' rnaMs kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong // nam 'dren the tsom som nyi ma mchis de slang khyod la mchod
87b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal tesangs rgyas sras po dge' ba'i blo can gang zhig spyod pa 'di ste nad pa// mkhas pa kun tu dge' ba nyid myong sdug sngal myong sdug sngal myong bar yong myi 'gyur// bcom ldan ba der gshegs dris ni tshul de bde bar thob pa
87b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyis// 'di la lha tshogs the tsom ma mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ de ltar dge' rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang myi zer bar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge'
87b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi lha rnaMs cang myi zer bar 'khod pa yang mkhyen/ de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa yang thugasu chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
87b6(dkon brtsegs): bcad de gsol pa// skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi mkhyen pa zil mnan nas// bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum pa mdzad 'di 'jig rten bas na// rgyu ma mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnas
87b7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dzum pa myi mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu don gnyer myig myed rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' bskul gsol// ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du myi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod// dpal stug khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan
87b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas// sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos nas yid ni rab tu 'gyur te// chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blo dga' ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur// bder gshegs myi mchog dga' ba'i thugs can
88a1(dkon brtsegs): ma der ring su zhig blo gros bskyed// de rang gang gis 'di skyed ni rtogs shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis// su zhig 'jig rten thugs rtse rgyal ba 'dren pa dngag tu myed 'gyur ba// dag bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di 'ag
88a2(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs pas tshim par mdzod// rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa reng su btsun la dad pa skyes// bdud kyis myi 'phrogs blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongasu gnas// sangs rgyas sras po tshul mkha sa gang zhig de ring nges/ 
88a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par 'gyur// rkang gnyis rtse bo dag ka stsol 'gro 'di the tsom mchis mdzod// bder gshegs deng su 'gro la dang bskyed skye dgu rnas byas gyur cing // byang chub mthar nga phyinang glo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la gnas
88a4(dkon brtsegs): gang la 'dzum pa deng bstand bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de gang lags// bso dra nams brgya pa'i mtshan mnga' dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tsom khamana'adren pa khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan leg par bka' stsam thos gyur na/ 
88a5(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'a de na// de ltar gyur da na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gan / sa par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myurang du bde gshegs rnam
88a6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka' bstsal pa// nga'i sa 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong 'gyur cing // skyes bu dpa khyod kyis dusu dris te/ 
88a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i don byas pa// khyod kyi bsod nams 'phel ba brjod myed de don zad myi 'gyur// da ni khyod la bstan gis khyed dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon// dge' rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag nga'i chos nyid la ni the tsom myed// kun kyang ying
88a8(dkon brtsegs): rangs rang bzhin yid kyis tshigs bcad dag gis ngal bsngags// sngon gi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong bgrangs mched 'os mchod byas ste// the tsom myed pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun du som nyi myed par 'gyur// de ltar sngon gi mya ngas
88b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dir yang tshig su bcad pas ngal bstod// skal ba bzang pos rgyal bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag bstod par 'gyur// 'di dag skal pa ud pal rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu chen 'gyur// 'di dag khrag khrig pas yas yongasu mya ngam
88b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po dag yid 'ong mtshan gang 'gyur ba// de yang bstand kyis dang ba'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spobs te nyon// rgyal ba de kun chos kyi rtog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa gzhal yas 'gyur// 'di dag re res
88b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang ni khrag khrig pas yas mya ngan zlo bar 'gyur// de'i tshe na bde gshegs kun gi ring sel shin du rgyal 'gyur te// de che zhing rnas kun du rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyal ba 'gyur// thub pa grags chen de dag yongs mya ngan 'das
88b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba na// thub pa skyob pa dag kun gi ring srel rgyas don can 'gyur/ sems cad khrag khrig pas yas nas kyis de tshe rang srel mchod byas te// ring srel dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'chi myed thob// thung
88b5(dkon brtsegs): bkang gnyis kyo ba de dag grogs pa rgyun 'chang myi 'gyur te// slob pa khra/ khrig pas ma yas nas kyang de che rgyal ba'i drung du 'du// ji ltar b+h+yo ba brgya grangs ngas legs par srung ba byas nas su// byas pa pas phyir
88b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen yid kyis byis pa'i 'khor du 'dong gyur pa// de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob tshogs deg rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du// rkang gnyis rtse bo dag kun gyi ring srel mchod pa bya phyir 'dong // bde gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thos cad do rjer
88b7(dkon brtsegs): gyu ring pa de thos shing // dge' rgyas ris kyi lha'i bdag nyid chen po de tshe thob gyur de nas/ 'khor rnaMs thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub sems kyang bskyed// bdag nyid chen po shes nas thub pa'i zhabs la 'go bos rab tu tuH/ 
88b8(dkon brtsegs): dge' rgyas ris lung bstanang pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin nas nas da / 
89a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong lung bstand pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde skyes nas tshul gcig la zhugs pa dang // chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo
89a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing / tshul la 'jug pa thas cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang // myi chod pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang // 
89a3(dkon brtsegs): nye ba'i spobs dang / 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dag kyang 'byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes na ste/ chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la
89a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa thob cing / myi chod pa'i spobs
89a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / dmyigs pa dang snyoms pa 'jug pa thas cad/ la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyuraro// de la dmyigs pa gang yang gzungs lags par ma 'tshal ba'i tshul gis sgrib par myi 'gyu ro// de ni phung po
89a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur// khas la 'jug pa dang skye mched la 'jug pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / seMs can la yuH/ 
89a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / dngos po la 'jug pa dang / dngos po mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dmyigs pa la 'jug pa dang / dmyigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / bdag la 'jug pa dang / bdag stong pa la 'jug pa dang / 
89a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / gnas la 'jug pa dang gnas ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma
89b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'dug pas kyang na gyul mapa mas pa'i gsus pab pal gyur te ma sa pagrags pa sa 'chos pa'i gabs pa nyan par 'arjer ro// na phung po 'dug pas kyang 'dis ste/ phung ze nas byang bam na sa ma
89b2(dkon brtsegs): gzung rab du the ban de ci'i slad du zhe na gzugs ni gang sang mang su grub pam mchis te/ sa ni sar mang su ma thub/ de bzhin du chu dang me dang rlung ni rlung gis yongasu ma grub po// rdo rje'i srung du na nags na rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste chos
89b3(dkon brtsegs): gang pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yang sum grub tho// chu dang skye dang drung ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la yang rang bzhin sa mchos pa don yong su ma grub pa'o// desar mo um grub pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa zhes dang
89b4(dkon brtsegs): par myi bgyi// ma 'ongs pa zhes bdags par myi bgyi/ da ltar byung ba zhes bdags par myi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis so/ 
89b5(dkon brtsegs): gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de ni 'gag pa ma mchis pa ste/ gang la ma skye ma 'gag su ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'ad ba dang ma 'ongs dang da ltar byung ba'i gzugs gang ji yang rung ste dag thas cad
89b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig du bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po'o zhes bka' bstsal da te/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dmyigasu ma mchis na 'das par lta ga la 'gyur/ ma 'ongs par ga la 'gyur/ da ltar byung bar yang ga la 'gyur te/ de bas na gzugs kyi
89b7(dkon brtsegs): bi ni bdags su ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang na par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du phung po nas ni dmyig su ma mchis so// phung po dmyigs su ma mchis pas gzungs dmyig su ma mchis
89b8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug par 'gyur ro// gzungs de yang mying tsam dang tha snyad tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / rjod pa tsam dang / bdags pa tsam ma rtogs par gzungs la 'jug par myi dmyigs te/ 'di la phung
90a1(dkon brtsegs): po yang myi dmyigs/ gzugs kyang myi dmyigs/ 'jug pa yang myi dmyigs gzungs kyang rang bzhin gis myi dmyig so// de ci'i slad du zhe na gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis pa'i chos ste/ chos gang ma bgyis pa de la
90a2(dkon brtsegs): spung ba yang ga la mchis te phung po ni spungs pa'i slad du phung po zhes bgyi'o// dper na khyim dang khang bzangs dang bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung khol ma dang / ba ge dang dra ba dang stegs bu dang / khang khyer dang / skar khung
90a3(dkon brtsegs): dang lta ba dang ra ba dang shing tags dang / 'obs deng chos mang po tho sogs pa la grang khyer nas bgyi ba bzhin du drang ba zhes bgyi ba de yang de bzhin te/ gzugs de yang de ba nyid kyis myo dmyigs na de la srung bstag la mchis/ spungs
90a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mchis pas na gzugs kyang ma mchis/ gzugs kyi phung po yang ma ma chis so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rna par shes pa yang rang bzhin gis dmyigs su ma mchis na/ de la spangs pa lta ga la mchis
90a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ spungs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis rnam par she sa pa'i phung po yang ma mchis so// de ltaraphung po la 'ju dag pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob par spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro// des
90a6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni myig gi skye mched ches bgyi ba ni ji'i skye mched ces bgyi ba na sdug sngal gi skye mched do// gling zhe na 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i 'dang ba ste/ sa'i khas dang chu'i khas dang / me'i khams dang rlung gi
90a7(dkon brtsegs): khams dang sho'o// de la sa'i khas dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin myi dmyigs pa de ni yang sum grub pa'o// de bzhin du chu'i khas dang ba dang / me'i khas dang ba dang / rlung gi khas dang ba ning gzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos ni
90a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gi rang bzhin myi dmyigs pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i myig gi skye mched de ni 'das pa zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes dmyigs pa ma lag so// de ji'i slad du zhen
90b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar myig gi skye mched ni dngos po ma mtshas pa ste/ dngos po mchis pa'i slad du skye bas mchis pa'o// gang sa skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa sa mchis pa ste/ gangs ma skyes su 'gags pa don ba gsum mchis pa'o// de kar m+b+hi/ 
90b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma skyes ma 'ogags/ skye mched dang sdug sngal yang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni myong tsam dang tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang brjod pa tsam ma rtogs par bdag sum mchis pa sten
90b3(dkon brtsegs): de yang myang gis ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na chos gang la myig ce 'am/ skye mched ce 'am/ sdug sngal zhes bdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmyig su ma mchis ste/ mying yang mying du brjod du ma mchis so// rna ba dang snga
90b4(dkon brtsegs): dang lce dang lus dang yid dang / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnaMs kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob// gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa thab po// de khas la 'jug pa gzungs
90b5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa ni myig ni myig gis ma mchis/ khas ni khas kyis ma mchis pa ste// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ myig ni myig gi rang bzhon dang bral ba/ kha/ ni las kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchi
90b6(dkon brtsegs): ba don dngos po mo mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yosu ma grub pa'o// gang ya su ma grub pa doni skye ba ma mchis pa// gang skyab ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang ma skyes ma 'gags
90b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dri ni mying tsam dang tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par 'das pa zhes bdags par dgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// mying de yang stsang
90b8(dkon brtsegs): gis ma mchis brjod pa'i bar de yang brjod pas ma mchis te/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de la dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa doni yongasu ma grub pa ste/ yong su ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis
91a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang la ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lags// ma 'ongs pa dang daltar byung ba zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lagaso// gang dus
91a2(dkon brtsegs): gsu du bdags par bgyi ba ma lags pa de ni myong ma mchis mtshan nyid ma mchis pa mtshon ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa brda ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa 'dris pa ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis/ 
91a3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa ma bstand pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa mngon par shes par shes rab bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongasu shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ kar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa gnas ma lags pa/ rten ma lags pa
91a4(dkon brtsegs): theb pa ma lags pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rtogs pa ma lag ngas pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma legs pa/ mngon du bgyis pa ma la gas pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i sa ma lags pa/ nyan thos
91a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis ma lags pa / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lag pa/ byang chub sos dpa'i sa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa ste/ sa yang ma lags sa ma lags pa yang ma lags so// de ni de bzhin nyid dang / 
91a6(dkon brtsegs): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang / zhi ba dang mtshan nyid ma mchis pa se/ tha snyad tsam du bdags pa'o// des tha snyad du de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste/ don dam par ni ma lagaso// de ji'i slad du zhe na/ 
91a7(dkon brtsegs): gang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de myi dmyig so// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khas dang / myig gi na par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khas dang / chos kyi khas dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khas kyi bar du rgya cher khas thas cad
91a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ches kyi dbyings ni phung por bdags kyang ches kyi dbyings nyid myi 'dor/ khas dang skye mched dang / dbang po dang bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar bdags kyang chos kyi
91b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid 'dod te chos kyi dbyis myong gang dag gis bshas kyang dang sa chos kyi byings nyid myi 'dor // com ldan 'das 'dis de bar nam galas ni myong ga dang ga gis pa srang du bgyis kyang de dang nges samams nang rgya'
91b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang mying gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba dang / des chos kyi dbyings nyid myi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na chu'i khas dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khas dang nam mkha'i khas ni mying ga
91b3(dkon brtsegs): dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chu dang mye dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khas nyid myi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang mying gang dang gang gis tha snyad bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid skye 'dor te/ de ltar na khas la
91b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pas gzungs thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa thob bo// bcom ldan 'das de la dbang po la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni dbang po nyi shu gnyis te 'di lta ste/ myig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang
91b5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / po'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde/ ba'i dbang po dang / sdug sbal gi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid myi
91b6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / myi shes pa kun shes par byad
91b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la myig myig gis ma mchis/ dbang po ni dbang pos ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ myig ni myog gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin
91b8(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni myi skye ba de ni myi 'gag pa/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ 
92a1(dkon brtsegs): sha gam 'os pa dang daltar byung ba zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lagaso// gang dus gsu dum dmyigs pa de na myigs lags/ dbang po ma lagaso// gang phyogs lags shing dbang pos lags pa de ni tha skad nge ltar 'cham par bgyi 'das
92a2(dkon brtsegs): dbar na chang pa stong pa ni brdzun pa yang dag pam 'asla ba sa mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar snying du bdags par bas kyi// don dam par na ltung bar yang gyi dmyigs/ cang bar mang gyi dmyigaso// de bzhin du mig dang dbang por mang cang steng pa ltar brdzun nings cwo
92a3(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag pa ma lags te// bsob gsog/ log pa bsdu ba'i chos can/ byis pa 'drid pa/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltar mying du bdags par bas kyi/ don dam par ni myig kyang myi dmyigs/ dbang po yang mi dmyigs na/ de ni bcom ldan
92a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis thas cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas/ ji tsam du phyin log la gnas pa'i sems can rnams 'dzud pa'i slad du dbang po zhes bdags kyi// don dam par ni ma lagaso// dbang po ni rang bzhin dang bral zhing dbang po
92a5(dkon brtsegs): 'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ chos gang chos gang gis stong pa de la des tha snyad du bgyi ba ni brdzun pa/ ma mchis pa/ gsob gsog/ log bar slu ba'i chos can byis pa 'did pa glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa/ rang bzhin dang bral
92a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ 'di ni myi skye myi 'gag go// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dung da ltar byung ba zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lag so// gang dus gsum du ma mchis pa ni myong ma mchis pa/ mtshan
92a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa/ brdzun pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ bdags su ma mchis pa/ bdags pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ rna bar shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa thos par bgyi ba ma lags
92a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rnam par ma rig pa/ rna bar rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma theb pa thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa'o// dom
92b1(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na ma mchis shing mchis pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// 'di ltar ste dper na myi zhig rmi la na dgod pa dang rga ba dang rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dag nyal nyal ba las sad de rjes su dran yang rnyed par myi 'gyur/ 'thokho bar myi 'gyur ro// 
92b2(dkon brtsegs): ni rje'i slang du zhen mi lam na yang myi des dgod pa dang rga ba dang rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyad pa de dag ma thob ma rnyed na/ nyal ba las sang pa'i tshe lto spos tsa 'tshal te/ thob dang rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de/ 
92b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmyi lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar rmi lam na dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyad pa dag dmyigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thas cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni 'das
92b4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lagaso// gang dus gsu du dmyigs su ma mchis rab de ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste// dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig
92b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi'o// de ltar na chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos thos cad la 'ju ga par bgyi// chos thas cad la 'jug pas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'a drug par bgyi'o// de la ji ltar na bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug
92b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bgyi zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni bden pa ste/ sdug sngal dang kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thos cad ni stong pa ste/ sems can myed pa/ srog myed pa/ gang zag myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa/ mtshan nyid myed
92b7(dkon brtsegs): myed pa zhes bka' bstsal te/ des bdag cag bcom ma mchis so/ som nyam mchis so// bcom ldan 'das des sems nanas mchis pa'i srad du sdug sngal ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de dzi'i slad du zhe na/ gang sems can ma mchis pa de
92b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug snga la yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sdug sngal ma mchis pa'i slad du kun 'byung ba ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ji'i slad du zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu ma mchis pa de ni rgyu ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kun 'byung ba mchis/ 
93a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du 'gog pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ji'i slad du zhe na/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la spang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du la mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de rje'i
93a2(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na gang spong bar myi bgyid pa de ni lam ma lags te/ lam gi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa ma lags la/ gang spang ba'i 'gog pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni myi dmyigs te/ 'gog pa dmyigs su ma mchis ma lam 'thad pa du ma lags te/ 'bras

93b8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba mo lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul maM lags pa/ byang chub ses dpa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ sa sa
94a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ spyod yul yang ma lags pa/ spyod yul ma lags pa yang ma lags pa yang ma lags pa/ bgyis pa ma lags pa / ma bgyis pa ma lags pa/ dag pa ma lags pa dag par bgyi ba ma lags pani de ltar
94a2(dkon brtsegs): bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs theb pas spobs pa thab par 'gyur ba'o// de la ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'thu
94a3(dkon brtsegs): ce na/ ma rig pa'i rkyend kyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed rnams kyi rkyend kyis rnam par shes pa nas/ de ltar na sdug sngal gi phung po chen po 'di 'ab shig 'byung bar 'gyuraro// zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// bcom ldan
94a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de la ma rig pa ni ma rig pas ma mchis so// de rje'i slad du zhe na 'di skar ma rig pa ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa don yongasu ma grub ni
94a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yongasu ma grub pa de ni myi 'gag pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lagaso// gang dus gsum du myi dmyigs pa de ni myi
94a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa bdags su ma mchis pa steg gzhan du na mi tsas dang / bang tsam dang / tha snyad ngam dang / kun rdzo tsam dang / brjod patsam dang / bdags btsam sems tsam nas gzung ba'i dod du kyi
94a7(dkon brtsegs): ngam gtogs par ma rig pa doni don dam par dmyigasum mchis so// chos gang don ngam par dbyigs su ma mchis pa don bdags su ma mchis pa/ tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang mying tsam no/ 
94a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyib nas bdags pa tsam gi bar dag kyang dag pa ma lags pa brdzun pa/ log pa brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ yongasu brtags pa/ rnam par brtags pa/ rna bar spyad pa/ ma zhi ba rab tu spros pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed na
94b1(dkon brtsegs): ces bgyi ba yang chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis pa/ de 'du byed bskyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ de bas na ma rig pa ni ma mchis so// de ltar ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang ma skyes pa'o// gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rga bar myi
94b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ 'chi bar myi 'gyur/ 'chi 'pho bar myi 'gyur/ skye bar myi 'gyur ro// de ji'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de la rga ba ga la mchis te/ gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de ni na bar myi 'gyur 'chi bar myi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar
94b3(dkon brtsegs): myi 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs kyi byang chub ste/ mying tsam du bas kyi don dam par ni ma lags so// ma rig pa gang lags pa de nyid byang chub po// de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag rnaMs kyang
94b4(dkon brtsegs): shes par bgyi ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyes pa ste/ chos thas cad kyang ma skyes pa'o// de bas na chos thas cad
94b5(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma 'gags pa ste/ ches thams cad kyang ma 'gags pa'o// bcom/ ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan pa nyid ma mchis pa mtshan
94b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pashAdamyigasu ma mchis pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rna bar byang ba ma mchis pa/ rjes su chags pas mchis pa/ khong khro ba ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ cho
94b7(dkon brtsegs): zas cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dang ngag gi ches thos cad mchis te/ de'i srid
94b8(dkon brtsegs): du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes mchi na dag
95a1(dkon brtsegs): thas cad ni lta ba'i rna ba la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ji'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ byang chub kyang gnyis su ma mchis pa lags pas gnyisu ma mchis pas ni gnyisu ma mchis pa mngon par
95a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gangs la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas bla na myed pa'i chos kyi 'khor la bskor ro/ zhes mtshan dag thos cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de rnga'i slad du zhe na de bzhin
95a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni zlog pa 'am skor bar mdzad pa ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sos can tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so zhes mchin// deg thas cad ni lta ba rna ba la mngon par zhen
95a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// rdo rje'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thos cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yangasu mya ngan las 'das pa gang yangs mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang sa la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa
95a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshad myed pa'i don mdzad do zhes mchi na/ deg thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la zhan pa'o// de ji'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das de 'i/ na gshegs pa ni chos gang la yang phan pa'i/ gnod pa'i rna bar nye bar gnas
95a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed bor ro// zhes mchin/ dag thams cad ni lta ba'i na pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni ji 'ang 'dir
95a7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ len pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbangasu mya ngan las 'das so// zhes mchi na/ deg thas cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon pa
95a8(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa'o// de rje'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par 'gyur na/ de dag zas cang bla na myed pa yang dag par
95b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la ni ba mchis kyang gda'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dog ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur// 
95b2(dkon brtsegs): bam po dgu pa'o// de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyid la nges pa'i 'gro ba brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la la/ 
95b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum skor ba byas nas/ thal mo bsgyur te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig du 'khod nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde bar gshegs pa mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul myin mkhyen
95b4(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba kun la thugs rtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa// 'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag pa sa nad// mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la 'go bos
95b5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal// khyed kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang la gcig pu bgro/ da pa bstan// khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shes myi/ g.yo'i brnyes// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug sAl nye thag
