95b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro la mdzad pa/ mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phe gas la 'ge bos phyag 'tshal// phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid stong shin tu/ phung po rnams dang bral// byis pa rmongs byed nas ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yo
95b7(dkon brtsegs): brtags// shes pa myi ldan skye bo phan chen 'dir bcings rnyong la spre'u thogs pa bzhin// grol ba mkhas pa rnaMs ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa myemed par 'dong // khaMs rnams khas kyis rnam pa kun du stong par thams cad mkhyend pas gsum
95b8(dkon brtsegs): dper na brag cha rnam pa kun du shi nang du sgra dang bral ba 'dra// des ni myo mkhas skye bo yang dag ci bzhin myi shes mang po bcings// grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams ni khams dgasu chags ma mchis// skye mched ngo bo nyid kyi
96a1(dkon brtsegs): tu nong nas thams cad sa byed pas padan / yang dgas lags bdun ni gyis paslab khang pa stong pa 'dra rtsomangs skye ba'i ma la gcig tungs mang bdas chags// dper na dren pa rgya mngotshon pa ra byas pa bzhin du
96a2(dkon brtsegs): 'kho ba cug/ 'dren pa dang po 'di dag dayang ba nyid kyis shin tu stong bu ste// sgrub pa ma 'ang na gtsun kyis lab / su na tu nad/ mkhas skye bo song dgas 'tshas mang za dag na das chags pa dang / khya
96a3(dkon brtsegs): nya dang srog tshogs dag ni rgyal thogs pa bzhin// sems can sems can nyid gong sems can dral zhing nga pa nyid kyis stong // thub pa sems can rim 'khan gis gzugs dris bzhin dum mtho na// myi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'as
96a4(dkon brtsegs): mang bib de la chags// mkhas pa yang dag rtogs nas sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya ba bzhin grol// rten byung chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste/ song shing dmyigs ma mchis rmyil dga' ba bzhin du bzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs
96a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa ka/ myi shes rtog pa'i slad du des kyang myi mkhas skye ba mang po bcings// mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnarnaMs gseb nas tha rad pa'i bya ba na/ na grom// thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos bzhin chos rnams thos
96a6(dkon brtsegs): na bas myi khyab// thub pa zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa de bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral// thub pa khas gsumyi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis to// de skad chus gcig 'di 'chas gyur ngan 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ 
96a7(dkon brtsegs): brub pa bdag dang gzhan du sum khyen sna bur chos kun gso ba med/ thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa di shin chos kun bsam kyi byang/ thub pa bris pa'i spyang num ma lags ci na chos kun brtags ma lags/ sas rgya
96a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gas pa de bzhin gshegs par gyis/ myi ma khas gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal las rnyes shes sba ba dang / gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dmi pa gnas yas mchog skar sA ba dang // gang dag pa de gshegs spyo pa
96b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon chags khrag khrig mya ngan ba\u0f88\u0f90 smra pa// dag zas cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta 'thibs por yo su kris// gang dag pade bar gshegs pas 'du byed btang babang smra ba dang / gang dag dpos bcu 'gro ba'i don mdang mo su mya ngan 'das smras
96b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thas cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyi lag du mchis// chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'den pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi// gang dag tshul myin 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal// de dag rkang gnyis
96b3(dkon brtsegs): rtso bo dpal stug 'jig rten thug brtse rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags// de ltar 'di 'tshal 'gyur nas tshul mkhas myi'i mchog du 'gyur// de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs ches rnaMs nges par rtog
96b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// ston spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bas pa de yang bstand byas na sa// kha cig yid rangs dogs myed yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bang ga mthong nas// 'dren sras dge tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung stan
96b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lha dag gi lhag bI bsam pas phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges par rtogs pa thug su chud nas/ seMs can rnaMs kyi dge' ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
96b6(dkon brtsegs): ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad da gsol pa// dpal sdug 'dren pa nas ni chu zhig gzigs nas 'dzug pa mdzad lags te/ rgyu myed kyi mdzad bka' sum bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum de skad thos/ 'di ltar
96b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi bde bsil ba'i 'dzum 'dzad na// rgyal ba lA myi lha myin bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsungs/ de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mdzad bsil mthong nas/ 'gro ba 'di dag kun the tsom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi
96b8(dkon brtsegs): zhal du lta// myi mchog thugs ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgya de ni mya rang du gsungs// de thos myu rang nas rgyal mchog 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom ma mchis 'gyur// 'dren pa dam pa lnga tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstand pa// dege su zhig gang hU~M
97a1(dkon brtsegs): ci thob mtha' yas rnam par 'phrul pa gsungs// myi mchog tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs sgrogs te the tsom kun du gsal du gsol// de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchog du mgu ba 'thob// bde gshegs rgyal mtshan
97a2(dkon brtsegs): mthon dag thas cad gzhan du myi sems par// 'dren pa'i sras nas byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam pa sems shing mchis// thub pa 'dren mchog the tsom 'tshal ba deganas kyi thetsam khu// des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul myin mkhas
97a3(dkon brtsegs): kun rgyal bar 'gyur// rkang gnyis rtse bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thob 'gyur nas rang dga' ste// bde gshegs bstand pa bzhin du bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par 'gyur// de dag don gi dbang la brtan nas bde gshegs
97a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol// des ni yid rangs 'gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyi nad par 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po lha dag sngon gi spad pa thob 'gyur cing // rgyal ba'i gsung thob 'gyur nas rnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste// tshul la
97a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnaMs myu rang du thams cad mkhyend par 'gyur// 'ge ba rab tu grol mdzad ston pa mdzad par// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshagasu bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs
97a6(dkon brtsegs): nas kyi ched dungs 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa// rta thul khyed kyis du dang tshod shes ngal dris pa shin tu legs// gang phyir nga'is 'dzum ma da bapa de'i rgyu'i tshu la dang rmya// de khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba rtse gcig yid
97a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis nyon// thams cad mkhyend pa rnaMs ni rgyu'i 'bras bu gsu gzigs shing // rgyu las gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug pa nas ni 'dzum pa mdzad// kha cig glo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang // kha cig
97a8(dkon brtsegs): kha ron 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang // kha cig 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te// skye bo sdug sngal ltung bar grol zhes zhus pa'i bsam pa mkhyen 'gyur nas// 'dzum pa chung mdzad gang byung nyan thos don du
97b1(dkon brtsegs): pa shes par bya// 'dzum 'bring mdzad gang 'byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya// 'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya// rab 'bring tha ma rna ba 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te// kha cig thar pa don
97b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyer lam gsu zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas// des na 'jig rten khams pa rnam par rgyal 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad// rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhabs 'og nub par 'gyur// rang rgyal don du 'dzum pa gang mdzad
97b3(dkon brtsegs): sku'i dbus su nub par 'gyur// 'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa sdug du nub par 'gyur// de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par gis// rgyal ba mchog rnaMs don du gang 'dzum de kun nga'i gtsug tu nu
97b4(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyis/ 'dren pa rnaMs kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de rgyu rna gsum yang bshad kyi das// kun kyang rtse gcig yid kyis de ni nga las legs pa mnyan par gis
97b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad sgra rang du thog mar nub// ShI nga gi don ni dus tshor chung zar bstand cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur na/ blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shi nang du ring du gnas // bu
97b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos don du gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad// gzhan yang 'dzum mdzad gzhan yang 'dzum rgyan gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod kyis mnyan par gis// gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la bskor bar byed pa ni// de dag
97b7(dkon brtsegs): ngal smyon par skyon nas myu rang du shi nang du mkhas par 'gyur// 'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la ral kyis skor bar byed par 'gyur// dal kyis g.yas phyogs skor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing gnas par 'gyur// gang dag gser rgyan pa
97b8(dkon brtsegs): kar snang bzhag 'dra ba'i bder gshegs mthong 'gyur na// de ni rkang gnyis dam pa'i dam thub pa'i sku kun khyed par gnas par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyend pas 'dzum bas nad 'do ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya// gang che gdugs 'dra mthar
98a1(dkon brtsegs): yas myig ldan pas 'dren de 'gebs pa dang // gang tshe me tog 'dral 'dren pa'i steng gi 'khal lding ba dang // gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde gshegs la lan gsu skor bar byed pa// de ni 'jig rten 'das pa de'i dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes
98a2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya / bde gshegs rgyal ba rnaMs kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rtsa gsum de tsam bstanang // rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum 'dzang rgyu rnams gsu de dag shes par gis// des na 'jig rten 'dzum pa mdzad// de thos gyur nganas thams cad mkhyend kyi bstan
98a3(dkon brtsegs): la the tsom myed par gis// 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tho pa 'di dag ni// zhing rnams dag du chos tshul shi nang tu rgya chen smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// mkhas pa dag dpag myed tshe ldan skal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur// de phyir bde
98a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstanang // de dag ston gri skal pa sum bcu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong // skal pa sum bcwa drug du thas cad mkhyend pa snyen bkur spyad pa spyod// da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag
98a5(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa grangs myed suM bcu drug tu// gang zag chen po dag rgyal bar khyu ma/ chog mchod pa byed cing gnas// thos cad yang phun sum tshul rtog/ rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod de byang chub zhi ba
98a6(dkon brtsegs): yo su btsal byas nas// de dag de'i 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis depa skyes bu mchog/ 'dren ma mthu chen yon tan ldan par gser gi rgyal mtshan skal lo 'byung // rgyal ba deg sna tshogs ning na gnas shing rang zhing sbyangs te// sems can da
98a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya// de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnaMs kyi 'dus pa grangs myed de// de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba dag ni// la te skal pa khrag khrig dag du stobs bcus nyan thos de grangs
98a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang tha lags mdzad nas kyi nyon mongs 'dus pa dag ni mthar byin bgrangs myi 'gyur// 'dus pa reg thas cad grangs myed 'dus pa de ni ci 'dra ba// de las gnyis 'gyur de tshe byang chub du ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// de che rgyal zhugs
98b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba thas cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin// deg thos cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur// bder gshegs dag spyod pa gang yin de dag rnaMs kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa dag mya ngan 'das par 'gyur nas
98b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos// de tshe sras kyis bzung zhing skal pa bye ba brgyad cur gnas par 'gyur// dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la ni byang chub sems skyed pa// gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shi nang tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// dag 'das nas/ 
98b3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni// nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'dadra bar 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten don mdzad rang byung dag 'byung ba dag thas cad kyi// bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongasu legs par ldan
98b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur ro cing // yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstand pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin// myi mchog de'i gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dad 'gyur nas// rkang gnyis de pa gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te// thas cad dag
98b5(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'// bde bar gshegs/ la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ de lta bas na dga' bar byos la 'go la 'bar bzhin spyad spyod de// rtag tu shes rab
98b6(dkon brtsegs): pha rolang phyind dang dge' ba'i bshes gnyen ston byos la// yang dag mthong ba 'i spyad pa dge' ba 'di la kun tu sten byos te// dge' slong khyod cag na nga gnyis rtse bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gas/ 
98b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu che nga'i lung bstand pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas gnas kyang ma'i ros kyi lha rnams/ de'i tshe sems cin dpag tu myed pa byang chub ngu yang dag par zhugs par rig
98b8(dkon brtsegs): cig sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la thocom myed par 'gyur bar rig nas// tshim zhing mgul ying rangs ste/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang // mid bang ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcang pa 'di dag gas so som
99a1(dkon brtsegs): sa ya na par bstod do// de lta'i basbyin pa la moso pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang / tsu mo dang ni srog pangs bteg rgyal srid btang bci smos te// sbyin pa mthar byin del phyag 'tshal/ khwa'i bu chug khrims sa
99a2(dkon brtsegs): mos pas gas lang pa ka/ khyod kyis tshul khrims rnam sbyangs pa ka rna ba kun du snyems myi mngar// shinang du bslangs pas mthar phyind pa// khrims mthar phyind la phyag kyang 'tshul// lha'i bu brjod pa la mas pas gsolang ba// khyed kyis bzod pa
99a3(dkon brtsegs): bsten mdzad pas// yan lag gtubs pa'ang bzod par mdzad// zab mor sgyid lug ma lags te// bzod mthar phyind la phyag kyang 'tshal ka/ lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa// brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te// stobs chen brtson 'grus
99a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyur pas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa// brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa// khyod kyis bas rten bsten mdzad pa// de la 'jig rten rting myi rnyed// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid rnyes pa
99a5(dkon brtsegs): sa gtan mthar phyin daphyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gso dmang pa// dpa' bos shes rab pha rolang phyind// yang dang yang ni bsgos bas na// thas cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa// shes mthar phyinang la phyag kyang
99a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu khas kyi glo gros kyis gsolang pa// sbyin pa dag dang ngag snyan dang / don spyod mthun pa'i don dag gis// 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyis btul ka/ 'dre/ ba khyed la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dga' ba'i gragros kyis gsol pa// byas can
99a7(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po dag/ yun ring dus nas ske mo mdzad de// sems can dpag yas yo su bsngal// gdos 'dzin khrod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsolang ba// nyon mongs sgra'i mthar nga phyin cing // thub chen 'dul ba'i sems sa/ 
99a8(dkon brtsegs): bas ma dul thas cang dul mdzad pa// kha lo sbyar la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu bre gros drim myed pas gsoyo pa ga/ sems dag mnyen pa'i sems mnga' ba// sems dus dbang po zhi mngara' ba/ sems can kun gyi sems mkhyend pa// sems kyi/ 
99a9(dkon brtsegs): ar+ya sa ma tra de pa su bo de skad du 'phags pa lta
99b1(dkon brtsegs): khyed la phyag kyang 'jal ka lha'i bu gro gros rnam par dag pas gsayong pa// shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can// blogs mchog sa rab tu zhugs// thugs gsal phun sum tshogs pa'i gro// khyi ma khas rtogs mdzad byag kyang 'jal zhwa'i bu brgya nas
99b2(dkon brtsegs): ga dag/ khyed kyi sems ni rnam par byung / sangs rgyas zhing yang ni dag mdang// sems can tho gang nas sbyangs pa/ kun dang myo pa byeg kya tsa'i// ka'i bu ngan pa skyed pas gsasong pa// dgas pa pan pa sgom par ba// khyod kyis bcu kyi zungs
99b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom// khyod kyi lha tshogs thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur// lha'i bu mya rang du byed pas gsold pa// khyed kyis chos rnams myur nga du mkhyend // sems can mya ra da bar rnam par srungs// thab cing lta dga'i chos dag lnga// myu rang du mdzad
99b4(dkon brtsegs): la phyag kyang 'tshal ba/ lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan pas gsold pa// bral la/ ra yeng su bral 'gyur ba// chu be rgal te zag pa spangs// pha rolang phyin cing thang la zhugs// brtson 'grus brtan la phyag kyang 'tshal// kwa'i spyod las dang ldan
99b5(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa// 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs// gti mug spangs pa pa gi myed pa// sbyin gnas bsod nas ni 'gyur ba// 'jig rten mchod 'os phyag kyang 'tshal ka lha'i bu shinang tu brtan pas gsomed pa// khyod kyi ngas chos
99b6(dkon brtsegs): shinang du brtan ka/ 'jig rten gsum du rab tu mchod// gcig du bgrod pas bde ba rnyed// lha'i bu myi 'khrugs pas gsolang pa// lhun stug gcig du 'gyur ba'i ri// rlung gis bskyod par myi nus so// de bzhin stod dang smad pa yin/ de bzhin bskyod par
99b7(dkon brtsegs): nus so// lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thos pas gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam// mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis can na/ shes rab zab mo glo ldan pa// rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sku chen khyed la
99b8(dkon brtsegs): sku myi mngar// de bzhin nyid la rab tu zhugs// yang dag mtha' yang rab tu stond// khyod mtshungs gang zag yong ma mchis// lha'i bu glo gros 'dang bas gsol pa// gnyi su myed pa yang dag ston da// dpa' bo dpa' bas rnam par gnon// gang zag zas chu
99'a1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'jas rnas// shugs kyis tshangs nas ngas pa ji bzhinadu/ ri sul so du gyis na so 'brizhing gnas// stag gi riga'adugis bzod pa dag gdi ni rgya brdzung mo
99'a2(dkon brtsegs): gsung // bdag mye dang rlo mu stegs gzhan thos na// shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser byin kyang // gsung thos pas ni bres cad 'jigs par 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la// spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang
99'a3(dkon brtsegs): brtsal// snang ba mdzad cing rdul kyang rno bar sbyangs// ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon par shar// 'di dang myi bde lam gnyis rab tu bstan// lam dang rgyu gol ba'i lam yang rgyal 'am bstan// lam stor skye bo rjes ni laM du bcung
99'a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dam du bying ba rnams kyang thang la bton// ji ltar ska ba'i sa la srin gis ni// skad dang gshengs bcas char gis ngoms par byed// de bzhin rgyal po grang ba~M khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba ltar bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad// ji ltar
99'a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar char gis ngoms pa'i ri sul rags// rtswa dbregrel ba nags tshal shing rjes dang // khri shing sdong po spang gi rno ba dang // me tog sna tshogs rjes kyis sa mdzes pa// de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang // ma 'dres pan myang
99'b1(dkon brtsegs): sras// dge rgyam rang rjem yongs// de phyogs kyi mthu byi sa dbang po// 'i ska sa 'dug da mengs du ltung // de bzhin rgyal ba grang po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong tshugs kyi na rje par mangs// byis pa'i
99'b2(dkon brtsegs): n+dan zab ma 'jug sgra sgrogs// thugs rje chen po'i glog 'phreng ring ldan pas// dran pa rtser bzhag nar rgyun 'dab sgrings te// rgyal bkru mchog de ni chos 'char 'brebs// yongs dgra dkyil 'khor rdul khrims rab kyi
99'b3(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha myin rab 'joms zhing // ye shes gnye zer srid pa'i sred pa skyems// rgyal ba'i gnyi chen 'gro ba rno bar mdzes// tinga'i dza mtshul khrims gzings dang gru chen te// dran pa nyer bzhag nor bu rin
99'b4(dkon brtsegs): chen tshegs// byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung nas bsam rten rlangs// thar bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bstan par bya// tshul khris rje dag rtsa ba brtan par gzug// ting 'dzin la ma dran pa yan
99'b5(dkon brtsegs): ga 'dab// byang chub yan lag me tog stong pa'i sdong // bdag myed grib lnga na rgyal ba'i steng dro sten// tshul khrims nags mtha' sten bi'i stobs chen po// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ri grong phug na gnas// stong
99'b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan myed smon myong spyod yul can// rgyal ba slebs chen seng ge khyod kyisas// thub pa myi gnas gnas ni rna par ston// rgyal ba khyu mchog brjid pa'i skabs bzung bas/ 'byis pa so so mu stegs gzhan bsngags te/ 
99'b7(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyi sras ni khyu mchog sgra yanga'i byan// tshul khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan// khasam gtan dang ba'i zhi gnas nye bar bskyabs// ye shes kyis bya spangs thar pa'i spyod yul con// rgyal ba tshang dpon gtsom
100a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dag khyod chos pha rolod phyind// lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol pa// mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag/ khyod kyi slob la bslabs pa'i nas// sbrul rnams pags pa rnying pa bzhin// srid pa gsuM po 'di dag 'dor/ 
100a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i buni pa'i 'od kyis gas lad pa// ji ltar mar me mar zad cing // snying rje ras zad pas zhi 'gyur bzhin// khyod kyis bstand pa myu rang thos na// shes rab chen po mya ngan 'ang // lha'i bu zhi gnas pas gsosong ba/ gang gis kun mkhyen
100a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod mthong ba// myi nos 'dod pa bcis pa yang // shes rab mtshon gis mkhas pa dang // 'dod chags zhags pa gcod par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhig gnas mang gis gsosong pa// zhi ba'i seMs mngabazhi la spyod// cho ga spyod yul rab tu zhig nyon
100a4(dkon brtsegs): mongs thams cad zhir 'gyur ba// dge rnaMs zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i tha zhi gnas 'jigs myed gos gsol pa// khyod kyis zhi gnas bslabs pa'i// byang chub ses dpa' gags chen dag/ zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing / 
100a5(dkon brtsegs): sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhig gnas zas kyis gsol pa// chos nas kun gi zhi ba ni// dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstand// shes rab chen po de 'tshal na// dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur
100a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rtag tu rnam pa lta bas gsoyod pa// khyed kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs// mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams// ye shes mchog gis mnyam bzhag cing // byang chub mchog kyang mnyam thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu snang 'dzin / 
100a7(dkon brtsegs): gas yod pa// shes rab pha rol phyi nad 'gyur ba// thub chen khyod las gang slob pa// de dag 'jig rten snang mdzad cing // sgrib pa myed par gzigs par 'gyur// lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsolnga pa// 'jig rten sgren mkhyen khyod kyi gsung
100a8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rgya mtsho de thos na/ deg dri myed bde ba 'thob// bsaM gis myi khyab 'od kyang 'byung // lha'i bu dri ma myed pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad rnam myi rtog/ thabs la mkhas pas deg gsungs// de 'dra'i ye
100b1(dkon brtsegs): sten 'gyid pa// de dag phrag mchog du 'gyur// lha'i bu rab tu myi gnas kyis gsoyong pa// gnas ma mchis shing blang ma mchis// chos nas thams cad sems ma mchis // bdag dang gzhan go rnam 'gyur ba ka/ de dag khyod kyis de
100b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyend // lha'i bu gnas myed glo gros kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thos cad gzhi myed par/ rna bar 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// deg khyod kyis lugs zlog ste// sems can rnams la bstand pa mdzad// lha'i bu myi rten
100b3(dkon brtsegs): zlazhes kyis gsos ba// ches rnams zas cad rten ma mchis/ sems can ma mchis pon dun byin// lag 'dis smra rlung bzhag bzhin// yang dag ci bzhin khyod kyis bstan da/ lha'i bu bar snang chubs gsomang pa// bden
100b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis chos kyi rnas// bar snang lta bur snang ba ste// skye dang 'gog par med pa gzigs// de slad 'jig rten chags myi mnga'// lha'i bu rang mtshan myed pas gsol ba// khyod kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun te lus kyis
100b5(dkon brtsegs): saca kyis ni// gse ba skyed pa ra 'dzin myed pa// spyod byed rtsol ba skyed pa gzigs/ lha'i bu tho gros rnam par sgom gis gsos nga / sbrum sna tshogs legs bgyis pa// sgyu ma'i 'khan pas stan gyur na/ 
100b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gdang // thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu rab tu sang pa'i ngang tshul can gis gsold pa// gzugs brnyan ji ltar me log la// bad yang de ltar ma mchis pa// de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs/ 
100b7(dkon brtsegs): de bas 'jig rten rmongs myi mnga'// lha'i bu yid gnyis rna par 'jig gis gas yod pa// sangs rgyas gzugs rnyan lta bu ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnas// de bzhin khyed kyis bstanang ba bzhin// de ltar 'gro ba kun kyang / 
100b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu spobs pa thogs myed kyis gsol pa// chos nyid la ni 'khor zug du// spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing // chos nyid de ni brnyes pas na// de slad khyod ni spobs dang ldan// lha'i bu chags myed glo gros kyis gsol pa// 
101a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis chos 'di thams cad ni// rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par// yang dag ji bzhin rab du mkhyend// de bas thub pas rab rib bstsal// lha'i bu mya ngan bral gis gsolang pa// mya ngan myed cing nyer len myed// spros pa med ci
101a2(dkon brtsegs): rnyog pa myed// chos rnams kun tu nyon ma mongs// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen // lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsolang pa// chos rnaMs yang dag ma lags te// 'gro dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa// de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen
101a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rab tu bstand pa mdzad// lha'i bu dros mchog gis gsol da pa// lhun gis grub cing blang myed pa// rmongs pa myed cing shes pa myed// ches rnams ci yang myi bgyid pa// khyed kyis rang bzhin thug su chud// lha'i bu sgrib pas myed thob kyis
101a4(dkon brtsegs): gso yod pa// snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis// gzugs myed ma lags gzugs can min// bzung ba ma mchis grol mchis// khyod kyis rang bzhin thug su chud// lha'i bu myig dpas gsol pa// yul dang phyogs na myi gnas pa// yod dang myed pa
101a5(dkon brtsegs): ma lpags pa// rmyi lam 'dod pa ci bzhin du// deg rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu myig myi 'dzums kyis gsol ba// byis pa rnaMs kyi glo rmong sa pa/ ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa// bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa/ 
101a6(dkon brtsegs): deg rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsoyod pa// gang zag sems can ma mchis pa// ma mchis tha snyad ma mchis pa// bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba// deg rang bzhon khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mtshan ma myed
101a7(dkon brtsegs): ba la gnas pas gsol pa// gang gis tha snyad bdags pa'i// mtshan ma dag ma mchis te// chos kun mtshan ma ma mchis par// na bar 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon pa myed pa la gnas pas gsamang pa// ji ltar mtshan ma stong
101a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing // smond pa dmyigasu ma mchis dang // su la smon la mchis gyur pa// de yang de lta tshul du mkhyend// lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa// rna thar sgo la brten bgyis shing // gang zhig grol 'gyur de ma mchis// de bzhin
101b1(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol pa// khyod ni sdig pa kun spangs shing // bsod nams thas cad bas ga gyur te// bde gshegs khyod la spad myi mngar// su spong dag mkhas ma pa
101b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu glog gi spyan gis gsoyod pa// ji ltar glog bcas sprin gi tshogs// char gis sa chen ngos par bgyis// de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gis// 'jig rten rnaMs ni ngoms par mdzad// lha'i bu bas pa don yod kyis gso yod pa// u
101b3(dkon brtsegs): khyed gsung ni don mchis te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor// shinang tu brtags te mdzad pas na// de na thos cad mkhyend pa'i mtshan// lha'i bu gro phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa// chos rjes thas cad dngos nyid kyis kam skyes pa
101b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags te// dge bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen // gzhan yang de bzhi na rtogs par mdzad// lha'i du seng ge'i nga ros gsold pa// khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstand te// seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas// mu stegs
101b5(dkon brtsegs): can kun rab 'jigs pa gseng ges ri dgas phra mo bzhin// lha'i bu bag so da las kyis gas yod pa// ngag yod sngon du 'atang mdzad de/ byang spyod pa spyad bgyis bla/ sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyed// bag yangang
101b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni nges par 'byung // lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la rab gnas te// khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel// stobs bcu gzhan yangang sangs rgyas chos// bsam gis myi khyab rab tu spel// lha'i bu bag
101b7(dkon brtsegs): yod skyes kyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la brtson pas na// byang chub phyogs rnams yongs dag skyes// thub chen rang yang grol 'gyur nas// dag nas ni 'jig rten 'grel// lha'i bu bag yod nges par 'byung gis gsol pa
101b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag/ ji snyed thar la brten pa rnas// kun kyang khyod la brten pa ste// bag yod pas ni nges par 'byung // lha'i bag yod pas gsol pa// bag yod yongs su ma btang bas// rna bar 'dren pa khyod kyisras
102a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'di la ma chags par// thas cad mkhyend du nges par 'byung // lha'i bu bag yod bsrungs kyis gsol pa// byang chub lam la bsten mdzad cing // khyod kyi bag gis bsrungs pas na// thugs rje chen po mkhas pa'is// byang chub
102a2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa brnyes par 'gyur// lha'i bag yod brtson gis gsoyod pa// ngag yod pa la brtson zhing // mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pas// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyi sras// bgi kor yang thob par 'gyur// lha'u bag yod mngon par dga' bas gso
102a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bag yod dag pa'i brtan pa rnaMs// deg sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// dpa'o nyon mongs ri 'jigs pas// nga rgyal ri yad+ya b+ha stil// lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gis gsold pa// sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad che// khyod ni bag gis bzung ba/ 
102a4(dkon brtsegs): mabaskal pa bye ba grangs myed du// khyod ni kyi thugs ni sbyor ma gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gis gsoyong pa// chos rnams de dag rang bzhin nyi de ni sangs rgyas spyo de yul lags// byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang // thos
102a5(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyend pa der myi 'jigs// lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsolang pa// sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhugs pa ste// 'on kyang de la chags myi mnga'o// sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad// rdul 'thul ba la
102a6(dkon brtsegs): char bzhin du// lha'i bu zhi gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsolang pa// sangs rgyas zhis rab tu zhugs// sus kyang myi bskyed ri bi bzhin// khyod la gnod pagyir myi nus te// sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gis gso
102a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ khyed kyi sras rnaMs ma smad pa// zhi gnas kyis ni yongasu dul// bdud nas bye bas myi tshugs te// 'dod chags kyis ni gnod myi 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par 'byung gis gsosod pa// zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhi la gnas// dpa' ro
102a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po skem mdzad pas// ci la gnas te bas gtan mdzad// sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gros gsolang pa// ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi// sngon ni du ni gnas 'gro zhes gsungs// gang gis byang chub 'grub
102b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos gzhan de'i rjes su 'brang // lha'i bu ni gnas rjes su 'brang gis gas yod pa// 'jig rten sgron zhi gnas na ni// sems kyi rnyog pa dang bar bgyid// zhi ba'i sems ldan nas kyi 'ching // de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad// lha'i bu
102b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas spyod yul gis gsolang pa// ches nas kun gyi spyod yul ni// zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs// de la chags med spyod pas ni// rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas brlan gis gsol pa/ bas te/ 
102b3(dkon brtsegs): gis ni mngon brlan te// shes rab kyis ni sems bsgom paso// phyir rdzogs pa byang chub des// de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren // lho'i bu zhi gnas lhur len gos gsal ba// sangs rgyas chos nas gang la yang // lam gzhan bdag kyis
102b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong ste// zhi gnas ye shes che thob na// rang 'byung ye shes che nyid du nges par 'byung // lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dga' gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po lhag mthong ni// chos rnas thas cad stong pa ste// de la khyod kyi sras spyod cing / 
102b5(dkon brtsegs): rang 'byung nyid ni 'thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyind gnas shing // rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sman pa'i rgyal po ste nad pa ste// de bas lhag mthong dge' ba lagras
102b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rab gnas kyis gsol pa// chos nas thams cad btsal bgyis te// yang dag ci bzhin mthong 'gyur na// brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'tho ba// byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dong // lA'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung gis
102b7(dkon brtsegs): gso meng pa// gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis// shes rab gcig tu nges par 'byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis// brnyes pa'i 'dren pa skye myi 'gyur// lho'i bu lhag mthong mngon par dgas gsoyod pa// yang dag ci
102b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yang dag tu// chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na// byang chub g.yas brnyes 'gyur te// de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas gsol pu// mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing / 
103a1(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa// deg rgol tshogs thas cad kyis// pham par bgyi bar yong myi nus// lha'i bu lhag mngon byung gis gsoyod pa// chos rnaMs rnam mthong bgyi slad du// rgyal sras grang dag bzhugs pa'i// rjes cho
103a2(dkon brtsegs): nas ngo bo nyid 'tshal zhing // rang 'byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong la bstend pas gsol pa// rnam 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du// ye shes la ni bsten mdzad pas// thas cad mkhyend pa brnyes nas ni// srog chags bye ba
103a3(dkon brtsegs): 'brel bar mdzad// lha'i bu khyad par ldan gis gsolang pa// sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen // 'dren pa dam pa mngon par 'phags// srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba'i// 'jig rten de'is sprul par mdzad// lha'i bu lhag mthong
103a4(dkon brtsegs): gas gis gsoyod pa// lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing // chos kun rna bar gzigs pas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te/ sa bzang na gro nga skyes 'dra// lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol dpa/ 
103a5(dkon brtsegs): rna bar 'dren pa khyod kyi smras// ye shes kyis ni yong bzung ste// byang chub ma chog ni thob bgyis shing // skye bo mang po 'grel par bgyid// lha'i bu lhag mthong la brtse bas gso yod pa// sangs rgyas mkhyen la rna par rol
103a6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun la 'jigs myi mnga'// zhum pa ma mchos sngar myi mngar// thub pa 'jig rten thos cang mkhyen // lha'i bu lhag mthong la yang dag pa 'jug gis gsoyod pa// dpa' bo chen po chos kun ni// lhag mthong nyid du yang dag
103a7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin myed par rnam mthong na// de ni rang 'byung byang chub lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsolang pa// sangs rgyas lhag mthong snying po ste// chos rnas kun la 'jigs myi mnga'// 'jig rten sdug sngal 'di gzigs shing // 
103a8(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po shin du skyed// lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gos gsol ba// byang chub phyir ni shes 'gro ba'i// 'jig rten mkhas pa nges par 'byung // dag byang chub mchog kyang 'thob// grol nas sku dgu 'di dag 'grel// lha'i bu stong pa nyi
103b1(dkon brtsegs): la snyen gyis gso song ba// stong pa nyid tu chos bsnyend pa'i// mkhas pa byang chub 'chang bya ste// sems can bcings las grol bgyid cing 'chil thams cad rnam par gcod// klu'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsoyongs// song banyid pa mas pang
103b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bka 'gro ba 'di dag srog skye gzigs / dmyigs myed ngo bo nyid myed pa// de ltar srog chags nas la ston / lha'i bu stong pa nyid la spyod kyis gas med pa// sangs rgyas kun go spyod yul ni// chos rnams rang bzhin steng ba ste/ 
103b3(dkon brtsegs): srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas// dpa' bos de la spyad pa mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsam pas gsol pa// skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la// 'jigs skrag thos cad rab tu spangs// chos rnams kun la myi gnas shing // 
103b4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par gra' bas gsalang pa// stong pa nyid chos la bstend cing // sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mos pa// dge smond pa mched ba ste// mchod pa de ni bla na myed/ lha'i
103b5(dkon brtsegs): bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyis gsolang pa// gang gis 'dre na pa 'phags 'gyur ba// de ni yang dag 'phags shes gsungs// stong nyid chos la bstend bgyid pa / ma smas deg sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu
103b6(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyis 'dren gis gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po ches rnams gang // mya ngan 'das myin ston ma mchis// klung mya ngan 'das pa 'den// drang srong chen po byang chub lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gis gsolang ba// stong nyid
103b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi la rten nas ni khyod kyi slob ma yang dag shar// stong pa nyid la gang bstend pa// de dag rim 'gro bgyid pa lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi la brten gis gsol pa// gang rnas stong pa nyid brtan pa// mkhas pa de dag rmongs myi 'gyur// nyon mongs// 
103b8(dkon brtsegs): myed cing lta myed nas// byang chub rdul myed 'thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsolang pa// gang rnams steng nyid bstend bgyid pa// sangs rgyas ches rnams phun sum tshogs// rang 'byung pham pa myed par 'gyur/ 
104a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur/ lha'i bu steng pa nyid bzhugs pas gsosong ba// sangs rgyas chos la zhugs 'gyur te// stong pa nyid la gang bsten pa// de la bdud rnams bye ba phrag/ snang gis bkrug par myi nus so/ 
104a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mtshan ma myed la dga' bas gsol da pa// mtshan ma myed la mngon bgyis te// dngos po thams cad ni bzhig nas// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung // mtshan ma rnaMs la chags myi mnga'// lha'i bu mtshan ma myed la gnas pas
104a3(dkon brtsegs): gsolang pa// mtshan ma myed la spyod 'gyur cing // zhi bzhi la spyod pa rnams// mtshan ma rnam par bshig rnams kyi// tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus// lha'i bu mtshan ma myed pa'i spyod yul gis gsol pa// sangs rgyas kun gi spyod yul
104a4(dkon brtsegs): la/ 'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de// mtshan ma myi mngar rtogs rko zhing // zhi spyod dal phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas skom gos gsol pa// thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni// mtshan ma myed pas skor 'gyur te// 
104a5(dkon brtsegs): yab kyi kor ni 'tshal 'gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la bkur sti bgyid// ny-i bu mtshan ma myed pa la spyad pasmra// mtshan ma myed la nyin mtshan du// gang zag mchog ni spyod mdzad pas// lha dang dri za myi dag kyang // khyed kyi tshul ni mchis
104a6(dkon brtsegs): so/ lha'i bu mtshan ma myed pas rnam par gres gis gsalang ba// ches rnams nyams cad rnam pa shig cing // dpa' chen 'jig rten sgron ma khyed// mtshan ma myed la gnas pa mdzad// dngos khyed la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma myed pa la na
104a7(dkon brtsegs): par gartse bas gsolang pa// thub chen dpa' bo chen po khyod// mtshan ma myed la rnam par rol// myi nas yongasu smin mdzad cing // sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la zhugs// lha'i bu mtshan ma myed pa yongasu grub gis gsolang pa// gang gis mtshan
104a8(dkon brtsegs): ma spangs rgya rang pa// deg byang chub grub pa ste// mab kyi chos kyi rdul zhugs can// deg rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// lha'i bu mtshan ma myed pa la dga' bas gsol pa// gang gis mtshan mkhar bzhig/ de dag sangs rgyas chos lam
104b1(dkon brtsegs): bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste// sems can kun gi mchod rten lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma myed pa la gsol dpas// zhil spyod song nas gros ba// sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na myed// 'byung po kun gi skyabs dang rten// dpung gin de bzhin gnas
104b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang lags ka lha'i bu mtshan ma myed pa la mes pas gsolang pa // mtshan ma myed la mes gyur da cing // zhi ba dag las rgyal gyur pa// sangs rgyas rgyal ba 'gro sgrol pa// deg tshad ni ga la mchis// lha'i bu smon pa myed pa rtogs kyis gsolang pa/ 
104b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gon po gang dag smon lam ni// rnam pa kun du myi dmyigs pa// dge 'jig rten bral ba ste// sangs rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung // lha'i bu smon pa la bsten pas gsold pa// zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod// srid pa rnams su smon myi mdzad// 
104b4(dkon brtsegs): sred pa yeng su chad pas na// sangs rgyas 'jig rten yong myi gos// lha'i bu spen pa med pas skyes kyis gsal pa// gang gis sred pa yongs bcom pa/ dag gzi mchog bskyed pa ste// dag 'jig rten 'gon po'i sras// rang gi yab
104b5(dkon brtsegs): la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa myed pas bskyed kyis gsol pa// khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa// sred pa yongasu bcad pas na// srid pa/ 'jig rten bgyid srid pa la// dag smon pa myi bgyid do// lha'i bu smond pa
104b6(dkon brtsegs): myed pas yongasu grol bas gsolang ba// gang dag smon pa myi bgyid pa// gzi ldan khyod kyi sras kyang nas// re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba// deg yongasu grem ze ra 'gyur// lha'i bu smon pa myed pas byung gis gsoyod pa// gang gis srid pa
104b7(dkon brtsegs): rab bcom pa// de dag mya ngan rgon pa rgal// de dag myi skom zang zing myed// dpa' chen khyed la de phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa myed pa la nges pas gsolang pa// gang gis srid dang sdug sngal dang bde ba dngos po myed snyoms pa// 'gon khyed de/ 
104b8(dkon brtsegs): nas kyi yab// dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags/ lha'o bu so nang pa myed pa'i 'khor gis gseyong ba/ srid pa sdug sngal sus mthong ba// deg khyed kyi stan la rul/ kha lo sbyar zhing sring sel ba// sems pul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sted
105a1(dkon brtsegs): ba myed pas byung gis gsoyod pa// sred pa'i dgon las byung ba'i rnams// bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te/ nyon mongs dag las pham mdzad pa// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa myed pas ya mtshan du gyurapa
105a2(dkon brtsegs): bas gsolang pa ka g.yul las rgyal bar gyur pa ste// khyod na rnam rgyal pham myi mnga'// bdud kyi dpung rnas pham mdzad cing // srid pa kun du smon myi mdzad// lha'i bu smond pa myed pa stobs ldan gis gsolang pa// tha rad pa'i ches la stobs
105a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas// bdud kyi zhags pa yongs bcad cing // khyod kyi sras rnaMs bdud dag la// sgrub pa'i 'du shes myi bgyid do// lha'i bu las rna bar brtags kyis gsol pa// lus myed 'chi ba myed tshul du// lus ni gang gis mthong gyur pa// de dag
105a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyod yul dga'// 'dren pa khyod kyi rjes su zhugs// lha'i bu lus dris par sems pas gsol pa// myi rtsang rus pa'i rnag zag pa// lus 'di myi bzad nges bsas te// yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas// rnam 'dren
105a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu las rtogs kyis gsoyong pa// lus la myi rtsang rtag bgyis te// lus la 'dun pa rnam spyad cing // lus kyi sdug sAl rnam grol nas// deg khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus mos/ 
105a6(dkon brtsegs): su tong gis gsolang ba ka/ s+thUl gi pags pa rnying bzhin du// nag can lus 'di spangs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa sku'o che// sku myi mngar la phyag kyang 'tsha la// lha'i bu lus la smond pas gsol da pa/ myi rtsang dring rnag zag cing / 
105a7(dkon brtsegs): rul po'i lus la rna smad de// myi gtsang gang ba rnam spangs nas// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyis yongasu bskor bas gseld pa// gang dag rul ba'i lus skyo zhing // rgyal sras gtsang ma 'tshal ba nas// chos kyis
105a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bskyed pa'i sras// deg sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'chal// lha'i bu lus kyis skrag pas gsolang pa// 'byung ba chen po sbrul gdug 'drar// gang gis shi nang du rtogs 'gyur ba// deg lus las 'das pa ste// rkang gnyis rtsol
105b1(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang 'chal// lha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong bas gsoyong pa// lus kyi skyon la mngon sum ste// ye shes gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' bas// sangs rgyas mkhyend pas mkhas pa dag/ srid gsum thas cad lo su gzigs// lha'i bu lus
105b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod chags dang bral bas gso yong pa// lus kyi 'dugs 'did chags dro ga chos kyi 'du shes myi gnas pas// dran sbyor kun las 'das pa ste// rnam zlab sangs rgyas drug kyang 'ja zhwa dus dpa dasa'i gro gros gas gsam nga/ 
105b3(dkon brtsegs): srid par srid pa 'joms mdzad pa// khyod kyis dgra'i 'du shes mkhyen // khyod kyi sras rnams sgom bgyid cing // mkhas pa byang chub mngon sangs rgya// lha'i bu srid pa sel bas sol pa// srid pa rjes kyi nges dmyigs mthong // mya ngan 'das pa
105b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs myed mthong // khyod kyi sras rnaMs 'gro phan phyir// byang chub spyad pa spyod bgyid pa// lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gsol da pa// gang gis/ srid pa rnam spangs shing // 'jig la mngon par myi dga' ba// bral bar gyur cing
105b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dag pa// mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa gas la gis gsol pa// myi'i de pa khyed kyi sras// srid par khrid pa rab ga sal te// khyod kyi slab la bslabs pa dag// stong gsum 'di na rnam pa mdzes
105b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu srid pa las rgal bas gsol pa// srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba'i// 'jig rten 'gon mchog skyob rnams la// gang gis rgyun du bgrang ba'i// grangs ni 'jig rten 'di na myed// lha'i bu srid pa 'joms kyis gsol pa// srid pa thams cad yongs pa
105b7(dkon brtsegs): snye/ gang dag rtag tu dran spyod pa// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// srog chags rnams la chos kyang stond// lha'i bu srid pa las rab tu grol bas gsol pa// srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu grol// rnam par 'dren pa srid pa rgal// srid pa ma
105b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byin nga sangs rgyas te// sring ba sel la phyag 'tshal na/ lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi byed kyis gso yod pa// srid par khrid pa rab zhi zhing // srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs// brtan pa srid pa mthar 'byin pa// khyod la don zla ma mchis so'o// khru'i bu
106a1(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i mthar 'gro bar gsol pa// srang ba'i mthar phyind rang zhi ba// 'gen po khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'// srid pa phyir 'byin thams cad mkhyen // sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu srid pa'i mtha' ma'i lus 'dzin kis
106a2(dkon brtsegs): gsosong pa ka sring ba'i rgyu ni rnam spangs nas// srid pa tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa// gang gis srid pa len gyu rang ba'i// khyod kyi kun du sbyor ba mthong // lha'i bu srid pa rab du zhi bathob kyis gsosang ba// khyod kyis sring ba stong mkhyend te// sring pa'i sgra yang de
106a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// zhum dang rab tu zhum myi mnga'// mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rolang tu 'gro bas gsol ba// srid pa'i pha rolod rgal ba ste// srid pa khrid pa yang dag bsum // rna bar 'dren pa thugs brtse bas// skye mo
106a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad// / bam po bcu pa'o// lha'i bu tshor bas mnar gis gsol pa// tshor ba bdag du bgyi ma mchis// sems ma mchis rtsol ma mchis/ bsam gtan
106a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa che khyed kyis// tshor ba chu bur lta bur mkhyen / lha'i bu tsher bstonod pas pa/ so long pa// ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po myed par// tshor ba khyod kyis rab mkhyen // rmi lam sdu gu'i dga' dra ba// de la so so'i skye bo chags dan
106a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tshor ba la so su rtog pas gso song ba// shes rab bcas pas yangs rtogs nas/ tshor ba 'gro bar ma se shing // 'ong ba skyengs dngos myed par// da thub chen khyed kyis gzigs/ lha'i bu tshong ba dang dras pas gsosang pa/ 
106a7(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po// rang bzhin myed pa khyod kyis gzigs// zab mo lta dka' tshig de yang // khyod kyis sems can rnaMs la bstan // lha'i bu tshor ba'i rgyud las nges pas gsoyod pa// tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam// don dam nyid du myi dbyig
106a8(dkon brtsegs): te/ khyed kyis sems can der btul bas// 'gro ba the tsom ma mchis gyu rang // lha'i bu tshor ba la mkhas pas gsalang ba// tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pa po// mkhas la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid pa dang
106b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa// tshor ba'i phung po mngon par mkhyend pa// rin chen rig pa'i mthar byi nang paka/ mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis// tshor ba dpag myed rab tu gzigs ka lha'i bu
106b2(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba la dga' bas gsolang pa// rkang gnyis tso ba dam pa khyod// rgal dka' tshor ba'i mtsho las rgal// 'das las rgal cing sdig myed pa// byang chub mchog 'di sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu tshor ba las byung gis gsolang pa// rnam par 'dres
106b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jig rten 'du// tshor ba rnams ni 'byung mkhyen na// tshor ba'i phung po rab rgal te// sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags myi mnga'// lha'i bu tshor bar rig pas gsol pa// myi rnams dag la gang 'ching ba'i// tshor ba thas cad khyed kyis mkhyen / 
106b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs zhags pa 'ching 'gyur ba// de'i rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs ka/ lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsolang pa// khyod kyi sems kyis nyon mo ngas pam// bdud rnams kyang ni spa skong ste// sems de rang bzhin mchis
106b5(dkon brtsegs): bar thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems yongasu shes pas gso lang ba// ji ltar sgyu ma'i 'khan po yis// sgyu sa sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin// sems de khyed kyis yang dag brtags// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin
106b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen da/ lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul spyod pas gsolang ba// seMs kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen// rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na// ji ltar tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du// byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid pa gzigs// lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug/ 
106b7(dkon brtsegs): bis gsolang ba 'dus 'gyur los su rung ba'i// sems kyi rang bzhin rtog sa myed pa'i// gang la 'jig rten ting myi rnyed// mtshan nyid / tan pa khyed kyis gzigs/ lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsolang pa// gang gis sems la sems myed zhes/ 
106b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa sgyid lug myi 'gyur zhing // bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa// dag 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi// lha'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa// gang dag sems la sems myed shes// deg/ sangs rgyas sras lags te// dpa' che
107a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos rnaMs la// skyes bu dag yang dag 'phags// lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis gsold pa// sems can de gzhi rab zhi// bdud kyi zhags las rab grol bas// de dag bdud kyi dbang myi mchi// lha'i bu sos mnyen pas
107a2(dkon brtsegs): gsoyod pa// myi rnams gang dag sems mo nyes shing // bsnyen par dga' dang dpa' ba dang // khyod kyi bstan la gangams pa// reg 'dod zhum myi 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas gsolang pa// sems dag las rnams cang gyur cing
107a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa// dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos na// zab mo rnams la zhum myi 'gyur// lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas pas gsolang ba// gang gi yid ni chos nyid la// rab tu dga' zhing thogs myed pa// deg myi dbang sras po
107a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ zhi ba'i sar ni phyi nad pa lags// lha'i bu chos la sems pas gsoyong ba chos pa rnams thos cad chos dbyings su// 'dren pa de la bslabs pa rnams// chos nyid la ni gang sems pa// dge spyod yul ma yin myed/ 
107a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la nges par 'byung gis gsoyong pa// myi mchog tu dkyi sras kyi rnams// chos kyi dbyings la nges 'byung ste// 'dren pa khyod kyis sras reg mtshan nyid gcig gis nges 'byung lags// lha'i bu
107a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyis kyi spyod lus gis gas med pa// ches nas kun gi skyed sul ni// chos kyi dbyis shes rgyal bas gas song // dpa'o khyod ni gang skyed pa'i// ma shes do ni ngas kyi khyab// lha'i bu chos kyi byings la zhugs pas gsosang ba
107a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la gang zhugs pa// de dag ye shes bas ma yas te// sangs rgyas chos la the tsom myed// sems can bsam la reg mkhas// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab gis gsolang ba// gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig/ chos kyi dbyings la bab pas rtswa
107a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa// bsam gis myi khyab thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jigs pa myed pas gsoyod pa// gang dag de dag gnas pa'i// 'jigs pa myed pa'i theb myed pas// reg rnams kyi spobs dang stobs// des
107b1(dkon brtsegs): de lo mtshungs pa myed pa 'byung // lha'i bu chos sa kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gas yod pa// khyod ni chos dbyings mkhas pa ste// chos rnams kun la shinang du mkhas// lag 'thil sbyar bzhag bzhin// chos kyi dbyings kyang napar stong // lha'i bu dbyings la
107b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas gas yod pa// chos rnams rang bzhin myed gzigs pas// khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la bzhugs// myi gnas zhum pa ma mchis ste// bzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsamad pa / sangs rgyas kyi
107b3(dkon brtsegs): yul gang lags pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de// bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba'i// 'jig rten 'gon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi lha rlon pas gsol da pa// gang dang gang gi sgo dag nas// skyes bu dam pa stond mdzad pa// de'i sgo
107b4(dkon brtsegs): nas chos dbyings stond // de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la brtson pas gsol pa// mngon par brtson pas chos kyi dbyings// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen pa// brtson par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas/ 
107b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes pa romod phyind par 'gyur// lha'i bu ches kyi tshim gis gsald pa/ dpa' bo khyed kyis skye bo 'di// chos dbyings rab tu tshim par mdzad/ chos kyi dbyings ni na mkhyend pas// 'dren pa byang chub mchog la zhugs/ 
107b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos nyid kyi rting rnyed pas gsol ba// rting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun// 'dran pa khyed kyi zhal du lta// chos dbyings rnam par mkhyen pa'i// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'chal// lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gso
107b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ myi mchog 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes gnas 'di chos dbyings te// rnam par 'dren pa stobs bcu po// gang la spyod pa de lags so// lha'i gnas la gnas pas gsol dpa// chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te// thams cad mkhyen pa
107b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam// de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang // mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa lags// lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas gsolang pa// khyed ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen // mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa ste// sems can kun gi bas
108a1(dkon brtsegs): nga yang / nang gnyis rtse ba khyad kyis mkhyend/ khwa'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gis gsus pa/ rna bar 'den pa khyod sras pa// gnas su bya ba chos dbyangs shes gags so par 'chal ba'i mkhas pa nas/ 'ang byung nyid du
108a2(dkon brtsegs): par byung / lha'i bu gnas la bslabs pa smra// chos kyi dbyings la gang bslabs pa'i// skyes bu reg byang chub zhugs// rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pa// deg rkang gnyis mchog du 'gyur// lha'i bu gnas myed pa la mkhas pas gsolang pa// gnas myed pa ni
108a3(dkon brtsegs): gang 'tshal ba// dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos// bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang de dag rmongs pa yang mi nus// lha'i bu gnas myed pa mngon par shes tha gas lad pa// gnas myed gang gis rig gyur pa// deg bdag cag bdud rtsi
108a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dakhye bas byang chub myi bskyod ces// mkhas pa deg shi nang du dga'// lha'i/ bu gnas myong ba'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol ba// rkan sa myed 'du shes mkhas pa ni// chos nyid la ni rab gnas de// sdig can
108a5(dkon brtsegs): bdud nas bshal ba ni// ji ltar rta'is shing rta bzhin// lha'i bu gnas myed pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po// chos kyi dbyings la dgeg bgyid pa'i// bdud kyi las ni gnas myed de// gnas myed do zhes rgyal
108a6(dkon brtsegs): bas gsungs// lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pas rtogs pas gsosang pa// gnas dang de bzhin gnas byis gsolong bI blo can rnams la bstand// rang gis de ni thugs chud nas// sems can rnams lha stonang // lha'i bu smin pa la mkhas pra
108a7(dkon brtsegs): gas song pa// sngon chad rgyu ni gang dag pa// las 'dra 'byung ba ma 'tshal ba'i// rgyu de khyod kyis thug su chud// las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyend// lha'i bu las la mkhas pas gsoyod pa// chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni// los kyi rgya zhes khyod
108a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen// gang gis rgyu yis bgyid do yang // gang zag mchog gis thugs su chud// lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsoyong pa// ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag na mi rnas gang bgyid 'gyur ba// de'i rgyu dang lond pa dang // gnas dang las kyang
108b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis mkhyen // lha'i bu dkar byung ba la lha nas gsolang pa// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi// sems can rnams dang rgyu nga las// gnas dang las kyi len pa nas// kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod su
108b2(dkon brtsegs): gas gso song pa ka myi dbang khyod kyis gzigs pa'i// lam dang myu dag ma mchis te// gnas dang skye ba'ang ma gachis so// de bas kyang ni gang bag mchogag lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gas yang ba kalas dang byung ba bzhin gnas/ 
108b3(dkon brtsegs): dus pa rnam sbyin nam gsu dang // ji ltar de'i len pa yang // khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod// lha'i bu stobs kyi gri gros gis gsalang pa// rgyu dang las dang ldan pa dang // rnam par sbyin dang rkyen dadang gnas// rang bzhin bral ba khyod kyis mkhyen
108b4(dkon brtsegs): de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa myed// lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsoyod pa// rgyu dang las mi len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyu rnams dang // rnam smin so so yang dag rig/ thos cad stong pa rab tu mkhyen // lha'i bu stobs kyi sebs gsol pa// 
108b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya dang las le nad pa dang // gnas dang rkyend dang rgyud kyi rnas// khyod nyid rang gis mngon dar mkhyen// rang bzhin med par mastand pa mdzad// lho'i khu ste bos kyis brtse bas sa gsol da pa// rgyu dang las dang yi nad pa dang // gnas dang rkyen pa
108b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyud kyi nas// 'pho myed dbang phyug myed pa ste// rten cing 'byung bar khyed kyis mkhyen lha'i bu stobs kyis gaslolang pa// rkyen dang rgyud dang las rnaMs dang / rnam par smind pa ste nad pa rnaMs// de kun rang bzhin stong nga zhes// seng / 
108b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ang ro khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu stobs kyi rjes su 'brang bas gsoyod pa// 'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis// khas ni gang zhig spel gyur pa// dag rkang gnyis rtso bo mkhyen // de bas khyod ni do zla myed// lha'i bu stobs ldan gis gsolang pa// mkhas
108b8(dkon brtsegs): gang la ni bsnyen bgyis shing // gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang // de'i rnam smin ci 'dra ba// de kun sbyin dang ldan pas mkhyend// lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis gsoyong pa// khas gang la ni bsten bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyu ra pa'i/ 
109a1(dkon brtsegs): gsems can thos cad khyed kyis mkhyen// phyag gi sor mo lnga dang 'dra// lha'i bu stobs la spyod pas gsolang pa ka khas gang la ni bsten bgyis shing // bshes nyen ji 'dra rnyed 'gyur nas// 'du 'dziji 'dra bgying 'gyur ba// de kun bla na myed pas
109a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen dkalha'i bu stobs kyis byin gis brlabs pas gsold pa// stobs kyi byin gis rlabs mkhyend cing // 'dren pa de ni mkhas dang ni// 'du 'jib shes nyes tshogs kyi rnams// dag myi mchog khyed kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu khas nges pas gso
109a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ khaMs de dang ni len pa dang / spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnaMs// de la khyod kyis mkhyen pa nyes// de phyir the tsom yong mya mnga'// lha'i bu khas la brten pas gsol da pa// sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i// 'khor ba de dang khas de dang / 
109a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams// myi mchog khyed kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu khaMs la mkhas pas gsol pa// ye shes gang gis khaMs de ni// 'den pas mngon pa mkhyen pa'i// mkhyen de mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes
109a5(dkon brtsegs): blo mchog mnga' bas yang dag bstand// lha'i bu khes nas nges par 'byung gis gso lad pa// khaMs gang la ni bsten bgyis nas// 'du byas dag la ji srid gnas// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin ma khyend// khyod la do zla ma mchis so// lha'i buSh+Ta
109a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su song bas gsoyod pa// khas gang la ni bsnyen bgyis pas// yon tan ji snyed bskyed pa dang // rnam par smin dang 'bras bu dag/ deg ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu khes la yang dag zhugs pas gsoyod pa// khams gang la ni stend bgyin
109a7(dkon brtsegs): cing 'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyid pa// de yang khyod kyis thogs myed mkhyen // de phyir khyod ni mkhas pas mchod// lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol pa// khaMs gang la ni bsten bgyis pas// 'gro bci 'ang mchi ba'i// sems can rnaMs kyi lam dag kyang // ye she
109a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa khyed kyis mkhyen / lha'i bu lam la myi 'jigs pas gas yod pa// sems can log pa nyid nges shing // mya ngan 'das 'gro skal myed pa// phung po gsu po dag la// khyed kyi ye shes nges par 'jug / lha'i bu lam gis nges par byung gis gso nga
109b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can yang dag nyid nges te// ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal skyed pa// de la 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// rtogs pa thegs ba skyed par 'jug// lha'i bu lam mos pas gsoyod pa // ma nges phung por gyur da ba la ka gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams ka/ de la ngar
109b2(dkon brtsegs): song ngan 'gro dang // mya ngan 'das par khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu stobs kyis bdas gsayod pa// sangs rgyas pad ri tsam nyid lags te// de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang // myi 'jigs bzhi dang de bzhin du// kun rdzob zhes ni thub pas gsungs// lha'i bu
109b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mthong bas gsolang pa// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnams myed// ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang myed// don pa nyid du bstan to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen da// lha'i bu stobs la gnas kyis gsolang pa// sangs rgyas
109b4(dkon brtsegs): chos la stobs gnas pas// des na de la 'jigs myed de// rgyul de bzhin gshegs kyi sras// ji ltar 'dod dgur na bar 'phrul// lha'i bu chos la 'jigs myed kyis gsolang pa// kun rdzob dang ni don 'dam dang // deg rab du bstan mchis kyang // kun rdzo
109b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ni don dam dang / bdang yang dmyigs su ma mchis// lha'i bu ye shes lhur len gis gsolang ba// brjod pa thos cang rna bar bzhag/ chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par bzhag/ mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma mchis// khyod kyis chos kyi
109b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gzigs// lha'i bu lam la brtson pas gsoyong ba// nges par gyur dani sems can nas// gzhan gi rgyud mchiganas ma mchis// log par rje sa nas kun du 'grer// drang srong chen po khyod kyis gzigs/ lha'i bu mos pa'i
109b7(dkon brtsegs): bas kyis gsusang pa// khams gang la ni bsten bgyis te// gang nas ji 'drar mos gyur zhing / 'dod chags las la sdug sngal ba// deg thub chen khyed kyis gzigs/ lha'i bu myi sdug pa las nges par byung gis gas pa pa/ mchis sa su
109b8(dkon brtsegs): brtags pas na// 'dod chags khas ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu byas pas nges byung gis gsolang pa/ ma mchis yongasu brtags pas na// zhe sdang las ni rab tu byung / de la mos pa
110a1(dkon brtsegs): ma nges 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ lha'i bu rkyen 'dis nges par byung gis gsolang pa/ ma mchis yongasu brtags pas na// gti mug las ni rang du byung // des mos pa des 'byung ba// dag khyod kyis ji bzhin da
110a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gis gsolang pa// 'chi myed 'jigs rnyed pa dag/ ser snan mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur// de la mos pa nges byung ba// deg thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dge' ba'i bshes nyen gis nges par byung gis gseld pa/ 
110a3(dkon brtsegs): swA// sdig pa'i grogs po dag dang 'grogs pas na// mthun pa'i khas ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa thob 'gyur ba// de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen/ lha'i bu rnam par shes pa snying por 'dzind pas gsol pa// 'khor ba 'di na
110a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnaMs kyis// ji 'dra'i khaMs la bsnyend pa dang // mos pa de mthar phyind pa dag/ khyo dkyis ma lus rab tu mkhyend// lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas ga sa yod pa// 'khor ba ni ni 'khor rnaMs kyis// gang gi rgyu byung nan tan dang / 
110a5(dkon brtsegs): mos pa de las gyur pa yang // smad pa myed khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsol pa// sems can gang gis khes gang la// bsten na ji ltar 'gyu ra ba'i// rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen // des na khyed ni dga' bar mdzad// lha'i
110a6(dkon brtsegs): bu dbang po ma la spyod pas gsolang ba// sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang // gang gis rgyal chen skye ba dang // dmyigs pa dang ni zhing rnams dang // dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen // lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol ba// 'dod pa'i sdug sngal gnod
110a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang // sred par mngon par 'jug pa dang // sred par zhi bar bgyi ba'i don// deg smra ba'i mchog gis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po snyed yul gis gsol pa// dbang po nyam chung rnams dang ni// gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par 'tshal// sred
110a8(dkon brtsegs): bar rnam par bzhig par yang // rkang gnyis dam pas bstand pa mdzad// lha'i bu dbang po nom par rgyal bas gsoyod pa// dbang po rtul po dur khrod parten// rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid// rkang gnyis gtso bo nas mthong nas// sred dang bcas
110b1(dkon brtsegs): ba khyod la lpag lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gso song pa// 'dod chags can dang 'dod chags dang // ni dang shes dang myi shes dang // srid pazhi dang dbang po rnams// rnam par gzigs ni sngon ma dmyigs// lha'i bu dbyung po la gnas pas gas yong pa/ 
110b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gnyen por gyurang ba'i// gnod sems skyed dang dben pa dag/ dbang po brtul ba'i bsnyen pa'i cha// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i bas pa gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gas yod pa// zhe sdang gnyen por byas pa gsung // sems can rje
110b3(dkon brtsegs): parjes su skye/ zhe sdang khas ni zhi bar bgyid// deg myi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen // lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas gsol pa// gnod sems byed dang byams pa dang // zhi ba ngo bo nyid ma gzigs// dag dang nyon mongs ma dmyigs te// des na 'jig
110b4(dkon brtsegs): rten khyad par 'phags// lha'i bu dbang po rjes su 'brang gyis gso yong pa// leg par rnam par rtog pa dang // rtog pa nye bar ston pa yang // nyon mongs dam byar kun sbyor te// zlog pas tha rang bar 'gyur ba gzigs/ lha'i bu ye shes yang dag
110b5(dkon brtsegs): shar gyis gsoyong pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dngos la 'dzind pa su na pa ste/ zlogs pas snang ba chen por 'gyur// don grags chen khyod kyis mkhyend// lha'i bu ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsob dang / 
110b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags ni sdang gtimug dang / mun pa snang ba dngos po rnams// rang bzhin nyid kyi ma mchis te// do ni gang gnyis tso bos gzigs// lnga'i bu snang ba 'dzin gis gas yong pa// sems can gang gis shes pa gang / ci tsam yang su snu
110b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyis dang / snod du gang rung ci snyed pa// de dag myi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen // lha'u dbang po rang zhe 'das pas gsol pa// nyon mongs spang phyir gang gis shes pa de la brtag bgyid pa// de yang stond pa khyod kyis mkhyen// de bas khyod la mngon par
110b8(dkon brtsegs): dga'i// lha'i bu dbang po la dga' bas gsold pa// yul dang dus dang gnas dag dang // spyod pa rnam par sgom pa dang // nyon mongs rnam par dag pa dang // thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs// lha'i bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gis gsol pa// 
111a1(dkon brtsegs): la ga bang ba ban brtus 'bring dag dang // gang zag dag gis bsam pa dang // bcings dang thar dang thad dang shes// yo ba med pa khyod kyis mkhyen // lha'i bu dbang po rgyal mtshan gis gsolong ba// dbang po rab 'bring dul ba dang // nyon mongs ye shes tshor ba
111a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gdus dang gsub par bgyid pa dang // khyed kyis mtshan nyid myed par gsungs// lha'i bu dbang por rnam par brtags kyis gsoyod pa// sems can rnams kyi bas gtan dang // rnam thar dkun nas nyon mongs dang // snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin ldan pa dang / 
111a3(dkon brtsegs): rnabyang thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen da// lha'i bu stobs kyis zhugs kyis gsold pa// zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te brten// ches kun ngo ba nyid kyis ni// rang bzhin myed par khyed kyis mkhyen da// des na thas cad mkhyen ces bgyi// 'i bu stobs kyi gces gson
111a4(dkon brtsegs): pa chos rnams gang dang rang bzhin gang // chos gang gis ni brjod bgyis pa// yang dag ci bzhin thugasu chud// des na dus gsu chags myi mnga'// lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsal pa// leg par brtags pas kun nyon mongs// rnam pa bzhi ni skyer
111a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// las las skyes par dag mkhyend// de bas khyod la de zla myed// lha'i bu stong ngas shes kyis gsol pa// nyon mongs rnaMs dang las rnaMs dang // ga/ na po rnam par byang ba dang // bstan pa'ang khyed kyis rab tu mkhyen // des ni
111a6(dkon brtsegs): khyed ma don byed/ lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gso yod pa// bsam gtan nam tha rang ldan ba dang // snyoms par 'jug pa dang ting 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon ma ngas nam byang dag/ mying tsam mo zhes khyod kyis bstan // lha'i bu stobs las byang
111a7(dkon brtsegs): gris gsoyod pa / bas gtan na thar nabyang dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin da// bag sod pa las byung ba ste// del khyed kyi ye shes 'jug/ lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel gis gsol pa// dpa' bo khyed kyis mkhyend pa ni// bas gtan la
111a8(dkon brtsegs): bstsogs de dag dang // ljang dang rnam par byang la 'jug/ de ni rlung ltar chags pa myed// lha'i bu sngon gi mtha' la mkhas pas gas song ba// skal pa bye ba grangs byeng du// srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs che// srid pa'i skyon dang yong ma 'dres// des na khyad la do ba skyed/ 
111b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sngon gi mtha' la gnas pas gsolang pa// skal pa bye ba grangs myed du// byang chub gzhal yas tshol byed cing // 'dren pas yongs su spyad pas na// des na khyod ni dpa' bo lags// lha'i bu son gi mtha' la tog pahA/ sngon cang 'khor spyod pa'i
111b2(dkon brtsegs): tshub rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa// 'jig rten sprin rnams khyod kyis gzigs// des ma khyod na tshul la mkhas// lha'i bu sngon gi mtha' char phyin pa sa// sngon mtha' nos rgyal mang po la// dpa' bos sngon chad spyod mdzad pas// thams cad mkhyenang du
111b3(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung // sems can mkhas la phyag kyang 'chal pa ka'i bu sngon gtsul phun sa tshogs pas gsoyod pa// byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir// skal ba bre ba grangs myed du// sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa// des khyed kyis sa zon
111b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sngon gi tshul la nges pas gsoyod pa// skal pa bye bar brtag mdzad pra// sa kun sems can myed pa zhes// chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen da// 'du 'phro tsam du rgyal bas gsungs// lha'i bu sngon gi mtha' la sems
111b5(dkon brtsegs): bas gsosong ba// skal pa bye ba grangs myed du// gnas dang gnas myin rab 'khyend par rnam par 'dren pa spyod mdzad pas// des na 'jig rten mongs myi mnga'// lha'i bu sngon gi mtha' la spyod pas gsol pa// gnas dang gnas myin rten bgyis na/ 
111b6(dkon brtsegs): las dang rgyu rnams spyad pas naka/ khaMs dang dbang po mos pa dang // bas gtan ston gi mtha' yang mkhyen // lA'i bu sngon gi mtha' la yongasu rtog pas gsoyong pa// khyod kyis spen mtha' yongs brtags pas// stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po// dpa'i chen
111b7(dkon brtsegs): pos rnam par spel// des ni 'jig rten 'di la gzigs// lha'i bu sngon gi mtha' gi spyod yul gis gsol pa// dpa' bos sems can thos cad kyi// sngon ga mtha'i spyod pa dang // dge' dang myi dge'i rjes dang // mkhyend pas 'jig rten bzo' ba mdzad// lha'i bu
111b8(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa la so sor rtog pas gsoyong ba// thub pas sngon gyi sems can gi// sngon mtha'i spyod pa rab 'khyend cing // khams dang mos pa mkhyend pas no// de phyir sems can gso ba mdzad// lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gis gsol ba/ 
112a1(dkon brtsegs): skal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// sngon gi mtha' la rtag bgyis kyang // khyod kyi dgongs pa chags myi mngar// des na 'gon la bdag mos lags// lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsoyong pa// rgal pa bye ba grangs phyed du// sngon mdzan
112a2(dkon brtsegs): srid pa bsam bgyis kyang // rkang gnyis rtse bo'i yon tan gyi// pha rol phyind nus 'ga' ma mchis// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi// skye dgu sna tshogs las ldan pa// shi 'pho skye bar 'gyurab
112a3(dkon brtsegs): dag khyod kyis sangs rgyas sman gis gzigs// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' las nges par byung bas gsol pa// rgyu gang gis ni las gang zhig// bgyis shing rgyu drug mchis gyur pa// deg thas cad rgyal bas mkhyend// des na thas cad mkhyend ces kyi
112a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pas gsoyod pa// khas gang gis ni seMs can gang // bsgos par gyur da cing las bgyid pa'i// bag chag las dang sems can dag/ khyod kyis g.yo' ba myed par mkhyen// lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba rig
112a5(dkon brtsegs): bas gsolang ba// bshes nyin ci 'dra bsten bgyis shing // las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas// 'gro ba gang du 'gyur ba// thub pa khyod kyis de yang ma khye nang // lha'i bu dgos pa la mkhas pas gselang pa// las de'i ni bgyis
112a6(dkon brtsegs): gag dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// gang gi slad du las bgyis pa// de yang ma sus rab tu mkhyen / lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas gsomang ba// ngas pra gang dag dmyigs pa dang / las gang mngon par 'dus pagyis pa na/ thas cang
112a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas de mkhyen te// de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags// lha'i bu dngos po rig pas gsol da pa// sems can nas kyi bsam mkhas pa// dngos de ci skar bas ma gnas pa dang // de ni ji ltar grub pa'i// las de khyod kyis mngon par mkhyen// lha'i bu shes pa
112a8(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pas gsoyod pa ka shes pa gang gis dngos po do// brtags par 'gyur ba rab tu mkhyen// de la ji ltar chags 'gyur ba'ang / thub pa khyod kyis shinang du mkhyen// lha'i bu mngon pa 'du byed pa la mkhas kyis gsosod pa// chags pa gang gis
112b1(dkon brtsegs): yang nas// nyen ma sa gang gis 'du bgyis pa'i// nyen mongs de dag yang dag ma khyen// de bas khyod ni bdag gi 'gon// k+ta'i bu 'gro ba lam khas grags song ba/ 'gro ba gang du las gang gis// mchis shing sdib pa gang rnyed na// 'bras bu tho bar myi 'gyur
112b2(dkon brtsegs): dai ku spyan ldam byed kyis mkhyen pa// lha'i bu dmyigs pa la mkhas pas gsobang pa// 'gro ba dag du skyes nas kyi// gang gis lam rdzas smin 'gyur ba'i// dmyigs pa khyod kyis rab la byen te// del khyod kyi blo gros 'jug/ lha'i bu bag chags la mkhas pas
112b3(dkon brtsegs): gas nga ba 'grod pa 'gro ba kyi nas kyis// sngon cad dbyid pa'i sdigasas dang / de bzhin dbre' ba'i las rnams kyi mamag chags khyed kyis rab tu mkhyen // sgra'i dums la mkhas kyis gnaso pa / 'gro ba gyu sa thas ca kyi/ ting dnganapa
112b4(dkon brtsegs): slad ma dang // las rnaMs gsum po khyod kyis mkhyen// de la so so'i skye bo 'khrul// lha'i rnam par sbyin pa la mkhas kyis gso yod pa// chung zhing rnam smin gyi ba dang // che zhing rnam smin chung ba dang / chung ngam che'am mnyam pa'ang rung / 
112b5(dkon brtsegs): del mu stegs can nas rmongs// klu'i dulas la mkhas kyis gsosong pa// tshe 'di las rna lags pa drong // skyes pa'i las rnams gang lags dang / lan gras gan na gi gang lags pa// dag spun ljid kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu che 'dis myong dab cu
112b6(dkon brtsegs): bal mkhas kyis// tshe 'di la ni gang bgyis pa'i// las kyi rdo sbyin myi gang dag/ myong bar 'gyur ba gang dag la// so so'i skye bo rmongs pa mkhyen da// lha'i bu skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba rtul mkhas kyis gsosong pa// gang gis las gang bsugs gyur te// skyes na
112b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin 'gyur ba// gang la 'jig rten nying myi rnyed// shes rab chen po de gang mkhyen// lha'i bu lan grangs gzhan na myong bar 'gyur ba mkhas kyis gas mad pa// las gang skaman pa bye ba yi// phyi dus rnam par sbyid 'gyur zhing // dus gzhan dag na yang bya
112b8(dkon brtsegs): deg yang dag nyid du mkhyend// lha'i bu yongasu ma smin pa myong bar 'gyur bal mkhas kyis gsol da pa// las rnams gang zhig bgyis gyu rad pa// yong su sbyin par ma gyur na// de srad 'bras bu myi 'byung ba// rkang gnyis mchog gis de yang mkhyen/ 
113a1(dkon brtsegs): ga ga wA'i bu yongs su ma smin pas myong bar 'gyur ba la rtogs pas gsoyong ba// las gang dang ni ldan pas ni// sems can 'di na skyer gyur pa// bam pa myed pas de mkhyen te// yongasu rtogs nas rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu yong su
113a2(dkon brtsegs): smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas phrag sol pa// las ni ji ltar yongasu smin na// 'bras bu kar bar 'gyur ba mkhyend// de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug/ deg stong par rnam par mkhyend// lha'i bu yongasu smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la nges par
113a3(dkon brtsegs): gsoyong pa / thas cad mkhyend pa las kyi rnas// khri dang yang bar rab tu mkhyend// sems can bas pa thug su chud// de srad bcom ldan bdag gi bla// lha'i bu lI yang mkhas kyis gsol pa// las gang gis ni sems can nas// 
113a4(dkon brtsegs): stong mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / lci ba dang ni yang ba gzigs// de shes mkhyen pas rab tu mkhyen // lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la mkhas kyis gsoyod pa// sems can spyod pa nyer bzung zhing // las kyi lci dang yang bdag/ dpa' bo khyod
113a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tum khyend// u stegs can rnams del rmongs// lha'i bu sems can spyod pas gsolong pa// sems can spyod pa spyad mdza cing / las kyi rnam pa smyon pa bstan// bor bu chu dad ga'i skye// lan can par bskon pa bzhin/ 
113a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu las la 'khas kyis gsoyod pa// slo ba dang myi slob rnam par spyod// rkang sa dam pa ston mdzad cing // kun nas nyon mongs las myong nas// la no zad par 'gyur bar bstand// lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la reg pa
113a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas spyan gis khas gsun// las kyi 'bras bu rten pa'i// byis pa dag dang mkhas pas gzigs// 'phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// lha'i bu las zad par byed pas gas lad pa// 'jig rten dag rje 'dren khyed// sems
113a8(dkon brtsegs): can rnaMs kyi shi 'pho dang // skyo ba kun lo mi shes 'jug/ mkhyend pas 'jigs myed phyag kyang 'chal// lha'i bu dmyig pa skyed pa la spyod pas gsoyong pa// 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang la// 'gro dang de bzhin sems can dang // na sprin rmi lam 'dra bstan pa/ 
113b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa gang gnyis mchog gis mkhyen// lha'i bu nyon mongs pa la rtog pas gsol pa// ji ltar rmi lam skom pa zhig/ shinang du bsil ba'i chu 'thungs bzhin// rkang gnyis mchog khyed 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang gti mug rnas kyang zang // lha'i bu
113b2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rtog pas dang bral bas gas yod pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nas// yongasu rtog las skyes pa ste// skyilas dga' bar rtse bzhin du// smra mchog khyed la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu yong su rtog bzhi par byed pas gas lang ba// me
113b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog par rab zhi bas// nyon mongs zad pa rab bstan te// mi lam nani sngon myed sbyar/ myi mchog khyed kyis rab tu mkhyen da// lha'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsosong pa// mi lam char cher 'bab de bzhin// zag pa rnas dang na byung bar// zag pa byang
113b4(dkon brtsegs): baM 'khas pa po// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan // lha'i bu rmi lam rtog gos ga/ so lad pa// rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar// de bzhin zag pa nA 'byung ste// nor pa rnaMs la zag 'byung bar// dpa' be chen po khyod kyis
113b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan da// lha'i bu khyod kyis ji skad bstan // lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas gsolang ba// ji ltar bu mo'i rmi la na// bu zhig byung la shi 'phos na// de ga' dang sdug sngal tshor 'gyur ba// de bzhin 'gro ba khyod kyis gzigs// 
113b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rmi lam la rtog pas gsol pa// rgyal ma dag na 'go bcad bzhin// khyod kyi zag pa zang pa gzigs// de ni mkhas pa nas la bstand // thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'chal// lha'i bu glo gros nges par brtags kyis gsos dang
113b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kun mkhyen pa khyod kyis ni// ji skar mi lam Sh+Ta phrad dang // bral ba yang dag sa mchis gzigs// 'gro ba ni bzhin tsam par mdzad// mu'i bu yigs yid kyis gsamed pa/ khyod kyi dam pa'i chos stong pa// thos nas yid ni dga' 'gyur te/ rmyis
113b8(dkon brtsegs): dag na rmyi bstan bzhin// de ltar rgyal bas bstand pa mdzad// lha'i bu yongs su dga' ba yid kyis gsolang ba// me long gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin// 'gro ba mthar dag gzigs pas naM// bsam gtan mnga' ba khyod la ni// ra
114a1(dkon brtsegs): 9/ bcas 'jig rten yid kyang dga'// lha'i bu bre gros nges pas gsoyod pa// thub pa'i pi bang sgra 'dre zhing // khyod kyi dachos thos gyur nga na// lha'i bu nas the tsom por// rgyal ba mchog kyang 'tshal na lha'i bu sgyums tshim gis gsold pa// spyas
114a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khan pos sgyu ma dag/ byis pa rmongs byed yongs bstan na// myi mkhas de la rmongs par 'gyur// sgyu ma bzhin du khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sprul pa la sems pas gsoyod pa// ji ltar rmi lam sgyu mthong ba// de ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs
114a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gon po'i bstan pa de thos na// bdag cag the tsom ma mchis so// lha'i bu sgyu ma las de sa par byung gis gsol pa// sgyu ma'i 'khan pos sgyu sprul kyang // sgyu ma lag par 'tshal bas na// de la rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis// de bzhin
114a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs// lha'i bu rtog pa'i rjes su rtog pas gsol ba// ji ltar brtson pas rmi lam na// sangs rgyas sku gzugs brtags pa bzhin// de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kis
114a5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa 'ardzogs gso stong pa// kun rtog 'dod pa chags rgyu lags te// 'dod chags dngos pos bskyed ma lags// rtog pa ngan las 'did chags byung // de ni rna 'dren khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu yongasu shes pa dang wa/ 
114a6(dkon brtsegs): pas gsolang pa// ri sul dag las sgra byung ba// khrag ca sems can sgra ma lags// de bzhin 'jig rten khyod kyis gzigs// de slad 'jig rten chags myi mngar// lha'i bu bsten pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// sgra ni gang yang ma mchis te/ 
114a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra ni brag cha 'dra ba lags// 'od kyang myi dbang khyod kyis bstan// byis pa mang po rab du btsud// lha'i bu nan tan la mkhas pas gsol pa// chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang // byis pa rnams kyis gzhan la brtags// nan tan chos pa
114a8(dkon brtsegs): shes rab bgyi// de la bdag ni the tsom bcad// lha'i bu don gyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa// ches don yang dag gang lags pa// de ni sus kyang ma bstand 'tshal ma gyur // de skad thub pa'i mchog gis gsungs// lha'i bu chos kyi brda
114b1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas gsolang pa / khrag dang dri ma nyon mongs dang // bag chags dang ni rtog dang rtog/ kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa// thung ba brda'i tshig kyang lags/ lha'i bu kun du rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// kun nas nyon
114b2(dkon brtsegs): mongs rnam pa dang // zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang // gang dang gshad dang nye du dang // stond pa 'di kun mying tsam lags// lha'i bu myi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsoyod pa// khas gsum rnams la ma chags ste// nam mkha' dri'i thugs
114b3(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba// bral bar gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas// zhi ba'i sems la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bum gos pas gsol pa// thub pa khyod kyi thugs yid ni// gzugs dang gzugs myed myi gnas shing // 'dod dang mya ngan 'das pa la// gnas pa
