114b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis par snang ba 'dra// lha'i bu re ba myed pas gsold pa// 'dod pa'i khas la re ba spangs// gzug dang gzugs myed gnyi gar sbyin// 'du 'ja dag dang dral 'gyur ba// sred zang khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pa byung bas gselang pa// 'byung ba/ 
114b5(dkon brtsegs): dag dang 'jig pa la/ khyod kyis sred pa yang dag chad// khas gsu kun la chag myi mang / rna bar 'dren pa phyag kyang 'chal// mu'i bu srid pa'i zis kyis mi non te/ gsolang ba// 'jig rten 'di dag zil mnan nas// khyu mchog dpa skyong mdzad
114b6(dkon brtsegs): cing sems can 'ag rten sgrom mdzad pa/ zugs bco khyod sa phyag kyang 'cha bu rbang pa dang zlam pas gnas ba kun du byur dang bras de ngasro bsam pas nir gyur ba// dag pa'i bdan nyid dag pa'i sem po/ sa
114b7(dkon brtsegs): bral la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu ji lta bzhon rig pas gsolang ba// chos rnams thas cad dngos myed pa// ci bzhin dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen // bcings pa ma mchis grol ma mchis// yang dag gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal // lha'i bu 'dam las rgal bas
114b8(dkon brtsegs): gas yod pa// 'dod pa'i 'dam las rgal ba ste// srid pa'i 'dam las de bzhin rgal// gzigs pa myi mnga' len myi mnga'// yang sring zang pa phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i zang zing spangs kyis gsol pa// zang zing spangs shing dri ma spangs// re ba spangs shing sdig pa
115a1(dkon brtsegs): ag gaspangs sangs rgyas sgrib pa rna spangs pa// don rtogs khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu re ba spangs pas gso yod pa// don dang don ma lags pa spangs// chags pa mi mnga' nges rtogs pa// bdud kyi zhags las rnam 'das pa// len myed khyed
115a2(dkon brtsegs): la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu phan par 'dod pas gsol pa// bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi// lam gang nyon mongs rims myed pa// sgrib pa myed par gzigs pa po// dpa' chen khyod kyis de yang gzigs // lha'i gags pa thob pas gsoyod pa/ 
115a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa 'jig rten rnam grags pa// khyod kyis mkhyen la brtson pa rnas// ji skad bstan bzhin rab rtog na// nyon mongs nas ni nub par 'gyur// lha'i bu 'jigs pa myed pas gsold pa// chos rnams kun la nges pas ma// sngo ba gang yang yong ma
115a4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// ye shes rgya mtsho myi spel bas// seng ge sgra ni sgrog par mdzad// lha'i bu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa myed pas gsol pa// 'jigs pa kun las yang dag dgal// zug rngu thas cad kun du rton// snyems pa myi mang
115a5(dkon brtsegs): zhum myi mnga'// thas cad zil non phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas myed kyis gsol pa// lha rnams dang ni dri za dang / bdud dang tshangs par brtsas pa'i sa// khyod kyi chos la rgal myi nus// de bas khyed la snyengs mas
115a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu seng ge rtsal gis gsolang pa// chos rnams thas cad yongs mkhyen pas// sangs rgyas gyur la 'jigs myed mngar// bdag la ches kyis sus rgol ba// bde gshegs khyed la dgos myi mnga'// lha'i bu skrag myed kyis gsol pan/ 
115a7(dkon brtsegs): seng ge ri bul gnas pa ni// 'jigs pa ma mchis sbag sa mchis// ri dgas phram yangs btul te// swA bskong nags na nga ro sgog/ de bzhin thams cad mkhyend pa yang // mu stegs can rnams yongs skrag ste/ a klu dri za 'jig rten na/ 
115a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs myed gzigs nas gsung yang sgrog/ lha'i bu thams cad zil non gos gas yod pa// 'jig rten na 'dren 'jig rten na// sangs rgyas nyid la sngo bgying pa// 'jig rten gsum nam mchis te// des na rgyal ba bdag gi skyabs// lha'i bu se
115b1(dkon brtsegs): gro slos kyis gsom pa mas cad mkhyen bams cad gzigs/ chos rnams kun pa 'jigs myi ma ngar// khyod 'dra 'jig rtenam mchis te / ces myi skyes la phyag kyang 'chas/ kwa'i bu rjes su mthun pa skyes kyis nam sa bar/ 
115b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nyid du dam bcas na// 'di na khyod la rgal ma mchis// 'jig rten 'dren pa chos kyis ni// khyod la gang rgol de ma mchis// lha'i bu khyod 'dzin gis gsold pa// seng ge'i nga ro gsung sgrogs te// khyod kyis chos mdzad bzung bas na/ 
115b3(dkon brtsegs): srog chosas kyi ba sang dag gis// byang chub mchag dus kyang skyed// bu btu 'thugs rjes mthun gis gas pa dpa// sas d+has rjes mthun du zhugs can// dpa' chen dag pab chen tho'i / byang chub mchog tu sems pa tu sa
115b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zag mchog du dag 'gyur// lha'i bu rjes su mthun pa'i chos la dga' bas dgasolang pa// khyed kyi bstand pa sus thob ste// byang chub mchog du sems btud pa// dgra 'jig rten sems can che// gang zag mchog
115b5(dkon brtsegs): du dngas 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas gsoyod pa// 'jig rten dag na rgol myed ba'i/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung thos nas// sreg chags bye bstong dag gis// byang chub mchog du ces kyang bskyed/ lha'i bu sems rgyun
115b6(dkon brtsegs): yong su dag pas gsol pa// yun ring dus nas myi dbang gis// sangs rgyas bslab pa la legs bslabs pas// de slad khyod ni thugs rgyud dgar// mtshan rab sum bcu nyas dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pa myed pa'i yid kyis gsoyod pa/ zag pa zang bI
115b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis// seng ge'i nga ro skrag mdzad de// dam bcas pa la mngon zhugs na// rgol ba 'di na yongs mchis// lha'i bu de kho na'i rjes su song bas gsold pa// khyod kyi gsung la smra 'gyur ba'o// lha dang lta bu myi dag ni// 'jig rten gsuni
115b8(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis te// des na thu ga dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pa zad pa la mkhas pas gsolang pa// dge' sbyong dam pa'i zag pa ni// ma lus yongs su bas pa ste// 'di ni khyod la rgol ma mchis// des na sangs rgyas bdag gi pa// lha'i rtag tu brtson
116a1(dkon brtsegs): bas gsolang pa// khyod la nyon mongs lus so zhes myi dbang khyod la gang rgol ba// rnam pa kun tu myi dmyigs te// des na sangs rgyas bsnyengs myi mnga'// lha'i bu sems zhi bas gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi ba ste// gti mug bag/ 
116a2(dkon brtsegs): chags bcas par zhi ta nyes spyod las kyang zhi bas na/ sems zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu rnal 'byor nga spyod pas gsold pa// rnal 'byor gang gis nyon mongs gang // bas par 'gyur bar lta ba'i tshe// de la khyod kyis mkhyend kun 'jug// des na khyod la
116a3(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu rna 'byor la mkhas pas gsold pa// 'dren pa gang la bslabs pa'i// rnal 'byor tshogs ni mtha' yas te// thams cad mkhyen pa de skad du// nyon mongs thams cad ma lus pas// lha'i bu rnal 'byor nga glo gros
116a4(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi blo// rnal 'byor de las ni nyams ma mchis// des na khyod kyis nyon mongs kun// bag chags bcas par yongs su bskul // lha'i bu zhi ba rig pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs thams cad zhir gyur
116a5(dkon brtsegs): nas bag chags ma lus yeng su bstsam // stengs pa myi mnga' rgyal sras dang / jis kyang myi stengs spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu zang ba la rtog pas gso lad pa// thub pa thos cad mkhyen pa khyod // nyon mongs bag chags par bas/ 
116a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig sgron ma khyod la ni// 'tshungs pa gang yang myi dmyig so// lha'i bu bag/ la nyal phyang gis gsold pa// khyod kyis bag chags ma lus pasam// khyod la skyon dri yong ma mchis// de slad sangs rgyas thas cad mkhyen// lAn
116a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun gyi thub pa'i thug// lha'i bu mtha' na gnas pas gsosang pa// zag pa nas ni spangs pas na// skye ba yang skye bam lags// thub pa khyod skye tha ma pa// sa na 'gon pa bsnangs myi mnga'// b+ha'i bu chang srung gi gsoyang ba// dang mo
116a8(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyis sa yon spangs// sdug sngal myu gu tshig pa 'gyur// mya ngan khri shing rna par skas// gdung ba myed la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shing thags bton gis gsoyong pa// thub pa thas cang mkhyen pa khyod// ma rig shing thug nas kyang bsumad// 
116b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyod pa rnam par sbyangs// de bas stond pa bsnyengs myi mnga'// lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rolal tu song bas gsol bya// srid pa'i mtshor mas yang dag rgal// rnam par 'dren pa bya ba byas// khyod kyi snang ba yang dag phyung // 'jigs myed 'od
116b2(dkon brtsegs): ni don kyang grub ka/ lha'i bu mya ngan 'ang bar 'gro bas gsoyong pa// zas cang mkhyen bzhir gyur pa// nyon mongs thams cad rab tu bzhig/ bag chags rdul tsam yang mya mnga'// 'gon po khyengs phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu chos kyi rgyal man
116b3(dkon brtsegs): gis gsoyod pa/ khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan sbeng // nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bskam// chos kyi lam srang mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo chen po khyed kyis bstan // lha'i chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsalang ba// sangs rgyas ches kyi 'gyu
116b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas po// thub pa chos rnas kun mkhyen pa// sems can kun gi dge' bshes gnyen// ye shes mtsho la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi gos can gis gsold pa// khyod kyi sras po 'jigs myed pa// seng ge'i nga ro rnam sgrog kyang / 
116b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal sras de dag mchog myed cing // sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyis skam// lha'i byu chos don du gnyer bas gsol ba// sangs rgyas chos rnas don ra bar// khyod kyi sras rnas sems bskyed cing // khyed kyi myi 'jigs thos
116b6(dkon brtsegs): byar mes/ mkhas pa des byang chub tshel/ lha'i bu chos kyis sgom gis gsosod pa// khyod kyi myi mas zes gyur nas// sangs rgyas chos rnams bcal ba'i phyir// srog chags bye ba smras 'gyur te// btson 'grus brtan po rab tu rtsom
116b7(dkon brtsegs): bam po bcu gcig pa'o// lha'i bu chos kyis 'phags kyis gsosong ba// sangs rgyas chos kyis mngon 'phags shing // 'jigs pa myed par 'dul mdzad pa'i// gsungs
116b8(dkon brtsegs): mchog 'gyur khyod mthong nas// brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol// lha'i bu chos 'dzin gis gsayang ba// thub pa zab cing ste dga' ba'i// chos ni khyod kyis rab bstanang ba// khyod kyi sras kyis thos gyur nas// dge ba myed byang chub chos
117a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i kun pa skyed pas gsosod pa/ khyod kyiseng ge'i gsung thos nas khyod kyi sras po dang 'dres pa gsus dang srog la myis par// byang chub don du gnyer bar bgyid/ lha'i bu gzhan du mi sems par the gros kyis gsoyong ba/ 
117a2(dkon brtsegs): thub pa bsnyengs pa myi mnga' ba// khyod kyi dam chos 'dir thos nas// gzhan du sems pa ma mchis par// brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol// lha'i bu gzhan du myi 'gro bas gsolang pa// myi dbang khyod kyi gsung thos nas// theg pa gnyi
117a3(dkon brtsegs): blo spangs bgyis shing // lam gzhan du yang myi mchi bar// bla na myed pa'i byang chub tshol// lha'i bu nye bar gnas kyis gsolang pa// seng ge'i nga ro 'di bsgrags pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos gyur na// byang chub mchog la nye 'gyur cing // deg nang
117a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dam par 'gyur// lha'i bu spobs pa nye 'gyur bas gsol pa// grags chen khyod kyis gsung brjed pa'i// spobs pa de ni thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas chos la khyod kyi sras// kun kyang dga' ba rab tu skyed // lha'i bu spobs pa thob pas
117a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// 'jigs myed khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pa// ma smad sras kyis tho/ ba gyur pa na// dge spobs pa nam du yang // sangs rgyas nyid las phyir myi ldog// lha'i bu rab dgas gsold pa// 'jig myed khyod kyi gsung bsgrubs pa
117a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs chen khyod kyi sras kyi nas// rtag tu rab tu dgar gyur cing // ma smad deg byang chub tshol// lha'i bu yid zhum pa myed pas gsolang ba// khyed kyi gsung sgrags thos gyur nas nas// rkang gnyis de ba khyed kyi sras// dga' di
117a7(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba ma mchis par// byang chub mchog ni tshol bar byed// lha'i bu thogs myed yid gis gsolang ba// khyod kyis gsung sngags thos pas na// sems rangs gyur cing yid dga' ste// deg yod ni nam du yang // byang chub nyid du thogs ma mchis// lha'i
117a8(dkon brtsegs): bu chos la bar chad myed pa la mkhas pas gsolong ba// chos rnaMs gang la bsten bgyis kyang // kar ba'i phyogs dag myi 'gri ba cing // do'i ba chang myi 'gyur ba'i// gnas ni thub pa khyed kyis mkhyen // lha'i bu ches nges par bstan pa la mkha
117b1(dkon brtsegs): gangs gas sad pa ka kar mo'i phyogs la spyod pa la// khar chad 'byung bar myi 'gyur zhing // gnas kyang myed par thub pas mkhyen // des na ston pa bzhengs myi mngar// sku'i bu chos rab nyid la mkhas pas gsayong ba// dga' la kun nas nyan thos pa/ nag pa'i phyogs kyi
117b2(dkon brtsegs): nga mnan te/ byad kyi ga pa ni das myigs// gnas kyang byed par drub pas ma khyen da// zhwa'i bu rigs pa la mkhas pas gas sa pa// dag pa'i son nam du yang // kar po'i chos dang mi 'gregs par// rigs par bcom yon byed kyi gsung // ngas ma
117b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pag gi zun lha'i bu dge' ba dang myi dge ba rig pas gas med pa// ches nas zas cad ma 'dres par// dba' be chen po lung kyis mkhyen// kun nas nyon mongs brtags pas na// kar po'i phyogs las 'grib par 'gyur// lha'i bu lam la mkhas pas
117b4(dkon brtsegs): gsolang pa ka/ kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa la// kar po'i phyogs ni myi 'byung ste/ de ltar 'tshal bar ma gyur dgag/ khar chad du ni 'gyur bar gsungs// lha'i \u0f7fthar pa 'dod kyis gas song ba// nag po'i phyogs la bsnyen bgyid na// thar pa 'dod
117b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mang po yi// bar du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs// des na rgyal khyod thos cad mkhyer ba nad // lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsolang ba// sems 'gro bgyi ba ga 'tshal bas// kun nas nyon mongs shes byas zhes// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis
117b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// des khyed 'jig rten mchod rten lags// lha'i bu'on mongs mthong nas gas yod pa// kun nas nyon mongs spyad pagyi nga // kun nas nyon mongs ma 'chas na// dam pa'i chos ni shes myi nus// nga skang ba bar gshegs pas gsungs// ga'i bu srin
117b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong gis gas yod pa// sdig pa rnas la bsten byas kyang // dga' ba myi 'grib gang smra ba// dani thar chos skal myed ces/ dang gnyis rab pa khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu gdul bar byas pas gas mang pa// chags pa gdus par gang 'dod pa// zhe
117b8(dkon brtsegs): mug btur 'dod pas/ thub pa'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba des bur nin tan dgyi/ khru'i bu kun nas nyon mangs pa dag pas gso song ba// dag da gnanas nyan mangs pa/ myim mas ga nas myigs pa ga dag ston pa sangs rgyas sbyin/ dgang drang srong ma
118a1(dkon brtsegs): ga gis gsungs// lha'i bu thar pa la brtson pas gsol pa// nyon mongs 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos// rgyal ba 'as ni gang bstand pa// de bsten nyon mongs myi zad ces// khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis// lha'i bu tha rad pa la mngon par phyogs pas gsol pa/ 
118a2(dkon brtsegs): chos gang nyen mongs gang gi nas// zad gyur thub pas bstend pa la// yang dag brtson byas myi zad ces// rgol 'di na yong myi dmyigs// lha'i bu rnal 'byor la brtson pas gsoyod pa// rgyal po khyod kyis nyan thos la// gang gis don du chos bstand pa// de brtson bgyis
118a3(dkon brtsegs): pas myi 'thob ces/ 'di la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu myi 'jigs dpal gis gsol pa// 'dod chags spang phyir mi sdug pa// bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis na// 'dod chags zad par myi 'gyur zhes// khyed la rgol ba yong ma mchis// lha'i bu 'gro ba myed par
118a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes kyis gsol pa// shi nad du bsnyengs pa myi mnga'o ni/ zhe sdang sngangs phyir byas gsungs pa// de sbubs sel bar myi 'gyur zhes// dag 'joms khyed la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu myig rnam par dag gis gsol pa// shes rab gti mug spang ba'i phyir
118a5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa de la bsten bgyis kyang // gti mug sel bar myi 'gyur zhes// 'di na khyod/ de la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa dag gis gsol pa/ shes rab gti mug spang ba'i phyir// gsungs pa de la bstend bgyis kyang / 
118a6(dkon brtsegs): gti mugasal bar myi 'gyur zhes ka 'din khyod la nol ma mchis// lha'i bu rnam rtog pa 'joms kyis gsol ba / rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen bo na// dbugs dbyung rdul pa dran pa gsungs pa// del brtson bcos
118a7(dkon brtsegs): myi zhi zhes// 'di na khyod la rgos ma mchis// lha'i bu mtshan ma myed pa lhur len pas gsod pa// nga'o sna pa spang slad du// stong pa nyid khyod kyis bka' bsumad te// des ni de ni myi 'gyur zhes// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu nga'o snyam pa'i ngargyal
118a8(dkon brtsegs): spangs gis gselang ba kang ste nga rgyal spang slad du// mtshan ma myed pa khyod kyis gsungs// bsnyen kyang zhi bar myi 'gyur zhes// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu sems rgyun rnam par dag pas gsolang ba// lhag pa'i bas pa dag po yi// nyon rje
118b1(dkon brtsegs): zas cad 'dzig par 'gyur// des ni nyon mangs myi zad ces// 'di ma khyong la rgol ma mchis / ka/ lha'i bu 'du shes rnam par bshig gis gsoyod pa// phyogs dang gnyen po rnam pa dang / nyon mongs las dang la 'jug la// 'jigs pa myed par rgol pa ni/ u
118b2(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po ma mthong ngo // lha'i bu tha snyad shinang du sel bas gso yod pa// bcom ldan phyogs dang phyogs myin dang / zad dang ma zad tha snyad tsam // 'jigs pa ma mchis rgol bgyid pa// thub pa de ni mying tsam mo// lha'i bu lus kyi las dul bas gsol pa// 
118b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyend pas ye su mkhyend 'gyur nas// khyod kyi sku'i 'phrin las 'jug/ thams cad ma lus mkhyen pas na// des na thams cad mkhyend// lha'i bu lus kyi las yongs su shes pas gsold pa// sems can rnas la thugs brtse bas// dpa'
118b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod sku'i 'phrin las ni// mtha' dag shi nad du nges pa las// 'jig rten 'gon la phyag kya nga 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi las shi nad du nges pas gsol pa// sku'i 'phrin las rab nyes par// lus can kun la sman slad du/ 'jig rten sgron
118b5(dkon brtsegs): ma khyod mdzad de// des na khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lha'i bu lus kyi las mtha' shinang du mthong bragaso mang pa ka/ sems can kun la sman slad du// 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni// sbyi'i 'phran las dag pa dang // legs par yong su brtags dang ldan// lha'i bu lus kyi de
118b6(dkon brtsegs): shin du mnyam par bzhag pas gsold pa// shanang du mnyam par bzhag sku dang // sku'i 'phrin las rnam dag dang // ldan par sems can bde don du// gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu tshig grub gis gsol da pa// snyan cing yon tan ldan pa dang // rtsug pa yongs/ 
118b7(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i gsung // mkhyend pas shi nang du brtags shing // 'gon po khyed ni gsung ba mdzad// lha'i bu dus su smra las gsol pa// rus su don dang ldan pa dang // don myed yongs su spangs pa'i gsung // gsung bar 'os dang blang 'os dang / 'dren pa khyod ni gsung
118b8(dkon brtsegs): ba mdzad// lha'i bu smras byed glo gros gsol da pa// dben du 'gyur ba yongs spangs te/ ka 'dum par 'gyur dang 'di 'ong ba// dben myed 'bras bu rnam par smin// sngon chad khyod kyi gsung du brjod// lha'i bu myi slu bas gsol pa// srog gi don du gang khyod kyis
119a1(dkon brtsegs): sring ba rnas su brdzun ma gsungs // de ngas khyod kyi grags pa kun// 'jig rten dag na thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu yang dag par ska bas gsosod pa// 'di kar 'gro ba zas cad kyang // sangs rgyas chos rnams bcal slad du// thub pa'i gsung
119a2(dkon brtsegs): la sdod pa ni ka yang dag gsung ba'i rgyu mthun lags// lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa// myi mchog khyod kyis bden pa'is// rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di sgrubs te// chos kyi yang dag rang bzhin yang // rkang gnyis de pa khyod kas
119a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen da// lha'i bu yang dag pa la brtul bas gsol pa// 'dus byas dag gi chos kyi rnams// yang dag ji bzhin blta ba dang // chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid kyang // myi'i dbang pos rab tu mkhyend// lha'i bu las la rtog pas gsol pa// ye shes yongasu dag pa
119a4(dkon brtsegs): ris khadag nyid dang ni gzhan dag gi sha tshig gi las kyang rab tu mkhyen// des na rgyal ba mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu yid la rtog pas gsold pa// mye'i dbang po thugs kyi las// ji snyed gang dag 'jug pa ni// dge 'gro ba thugs rjes 'jug/ 'gro phan
119a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol ba// 'gro la thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gang la khyod ni spong mdzad pa// de la thugs ni dul bar 'byung // 'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu thabs la Sha
119a6(dkon brtsegs): pas gsos banag 'gro ba'i bas pa na spyad nas// nam 'dren thugs kyi 'phrim 'jug/ thub pa'i ye shes sna tshogs ni// mkhyen bzhin kun du sa tu 'jug/ lha'i bu ying rnam par bshig gis gsoyong pa// sangs rgyas sa dang
119a7(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi las// sems can thugs rje gzigs pas 'byung // sangs rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs// rang bzhin myed pa ma khyend// lha'i bu 'das pa la mkhas pas gsol ba// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus pas gtan dag la yang / 
119a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gis gang la sngon sprad pa// sngon gi dus kyang rab tu mkhyend// lha'i bu 'das pa la rtog pas gsol pa// byang chub mchog ni tshil mdzad cing // gang du khyod kyis sngon sprad pa// sngon gi spyod pa yongs brtags nas// sangs rgyas bye ba rab tu mkhyend// 
119b1(dkon brtsegs): sti'i bu sngon gatshus phun sum chogs pas gsosong pa// lang pa bye ba grangs phyed du// gang du khyod kyis sngon spyad ba// snron gi tshul ni sh+lo sa ma gyung // khyod kyothug ming thugs myis dang // lha'i bu sngon gi bu chub la yang mu rtog pas nas song
119b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mang las byung ba'i// ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub bya ba// sangs rgyas bye ba grangs myed la// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis zhus// lha'i bu sngon gi sbyor ba las byung gis gsold pa// sngon gi sangs rgyas drung du// grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'i// 
119b3(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin pa 'dren pa'is// zhus shing skom pa mdzad par 'gyur// lha'i bu sngon gyi gnas la rtog pas gsoyod pa// 'khor ba'i nyes pa rab tu mang dang // bkur si rdza pa sna tshogs dag/ gzigs pas sems can rnaMs la stond // sem snyan nA
119b4(dkon brtsegs): bi rnams kyang 'dra / lha'i bu sngon gi dus ni 'brel bas gsol ba// gzhan nga gzhan dag zos shing 'tshal// rtse zhing rab tu dga' ba bgyid// gan rnyed pa myi bzang bgyid pas dag/ gzhan dang gzhan yang khyin gyis gzigs/ 
119b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sngon gi spyod pas yang dag par 'byung bas gsolang pa// thas cad mkhyen dpa 'go rtogs pa// khyod kyi ye shes 'das dus kyi// las dang bsam rte na snyems 'jug dang // 'gro ba rnaMs la thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha'
119b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas gsol pa// 'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyend pa ni// ma 'ongs dus kyi 'chi 'pho dang // skye dang las kyi rnam smin dang // thogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis so// lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i spyod yul gis gsold pa// brtan pa 'go ba mkhas khyod kyi
119b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyend pa'i phyi dus sems can gi// bas dang las kyi 'bras bu dang // 'gro ba thus la thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu srid pa las bskyod kyis gsol da pa// khas rnams gsum po 'di dag dang // dus gsum kun la mkhas khyod kyi// ye shes mchog ni
119b8(dkon brtsegs): myi chags te// srid pa'i spyod yul khyod kyis me khyend// lha'i bu tha snyad la spyod pas gsold pa// las dang sems can 'gro ba dang // rna bar smin pa myong ba dag/ deg thos cang mying tsam du// rkang gnyis dam pa bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu da ltar
120a1(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba la yang dag par rtog pas gas sod pa// dpa' grobyad kyis mkhyend pa ni// da ltar byung la thogs ma mchis// grangs skyed sangs rgyas zhing nas ni// 'jig rten 'gon por rab dum khyed // kwa'i bu daltar byung ba la na bar spod
120a2(dkon brtsegs): pas gso lang bkar mye'i dbartswa po rnam spyad nas// byis pa'i blo gros rmongs bgyid pa// dus gsu dngos po ma mchis par// nyes par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs// lha'i bu myi gnas pa'i glo gros kyis gsol pa// dus gsum gnas pa mchis
120a3(dkon brtsegs): shing / ngo bo nyid la myi gnas po teg/ dngos pa thams cad dngos myed par// na par 'dren pa khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu dus gsum mngon par bskul bas gas yong ba// 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs drung // da ltar byung ba'i phung po rnams// ma mchi
120a4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po ma mchis par/ skyes bu dam pa bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu cha gas myed yid kyis gsosod pa// dus gsum sems can thas cad la snying po mchis par ma bstan te sa sgyu ma smrig rgya myig yor dang // drag cas
120a5(dkon brtsegs): bur khyod kyis bstan da/ lho'i bu dus gsum dpogs kyis gas yong // 'dren pa khyed kyi mkhyen pa ni// dus gsu po dag kun du spang // sgyu maH/ bur mkhyen pas na// khyod kyi dbang po chags myi mngar// lha'i bu mes pa so
120a6(dkon brtsegs): rig par byed kyis gas 'ad pa ste/ gang gi nub mo dpa' khyod kyis// byang chub mngon du bgyis gyur pa// de dus tshul can mos pa la// dri gakar gyur par yongs myi gda'// lha'i bu mos pa yang dag thob kyis gsusad pa// 'jig rten sno ni
120a7(dkon brtsegs): mos pa ni// rab tu rgyun chad myi 'gyur te// rtag par khyod kyi mos pa des// khyed kyi sus nas mas pa che// lha'i bu mos pas mngon par 'phags kas gsosong pa// chamams pa dam ji bzhin du// 'din mos pas mdzod dru bags// 'ang
120a8(dkon brtsegs): rten dag gis myi gos te// pad mar chab kyis ji bzhin no// lha'i bu mos pas yongs su grol gis gsold pa// 'jig rten 'gon dang mes pa ni// chos kyi dbyings shes brjod pa ste// gnyis myed gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ su dra ba myed pa
120b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gzigs ka lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsoyod pa// gzi brjed chen po brtson 'grus kyis// byang chub yang dag brnyes par 'gyur// mdzad pa mdzad kyang 'gon po khyod// brtson 'grus btang ba yong ma mdzod/ ka/ lha'i rdza dza rlang ba
120b2(dkon brtsegs): dran sum chogs pas gsasang pa gathams cad kun du rjes su 'jun// mdzad pa mang kyang 'gon po khyod// dgangs pa bri ba song ma mchis// sku'i busems mnyas par bzhag pas zhas yong pa// shin po rtog tu mnyam thorgyan snron namams cad
120b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen// 'idren pa spyod pa'i dbang gis ni ka/ sems can rnams la chos kyang stond // lha'i bu shes rab lhur len gis gsoyod pa// 'jig rten sgron mor gyur khyod kyi// ye shes rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma ni// skal pa bye bar brjod bkyis
120b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang / sangs rgyas zlas kyis brjod myi spyod// lha'i bu rnam par grol ba la mkhas pas gsold pa// rna bar gel dang ma grol ba// gang slad khyod kyis ma brnyes pas// mtshungs pa myed pa khyod la ni// nam grol yongasu nyams myi mnga'// lha'i bu rna par
120b5(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i ye shes la brtson pas gsayang ba// thub pa khyod ni nam glog nas// ngo bo nyid myed mkhyen pas na// na grol ye shes gzigs pas ni// yang dag mkhyen pa nyams myi myanga'// lha'i bu sngon gi srid pa rnam par srung
120b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsoyod pa// mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du// dpa' bo yang dag gzigs gzigs khyod kyi// spyod la 'khrul pa myi mnga' ste/ des na sangs rgyas lagadzas shes stod// lha'i bu zab mo la spyod pas gsol pa// srog chags gzhan
120b7(dkon brtsegs): dgra ci bzhin du// ba de gshegs khyod la mchos myi mngar/ chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen pas na// rang bzhin dum mongs myi mnga'// lha'i bu blo zas sangs pas byas myong ba na thams cad mkhyenang po khyed la ni// rnam pa kun tu bsnyem myi ma par// na
120b8(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa nyer bzhag pas / grub pa 'bru mar snod dang 'dra// lha'i bu sems g.yeng ba myed pas gsoso nga // jig rten ston ma khyod sa ni// mnyam par ma banagasas myi ma nga / ma 'a sa sangs rgyas chos kyi nas/ sreg chags kun gyis shes par
121a1(dkon brtsegs): ga gsu bu shes par tu das kyis pa yong pa 'de bar gshegs pa khyod pa ni ma gags pa snyoms phyimams// 'i dbang pos pa rgyas chos ma 'dres pa ni bsas kyi byag/ lha'i bu po thos cad dri rten gas gsas pa// 
121a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes su byung mchog khyod la ni/ 'jig rten gsun mtshungs ma mchis// zas cad mkhyen pa ma pham pa/ khyod kyis chos nas thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu snying po blangs pas gsamad pa// sems cad thas cad snying po bla na myed// ches rnaMs kun la 'ag
121a3(dkon brtsegs): ma ga sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam bsnyems pa// sangs rgyas byang chub phyag 'tshala'o// gnas gtsang ma'i le'u ste/ nyi shu bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang kun tutu
121a4(dkon brtsegs): byag khri mam yini dang ma rji nga/ 'i drim dang / rgyal bus dag ni ba dang nod sbyin dang / m+b+hi mchi dang / 'bre ldan rlung gi man dang / rgyam can shi ris pa / su surtsa ga la 'a 'thun dang / 'a
121a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / 'od gsal dang / dge' rgyas dang 'bras bu che ba'i lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos// gnas gtsang ma ros kyi lha dag gis smong pa brjid pa yang thos nas
121a6(dkon brtsegs): ngomatshar theb par 'gyur te// chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa 'di thos nas// 'di ltar sngan cang ma thos pa'i nos kyi chul thos pas na med gnyis su gyur pa/ nem nu dang thetsam za bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
121a7(dkon brtsegs): kye ko'u ta ma sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos bstand pa 'di thos nas/ bdag cag kun tu rgyu'i gnas kyang myi 'tshal/ khyim gi gnas kyang mi 'tshal bar gyur cing / 'di ltar sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas// chos 'di la no me nur dang the tsom
121a8(dkon brtsegs): du gyur te// sems dang par yang ma gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge' sbyong ko'u ta ma khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal yid ches pa mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na// 'di ltar dge' sbyong ko'u tam khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de/ 
121b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'brub mngon par 'du bya ba dzi lta bu mngon par mdzad de/ bdag cag gis lha'i 'khor rgya chen po 'di dang / thas cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bas cher garu tam khyed kyis legs par gsungs// pa 'jas cing yid phas par 'gyur ba mthong / des napa
121b2(dkon brtsegs): cag dga' sbyong ko'u ta ma khyod la dad pa mchis par gyur to// kye ko'u ta ma gang 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnaMs kyis chos thas cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes smras pa de la// ji ltar chos thos cad de bzhin gshegs pa ste du bdag cag the tsom cher 'tshal/ 
121b3(dkon brtsegs): dge' sbyong ko'u ta ma khyod ni ji nas bdag cag legs par bshad pa'i don de rtogs nas/ mun pa myed par gyur te// snyan 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag la chos ston spyod do// swA ste bdag cag dge' sbyong ko'u tam khyod la de ltar mngon par dad par gyur
121b4(dkon brtsegs): to// de skad ces gsolang ba dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang // kun tu rgya rnams 'di skad ces bka' bsul to// na du rgyu dag de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris// khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan tho
121b5(dkon brtsegs): shig/ dge' skyong koT ta ma legs so zhes legs te// kun du rgyu de dag tsu ljon 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis deg la 'di skad ces bka' ba sumang to// kun tu rgyu dag khyod kyis ji ltar mngal du 'jug pa shes
121b6(dkon brtsegs): sa/ deg gis gsosod pa / ke ko'u ta ma bdag cag gis bstan chos las thos na// gsum 'dus nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te// gang 'di pa dang ma gnyis kyang 'tshogs pa dang / chags par yang 'gyur ba dang / chags nas kyang 'dod pa'i rna bar rto
121b7(dkon brtsegs): brnaMs kyis rnam par brtags pas/ 'dod chags kyang byung ba de'i tshe/ mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal ba/ kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snya du sems/ pha dang ma gnyis rnam par rtog pa che/ 'dod chags de ma'i sems
121b8(dkon brtsegs): las byung nge gsoyod pa ta kye ko'u ta ma ma lag so// ma'i rna bar rtog pa las byung ngo / ke ko'u ta ma ma lags so// de pha'i sems las byung ngam/ kye ko'u ta ma ma lag so// pha'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngo / kye ko'u ta ma ma lagaso// kun du rgyu dag 'di la jis
122a1(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa de ma'i mangs du zhugs so/ ke ko'u tam de ni ma lags so// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snya du sems// pa'i sems gang yin pa de ma'i mangs du zhugs sam/ kye ko'u ta ma de ni ma lags so// du/ 
122a2(dkon brtsegs): du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ pa'i kun du brtag pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam// kye ko'u ta ma de ni ma lagaso// kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snye du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de lha las shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs so/ kye ko 'u ta ma de ni ma
122a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal to// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snye du sems/ mngal na gnas pa dang myi dang lha ma yin dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'go'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te/ mngal du zhugs sam/ kye ko'u ta ma 'tshal to// kun tu rgyu
122a4(dkon brtsegs): dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de gzugs yod pa 'am/ gzugs myed pa zhig ma'i mngal du zhugs/ kye ko'u ta ma ma 'tshal to// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snya du sems/ gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnas
122a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs sam// kye ko'u ta ma 'tshal to// de skad ce sa gselod pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal da pa// kun tu rgyu dag chos 'di ni zab
122a6(dkon brtsegs): cing 'dra ste/ mkhas pa shes pa blo dang ldan pas rig par bya ba yin te/ brtag tu myed cing brtag pa'i yul ma yin la/ lta dka' zhing shes par dka' bas// de ni khyod yun ring por gzhan du bltas pa/ gzhan du mos pa gzhan du dad pa gzhan du brtson pa/ 
122a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du lta ba'i gnas la gnas pa rnaMs kyis bar myi nus mod kyi/ kun tu rgyu dag 'on kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i dge' ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ chos zab mo rnams myig skye bar 'gyur te/ kun du rgyu dge 'od la
122a8(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na/ myig gi dbang po nyams pa ni/ de'i tshul dang 'dra ba'i gsor ba byed pa dge' ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na/ tshe 'di nyid la myig yong su dag par 'gyur te/ myig des kyang tshe 'di nyid la gzugs nas mthong bar 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu dag de
122b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sa kyi bu rigs kyi bu ma shes rab kyi gnyams par gyur pas kyang tshul dang 'drang bdaga' ba'i bags nyen pa ban / gas rab kyi kyi ga rnam par dag par 'gyur / des kyang chos rab mornams mthong por 'gyur ro// 
122b2(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu khyod kyang yun ring po nas gzhan du ltas/ sngon log pa'i bdes pa gang gis bslus pa/ chos ma yin pa la chos 'du shes pa/ tha rad pa ma yin pa la tha ra par 'du shes pa/ 'byung ba ma yin pa la 'byung bar 'du shes pa/ chud zos pa
122b3(dkon brtsegs): nas kyis chung bsan pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na long ba'i dmyigs bu long bas byas nas/ gang 'di 'gro ba dang khrid pa de gnyi ga yang tshul ma yin par sdug sngal thob par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// kun du rgyu dag de bzhin du/ 
122b4(dkon brtsegs): dge' stong ngam bri ze gang la la ston pa ma yin par bdag cag ni ston yin no zhes khas che ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par bdag cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no zhes khas che ba dang / 'byung ba la
122b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa ma yin par bdag cag ni 'byung ba la mkhas pa'o zhes khas 'tshe ba dang / 'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par bdag cag ni 'byung ba mthong ba yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang / mu stegs byed pa ma yin par bdag cag
122b6(dkon brtsegs): nI mu stegs byed pa yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/ deg ston pa ma yin par ston pa'o zhes khas 'che zhing gang 'dzin de rjes su stonang pa de ni log par rjes su ston par 'gyur/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par
122b7(dkon brtsegs): gang khong du chud par byed pa de ni// log par khong du chud par byed par 'gyur/ gang 'byung ba la mkhas pa ma yin par gang 'byin pa de ni log par 'byin par 'gyur// 'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par/ gang 'byung ba stond pa de ni log par ston par ston
122b8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ mu stegs byed par ma yin par/ gang sgrol ba de ni log par 'gyur te/ deg ni tshul ma yin par sdug sngal thob par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag 'di lta ste/ dper na ba glang rdzi rab ka la mkhas pa yin pas rab ka ma yin par ba glang
123a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgral na/ de'i ba glang dag gis pha rol dang tshu rol gyi 'gre ma rnyed nas/ 'khyil te de nyid du tshul ma yin par sdug sAl thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ba glang rdzi de rab ka la myi mkhas pa'i phyir ro// kun du rgyu dag
123a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du/ gang la la mu stegs byed pa ma yin par mu stegs byed par khas 'che zhing gang sgrol ba de ni tshul ma yin par sdug sngal thob par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag nga ni ston pa nyid yin la ston par khas 'che bas nga gang rjes su ston pa de
123a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag rjes su ston pa yin/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid yin la/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su las 'che bas nga gang khong du chung bar byed pa de/ yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa yin/ 'byung ba la mkhas pa nyid
123a4(dkon brtsegs): yin lag 'byung ba la mkhas par khas 'che bas nga gang 'byin pa dag yang dag par 'byin pa 'byung ba mthong ba nyid yin la/ 'byung ba ston par khas 'che bas/ nga gang 'byung ba ston pa de yang dag par stond pa yin/ mu stegs byed pa nyid yin la mu
123a5(dkon brtsegs): stegs byed par khas 'che bas nga gang sgrol ba de yang yang dag par sgrol ba yi na te/ ston pa'i chos rab tu shes nas ni rjes su ston // sangs rgyanas kyi chos rab du shes nas ni/ khong du chud par byed/ 'byung ba rab tu shes nas ni
123a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byin/ yang dag par mthong nas ni ston/ mu stegs rab du shes nas ni sgros te/ gang sprul ba de yang mu stegs bde bas rab tu spros ma yin no// 'di lta ste kun du rgyu dag khyed kyang thar pa 'dod pa yin la nga yang ston pa mngon du zhugs pa yin
123a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa/ 'byung ba phun su chog pa 'byung ba mthong ba/ yang dag pa'i mu stegs byed pa yin gis/ de'i phyir rna ba lhogs te/ mos pa skyed la/ dran pa nye bar zhog ste/ yod 'dun par gis la/ mthom
123a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnas thob par bya ba dang / sngon ma phyin pa'i lam du 'gro bar bya ba dang / sngon ma song ba'i phyog su 'gro bar bya ba dang // sngon ma 'grogs pa'i lam grogs dang / 'grogs par bya ba dang / sngon ma btsal ba'i lam btsal bar bya dang / sngon ma thob pa'i chos kyi
123b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdzod thob par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus yang dag par rtsom shig/ kun du rgyu dag chos gsum mngon du gyur pas mngal du 'jug ces gang smra ba de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rna grangs 'di khyed
123b2(dkon brtsegs): langs bshad do// kun tu rgyu dag de la ma zhes gang smra ba de ni sngon gi las bstsags pa'i rkyen du gsus so// pa zhes bya ba de ni sngon go wa gsugs pa'i rgyur gsungs so// dri za zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa las kyis 'phags pa'i tshig bla dgas so// mer
123b3(dkon brtsegs): mer po zhes bya ba de ni lam gyis 'phags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang gzhi'o// ma'i mngal zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa las kyis 'phags pa'i gzhi ste/ 'di ltar ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni skye ba dang 'phel ba dang / 
123b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po la gnas nas rtsa dang shing gel pa dang / sman nag 'tshal dag skye zhing 'phel ba dang rgyas pa ra 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ma'i mngag na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa yang skye bad
123b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro// 'phel nas skye bar 'gyur ro// bcas na sa rnam par 'phel lo// 'phel nas spyod pa snang bar gyur te/ 'gro ba gang dang gang nas de dang der skyes par dag dang 'dra ba'i spyod pa deg der spyod par
123b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ deg kyang mkhas pas shes par bya ba yinini/ glen pas ni ma yin no// yun ring po nas 'grogs pas shes par byab yin ga/ yun thung ngus ma yin no// yang dag par sems pas shes par bya ba yin gi// myi brtson pas ma yin no// kun tu
123b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas 'chi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags mkhas pas shes par bya ba ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste skad sha sha po yon/ skad gyo rum gi sgra lta bu yin/ skad rtags dgos pa yin/ skad che ba yin/ skad ltang lhung po yin rta/ 
123b8(dkon brtsegs): du sdang ba yin/ rtag du bdar ba yin/ rtag du spu zing zhes/ rmyi lam na me'i phung po 'bar ba mthong ba yin/ ri rgyug par mthong ba yin/ me mngag 'bar bar mthong ba yin/ lugs zangs kyi nang du btso bar mthong ba yin/ lag na dbyig pa thohA
124a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i myi dag mthong ba yin/ srin po dag gis bdag 'phang bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid gson por bsal shing gis gzugs par mthong ba yin// khyi dag gis bdag dbang bar mthong ba yin// khyi dag gis bdag bskor bar
124a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid glang po che dang sbrul gis brtses par mthong ba yin/ phyogs pazhir bros na phyogs myi shes pa yin/ sems can kun la yid myi rton pa yin te/ kun du rgyu dag rnam pa nyi shu po dag gis sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos na
124a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zag du rig par bya'o// kun tu rgyu dag de la dud 'a gre'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste dper na rmugs shing gnyid che ba yin/ le lo che ba yin/ mang du za ba yin/ sa la 'dud pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa bye
124a4(dkon brtsegs): b+hu ba yin/ myi gsol ba smra ba yin/ glen pa la dga' ba yin/ mun pa la dga' ba yin/ 'dam rdzab la dga' ba yin/ yang dag yang sos rtsa gcod pa yin/ rgyun du rkang pa'i 'the bos sa rko ba yin/ yang dang yang 'go la bral ma 'du ba yin/ yang dang yang
124a5(dkon brtsegs): nam 'kha' la sos 'debs pa yin/ kun tu skus te nyal ba yin/ sa la nyal ba yi/ na/ myi rtsang bas myi 'dogs pa yin/ yang dang yang nam mkha' la snom/ dpa yin/ yang dang yang ma smin pa za ba yin/ gzhan du smra ba zhing gzhan du byed de g.yo
124a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin/ rab tu spyod pa yin/ rmi lam na 'di rdzab gis gos pa rmib yin / m+b+hi lan bdag gnas su song ste bca' ba za bar sgrib yin/ sbrul gdug pas bdag skor bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid khrod du zhugs par mthong ba yi nan kus
124a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dag deg la bstsogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma rna ba du ma shes par bya ste/ deg ni skal pa 'am/ skal pa las lhag par brjod kyang zad par myi nus so// kun du rgyu dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos sde
124a8(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gi mtshan ma ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste bkra ser ba yin/ mig wa'i myig lta bu yin/ rtag par bkres pa yin/ rtag tu skom pa yin/ ser sna ba yin/ 'dod pa che ba yin/ thob pa myi rnyed pa yin/ gzhan gi la re ba yin/ 'gro ba yin/ myig dmar
124b1(dkon brtsegs): yin bza' ba thas cing sred pa yin / bdog pa thas cad la chags pa yin/ sbyin ma'i gnas dag mthong bar myi 'dod pa yin/ dngos po kun la yang de gu ba'i sos yod pa yin/ dngos po ngan pa nas pa yang dga' ba yin/ 'thab pa la mos pa yi/ 
124b2(dkon brtsegs): zas skom myi gtsang ba la dga' ba yin/ gzhan gi phun sum tshogs pa la 'phro dog byed pa yin/ gzhan gi long spyod la sred pa skyed pa yin/ gzhan gi long spyod gang yin pa dag bdag gi sA du sems pa yin/ zas gtor na sems myi dga' ba yin/ 
124b3(dkon brtsegs): tshong dus kyi srang dag nas kyang shing tog len pa yin te/ kun du rgyu dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags gi bye brag ni reg las bstsogs pa mtha' yas par shes par bya'o// kun du rgyu dag de la lha ma yin pas
124b4(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste khyengs pa yin/ 'thab dgol che ba yin/ 'khon du 'dzind pa yin/ nga rgyal che ba yin/ lus che ba yin/ myig che ba yin/ myig kar ba yin/ mche ba snang ba yin
124b5(dkon brtsegs): mthu dang ldan pa yin/ 'thab mo'i blo can yin/ dbyen la dga' ba yin/ bya ba thas cad la nga rgyal che ba yin/ so snang ba yin/ 'jig rten thas cad la brnyes pa'i 'du shes can yon/ mtshon mno ba yin/ tshigan pa yin/ bdag gzeng stong pa
124b6(dkon brtsegs): can yin/ myi shes pa'i stobs can yin/ nyon mongs pa'i stobs can yon te/ kun du rgyu dag las bstsogs pa ni/ lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan mar shes par bya'o// kun du rgyu dag de la myi las shi 'das pa'i gang
124b7(dkon brtsegs): zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa can yin/ 'phags pa dang stend pa yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa la smod pa yin/ dge' ba byed pa yin// mngon rtags 'dod pa yin/ grags pa 'dod pa yin/ snyan
124b8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dod pa yin// bzo la dga' ba yin/ shes pa la dga' ba yin/ nyon mongs pa tsun yin/ khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa yin/ rigs kyi bu tshul phun sum tshogs pa yin/ byas pa bze ba yin/ mdza' bo la gdu ba yin// yong su gtong
125a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa yan bye brag shes pa yin byas dang ma byas pa la rtag pa yin// tshig gi mthu yod pa yin/ dros bzung bar bya ba'i mthu yod pa yin/ 'dum par bya ba dang 'thab mo bya ba dang 'thab mo bya ba mngon par mkhas pa na
125a2(dkon brtsegs): pho nya nus pa yin pa skad thos cad 'dzin pa'i mthu yod pa yin// gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mngon par shes pa yin te/ kun du rgyu dag dag las bstsogs pa ni myi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags yin no// kun du rgyu dag de la lha las
125a3(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste mdzes pa yon/ gtsang sbra che ba yin/ 'phel ba dga' ba yin/ spos la dga' ba yin/ gdug pa la dga' ba yin/ klu len pa ni ngang tshul can yin/ byug pa la dga' ba yon/ 
125a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dong po'i yon tan ngan ngon gis myi mgu zhing / rgya chen pos dga' ba yin/ rol mo'i sgra thas cad dga' ba yin/ klu thams cad la dga' ba yin/ skye bo rgya chen po dang 'gegs pa dga' ba yin/ khang pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa
125a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim dang longs spyod rgya chen dga' ba yin/ de'i sems byis pa sngon du 'gro ba yin/ dgod pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ 'jam par smra ba yin/ da 'a ba la mkhas pa yin/ rgyan la dga' ba yin/ tsha ba'i ngang tshul can yin// 'gro
125a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ngang tshul can yin/ lus kyi shugs 'byin pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ chags pa'i mtshan ma dang / myi chags pa'i mtshan ma shes pa yin/ phan par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kun du rgyu dag mtshan ma dag las bstsogs pas/ mtho' ras
125a7(dkon brtsegs): nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag du shes par bya'o// kun du rgyu dag de la mtshan ma deg las yang dag par 'dra bar bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis dge' ba'i bshes nyen gang dag las 'dra ba'i phyir/ ches ston par byed pa de ltar
125a8(dkon brtsegs): bu'i dge' ba'i bshes nyen rnaMs la bstend par bya/ bsnyen pa bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon myir gyur pa'i tshe/ zhe sdang la yong su bsten pas des zhe sdang las mngon par 'du byas pas/ 
125b1(dkon brtsegs): delas des sems can dmyal bar skyes te/ de'i phyir de sems can dumyal bar gnas pa rnyed nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de'i nang du skyes te spyod pa'i rtags 'di dag thos na/ bdag ni sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos
125b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'o zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing des sems can dmyal ba'i las kyi rgyu spang ba'i phyir/ dge' ba'i bshes nyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge' ba'i bshes nyen deg zhe sdang gi gnyen por byas pa ston to// byis pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub
125b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyogs chos rnams dang / byis pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond to// des kyang de'i zhe sdang gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur te/ de byas pa chen po bsgoms pas/ pha rol du phyind pa drug po thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur
125b4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rgyu de dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis sngon myir gyur pa'i tshe/ gti mug la yongs su bsten pas/ des gti mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas/ de las des dud 'gro'i gnas su skyes te/ de'i phyir de
125b5(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas pa rnyed nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod ba can du gyu rang bas/ de dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa can du gyur da bas/ de dad 'ga'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te/ myi'i nang du skyes kyang dung 'gro'i gnas kyi
125b6(dkon brtsegs): snang ba dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ ngas spyod pa dag gis dag ni dud 'dra'i skye nas nas shi 'bas nas / rgya'i nang du skyes so zhes bdag nyid kyi zhes pa/ bla zhing / de dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi las dag las yang dag par 'ad bar bya ba gyi
125b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i yin sa nyin pa la bar bya/ da sa dga' ba'i bshes nyin na/ ti grogasas pa gyid// sa pa dres par byang ba ston / kya ri drug gi sanas nyam song bar 'gyur ro// nga gapar kyi pha rob tu na pa dus gsum mnyam
125b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid ston to// des de gti mug de ni rang bzhin myed pa'o zhes bya bar shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro// yang na dal chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ston te/ des re shes rab kyi pha romod tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
126a1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rgyu de las gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon myir gyur pa'i tshe/ ser sna la kun tu bsten cing sgoms te/ mang dus pas des ser sna dang ldan pa chags pa las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas de las/ 
126a2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten nu gnas pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ dge gshin rje'i 'jig rten
126a3(dkon brtsegs): nas shi 'phos te/ myi'i nang du skyes kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten spyod pa deg nyid spyod par gyur to// des spyod pa dag gis bdag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / de spyod pa deg las yang blar
126a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir/ dga' ba'i bshes nyen btsal bya ste/ de la dgo' ba'i ba shes nyen dag ser+ya spang ba'i phyir gtong ba stond to// des kyang de'i ser sA'i bag la nyal spong bar 'gyu ro// yang ni de la gtong ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi
126a5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi chos rnams stond/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stonang to// de snyoms bas pa re sad du phyind pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de la lha ma yin las shi 'phes pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon myir gyur pa'i tshe dge
126a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnab rgya chen po dag kyang / mngon par 'du byas lanang rgyal la yang ma su bstend pas/ deng byas dang ldan pa'i las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / bsdogs pa byas pa dang / blangs pa des su ma yin du skyes ste/ lha ma yin ni nang na gnas
126a7(dkon brtsegs): bas snga ma yin gyi spyod pa can du gyur dpas/ de lha ma yin nas shi 'phos te/ mye'i nang du skyes kyang / lha ma yon gi spyong par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa dag gis bdag ni lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes 'dra byang zhing des spyod pa de/ 
126a8(dkon brtsegs): yang ga par dab phyir dge ba'i migs rten chum pa ba de/ de sa da' ba'i rigs rten / dag rgyal gang ba dang / darigs pa'i rgyas gnos par phyir bya ma che rnams snyed to/ da ga dang rgyam thong ba gyur ro san de das
126b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid stonod te/ dasun de'i dargyal gi bag la nyas spong ba dang / bdes rnam par 'jigs par 'gyur ro// yang na ji ltar bya ba sgyur ba rnams tshogs pa las byung ba'i tshul ston te/ des de'i nga rgyal gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro// yang des chos rnams kyi man
126b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid gcig pa stond te/ deg de'i shes rab kyi pha ro song du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing de bsgoms pa thos cang mkhyend pa nyid du sgrub par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de la myi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon myor 'gyur ba'i che'ang / 
126b3(dkon brtsegs): oM del ba 'acu'i las kyi sa la kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du nus pas gdes las de byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pas myor skyes te/ de myi'i nang na gnas pa des/ myi'i spyod pa can du 'gyu
126b4(dkon brtsegs): las de myi'i nang nas shi 'phos te/ myi'i nang du skyes kyang / myi'i spyod pa de gnyid spyod par 'gyur te/ de spyod pa dag gis bdag ni myi'i nang nas ni 'phos pa'o// zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des myi'i spyod pa dag las yang dag pa
126b5(dkon brtsegs): 'daba'abya ba'i phyir/ dge' ba'i ba shes nyen bcal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes nyen dag myi rtag pa'i 'du shes stonang to// des kyang de spyod pa bags nyam dang bcas par spong bar 'gyuraro// yang na des 'khor ba'i tshe
126b6(dkon brtsegs): ldags pa dang / bya nams 'das pa'i sngags pa ston te/ des de lakhor/ la myi dga' zhing / mya ngan lapa 'ang ba don du gtor bar 'gyur ro/ yang nid ma pa sa sbyin pa drug stod to// de thos pas than myed pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i
126b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang chu du sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// des thabs mkhas pa yang stond te/ des do pa sod tu na pa drug pa dog shin tu bzung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen nyid kyang myurang du thong bar 'gyuraro/ kun tu tu dag dal mtha ris nas pa 'bras pa'i
126b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dgas dur phyir gyur pa'i rims par spyod pa 'og tu drung gsung pa dang phyin pa tu rung byon pa dang / nas chog tu rung gi yus pas mas la ba dang / grags pa dang / 'di 'am pa dang / 
127a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byas pa dang bras bas ma'i na du skyes te/ desa'i nan das pa des pa'i spyod pacan du 'gyur bas / de gA'i das gi 'phos te/ myi'i nang du skyes kyang na spyod pa deg nying spyod bar 'gyur te/ sa stod pa dgagis pa dan ni 'i
127a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa spyod pa'i yo na rjod do// chog du min spyon pa dod nga reg tu babyed pa spyon pa galas pa bgrong / na tu na sa chubarmongs pa rnyed cing jog du la ni babyed pa'i chul khrims sa brtags papa rgya
127a3(dkon brtsegs): wA des de'i phyir tshul khrims dang brtus zhugs mchog du 'dzind pa bag la nyal dang zus par spong bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la tshul khrims kyi pha rab tu na dag stond te/ de bsgoms par pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
127a4(dkon brtsegs): ras bas mkhas pa yang ston te/ de dang ldan pas myur du byas cangs can mthong dus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun du byudag dal sems ban dmyal ba nas shi 'bas pa'i gang cag gis ni dga' 'a'i tha zhes nyes
127a5(dkon brtsegs): brten te dus gsumanyam pa nyid mnyam par bya'o// thos nas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ste/ gong dang gong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na dge' slong dang dge' slong ma dang / dge' bsnyen dang dge'
127a6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen ma dag 'khor bzhi po mang po yod pa dag tu gnas par bya zhing / de dag dang 'gro bar bya ste/ des 'gro bar po byas te/ goms pa rjes su 'gro bas chos thas cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid zhes dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mngon du 'gyur ro// 
127a7(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu dag de la dud 'go'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag ni dge' ba'i bshes nyen la brten te/ gti mug gi gnyen por stan bcos la 'khas pa'i skye bo dang / lhan cig dga' bar gnas par bya'o// des de'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur te/ des
127b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan bcos de dang bstan bcos shes pa deg rang bzhin gis yang dag par brtag par bya'o// de'i phyir de la stan chos dang bstan bcos shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin myed de zhes bya bar snang bar 'gyur te/ des de la dus gsum pa mnyam nyid mngon du 'gyur zhing
127b2(dkon brtsegs): myurang du zas cad mkhyend pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni gang la brten na de'i sbyin pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis de la dus gsu mnyam nyid dang / gang 'di man
127b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig par mngon du 'gyur ba dang / de bsgoms pas myu rang du thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge' ba'i bshes nyon la brten par bya/ yon tan la bstend par bya'o// 
127b4(dkon brtsegs): ma po bcu gnyis pa'o// kun tu rgyu dag de la lA ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni ge' ba'i bshes nyen la brten te/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang 'thab par bya'o// 'di lta
127b5(dkon brtsegs): stede rgyal zhes bya ba'i chos gang shig de ni ji zhig gis yongasu bzung / de ni su la sa kun nas langs/ su zhig de spong bar byed// ces yang dag par bcal na/ nga rgyal de myi dmyigs so// gang gis de yongasu bzung ba dang / gang la de kun nas
127b6(dkon brtsegs): ngas pa dang ni gang de srung ba'i phyir rol ba de yang myi dmyigs te/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin par mo su drung gu dang 'jig rten bslus par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // des chos thas cad rang bzhin myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngon pa cos gangs
127b7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// zhes bya bar shes so dngos po myed pa dang yong su ma grub bo// zhes bya bar tu shes// yong su ma grub pas myi skye ba ste/ gang mi skye ba de ni myi 'gag go// gang myi skye ba de ni bdags su byed pa'o zhes bya ba tu zhes sog dang / 
128a1(dkon brtsegs): gcad kyi chos nyid de/ chos nyid gang gis chos thams cad de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin gsheg pa yang de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ de'i phyir chos thos cad
128a2(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// kun tu rgyu dag ngas ni sngan chad dang da ltar yang 'jig rten brtags pa ni nga rgyal gi rang bzhin no// zhes bshad de/ nga rgyal gis ni myi las shi 'phos pa bdags par 'gyur ro// nga rgyal gis ni mtho'o ris nas shi 'phos pa
128a3(dkon brtsegs): bdags par 'gyur ro// dargyal gis ni sems can dmyal ba'i bar du shi 'phos pa bdags par 'gyur ro// nga rgyal myed na bdags pa myed de/ kun du rgyu dag de ni nga rgyal myed pa'i ye shes shes bya'o// de'ang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing shes rab
128a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang dge' ba'i bshes nyen gis yong su zin pas shes pa ra nuso// de nas kun tu rgyu drug khri bo dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ dag myi skye ba'i chos la bzod
128a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thob nas/ stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bas phyag 'chal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// mgon
128a6(dkon brtsegs): po ye shes stobs kyis yang dag 'phags// 'gro ba kun la gzhan gi dring myi 'jog/ 'gro ba kun la spyod pa rna gzigs te// lag pa'i 'thil du skyu ru ra bzhin du// 'jig rten lta ba'i rna ba kun du bkrugs// sprin sdug dag gis nam mkha' yog pa
128a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ka/ de dag gis ni byis pa mongs nas spyod// 'ong ba'i tshogs nas rab tu lam stor bzhin// 'jig rten rtag dang 'jig rten myi rtag dang // rtag kyang rtag la myi rta gcig mchis// rtag pa ma yon myi rtag sbyin zhes ste// glang ba'i dbang po khyim du
128a8(dkon brtsegs): brtags ltar brlag/ 'jig rten mtha' yod 'jig rten mtha' myed de// mtha' yod pa ma yin mtha' myed sbyin zhes te// dper na bya ni gsem du 'jug pa bzhin// la la dag ni lus 'di bdag ces mchi// la la dag ni lus 'di gzhan zhes mchi// 
128b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas yong su dkris te nyas bgyid de// byani bya h+yar chud nas thegs pa bzhin// kha la dag ni dbang phyug smul ces mchi// la la rgyu myed byung zhes 'dogs pa bgyod// lta ba'i na ba dag gis kun tu bkris// mkhas la gnas pa'i zla ltar rgyal bas ga'i
128b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar gseb du bcug pa'i bya rmongs pa// bu ga pu gang thar du re ba ltar// myi mkhas lha'i rna bas 'das par 'gyur ra// thar par myi 'thob rkang gnyis btags pa bzhin// tshangs dang skye dgu bdag dang skyem byed dang // gzhon dang 'khor lo 'dzin dang na zla
128b3(dkon brtsegs): buH/ phyogs dang rgya mtsho kun la phyag 'tshal te// rgyal pos mtshan mo rkun po bzung bzhin// dbul po bu lon chags nas bu lon pas bzung nas sgrom du gsol ba 'debs pa bzhin// lta ba'i rnam par gnas pa'i byis pa dag/ dbang phyug las ni bde ba
128b4(dkon brtsegs): tshol bar bgyid// rkun po'i tshogs rnams btson rar bskul ba bzhin// 'gro ba rnaMs su sdug snga la brgya myong ba// deg de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis gzigs// phyag gi 'thil na ser mo lnga dang mtshungs// de la myi dbang thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ 
128b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ma byed padang 'gro ba sbyongs da de/ blam chog ce bas 'gro 'phros no/ dpe na rgyal bos paso nas dbyeb bzhin/ 'jig rten ldan snga la ba bsam pas su gaga' ba mdzad nas byang chub mcheg pa rnyes te/ 
128b6(dkon brtsegs): rna bir sems can 'khyis mkhyen nas// dag bcings las khyod kyis grol ba mdzad// bde gshegs myi'i seng ge rkang gnyis rtse// chos tshogs gang la mnga' dbang khyod mdzad pa// lta ba'i rnam pa sgyu 'drar mongs myi mnga'// bder gshegs khyod
128b7(dkon brtsegs): ni de 'drar bdag cag 'tshal// stobs rnaMs gang gis rgyal ba stobs brnyes shing // myi 'jigs gang gir sngo ba'i grwa bsul te// 'khor gyi'i nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa// khyung mchog de ni bdag cag thob par shog// gang gyis rgyal ba 'jig rten gsum spyod
128b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang gis mtha' yas 'od ni 'gyed pa dang // gang gis myi mchog sems can lung bstonod pa// di ring yud kyis bdag cag de thos shog/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du rgyu dag gi lhag gi lhag pa'i bas pa thug su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum/ 
129a1(dkon brtsegs): gam mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsolang pa// 'jig rten phan bzhid 'dzum pa gang mdzad pa// mu stegs tshogs 'di nang du 'phags gyur da te// myi mchog rang 'byung ci slad 'dzum mdzad pa// 
129a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum rgyud de ni khyod kyis bka' stsal gsoso// bde bar gshegs pa 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas// 'jig rten phan bzhed 'gro 'di the tsom 'tshal// zla ba nyal 'gro ba lta ba bzhin// lha zhing mchis na rgyal ba 'dzu phyu gsungs// su zhig rgyal la mchod pa dab gyis
129a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis de ring yab ni mnyes par bgyis// rgyal ba'i yon tan de ring gang gis mthong // mkhas pa myu rang du legs par bka' bsum gsol// mu stegs can rnams lung bas nad te thos nas// 'jig rten thas cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'di ltar
129a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bde bar gshegs par btul// des na 'gro ba kun gi rna 'dren lags// rgyal bas the tsom bsngal du gsol// som nyi 'tshal ba'i sam nyi dgu du gsol// sa ni 'khor rnaMs 'di dag yid rangs shing // sangs rgyas khyed kyi dgongs
129a5(dkon brtsegs): ma dad pa mam/ nas bcom ldan las kyis che dang ldan pa yus pa chis su yang dgas pang slar ka' 'dus dpa // khrub khyod kyis dus 'di shes 'ad nas rgyal ba dgra las rgyal ba dris pa legs/ 'dren par
129a6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'bris pas// 'jig rten phan pa'i tshig kyang rjod par gyur // 'dzum pa 'di ni ji ltar ngas mdzad pa// 'dus rgyus de khyod sa bstand par bya// mang dag ji bani pa'i bstan pa ma/ dga' pa'i ming du thos te deng nyon cig/ mu stegs so/ 
129a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi ma du su ma da/ na ga nga kyi ma na da ma 'o// sa sa tsho ni nyid
129b1(dkon brtsegs): nis la sbyin pa mi nyung ngul// khrims dang zhi ga ting 'dzin na par sbyangs/ shes rab brtson 'grus stong pos kyang 'bar bar byas// thugs rje ldan pa nas drung bzod pa bsten// byang chub das pa btsal nas yun ring du// pa ro song phyi nang pa drug la blong
129b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs// rgyal ba dgra las rgyal la zhu ba zhus / sangs rgyas bgrangs dag la ni yid dga' byas// deg sdig pa'i grogs kyis dbang gis na/ lta ba'i rdo bsdug la gnas gyur pa// deg pa der gshegs rang byung mtheng gyur nga nas// chags myed pas
129b3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i rna ba spangs// stonod pa'i dgongs pa yang dag rnam par rtogs// stond pa'i dgongs pa rnams la dad pa gnas// ma 'ongs dus na byang chub tshol byed cing / rgyal ba bye ba bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur// ma 'ongs bskal pa skar ma 'dra ba la/ 
129b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba nga rgyal bcom pa mtshan mthun par// grags pa chen po phyogs su rna par grags// 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba 'grel bar 'gyur// deg sangs rgyas zhing yang dag 'gyur te// de dag bkod pa sna tshogs mtshungs pa myed// sangs rgyas zhing der sdi
129b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blothon byed// blo gas dag par mthun par na stug gnas// den ngan song rnams na da rnams snang // mi khom gsal te dus de tha ma la// rgyal ba deg su tshe stobs ldan la te// lo ni stong phrag brgya cu thub// mye de dag gis byang chub
129b6(dkon brtsegs): zhithos nakadi ni myi gnyis par ni byed myi 'gyur// chags myed brem par nas kyi mtshan thos nas ga/ pung med nas kyang / skyes pa'i lus theb 'gyur// de ltar rjetsam rgyal pa drang srong tshe stond pas mu stegs lung bi stan bka' bsu / 
129b7(dkon brtsegs): de thos gyur nas ltar bcas 'jig rten rnams// yid reng gyur cing stobs kyang skyes/ mu stegs can lung bstan pa'i leT ste/ nyi shu kA'o// / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'khor dpa sa
129b8(dkon brtsegs): bas ta lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding nas nas/ kun du rgyu nas kyi bar gyi lung bstan pa thos nas/ 'di sa du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba thas cad tshim par byas pa ni ngom
130a1(dkon brtsegs): gto snyam nas/ de yang bu la chags pas kun tu bkris par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sems thug su chud nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la bka' bsulang pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod la tshangs pa spyod thogs
130a2(dkon brtsegs): dge' ba bar du dge' ba / tha mar dge' ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa yong su rdzogs pa/ yong su dag pa/ yongasu byang ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ khaMs rlug rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyis de legs par rab tu
130a3(dkon brtsegs): nyon la yid la zung shig dang / bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so// zhes gsolang nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rgyal po chen po khas drug na
130a4(dkon brtsegs): par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam gangs de gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu'i gang zag 'di ni khaMs drug pa/ reg pa'i skye mched drug pa/ yid nye bar spyod/ pa bcwo'i brgyad pa ste/ skyes bu 'di ni khaMs drug pa zhes gang smra ba do las brten te smras she
130a5(dkon brtsegs): na/ rgyal po chen po khas drug ni 'di dag go// drug gang zhe na sa'i khas dang chu'i/ sa dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khaM sa dang / nam mkha'i khas dang rna bar shes pa'i khas so// rgyal po chen po dag ni khas drug ste/ skyes bu 'di ni khas
130a6(dkon brtsegs): drug pa'o zhes gang ngas smras pa de ni de la brten te smras so// skyes bu de ni reg bI skyes bu mched drug pa zhes gang smras pa do tsa las brten te smras shes na/ rgyal chen po reg pa'i skye mched drug ni 'di dag ste/ gang zhe na gzugs nas la lta ba'i
130a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir myig gi reg pa'i skye mched dang / sgra rnaMs la nyan pa'i phyir rna ba'i reg pa'i skye mched dang / dri nas la sdom pa'i phyir sna'i reg pa'i skye mched drug dang / ro rnams myang ba'i phyir lce reg pa'i skye mched dang / reg pa rlag pa'i phyir lus reg pa'i skye mched dang
130a8(dkon brtsegs): chos rnam par shes pa'i phyir yid reg pa'i skye mched do// rgyal po chen po dog ni reg pa'i skye mched drug ste/ skyes bu 'di ni reg pa'i skye mched drug pa'o// zhes gang ngas smras pa de ni de la brten te smras so// rgyal po chen po de ni yid kyi nye bar spyod pa
130a9(dkon brtsegs): skye mched do// rgyal po chen po/ dag ni reg pa'i blo mched drug sre/ sras
130b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa'o zhes gang smras pa de ci las brten te smra she na/ rgyal po chen po yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bcwo brgyad ni 'di dag ste// bco brgyad gang zhe na 'di la myig gi gzugs mthong na yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba dang / btang snyoms su 'gyur ba gzugs la nye bar spyod de/ 
130b2(dkon brtsegs): nam pas sgra thos na yod bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / btang snyomarjes su 'gyur bar sgra la nye bar spyod do// snas dri tshor na yid bde ba dang yod myi bde ba dang btang snyom su 'gyur bar dri la nye bar spyod do// lus re meng na yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / ba
130b3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms su 'gyur bar ro la myong bar spyod do// lus kyi reg bya la reg na yod bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / btang snyoms su 'gyur bar reg bya la nye bar spyod do// yod kyis chos reg na yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba dang / btang snyoms su 'gyur bar chos la
130b4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar spyod do// rgyal po chen po de la gang dag yid sde bde bar spyod pa drug dang / gag de dag yid myi bde bar spyad pa drug dang / gang dag btang snyoms su 'gyu dbar nye bar spyod pa drug po reg gcig tu bsdus na/ yid kyi nye bar spong ba bcwo brgyang
130b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur ros rgyal po chen po brgyad pa des ni med kyi nye bar spyod pa co rgya nga men/ gangs smras pa don de la brten tesmras so// rgyam po chen po dang mams ni rnam pa gnyis te/ nang gi sang mde/ phyiros kyi yang med/ rgyal ba che pa
130b6(dkon brtsegs): nang gisa'i khas gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste lus 'di la nang gi khar na sra pra dang / 'khrang ba'i rnam pa dang nye bar gyur pa dang / zin pa'or yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgra dang spu dang / sen mo dang / sa dang rdus dang dri ma dang / pags pa dang sha dang rtsa dang chu drus
130b7(dkon brtsegs): dang rus pa dang rkang dang snying dang / mtshan pa dang bro ba dang / mkhal ma dang sum mangs dang / mchin dri dang / rgyum dang gnye ma dang / snang ba dang mcher ba dang / phyis dang / gnang dang grang ba dang glang rgyas dang / gzhan yang gang lus 'di la nang gi 'khar nas
130b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'grong ba'i rnam pa dang lus su gtogs par 'gyur ba dang / zin pa 'di ni nang gis le bas shes bya'o// rgyal po chen pa phyi 'o mod kyi sa ri khas gang rten/ ga yang rung ste phyi sad kyi sra ba dang 'brang ba'i rna ba dang / sras su ma gtogs pa dang / 
131a1(dkon brtsegs): thA/ mazin pa 'di ni phyi ros kyi sa'i khas shes bya'o// rgyal po chen po de la nang gi sa'i khas 'byung ba'i tshe/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang 'gag pa'i tshe gang du'ang sogs pa myi 'gro'o// rgyal po chen po bud myed nang du bdag ni bud myed do
131a2(dkon brtsegs): ma bye su kyi so skyes su rnyed ba'i sa tes go// so sgru pa sas/ ma gas pa gyu te/ ma gyi rnam pa sa blang bar 'ad/ zhes pa sa nang du rgyas pa nis
131a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba sa sas su sa su myo ba ga/ sa ngas su sa rgya tha na mas par 'gyu/ kyis kyi nga myed nga phred par / 'a pa 'a sa zang bar chu na
131a4(dkon brtsegs): bskye bar 'gyur ba'i dus de med do// rgyal ba chen po gang ma kun du brtag pa dang / gang kun du rtog pa de gnyis ka sang myed do// bud byed sa ni su myed do/ skyes pa la ni skyes pa med de/ de snyer myed cing yang dag pa ma yin par kung sa
131a5(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa skyes te/ kun du rtog pa de yang ngo bo nyid kyis myed do// kun du rtog pa nga lta ba de bzhin du phrang ba dang / mer mer po yang ngo bo nyid kyis myed do// gang ngo bo nyid kyis myed pa de ji ltar sra bskyed par 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po de ltar/

131a8(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna mdun gi rgyalas grub pa gnas pa'i dus yod de/ rgyal po chen po de'i sra ba de 'byung ba'i tshe/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong ngo // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas myed lang rin po che sna bdun gyi nulas grub pa byung yang / rgyal po chen po de'i srang
131b1(dkon brtsegs): de 'byung ba'i tshe/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong ngo // 'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po'i ri rdo rje'i rgyu las grub pa/ sra zhing brtan la lhun stug pa nas gnas par gyur kyang deg gi sra ba de byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang myi 'ong ngo // ro'i rgyal po ri rab dag dang /

132a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de ltar sa'i khaMs de 'byung ba yang stong sa'i khas de 'jig pa dang 'byung ba yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // rgyal po chen po sa'i khaMs ni tha snyad tsam ma rtogs par sa'i khas nyid du myi dmyigs te tha snyad de yang
132a2(dkon brtsegs): bud myed ma yin/ skyes pa ma yin gis/ rgyal po de ltar de yang dag par ji ltar bzhin gi shes rab kyis rtogs shig/ rgyal po chen po de la chu'i khas ni rnam pa gnyisu ste/ nang gi dang phyi rolod kyi 'o nang gi chu'i khas gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung
132a3(dkon brtsegs): ste lus 'di la nang gi khong du chu dang / chu'i na pa dang / chu nyid dang rlan pa dang / rlan pa'i rna ba dang rlan pa nyid dang / gnyer ba nyid lus su rtogs pa dang / zin pa'o// de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mchi ma dang rdub dang mchil ma dang / skabs dang chu ser
132a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshil dang 'khris pa dang / ngar snabs dang rnag dang khrag dang / 'o ma dang gcin dang / gzhan yang gang lus 'di la nang gyi khong na chu dang chu'i rnam pa dang / chu nyid dang / rlan pa dang rlan pa'i rna ba dang / rlan pa nyid dang / gsher ba nyid dang / lus su

132b1(dkon brtsegs): deyong de/ 'dungs pa'i tshe gang du yang myi 'gro'o// rgyal po chen po de bzhin du nang gi chu'i khas 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang myi 'ong 'gag pa'i tshe gang du yang myi 'gro'o// rgyal po chen po gang 'jig rten 'di chags par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod de/ 'jig te/

132b8(dkon brtsegs): meng cu 'grob par 'gyur ro// dang ga chad gnyis dang gsum dang / bzhi dang lnga cu dang / nyi gu dang sum bcu dang / ban bcu dang / dpag cad snga bcu tsam pa chu yo su zadas yong su 'grib par 'gyuraro// dngag tshad brgya dang nyis brgya dang sumaH
133a1(dkon brtsegs): ga gdag bani brgya dang / dpag mang sna bcu dang / dang gachang stong dang / nyis stong dang sum stong dang / dpag chad bzhi song tsam du rtsamatsho chen po las chu yong su zad cing song su 'drib par 'gyuro// rgyal po chen po rgyamache chen po la dpag tshang nga ni

133b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshams su myi 'gre'o// rgyal po chen po chu'i khams de ni skye ba yang stong / 'jig pa yang stong / gnas pa'i tshe'ang chu'i khas de rang bzhin gis stong ste/ rgyal po chen po chu'i khas de ni tha snyad tsam ma rtogs par chu'i khas kyis stong zhing myi dmyig ste/
