156a8(dkon brtsegs): ji skad lung bstan par bgyi// des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po grags pa mtha' yas gling chen po bzhir srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas shing / bas yid du 'grub la/ don myed par myi 'gyur ba myong // shing thas cad yid bzhin
156b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'bras bu chags pa dang / gnod pa thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / sems can thams cad yid la bsam pa don yod pa dang / spos chu'i char 'bab pa dang / lha'i yid bzhin gis gos kyi char 'bab pa dang / dbyig gi char 'bab
156b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gser gi char 'bab pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis char 'bab pa dang / yo byad thams cad kyi char 'bab pa yang myong bar gyur nas/ gling chen po bzhi dag du gnas te/ gling chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas
156b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ brgya byin gi sta nang phyed mnan pa las 'dod pa chen pos ma btang ste/ 'dod pas ma ngoms bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byaso// zhes rgyal po chen po khyod kyis lung stonang cig/ de skad ces smras nas/ rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas
156b4(dkon brtsegs): de 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to// rgyal po chen po de'i cha de'i dus na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas shes bya ba/ byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du/ khyod dogs shing the tsom za med de ltar
156b5(dkon brtsegs): myi 'alta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po nga nyid de'i tshe/ de'i dus 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po grags pa mtha' las shes du ra gyur to// de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis dbang po rnams ni sgyum nyi
156b6(dkon brtsegs): yul rnams ni rmyi lam lta bu'o zhes de ltar rig par byas nas/ sems nges par gzhag pa bye ste/ gzhan gi dring myi 'jog par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshig su bcang ba 'di dag gsung so// 'dod pa'i dbang phyur
156b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa las/ sems ni mkhas pas bskyed byas ste// chos kyi dbang pung dga' ba las// sems ni yang dag nyid du btang // 'dod ba de'i dbang phyug spang byas shing // chos kyi dbang la yid bzhag ste// sems gdung ba la rab rjo
156b8(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs rapa tu mar mong 'gyur/ nyo ngas char bcang brten na ni / mas kyisam yang chang par 'gyur/ mas kyisas ni chang gyu / 'jig rten gi ni mchong cer 'gyur/ 'angs sun nas nyon ma mangs/ 'di ba'i nyes pas
157a1(dkon brtsegs): na san te/ gsems can rnams la phan sems pas// de phyir mchod pa'in ces bya/ 'dod pa'i nyes 'thos 'gyur nas/ myi mi dong ba'i 'dod chags las// sems spyong byed pa mas cad ma byedas
157a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir mchod pa'i rten ces bya// sems can rnams kyi sdang spang ba// gang zag mchog gis rab tu mkhyen// sdang las sems ni grol mdzad pas// de phyir mchod pa'i rten ces bya// sems can rnams kyi mongs spang ba/ 
157a3(dkon brtsegs): shag kya'i khyu mchog rab mkhyen te// rmongs las sems ni spyong mdzad pas// de phyir mchod pa'i rten ces bya// sems can nga rgyal spang ba yang // sems can kha lo sgyur bas mkhyen// nga rgyal dag las sems sbyong bas/ 
157a4(dkon brtsegs): de phyir mchod pa'i rten ces bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang rgyapo zas gtsang ma la bka' stsal ba// rgyal po chen po'i spo na byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// rgyal po sa'i lha zhes bya ba chos dang ldan// 
157a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po tshe dang bdun
157a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po sa'i lha'i de'i pha ni rgyal po sa 'byung zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po sa 'byung de'i bu thu bo ni gzho nu sa lta ba ste// de nas rgyal po sa 'byung 'chi ba'i des byed pa'i tshe/ rgyal po gzho nu sa'i lha rgyal srid la dbang bsgyur ro// de nas rgyal
157a7(dkon brtsegs): zo sa'i lha de rgyal rigs spyi bo dbang bskur bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po sa'i lha rgyal rigs kyi spyo bo nas dbang bskur bde/ gso sbyong gi nyi ma zla ba nya ba'i tshe/ skra bkrus te ras bcos bu sar pa bgos// skra dang kha su bcos
157a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba brgyan btags/ nor bu dang rna cha gdub 'khor btags nas/ khang steng du bud myed kyi 'khor gis bskor cing / mdun du bdar te 'dug 'dug pa dang / shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong dang ldas
157b1(dkon brtsegs): ste ba dang bcas pa mu khyung dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa// 'od gser dang ldan pas 'od gsal ba/ 'phang du khru 'dun yo ngapa / thams cad gser las byas pa/ byung bar gyur to// rgyal po sa'i lha
157b2(dkon brtsegs): des sngon yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang skur ba gang gso sbyong gi nyi ma zla ba nya ba'i tshe zhes bya ba nas/ bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor cing mdun du 'dar ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/ shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo
157b3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che rtsibs stong dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/ thams cad gser las byas pa'i bar dang ldan pa byung bar gyur pa dang / de 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyu ro// zhes thos pas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag 'khor los
157b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba'i rgyal po lte ba yin nam// de la bdag gis sang par bya'o snyam na sa/ rgyal po sa'i lha stan las langs te/ gos phyogs gtso dag du 'gos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lu'i khong
157b5(dkon brtsegs): lo rin po cheg la de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ lha'i 'khor lo ra na po che de la 'di skad ces smraso// kye 'khor lo rin po che bo bas te sa la gnos shig ces byas pa dang / de nas lha'i 'khor ma ra
157b6(dkon brtsegs): ngatsho de nam mkha' sa babs te sa la gnas par gyur to// de nas rgyal po sa'i lha des lha'i 'khor lo rin po tsho dgos khye'u chung gis phyis te/ mag pa g.yas pas sgrungs nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// kye 'khor
157b7(dkon brtsegs): ma rin po che shar phyogs las rnam par rgyal bar gis shig/ de nas 'khor lo rin po med shar phyogs log su gyur pa dang / shar phyogs kyi gnas rnam su de nyid tshe sngon gi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi lam mnyam zhing ni/ 
157b8(dkon brtsegs): dung de nyams dgor ba/ rin pa tsho sna bdud gi nulas grub pa// metog sa mam sna tshogs kyis gang 'byung bar gyur te/ riri ga gong du byung pa'i phyogs rnams ni mthobar gyur to// skad du mya reng ba rnams ning pa dang rgya
158a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i khron pa dang 'bab chu'i ngo dang / mche'u dang chu klung skams pa rnamasu ni/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste bsil ba dang / zhim pa dang / yang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / 'dang ba dang / drings
158a2(dkon brtsegs): myed pa dang / mthun na rtog mar gri gnod pa dang / 'bungs na skyo bde bas yongasu gang bar gyur te// mi tog gi shing ljor pa rnams la yang me tog chags par gyur te/ 'bras du'i shing ljon pa rnams la yang 'bras bu rgyag
158a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// me tog rgyas pa'i shing rnams kyang rtag tu me tog rgyas par gyur to// 'bras bu chags pa'i shing rnams kyang rtag tu 'bras bu chags par gyur to// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yang
158a4(dkon brtsegs): ma lag pa'i pa dang spyad gcig tu// dazang sa rin di byid mes dpe/ sa phyogs gang du 'khor so ring po ming 'jug da gyur pa dang / 'khor bas spyir ba'i rgyal po yang phung ga tshams
158a5(dkon brtsegs): lag bzhi pa dang lhan gcig 'dugs par gyur to// de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi rgyal po'am khams kyi rgyal po 'am/ grong rdal gi myi 'dra zhing pa de dag thams cad gser gi gnong pa dngug gi sim mas dka ba
158a6(dkon brtsegs): dngul gi gzhod pa phyes bkang ba dag thogs to// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de su zhig/ lha tshur gshegs/ lha gshegs pa leg so// lha'i chags 'og du mang ba 'di dag ni/ 'byor cing rgyas la/ lo legs shi / skye
158a7(dkon brtsegs): zamang po dang / phyis gang bse/ 'di dag dang bdag cag pa/ lha mingar mdzad du gsol// dri skad ces smras pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des de dag la 'di skad ces smras// ngal long srong 'di dag myi dgos kyis/ 
158a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ag khyong kyimang chung du gyur / nye bar yong dgis shig/ khyed 'dis pa'i su grang gis shig/ ga te khyod kyi srogs cing yang na ma bying bang medang das shis/ 'og na 'i nga dus sa
158b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ni yul 'di dag las brgyal te/ myi gang dag mar 'dzin bya dang / bar 'dzin pa dang / dge slong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gcol rim 'gror byed pa de dag ni/ nga'i rjesu 'brang ba yin no// snyam
158b2(dkon brtsegs): du semaso// dpan cad khyed yul 'khor du chos ma yin pa'i spyod pa dang / myi rigs pa'i spyod pa 'dod par ma byed cig/ de ltar byas nanga'ang yul 'di rnams las rgyal myi de dag kyang ri'i rje su 'brang ba yin par sem so// de dag
158b3(dkon brtsegs): gis de la leg so zhes nas de bzhin du nan tan du byed do// de'i lto'i 'khor lo rin po che des shir phyogasu rnam pa ro rgyal bar byas ste/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal nas/ mdun du shing rta'i srog shing bcugs pa ltar 'dug
158b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// de bzhin du lo phyogs dang / nub phyogasu yang rgya cher rnam pam rgyal ba byas nas/ khyang phyogasu byang gi sgra myi snyan gi gling chen po'i bar las rnam par rgyal ba byas ste/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgyam mas
158b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo'i steng du shing rta'i srog shing btsugs par gyur to// rgyal po sa'i lhas 'khor lo rin rdo che bskor ma thag tu de nas de'i mdo la gling chen po bzhi pa zas cang ri pa
158b6(dkon brtsegs): tsheche'i rang bzhin bkra ba/ blta na sdug par gnas par gyur te// rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang dngul dang be dUr+ya dang shel dang mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no// rgyal po sa'i lhas la
158b7(dkon brtsegs): lo rin po che de bskor ma thag du// sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin ga ris thams cad dang / myi khom pa thams
158b8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang rgyun chad par gyur to// myi dga' ba'i sgra rnams kyang yongasu nub par gyur to// 'di ltar rgyal po sa'i lha sngon gi smon lam gis// gling chen po bzhi po thams cad du ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa su'i 'bru yang byung
159a1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur/ dpag bsam gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur to// sems can de dag gi nad kyi rnam pa yang 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang kha zas myi bza' ba dang / rga ba gsum ma gtogs par thams
159a2(dkon brtsegs): cad rgyun chad par gyur to// sems can de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba tshang bar gyur to// sems can de dag la sdug bsngal yang thas cad du myi mngon zhing myi gnod par gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di dag dang gzhan yang ngo mtshar zang du
159a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba mtha' yas pa byung bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po sa'i lha de 'di snyam du sems te/ mu'i 'jig rten na long spyong 'di lta bu yong na/ long skyong 'di bas rgya che ba dang 'di bas khyad bar 'phags pa'i lo
159a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod gzhan 'ga' zhig yod dam myed snyam nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha zhes bya/ ri rob kyi rtse mo la gnas pa dag yod ces thob nas/ de dag gi long spyod de ci
159a5(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig yod snya mo// de nas rgyal po sa'i lha de 'dod pa ma spangs pa'i phyir/ myi'i long spyod la ni smod pa/ lha'i long spyod pa ni smon cing 'di snyam du/ 'o na bdag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnasu 'gro bar bya'o snyam du sems
159a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par gyur to// rgyal po chen po nas rgyal po sa'i sades sems bsgyings pa ga tu/ dpung gi tshogs san log pani pa dang yun cig du mi rgyam po rar kyi kyi mal phyin par gyur to// de nas pa'i dra mo rgya byin gis
159a7(dkon brtsegs): sa'i sa rgyang ring ponas 'ong ba mayonganas 'di ska sa smras te// rgyal ba rgya spyo/ rgyal ba chen po byon pa legaso nas sman gyi byedas dang te/ rgyal ba na po gang gi dus la dang sa par mkhye nas/ sad 'di la dunags
159a8(dkon brtsegs): zhes smras pa dang / rgyal po sa'i lha brgya byin gi sun byed la 'dug ste// des dang sa brgya stong phrag mang por sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du rgyal srod kyi dbang phyug byed la dbang byaso// de yun ring po 'das pa'i dus shig na/ 'ang
159b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i dbang gis 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ kye ma bdag gis sum bcurtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang bya'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed phrag du lha'i dbang po tu byin gisan byengs
159b2(dkon brtsegs): nyams nas/ phyir 'dzam bu'i gling gi grong khyer bde ba'i khyim zhes bya bar gnas par gyur to// de lha'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa las 'dzam bu gling du gnas par gyu rang nas/ myi'i gzi brjid myi bzod par gyur pa nas/ de bying zhing myi
159b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur to// de nas rgyal po'i lci bying ba na/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// rgyal srid dbang phyug rgya chen gis/ 'dod pa zhi myi 'gyur// me la rtsa ba shing ji bzhin te// de bas 'dod pa rnam par spang // yun ring rgyud rtsa
159b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la// bsten na ngoms par myi 'gyur te// skom pas nyen pa tsha chu la// rab tu 'thungs/ yongs gdung bzhin// chu bo rnams kyis nam du yang // rgya mtsho ngoms par myi 'gyur te// de bzhin 'dod pa bsten byas na// gzhan yang ngoms
159b5(dkon brtsegs): par myi 'gyur ro// shing dag rtsa dag rab bsregs kyang // me ni ngoms par myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin 'dod pa bsten byas na// 'dod pa'i long spyod ngoms myi myong // me long ji ltar gzugs brnyan gis// nam yang ngoms
159b6(dkon brtsegs): bar myi 'gyur ba// de bzhin gzugs rnams bsnyen byas na// 'dod pa'i long su dngoms myi myong // brag ca ci ltar sgra rnams kyis// nam yang ngos par myi 'gyur ba// de bzhin sgra rnams bsten byas na// 'dod pa'i long
159b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod doms myi myong // ji ltar spos snod spos rnams kyis// nam yang ngoms par myi 'gyur ba// de bzhin dri rnams bsten byas kyang // sna ni dri yis ngoms myi myong // ji ltar gzar bu ro mchog gis// nam yang ngoms par myi 'gyur ba// de
159b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin lce ni ro mchog gis// nam yang ngoms par myi 'gyur ro// ji ltar nam mkha' rlung rnams kyis// nam yang ngoms par myi 'gyur ba// de bzhin lus ni reg rnams kyis// nam yang ngoms par myi 'gyu ro// dper na rmi lam rmis pa 'is// 
160a1(dkon brtsegs): chu 'thungs ngoms par myi 'gyur ba// de bzhin chos la chags pa'i// yid kyang ngoms par 'gyur ba myed// sems can 'dod la bsten pa ni// phyir zhing sred pa 'brel 'gyur te// yul la nye bar sten
160a2(dkon brtsegs): byas na// 'dod pas rnams kyang ngoms par myed// skom dang me 'dra'i 'dod pa las// sdug bsngal 'byung ba su mthong ba// de dag sreng bzhi 'gyur te// me la chus ni blugs pa bzhin// rgyal po chen po de'i dus na/ 'a
160a3(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sa la zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du thogs shing the tsom za 'am yid gnyisu gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po nga nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
160a4(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sa'i lha zhes bya bar gyur te/ de tsam du che zhing de tsam du yangs pa'i dbang phyug la dbang byas kyang / dbang phyug gis ma ngoms bzhin du/ 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to// de ci
160a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dbang po rnams ni ma ngoms shing / ngoms pa ra myi rung ba/ yul rnams ni ngoms par mi byed pa ste/ dang / nga po rnams ni me long dang 'dra'// yul rnams ni gzugs brnyan dang
160a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra/ dbang po rnams ni brag cha dang 'drar// yul rnams ni sgra dang 'dra// dbang po rnams ni sgyu ma dang 'dra // yul rnams ni rgya'i ma 'dra' ba yin gas// rgyal po chen po khyod de la yid gzhag cing / gnang gi dang myi
160a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jog par gyis shig// bam po bco lnga ste/ tha ma'o// // rgyal po chen po gzhan yang sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal
160a8(dkon brtsegs): bong mas nu zhes bya ba/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu chel/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bo nas byung ba/ sngon gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa// sangs rgyas dpag tu myed pa mthong ba/ dge ba
160b1(dkon brtsegs): rna ba yang dag par sgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig song po la chos dkar po yongasu bsgrubs pa zhig byung ste/ des gling chen po ba ning/ dbang phrug sa dbang bya'o// de 'jam bu'i gling na gnas 'di'i tshe/ 'dod
160b2(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi sems can myi dang lha gang ji snyed cig 'dod la spyod par gyur pa de dag gi nang na/ rgyal po nga las nu de/ 'di ltar 'dod pa la long spyod pas mchog du brjod do// de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'byor cing rgyus pa/ 
160b3(dkon brtsegs): la/ bde zhing lo logs pa dang / skye bo mang po glang ba dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba yang mdab nye bar gyur/ grong rnams kyang bya 'gag gi 'phur stabs
160b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis son pa tsam du nye bar gyur to// 'di ltar chos kyis gnas pa ra gyur bas/ sa chen po 'di yang gseg ma dang / gya mo myed cing / gser dang dngul mang po dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / bskyed
160b5(dkon brtsegs): mos tshal dang rdzing bu dang / mtshe'u dag gis mdzes par byas par gyur to// rgyal po nga las nu ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ni/ grong khyer mya tshugs pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ shar nub tu chur ni dpag tshad
160b6(dkon brtsegs): bcu gnyis/ lho byang gi zhed du ni dpag tshad bdu ni yod par gyur to// de ni bskal pa'i dang po la byung ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po// rigs chen por grags par skyes pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi dang po'i grong khyer du
160b7(dkon brtsegs): gyurd pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer chen po blta na sdug ces bya ba ni// steng gi phyogs nas dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa'i bar du rgya cher te/ de bzhin du rgyal po sras nus
160b8(dkon brtsegs): dpyid gnas pa ni/ zla ba 'char ba zhes bya ba ni khang bzangs bshams par gyur to// dbyar gnas bi'i be dUr+ya'i snying po zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs bshams par gyur te// 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gi rnam pa
161a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i khang bzangs lta bu'o// rgyal po nga las nu'i dgung na gnas pa ni nyi ma'i 'od gze ra yang dag 'phags shes bya ba'i khang bzangs bshams par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin
161a2(dkon brtsegs): gi rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs lta bu'o// rgyal po nga las nu khang bzangs zla ba 'char bar gnas pa'i che ni/ btsun mo dang bcas par 'di lta ste dper na/ tsa dan gis bskus pa bzhin du lus bsil bar gyur to// khang bzangs
161a3(dkon brtsegs): bai dUr+ya'i snying por gnas pa'i tshe ni 'di lta ste dper na ta ma la'i lo mas bskus pa bzhin du lus dus dang ldan par bde bar 'gyur ro// khang bzangs nyi ma'i 'od zer yang dag 'phagasu gnas pa'i tshe ni 'di lta ste dper na/ a ga rus
161a4(dkon brtsegs): skus pa bzhin du lus dro bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po las nubasam ba'i dbang gis khang ba'angs de dag kyang nyam su bde ba'i reg pa/ 'byin par gyur to// brisam pa'i dbang gis rlung spang bar 'gyur/ cha
161a5(dkon brtsegs): oM'abab par 'gyur/ rol mo'i sgra 'thung bar 'gyur ro// bsam pa'i dbang gis bskyed pa dang / long spyod pa dang / yongs su spyong pa'i rnam ba 'byung ngo // rgyal po de nas rgyal po las nu 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma
161a6(dkon brtsegs): pho brang du zhag bdun du dbyig gi char 'bab par gyur cig snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag du ta las nu'i pho brang du zhag bdun du dbyig gi char 'bab par gyur to// rgyal po chen po de nas nga las nus zhag bdun po de 'das na
161a7(dkon brtsegs): dbyig gi char bab pa de la 'di snyam du sems te// ji tsam du yongs su dag pa'i las kyis rnam pa smin pas bsam pa yid bzhin du/ yongs su rdzogs par byas dmyigs shing / bsod nams dag kyang myi bslu ba 'di ni/ ngo mtshar
161a8(dkon brtsegs): rmad du byung ngo snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gling chen po 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor cing rgyas la/ bde zhing lo legs pa dang / skye bo mang po dang / myis gang ba la yang dbang byas// bdag gi khyim du ni zhag zudur
161b1(dkon brtsegs): du dbyig gi char bab na/ da ni bdag nub kyi ban lang spyod kyi gling du 'gro snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag du rgyal po nga las nus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ 'dzam
161b2(dkon brtsegs): gling nas nub kyi ban yang spyod kyi gling du phyin nas/ des der lo brgya stong phrag mang por myi'i las 'das shing lha rdza sum gyur pa'i long spyod dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos byaso// de nub kyi ban lang spyod kyi gling chen po de na gnas pa'i tshe yab
161b3(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed ma thag du/ 'dzam bu'i gling du bab pa zhug bdun gi bar du dbyig gi char bab par gyur to// rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po nga las nu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor cing rgyas pa nas/ skye
161b4(dkon brtsegs): bo mang po dang myis gang ba'i bar la ni dbang byas/ bdag gi khyim du zhag bdun du dbyig gi char ni bab/ bdag gis nub kyi ban lang spyod kyi gling chen po yang dbang byas te/ bdag gi khyim 'dir yang zhag bdun du dbyig gi char bab
161b5(dkon brtsegs): na/ shar gi lus 'phags shes bya ba'i gling chen po yod kyis/ bad ga ni gling chen po shar gi lus 'phags po ga la ba der 'gro 'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu/ rgyal po chen po nga las nu de dpung gi
161b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs yan lag bzhi dang / lhan cig tu nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ shar gi lus 'phags po'i gling chen por phyind par gyurang te/ des der yang yo brgya stong phrag mang por mya lis 'das shing lha rdza sum gyur
161b7(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur pa'i long spyod dang ldan par rgyal po byas so// rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po nga las nu der yang 'di snyam du bsams te// bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling dang / nub kyi ban lang spyod pa dang / shar gi lus 'phags po la dbang byas
161b8(dkon brtsegs): na/ da ni bdag bying gi sgra mya snyen gi gling chen por 'gro'o// de'i mya rnams ni nga'i bya ba myed cing yongasu 'dzin pa myed mod kyi/ 'on kyang der song ste/ rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rje su bstan par bya'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma
162a1(dkon brtsegs): thag du rgyal po nga las nu de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ shang gi lus 'phags po'i gling chen po nas/ byang gi sgra myi snyan gi gling chen por
162a2(dkon brtsegs): byind par gyur te/ der yang myi rnams nga yir bya ba myed cing yongasu 'dzind pa myed pa'i nang du lo brgya stong phrag du mar bdag gi dpung gi tshogs rnams la rjesu bstan to// rgyal po chen po de nas lo brgya stong phrag mang
162a3(dkon brtsegs): bor 'das pa zhig na/ rgyal po nga las nu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'dzam bu gling pa ni dbang byas te/ zhag bdun du ni khyim du dbyig gi char bab// bdag gis nub kyi ban lang spyod kyi gling chen po la ni
162a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang byas/ bdag gis shar gi lus 'phags kyi gling chen po la yang dbang byas/ bdag gis byang gi sgra myi snyan gi gling chen po la yeng dbang byas na/ da ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa zhes bya ba'i
162a5(dkon brtsegs): ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'khong pa zhig yod ces grag gis/ sum bcu rtsa ba sum gau gan su 'gro'o snyam du bsamaso// rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po nga las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu/ dpung gi
162a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo la phyiri par gyur to// de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chos b.rangs lha'i mdun so zhes bya ba na 'dus shi
162a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pa las/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis rgyal po nga las rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ste/ mthong nas stan gi phyed la bdar te/ rgyal po chen po chur spyon/ rgyal po chen po byon pa leg so// gang gis dus la bab par
162a8(dkon brtsegs): shes na/ stan gi phyed la bzhugs shig ces spras pa dang / rgyal po ngalas nu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gi stan phyed la 'dug go// rgyal po nga las nu brgya byin gi stan phyed la 'dug ma thag du// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi
162b1(dkon brtsegs): lha thams cad/ lha'i gnas bcus zil gis mnan te/ bcu gang zhe na/ lha'i tshe dang / lha'i grags pa dang / lha'i kha dog dang / lha'i bde ba dang / lha'i dbang phyug la dbang ba dang / lha'i gzugs dang / lha'i sgra dang / 
162b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dri dang / lha'i ro dang / lha'i reg dang / rnam pa bcu ste/ de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin ma gtogs pa zil gis mnan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig 'dzums pa dang / myig myi 'dzums pa tsam las lha rnams
162b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ 'di ni rgyal po nga las nu'o// 'di ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin no zhes bya bar shes pa ma gtogs par rgyal po nga las nu de dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnyis kyang gzugs mnyam par 'gyur// spyod pa mnyes
162b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ long spyod mnyam par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po myur gyur pa dang / lhar gyur pa gnyis lus mnyam par grub pa de ni ngo ma tshar che'o// rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nus dor lo brgya stong
162b5(dkon brtsegs): phrag mang po// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du// rgyal srid kyi phywa ga phyed la dbang byaso// rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po ngal sa nus// gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang byas/ sum bcu
162b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gsum pa'i rgyal srid phyed la dbang byas kyang / dbang phyug gis ma ngoms nas 'di snyam gi// sems bskyed de/ kye ma bdag gis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang bya'o snyam pa
162b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems bskyed ma thag du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig du sum bcu rtsa gsum gi gnas nas nyams te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal mchog du phyin par gyur to// de 'jam du
162b8(dkon brtsegs): gling du gnas par gyur pa'i tshe/ phyogs thams cad kyang snang bar gyur te/ nyi ma'i 'od kyang zil gis mnan nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i 'od nyi mas zil gis mnan pa lta bu'o// nyi ma nam mkha' la 'dug pa nga
163a1(dkon brtsegs): swa me ma yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa// nyi mas zil gis non na myi snang ba bzhin no// de nas grong khyer myi tshugs pa'i pho brang ngam pa na myi 'khod pa rnams
163a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ rgyal po de bskyed mos tshal der phyi ning pa mthong bar gyur to// mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te/ de dag grong du 'dong nas/ kye grogs po di ltar/ lha'i bu zhig bar snang las babs te/ rgyal po'i bskyed mos tshal 'di
163a3(dkon brtsegs): phyinang to zhes tshig brjod/ sgra sgrogaso// rgyal po chen po de nas yul 'khor gi myi dang / rgyal por bcas pas de skad thos nas/ myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugasu glu dang / rol mo dang / me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng
163a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re thogs nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i spyod pas grong khyer de nas byung ste/ bskyed mos tshal de ga la ba der dong ngo // rgyal po chen pos
163a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po nga las nu de bskyed mos tshal der 'dug ma thag du/ sa chen po/ 'di yang rnam pa drug du g.yos par gyur to// rgyal po chen bo de nas yul 'khor gi myi dang / rgyal por bcas par myi'i dri khyed
163a6(dkon brtsegs): du 'phags pa/ rgyal po nga las nu'i drung du 'dong ba dang / rgyal po las nu lha'i long spyod la goms pas/ myi'i long spong mi bzod par bya/ rang nas/ sa la bying zhing myi gnas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste na/ 
163a7(dkon brtsegs): mar gi gong bu 'am/ mar gsang gi gong bu bye ma tsha ba la bzhag na zhu zhing myi gnas pa de bzhin du/ yul 'khor gi myi dang / rgyal por bcas pas de bying ba mthong nas/ khyed su zhig lags shes dris// de nas rgyal po
163a8(dkon brtsegs): maso nus/ rgyal po dang yul 'khor gi myir bcas pa de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// khyed kyis rgyal po nga las nu zhes bya ba zhig byung ba thos sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis/ rgan rabs dag las/ 
163b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po nga las nu zhes bgyi ba zhig/ lus de nyid kyis/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig tu/ mtho ris su bzhu do zhes thos so// rgyal po nga las nus de dag la smras pa dang / grogs po dag/ rgyal po nga las nu
163b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni kho bo yin te/ mtho ris nas nyams nas lhung bar gyur to// zhes smras nas/ rgyal po dang yul 'khor gi myar bcas pa'i mya de dag gis/ glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigasu bcad pas/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras
163b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag rnams kyis rgan rabs la// myi'i bdag po rdzu 'phrul che// mya ngan bral zhing grags chen ldan// nga las nu zhes bya ba byung // de ni khyogs dpung bzhon par bcas// g.yog bcas mtho' ris 'jig rten bzhud
163b4(dkon brtsegs): myi dbang gtso bo lha gnas bzhugs// chos kyis sa yang skyong zhes thos// de smras myi'i dbang po de// myi rtag nyen te 'phongs par gyur// bde ba stor te sdug bsngal thob// rgyal po de ni kho boni
163b5(dkon brtsegs): des smras skye bo thams cad kyis// thal mo sbyar te rkang par gtugs// rgyal po bdag cag ci brjod pa// ya mtshan ngo mtshar bka' stsal gso lang // de smras rgyal po lha las nyams// sdug bsngal rnyed pa'i ngo mtshar
163b6(dkon brtsegs): nyon// yun ring bde bar 'dod pa'i// myis ni rtag tu bag yod bya// nga los nub rgyal po mchog/ rgyas pos gling bzhi rab bstan nas// 'dod pa'i long skyong mchog ldan te// 'dod pas ma ngoms de'ang so// de'i phying dun
163b7(dkon brtsegs): bdun du// dbyig gi dra ba'i char pa 'bab// gling bzhi pa la rab bstan nas// 'dod pas ma ngoms de byed do// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gi// stan phyed la ni rgyal po 'dug/ kun tu rtog pa'i rtog pas brlag/ bdag 'dod nga rgyal bcom
163b8(dkon brtsegs): nas rgung // phyi mkhas 'khor ba'i rgya mchor 'dir/ 'gro bdag du yang nub ste// 'dod pa rab tu bsten byas na// rgyal bas bsngags pa ngoms myi rnyed// rgyal ma rgyas pa'i chul bur// 'thungs kyang ngoms par myi 'gyur ba/ 
164a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar 'dod pa'i long spyod rnams// bsten na ngoms par myi 'gyuraro// blo gros ldan pa gang dag gis// shes pas mun pa rnam bsal te// ngoms par bya phyir bcom ldan gi// 'phags pa'i shes rab yang dag rtog
164a2(dkon brtsegs): srid pa rnam bshig blo gros can// rgan dang shi dang skye ba la rtog/ sred pa rab tu spangs na su// srid pa spangs te len myi byed// tshor ba'i rnam pa me 'drar rig/ reg pa 'ang mye 'drar rig nas ni// tshor ba 'phags pa ma yin dang
164a3(dkon brtsegs): reg pa de la sred myi byed// rol mo sil snyan brdung ba ltar// yul dang dbang po myi byed de// rgyal bstan byed pa dang po rtogs// rang bzhin mthong ba dbang po 'dor// skye mched drug po yod myin yang // gzugs dang 'brel par
164a4(dkon brtsegs): yid bskyed do// rnam par shes pas brtags pa'i phyir// tshor ba kun tu rtog ces brjod// de ltar rig nas 'phags pa nas/ srid pa'i rgyud la yid myi rto nad// shes rab 'phags pas ngoms gyur te/ 
164a5(dkon brtsegs): shing myong me bzhin zhi bar 'gyur// srid pa myi rtag brtan byas te// rgya la po yul 'khor myir bcas la// nga nus de skad lung bas nanas// mye'i bdag po nub par gyur// / rgyal
164a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ rgyal po nga las nu zhes bya ba byung ba de// gzhan zhig yin snyam du dogs shing the tsom za 'am/ nem nur du gyur nga na// khyod kyis de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po nga nyid
164a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bong las nu zhes bya bar gyur te// rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug/ rgya chen po la dang byas kyang / 'dod pas ma ngoms bzhin du/ 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa ma yin no// 
164a8(dkon brtsegs): chen pos de lta zas na/ de rig par byas la dbang phyug gi drags pa spangs te// bag yod par bya'o// bag yod pa la gnas te/ khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o// rgyal po chen po bag yong/ 
164b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mngon par dga' ba ni don grub par 'gyur gis/ rgyal po chen po bag yod par mkhas mnyam pa nyid yang dag par bsgrub par bya ste/ rgyal po chen po 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khas ni bung ma yin skyes
164b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin gyis/ rgyal po chen po 'di la khyod kyis sems nges par bzhag cing / gzhan gi dring myi 'jog par bya'o// rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 
164b3(dkon brtsegs): po mu khyud ces bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po bag yod pa lhur len pa zhig byung ste/ de bya ba gang dang gang rtsom pa yang de dang de thams cad bag yod par spyod cing byed do// rgyal po chen po rgyal po mu khyud de/ chos 'di dag
164b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni dus gsu mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/ 'das pa'i dus na yang chos thams cad rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus na yang chos thas cad rang bzhin dang bral ba zhes dus gsum mnye ba nyid
164b5(dkon brtsegs): la brtson par gyur to// ngos chos thams cad dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du mthong bas/ chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa myed pa ra gyur to// des sems can phyin ci log bzhis/ sems phyin ci
164b6(dkon brtsegs): du gyur cing / myi sdug par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal bde bar 'du shes pa dang / myi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bdag myed pa la bdag du 'du shes pa dag mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di skar mos
164b7(dkon brtsegs): can 'di dag ni chos thams cad stong par ma mthong bas/ kyes kye hud 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phung ngo // kye ma 'jig rten 'ganas pa 'di ni rnam par phung ngo // snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gi sems 'di
164b8(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu bar bya'o// bdag gis de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdus na/ chos la sbyar ba la dbang du 'gyur ro sa mo// rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis/ thabs mkhas pa sngon du btang ste/ sos
165a1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdus nas/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gdams ngag gis bstan te/ kye sems can dag chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ste/ kye sems can dag chos gang
165a2(dkon brtsegs): la rang bzhin myed pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir te/ 'das pa zhes gdags par bya ba ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltung
165a3(dkon brtsegs): byung zhes gdags par bya ba ma yin// rgyal po chen po de nas sems can dag rgyal po mu khyud des de ltar dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bskul bas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu myi skye ba'i tshe
165a4(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum/ nyepa'i lha rnams/ chos bzangs lha'i mdun sa na 'dus shing 'khod 'khod pa'i nang du bar skabs 'di lta bu'i gtam brjod pa byung ste
165a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar phyin ci log du gyur ba'i sems can rnams la thabs mkhas pas/ phyinang ci log myed pa'i yang dag par ston po/ cho sa can chos kyi rgyal po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan po mu khyud 'di su dag
165a6(dkon brtsegs): gri rgyal po yin pa'i myi rnams ni/ kye ma'o rnyed pa dang ldan pa ste/ kyem myi rnams ni rnyeng pa legs par rnyed pa'o zhes zer bar gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos bzang lha'i nang 'dun sa ga la ba de song ste/ 
165a7(dkon brtsegs): phyinir nas rang gi sman la 'dug ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams la smras pa// khyed nga ltar 'di ni 'khod pa rnams gtam ci zhig byed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i snga rnams kyis su'i nga
165a8(dkon brtsegs): thobargya byin pa 'di skad ces smoso// lha'i dbang po bdag cag chos babang gA'i mdun sa 'din gachis pa'i che/ bar nab su 'dis bu'i sa ma brjod pa byangs/ 'dis dbyin ci log du gyung ba'i sems ca rnamams
165b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas/ gang 'di chos thams cad rang bzhin myed pa'o zhes phyin ci log par ston dang/ chos can chos kyi rgyal po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa mu khyud 'di su dag gi rgyal po yin pa'i myi rnams ni/ kye ma'o rnyed par
165b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ste/ kye ma'o myi rnams ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o zhes bzhi so// de skad ces ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// kye grogs po dag
165b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba de ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin na/ rgyal po mu khyud de 'dir 'ongs nas mthong bar khyed 'dod de myi 'dod// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis smras pa
165b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po rgyal po mu khyud de 'dir mchis te mthong bar bdag cag kyang 'tshalo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis// kha lo sgyur ba ta ma li la smras pa// ta ma li tshur shog khyod lnga'i shing rta chang shes rtsibs stong
165b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldam pa rji sa/ rgyal po su khu ga la ba der song ste/ rgyas blo mu khyud la 'di skad gis shig/ rgyal po chen po sum rtsa gsum pa'i sa rnams kyis/ shing tacang shes 'is song dang lda
165b6(dkon brtsegs): sgrib ste mchis na/ rgyal po cher po thags thogs ma mchis pang 'di la bcib su gsol// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i snga rnams ni khyod mthong bar dga'o zhes gis ma/ shing rtal zhon pa dang 'di skad ces gis shi
165b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po lam gang nas gshegs par bgyi// gang gis phyi nad ci log du gyur pa'i phyi nad ci log gis nas bzhud dam/ phyi nad ci log ma mchis pa rnams kyis/ phyi nang ci log ma mchis pa'i sa nas bzhud zhes
165b8(dkon brtsegs): gis shig/ leg so zhes smras nas/ kha lo sgyur ba ta ma la'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin gi ltar mnyan nas babs te/ ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du rgyal po mu khyud de la de skad ces smra so// de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po mu
166a1(dkon brtsegs): 6nakhyud kyis// kha lo sgyur ba te ma li 'di skad ces spra'o// ma ti la de lta bas na lam de gnyis ka nas 'dong ngo // zhes byas pa dang / kha lo sgyur bam ti lis rgyal po mu khyud phyi nang ni log du gyur pa rnams kyi phyir
166a2(dkon brtsegs): ci log gi sa dang / phyi nang ci log myeng ba rnams kyi phyi nang ci log myed pa'i sa de gnyi ga nas drangs te 'dong ngo // rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis kha lo sgyur ba ma ti li la smras pa/ ma ta li de bas na phyin ci log du gyur
166a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa ltas yud tsam zhig shing rta sngog du chug shig de nas kha lo sgyur ba ma ti lis shing rta sdong du 'jug pa'i yun ji srid pa de nyid kyi bar skabasu rgyal po mu khyud kyis srog chags bye ba khrag brgyad bcu de kho na nges par bstan
166a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bkod par gyu red to// 'di ltar bag yod pa dang / mdo na par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'i phyir ro// de dag gis dmyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyu rang to// kha lo sgyur ba'i
166a5(dkon brtsegs): ma ta lis ni rgyal po mu khyud kyis las ci byas pa shes par ma gyur to// de nas khwa lo sgyur ba ma ta lis de bzhin du drangs te/ rgya po mu khrung dang ri rab kyi rtse mo la phyi nang to// de nas rgyal po mu khrung
166a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis rgyang ring po nas nags tshal stug po rnam pa thams cad du sngo ba mthong ste/ mthong nas kha lo sgyur ba ma ta lI la 'di skad ces smraso// ma ta sa nags tshal srug po 'di ni the com myed par phyi nang ci log myed pa'i sems
166a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi gnas yin to// ma ta lis smras pa// rgyal ba chen po 'dini sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i sgra rnams kyi chos bzangs sti'i mdunas na lags te/ sum bcun gsum po'i sgra rnams kyang 'dir lus kyis rgyu
166a8(dkon brtsegs): po chen po thags thogs ma mchis par bzhud cing // sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni khyod mthong bar 'tsha'o// rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po mu khrud de thags thogs myed par nang bu song ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin
166b1(dkon brtsegs): sa rgyal po mu lung bya'i bangos 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas sun gi byed pa brdad to// dengs rgya po su byung kyang ba rgya byin gi spyan byed la 'dug go// denas sti'i dbang ro rgya byi gis rgyal po ma khyung sun las
166b2(dkon brtsegs): jug pa shes nas legs pa bzhin tu dga' bar bya ste/ rgyal po che po khyod kyimed sbyangasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa/ 'jig rten du bdag pa ni khyod kyis rnyeng ba lags par rnyed do// dengs pa'i
166b3(dkon brtsegs): ba brgya bying gis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams so smras pa// kye grogs po dag rgyal po mu khyung 'di ni thebs mkhris pa bsam gis kyi khyab pa dang ldan pa ni/ 'di ltar skad cig tsam la srog chags bye ba phrag brgya cu
166b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos sa 'dul bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po ma khyud kyis da'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso// 'i dbang ngo ba dag na phyir 'dzam du gling du 'gro bar 'dod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
166b5(dkon brtsegs): bangag ngong song ste/ de bani gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang su rung ba bya'o// brgyatsun gos des smras pa/ rgyal ba chen po byeng gang ni dusas bab pa sa khyen bathung cig// denas byos
166b6(dkon brtsegs): dri bring las na sring du byi ras shing cher po dang lnga ring bas sa'as pa la 'aspangs pas// sems ca bye ba dpag tu byed pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyi sanapas 'tshul par gyur to// rgyam bache par ci sas/ 
166b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du the tsom 'am nes nur ba na/ rgyal po khyod kyis de ltar myi blta'o// rgyal po chen po nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po mu khyud ces bya bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po
166b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar rgyal po mu khyud lha'i dbang po brgya byin gi stan phyed la dga' ba myed pas/ mu khyud kyi bag yod pa'i stobs bskyed pa la ltos// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis bag yod pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtson
167a1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni sangs kyi chos// de skad ces bka' stsalang ba dang / rgyal po ras gtsang mas/ bcom ldan
167a2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du// gal te chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos lags na/ de lta na ni sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas leg so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
167a3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa// rgyal po chen po khyod gang dag phyind ci log pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi so// rgyal po chen pos sangs rgyas shes bya ba ni kho na mthong ba'i tshig bla dag so// de kho na mthong ba zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i tshig rdza
167a4(dkon brtsegs): dag so// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bla dgaso// rgyal po chen po chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba de ni gzhan du mying tsam 'am/ brda' tsam 'am/ tha snyad tsam 'am/ kun
167a5(dkon brtsegs): rjod tsam 'am/ brjod pa tsam 'am/ gdags pa cas mo gtog sa par bstan pamyi nuso// rgyal ba chen po chos thams cad skye ba myed pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ desa'i
167a6(dkon brtsegs): chos thas cad myi g.yo myi 'gul zhing / rlom sems myed pas de'i phyir de ni gzungs kyi sgo'o// rgyal po chen po chos thams cad 'gag pa myed pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la ni chos thas
167a7(dkon brtsegs): skyeg ma rgya tshu ni go/ rjem sems myed pas do phy-i ni gangs kyi naro// de bzhin rgyas panas pa ma na 'i rung ba nga man mo byed pa dang / ma skyes pa nga / rang po bying sa ma pa
167a8(dkon brtsegs): snying ba po ma myos padas nga na byang dus ma byas pa dang / 'a na byed padag 'grob byung ba dang sems cad byung ba dang / sgog srung ba dang / gso'i byang pongs gang dag byed pas rlos phreng bas
167b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma myed pa dang / rtags myed pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / bag la nyal myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / rje su chags pa myed pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa/ 
167b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcings pa myed pa dang / grol ba myed pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa dang / rgyug pa myed pa dang / ldog pa myed pa dang dma' ba myed pa dang / gnas pa myed pa dang / 'dug pa myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa dang / 
167b3(dkon brtsegs): nor ba myed pa dang / shes pa po myong pa dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / mthong ba po myed pa dang / myi mthong ba myed pa dang / tshul khrims myed pa dang / tshul khrims ma yin pa myed pa dang / 'gyod pa myed pa dang / mya'i rgya
167b4(dkon brtsegs): pa myed pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba myed pa dang / mchog tu myi dga' ba myed pa dang / dga' ba myed pa dang / myi dga' ba myed pa dang / shin tu sbyangs pa myed pa dang / shi nad tu ma spangs pa myed pa dang / bde ba myed pa dang / 
167b5(dkon brtsegs): myi bde ba myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma yi na pa myed pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin myed pa dang / log pa myed pa dang / yid byung ba myed pa dang / yid mi byung ba myed pa dang / 
167b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral ba myed pa dang / 'dod chags dang ma bral ba mye dab dang / lta ba myed pa dang / lta ba ma yin pa myed pa dang / rnam pa ra grol ba myed pa dang / rnam par ma grol ba med pa dang / shes pa myed pa
167b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / myi shes pa myed pa dang / mthong ba myed pa dang / ma mthong ba myed pa dang / las myed pa dang / rnam par smin pa myed pa dang / tshul bzhin myed pa dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa myed pa dang / rnam pa'i sgo bdun bcu de dag gis
167b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po chos thams cad la 'jug par bya'o// rgyal po chen po gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ma byung myi 'byung da da ltar yang myed do// rgyal po chen po de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
168a1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin ma byung myi 'byung / da ltar yang myed do// rgyal po chen po 'di sa ste dper na/ gzugs brnyan gi gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ma byung myi 'byung / da ltar yang myed do// rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gzugs
168a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang ma byung myi 'byung / da ltar yang myed do// nga rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ brag cha'i rang bzhin yang myi byung / da ltar yang
168a3(dkon brtsegs): myed do// de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang ma byung myi 'byung / da ltar yang myed// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na smig rgyu'i chu'i rang bzhin ni ma
168a4(dkon brtsegs): byung myi 'byung / da ltar yang myed// de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'a du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ya nga myi 'byung / da ltar myed do// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ 
168a5(dkon brtsegs): spu brdos pa ni snying po myed de/ ma byung myi 'byung / da ltar yang myed do// de bzhi na du gzugs kyi rang bzhin nas/ rnam par shes pa'i rang ba zhin gi bar du ma byung myi'i byung da ltar yang myed do// rgyal po chen po
168a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na/ rmyi lam gri yul gi bzang ma ni/ ma byung myi 'byung da ltar myed do// de bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhin nas/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gi byar du ma byung myi 'byung / da ltar yang myed do// rgyal po chen
168a7(dkon brtsegs): bo 'di lta ste dper na/ rmyi lam gi mag she gi bu'i skye ba ni/ ma byung mya'i byung da ltar myed// de bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gi bar dum byung ba myi 'byung bltar myed do// rgyal po chen po
168a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di sa ste per ma nam ma langs gnas byed do// de bzhin du gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bangar du gnas paskyed// rgyal po cher po gzugs pa ni skye byed do// de bzhir du rnam par shes pa'i bar gi du skye bskyed do// 
168b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po gzugs la ni 'gag pa myed do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du 'gag pa myed do// rgyal po chen po 'di ltaste dper na mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la skye ba'am 'gag pa myed do// de bzhin du gzugs
168b2(dkon brtsegs): nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la skye ba 'am 'gag pa myed do// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ chos kyi dbyings la skye ba 'am 'gag pa myed do// de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la skye ba 'am 'gag pa myed
168b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po chos 'di dag ni de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te bsam gis myi khyab pa'i spyod yul// byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i spong yul te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thos
168b4(dkon brtsegs): cad dang thun mong ma yin/ phra ba ma yin/ bstan pa ma yin/ thob pa ma yin/ stong pa ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin/ mdo dran par shes pa ma yin/ yong su shes pa ma yin/ yongasu ma shes
168b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan pa ma yin/ rab tu ma bstan pa ma yin/ bsgrags pa ma yin/ ma bsgrags pa ma yin/ thos par byas pa ma yin/ thos par ma byas pa ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ ma thos pa ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhes
168b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po gang bsnan par bya ba 'am/ dbri bar bya ba'i chos de ni myi dmyigs te// rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni rang bzhin myed pa yin gi// rgyal po chen po 'di la yid yongasu dga' bar bya zhing / gzhan gi dring myi'
168b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la ni gang rtogs pas/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i chos de gang yang myi dmyigs mod kyi/ 'on kyang dmyigasu mod kyang dmyig su mod kyi// 'on kyang dmyigasu
169a1(dkon brtsegs): 6// myed pa'i chos rnams la de bzhin gshegs pas gdags pa bstan to snyam nas// de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma las stsogs bshag kya bdun khri myi skye bya'i chos rnams la bzod pa skyes so// de nas bco// 
169a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas/ mdzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs can/ 
169a3(dkon brtsegs): kha dog du ma dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gi sgo nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gi khas mtha' ya su myed pa'i ngag snang bas rgyas par bkang nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ phyi/ 
169a4(dkon brtsegs): log nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las langs te/ gos 'phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te// bcom ldan 'das
169a5(dkon brtsegs): gA la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la chi/ gsu bcad zhus pa// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa po dpal chen khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad do// 'jig rten snang ba mdzad pa po// 'dzu
169a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol// thams cad mkhyen pa 'dren pa po// rgyu gang gis na 'dzum bstan pa// khyod kyis 'gro ba rnams la ston// bdag gi the tsom myur du khum// shag kya'i tshogs kyi don slad du// 
169a7(dkon brtsegs): go'u ta mas 'dzum pa mdzad// dpa'o 'gro ba dga' mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i the tsom bsal du gsol// bas gtan chen po khyod kyi gsung // thos na 'gro ba'i the tsom 'chad// mchog du dga' ba'i yid 'gyur te// kun kyang khyod kyi
169a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'thob// rgyal ba'i 'dzum gi 'phrin las 'di// khyod kyi sras rnams 'tshal gyur da na// nan tan gis ni rab nges shing // shes pas rje su mchi bar 'gyur// rgyal ba khyu mchog khyod kyis ni// 'gro ba'i the tsom 'di bsam/ 
169b1(dkon brtsegs): gsaso// 'jig rten be tsom chang 'gyur na// bde ba chen po 'thob bar 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcad de slar bka' stsal das// ngas ni 'jus ni gang
169b2(dkon brtsegs): pa// rta thul de ni ngalas nyon// shag kya rnams kyi bla nges pa// yang dag ldazhini lung bstan to// chos rnams dmyig su myed par ni// shag kya rnams kyis yang dag shes// de phyir sangs rgyas chos rnams la// 'di dag
169b3(dkon brtsegs): yid ni nges par bzhag/ dmyigasu myed pa rten nas ni// shag kya grags pa chen po pa// chos rnams kun lo nges gyur nas bla myed byang chub thob par 'gyur// shag kya nges pa 'di dag ni// mye'i ning nas che 'phos nas/ 
169b4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can gi 'jig rten du// 'od dpag myed gi drung du 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs myed pa// bde ba can na gnas pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bye ba grangs myed la// phyogs bcu dag du mchod byed 'gyur
169b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams ni khams gcig na// sangs rgyas bzhugs rnams bsnyen bkur byed// sems can kun la phan tshol zhing // byang chub mchog du smon lam 'debs de bzhin gshegs rnaMs mchod byed/ 
169b6(dkon brtsegs): cing // zhing nas zhing du rnam par rgyu// gang du sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'dong bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba grangs myed du// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mdzod/ 
169b7(dkon brtsegs): nas// de'i 'og du 'dren par 'gyur// de tshe sangs rgyas re re zhing // sems can khrag khrig mang po dag/ byang chub phyir ni sangs rgyas kyis// sangs rgyas dgongs la 'gro ba 'dul// sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing rnams na// 
169b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' la ni bskor// de nas sangs rgyas gang yang ni// nyan thos 'dul bar yongs myi 'gyur// sangs rgyas de dag re re zhing // de ni tshe tshad 'gyur ba ni/ khyeb grangs myong so rnam su// chos son dag na gnasas/ 
170a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de dag mya ngan yongs 'das nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs myed pa// rgyal ba'i sras dag lo grangs ni// bye ba stong du ngam chos 'dzin// myi dbang sras po de dag kyang // stong pa nyid kyis
170a2(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pas// sems can bye bas ma yas dag/ byang chub la ni 'dul bar 'gyur// bag yod pa'i myi rnams ni// bag yod pa la gnas bcas te/ stong pa nyid kyis chos bsten nas// thams cad mkhyen du / 
170a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'byung // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis shag kya 'i// bu'i 'gro ba bstan 'di thos// lhar bcas 'jig rten dgar 'gyur te// byang chub phyir ni yid kyang btang // 
170a4(dkon brtsegs): shag kya lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri
170a5(dkon brtsegs): bu la bka' stsal be// sha ri'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzi/ na de nges par bstan pa 'di// byang chub sems dpa' mthar/ phyi nad pa rnams la bsgrag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i
170a6(dkon brtsegs): bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gang bag tu ste/ des de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang yang ma dmyig so// gang sa ma dmyigs pa de ni mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyaso// gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas rje'i
170a7(dkon brtsegs): mA bstan pa'o// gangs bstan pa di ni ma shes pa'o// gang ma shes pa de ni 'das pa dang / byor ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
170a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi chen pa yin gis/ ji nas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na sa sur pa 'di bzung ba dang klag pa dang / gan dag la yang bya cheng yang dag par bstan par bya ba 'di dag ring bu khyongs po mu gtad // 
170b1(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bskal pa bcu'i bar du/ pha rol tu phyi nang pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / bral bar spyad bus
170b2(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho nas nges par bstan pa 'di than thos gyur kyang // de nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// sha ri'i bu gang gis bskal pa bcu'i bar du// 
170b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa bas/ gang gis sems can gcig cig la 'di bstan na// de nyi dade bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phe'o// gang gi bskal pa gang gi bskal pa bcu'i bar du mnyan te/ gzhan la bsnyad pas// gang gis
170b4(dkon brtsegs): se gol gtogs pa tsam du 'di bsgoms na// de nyid de bas ches da/ song nams mang du 'phel lo// sha ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na ngas par bstan pa 'di
170b5(dkon brtsegs): la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nan tan thams cad kyis gdams par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzi nad de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di bsgoms pas ni/ myur du myi skye bI
170b6(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ sha ri'i bu gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngas lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'di dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin
170b7(dkon brtsegs): kho na nges par bstan pa 'di la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / dge slong dag de dag dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / brgya byinas
170b8(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
171a1(dkon brtsegs): bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog bsregs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya las/ de kho na nges par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ drug pa'o// rdzogs s+ho// / 
171a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gi mkhan pong ni len tra bo do dang / 'dzin myi tra dang / zhu chen gi yo che ba/ ban de ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te// skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// 
171a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya ba las// gang po zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 
171a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'ong ma'i tshal na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
171a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po grangs myed tshad myed pa rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po stan las langs/ nas/ bla gos 'phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas ji
171a6(dkon brtsegs): lha nga sa la btsugs nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi zhu ba cung zad cig mchis na/ de bzhin gshegs
171a7(dkon brtsegs): pas thugs rtse bar dgongs nas/ rje su gnang ba mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams ma'i bu gang po khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas yang dag par bstan nas/ khyod kyis so// 
171a8(dkon brtsegs): rangs par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni yon tan mchog mngon par bsgrubs pas/ grags pa shin tu mtho zhing rgyang ring po rtag par sems can gi bde ba yongasu gnyer ba
171b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slad du zhu ba mchis lagaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// yon tam chogs ni rab sgrubs nas/ grag
171b2(dkon brtsegs): ba mtho zhing rgyang ring ba dang // tshul khrims gtsang zhing chos mos pa'i// spyod pa gang lags bdag zhu lags// ci ltar sems ni sbyong bar bgyi// ci ltar sbyin pa rgya cher btang // ci ltar sems can rab sgrol zhing // 
171b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' sems rtag tu lam bsgom lags// bcom ldan 'das byams mi'i bu gang pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni skyes bu dam pa de dag gi slad du dngos po de lta bu dag zhu ba lags na// byang chub
171b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ci ltar mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bstsags pa yongasu gtugs par myi 'gyur ba lags// ci ltar mang du/ thos pa'i gter rin po che sngags nas// chos rnams la nges pa'i
171b5(dkon brtsegs): don thob pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba la gas// de nas tshig su bcad de gsol pa// ci ltar byang chub se mas dpa' rnams// mang thos rgya mtsho lta bu tshol// chos la nges pa'i
171b6(dkon brtsegs): don thob nas// byang chub lam 'di legs rtogs 'gyur// ji lta bur ni tshig gcig gis/ tshad myed don ni rab rtogs te// 'di ltar shes rab stobs dag gis// chos rnams thams cad rtogs 'gyur lags// mang pos
171b7(dkon brtsegs): mthar thug ma mchis pas// rgol ba mchis kyang sems myi g.yo// snying rtse slad du chos bstan nas/ sems can the tsom gcod bgyid lags// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos yang gsol pa/ 
171b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni sa'i rje su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus pa gsol ba lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
172a1(dkon brtsegs): cha/ ba'i byang chub las yongasu ldog par myi 'gyur lags// de nas yang tshig su bcad de gsol ba// ji ltar myi khom yongs spangs nas// sangs rgyas mang po phrang 'gyur lags// sangs rgyas mang po mthong ngas kyang / shin
172a2(dkon brtsegs): tu dang ba myur thob lags// bla myed dang ba thob 'gyur nas// shinang tu gtong dga' gtong bar 'gyur// thams cad yongasu btang nas kyang // stobs kyi thogs myed lam spyod lags// ji ltar rang byung mos gyu rang nas// dper gan
172a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'i ye shes sgom// ji ltar chos dang 'ga' myi bkri// dngos po bkas ni bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rjes
172a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul thas cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa dang / khams gsum na mchog du gyur nas/ dpe bla ma mchis pa'i ye shes chen po gya nom pa brnyes nas/ chos rnams la spyod pa thogs pa
172a5(dkon brtsegs): myi mingar bar khong du chud pas na/ de'i slad du dang bdag dngos po 'di dag zhu ba lagaso// de nas yang tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan ma tshogs bzhugs pas// rdzu 'phrul pha ros rab tu
172a6(dkon brtsegs): byon// thogs pa myi mnga' mchog brnyes pas// dpa'o khyod la bdag/ zhu lags// chos rnams thams cad legs bslabs pas/ yon tan mtho zhing mngon par 'phags/ mun bcos shes rab snang bskyed pas/ 
172a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor mang thams cad dga' bar mdzad// dgra zun byams sdang myi mnga' zhing // mya ngan myi mnga' bslu myi mnga' 'chi bdag las na rib dgal zhing // bdud dpung dag ni pham par mdzad// mtshon cha thogs pa myi mnga' ba// dgra rnams
172a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad pham par mdzad// rtag par byams pa'i thugs ldan zhing // tshul khrims rnam dag brtan par gnas// bcom ldan g.yo sgyu myi mnga' zhing // nga rgyal myi mngara' drags myi mngara'// rnam grol rigs pa rnyes pas na// yod tang / 
172b1(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi mchog du 'gyur/ ci ltar sngon gi las spyad pas// mkhyen pa mchog ni brnyes pa dang / ji ltar spyad na sangs rgyas pa// bdag la de'i bkas bshad gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i du
172b2(dkon brtsegs): gang po la bka' stsal gi// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la dngos po de lta bu dag zhus pa leg so log so// shinang tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems bskyed
172b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa thams cad mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par snyan par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa// ngas deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 
172b4(dkon brtsegs): dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas// rab tu brtson pa'i stobs da ga gis// byang chub lam spyad bshang bar bya// byang chub sa mas dpas spyad pa'i// lhag pa'i ni bsam tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas lung
172b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan gyur pa// dngos po de dag mdor bstan to// lhag pa'i bas bas chos mos sems// tshad myed mtha' yang yod pa ma yin// spyod pa sna tshogs ston byed pa// dngos po gcig gis grub myi 'gyur// dga'
172b6(dkon brtsegs): sems nang gi rab rgyas pas// sbyin pa dag ni gtong byed pa// sbyin pa gtong yang 'gyod myed pas// de'i sems ni dga' bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpal 'di snyam du// sems can rtag tu rgyud pas ni// mang du thos pa'i cho sa
172b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan// bdag gis btsal bya snyam du sems// sems can rtag tu rgud pa yang // le lo'i dbang las gyur pas na// bdag gis brtson 'grus rab bskyed de// byang chub thob bya snyam du sems// bdag gis sems cad ched du ni/ 
172b8(dkon brtsegs): yid bzhin bzod pa rab spyad// tshig ngan sma 'brobs brdegs gyur kyang // lan yang myi smra snyam du sems// bdag la sma 'bebs su zhig yin// sma 'bebs khong khro byed pa'i// dngos po thams cad stong snyam sems// 
173a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar ming la sems myed pas sems la khong khro khon 'dzin myed// rtag tu bzod pa bsgoms pas na/ des na mngon par 'tshang yang rgya// sems can dge sems myed pa la// 'jig rten sgron mas byas
173a2(dkon brtsegs): nas ni// mgon dang skyabs ni byed pas na// nor myed nor dang ldan par byed// sems can lam log spyod pa ni// de dag snying rtse'i gnas yin pas// bdag gis yongasu bzlas nas ni// mya ngan 'das la gzhan
173a3(dkon brtsegs): snyam sems// sems can thams cad dgus pas na// shes rab nor dang yong myi ldan/ bdag gis pas cad mkhyen thob nas// de dag tshim bya snyam sems te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// seMs
173a4(dkon brtsegs): can yongs bzla ba'i phyir// sems bskyed byang chub tshol bas na// de 'dra'i smon lam 'debs par byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub ses
173a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rgyu rkye nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// sems kyi ston par byed pas kyang // chos 'ga' tsam la yang gnas par myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
173a6(dkon brtsegs): ni chos thams cad yang dag par bslabs nas// de'i 'og du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba so// byang chub sems dpa' ni ngo mtshar rmad du 'byung ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pas/ chos gzhan
173a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yang dngos po 'di las lhag par yang dag par rje su myi mthong ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems can le lo can rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom par byed pa gang yin pa de ni// ngo mtshar rmang du/ 
173a8(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i dngos po dang po zhes bya'o// khong 'khro ba'i sems can nan te bo che de dag gi nang na bzod pa sgom par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po gnyis pa zhes bya'o// sems can la log
173b1(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pa dag mthong nas/ bdag nyid yang dag pa'i lam la brtson pa shA ra byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du 'byung ba'i dngos po gsum pa zhes bya'o// sems can 'khor ba las yongasu bzla ba'i phyir
173b2(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pas blo na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya ste// gang ngo mtshar rmad du 'byung ba'i dngos
173b3(dkon brtsegs): po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po mchog ces bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa// sems can le lo can mthong na// brtson
173b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus sems ni bskyed byed pa// bdag gis de la chos myin pa'i// dngos po bstan snyam yong myi sems// khong 'khro bstan par myi byed// khong 'khros sangs rgyas lam myin zhes// rtag tu byas
173b5(dkon brtsegs): sems bsgom pas nas// byang chub de las skye bar 'gyur// sems can lam log mos pas na// log pa'i lam la gnas pa/ ra byed// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag lam// btsal nas
173b6(dkon brtsegs): sems nan 'god par byed// 'khor ba'i nyes dmyigs mthong bas na// rtse gcig sangs rgyas ye shes tshol// bla myed gter ni rnyed la gyur nas// sems can bzla bya snyam du sems// rmad byung dngos
173b7(dkon brtsegs): bo 'di dag las// lhag pa gzhan ni su yang myed// de lta bas na lhag myed chos// thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya// lus kyi gos ni tshig pa dang // mgo mye ni 'bar ba bzhin// lo so'i sems ni skye
173b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na// myur ba nyid du sel bar byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can rnams ni
174a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba na gnas shing gnas brtson 'grus myi rtsom par mthong la// bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi lam la gnas nas brtson 'grus rtsom par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sas
174a2(dkon brtsegs): tsan rnams ni rtag par le lo can du 'gyur ba mthong la/ bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi snyan pa la gnas nas// brtson 'grus rtsom pas mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang sems can rnams ni'o// 
174a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog can du 'gyur ba mthong la/ bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid ni khong khro 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog myed cing rtag par byams pa'i sems dang ldan par mthong bas/ 
174a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho nyes mngon par sgrub par brtson pa gzhan su yang bdag da nga mtshungs pa myed par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba
174a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa// sems can le lo can mthong na// bdage nyid brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// bdag
174a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid dga' sems thos par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i nyes dmyigs mthong bas na// skyo ba'i sems ni rab tu skye// khams gsum brtson ra 'jigs pas na// brtson pa'i sems kyis spong bar byed// sems can
174a7(dkon brtsegs): khong khro kho na 'dzin dga'// bdag nyid byams sems gnas pas na// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// dga' ba de'i sems ni skye bar 'gyur// sems na rnams kyis gang byas pa// de dag thas cad myi bya ba
174a8(dkon brtsegs): de phyir bdag gis bla myang ba'i// sangs rgyas lam ni btsal snyam sems// sangs rgyas kyis ni bsngags pa'i// yang dag ye shes gang yin pa// bdag gis ye shes de bslabs nas// sems can kun gi skyangs/ 
174b1(dkon brtsegs): bya sems// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// rtag tu dga' sems skye bas na// 'dus byas myi bden bdag la ni// yang dag chos ni skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang pos byang chub seMs
174b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// myi khom pa rnams dang bral ba ste// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par bsgrubs pa chud myi za bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ses
174b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dman zhing shin tu mnyen pas na// sems can dag mthong bar 'gyur ba'i tshe// rtag par 'ongs sam zhes mdangs dang ldan pas gsong por smra zhing // phan tshun tshig sbyin par byed pas// rtag par 'dzum pa
174b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yin// sems rtse gcig du chos gnyer zhing rtag par 'dri rtog la rab tu mos pas na// dge ba'i don tshol zhing brtson pa la chog kyi shes pa myed pa yin// dben pa'i gnas la mos shing gcig la dga'
174b5(dkon brtsegs): ba yin// bdag nyid byang chub kyi lam na gnas shing sems can gzhan yang byang chub kyi lam la gnas par 'dzud pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na// mya khom
174b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang bral te// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par bsgrub pa chung za bar myi 'gyu ro// de nas de'i tshe tshig su bcad de bka' stsalang pa// mnyen pa'i sems dang
174b7(dkon brtsegs): rab ldan zhing // rtag par byams sems bsgom pas na// sems can dag dang smra ba'i tshe// sems dman gsong por byed// rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags pa yin// zab mo gya nom chos kyang tshol// rtag par tshul khris
174b8(dkon brtsegs): gtsang srung zhing // sbyangs pa'i spyod la mos pa yin// sbyangs pa'i chos la rab gnas kyang // shes rab zab mo spyad pas na// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// myi khomo rab spangs dpal dang ldan// rtag tu sangs rgyas
175a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni// chos zab rnams ni zhu byed pas// de phyir shes rab 'phel 'gyur nas// myi khom gnas ni skye bar myi 'gyur// rtag par dgon par gnas mos shing // rnam dag sbyangs pa spyod pas ni// 
175a2(dkon brtsegs): de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// myi khom rab spangs khom dang ldan// blo ldan mkhas pa gang dag gis// chos 'di bzhi la bsten byed na// myi khom thams cad rab spangs nas// sangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur// 
175a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mang po mthong nas kyang // myi 'jigs dang dang ldan pas na// brtson 'grus mchog ni rab bskyed nas// sangs rgyas ye shes tshol bar 'gyur// de phyir ye shes gnyer ba dag/ yang dag chos ni bslab par/ 
175a4(dkon brtsegs): bya// yang dag chos ni bsla gyur na// byang chub lam ni thob myi dka'/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i le'u ste// dang po'o// 
175a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa// gong ba byang chub sa mas dpa' chos pazhidang ldan na/ mang du thos pargya mchen rngu ra bstsags pa yin pas yongasu gtugs par myi 'gyur// rtag par yang
175a6(dkon brtsegs): du thos pa'i gter rin po che bstsags nas// chos rnams la des nga'i don thob pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos yongasu chol byed
175a7(dkon brtsegs): bas// gsung rabs yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyang pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i de dang / tshig su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / de lta bu'i
175a8(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmang du byung ba'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / gtan la phab pa'i sde rnams yongasu tshol bar byed do// yongasu btsal nas kyang / glog
175b1(dkon brtsegs): cing 'don du 'don par byed// klog cing la don du bton nas yang dag par rjesu dran par byed/ yang dag par rjes su dran par byas nas kyang // ji skang bas nub bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub par byed de// gang / 
175b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang po chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bus bstsags pa yin pas yongs su gtugs par myi 'gyur zhing / rtag par mang du bos pa'i gter rin/ 
175b3(dkon brtsegs): poche bsngags nas/ chos rnams ma nges pa'i don thob pas/ tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la gnas pa myed pas/ 
175b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag kyang gnas bya ba myed do// gnas pa myed pa'i chos rnams lasaganas pa myed pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// gnas myed pa'i ye shes
175b5(dkon brtsegs): thob pas chos rnams las thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes dang / ma zong thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang po 'dod chags par bya ba'i chos gang yang myed pa'i phyir te/ byang chub
175b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang chos gnyis po 'di dang ldan par gyu rang na// mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bsogs pa yin pas yongs su gtugs par myi 'gyur zhing // rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin
175b7(dkon brtsegs): po che bstsags nas// chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pa tshig gi don rnams las legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni chos yongs su gnyer ba'i rgyu
175b8(dkon brtsegs): dang rkyend kyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su dran par byed do// des chos kyi rgyu dang / rkyend kyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing // sangs
176a1(dkon brtsegs): sas rgyas chos rjes su drang bar gyur ba na 'donags par bya ba'i chos 'ga' yang dag pa rjes su myimathong // des 'do chags myed par byir ches thams cad la sems kyi mngon par zhen pa byed/ des
176a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la mngon pa byinan pa myed// des chos thams cad la mngon par med pa skyed pa'i phyir/ dris pa rnams kyis rjes su lan 'debs pa la thogs pa myed par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsub 'di dag dang ldan pa 'gyur
176a3(dkon brtsegs): na/ mang du thos pa mtsho chen po lnga bu bsugs pa yin pas yongasu btugs par myi 'gyur zhing rtag ldang du thos pa'i gter rin po bsngags na/ chos rnams la nges pa'i don thos par tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur
176a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni dmyigs pa myed pa'i byams bla su 'tshogs par 'gyur bas spyod pa dag la thogs myed de/ dmyigs pa myed pa'i byis pa ni dngos po rnams myi le nang pa gang po yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na
176a5(dkon brtsegs): gang po gang mtshan ma 'di la gnas par gyur na yang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug skyed par byed la/ gang mtshan ma 'di la gnas khar gyur na yang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug skyed par byed pas sa
176a6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po'i mtshan ma 'am/ phung po'i mtshan ma 'am/ rdzas kyi mtshan ma 'am/ skye mched gi mtshan ma 'am/ khas kyi mtshan ma'i chos kyi mtshan ma laM/ chos ma yin pa'i mtshan ma'i mtshan ma gnas par gyur na yang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang
176a7(dkon brtsegs): deng gti mug skyed par byed pas de'i phyir/ gang po nim du len pa'i mtshan ma dang bcos pa de dag thams cad ni log pa'i lta ba zhes bya ste/ byang chub ses dpa' ni mtshan ma de dag thes cang nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i cheng du/ byams pa sgom par byed pas/ 
176a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'jig pa'i phyir dngos po yang 'jig pa nyid do// dngos po 'jig pa'i phyir lta ba yang 'jig pa nyid do// zhes byang chub seMs dpa' de'i chos thams cad rna bar bshig nas/ byams pa sgo bar byed de/ de lta bu'i byams pa gang
176b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa 'di ni dmyigs pa myed pa'i byams pa shes bya'o// de lta bu'i dmyigs pa myed pa'i byams pa gang yin pa ca 'di ni chos kyi byams pa zhes bya'o// de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi byams pa zhes bya'o// gang
176b2(dkon brtsegs): po sangs rgyas kyi byams pa gang zhe na/ mngon par 'du byed pa myed cing 'jig pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi byams pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang po yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du chos thas cang rab tu rtogs pa gang yin pa 'di ni sangs
176b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi byams po zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ri ltar byed bgying na yang dag pa jis pa bani du chos thas cang ba tu rtogs pa zhes bgyid lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsal dpa/ gang po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ 
176b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni chos zhes sam/ 'di ni chos ma yin zhes sems par myi byeda'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang po gal te chos yod do zhes zer na/ de ni chos ma yin pas gal te chos myed par gyur na/ chos ma yin pa yang myed par 'gyur bas/ de la smos
176b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ci yang myed paso// spros pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ mya ngan las 'ang sa pa zhes bya ste/ khyod kyis de ltar rab tu brtags pa de shi nang tu thag ring ba zhig yin no/ 'on te shin tu thag nye ba zhig yin/ gang pos
176b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ de ni thag ring ba yang ma lags thag nye ba lagaso// de ci'i slong du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bu don la ni phyogs kyang ma mchis/ gnas ma mchis/ nang zhes bgyi ba yang mchis phyi zhes bgyi ba yang mchis so// @
176b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsa lang pa/ de bzhin du gang po khyod kyis chos tshwa grangasu bgrang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das chos ji lta bu zhig la grangs su bgrang bar bgyi ba lags/ gang po ji tsam du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon
176b8(dkon brtsegs): par med par bya ba'i chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dbyigs par gyi mdzad/ sgrub par phyi ma dang / mngon du phyi mdzang zhes des bu'i chos myi rtog pa gang yin pa de ni grangs su 'grang ba zhes bya'o// gang po chos kyi tshe grangs de dag ni
177a1(dkon brtsegs): chos tu ma pa skyed pa pa yin par byor/ gang ba dang myong pa di ltar rang tu zer pa gyim mchog das pa sangs rgyas rgyalas yongs su srung bar 'gyur ba bshad par byar// gang po ma ngas pa'i dus na/ 'dzin rten
177a2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa la gdu ba dgu gte madro sde 'ad thos par 'gyur na/ mnyan pa dang len par thos par myi 'gyu ro// gang po ngas byang chub ces brjod pa'i tshig 'di khyod kyis sgra dang tshig cam du phyogs cung zad cig rtogs par 'gyur bar zad kyi/ 
177a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i don gi tshul ni khyod kyis shes par myi nu so// don 'di ni shin du zab pas tshig gis brjod par bya ba ma yin gi/ mkhas pa dag gis nang gis rig par bya yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka' rtsal ba
177a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis don ni myi rtogs pa/ sangs rgyas chos la mya ngan skye/ gal te don ni rig gyur na// sangs rgyas de la ston pa mdzad// sangs rgyas ston par gang sems pa// de ni mya ngan 'das gnyer bas 'thab rtsod seMs ni
177a5(dkon brtsegs): myed par yang / yang dag chos ni sems par byed// 'di la chos skye yod pa myin/ 'gag pa'i chos kyang yod myin te/ skye dang 'gag pa myed gyur pa// de ni chos rnams yang dag mtshan// chos gang skye ba myed pa la// byed dang / 
177a6(dkon brtsegs): 'drung ba yod kyi 'gyur/ yin nga ma yin tho dang ga// chos 'dis ni dag byed/ de ni mya ngan 'das yin te// den 'gag par bya ba byed/ thag nyi ring gang rer ba de dag ga nyi gsung ba yid// gang nig stong por rtog gyur dpa// de
177a7(dkon brtsegs): da yin// myangang 'das pa ga zhes pa// nga'i slob sa zhes bya'o// gang pa byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos pani po 'di dang lda pad+ma gyu ra namang du thos pargyam chen po sa dzun bstsags pa yin pas// yongs su 'dugs pa cu
177a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po bsags nas/ chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pas/ tshig gi don rnams legs pa khong du chung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'akyis tshig su bcang bka' yu
177b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag du mang thes gnyer 'dod pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags gyur cing // yang dag nges don thob 'gyur bas// de phyir rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur// yi ge 'bru ni gcig pu dang // tshig gi don ni gcig tsam yang // skal pa bye bar brgya stong du
177b2(dkon brtsegs): brjod kyang zang par myi 'gyur ro// de phyir yang dag chos gnyer bya// gnyer nas tshul bzhin bsam bya'i// chos kyi mtshan nyid myi blang zhing // sangs rgyas sngags la zhen myi bya// de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran zhing // yang dag chos ni dran pa
177b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'adod chags rtsod par byed sems kyis// 'dren pa yongs su gnyer bar bya// rtag par seMs can rnams la ni// byams pa'i sems mi bsgom par bya// sems can la ni zhen myed par// chos rnams thams cad zhi bar bya// byang chub seMs/ 
177b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' grags chen bgyis// 'di 'dra'i chos ni sgrub byed na// myur du gzungs ni thob 'gyur bas// mang du thos pa de las skyes// ji ltar nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid 'phel zhing 'grib pa myed pa ltar// chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin te/ 'phel ba/ 
177b5(dkon brtsegs): myed cing 'grib pa myed// ngas ni shes rab stobs dag gis// bskal pa tshad myed grangs myed du// chos rnams yongs su bshad gyur kyang // 'on kya nga bshad pa zhes myi brjod/ seMs can nyid ni ji snyed pa// thas cad myi lus
