199a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bdi 'du shes rnams gsum skye/ lus kyi rgyun 'i chang po 'gyur// myi den 'du shes bya rtog na// nyes dado myig 'di dag yang kyi gyur// ga tu tshas rnams sems byam na// rkyen las byung ba rab tun/ 
199a8(dkon brtsegs): ma ma mas ma su // de rtso ma pa lug pag da / ma
199b1(dkon brtsegs): skyed/ yong byas smras// mas// / byams ma ma/ 
199b2(dkon brtsegs): smin ni las rgyu nas pas na// rnam smin 'di myod snyams su sems// drang du blangs te ma myod bas chub lam la gnas par byed// snod dang sdug bsngal dngos po 'di'i// gzhon gis byas pa ma yin gyi// 'din
199b3(dkon brtsegs): nges pa las kyi rkyen// yun rings lon yong chud myi za// sems can 'jig rten gnas padag/ rtag tu dge sdig la slong bas// deng bdag sdug bsngal 'di myong yang // las rkyen yin par rab tu shes// gal/ 
199b4(dkon brtsegs): ngan pas lan byas na// phyis kyang sdug sngal myong bar 'gyur na// tsa'i dngos po ngan pa yin// de dag la ni gnod bya ste// / bla na myed pa'i chos gnyer nas// gzhan dag la ni ston byed pas// 
199b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can sdug bsngal ci snyed pa/ thams cad las ni thar bar khyed// gal te 'ga' zhig ma tog spos// 'phrong ba dag/ shes bdag mdzod cing // rjes su chags pa myi skyed par// mnyam
199b6(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa bsgrub bye ste// byams sdang dag ni lam smin pas// rtag tu btang snyoms spyod par byed// sus byi su ni len byed ces// chos rnams yang dag rtogs par byed// stong pa byin cipo stong len na// phyin
199b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyig stong bas na// stong la byin dang len myed pas// thams cad kun la bdag byed// stong la 'dod chags bral ba myong // stong la kun nyon mongs byed// rnam par byang ba myed pa sun// dri dral rjengs son
200a1(dkon brtsegs): yin// stong pa rnam par rtog pa myed// stong la ngo bo nyid mtshan rnams myed// stong ni drug stong mtshan ma myed// de ni rnam dag lam yin// gal te 'ga' zhig 'ongs gyur nas// lus ni dum bur bcad gyurd kyang // las kyi
200a2(dkon brtsegs): las byung rig pas// de la zhesdang yang myi skyed// sems can dge sdig slong bas na// las bzhin rang nyid 'bras bu len// bdag kyang nges par snga ma'i sdig// sdug bsngal rnams sprin 'ang myong ba snam// sdig pa'i rdo sprin
200a3(dkon brtsegs): dimyong ba yang na/ lus rtags gzugs brnyan chu bur dang // sgyu ma sprul pa smyig rgyu 'dra// stong zhing myed pas mthar yang stong // kha cig lus kyis yan lag gcod// kha cig drin ni dran gyu rad nas// mtsho nga gi ni byas
200a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang / ka dga' dang myi dga'i yod mya byed// rnyed pa thub kyang de ga' ba myed// khang du byas kyang khong myi 'khro// 'di gnyis sgrib pa yin pa na// sangs rgyas yang dag lam myin sems// 'dod chag
200a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gti mug sems// de dag thams cad spong bar byed// rtag tu stong dben sgoms pas na// sgrib pa rnams ni spong bar byed// bzod pa stobs bcu'i gzhi yin te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gnas// thogs
200a6(dkon brtsegs): myed ye shes snying rjesa'i// rtsa ba dag ni bzod pa yin// bden bzhi dran pa dang yang spong // dbang stobs byang chub lam yan lag/ thams cad bzod pas gzhi byed pas// mkhas pa gang zhig bzod mya sgom // ngas kyang
200a7(dkon brtsegs): byar na ser ni// bla ra myed 'khor lo bskor ba yang // bzod pa dag gyis gzhi byas pas// sangs rgyas rtag tu bsngags// khyed kyang stong bzod bla myed gzhi// yongasu bsgom par byed na ni// sangs rgyas yon tan thob pa
200a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rnams ni 'dod pa lnga po dag spangs nas// rtag par rab tu byung bar mos pas sems kyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su 'brang bar byed// rab tu byung
200b1(dkon brtsegs): ba la gzhol bar byed pas 'dod pa lnga po dag la mngon par zhe nad par myi byed do// rab tu byung nas 'du 'dzinang rnams spangs nas// shin tu thag ring ba'i ri dang / nags tshul dben pa dag tu gnas shing // dge ba'i chos
200b2(dkon brtsegs): rlung myi za bar byed de byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcang ngo
200b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal ba// rab tu byung la mos pas// rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// ri dang nags tshal gnas mos pas// yon tan 'byung gnas 'phel bar byed// dben par gnas la sten byed pas// 'dod lnga'i chags
200b4(dkon brtsegs): ya yongasu spong // de ni 'du myed pas na// dge chos rkyen ni nyams myi 'gyur/ phan tshun 'dul zhing rtam 'dri dang // tshig gis smra ba myed pas na// stong dben nyer bzhi bde ba la// sngag sangs rgyas kyis rab tu sngags// de phyir
200b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rtag par yongs su bsten bya zhing // grong khyer la ni chags myi bya// bsnyen na rnyed sems skye bar 'gyur/ bsten pa thos nas rab tu dga'// stor bar gyur na mya ngan skye// des
200b6(dkon brtsegs): 'os sangs rgyas mchod byas kyang // mchod pa byas shes myi brjod// 'di 'dra'i nyer dmyigs spong 'dod na// rnyed pa rnams ni spang bar bya// spangs na sa gnas dben rab gnas nas// stong pa'i chos ni sgom par bya// gnan
200b7(dkon brtsegs): sde'adra greng 'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par chos gnyer ba yongasu slob par bya'o// yang su gnyer nas kyang klog ning 'don tu 'dod na// 'di ltar tshul khrims yongasu dag pa dang // sbyangs pa'i yon tan shin tu 'dra ba'i chos yongasu
200b8(dkon brtsegs): che ba bar byed gyi// 'dod pa mang ba dang / chog sgra pa'i chos yongasu tshal bar myi byeda'o// 'dod chags nye bar zhi ba yongasu tshal bar byed kyi// 'dod chagre spang bar bye // zhesang gzhi po yongasu tshol bar byed kyi// zhesdang 'phel bar myi byed
201a1(dkon brtsegs): phyagagazong ba yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ gti mug skyed par myi byed do// khengs pa gnos pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi// byings pa spong ba yongs su tshol bar myi byed/ kyang rgyal gzhom pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ 
201a2(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal 'phel ba yongs su tshol bar myi byed do// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos spro ba yongs su tshol bar byed kyi// bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos 'phel bar byed pa yongasu tshol bar myi byed do// bdag med pa'i chos yongs su tshol
201a3(dkon brtsegs): dag / nga/ rdzogs pas / pa na 'gyur ba khrimasas su rgyab bya/ sems
201a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ tshul ba'i dus ngas par ming 'byed/ jimed bstan paba'in du yang dag par sgrub par byed/ gzhan dag pa yang dag par tu bston par byed kyang / 'jig der dra'i ba yang yongs su thol ba
201a5(dkon brtsegs): byed la/ yan legs sa zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod pacas yang yongs su tshol bar mi byed pas ga sems pan mang bachas de ladog par byed de// gang po byang chu'i sems dpa' gang chas gsum pa 'di dang ldan par tha dang / so
201a6(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshegs su bcad de bka' stsal da pa// byang chub sems dpa' ngang thung // tshul khrims srungs pa dag la mos/ nges nashes rapa yongs su
201b1(dkon brtsegs): sems da yeshes car ni phebs par byed// rnam dag chos de de thob nas/ yang dgadu pas don sems byed // ji sang bstan pa bzhin du ni// de bzhin la dag smrab par byed// rtag tu rnam dag sems kyis me// gnam
201b2(dkon brtsegs): ma bstanas/ sems pa mang po pam dgas kyang / sems papa srung ba byed/ yod tananams kyi zhing nas/ bdag ni chas ga gnas gang / san m+b+hang de ya gang byung bas / dbying sangs rgyas chem 'phes 'gyur/ 
201b3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa tshang myed rnams su ni// yon tan mang po ca ba sngags pa// thams cad mngon du gyur nas ni// byang chub lam du sdud 'jug 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i// chos zab dag ni yongs su btsal nas rtag par sems/ 
201b4(dkon brtsegs): can bstan par bya// yon tan rnams ni de las skyes// gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / sbyangs pa'i chos la rab tu gnas par gyur na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
201b5(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs myed pa tshad myed cing mtha' yas pa/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam gyis myi khyab pa bya ba de'i tshe
201b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rag pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa'i 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na myed pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sbyar ba lha dang phyi rnams kyi ston pasangs
201b7(dkon brtsegs): byas bcom ldan 'das me ro gan 'da' zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug tu thob par 'gyur ro// 'dus pa re re la chos bstan pa'i tshe/ nyin pos bye brag brgya bcu dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 
201b8(dkon brtsegs): gang po de bzhin gshegs pa mo rogan 'dang yongs su mya ngan lam 'das pa'i 'og tu ngam pa'i chos ni go lnga brgya'i bar du gnas par 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu// zhag bdun tshun chad nyan thos
202a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i srid pa pa la cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su yongs su mya ngam pas 'das par gyur to// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa de yang dri lta bzhin du migs ma'i lnga'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten dubyung bar gyur te/ can thos cher
202a2(dkon brtsegs): po rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i tshe skye bo rnams phal cher 'di snyam du// dge sbyong gi chos ni rab bde zhing skyed yin na/ bdag cag ci'i phyir so so nas rab tu myi 'byung snyam du sems nas/ so so nas sgra dang / kha spu bregs te
202a3(dkon brtsegs): chos gos ngur smrigs bgos nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu 'byung ngo // rab tu byung nas kyang dngos po gsum po rtag par khyim du 'gro zhing 'dul bar byed pa dang / rnyed pa la mngon par zhen nas bdag nyid tshol bar byed pa dang / bdag
202a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid nyam 'chog che ba 'ba' shig tu sbyor zhing // bsod nams dang ye shes dang myi ldan pa 'ba' shig spyod par 'gyur bas// dngos po gsum po 'di 'ba' shig spyod pad+ma gyi/ las gzhan ni mngon par myi sgrub par gyur to// lo brgya 'das pa'i 'og
202a5(dkon brtsegs): tu nyan thos chen po thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das te ma lus par gyur pas dge slong mang po de dag khyim pa rnams dang mthun par byed/ cing // sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde zab mo rnams dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / 
202a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod lam zhib mo gya nom pa'i chos rnams ni phal cher spangs nas/ su yang glog cing 'don pa myed par gyur to// gang po de'i tshe dge slong mang po rnams 'dod pa mang po la spyod par mos shing / bza' ba dang btung
202a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ro la chags par gyur pas/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu dam shi ra'i zhes bya ba rgyal po shin tu byams shing gces par byed pa zhig yod de// des gnas dben pa zhig du 'dug nas 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' chos ci lta bu zhig brnyes
202a8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ deng de'i nyan thos rnams bag myed par spyod cing khyim pa rnams dang bye brag myed par gyurd ces de snyed du sems shing the tsom du gyurd pa dang / de'i tshe lta zhig de'i thad du 'ongs nas lus myi snang bar byas te/ 'di skad du kye rgyal bu de bzhin gshegs
202b1(dkon brtsegs): bi me rog na 'da' brnyes pa'i chos ni shin tu zab shing yongs su dag la rnam par nges pa yin no// zhes smras so// de nas rgyal bu des/ lha de skad smra ba thos pa dang / 'di skad du kye de bzhin gshegs pa me rog na 'da' brnyes pa'i chos shim
202b2(dkon brtsegs): tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par shes par gyur pa'i dngos po de ji lta bu zhig yin// lhas smras pa/ rgyal bu chos de ni gzugs kyang myed/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang myed/ phung po dang khams
202b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye mched kyang myed/ 'dod pa lnga yang myed/ 'dod pa'i sems kyang myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa me rogan 'das de lta bu'i chos shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam pa nges pa brnyes pas/ sems can rnams la yang dag par
202b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston to// de nas rgyal bu lha de la smras pa/ bdag gis ng+ge ltar bu rjod thos shing khongs su chung bar gyur nas/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin da du bsgrub tu rung ngam// kye ma rgyal bu khyod sems rtse gcig tu nam tan brtson
202b5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus byas shig dang / thob par dka' ba myed do// gang po de'i tshe rgyal bu de/ 'di snyam du nges par ltas kyang bskul te// bdag gis khong du chud par byas pas bdag rab tu byung nas/ chos zab mo de yongs su gnyer bar
202b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// snyam du bsams nas/ pha ma ga la ba de song ste/ mgos gdugs te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum deng bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi ro ga na 'da'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ lam yongs su gnyer
202b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'tshal lo// pha mas smras pa/ khyod deng deng spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ci dgos/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba rnams dang bye brag tu gyu ra pa ci yang myeng ngo // de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa de
202b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar dge slong mang po rnams/ bag myed 'dod pa lnga yang spyod// zhing rmod nyo tshong byed pas ma// khyim pa rnams dang bye brag myed// dbul po sdug bsngal rab mang zhing // bdag nyid gso ba mya nus pa// de 'dra'i skye bo mang po rnams// lus srog/ 
203a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir nirab tu byung // khyod ni rgyal rigs khyim du skyes// phyig cing 'dod lnga'i bde bamyong // nor dang rin chen ba mang ba// rab tu byung bas ci zhig bya// de nas rgyal bu mashis pa ma la tshegs su bcang de smras pa ka bdag ni dbang drug
203a2(dkon brtsegs): myi tshol te// gal te thos kyang spong bar bgyid// deng bdag sangs rgyas chos zab dang // rnam dag tshul khrims 'ba' shig tshol// gal zhig bdag ni go bgyis te// rab tu byung bar bskul bas na// sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i zab mo'i chos/ 
203a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni rab tu rtogs par 'tshal// lhas spras bdag gis thos na// sems ni rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bstan pa nub tu nye// bdag ni grogs bgyi srung bar sems// de nas pha mas tshigs su bcad de dam shri la smras pa/ 
203a4(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde zab mo zad nus pas// kha thon 'don pa yod myed na// de ring khyod kyis su la ni// sangs rgyas chos zab thob par 'gyur// gal te 'khor ni bzhi po las// don zab 'don pa yod gyur na// de la khyod kyis sngar mnyan nas// de 'og rab tu
203a5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba rigs// da ma shrI ris tshigs su bcad de pha mas la spras pa// deng bdag nan tan brtson 'grus kyis// tshul khrims srung zhing sbyangs pa spyad // thag ring ri dang nags tshal gam// sangs rgyas chos zab rnam dag tshol// 
203a6(dkon brtsegs): gang pong mabris tshigs su bcang pa 'digs sa/ man thos byas byas te/ rab byung bar gsol ba btab pa dang / 'am gnyis kyang bang kyi smra bar gas // de ngas dge slong rnams kyi bang du song nas// spa dpa' su breg sa sa
203a7(dkon brtsegs): gos ngur skyigs bgos nas rab tu byung ste// bslab pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag par blangs nas/ gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das rjes su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan
203a8(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad// bdag gis thos par gyur na ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bslab par 'tshal lo// zhes smras pa dang / gang po dge slong mang po rnams kyis/ dge slong dam shri la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las chos thos pa ni myed
203b1(dkon brtsegs): byin mkhar po dang sbobang po rnams kyi ngas su spyod pas deng myong bang 'di lta du'i rgyas la srung ga// de nas dge slong ma bris dge slong bang po rnams su la smras pa/ khyong na gdong byir bar dadus pa spang rimamasas rab tu byung bayir bas/ 
203b2(dkon brtsegs): ro'i phyir deng kyong rgas pas 'ab zhig lhur len pa spyong pa rnams// khyim bdag dang bye brag tu gyur ba ci yang myed pas// deng khyod bdag dang ldan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yongs su dag par bcas par bya'o// de nas do'i che dge slong mang po
203b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de/ dge slong ngam shri ri la smras pa// bdag gis ni gang sgrub pa// dngos po de ni thob gyur bas// gos zas dag ni 'byor de cing ldan// rgyal pos bkrol ba las kyang thar// shi nang tu bde zhing rab tu skying // brnyas shing nga rgyal
203b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa myed ka khyim pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa// de dag da ltar gang yang myed// 'di nyid mya ngan las 'das pas// mchog tu bde bar gyur pa yin// dngos po 'di las lhag par ni// bdag cag la ni dgos pa myed// khyim pas rtag tu
203b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byor dbul bas// bdag cag chos gos lhung zed mang // sman dang nor zas shin tu mang / sbyin bdag khyim yang rab tu mang // gang po de'i cha dge slong mang po rnams kyi kyi tshigs su bcang de// de skad smras pa thos pa dang // sems ni rab tu
203b6(dkon brtsegs): gdung skyes nas// mchim blags te de dus nas// gtsug lag khang gzhan dag du song ste/ yang dngos po des dge slong mang po rnams la// de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das rjes su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan par
203b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// bdag gis thos par gyur na ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsnyungs par 'tshal lo// zhes smras pa dang / dge slong chen po rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du lan btab par gyur to// de nas dge slong ngam bris/ dge slong mang po de dag spangs nas/ gcig
203b8(dkon brtsegs): bu ri dang nabs rgyal dben pa'i gnas su song nas sems rtse gcig tu chos zab mo gnyer ba 'dun par 'gyur ba dang / de'i tshe sngon de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i nyan thos rnams kyi nang na nyan pos chen po zhini tu btan pa zhes bya ba rab tu dber ba'i spyo
204a1(dkon brtsegs): gamangan par bslas pa/ gcig nu gcig tung dper gnas pa/ 'dod babyung zhing chagags yongs su spong ba la sems pa na par slob bya byas pa// mngon pa shes pa drug dang / rig pa gsus dang sngama'i
204a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa chen po zhigi zung bar gyur te/ ji ltar dkar nga'i bstan pa las 'od srung chen po ji lta ba bzhin no// de'i tshe dge slong shining tu brtan pa des bdag nyid gnas pa'i ri drug gi drag ngos la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag yi ger bris par
204a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ 'di ltar ste 'dod pa'i ro ni myong ba'i phyir// 'khor ba dag ni rgyun myi gcod // dgra ni gsos nas dur khrod 'jug/ don myed sdug bsngal mang po myong // lus 'di myi gtsang ro dang 'dra// bu ga dgu nas myi gtsang 'dzag/ srin
204a4(dkon brtsegs): bu myi gtsang mos pa bzhin// blun pos lus sred de dang 'dra// yang dag ma yin/ kun rtog pa// de ni 'dod lnga'i rtsa ba yin// mkhas pa dag ni myi rtog/ rdapas// 'dod lnga dag ni 'gag par 'gyur// log rtog las ni 'dod
204a5(dkon brtsegs): chen skye// 'dod zhen las ni nyon mongs skye// yang dag dran la zhen myed pas/ nyon mongs lhag ma zad par 'gyur// / bam po bzhi pa'o// / 
204a6(dkon brtsegs): gang po dge slong shin tu brtan pas/ ri phug gi brag gi ngos la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'di dag yi ger bris pa/ dge slong da ma shri ris ri phug dben par song nas yun ring zhig lon nas// ri phug gi
204a7(dkon brtsegs): brag ngos la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'di dag yi ger bris pa mthong nas/ kha thon tu bslabs te/ de'i don gang yin pa yid la byas pa dang / ring por ma lon par shes pa lnga po thob par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me re ga na
204a8(dkon brtsegs): 'da' sngon zhugs la bzhen pa'i gnas skabs su phyinang nas/ phyag byas te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ dkyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas 'di skad ces bdag gis gnas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa yang ma mthong / chos gzhan yang
204b1(dkon brtsegs): ma thos kyi bar du 'di las myi ldang ngo zhes dam bcas so// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das gsungs pa'i mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgya pa zhes bya ba// brgya byin lha'i dbang pos mdo sde kha thon du shes pas// brgya byin lha'i
204b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang pos dbang pos dge slong ma sha ri'i lhag pa'i bsam pa sems kyis rtogs nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas nas babs te/ de'i drung du phyin nas de la mdo sde'i sgo stong phrag brgya pa de yang dag par bshad do// gzhan yang mang
204b3(dkon brtsegs): du zos pa'i dngos pa'i tshig bzhi dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshig bdun dang / sgo'i tshig bcu bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang byin no// dge slong de mag ris thos nas kyang kha bon du 'don te/ yongs su bzung bas chos rnams la shes
204b4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'das gsungs pa'i mdo sde yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'thun pa bral ba'i rjes su 'thun pa/ zab mo shi ning du gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang rang gi rang gis sems la snang bar
204b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da' dge slong gi dge 'duna'akhor dang bcas pa dang / bzhugs pa'i gnas dri gtsang khang dang / bdun khri dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang klung dang / gnod sbyin dang
204b6(dkon brtsegs): dring dang / lha ma yin dang / phyi 'as ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / phyi dang mim nabar bcas po'i 'khor bams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// dge slo dmigs yang chos rnams las shes rab kyi snang bathob par gyur pas/ 
204b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas mthar kyis rang gi yul du song ste// pha ma'i drung du byind pa nas pa ma la yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'thun pa/ zab mo gni tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bshad nas/ sangs rgyas dang chos
204b8(dkon brtsegs): rang / dge 'dung gi yon tan gi sngags pa rab tu brjed pas/ gang ba de dige slong ngam gro'i pa ma dang / rang gi bcur mo dang / blon po cing po dang / 'khor rnams kyi ches de thos nas shin tu mngon par yid ches par gyur pas/ gus pa'i sems
205a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis dan marnal din sa stsa'o// zur bayang ca sas rgya ban dgas mamams pa skan du rdung dugs // rkang pa 'i drug gas ca pa'i khyod rnam pa yum
205a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes mas / rlung ma te/ byungs lams khyod dam chos kyi ge 'du shes bya bar gyur to// dag slong ba kyis de kyang de ba gshegs pa pa rigs 'i na pasdarang rgyas pa byas ma
205a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rgyu'i sas// de ba'i gagags pa mar gas ma dag na ga rjod / dun yang po sgyu ji sring gA kyings su chu ga/ zus sa sa sa
205a4(dkon brtsegs): 'i ya nga du med du na ma / skye dang / nam dang pa dang skye dang / gas su/ pa du
205a5(dkon brtsegs): dag chogs kyis bus pas macad cing ri 'gro dang / tha mar byas nas bsngags pa yang bar gyu // gang po dge slong dmagro'i yig dus kyi slar 'jam du brid dum par gyur chog ces slod lam da sa pas/ smon lam pa tha
205b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal rigs su skyes// dran pa thob pa zhes bya bar gyur te// de bzhin da gshegs pa me rog ma 'da' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo gsum brgya lon pa'i ba'i bstan pa las rab tu byung ste// sngon gi smon lam dang tshe rabs dran pa/ 
205b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i dbang gyis sgo rnams tshig ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig kyang rang gi ngang gis slab thob par gyur to// gzungs thob pa'i dbang gis sngon ma thob pa'i mdo sde rnams sems can la rgya cher yang dag par bstan gyi// tshe rabs snga ma la
205b3(dkon brtsegs): sngar bshad par gyur pa dag ni ma bstan to// gang po de'i tshe da ma shri'i dge slong mang po rnams la gang shes rab zab cing gsal la dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun stug pa gang yin pa de dag ni dran pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde rnams thob par gyur
205b4(dkon brtsegs): na/ sems kyis rjes su yi rang nas mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed pa gus pas mchod par byas nas/ dge slong dran pa thob pa la yang yongs su bsrung bar byed do// dge slong de dag las gzi'i byin dang yon tan myed pa dang / 
205b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rtul zhing myi gsal ba dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba de dag ni/ dge slo/ dang dran pa thob pas gsar du bshad pa'i chos thos par gyur na/ nye mngon par yid ches par gyu ra pa yang myed// da dung len pa yang myed/ 'gal
205b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag byas nas skyon 'byin cing 'di skad du mdo sde 'di dag ni bdag cig mkhyen po dang slobs dpon las kyang ma thos/ sngon slob dpon chen po da mash+lo las kyang ma thos so zhes zer ro// gang po de dag las gang shes rab zab cing
205b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i don la tshon pa de dag mi tshig gi rjes su myi 'brang bar don sa ton pa'i phyir// sems kyis kyang 'gal bar mya byed do// gal bar myi byed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i snyan pa yang yang dag par bsrung bar byed pa/ 
205b8(dkon brtsegs): gus pas dge slong dran pa thob pa la yang bsrung bar byed do// gang po de'i 'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyed ma'i 'khor thag khrig brgyan dge slong dran pas bstan pa'i ma sde'i rjes su zhugs par gyud to// gang po dang/ 
206a1(dkon brtsegs): sa rjed ma kyi slob ma 'bor rnams logs shig tu sde gnyis su skyes par gyur te/ gcig gi nga ni dge slong ngam bri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun shes bya bar gyur to// gcig gi phying ni dran pa thob pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun shes byab
206a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang / de'i tshe/ dge slong dran pa thob pas bdag ni dam shi yin no zhes ma smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe dge slong dam shri ni mang po kun gyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyurang gi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no zhes zer
206a3(dkon brtsegs): bas gal te bdag nyid kyis smra bar gyur na// mang po kun the tsom za bar gyu ra pa dang / dge slong dran pa thob pa ni de'i tshe mang po kun gyis 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yin gi dgra bcom pa ma yin mo zhes zer bas so// gang po dge slong dran pa thob
206a4(dkon brtsegs): pas de ltar rgya cher sems dpa' rnams la phan btags nas/ de'i 'og tu 'chi/ ba'i dus byas par gyur pa dang / de'i slob ma mang po rnams kyis spos kyi shing thams cad spungs nas/ mchod pa byas te bsreg so// 'khor
206a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po rnams 'dus nas ston pa chen byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ ring sring gi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyang grags gcig yod pa brtsigs nas/ spos dang / me tog dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / byug
206a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / mtshan sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur sti byas bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge slong dran pa thob pa 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag slar 'dzam bu gling 'di nyid
206a7(dkon brtsegs): du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas smon lam btab pa bzhin du khyim bdag gi rigs shing gi sa las chen po lta bur skyes par gyur te// de'i mying ni ya sha zhes bya bar gyur to// sngon gi smon lam gyi dbang gyis/ sngon gi gnas rjes
206a8(dkon brtsegs): su dran pa thob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me rog 'da' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og du/ lo brgya pa'i bstan pa las lo bdun lon te rab tu byung nas gzungs rnams thob par gyur to// gzungs thob pa'i mthus skye bo mang po la sngon ma thos
206b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bstan to// de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pa'i dge slong rnams dang / da ma shrI'i dge slong rnams las gang dge ba'i rtsa lhun stug pa de dag gis ya shas bstan pa'i chos rnams thos nas/ sems rab tu dga' zhing
206b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis chos kyi bde bzob par gyur to// gang po dge slong mang po de dag yang dag pa'i de ma chen cing / tshig gi rjes su 'drang bar mi byed pas/ de'i phyir dge slong lags sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'thur zhing shin tu
206b3(dkon brtsegs): zab pa/ don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa yang dag par bstan pa thos par gyur na/ mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed/ 'gal ba myed par yang dag par len cing kha thon 'don par byed// ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rjes su bsgrub par gyur
206b4(dkon brtsegs): to// gang po dge slong de dag las gang dbang po rtul zhing myi gsal ba dang / de dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun myi stug pa de dag ni dge slong ya sha las sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde dam pa'i rjes su 'thun pa/ stong pa nyid rjes su 'thun zhing / shin tu zab pa dag/ 
206b5(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur na/ mngon par yid ches shing / dang du len par yang myi byed/ 'gal ba byas nas 'jig rten cing smod par byed de// 'di skad du 'di/ lta bu'i chos 'di ni// bdag cig gis/ 'khan po dang / spobs dpon las
206b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma thos// sngon ston pa chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa thob pa las kyang ma thos so zhes zer ro// gang po de'i tshe dge slong nga ya sha las chos thos nas rab tu dga' ba dang / sems kyis mngon par
206b7(dkon brtsegs): yid ches shing / dang du blangs pa dang / de dag thams cad ni/ da ma shri'i dge slong rnams dang / dran pa thob pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sdang zhing phra dog gis smad nas// lhan cig tu gnas su yang myi ster/ lhan cig klog pa dang / kha don 'don pa dang
206b8(dkon brtsegs): chos bshad du yang myi ster ste/ skur pa 'atab nas 'di skad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma yin/ ston pa chen po'i bstan pa yang ma yin no// zhes zer ro// gang po de'i tshe dge slong yashas de bzhin gshegs me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa rgya cher yang
207a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par spel nas/ grong khyer cig nas grong khyer cig tu rgyu zhing song nas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan cing phan pa mang po byas pas srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgya bcus bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
207a2(dkon brtsegs): tu sems bskyed par gyur to// dge slong ye shes de ltar phan pa mang po byas nas/ de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / dge slong ya sha'i rjes su phyogs pa'i skye bo bdun khri yod pa de dag gis/ dge slong ya sha'i phyir ring srel gi mchod rten bdun
207a3(dkon brtsegs): khri brtsigs nas/ spos dang me tog dang / spos kyi phye ma dang brug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge slong ya
207a4(dkon brtsegs): shas 'chi ka'i dus kyi che/ slor 'jam bu gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyurd cig ce das smon lam btab pas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu/ smon lam pa/ ba pa bzhin du rgyal rigs su skye bar gyur te/ de'i tshe lha mang po rnams kyis sgra
207a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po byung ste/ 'di skad du deng rgyal po la bu btsas pa 'di ni sems can la phan pa mang po byed pa yin no// zhes grags pas sgra de'i rjes su myi/ nga yang 'dren pa zhes btags so// de lo bcu lon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
207a6(dkon brtsegs): ba me ro gan 'da' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ lo brgya pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gyur to// dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de yang mdo sde dang bstan chos mang po rgya cher kha don du 'don pa dang / mang du thos shing zab mo la 'jug pa dang
207a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru dang spros pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos bstan pa'i thabs la rab tu mkhas par gyu rang to// gang po dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de grong rdal cig nas gcig tu grong khyer cig nas cig tu/ yul cig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas/ de bzhin
207a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa rgya cher spel nas phan pa mang po byas so// de'i tshe mashri dang / dran pa thob pa dang / ya sha'i dge slong gi tshogs rnams cig tu 'dus nas rab tu 'dren pa'i thang du 'ongs te/ des bstan pa dag gzhig cing skur pa btab pa
207b1(dkon brtsegs): bshags so// de nas de'i cing ni slong rab tu 'dren pas dge slong ma thongs par rig nas/ 'di na du bye ge slong byung po byed ngos po 'izhig gis rgol bar sems/ dngos po gang zhig mi dri bar sems / shes smram pa dang / dge slong ma
207b2(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams de skad smras pa thos nas mya ngan gis non cing myi bde bar gyur pas cang kyi zer gyur te/ dge slong rab tu 'dren pa la gegs bya bar yang myi nus so// gang po byang chub sems dpa' de ci srid du 'jig rgan du gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas
207b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bstan pa yang rgyas shing rab tu 'phel bar gyur to// de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su sangs rgyas bstan pa yang nus par gyur to// dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa ma la dam pa'i chos nub du nye ba'i che/ grong rdal
207b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig nas gcig tu grong khyer cig nas cig tu/ yul cig nas cig tu rgyu/ zhing song nas/ sems can mang po'i cheng du yongs su dag cing / so// dpa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i mdo sde zab mo yang dag par bstan nas/ srog
207b5(dkon brtsegs): chags bye ba phrag brgya bcu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par gyur te/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'od tu thams cad kyang mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to// gang po dge
207b6(dkon brtsegs): slong rab tu 'dren pas de ltar phan pa byas nas/ de gang gi nub mo 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i phyir/ de nyin par sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang nub par gyur to// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan 'da'i bstan pa nub par gyur pa'i phyir mdo/ 
207b7(dkon brtsegs): sde zab mo yongs su dag cing / stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams kyang nub par gyur to// gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni mdo sde zab mo de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung zhing bdag
207b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyang phun sum tshogs par byed pa yin no// gang po byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'dren pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu/ zhing de nyid kyi steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams bcu par skye ste/ de'i tshe zhing de/ 
208a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mtshan ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs pa'i spyan zhes bya ste/ de'i snyan pa la rab tu byung nas/ tshe dang ldan pa snga ma'i dge ba'i sra ba dang / bsod nams kyi
208a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen gyis shes rab zab cing gsal/ rno ba dang spobs pa gtugs pa myed cing myur la thogs pa myed par gyur to// dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i spyan gi bstan pa las lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du
208a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / slar yang de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'phel ba'i dpung pa zhes bya ba dang phrad par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas de'i snyan pa las rab tu byung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
208a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu slar yang zhing de nyid du skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
208a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas gdon myi za ba'i spyod pa dang phrang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas / de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lo bdun khri bar du nam tan bcom / 'grus kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag
208a6(dkon brtsegs): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i mying ni shul zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdon myi za ba'i spyod pa des 'di skad du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dge slong shu la 'di skad/ bla na myed pa yang
208a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa myi mnga' ba'i spyan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// gang po byang
208a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di ldan par gyur na yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsa lad pa/ byang chub
208b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bab mo zab mo yi// rnam dag nges pa'i chos thos nas/ bdag nyid de la gnas byed cing / gzhan dag la yang ston par byed// 'jig tan gting ni myi dpogs kyang // byang chub sems dpa' bying myi 'gyur// rdul khrims rnam dag rab
208b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas// rgya cher sems can phan yang 'dogs// gleng bzhi dang ni rtag pa brjod// sangs rgyas lam zhes 'khor la ston// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pas na// 'di ni nges pa'i chos yin no// byang chub sems dpa' phan spyod pa// 
208b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' can la ni phan yang 'dogs// sangs rgyas chos rnams srung byed cing // 'khor la byang chub sems dpa' byed// sems can dag ni chos bzhin don// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad byed// 'khor la sangs rgyas lam ston pas// 
208b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ni nye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas lam ni srung byed cing // sems can rgya chen pan 'dogs pas// lha dang klu dang 'gre srin dang // gang zag chen pos bkur bar 'gyur// de phyir rnam par dag pa yi// stong zab gya nom chos thos nas
208b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsegacig sems shing nyer byed na// shes rab kyi dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// ga de zhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams da ni spyod pa rnams phun sum tshogs par byed de/ spyod pa rnams phun sum tshogs
208b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro// de la spyod pa gang zhe na/ gang po byang chub sems da pa'i ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten nas sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar byed
208b7(dkon brtsegs): hU~M tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzong ba bsgom par byed/ brtson 'grus brtson par byed/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gnog par byed/ shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa bsgom par byed do// byang chub dpa'i' dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang
208b8(dkon brtsegs): zhing / byang chub sems dpa' gang las mdo'i sde de lta bu dang / rjes su ston pa'i thabs mkhas pa ston par 'gyur ba/ sangs rgyas dang / nyan thoste dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' gnyer bar byed pa'i byang chub
209a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba shes gnyen zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur ma/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// 
209a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsa lang pa// ngas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sprad par bya ba'i chos dag ni// sbyin pa btang nas rab dga' zhing // 'gyod par 'amyed pa yin zhes bshad// de la dga' ba gang zhe na/ 
209a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bes lus kun khyab pa yin// rtag tu dga' sems dpa'adi yis ni// byang chub lam ni spyad par bya// byang chub de sems dpa' sbyin btang nas// byang chub tu ni sngo byed cing // sems na nang rnams la phan 'dogs na// rab don dpag myed zo
209a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// slong ba dag ni mthong 'gyur na// sangs rgyas 'du shes rab skyed de// de ring 'dir mo 'di 'ongs pas// bdag la byang chub lam yang byin// bdag ni 'dir dbang gis na// rnam dag zhing ni thob par 'gyur// 'di yis bdag la sangs rgyas
209a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan// bdag la sangs rgyas lam ston byed// deng bdag 'di dang phrad pas na/ rnyed pa chen po rab rnyed ces// bdag pas lus kun khyab nas ni// dngos po gzhan la mos myi byed// dga' zhing drung du 'ongs gyurang nas// 
209a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyang nas gsong bar smra bar byed// khyod ni dngos po ji zhig 'dod// bdag gis zad par sbyin zhes zer// gzhan dgos pa myed zer na// byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' zhing // 'dis bdag 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir// 
209a7(dkon brtsegs): dgos pa myed ces zer bar zad// 'phags pa 'dis ni gang mos pa'i 'dod nyung chog shes chos gis ni// 'dir 'ongs bdag la go byas nas// byang chub rkyen ni thob par byed// dong bdag gang zag 'di'i rgyus// rjes su bstan pa'i chos kyang zong
209a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis dgos myed gang zer ba// tshig 'di legs par yin// dngos po 'di ni 'dod zer zhing / bdag la byin cig zer na yang // byang chub sems dpa' ci bdog pa// dga' bas khyod kyis khyer zhes zer// gal te sbyin pa btang nas ni// phyis
209b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'gyod pa myed 'gyur na// sangs rgyas la ni dran pa'i phyir// sems ni rtag tu dga' ba thob// sems can kun la skal yod pas// thams cad 'angs pa myed gyur cing // ma lus thams cad tshig byas zhes// sbyin pa gtang che bsngo bar byed
209b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub lam ni spyod pa'i tshe// sems cam bdag gi mying thob pas// rang gi ngang gis rlog shes shing // ser sna chags sems myed par shog/ bdag gi yul gi sems can kun// lam spyod thams cad chog shes shing // dod lnga rtags paku
209b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas// thams cad rab byung mos par shog/ de 'dra'i spyod pa tshad myed dang // sbyin pa yongs su bsngos pa yis// rtag par sbyin pa rab gshong zhing // sems can bdag rjes slob por shog/ byang chub sems dpas sbyin gtong che// 
209b4(dkon brtsegs): byams sems sems cad khyab pas na// 'jig rten dag ni thams cad no// de 'dra'i bde ba yod myed do// dper na khyim bdag drug po yis da// rdor dang rin chen shin tu mang // bu ni cig gcig yod pa los // lo ni ming por
209b5(dkon brtsegs): lam ring song bakhyim bdag bu 'ongs thos gyur nas// dag bas lus su na khyab gyur cing // yun ris lon nas der 'ongs shes// nga gdong ba cas bzhin rab tu dga'// byang chub sems dpa' slong mthong ma// de'i tshe sems
209b6(dkon brtsegs): di ba tu dag la/ khyim bdag ro'i dga' bas ni// bcu drug char yang myi bong ngo // sbyin pa gtong ba zos gyur na// de'i sems ni rab dga' bas// byams sems las byung dga' ba yis// dpe' zla dag ni yang myed do// ji ltar rgyal po nyes byung ba/ 
209b7(dkon brtsegs): san lag 'atungs shes bsgobs na/ gsod pas gsod par khrid nas ni// mtshon gis gdab pa gzas pa las// rgyal pos long spyod thabs byin na// myi de rab tu dga' bas ma// byang chub sems dpo' 'phongs pa la// sbyin padang dag la
209b8(dkon brtsegs): btsam gyi thong // byang chub sems dpa' la sgom che// bsod rnanams zhing ni myi tshol gi// slong ba yod na gtong byed pas// pyir dga' 'cher po 'thob// byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas dang // dgra bcom rang rgyal mthong 'gyur ro// gus sas
210a1(dkon brtsegs): brang ris pas na// de phyir drung 'gro mchod par byed// byang chub sems dpas ga'i byin ldan// gsal sems ni dul bas na/ yon tan mos shing lam gnyer byir/ sangs rgyas dge 'dun mchod par byed// sas
210a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / de'i nyan thos ma gtogs par/ lhag pa'i bsam dang gus sems kyis/ lhag gzhan ni mchod myi byed// galate rang rgyal 'ag zhig gis// rang byung mya ngan 'dres thob pa
210a3(dkon brtsegs): de 'drab yon tan ldan mthong ma// de la yang ni mchod pa byed// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams shing // dge dang myi dge rig pas na// 'jig rten mkhas pa gang yin pa// mu stegs sdig can mchod mi byed// tshul khris
210a4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs la rab gnas shing // byams pa sems can kun la khyab// brtson 'grus dag kyang dpe' zla myed// bzod shes rab thos rgya yang che// de 'dra'i yon tan ldan pas na// 'jig rten kun gi gitso 'gyur nas// sangs rgyas
210a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon byas te// bla na myed pa 'khor lo skor bar byed// byang / chub sems dpa' de 'dra'i// chos bzhi dag ni sgrub byed na// dge ba'i rtsa ba ci snyed pa// thams cad kun ni mngon du gyur// bskal pa
210a6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba grangs myed du// yon tan rnams ni gang sgrub pa// de kun byang chub sems dpa'i lam// 'di ni bsdu bar bya ba yin// da phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rtag tu byams sems bsgom par bya// rang byung
210a7(dkon brtsegs): rirang tshal gnas shing // dgon pa'i gnas la mos par bya// rtag par shin tu rnam dag cing // zab mo nges pa'i chos btsal te// byang chub spyod pa ldan byas nas// de'is bdag nyid 'phel bar bya// 
210a8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gi mthus/ sku'i spu'i bu ka kun nas
210b1(dkon brtsegs): ba kyi zag brgya na dus kyi// gan yang chu'i ba ga sa pa ba ba'i drung bar sgyu po d+hang gas pa zung mgyur to// gshe sa m+bu'i zug gnanas de ba gag nas
210b2(dkon brtsegs): mngang ba gang ga'i klung ga phyim sred srung bar gyur te/ 'khar dus pa rnams cad kyis kyang / des bu'i du 'phrul gi ma du sbyar ba maring bar gyur ro// de nas bcom ldam ngas rngu 'phrul gang bangon pa nga sa tshe dang sngar
210b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang po la bka' stsal da pa// gang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bu'i gnas byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gi mthu mthong ngam// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gi mthu
210b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas rgyun chad pa myed pa yin na deng nyan thos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa 'di 'ba' shig tu bzhugs na chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ nga ni yang dag par na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ga' klung gi/ 
210b5(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed kun tu rgyu na chad pa myed pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu de bzhin du chos bstan pa mdzad do// gang po gal te 'ga' zhig yang dag pa'i tshig gis 'di skad du
210b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa myed cing dpe zla myed pa/ rkang gnyis kyi mchog/ bsod nams kyi zhing / shin tu zab cing dpag par dka' ba// spyod pa dpag tu myed pa dang ldan pa gom pa cig bor na yang / sems can thams cad kyi sems gang dang spyod pa gang gis
210b7(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa bted cing / gzhag pa shes par yang myi 'gyur la/ gzhal bar myi nus pa de gang yin zhes zer de ni nga yin no// zhes smra bar bya ste/ gang po sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa gang dang bsam pa gang dang
210b8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa gang gis zhabs bdeb pa dang / zhabs bzhag par gzhal bar myi nus pas so// de nas de'i che bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsas par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsa lang pa/ bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa gang / 
211a1(dkon brtsegs): dag dang // spyod pa gang gis zhabs bteg gzhag/ g.yo dang myi ga yo sems can gis dngos po 'di ni rtag myi rigs// rdzu 'phrul 'bru yang tshad byed de/ spyod pa dag kyang chang myed do// yon tan dag ni chang byed phyir// marmon
211a2(dkon brtsegs): tu mtho zhing gtso bor 'gyur// blo gros chen po tshad myed pas// sus kyang mthar thug shes myi 'gyur// gal te sems can thams cad kun// shes rab dang ni rdzu 'phrul stobs// thams cad sha ri'i bri dadu ni// me'u 'gal lta bur gyur kyang
211a3(dkon brtsegs): ni kagang yis rkang btog bzhag pa'i// dngos po dag ni reg myi 'gyur// gal te sems can thams cad kun// thams cad rang rgyal grub gyur kyang // nga'i gom gcig mya rig na// chos zab gzhan lha mos ci dgos// nyi zla tshad myed ci snyed
211a4(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig gyur kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu khung cig/ 'od zer tsam yang myi phong ngo // gal te 'jig rten khams bye ba// khrag khrig phrag ni bdun khri'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor kun tu yang // zhing ni tshad myed snang
211a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa// de 'dra'i nyi ma chen po dag/ phyogs bcu'i gang 'ga' bye ma snyed// thams cad nyi ma cig tu gyur // 'od zer cig kyang ri rab tsam// de'i 'dra'i nyi ma chen po dag/ rtag par phyogs bcu gsal byed pa// sangs
211a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od dang snyun gyurd na// sdong po tshig bzhin snang myi 'gyur// nyi ma che na po de'i 'od// ljon shing lo ma myi 'thal zhing // ri dang klung dang brag rnams dal// thams cad du ni thogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od
211a7(dkon brtsegs): zer ni// ri rab dang ni lugs ri dang // rdo rje ri ni thams cad la// thal bar 'gro zhing thogs pa myed// 'od zer rdzu 'phrul mthu stobs dang // gzi byin dag ni tshing myed pa// yid ches myed pa ma gtogs par// mthong ba su zhig sems myi skyed/ sems
211a8(dkon brtsegs): can de 'dra'i 'od zer dang / rdzu 'phrul mthu chen mthong gyur na// bdag cag kyang ni mthong 'gyur zhes// phal cher bla na myed sems skyed// de tshe bcom ldan 'dzum mdzad nas// kun dga' bos ni 'di skad gsol// gang spang bcom ldan 'dzum pa mdzad/ 
211b1(dkon brtsegs): thogs skyed mkhyen pas dka' ba shang gsol// bcom ldan kun dga' bka' stsal pa// sems can rnams kyis deng nga yi// rdzu 'phrul mthu stan mthong bas na// sems bskyed sangs rgyas 'grub par spyon// 'khor 'di srog smra/ 
211b2(dkon brtsegs): sum khri yis// chos 'di srung bar dam yang bcas// bdag cag sangs rgyas 'das 'og tu// mdo sde 'di ni gdon bu sems// de dag nga ni 'das pa'i 'og/ mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur na// thar dang tha ma'i dus kyi tshe// ji skad bstan bzhin
211b3(dkon brtsegs): grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems bskyed shin tu dka'// sangs rgyas chos ni mos pa dka'// tha ma'i dus tshe mdo sde 'di// 'dzi nad cing 'don pa de bas dka'// bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du// sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon// ma 'ongs tha ma
211b4(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe// mdo sde 'di bshad de bas dkon// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo ngas mdo sde 'di khyed la yongs su gtang ngo // de ci'i zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling na ji srid
211b5(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di gnas pa de srid du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gnas par 'gyur// khas so// kun dga' bo 'di lta dbu'i mdo sde zab mo 'di nub par gyurang ba'i phyir// 'di skad bstan pa bzhin
211b6(dkon brtsegs): du mngon par bsgrub par byed pa'i chos kyang nub par gyur pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang nub par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo deng khyod kyis spos kyi phye mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas nga la mchod par bya'o// ji ltar nyan thos rnams
211b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas nga la mchod par 'gyur ro zhe na/ khyod kyis 'di snyam du/ me tog dang / spos dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / byug spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang na bza' dang / rol mo sil snyan mchog
211b8(dkon brtsegs): dam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bsngags pa brjod pa ni mchod pa mchog dam pa yin no// snyam du bsam+b+ha myi bya ste// kun dga' bo de lta bu de dag ni mchod pa mchog dam pa/ zhes myi bya'i/ gang gis mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu thos nas len
212a1(dkon brtsegs): ga pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha don du 'don pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/ mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim 'gro byas pa dang / bkur
212a2(dkon brtsegs): sti byas dang / bla mar byas pa dang / bsngags pa brjod par byas pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang chos mchod cing rim 'gro dang / bsnyen bkur mdzad kyi// 'jig rtenan ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad
212a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni bkur bar myi mdzad pas so// de lta bas na kun dga' bo dang mdo sde 'di nam ngan brtson 'grus kyis khyed la yongs su gted ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo ngas kyang mdo sde 'di yang dag par bslabs pas/ deng hA/ 
212a4(dkon brtsegs): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bla na myed pa'i yang dag chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba yin no// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
212a5(dkon brtsegs): spong ba'i tshe/ mdo sde 'di yang dag par skabs nas / ka/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ bla na myed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor te/ ma byon pa'i sras
212a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyang mdo sde la 'di yang dag par bslabs nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / bla na myed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig
212a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa thams cad kyang mang sde 'di yang dag par bslabs/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ deng chos kyi 'khor
212a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su skor bar mdzad pa yin pas/ de'i phyir kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i sde sbed kyi mdo sde 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba'i 'khor lo mdo sde zhes bya bar yongs su bzung bar bya'o// yang yul ba nan se'i dgra
212b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba'i tshal du yang nyan thos rnams la 'dis chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ro// kun dga' bo ngas deng 'od ma'i tshal 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde phyir myi ldog pa'i 'khor 'di yongs su bskor nas sems can/ 
212b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi ba com yongs su bcad do// sumamatha' bo 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kying rnam ma pa'i sa 'tshams 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i sde srid kyi mang sde 'di yang dag par gsung so// dbyod pa'i de bdi
212b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyang nam mkha'i sa 'tshams 'dir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag par gsungs par 'gyur ro// ngas reng bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / 
212b4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i sa 'tshams 'dir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di yang dag par bshad pas/ de'i phyir sa gzhi 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mchod rten chen po lha dang myir bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod
212b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bya ba'i gnas su gyur da par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo sa gzhi 'ba' shi/ ga thugs mong ma yin pa'i yon tan 'di lta ste/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dir mdo sde zab mo 'di yang dag par
212b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa dang ldan pas/ kun dga' bo 'di dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag 'ong ma'i chal 'dir zhugs par gyur ma/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug spong bar myi 'byung
212b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug lag khang gzhan na yang bzhugs par 'gyur mong gi/ de dag gang la yang 'di lta bu'i yon tan myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo ka lan ta ka 'od ma'i chal 'dir dung 'gro'o
212b8(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas su gtogs pa dag/ zhugs par gyur na ni/ 'dod chags skye bar myi 'gyur la bya mang mor zhugs par gyur da na ni/ dus ma yin par sgra myi 'byin pas so// ji lta zhe na yul ma ga ta'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i spyi bo nas
213a1(dkon brtsegs): ba gdang skur nas dang po rgyal sar zhugs pa'i tshe/ bcur mo'i 'khar dang bcas te/ bskyed mos chal 'dir zhugs nas/ lhan cig tu rtse bar byas pa lasazhugs ma thag du bdag nyid 'dod chags kyi cher mo bya ba'i bsam/ 
213a2(dkon brtsegs): ba skyed par gyur bar tshor bar gyur to// btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang so sor nas 'dod chogs kyi sems kyi cing mo'i bisam pa myed par gyur / rjor bar gyur pa dang / de'i tshe rgyal po rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ 'di snyam
213a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 'bying zhing bdag gi yul du byung bar gyur nas bdag gis mthong bar gyur cig/ mthong nas kyang sems kyis mngon par yid ches par gyur cig/ mngon par yid ches par gyur cig/ mngon par
213a4(dkon brtsegs): yi ma par gyur nas kyang mchod pa byed par gyur yi/ bskyed mes cham 'di das de bzhin gshegs pa la phul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'di bzhugs par gyur nas/ bdag cas thos par gyur cig de ci'i phyi she
213a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed mos tshal 'di ni mchod nas su gyur pa dag gi gnas yin gis// 'dod pa lnga dang ma bral ba dag gi gnas ni ma yin no// snyam du sems so// kun dga' bo rgyal po gzugs can snying po bskyed mos tshal
213a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dir zhugs pa na/ de lta bu'i sems skyed pa yang 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed mos tshal 'dir bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo sde 'di gsungs pas na/ de'i phyir zhe na
213a7(dkon brtsegs): spyad kyisamam 'a man 'ji gang yod pa de dag 'i/ ga'ang dag dang dra mang du gyur dpas/ lha nga bye da/ lha ma yid du cas pa'i 'jig tan thams cad kyis gus par bye byed pa yin no// 'a po skyed sa
213a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dini sbrul gdug pa ya tshangs pa dang / snang bu dang / sbrang bum chu rings las sogs pa byed do// gung te gnas par thur du na yang gdugs pa'i sems byed de/ 'di yang 'ong pa'i rgyal gi krur tshong ba yin pa'i sor da / 
213b1(dkon brtsegs): gsas lo brgya'i bar du mas 'di'i yon tan brjod na yang mthar thug par myi 'gyur ro// byo phyir nan/ kun dga' ba 'o ma'i rgyal gi dri cing 'dim yon tan chang byed pa snyed dang ldan gi/ gzhan ni ba'in lham min ngas so// 
213b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon 'od ma'i tshal 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan par ma 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngar bcom ldan
213b3(dkon brtsegs): 'angs kyis 'am 'bring bgyi bar ma mos pa'i sdig pa gang lags deng bdag gshegs par 'tshal lo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang ba/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis dang po chos rnams las chos gi myig rnam par dag du/ 
213b4(dkon brtsegs): zab par gyu rang ba'i de'i tshe/ sdig pa de dag byang bar gyur to// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi le'u ste lnga ba'o// bas po lnga pa'o// 
213b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gi bu chen po 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'di ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa rnams legs
213b6(dkon brtsegs): par bstan pa mdzad pas/ bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs par sgrub cing skye 'gag myed pa'i don sems khong du chud par byed pas
213b7(dkon brtsegs): so snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa me ru 'gal gi bu chen po'i sems kyi bsam bzhugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gi bu chen po la bkar stsalang ba/ me'u 'gal de bzhin de/ de de ban te
213b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan bya yin no// gal te ba'i nyan thos gang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i don thos par gyur na/ sems can mo mye bor 'gyur zhing mos par myi 'gyur ro// me'u 'gal de
214a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i thugs che chen po dang shig zhog gi ngas gal te sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po ji snyed cig dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan par gyur na yang
214a2(dkon brtsegs): khyad kyi sems myo myo bar 'gyur zhing / mos par yang myi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gi bu chen ngos 'di skad ces gsol to// legs so bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems
214a3(dkon brtsegs): dba'i spang ba spyod pa'i tshe/ thugs rje chen po las phyogs pa cung zad cig bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me'u 'gal shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / khyod la sngon byang chub seMs
214a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spang ba spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po las phyogs cung zad cig dpes bstan par bya'o// sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa srung ba ni/ snying rje chen po ji snyed cig spyod pa brjod kyis myi lang med kyi/ snying
214a5(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po de ni/ dngos po rnam bzhi la gnas par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ci tsam du snying rje chen po la gnas pa de tsam/ sangs
214a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// me'u 'gal nga ni sems can rnams la 'di lta bu'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'di lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang ldan pas/ seMs
214a7(dkon brtsegs): ji snyeng cig sems cad dbya brgyad pa mnar myed pa na srug bsngam rnams myong bar gyur ba dang / sems can dbul ba chen po zig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / yang sos dang du 'dod dang du 'dod chen po dang / 
214a8(dkon brtsegs): dnga'a' ba dag sug podus byed bar 'gyur ba dag mi 'ang ngas ga tu sems pa dag gi cid du/ sems can dal ba chen po sdug bsnga'i'i sted mod pa dag rlig pa'i mas sa rung bde sri na drug 'asas da/ 
214b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya gyur kyang / sems sa thong brkyang bar gyur ta/ su 'gal gal te sems cad ga don du gyur byen cig yod par gyur na/ ngas de dag thams cad dang du blangs nas sems cad de dag sems pan dmyal na
214b2(dkon brtsegs): zo las thar bar byas nas/ nga shing sdug bsngal dang du len par byed pas sems can gcig gi sems can dmyal ba yang sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i las mthar thug pa'i bar du dang du blangs kyang de'i che nga'i sems la khyod
214b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ci yang med do// me'u 'gal ngas ni 'di lta bu'i smon lam dang / brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas blo dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang / de'i nyan thos dag la 'di ltar rig pa'i tshul 'di lta bu'i rgyu rkyen yod par gyur na
214b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal dang du blangs nas/ sems can dmyal ba las tha rad par byed pas/ mo'u 'gal mkhas pa dag gis thos par gyur na/ nga'i mang du thos pa'i bsngags pa la brjod de/ byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ sbyin pa gtong bar
214b5(dkon brtsegs): byed/ tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzod pa sgom par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ dge ba'i bshes gzhan la bsten pa'i bsngags pa brjod par byed do// mo'u 'gal ngas de lta bu thos nas bcwo
214b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus chen po bskyed de/ chos yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bas ma pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa chen po thob par bya ba'i ched du brtson 'grus brtsams so// pha rol tu phyin
214b7(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i ched du bzod pa yongs su bsgom mo// me'u 'gal nga las sngon ji lta bur bzod pa yongs su bsgoms zhe na/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' gyu ra ba ma/ 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ phyogs
214b8(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams ma yod pa'i sems can ji snyed pa gzugs can nam/ gzugs myed pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes myed pa 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin yang rung ste/ sems can de dag thams
215a1(dkon brtsegs): gcang ma lus pa myi lus thob par gyur nas thams cad bdag gi drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du/ kye khyod ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yin la/ bdag cag ni 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba dang / 'tsho ba'i
215a2(dkon brtsegs): yo byad kyis mang du thos pa yin te/ khyod gal te bdag cag la sbyin pa myi nus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par myi 'gyur ro zhes sems can de dag gis de'i tshe chag brlang pos brgyad bkag gam/ myi bden pas smos sa
215a3(dkon brtsegs): yid myi mthun pa'i phyir/ ral gi dang / dbyig pa dang / gyo mo dag gis bdag gi lus la gnod pa byas kyang bdag de'i tshe zhe sdang dang / 'gyod pa myi skyed par bdag gis 'di ltar sems rab tu gdul bar bya'o// sems can 'di dag ni glen zhing gti mug pa
215a4(dkon brtsegs): rag shes pa byed pas gti mug gi las byed pa yin / gal te bdag gis kyang sems cad glen zhing gti mug pa 'di dag la zhe sdang ba dang / khor du 'dzin pa skyed par gyu rang ma/ yod ni bdag 'di dag dang ba dad pa yang ci yod/ 'di dag ni las dum
215a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa yin la/ bdag ni dge ba'i lam du zhugs pa yin pas/ deng bdag gi sa sems can 'di dag la sdug bsngal dang du blangs te/ zhe sdang gi bsam pa myi skyed par sa chen po bzhin du bzang po dang ngan pa gshong bar bya'o// 
215a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ mo'u 'gal ngas sngon bzod pa 'di lta bu yongs su bsgoms so// gzhan yang me'u 'gal nga ni yun ring po nas rtag tu sems can thams cad la bu cig pa bzhin du bltas so// ngas yun ring po nas rtag tu sems can thos
215a7(dkon brtsegs): cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du ltas so// 'di lta ste dper na khyim bdag shin tu phyug cing nor mang la/ rin po che rab tu mang / bran po dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang ldan pa/ brtul shugs rnam pa brgyad spyad de/ bu cig rnyed par gyu rad nas/ sems la sdug
215a8(dkon brtsegs): cing blta bas myi ngosos par gyur nas/ mo ru dgal khyim bdag de ni rtag par bu de'i legs pa'i ngos po tshol bar byed/ rtag par legs pa'i dngos po spyod par byed/ rtag par phan pa'i sbyin par byed kyi/ gnod pa dang phan pa ma yin pa sbyir bar myi byed de/ 
215b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du mo'u 'gal nga yis yun blo nas rtag par sems can rnams la bu cig pa bzhin du lta bar byed pas/ yun ring po nas rtag par sems can rnams la legs pa'i dngos po yongs su btsal nas/ phar 'dogs par byed kyi/ 
215b2(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa dang phan pa ma yin pa sbyin par myi byed do// mo'u 'gal nga ni yum blo nas lam nor ba'i sems can rnams dang / lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag par lam bstan nas yang dag pa'i lam la yang dag
215b3(dkon brtsegs): bar rab tu bkong ngo // mo'u 'gal rgyu dang rkyen des na de bzhin gshegs pa ni yun ring po nas sems can rnams la shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas bu cig pa rtse zhing 'phangs pa la lta ba bzhin du gzigs pa yin par rig par bya'o// mo lu ga
215b4(dkon brtsegs): sngon 'das pa'i dus na tshong pa phal mo che zhig lam du zhugs te 'dong ba las/ lam stor nas lam gol par zhugs pa dang / mtshan mo mun nag tu gyur pa'i phyir gar 'gro ba myi shes nas/ thams cad kyis 'di skad du
215b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni lam stor to mgon bye skyed pa yang myed/ skyabs byed pa yang myed/ gnas byed pa yang myed na/ sems can rnams la su zhig lha'am/ klu 'am gnod sbyin nam/ myi ma yin pa gang zhig bdag cag la lam
215b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas lam ma nor bar thob par 'gyur su zhig bdag cag la snying rtse bas phan 'dogs shing mtshan mo mun nag lam gol zhing nyam nga bar zhugs pa 'dir snang ba sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes smras so// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe dgon pa'i nags tshal
215b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig na mu stegs can gi drang srong zhig rtsa'i spyi lu'i nang na 'dug pa las mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na tshong pa mang po rnams snying rje chen skad du 'bor ba'i sgra zos nas/ de 'di snyam du deng tshong pa mang po rnams mtshan mo mug chag tu gyur pas dgon
215b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nags tshal 'dor lam stor bar gyur to// gal te bdag gis skyabs ma byas na tshul yang ma yin la/ tshong pa mang po rnams kyang stag dang / seng ge 'am/ sbyang gi 'am glang po che 'am/ tha'am gzhan zar ma rungs pa rnams kyis gtses
216a1(dkon brtsegs): ngas ma bye / ma tshung pa mas byed ma 'gas shes/ nga dag gis kyang kyisabs kyi zhing snang bas khyed la lam yang dag par 'asar par bya'o/ zhes bya 'i mi nga srong des
216a2(dkon brtsegs): gshing srog 'phrog par gyu / l+h+wam nas sodu 'gal de'i drang srong des tshong ba rnams kyi stob bskyed de/ ras kyis lag pa gnyis bkris nas/ 'brum gis kun khyab par byugs te me sbyar nas sna ba byas te/ tshangs
216a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la lam bsar do// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe tshong ba rnams so so nas 'di snyam du drang srong 'di ni gni du ngo mchar che ba yin te/ bdag cag gi phyir lus dang srog la yang 'phangs pa myed par gyu red te snyam mo// moru 'gal de'i tshe drang srong des
216a4(dkon brtsegs): legs par bsregs pa'i snang bas tshong pa rnams lam bstan nas kyang / sems can rnams la snying rje'i cher skyes par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du nam bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
216a5(dkon brtsegs): bI'i tshe ka lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa byas nas yang dag pa'i lam ston par gyurd cig snyam mo// mo'u 'gal de'i dus na lag pa gnyis bsregs par gyur kyang / lus dang sems la 'gyur ba cung
216a6(dkon brtsegs): zad kyang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa la byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gi don yongs su gnyer ba na/ lus dang sreg la yang mngon par zhen pa myed pas so// bsam pa rnam
216a7(dkon brtsegs): bang dag bris sbyin pa yongs su bdang ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gis de'i lag pa yang sde mkho bzhin du gyur cig/ rma yang skyed par gyur to// tshong pa rnams kyang lam rnyed par gyur te/ nam mangs nas drang srong gi
216a8(dkon brtsegs): lag pa gnyis lo rma yang med par mthong ba dang / ngo mtshar gi bsam pa skyes nas 'di snyam du drang srong 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gi mthu chen po dang ldan pas/ mtshan mo thog thag lag pa gnyis sngar nas bdag cag gi snang ba byas te/ ma/ 
216a9(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bas byag de'i 'as pa la tshig 'dung bang byang byed pas so gdor byi bar 'don spyod pa che na 'i gru cing mim na ldar pa yi na sapa nas/ ro na 'ga' de'i tshong pa rnams kyi badrang srod pa 'dzin thos
216b1(dkon brtsegs): drang srong khyod kyis mchog tu dka' spyad par gyur pa ni shin tu legs so// deng spyod pa 'dis dngos po gang zhig thob par smon lags/ drang srong gis smras pa/ kye tshong pa rnams bdag ni dngos po des bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
216b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub thob nas// khyed las sogs pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bzlas te/ lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam bstan to// de'i tshe tshong pa rnams la yang dag pa'i lam bsta nang po// de'i tshe
216b3(dkon brtsegs): tshong ba rnams sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ thams cad kyis 'di skad du bdag cag dngos po ji lta bu zhig gis drang srong 'di la lan glan par bya zhes smras pa dang / drang srong gis smras pa/ khyed rnams rje gcig tu dge ba'i chos spyod
216b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la bag myed pa ma byed cig/ tshong pa rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/ 'tshal lo// zhes smras nas/ tshong pa rnams rab tu dga' zhing / dgus par byas te de nas dges par gyur to// mu'u 'gal khyod kyis
216b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na mu stegs can gi drang srong tshong pa rnams kyi ched du lag pa spang nas lam snang bar byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems ma de ltar myi lta ste/ de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong pa rnams
216b6(dkon brtsegs): nid ltar gi dge slong nyis stong nyis brgya lnga bcu po 'di dag nyid yin no// mo'u 'gal de bzhin gshegs pa ni yun ring po nas 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la myi 'jigs pa byin pa dang lam log par zhugs pa'i
216b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i lam snyan pa dang / myig myed pa'i sems can rnams yongs su dag pa'i myig thob par bya ba dang / nang chabs che ba'i sems can rnams gsos nas sos par bya ba'i rgyu rkyen des na de bzhin gshes
216b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni mun ring po nas sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po batshulapa pa yi par rig par bya'o// gzhan yang mo 'u 'ag la sngor drung ba 'das pa'i dris kyi mi/ 'jam bu sring 'di na kyi skal pachar po blang ngas pa sems camam
217a1(dkon brtsegs): la nad kyis nyon mongs par gyurang te/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po dbang phyug gi sde zhes bya/ grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyu rang to// de'i tshe
217a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyab po de'i btsun mo dam pa sems can dang ldan par gyu rang to// de'i lus kyi yan lag gam/ lag pas sems can rnams la reg pa tsam gis nang thams cad sos par gyu rang to// zla ba chang nas khye'u zhig bcas pa
217a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcas ma thag tu 'di skad du bdag ni nang pa rnams gso bar nus so// zhes smras so// gzhan yang bcas pa'i tshe 'dzam bu gling gi lha klu rnams kyis mthum par 'di skad du ka deng rgyal po'i bu btsas pa 'di ni myi'i sman
217a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no zhes smras pas/ de skad smras pa'i sgra de kun tu grags pa'i phyi ra mying yang mya'i smin pa zhes btags so// de'i tshe myi rnams kyang nad kyis btab pa rnams khring nas/ rgyal bu de la bstan pa dang / nad pa gang rgyal
217a5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i drung du phyind pa de dag/ rgyal bu'i lag par reg par gyu rang tam/ lus kyis reg par gyur kyang rung ste/ thams cad sos te/ bde bar gyu rang to// de bzhin du 'dzam bu gling ma/ gnas pa kun gyis
217a6(dkon brtsegs): nad pa khrod nas rgyal bu la bstan pa dang / rgyal bu'i lag pas reg pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sos nas mchog tu thob par gyur to// mo'u 'a gal rgyal bu myi'i sman gyis le stong gi bar du de ltar nad gsos nas
217a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas so// 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu nang pa rnams der 'ongs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par thos pa dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags bton te dus nas su zhig bdag cag na ba'i sdug bsngal las thar
217a8(dkon brtsegs): byed ces snyim// na kyis btab pa rnams rgyam bu mye'i sla gang du smras nas/ gang du sregs pa shes par gyur pa dang / bsregs pa gnas deng rus pa blangs te phye mar bdags nas lus bskus pa dang / 'ams
217b1(dkon brtsegs): cang rang mos par gyur nas// 'di skad du rgyal bu myi'i sman da dung yang na ba rnams sos par nus so zhes smras so// mo'u 'gal de ltar nang pa rnams gso ba'i rgyu dang rkyen kyis nus pa rnams kyang mthang gis zad par
217b2(dkon brtsegs): gru rang to// rus pa rnams zad pa'i 'og tu bsregs pa'i gnas der song nas sa dang thal ba dang / sol ba rnams blangs te/ so so nas lus la bskus pa dang / nad thams cad sos par gyur to// mo'u 'gal de ltar rgyal
217b3(dkon brtsegs): khru myo'i spang gis bskal pa chen po byung ba na/ thabs mkhas pas nad kyis btab pa rnams gsos pa yin no// mo'u 'gal khyod kyis de'i che dus na/ rgyal bu myi'i sman zhes bya ba byung ba de bzhin yin snyam du sems na/ de ltar
217b4(dkon brtsegs): bya lta ste/ de ning nyid yin te/ ngas nad kyi sdug bsngal mang ba'i sems can 'gon myed pa/ skyabs myed pa dag gi nang gsos so// ngas deng bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
217b5(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas nas kyang shes rab chen po sman gyis/ sems can rnams gsos nas sdug bsngal mthar byas so// mo'u 'gal nga ni sems can gyi ched du lus gang blangs pas pan 'dogs par
217b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de bzhin du len cing phan 'dogs par byed pas/ mo'u 'gal rgyu dang rkyen nges na ched du sems can gyi phyir lus blangs nas phan 'dogs pa yin par rig par bya'o// gzhan yang mo'u dag la sngon thung ba 'das pa'i
217b7(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi che/ nga gcig bu grogs myed par song ba las/ gcan zan ma rungs pa cig 'ongs te/ nga'i srog bcang nga'i sha za bar 'dod pa las// nga'i 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe/ sems bskyed nas 'di skad du// bdag 'chi ba'i 'og
217b8(dkon brtsegs): tu dgon pa'i gnas tshal 'dir dud 'gro lus po che zhig tu skyes te// gcan zan ma rungs pa gang bdag gis srog bcad pa de dag 'drangs shing tshim par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gcan zan
218a1(dkon brtsegs): ma rungs pa de dag ni rtag par srog chags phra mo gsod cing za bar byed pas/ srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho ba mang du bskyed kyang 'drangs shing tshim par myi 'gyur bas/ ngas 'di skad du bdag 'dir dud 'gro
218a2(dkon brtsegs): 'i lus cher skyes nas/ sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba'i sems can rnams tshim par byed par gyur ces spor lam btab pas na 'chi ba'i du byas ma thag tu der dung 'gro lus po cher rdzus te skyes nas/ gnas zan ma rungs
218a3(dkon brtsegs): ba za zhing khrag 'thung ba rnams 'drangs shing tshim par byas pa yin no// de bzhin du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong steng du lus blangs nas/ sems can rnams la phan pa byas te// mo'u 'gal ngas gal te bskal cig ga/ 
218a4(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa las lhag par sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// sems can bkres shing skom pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi sha khrag gis tshim par byas pa dag brjod na yang mthar phug par myi 'gyur ro// mo'u
218a5(dkon brtsegs): dag la de ltar na ngas sngon sdug sngal ba rnams la snying rje'i sems rab tu bskyed pa yin no// gzhan yang mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus tshe// ngas sems can sdug bsngal
218a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis nyon mongs pa mthong ba dang / 'di snyam du bdag gis spangs te/ yongs su myi rigs so// snyam du bsams te/ de dag gi thad du song nas 'di skad du// kye khyed la sdug sngal ji lta bu zhig yod/ ci zhig 'dod ches
218a7(dkon brtsegs): dris pa dang de dag gis smras pa// deng 'das nag nini du dkres shing skam mo// ngas de sang smras pa bas nas 'di skad ces smras// byed pa di dang bdung ba ji lta bu zhig 'ang/ de dag gos de la bag cag mi khrag 'asrung zhing bar
218a8(dkon brtsegs): yi pas// ga she lus kyo ga dang thag dngagacag la byin na ni/ bdag zag pa dang dang byed cing bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / ngas de dag la de bzhin du gnangs / rang shi kyin yang khrag zung ngas sems cad de dag sa kyi
218b1(dkon brtsegs): yang / mo'u dgal de'i tshe de'i sems cal 'gyod cing 'phangs pa yang myed// mya ngan yang byed/ bying ba yang myed kyi/ 'di snyam du deng bdag cag gis lus kyi sha tsi tsam du bcang pa de tsam 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi phyogs kyang de
218b2(dkon brtsegs): tsam zhig 'gag par 'gyu ro snyam du bsams nas/ ngas yun ring po rtag par sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la mos par gyur to// de ltar sbyin pa btang yang rab tu dga' zhing bde bar thob par gyur pa yin te/ rgyu dang rkyen des de
218b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab tu mnga' ba yin par rig par bya'o// gzhan yang mo'u dag la ngas dran to// sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba yin tan gi mthu chem
218b4(dkon brtsegs): lo dang ldan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bsngags pa zhig byung ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po stos po chen 'di snyam du deng bdag gis ci'i phyir mchod sbyin chen po bshams nas/ sems can rnams tshim par myi byed snyam mo// de snyam du bsams
218b5(dkon brtsegs): nas mched sbyin chen po bshams nas/ bza' ba 'dod pa la bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod pa la btung ba/ gos dang / mal cha dang gser dang dul dang rin po che'i dngos dang / shing rta dang / bzhon pa dang nor bu dang / spug
218b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdo'i snying po dang / shel dang be dUr+ya dang / byi ru dang / man shel las stsogs pa'i rin po che dang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos kyi bye ma dang / dang gi lda ldi dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bu dang
218b7(dkon brtsegs): mu mo dang / bran po dang bran mo dang / las byed dang / rta dang glang po dang / ba lang dang / lug dang / zhing gi dngos po 'dod pa dag la yang / ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga' mgur sbyor nas thams cad yongs su btang ngo // mo'u 'gal rgyal po
218b8(dkon brtsegs): stobs po ches de ltar sbyin pa rgya cher btang ba dang / de'i brgya byin lha'i dbang po 'di snyam du bdag gis ci'i phyir rgyal po 'di la bar chad byas te/ 'bras bu myi thob par myi snyam du bsams nas/ de nas bram ze cig tu sprul te/ rgyal
219a1(dkon brtsegs): po ded ga la ba der song nas/ rgyal po de la 'di skad ces dris so// kye mchod sbyin chen po 'dus pa'i nor dngos po ji lta bu zhig yongs su gtong // rgyal pos smras pa/ bram ze bdag la nor ci dgos pa thams cad
219a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong bas 'phangs ci yang myed do// bram zes smras pa/ khyed kyi yi dam de lta bu'i yin na deng bdag gis slong ba gang yin pa de sbyin par nus sam// rgyal po stobs po ches smras pa// bdag gis ci dgos pa thams cad zad
219a3(dkon brtsegs): par gtong ngo zhes ma smras sam/ bram zes smras pa/ rgyal po gal te de ltar na deng bdag ni rgyal po'i lus kyi yan lag 'dod do// rgyal pos bsams pa/ bram ze 'di ni ner zas 'dod pa ma yin gi// deng 'dir 'ongs nas bdag
219a4(dkon brtsegs): gi mchod sbyin chen po bshig par 'dod pa yin te/ bdag gis gal te lus kyi yan lag ma yin ni na/ bdag nyid kyis rang gi ma chod sbyin chen po bshig par 'gyur ro// snyam du bsams nas/ bram ze la 'di
219a5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so// khyed la lus kyi yan lag sbyin gis chod la khyer cig/ bram zes smras pa/ kye rgyal po chen po dang de skad smras pa 'di la 'gyod par 'gyur ro// ba lta myed dam/ rgyal po stobs po ches
219a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bdag gi sems can la 'gyod pa myed do// de slong ba mang po phyogs bzhi nas/ 'dus te 'angs na yang bdag gis thams cad tshim par bya'o snyam mo// deng bdag cig du tshim par bya ba yang dka' na/ gzhan mang po lta smos
219a7(dkon brtsegs): sus/ nas rgyal ba spangs pa cas miminanan sa rang kyi lag pa sang+ya swA/ brasa'i labyed kyis lag pa sbyi pas smras so// ga rgyam baspongs pa ni rang gi lag pa yang sems pa 'i
219a8(dkon brtsegs): khyed byed par gyu nga/ de gar ses rtse gci byor pa mam su gang de phyi nga sacang 'oms gang ba byi dgasas sum ra badzin du gyung ro// de'i rgyal po nas po chis patsho gas sas kyis
219b1(dkon brtsegs): lag bcang nas bram ze la byin yang slar skyes par gyur to// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang rgyu dang rkyen des ma/ lha'i bsod nas zad nas/ sems yongs su gdung zhing sdug bsngal bas 'od dod chen po bos te/ 
219b2(dkon brtsegs): yus de nyid kyis mngon du sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar myed par ltung bar gyur te// ma'u dag la khyod kyis de'i chi de'i dris na/ rgyal po stobs po ches lus yongs su bdang ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems ra/ de ltar skye
219b3(dkon brtsegs): skye/ de ni 'i yin no// don mo'i dus nab rgya byin lha'i dbang po mchad sbyin chen pa ra mang byed par 'do pa ga'an rig yon sum du sems du/ de ltar phyig ste/ de gyi sbyin nyid yin no// mdu gas de'i gyim
219b4(dkon brtsegs): spyir thung pos phra dog dang / zhe sdang gdisam pas sbyin pa'i bar chang bya bar 'dod pa las gzhig par ma nus te/ sems can dumyal ba chen por ltung bar gyur to// ngas dang bran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bying chub mngong pa
219b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi mchod sbyin bshams pa na yang / lha sbyin thun po dung zhe sdang dang / 'bru dog gi bsam pas rnyed pa mngon par zhen pa'i phyir/ 'khor mang po'i ba sdus nas nga bsang
219b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dod pa yin te/ nga sden bu rgong phung po'i rishi ni du chags pa la lA sbyin bdog ga de ri'i steng du 'jigs nas/ 'khrub 'khoragos rdo 'a'adas te/ bdag nyid dge ba'i rtsa ba bshiganas ngaming na sangs skyed
219b7(dkon brtsegs): khas bdag nyid kyi rnyed pa dang / 'byor da ba'i mthu nyams par byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar myang ltung ba yin no// mo'u 'gal nga ni lha sbyin blun po la lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi nyes par byas par byed kyang yun ring rje
219b8(dkon brtsegs): nas pa la dgrar 'du zhes so// tshe rabs tha byas cad du ngas dge ba'i chos mngon par bsgrub pa'i bar chad bya bar brtsams kyang / nga dges pa sbyin pa'i bar chad bya bar ma nus so// nga ni yun ring po nas rtag par byams pa dang / snying
220a1(dkon brtsegs): gag rnyes pan bdags kyang ngalanye ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa myed do/ mo'u dag pa lnga sbyin ni che rabs thams cad du ngas byas pa'i dri myi bzongs/ ngas deng lnga sbyin dang dra bdag kyang / la dang phyi dang lha ma yin du bcas/ 
220a2(dkon brtsegs): kha'i 'jig rten gi drin myi shes par bstan te/ de lta bu'i skye bo de dag ni log pa nyid du nges pa'i gnas su zhugs pa yin no// mo'u dag la lha sbyin 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar myed par 'jug
220a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe gdod de la lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthun yin no// lha sbyin byas pa'i drin myi shes pa'i mchog tu gyur pas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar
220a4(dkon brtsegs): myed pa 'jug tu nye ba'i tshe/ sgra chen po 'di skad du lha sbyini blun po khyod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pa dang / gsang par bya ba ma yin pa la nan gyis/ gsod sems bskyed pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i rgyu dang rkyen
220a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis ka deng sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar myed par ltung ba yin no// zhes bsgo ba thos pas shin tu skrag nas gdong dul bar gyur te/ 'di skad du deng bdag sha dang rus pa gtugs te/ sems/
