220a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsi gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o// zhes smras nas/ sems bde ba thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par yid ches pa bskyed nas sgra chen po byung ste/ sems can dmyal ba/ 
220a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po mnar myed par zhugs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des na/ phyis sems can dmyal ba chen po las thar nas myir skyes te/ khyim nas khyim bdag myed par rab tu byung nas lam yang dag par bsgoms pas/ rang sangs rgyas
220a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te/ mying yang rus pa can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal ngas de lha sbyin la rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan pa nyid kyis/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su bzlas pa yidan
220b1(dkon brtsegs): 'acu gas ngas la sbyin nus pa'i na ba'i sngon smon las ci lta bzhin du gyur pa yin na// de ci'i phyir nen/ tshe rabs snga ma la lha sbyin mongs su bzlas par dam bcas pas/ ngas khyod yong su bzla bar bya ba'i gzha mas bsgrub/ 
220b2(dkon brtsegs): byang byed do// zhes smras paso// mo'u dag la lnga sbyin ni pa'i 'anga' shig las mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu dang rkyen bskyed pa yid gi/ gzhan gis bskyed pa ma yin pas/ lha sbyin ni byin cad kyang gzhan gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par mi byed
220b3(dkon brtsegs): kyai/ nga bang shig yongs su dang ba'i sems bskyod par byed do// sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'i zhes smras pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis ni/ byis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam thob par gyur pa yin no// mo'u 'gol nga ni yun ring
220b4(dkon brtsegs): bo nas rtag par sems can rnams la pha ma lta bu'i 'du shes kyis gang 'gon myed cing skyabs myed pa/ rgud cing nor dang myo ldan pa/ 'khor ba yang bar kha rgyud cing lam ngan par zhugs pa/ gleng zhing gti mug pas
220b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa skyed pa/ rtag par dbus long du gyur cing myig dang myi ldan bdag su zhig bdag cag la 'dren par 'gyur// su zhig 'gon dang skyabs byed par 'gyur snyam du sems dpa' dag gcig pu snying
220b6(dkon brtsegs): dang snangs bya bar da cos pas na ma thu gas su sas ca pa'i phyi/ mas canasapapa ni ga gachu banas sa sus pa bangangs sur pa mi byed do// rig nangs sa
220b7(dkon brtsegs): sas 'a gas kyang drung sa sus nga ngas par tu byed / tsa byor shen/ ngani dag par sems can pangs dang spangs pa'i bde sbyin teng/ sdug bsngar kyi pa 'ams cad yongs su bas ga kyi
220b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dag la gdang ba rnam sa sbyin ci ti rigs papo// sa dmas las su zhi da par sa pa' din/ 'di gci su ma nas pard par dris pa yin bas da de sems can 'od pa chos dag pas gyi
221a1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i chos dang / rab tu dul ba'i chos bslabs nas/ glang po che cang shes ltar bur dul bar bya'i// glang po che ma dul ba lta bur myi bya'o// snyam du sems te/ mo'u 'gal 'di lta ste dper na/ glang po shin
221a2(dkon brtsegs): tu dul ba ni g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i tshe sems la nur pa myed cing / rnga bo che'i sgra dang / dung gi sgra dang / rab tu 'bod pa'i sgra dag bzod pas/ 'di lta bu'i 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra dag thos par gyur nga na yang skrag cing
221a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa myed la/ grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sha sbrang gdug bya/ dang / rlung dang char pa dang bkres pa dang / skom pa dag kyang bzod pa nus/ ral gi shin tu rnon po sna tshogs btab pa dang / mdung thung dang
221a4(dkon brtsegs): lugs kyi 'khor lo 'phang ba dang / lug gis gzhu ba dag kyang bzod cing / skrag pa dang 'jigs pa myed par thad kar g.yul ngor mchong zhing nur pa dang / 'gong ba myed pas/ mo'u dgal glang po che shin
221a5(dkon brtsegs): du dul ba ni 'di snyam du bdag dgra'i g.yul du 'jug par myi bya'o snyam du ses kyi/ bdag dgra'i g.yul 'di las rgyal bar bya'o snyam du seMs pa kho nar zad do// mo'u 'gal de bzhin du nga yang sngon byang chub
221a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems kyis smon lam rgya chen po btab nas/ rje sems can rnams sems dul bar byed pas/ gal te sems can rnams kyis ngag rtsub pos nga la myi snyan pa brjod na yang ngas lan du gnod
221a7(dkon brtsegs): byar myi byed do// dngo brtsor par byed na yang ngas lan myi byed do// ga' te mtshon nu dang / dbyug pa dang / gya mo dang / rdo dag gis du la gnod pa gnod pa byas nas nga'i srog 'phrog par byed na yang / 'do'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag
221b1(dkon brtsegs): rang babyung ba yang byed khong jo dang / 'khan du dzin payang byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i mam la yongs su skyo ba yang byed pas/ 'disam du deng bdag dgra'i gsul 'dir 'jug par myi bya gam du myi sems kyi
221b2(dkon brtsegs): dug gis srog pa'i sus yang dag par bcom ste/ bur byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rlu bab par byas nas/ yos gsum gi sems tsam byed pa rnams yongs su bzla bar bya'i snyam du sengs pa khon
221b3(dkon brtsegs): zang ngo // mo ru 'gal sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa ji snyed spyad pa dang / sems can rnams la byams pa dang / snying rje ji snyed bskyed pa gal te tshig gis brjod par gyur na// nams mthar
221b4(dkon brtsegs): thug par myi 'gyu ro// gzhan yang mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon byung ba'i 'das pa'i dus na/ mu stegs can gi drang srong bzod pa'i stobs zhes bya ba zhig byug ste// des bdag gis sems can la zhe sdang myi skyed do snyam pa'i
221b5(dkon brtsegs): chos yang dag par blangaso// de'i tshe sdig pa'i yid ches bya ba'i bdud cig yo da do// snyam du bdag deng ci'i phyir drang srong de'i drung du song nas/ bzod pa'i chos bshig ste/ kho 'khro ba bskyed nas bzod/ 
221b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang du len pa'i bsams pa lngas ldog par myi bya snyam du bsams nasade nas spyad pa la mkhas pa'i myi stong bkye nas/ de yongs su bskor te/ ngag rtsub mos spyos nas myi 'den par skyon nas
221b7(dkon brtsegs): spos ka/ 'byung bar myi 'os pa'i tshig ngan pa na pa sna tshogs kyis spyos te/ 'gro ba'i tshig gis spyos te/ grong khyer du phyin pa'i tshe yang spros// grong khyer du 'jug pa'i tshe yang spyos/ zan za ba'i chu yang spros ka zan zos zim
221b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'og tu yang spros/ stan las langs pa'i tshe yang spros/ grong khyer nas byung ba'i tshe yang spros/ rang gnas nags tshal dag tu phyind pa'i tshe yang spros// 'greng ba'i tshe yang spros/ 'dug pa'i tshe yang spros/ nyal ba'i
222a1(dkon brtsegs): yang skyes/ 'jog pa'i yang smra// ban zugs rngub pa dang / dbugs srung da'i mi yang smras te/ rtag par rjes su 'as nas TI bdun pasna tshogs kyi rgyu chad bskyed par smos so// de'i mi
222a2(dkon brtsegs): na pa d-i gA kr-i kyis lags 'i 'ja nib nga ba du gnas/ nga srang zang ci nams lam nus sa// dengs dung mig pa / du maung ba'i gyig sa byud kyadang du rdzu
222a3(dkon brtsegs): bad ga nyid kyi gcin gis de'i mgo steng du blags lhung bzed kyi nang du brags// chos gos dang lhung bzed la yang bskus nas/ phyag dang gis mgo la yang gdor to// de'i drang srong bzod pa'i spobs la brgyad rje
222a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi stong gi bar du spyo ba la dpa' ba'i myi steng gis ngag rtsub pas spyos shing spyad par gyur kyang / de'i tshe sems la zhe sdang / 'khyen du 'dzin pa yang myed la/ tha na sems la nur zhum par gyur pa yang myed do// bdag
222a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis kyang 'di skad du bdag gis rnyed pa ci byas zhes kyang myi zer la/ khon du 'dzin pa yang myed do// lo brgyad khri bo'i stong gi bar du snang myig gis bdud sdig pa'i yid la bltas pa yang myed
222a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag la nyes pa ci yod ces smras pa yang spyod do// me'u dgal spro ba la dpa' ba'i myi stong po de dag gyis drang srong bzod pa'i stobs la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong las 'das pa'i bar du spyos kyang / 
222a7(dkon brtsegs): ma zhig myi nus par rig nas/ shin tu dang ba'i bsam pa bskyed de/ kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang gshegs nas/ 'di skad du khyod kyis dngos po 'dis chos ji lta bu zhig yongs su tshol// bdag kyang chos de thob par 'tshal lo// 
222a8(dkon brtsegs): nas sbas so// mo'u dag la spyob la dba' ba'i myi stong po de dag drang srong las shin tu dang bathob pas gus pa'i sems kyis mchod cing rim 'gro byas nas/ bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// drang srong yang / 
222b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis rim 'gro dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa nyams su drangs kyang sems la mngon par zhen pa ci yang myed par gyur to// moT dag la khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na// drang srong bzod pa'i stobs zhes bya ba de bzhin
222b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig yin snyam du sems na/ de ltar myi ste de ni nga yin no// ngas de'i tshe bzod pa'i chos de lta bu yang dag blangs pas/ bdud sdig pa'i yid kyis myi stong bkye ste// rgyun chad pa myed par ngag rtsub pos spros shing rtag par dam
222b3(dkon brtsegs): snyispong por gyur kyang // nga'i sems la g.yo zhing gyur pa ci yang myed do// mo'u dag la spyod pa la dpa' ba'i skyes bu stong po de dag drang srong bzod pa'i stobs la shin tu dad pa skyes te/ sdig pa bshags nas/ drang srong bzod pa'i
222b4(dkon brtsegs): skyabs kyis/ rjes su bun byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ de'i tshengs yongs su btul nas sangs rgyas kyi bstang pa la yang dag par bkod de/ skyes bu snang po de dag par
222b5(dkon brtsegs): phyi nang pa drug kun sum tshogs par spyod pas/ mthar kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ thams cad lhag ba myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das
222b6(dkon brtsegs): zar gyur to mo'u 'gal khyod kyis de'i dus na/ bdung sdig pa'i ying skyes bu song bgyeras nga la sbyor ba bcug pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/ de ltar gyi sto/ deni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin no// 
222b7(dkon brtsegs): drunaso// / gzhan mang mo so na ma ngas ma dran te/ 
222b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dus ma// ras rang gi lus sems cad rnams la yongs su btang ras ni/ 'jig ca gi skye rnams kyis dran dang / gsog byas pas de'i chi skye ba mang ba de dag gis/ nga las rnam par snardzogs
224a1(dkon brtsegs): byed du bcug ste/ kha cig gis ni nga la bshang ci dor du bcug go// kha cig gis ni nga la lung 'dor du bcug go// kha cig gis ning las rtsa len du btang ngo // kha cig gis ning la 'bru dang / 'o sa dang zho dang
224a2(dkon brtsegs): mar dang / 'bru mar dang / sbrang rtsi len tu btang ngo // kha cig gis ni nga la shing dang sol ba dang me dang chu dang len du bcug ste// 'di lta ste bu las stsogs pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs byed du bcug kyang / mo'u dag la ngal de
224a3(dkon brtsegs): ga nas pa shang cing 'dor du bcug pa de'i rjes su myi byar snyam pa'i sems bskyed par myi dran no// gang gis nga la me tog dang / skyes dang / phreng ba dang / byug smos dang / spos kyi byom dang / bza' ba dang / btang ba dang / 
224a4(dkon brtsegs): gzus bu len du rang ba las de'i rjes su ma song myi dran no// mdzu dag nya ngas gang gis legs par byed du bcug pa'i rjes su ni 'gro bar bya/ legs pa ma yin pa byed du bcug pa'i rjesu ni 'gro bar myi bya'o snyam dusas
224a5(dkon brtsegs): skyeng po yang dag par rjes su myi dran no// me'u 'gal ngas de'i tshe rgyas rigs kyi rjesu ni 'brang bar bya/ bram ze'i rjes su ni 'drang ba rabyan/ rgyal rigs kyi rjes su ni 'brang bar myi bya// dmongs rigs kyi
224a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su ni 'brang bar myi bya/ gdol pa'i rjes su ni 'brang bar myi bya/ dmangs rigs kyi rjes su ni 'brang myi bya/ rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rjes su ni 'brang bar bya/ dmangs rigs dang / gdol pa'i rje su ni 'brang bar
224a7(dkon brtsegs): myi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par myi dran la/ gang zag 'di ni che'o// gang zag 'di ni chung ngo zhes de dag khyad par dang / gang zag 'di'i rje su ni 'brang bar bya/ gang zag 'di'i rjes su ni 'brang bar myi bya'o snyam du sems pa yang
224a8(dkon brtsegs): khyi khyo ma gapa gnyis 'i rima'i ses sems kyis kra ba di 'a de// gas ma par dra / nga sdi byang chu sems dpa'i srung ba srung b.ring/ gang gi tshom pa ga byang sa
224b1(dkon brtsegs): bcug pa las/ nus bzhi du ma byas pa yod par ma yang myi dran no// mo 'u dag langs mngong par dran de sngo byang chub sems dpa'i spang ba spyod pa'i tshe/ bya ba'i ngos po dag nges par mthar phyin pa'am/ dge ba'i las
224b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzo du bya ba dge ba gang sang mthar ma phyin par yod par rjes su myi dran mngangs sngo byang chub sem sa pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yang lus la mngon par zhen par byung ba skyed na/ re gi dngos po la sa
224b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dom dengs sngor byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ yang longs spyod kyidangos po dag la 'don bdag gi longs spyod yin snyom pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa byed kyang / sngan gyi las kyi rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis longs spyod dang
224b4(dkon brtsegs): ldar par gyur ba mazang bas/ long spyod kyi dngos po dag la 'di snyam du semos te/ dngos po 'di dag ni sems can rloms dang bun mong du spyod pa bya ste/ dngos po 'di la bdag gi skal pa yod bzhin du/ sems can nas
224b5(dkon brtsegs): sa skal pa yod do snyam du sems so// mo'u dag la ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i dbang gis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dong nye bar gyur kyang / bdag gi long spyod la bdag kyang skal pa yod/ sems
224b6(dkon brtsegs): sa rnas pa 'ang don ma du gyigyis te/ long spyong 'di dag ni sems pas rnams kyi yin pas / bdag laskal pa ci ming byed de/ sum du sems khon dbang nga/ ma'u dag pangs sangs rgyas kyichos dang nye bar gyur parjes su
224b7(dkon brtsegs): thob bar gyur kyang / de la mngon par nyen pa yang myong / yongs su sdud cing len par yang myi byed pas/ chos rnams la mos par byed kyi/ chos rnams dang du lend pa la mos par myi byed do// stong bzod ma nas myed pa nyid mos pa
224b8(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi/ bzongs nas yod pa nyid la mos par myi byed do// mo'u dag la ngas mngon par dran to/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ che rabs brgya stong chad myed pa snyed du mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na rang gi lus me
225a1(dkon brtsegs): sbar nas/ lam stor ba'i sems can rnams la snang bar byas te lam bstan to// mo'u dag la ngas sngon mngon par dran te/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ tshe rabs brgya stong tshad myed pa snyed
225a2(dkon brtsegs): drug pa'i sems can rnams la rang gi sha bcad nas sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo // mo'u dag la ngas mngon par dran te/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ tshe rabs brgya stong chad myed pa snyen du khrag 'thung
225a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can rnams la lus las khrag phyung ste/ sbyin pa yongs su btang bas tshim par byas so// mo'u dag la mdor na 'jig rten pa'i nor rdzas sam/ long spyod par bya ba ci yang rung ste/ sems can rnams la nam yang
225a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs shing ser sna byas ma myong ste/ thams cad kyang sems can rnams la 'che ba myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa dang / mkhas pa rnams kyang gnang ba 'phangs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par gyu ra pa de ltar/ ngas
225a5(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po rtag par sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i bsam pa rab tu skyed do// gzhan yang mo'u dag la ngas mngon par dran te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ tshong dpon legs par rnyed pa zhes bya bar gyur pa
225a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen por zhugs nas rin po che len du song ba las bde bar slar log ste/ rang gi yul du phyin nas grong khyer du zhugs te/ khyim gi sgor phyind pa dang / de'i tshe grong khyer na gnas pa'i spongs mo pa mang po
225a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis/ de yongs su bskor nas de'i mdun du 'di skad smras so// legs par rnyed pa bde bar byon tam/ sbyin bdag chen po bdag cag spong ba mchis te/ gal te gnang bar gyur na bdag cag bslang bar 'tshal lo// 
225a8(dkon brtsegs): ma'u dag la de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas/ spongs mo pa de dag la 'di skad du/ khyed spongs shig dang / bdag la ci bdog pa 'phangs pa myed par sbyin par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas slongs mo rnams kyis legs par rnyed pa
225b1(dkon brtsegs): slongs mo de dag la 'di skad du/ khyed slongs shig dang / bdag la ci bdog pa 'phangs pa myed par sbyin par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas slongs mo rnams kyis legs par rnyed pa la smras pa/ khyed kyis rgya mtsho'i chen po nas
225b2(dkon brtsegs): rnye ba'i nor bu rin po che rnams bdag la byin cig dang / des na bdag cag rab tu bde bar 'gyur ro// mo'u dgal de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas// nor bu rin po che gcig cig yang / gser srang / rgya stong gser srang / brgya stong
225b3(dkon brtsegs): du ma ri ba phrag brgyan rnyed kyi/ ring po che rnams ma lus par spongs mo ba rnams la byin te/ mo'u dag la legs par rnyed pa deste de ltar nor mang po rnams yongs su btang bar gyur kyang / sems la 'gyur ba 'am 'gyed
225b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ci yang myed do// de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas rin po chen po mang po slongs mo pa rnams la yongs su btang nas/ khyim du yang ma nyags par slar ldog ste/ rgya mtshor zhugs nas rin po che len du song ba las
225b5(dkon brtsegs): snga ma bas byed 'gyur gis rin che mang po thob par gyur to// mo dade/ brgya bcu 'das nas slar rang gi yul du phyin nas/ grong khyer du zhugs pa las/ de'i tshe nyes pa byas pa'i dag cig gshed ma bas
225b6(dkon brtsegs): bzung ste bcings nas myi sten pa'i sgra bsgrags nas/ rnga yang brdungs/ lam ba'i mdo rnams su bsgrags pa yang byas gsang pa'i gnas su khrid de gsang bar byas pa las/ de'i tshe gas pa
225b7(dkon brtsegs): bzug pa de dag tu sa legs pa nad pa byung ba dang / 'di skad ces smras/ tshong dpon padag cag la myi 'jigs pa byin cig/ bdag cag gsang pa'i nyis pa las spyongs la bdag cag la srog byer cig/ khyod na
225b8(dkon brtsegs): Na sbyin bdag chen po skyes bu dam pa legs so// legs par rnyed pas de skad thos pa dang / gsang ba la thug pa dag la/ kye khyed myi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing khyed gsang ba'i nyes pa las yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes smras
226a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ gshed ma de dag gi drung du song nas re re la yang nor bu rin po che gser srang bye ba ri bai re re byin nas/ khyed cag deng bdag rgyal po'i drung nas slar ma 'ongs kyi bar du/ skad cig sdod cig zhes smras ste
226a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas legs par myur zhing rings par rgyal po'i drung du song nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag ni rin po che bzang po dag gis myi 'di dag gi srog 'jam par 'tshal lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ legs
226a3(dkon brtsegs): par rnyed pa myi dri dag nyes pa ni btang du myi rung bas bcong du myi rung ngo // gal te steng zag pa nas nyo bar 'dod na/ khyod la nor ci bdog pa zad par nga la byin la/ bdag nyid kyang shi bar khas len na gdod gtong ngo // mo'u
226a4(dkon brtsegs): dgral de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas de skad smras pa thos pa dang / rab tu dga' gyu rang nas/ bdag ni rnyed pa chen po thos pas/ smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ myi 'di dag gis skyabs
226a5(dkon brtsegs): byas par gyur pa ni bdag gi yid tshim par gyur to zhes/ de nas leg sa par rnyed pas myi de dag bskyabs te/ gsang pa'i nyes pa la sa thar par bya ba'i phyir/ khyim na nor ci 'dog pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po
226a6(dkon brtsegs): nas thob pa'i nor bu rin po che gser dang dngul las stsogs pa bye ba stong phrag tshad myed pa rnams rgyal po la phul nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po myi de dag btang du gsol/ bdag la nor tsa mchis pa ni bas par 'dir
226a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// rgyal pos nor rnams blangs nas gshed ma dag la bsgo ba/ legs par rnyed pa 'di khrid kha sod cig/ lha de bzhin du 'tshal lo// zhes rgyal po'i bka' nyan nas/ legs par rnyed pa bcings te/ gsod par
226a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas su khringangs / lag pa g.yas pa nga ste/ legs pa rnyed pa la mtshor gdang par gnas palas/ lag pa ngas ras bdab tum 'dub pa dang / skrag cing ngo mtshar du gyur nas legs par rnyed pa khrid de/ rgyal
226b1(dkon brtsegs): po la dngos po 'di zhig tu gsod do// mo'u dag la rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas/ bdag nyid mtshon thogs te/ legs par rnyed par gsang par 'dod pa'i phyir mtshon bteg ste/ gdab par gzas pa las/ de'i
226b2(dkon brtsegs): che rgyal po de'i lag pa gnyis sa la ltung ste/ sdug bsngal gi gnod pa chen po thos nas/ skad ngan phyung ste/ 'chi ba'i dus byas so// mo'u dgal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon legs pa rnyed pa zhes bya ba byung ba
226b3(dkon brtsegs): de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/ de ltar myi lta ste/ de ring nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa de ni lha sbyin thun po 'di nyid yin no// mo'u dag la de'i tshe de'i dus na yang lha sbyin gis nga'i srog 'phrog par byas
226b4(dkon brtsegs): ba las 'phrog par ma nus so// deng nga bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ nga'i srog 'phrog par byas pa las 'phrog par ma nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
226b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thos cad kyis kyang gnod par bya bar myi nus na/ lha sbyin blun pos smos kyang ci dgos pas so// lha sbyin ni da ltar yang grogs po ma
226b6(dkon brtsegs): rungs pa bsdus nas/ ngo la gsod par yong 'dod la/ bdag nyid kyang thabs kyis nga gsod par 'dod pas rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang mthu stobs nyams nas gson por lus 'di dang bcas par sems can
226b7(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba mnar myed pa ltung bar gyur to// mo'u dag la nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gang la lha sbyin lta bur phan btags pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ lha sbyin ni byas pa dran du myi gzo'o
226b8(dkon brtsegs): ngasngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i che/ sems can rnams la pha ma lta bur gyur pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab dang ldan pa rig par bya'o// gzhan
227a1(dkon brtsegs): \u0f7f// yang mo'u dgal sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ gangs ri'i rgyal po'i drung na glang po che lnga brgya zhig gnas te/ de'i nang na glang po che'i rgyal po bdag por gyur pa byang bzhin sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/ stobs po che
227a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de'i tshe glang po che mang po rnams ri srang nyam nga zhing dog pa/ lam gcig las myed pa zhig tu mtshan mo gnas par gyur pa 'dron pos mthong nas/ mtshan mo thog thag lam nyam pa der rlubs
227a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po brkos nas/ 'di snyam du glang po che mang po 'di dag ni 'dir lhung bar 'gyur bas thams cad bdag dbang ste/ bdag gis dga' mgur blang bar bya'o snyam mo// mtshan mo thog thag rlubs brkos zin nas/ glang po che mang
227a4(dkon brtsegs): po rnams bdas te/ lamanyam nga zhing rlabs kyi steng du btang ngo // glang po che mang po rnams 'byung bar byas pa las rlabs chen po yod par mthong nas rgol bar nus so// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe glang po che'i bdag
227a5(dkon brtsegs): po nges bdag nyid kyi lus rlabs kyi steng du phreng nyal te/ zam par byas nas 'phreng du glang po che lnga brgya rgyab kyi steng du 'ardzis nas des rgol te dong ngo // glang po che mang po bzlas nas/ bdag nyid kyi mthus mchongs
227a6(dkon brtsegs): pa byas steng song ba dang / de'i tshe ri'i lha zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sdig can rlabs zab brkos gyur kyang / de na grang bdag blo ldan gyis/ bdag dang gzhan ni zlas pas na/ don myed rlabs zab brkos par 'gyur/ 
227a7(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dag la khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na/ glang po che'i rgyal po rno ba zhing mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba byung ba de gzhan yin snyam du sems na/ de ltar myi blta ste/ de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po lnga brgya byung
227a8(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag ni dkar gi dge slong lnga brgya po lha sbyin gis gzhigi par bya bar brtsams pa dag yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na rngon par gyur pa de dag ni lha sbyin las sogs pa lnga brgya po 'di lta ste/ khar da bya dang / gad mo ga dang / tin
227b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho byin dang / ko ka li la sugs pa yin no// mo'u dgas nga ni yun ring po nas rtag par sems cad 'jigs shing skrag po rnams mthong bar gyur na de dag la myi 'jigs pa byin no// sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong
227b2(dkon brtsegs): mabade byin na/ sems can dmyal 'phongs pa dag la ni zang zing yongs su btang ngo // sems can gang la ma log par zhugs pa dag la ni yang dag pa'i lam bstan to// sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba dag la ni nang kyi
227b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yongs su bstsal lo// sems can gang bkres shing skom pa dag la ni bza' ba dang btung ba yongs su btang ngo // sems can gang sha ni za zhing khrag 'thung ba dag la ni lus kyi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas so
227b4(dkon brtsegs): ma'u dag la nga ni sngon smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad yang dag par byas pas ngas sems can rnams la khas blangs pa gang yin pa de dag le lo dang tang snyoms las myed par byas te/ mo'u 'gal ngas sems
227b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas ka bla ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyi bden tshig ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ngal ba dang par gyur paci yang spyod de/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa gang yin pa
227b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag le lo dang btang snyoms las kyis bar chad byas par gyu rang na/ dadz+ra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa ra 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ba zhig na/ mo'u 'gal nga ni dzi skad smra ba bzhin du
227b7(dkon brtsegs): du spyod la/ ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smra ba yin no// / thugs rje chen po'i le'u ste// drug 'o// / de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus
227b8(dkon brtsegs): ra tid du dge slong grong bache'i bgazhes bya bzhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur ba san las langs te/ grags phrag pa gcig tu gas sa bus mo gams pa'i spangs bcugs te sa sa gyur nas/ bcom lda das la 'dis kyis
228a1(dkon brtsegs): nam yang / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las bka' ba srung ba'i ngas pa 'di dag thos pas/ lus kyi sku yang lngar zhing mchim yang drung bar gyur to// deng bdag gis dngos po cig zhu bar 'chal te/ bcom ldan
228a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das nyid kyis 'di skad du/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i tshe ji smras pa bzhin du spyod la/ ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du smra ba yin no// zhes gsungs pas/ bcom ldan 'das ni dang po thugs bskyed pa nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su
228a3(dkon brtsegs): bzla bar thugs dam pa bzhengs pa lags te/ gal te de lta bu'i thugs dam pa zhes pa lags par 'gyur na/ da ltar yongs su bzla bar mdzad sems can nga dung ma bas par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyu rad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan
228a4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i 'og tu gal te 'ga' zhig mchis nas/ dge slong rnams la 'di skad du/ khyed ni ston pa chen po sngon sems can thams cad yongs su bzla bar thugs dam pa zhes bzhes so zhe na/ sems can da dung ma zad par bdag nyid yongs
228a5(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de ci'i phyir zhes rgol ba zhig mchis pa/ ra gyur na/ de ci skad du lan 'dab par bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong glang po che'i lag la bka' stsa lang pa/ gal de 'ga'
228a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig de skad du dgol ba zhig yod par gyur na ni de nyid la slar 'di skad du dris shig/ khyod kyis chos 'di lta bu zhig la sems can yin par 'dod/ des gal te 'di skad du phung po dang / skye mched dang khams gang yin pa de dag la sems
228a7(dkon brtsegs): tsan yin par 'dod do zhes zer na/ de nyid la slar 'di skad du dris shig/ ci phung po dang skye mched dang khams 'du shing tshogs pa la sems cam yin par 'dod dam 'on te bral zhing gyes par gyur pa la sems smin par 'dod/ des gal te 'di skad du
228a8(dkon brtsegs): phung po dag skye mched dang khams 'dus pa la sems can yin par 'dod de zhes zer ma/ de la 'di skad du spros shig/ khyed bdag nyid kyis lan bdab zin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus pa ni sems yin la phung po dang / skye mched dang khams
228b1(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can ma yin pas/ chos bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gsungs pa yang bral zhig gyes par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa yin gi/ tshogs shing 'dus par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das ni bral 'dzi
228b2(dkon brtsegs): gas pa'i spyod pa la dgyes yin te/ 'dus shing tshogs pa la dgyes pa ma yin te/ tshogs shing 'dus pa la sems can myed pas so// des gal te 'di skad du/ phung po dang skye mched dang khams nyid sems can yin no zhes/ 
228b3(dkon brtsegs): ze nang/ de la 'di slar 'di skad du spros shig/ gal te de ltar na NA dang / shing dang gyo mo dang / rdob thams cad kyang sems can yin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod phung po dang skye mched dang / khams nyid sems can yin no
228b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes zer la/ de dag la yang blo dang skye mched dang / khams yod pas so// des gal te 'di skad du/ de dag la sems kyang myed/ sems las byung ba'i chos kyang myed pa'i phyir/ sems can ma yin no zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad ces/ 
228b5(dkon brtsegs): smos shig/ gal te de ltar ni sems can thams cad ni sems can gci/ g.yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshe gso pas phung po dang skye mched dang / khams dag la tha dad par yod par
228b6(dkon brtsegs): gsung bas so// des gal te 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsuM rlung rabs las sems can yong par gsungs pas/ de'i phyi sems can yod ngo zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad ces smros shig/ khyed cing
228b7(dkon brtsegs): phyis lan btab zin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa las yod pa dang / myed pa las dben pa zhes gsungs pas so// des gal te 'di skad du gal te de ltar na/ 'o na ni lam gyi 'bras bu yang myed par 'gyur ro zhes zer
228b8(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad du byung gyis gang zhig la 'bras bu yin par 'dod cas dris shig/ des gal 'di gang du bdag ni di ngam panges par gyu reng pa gang yin pa de la 'dras bu min par 'dod ces zer na/ de la 'di skad du dram par nges pa'idi dpa
229a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni sgra dang tshig myed la/ sgra dang tshig myed pa la ni nges par yod ces sam/ myed ces brjod du myed pas khyod kyis ni rnam par nges pa'i don dam pa la 'bras bu yin par 'dod la/ rnam pa nges pa'i don dam pa la ni
229a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can yang myed la/ sems can gyi mying yang myed pas de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can yod do zhes gang smra ba'i tshig de dag nyid kyis bshig pa yin no zhes smros shig/ gzhan yang glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
229a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa las chos rnams 'gag pa myed par gsungs pa yang sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar mdzad pa yin te/ ngas de ltar chos rnams kyi khon nyid mtshan nyidadi rab tu rtogs pas ji ltar thugs su chung ba'i chos rnams sems can la mngon
229a4(dkon brtsegs): smra bar zhes pa myed pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / smos paskyed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed cing 'byung ba myed panyid du bstan pa yin no// glang po che'i lag gang gyis de lta ra ngas bstan pa'i chos kyi dor shes pa des kyi
229a5(dkon brtsegs): yang ba dang / myong pa'i ched du las kyi spyod pa spong bar myi byed do// gang gis yod pa dang med pa'i ched du las kyi spyod pa myi spong ba des/ ji ltar sems can yod pa dang / sems car byed par mthong bar gyu
229a6(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i lag 'di ni rtag par chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ 'di la ma rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yang myed/ dri ma yang myang / yongs su dag pa yang myed/ 'ong ba yang
229a7(dkon brtsegs): myed/ 'gro ba yang myed/ lam gi 'bras bu yang myed/ ring po yang myed/ zung du yang myed/ gru bzhi yang myed/ zlum pa yang myed/ dbyibs kyang myed/ kha dog kyang myed/ de'i phyir chos rnams ni sgo gcig khor ste/ 'di snyam du
229a8(dkon brtsegs): sems nas gang gos sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de ji 'gags pa dang / 'gag pa dang 'gag par 'gyur ba'i 'gag pa'i mtshan thong gcig yin sum 'am/ bcom ldam das de ma lags so// 'a rje
229b1(dkon brtsegs): bas/ rnas gang gis sangs rgyas mthang bar 'gyur ban byas daji sru dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba'i skye ba'i mtsha nyid gcig min sum 'am/ bcam ldan 'das don ma lagaso// glang ba che'i lag
229b2(dkon brtsegs): gal te de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'gag pa zhes myi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ma lags so// glang po che'i lag des gal te 'di skad du/ sku mtshan dang ldan pas bdag de'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
229b3(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das par zhugs nas slar log par myi 'gyurar zhes smras pa yang su mtshan phyir myi ldog par mthong ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gag pa zhes bya'o zhes zer na/ ral 'di skad du dris shig/ ci khyed sku'i
229b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan yongs su grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dod dam/ 'di skad du bdag ni sku'i mtshan yongs su grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'dod do zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig/ de bzhin
229b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa gsungs pa'i gsungs rabs la ni sku'i mtshan la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o zhes ma gsungs te/ gal te sku'i mtshan ma yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin no zhes brjod ni ni gyo mo dang / 
229b6(dkon brtsegs): rdo dang ri dang / klung dang / rtsa shing thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin par 'gyur ro// des gal te 'di skad du gyo mo dang / rdo dngar dang / klung dang / rtsa shing thams cad la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum rtsa
229b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis myed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes myi bya'o// zhes zer na de la 'di skad du smras shig/ khyod kyis smras pa ltar/ su mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya na ni/ 'khor lo
229b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba'i rgyal po yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin pa'i rigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas so// des gal te 'di skad du mtshan ma'i mtshan gri chos la 'jug
230a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur bas/ mtshan ma'i bram zes kyang sangs rgya su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'i dngos po de dben pas so nas zer na de la 'di skad du smos shig/ gal te mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na
230a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa yin na ni/ khyod bdag nyid kyis mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par mthong bas mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa yin no// zhes smras pas/ deng khyed kyis de bzhin
230a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mtsham mod cig/ des gal te 'di skad du bdag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos bcwo brgyad dang / zag pa myed pa'i dbang po dang / stobs dang byang
230a4(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag dang lam dang bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las sregs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid du ston pa zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du sus shig/ khyod kyi stobs bcu las
230a5(dkon brtsegs): sngags pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// zhes smras pas/ deng khyod kyis de ba'i na gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ci lta bu yin pa bshod cig/ des gal te 'di lta skad du ji sangs rgyas dang mtshan tha dad pa cig yin
230a6(dkon brtsegs): nam zhes zer na/ nga la 'di skad du sbyong nying mtshan sangs rgyas yim shes zer bar bad kyi/ mtshan ni sangs rgyas ma yinan zhes smos ni ga/ des gal ta yang 'di skad du/ dbyibs myed cing khadog byed pa
230a7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshas gzhan rig sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu la stsogs pa'i mchan nying byed par 'gyur ram zhes zer na/ de 'di skad du smos shig/ dbyi mi skyed cing bton byed pa'i chos ji ltar dbyibs dang bcas shing 'dog da sa
230a8(dkon brtsegs): kha'i sa cha ra byed par 'gyur/ gzhan yang byed kyim gte byibs byed cing bdag byed pa'i rnam la sangs rgyas gis phyi zhes zer na por rjeg 'ang tshubs byed cing bdag byed de'i chos thams cad kyangs sa rgyas
230b1(dkon brtsegs): yin par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// gal te chos de dag sangs rgyas yin par 'gyur na ni/ stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos bcwo brgyad dang dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 
230b2(dkon brtsegs): am dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yang de'i mtshan nyid byed par gyu rang pa'i rigs so// zhes brjod par bya'o// glang po che'i lag nga'i nyan thos rnams ni nga ltar skyes bu thun pa
230b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu gdul bar bye'o'odo// gzhan yang glang po che'i lag ngas sngon blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad yongasu bcu rgya'o zhes spor lam ba ba mod
230b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ sems can yang ma dmyigs/ sems can gi mying yang myi dmyigs pa
230b5(dkon brtsegs): nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ rten cing 'brel par 'gyur ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po'i chos dngos po yod pa'i phyir dngos po 'di yod dngos po 'di myed pa'i phyir/ dngos po 'di myed par rtog
230b6(dkon brtsegs): ba kho nar zad do// dngos po gang yod pa'i phyir dngos gang yod/ dngos po myed pa'i phyir dngos po gang myed par 'gyur ce na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yong bar 'gyur/ 'du byed kyi rkyen kyis rnams par
230b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis mying dang gzugs mying dang gzugs kyis rkyen gyis skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len
230b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rkyen gyis srid/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skyob/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rgani/ rgazhi'i rkyen gyis mya ngan rdzas mya ngan smra sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / ying mi bde dang / 'jug pa rnams yod par 'gyur te/ de ltar snun
231a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa 'gag pa'i phyir/ 'du byed rnams 'gag/ 'du byed rnams 'gag pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par
231a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'gag pa'i phyir/ mying dang gzugs 'gag/ mying dang gzugs 'gag pa'i phyir/ skye mchod drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gag pa'i phyir/ reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gag pa'i phyir/ tshor ba 'gag pa'i
231a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ srod pa 'gag pa/ sred pa 'gag pa'i phyir/ len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gag pa'i phyir/ srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gag pa'i phyir/ skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gag pa'i phyir/ rga shi 'gag/ rga shi 'gag pa'i phyir
231a4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug sAl gi phung po chen po 'ga' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro// de de la myig dang ye
231a5(dkon brtsegs): shes dang / rig pa dang / blo skyes pas/ 'di ltar dbus dang / mtha' myed pa dang / 'jig pa myed pa'i rnam par grol ba rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par grol ba de rab tu rtog
231a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir// chos gzhan gang yang thob par gyur pa myed kyi/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i chos dmyigs pa kho nar zad do// glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji ltar chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa de
231a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sems can rnams yang dag par rab tu ston to// glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi nyidi ni 'gyur ba myed par rtag tu gnas pas/ 'di lta ste myi dang gzugs kyang stong bar
231a8(dkon brtsegs): myi 'gyur la/ phan tshun 'gal ba myed/ skye ba yang myed/ 'byung ba yang myed do// glang po che'i lag nga ni de ltar rtag par de ltar chos ston pas/ khyed kyis kyang nga'i dgongs pa bzhin du rig par bya'o// ngas khyod de lta bu'i chos
231b1(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyis kyang de bzhin dunan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// blang ba ma'i lag son brgyad pas slab ma rnams la gang byas pa'i shes pa de dgangs ma smras par byas zin pas/ khyed kyis ciskang sbyar ba banin du
231b2(dkon brtsegs): mang par bsgrubs nas/ chos rnams las ma shes kyi snang bar 'ob par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa glang ba tsho'i lag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gas de 'ga' zhig rje
231b3(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ de bzhinani gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba zhig yin na su zhig lam ston par 'gyur/ lam ston pa myed pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos nub pa zhes bya'o// dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ 
231b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa yang nub pa zhes bya bas/ 'di yang sems can thos cad yongs su ma bzlas pa zhes bya'o zhes mtshan/ de la ji skad du lan btab par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
231b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsa lang pa/ glang po che'i lag gal te de skad du 'dri bar yod na/ de la 'di skad du lan gdab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thos cad mkhyen pa nyid yin par skye bo mang po kun gyis kyang shes shing
231b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong lag rtag par sems can bzla ba'i dus la gnas pas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang / da dung phan pa mdzad pa yin no// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas rnams
231b7(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung ston par mdzad pas/ de nyid sangs rgyas kyi gdung bas ba cing rgyun gyi chad par mdzad pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ni sangs rgyas gcig gi/ 
231b8(dkon brtsegs): chos yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yin pas/ de lta bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon byang chub sems dang
232a1(dkon brtsegs): 'i spyod pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji skad bstun pa bzhin du spyod cing / ji kar spyang pa bzhin du gsungs pa yin par rig par bya zhes brjed par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i lag gis 'dris pa
232a2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad yongs su tshul legs par thugs su chung ba lags te/ chos thams cad logs par thugs su chung pa'i slad du/ sku dang gsung thugs kyi byun
232a3(dkon brtsegs): las mkhyen pa sngon du gtong zhing mkhyen pa'i rjes su 'brang ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji skad bstan pa'i bzhin du mdzad cing / ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du gsung bar 'gyur ba ni shing
232a4(dkon brtsegs): tu ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ glang po che'i lag khyod kyis ci skad smras pa bzhin du nga ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji skad ston
232a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin du spyod cing / ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smra bar gyur pa yin no// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhig nor ba myed par 'jig rten du byung nas sems can la phan 'dogs
232a6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ lha dang mya'i bde ba la bgod pa dang / thams cad kyang kun gyi ston pa/ chen por gyur nas/ yang dag pa'i lam ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol bas/ spros pa myi mnga' ba'i pha rol
232a7(dkon brtsegs): du byon nas/ de dung ma rgal ba dag yongs su bzlas zhes zer ba la/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smrabs smra ba ma yin no// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la
232a8(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'di sang dus shis bsru ba skyed cing bya babyas pa'i dri gzob min zhes zer ba la/ de ni nga yi ni shes smra ba gang yi byeng / yang dag par sngangs smra ma med te/ sems grang la la zhig ngas byang chub bang cig byas pa'i dngos pa
232b1(dkon brtsegs): de yang chud za bar myi 'gyur ro// glang po che'i lag nga dang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa tshun cad pa der// nam yang sems la ldog cing 'gyur ba yang myed la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
232b2(dkon brtsegs): kha la mngon par zhen cing mos par gyur ba yang dag par rjes su myi dran yang / ngas chos de thos nas sems rtse gcig tu 'khor rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yongs su nyer ba la gzud bar bdun par gyur pa kho nar zad do// glang
232b3(dkon brtsegs): po tshwa'i lag sngon 'byung ba'i dus na mu stegs can gi drang srong du gyu rang pa'i tshe shes rab gsal zhing rnol mang du thos shing spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze
232b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu lnga brgya zhig khyim na gnas pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i nyes dmyigs mdza nga zhing rab tu byung ba'i phan yon mthong nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung ste/ lam sgom par gyur to// de dag thams cad nga'i thad du
232b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa dang / ngas chos bstan pas rang sangs rgyas kyi lam thob par gyur nas mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan zhing / sems la rang dbang thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang ldan par gyu ra ba/ rtag par rdzu 'phrul gi stobs kyis na
232b6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la mngon par 'phags mas/ grong drang grong khyer dang / grong rdal rag tu zhugs te/ bsod snyoms bslangs nas/ nga la rim 'gro byas so// nga de'i tshe 'di snyam du 'di ltar 'di dag ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes chen po dang ldan pas
232b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'di dag gi ma tshang bzung ba'i phyirigs so snyam du sems par gyur te// drang srong de dgangs rjes su bstan pa'i phyir/ de lta bu'i ces thos par gyur kyang ngas mthob par ma gyur bus nas de thob par bya 'ang mngan su
232b8(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed par gyur to// glang po che'i lag ngas nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed nas/ chos de mngon sum du byas pa'i tshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha zhig 'ongs te mngon du lung bster
233a1(dkon brtsegs): nas / nga la 'di skad du kye ye shes 'di la mngon par zhen par ma byed cig/ khyed ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngor bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can chang sred pa bag tu myed pa rnams yongs
233a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'gyur ro zhes bsgra'o/ blang ba ma'i pas dong sa de ska ngas sa / pa brnam pa thos nas / sems mchog tu dga' 'aza par gyur nas/ zla byed kyi lar du ngan par 'jug pa'i mi dga' bas sus
233a3(dkon brtsegs): zhub bar gyur te// glang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na/ lha rnams kyi 'go bar byed cing / rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyang thob par 'gyur la bdag nyid kyang bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
233a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub thob par rig par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid bla na myed pa'i byang chub tu sems rab tu bskyed nas/ gzhan dag kyang sems bskyed par bskul ba yin/ theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed pa dag
233a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ma/ 'phrog dog kyang myi byed la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag gcig pus thob par bya ba yin zhig ga zhan gyis thob par bya ba ma yin no snyam du myi sems pa yin/ sems can
233a6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar spyod pa dag la dus rjes su 'dems shing sems bzang pos pa dmas ngag smras nas/ de dag gi dge ba yongs su bzung bar byed pa yan/ bdag nyid rtag par rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis chos nas
233a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher gnyer zhing gzhan dag la bstan nas ser sna myed par gyu ra pa yin te/ glang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ lha rnams kyis kyang 'gro ba byed/ bdag
233a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bar rig par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' su lang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' brtan sas kyis/ 
233b1(dkon brtsegs): tra skyed theg la rab gnas shing // sems can dag kyang bskul byas nas// theg pa de la 'god par byed// byang chub sems dpa' spyang spyod tse// rtag par 'phrug dog khang 'gro myang // nan tan brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas// dgra
233b2(dkon brtsegs): ji sems ni 'phel bar 'gyur// sems can sdig spyod mthong gyur na// 'du shes rjes su 'dems par byed// rtag par byams dang snying rjer ldan// khong 'khro dag ni myed pa yi// rtag par nam tan chos gnyer nas// sems cam/ 
233b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la stsal bar byed// ci ltar char ni rlar byed lhor// chos kyis thams cad tshim par byed// chos bzhi 'di dag gang spyod pa// khyod ni sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur bas// the tsom sems ni ma skyed ces// lha rnams kyis ni 'gro
233b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas// nan tan brtson 'grus skyed par byed// dngos po 'di ni des dben pos// bdag nis ngas rgyas nges 'grub sems// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// brtsom
233b5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang ni smon lam dang // dran pa dag ni shes rab dag/ bdag nyid rgya tshor 'phel bar 'gyur// gal te de ltar bzhin gshegs pa rnam 'jig rten du ni 'byung 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// 'di 'dra'i
233b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang zag chen po bkur 'gyur zhing // rgyal po blon po 'bangs rnams kyang // thams cad sems ni rab dga' zhing // lam ldan yin par rig par gyur // bstan chos gtsug lag tshig dang don/ 
233b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru tshig bcad rtsis dang grangs// de dag thams cad logs rtogs nas/ sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// dbang rdo zhing shes rab ldan// bya ba stobs la myi bri ltos par// thabs dang ldan pa 'ba' shig gis// thams cad
233b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'grub par nus// dgra rnams rab tu gdul ba yang // lus kyi zho sha myi ltos par// shes rab stobs ni 'ba' shig gis// rang gi sems ni gdul bar byed// sems can rab tu rtse ba'i phyir// 'jig rten du ni skyes
234a1(dkon brtsegs): ka pas na// rgyal po blon po 'bangs rnams kyang // ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang smra bas ma// de'i ya mtshan kun gyis rig// ci phyir de dag rig ce na// bdag sems shes zhes sems
234a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' de rtag tu// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong bas nas// der song chos ni rab tu zhugs nas// sems can rgya cher phan yang 'dogs// sangs rgyas zhus lan gsungs pa na// the tsom dag ni chang bar 'gyur// 
234a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni phan 'dogs pas// thams cad dga' ba thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu bstan nas// sangs rgyas rgyur bar lus bstan nas// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// sems ni dga' ba thob par 'gyur// 
234a4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'phangs pa'i rdor rnams dang // phyi nang kun la chags myed pas// de phyir dga' chen po yis// bdag nyid sangs rgyas 'grub par shes/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsngags pa'i// bzod pa gya nom thob pas na// de phyir
234a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba chen po yis// chos rnams kun la myi gnas shing // chos rten myi rung rig pa nas// de 'dra'i shes rab thob 'gyur nas// lus ni mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur// de'i sems ni nang myi gams te// 
234a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes thams cad 'das pas ma// de phyir bzod pa bu myed thob// yun rnying byams dang snying rje yis// sems can kun la sems pas na// phyir bsod nams de'i dbang // sangs rgyas tshad myed mthong bar 'gyur/ 
234a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus ni thams cad kun// sangs rgyas sku dang khyad par myed// de dri'i bzod pas na// chos kyi bdag nyid 'phel bar byed// byang chub tu sems bskyed la// su zhig rje su myi byed pa// rab rten dam chos gang gnas pa'i// de 'dri'i yon
234a8(dkon brtsegs): tan thob par 'gyur// de phyir lam ni gnyer ba dag/ chos kyi bdag gi khe btsal nas// byang chub la ni phan gdags bya// rgal ba'i lan btab pa'i le'u ste/ bam bdun pa'o// 
234b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs la shin tu brtan par gnas
234b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa// gang po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ nga ni yun ring po nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i chos la shin tu brtan par gnas
234b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gnas par stand pa'i phyir// tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal to// chos gnyer chos ni gang thob pa// de ni sangs rgyas lam bzhi yin// rtag tu chos la gang bcwo
234b4(dkon brtsegs): chos ma yin pa stong par 'gyur// rtag tu yang dag lam bstan pa// log pa'i lam ni spong bar byed// sangs rgyas chos la rtag bsten pa// de ni lam la bsten par gyur // des na myi khom rnam spangs nas// khom
234b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan dag ni thob par 'gyur// khom ldan gnas ni thob gyu rang nas// brjo/ na 'grus brtsams pa chud myi za// gnas gnyis su ni mchog tu brtson// kha dog gzugs ni mchog tu 'gyur// g.yog 'khor dag ni
234b6(dkon brtsegs): thun tshogs shing // thams cad kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// brtan pa'i sems kyis rtag tu ni// tshul khrims bzod pa'i phyogs la gnas// brtson 'grus phyogs la rab gnas shing // bsam gtan shes rab 'phel bar byed/ 
234b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi// gtso mchog dag ni byed par 'gyur// yon tan kun mchog 'gyur bas// don rig 'jigs pa ci yang myed// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
234b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i chos gya nom pa dag la su zhig slob par myi bgyid// de bdag cag ni sngon dang po nas le lo can du gyur pas// sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa la re ba ma mchis shing / bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa 'di lta bu
235a1(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ba mngon par yid ches pa ma mchis pas ni// 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas bdag nyid nges par 'byung bar gyur pa lagaso snyam sems lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng sman
235a2(dkon brtsegs): chad byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzeng stod cing spro ba bskyed nas// sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod par bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dka' ba lags pas// 
235a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gi ched du rtag pa de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po sha stag mdzad de// de lta bu'i dngos po de ni dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
235a4(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mchis na/ sems can gzhan la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bas so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu shin tu dka'i/ dngos po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa 'ba' shig gis sems can
235a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la snying brtse ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po de lta bu tshad/ ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dang ldan pas/ 
235a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag de lta bu'i shin tu dngos po chen po spyad de/ bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo
235a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor te/ sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams yongs su zla bar bgyod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ gang po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ci skad smras pa de bzhin du
235a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bde ba yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/ sems can thams
235b1(dkon brtsegs): cangs byams pa dang / snying rje chen po ldan pa yin pas/ sems can thams cad kyi tshod dun byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang / dka' ba'i dngos po chen po shin du zab pa/ shin tu la
235b2(dkon brtsegs): khag tshad myed dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa dang ldan par gyur pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das de skad bka' stsalang pa / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang myi dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / wA
235b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin du bcas pas/ thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' zhing yid ches pas mngon par stong ngo do// gang po'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po
235b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las gang po'i le'u ste 'dus pa bcu bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// @##// rgya gar skad du// ar+ya ra sta ba la ba ri bring tsha na ma mahA
235b5(dkon brtsegs): ya na su tra// / bod skad du// // 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba// / theg pa chen po'i mdor// 
235b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong
235b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid rgya lnga bcu'i/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong thams cad kyang / spobs pa mtha' yas thob pa/ myi 'jigs pa thogs pa myed pa thob/ bzod pa thob pa/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ 
235b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin du nye bar gyur pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas thob pa/ myi 'jigs pa thogs pa myed pa thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gi stongs
236a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin nas/ yon tan gi tshogs thams cad zad myi shes pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun tu myig dang / kun
236a2(dkon brtsegs): tu lha dang / kun tu 'od gzer dang / kun tu 'od dang / blo gros mchog dang / blo gros 'phel dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros rgya chen dang / blo gros myi bzad pa dang / sa 'dzin dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / rgyal
236a3(dkon brtsegs): kha'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal las stsogs pa/ sems dpe' myed drug bcu dang / bzang skyong lngas
236a4(dkon brtsegs): stsogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / myi mched gi tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzangs dang / lha'i bu blo gros legs gnas dang / lha'i dbang
236a5(dkon brtsegs): po thams dang / klu'i dbang po dang / myi 'am tsa'i dbang po dang / dri za'i dab nga po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha mo yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'khor brgya stong du ma yod pa thams cad
236a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ lhun po ltar 'khor gi dkyil 'khor thams cad las ni
236a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'phags/ nyi ma ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni snang / zla ba ltar 'kho ba thams cad la snang ba ni mdzad// tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar ni bzhugs/ brgya bya ni ltar ni sku ni bsnyen par dka'/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar
236a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che bdun dang ni ldan/ seng ge ltar chos thams cad dang bdag myed pa dang / stong par ni stobs/ mye'i phung po chen po ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i sku dang ni ldan/ lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu
236b1(dkon brtsegs): ma thas cad cidam pa'o ba ro du dubyod pa 'khod gyi dang na 'thugs pa / rangs pa'i sa dngas bsgrags pa/ sems can thams ca go par byed dang ldan pa'i dngas kyis chom ston te/ tshangs par rung ba dang / 
236b2(dkon brtsegs): khrag sang dge ba dang / bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ den bzong po// tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byung ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas byang chub sems
236b3(dkon brtsegs): rang sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ nyim stong las lhag pa'i da kyis 'khor go dkyil rje
236b4(dkon brtsegs): mas cad cis du rlag par mngadangs/ shin tu bzhugs pas po ngaste/ dga' ba dang / mgro ba dang / dang pas 'dun pa'i sems kyis/ stan las yangs nas thal mo sna ste/ bcom ldan das
236b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag gis mngon par spyod de// lha tshogs lha ma yin dang myi 'am ci// klu dang nyan thos dag dang sangs rgyas sras// 'gro ba 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yengs kyis/ 
236b6(dkon brtsegs): zil mnan khyed ni gser gi ri ltar gsal// rgya mtshor dbus na gnas kyang rnam mdzes pos// lhun po lnga tshogs gi gnas lta bur// thugs rje rgya mtsho'i dbus na de bzhugs te// 'od gzer stong phrag brgya dag 'gyed par mdzad
236b7(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de// mtshangs pa'i mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes ltar// bsam gtan rnam par ting nge 'dzin bzhugs te// 'od gzer stong phrag ses can dam pa 'gro ba kun la gsal// brgya byin
237a1(dkon brtsegs): sum bcu rtsa gsum lnga nang du// gnas nas gzi brjid yangs pas mdzes pa ltar// mtshan gyis spros pa ye shes yon tan dang // thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba kun la gsal// gling bzhi myo'i bdag po sdang
237a2(dkon brtsegs): lAn bka/ 'jig rten 'di la ston pa mdzes pa ltar// 'phags pa'i lam du 'dzud pa mdzad cing // thugs rje'i dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes// mkha' la nyi ma lam me thal le ba// nor bu mye 'od mog mog
237a3(dkon brtsegs): byed 'di ltar// nyi ma stong pas khyad par 'phags pa 'od // sangs rgyas nyi ma 'gro ba 'di ni gsal// dri myed zla ba nam gi gung gsal ltar// shi nad tu rnam dag 'gro ba kun la gsal// rgyal ba'i zhal zla ba nya ba 'dra// kun 'od
237a4(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// ji ltar ri be zom le me 'bar bya/ ma mtshan mo myi nyal tsam na kun snang ltar// gti mug mun pa ma lus bcom nas ni// drang srong chen po'i ye shes 'od kyang gsal// seng ge ri
237a5(dkon brtsegs): sul brtan pa'i sgra sgrogs cing // sa la ri dgas tshogs rnams skrag bgyid ltar// myi dbang stong rtag myed gsung sgrog cing // pa rol mu stegs can rnams skrag par mdzad// nor bu'i rgyal po'i bzang
237a6(dkon brtsegs): po gzi brjod 'bar// nor bu thams cad zil mnan lam me ltar// rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gi mdog 'dri ba// 'gro kun zil gyis mnan nas lham mer bzhugs// 'jig rten gang na'ang khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ 
237a7(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i sems can mchis par ga la 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thabs rnams dang // yon tan kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// myi'i dpa' bo 'gro la lam me ba// mgon po yon dan rgya mtsho
237a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mthong // gus pa skyes shing dga' ba rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi mthu la bdag gis gdugs// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten sgrom// grags pa dam pa rgya chen thugs mnga' ba// bdag
237b1(dkon brtsegs): gis bstod de bsod nams 'dir thob des// 'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad
237b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas// thal mo sbyar te/ myig gnyis myi 'dzum par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni lta// chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par de spyongs// zab dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / mthong
237b3(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba dang / khong du chud bar dka' ba dang / brtag myo nus pa/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / 'phrul ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsom gyis myi khyab la ni rjes su rnam par dpyod / 
237b4(dkon brtsegs): ra bya'i gshegs pa'i ye shes/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni rjes rnam par sems/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul myi mnyam pa dang mnyam po la ni yang dag par lta// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul
237b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi spyod yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa la ni 'jug// sangs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dbyings gcig gi tshul gi ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni rtog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
237b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas myed pa/ nam mkha'i spyod yul du ni yang dag par lta/ chos thams cad yang dag par pa'i mtho'/ mtha' ma yin pa'ir nga bzhin la 'jug pa la ni mos/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa
237b7(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa myed pa la ni mngon por 'dod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug la ni 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjesu song ba dang / 
237b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan phyi ma'i mtha'i bskul ba'i mur yang thug pa myed pa'i ni rjes su dran par byed/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam pa
238a1(dkon brtsegs): cashadapyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po cang myi smra bar 'dug par gyur to// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod du dbyar zla ba gsum gnas
238a2(dkon brtsegs): par dam bcas te/ de la zla ba gsum 'das nas/ chos gos byas te/ chos gos zin nas/ de lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gser bu las dang po rab tu byung nas ring por ma/ 
238a3(dkon brtsegs): lon pa dag dang / lhan gcig tu/ mthar da kyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po gsal ba dang / bya rgod gi phung po'i rig la ba der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong / bcom ldan 'das
238a4(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / tshe dang ldan
238a5(dkon brtsegs): kha yul 'khor skyong gis thal mo sbyar te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis 8/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// myi mchog 'od mdzadad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag
238a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam lo// rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// srid sum mdzu rabyon thub la phyag 'tshal lo// shing rnams bye ba rab 'byam na tu yang / 'dren pa dag ni khyed kyis bsngags pa gsungs// rgyal ba'i
238a7(dkon brtsegs): sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing // yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mchod du mchi// byang chub dam pas mchog ni tshil ba na// khyod kyi thugs ni skyo ba myi mnga' bar// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su// sems can rnams kyi
238a8(dkon brtsegs): ched du spyod pa spyad// 'dren pa khyod kyis sprin dang tshul khrims spyad// bzod dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan bslabs// shes rab thabs dang dbang gi pha rol gshegs// des nas rnam 'dren che la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul
238b1(dkon brtsegs): rkang dang mngon shes mchog la mkhas// dbang po stobs dang rnam par ba rang ba bslabs// sems can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chung rtogs// mnyam myed ye shes mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen/ 
238b2(dkon brtsegs): spyong ba gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang // tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur ba// de ni bcom ldan myi'i mchog gis mkhyen// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong // gang gis sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang / 
238b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bde 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las// 'gro bas legs pa bgyis dang nongs bgyis mkhyen// 'gro ba phan mdzad gang dag 'das rnams dang // da ltar lha dang myi yis mchod rnams dang // gang dag ma byon yon
238b4(dkon brtsegs): tan mchog mthar phyin// bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen// dga' ba zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang // byang chub sem sa dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos dang // drang srong chen po rnams sku tshe'i tshad// 
238b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par mkhyen// mya ngan 'das chos gnas ni 'dra dang / rgyal ba'i ring srel mchod pa ci 'dra dang // der ni chos mdzod 'dzi na pa ci 'dra ba// de dag ma lus myi'i dam pas mkhyend // dus gsu
238b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams su rtag par stobs bcu'i// ye shes mkhyend pa sgrib pa myi mnga' 'jug/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags myi mnga'// phyag 'tshal rgyal ba ye shes mtsho khyod la// khyod dang mtshungs pa mnyam ma mchis ga la lhag/ 
238b7(dkon brtsegs): skar ma rnams kyis nam mkha' smras pa ltar// mtshan rnams kyis kyang sku ni rab spras pa// myi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du mchi// lhar bcas 'gro ba zil du brlag
238b8(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid// tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min lha'i rnams// khyod spun sngar de dag mdzes ma lags// khyod ni gser gi ri ltar dra myi mnga'// dbu sAm 'jam zhing g.yas su 'khyil par gnas// lhun po rgyal po lta bur spyi gtsug
239a1(dkon brtsegs): gag 'phags// bsod nams rgya chen byung ba lam mer bzhugs// 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing // khyod ni sbyin pa'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes// 'gro ba thugs rjes dgongs pas gang gzigs pa
239a2(dkon brtsegs): spyan ni ud pa la 'dra zhing yid du mchi// zla nya dri myed ma la la ji ltar bar// rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal ni lam me ste// lta ba'i skye bi ngoms par myi 'gyur ba// zhal bzangs myi'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// ngang pa rma bya ri dgas
239a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gi stabs// glang po grags pa dal gyis mchi stabs kyis// sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa// stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan phyag 'tshal lo// phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum la mdzes// sen mo zang
239a4(dkon brtsegs): mdog rag cing dra bas spras// bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lte ngar reg cing slebs// sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo 'dra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bas// sa steng ri mo mdzad cing rib tu gshegs// zham
239a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od gzer gyis ni yongs spyon pa'i// myi rnams gum nas lha'i 'jig rten mtsho// chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po// chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thabs mnga' ba// chos kyi ston pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa// 'dron pa chos
239a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes la phyag 'tshal lo// byamos pa'i go cha dran pa'i ral gri mchog/ tshul khrims gzhu dag shes rab thabs kyi mda'// de yis skye mche srid sred 'brel bgyid pa// nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par 'gyur// rgal nas
239a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol// grol nas 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'grel// ba gshegs gang gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi' ba// bde ba rims nas ma mchis kham yang ston// gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing / 
239a8(dkon brtsegs): 'bral ba'i sdug snga la 'byung bar myi 'gyur ba// gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de// thugs rje brnyes nas khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// chos kun dbang gi pha rolang gshegs pa'i rgyal// thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog
239b1(dkon brtsegs): sang bas// bangag gir 'dzin bsang rnams gang bsags des/ 'gro ba byang chub ma bar sa sa rgyas gag/ de nas che dang ldan pa sum 'khor myong gis/ bcom thamangs latshigs su bsang pa'adag gisam
239b2(dkon brtsegs): bstod nas/ thal mo sbyar te stan las langs nas// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gsar te// pus mo g.yas pa'i lnga palnga btsugs nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de// bcom ldan 'das
239b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
239b4(dkon brtsegs): la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu la gso// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bkar su yang to// yul 'khor skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngos dris
239b5(dkon brtsegs): ba de dang de nyid lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang ngo do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
239b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyab par thob par 'gyur// gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes pa 'thob ka myur ba'i shes rab 'thob// spobs pa rnam par nges
239b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'thob/ snang ba 'thob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yid gnyis spong ba dang / som nyi spong ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa 'thob// 
239b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang / ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / ldem po ngag yang dag pa dang / sems can gi khams la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa 'thob pa dang / zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang / 
240a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// byang chub sems
240a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyod pa rab nges pa// yang dag par nyid du ji ltar de 'byung dang // ye shes rgya mtsho'i bka' mching rnam nges// myi mchog rgyal bas bdag la bshad du gsol// shin tu sbyangs pa gser gi gzugs lta bu/ 
240a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dam pa bsod nams mchog bsags pa// khyod ni skyabs bsang gnas dang dpung gnyen lags// byang chub spyod mchog dri myed deng bdag gsungs// gzungs dang bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba yi// ye
240a4(dkon brtsegs): shes myi zad ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur// gang gis skye bo'i ngogs pa gcod 'gyur ba// shes rab rgya mtsho ni ltar rnam par dag/ 'khor bar bskul ba bye ba mang por dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal nyen la
240a5(dkon brtsegs): lha bgyid kyang // skyo ba'i blo na nim yang myi skyed cing // de dag don dge ston par 'gyur ba dang // dga' ba'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang // tshe mchog dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing dang // ses
240a6(dkon brtsegs): tsan ched kyi bka' mching bla na myed dang // byang chub spyod pa'i dri myid bshad du gsolang // bdud du gsol// bdud 'jom mdzad pa lta ngan sbyong ba bo// sred pa skems pa rnam grol reg mdzad pa// chos kyi tshul yang bskyed pa
240a7(dkon brtsegs): myi 'gyur bar// sems can rin chen spyod mchog bstan du bsol// gzugs dang long srung spobs pa phun sum tshogs// snum pa'i gsung gis 'khor rnams tshim mdzad pa// bde gshegs sprin ltar 'gro batshom
240a8(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// sangs rgyas spyod yul lagaso bstan tu gsol// ka la bying ka'i sgra snyan gsung byin pa// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blo ngan rab 'jig pa// chos 'tshal 'gyur ba'i 'khor rnams lhags lags kyis/ 
240b1(dkon brtsegs): gtso bo bdud rtsi ro yis tshim par mdzod// byang chub dam pa'i mchog la 'dun pa mchis// chos la 'dun pa zlog pa myi rigs te// 'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags// rin chen dam pa bsgrags pa'i dus
240b2(dkon brtsegs): lo bab// thub pa bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis// bdag gi bsan pa rgyal bas rab tu mkhyend// rgyal bcwo bri ma lags du gnyer// spyod pa dam pa legs par bshad du gsol// de skad ces gselang ba dang // bcom
240b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces gsal sulang to// 'khor skyong khyod legs so legs so// yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang // yul 'khor skyong khyod skye
240b4(dkon brtsegs): bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa la
240b5(dkon brtsegs): don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni/ legs so// yul 'khor skyong khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid zug shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ tshe dang
240b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis// bcom ldan 'das kyis lhor nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// 
240b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob po// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ji skad smras pa de
240b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin byed pa ste// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen chen po chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan ma/ yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo// de la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// bsam pa
241a1(dkon brtsegs): cagathag pas rtag tu mngon par brtson pa// byang chub lam las myi ldog mid ldam la/ g.yo myed pa ba myed cing sgra myed pa// me shes mtha' mas ldan la de dag yod/ skye dang na dang rga dang 'chis gzing ba/ sas
241a2(dkon brtsegs): can mgon myed sdug bsngal mthong nas ni// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral pa'i phyir// de dag chos kyi gru ni yang dge sbyor// nges pa sems can kun la sems mnyam po// bu cig po bzhin 'gro ba rnams la swA/ 
241a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag thams cad bdag gyis grel lo zhes// gang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// stong nyid rtag tu rtogs pa khong du chud// bdagra yong ma yin sems can yod ma yin// 'dus byas sgyu ma rmyi lam 'dra ba la// byis pa myi
241a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas 'di na rnam par rmongs// mkhas pa de dag ci skad tshig smras pa// de la nan tan byed cing kun tu gnas// dul zhing zhi la rtag tuskyon rnams spangs// rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dgal
241a5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong blo 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbus sa 'byin pa thob pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzungs thob pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa thob pa/ 
241a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yang dag par spyod pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o// de la 'di ni ches nyid yin te// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// 
241a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog 'dzim 'gyur ba// gzungs rnams grangs pa chen po de dag gis ni rtag tu thob// nam yang chung zar myi 'gyur phyir zhing blo glos rab tu 'phel// de dag ye shes chags
241a8(dkon brtsegs): pa skyed cing chos kun pa ba phyir// byang chub yan lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed// de dag 'dren pa rnams ni gang nas bzung ba'i lam mchog ston// de dag sdig pa'i grogs po dag la sten pa ma yin ce/ 
241b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig byed bdag nyid me ltar de dag ring du rnam par spong // dbang po stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo'i chos thos nas// de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun myi 'byung // de dag tshul khrims skyon myed dul zhing zhi
241b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yid dang ldan// sangs rgyas tshul khrims bla na myed la sems can rnams kyang sbyor// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te// bzhi gang zhe na/ 
241b3(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong sangs rgyas mthong ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang // yul 'khor skyong bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na
241b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dmyigs su myed pa'i chos la bzod pa// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi
241b5(dkon brtsegs): po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dag dbar byed pa'i chos so// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gzi brjid gyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun
241b6(dkon brtsegs): nas snang mdzad pa'o// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi mchog tshe rabs kun tu de dag mthong // byang chub dam pa mchog tshol chen sems can grol ba'i phyir// dga' zhing gus par gnas nas de ltar myi
241b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rgyal po mchod// 'dren pa'i rnams las zhi brje su 'thun pa'i chos kyang nyan// thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor// dmyigs myed chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems can myed pa dang / 
241b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di la bdag myed par ni chos la som myi de myi skye// de ni bdog pa thams cad yongs gtong rtag tu kun 'dzin myed// spong ba nye bar 'ongs pa mthong na sems ni rab tu dga'o// grong dang yul 'khor sa dang / srog dang bu dang rlung
242a1(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / thams cad gtong zhing de'i sems ni gang du'ang g.yo ba myed// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi la lta bar myi byaste// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim gri
242a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas la lta bar myi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la blta bar myi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar myi bya ba dang // 
242a3(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas lus dang srog la lta bar myi byi ba ste// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta por myi bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// skyom
242a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzings po mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor myi lta// yon tan ldan pa nges pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul// / de dag gang du'ang bud myed rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dres myi
242a5(dkon brtsegs): byed// bse ltar gcig pu gnas shing bsam pa dri myed dag la dri mi bral// de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis dga' bar myi 'gyur ma thob yid bzhugs myed// 'dod pa chung ste ngan ngon tsom la dga' zhing sgyu dang
242a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos spangs// sems can don phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin// yul dang de bzhin srog la myi lta sdug pa'i/ 
242a7(dkon brtsegs): rtswa lag rnams spangs ste// bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor// lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba myed// thams cad mkhyen nyid re ba phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtam
242a8(dkon brtsegs): 'drir brtsom// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba myed par byed pa'i chos te// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshul khrims skyon myed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba myed pa
242b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i chos dang // yul 'khor skyong 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang 'thun par byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba myed par byed pa'i chos dang // yul 'khor skyong mang du thos pa thob par byed pa// byang chub sems
242b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams gdung ba myed par byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba'i chos so// 'di la 'di ni chos yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa
242b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la 'dod byed cing // tshul khrims dri myed nor bu rin po chen dra ba srung // de dag nga ni khrims ldan legs sde ma yin myi sems/ tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor// de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed
242b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes myed// gzugs kun rtsa dang shing rtsig pa 'dra bar mthong // 'di la skyes pa bud myed bdag gir myed par mthong // 'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo myed tshul 'chos myed// bag yod
242b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag bsam pa thag pas rab tu sbyor// thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed// bod bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen/ don du gnyer// skye rga 'chi bas btso bzhin nad gzir ba// 'gro ba
