242b6(dkon brtsegs): mgon myed srid pa'i btson ra 'dir bltas nas// zhi ba dam pa mchog gis chos kyi gru sbyor te// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu las skye bo sgrol bar byed// 'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten khyams pas skyabs mgon
242b7(dkon brtsegs): dang // dpung nyen byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod myin gyis// bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgrol zhes// de phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam btab// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas
242b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag nig cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bde 'gro 'thob ste/ de yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / phrang ba dang / bla ma la bsri bu byed de/ de yang zang zing byed pa'i sems kyis bsten pa dang / 
243a1(dkon brtsegs): bas mapa'i gnas lam la mngong bar dga' ste/ de yang rnyed pa dang kur sti la gyi lta dang / spongs pas/ de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' ban po dag ni/ 
243a2(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// brtan pa gnas dang su la rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag rtag tu 'khor mor rnyed pa don gnyer myin// chags myed blo can rtag tu
243a3(dkon brtsegs): spobs dang ldan pa yin// zab mo chos la mkhas shing spros pa rnams dang bral// rtag tu 'khor mor bla ma rnams la sri zhu byed// de dag ci skad smras pa de bzhin de dag sbyor// bde gshegs dpag tu myed pa mang po mnyes par byed
243a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i ye shes ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed// grags pa chen po rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur// lha myi rnams kyi nang na spyi bar byin pa da yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tu sems can 'dzud// 
243a5(dkon brtsegs): dge pa bcu po dag la'ang yang dag sbyang bar byed// sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dgar 'gyur te// de dag ring por myi thogs da da bar 'gyur// de dag byang chub rtul bral dam pa sangs rgyas ras// 
243a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' mas rnams las 'grel// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag nani bying chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang ba'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan ldang kyis
243a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshi/ tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag bkara' stsayang to// blan myed pa'i byang chub 'dod pa ma// tha ba dri ma myed cing 'khro sems myed// de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed pa yin// g.yo myed tshul 'chos myed cing spro sems myed// khyim
243a8(dkon brtsegs): gi blo gos yang mya ngan rtsa/ skye bo ngan grogs tshul bzhin ring bar 'gyur ba// spangs te de la myi ltar rab tu byung nas// thar pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed// dgon pa bas mtha'i rnam pa ster pa na// shes khe 'thob pa kun sa/ 
243b1(dkon brtsegs): myi brten zhing // lus dang srog la 'ang lta bar myi byed la// seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal// byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba na// ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed cing // rtag tu bya ltar stsogs pa spangs
243b2(dkon brtsegs): nas ni ka 'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no// dper na bse ltar gcig pu gnas byed cing ka// seng ge lta bur 'jigs pa yod ma yin// ri dgas lta bur sar 'jigs yod myin rton// de ni mchod pas 'khengs par 'gyur ba myed// 
243b3(dkon brtsegs): gagayang sar ltung ba'i 'gro ba 'di ltas nas// rab tu thar bar bya phyer 'bad par byed// gal te bdag yod dge ba'i chos spyod ma// bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di'i dpung nyen du 'gyur// myi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod pa na// 'dzum pa'i bzhin
243b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis rab snyan tshig smra zhing // sdug dang myi stug rtag tu rnyog sems myed// rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa myed par gnas// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa la smos// 'dus byas kun la sgyu ma lta bur rtog yangs pa'i blo can zhidang dul la
243b5(dkon brtsegs): dga'// de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi ro yis mgu// ci nas byang chub lam ni sgrub byed ci/ dra // de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong // gzugs dang spo sa pa tshol bar byed pa na// yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgyad
243b6(dkon brtsegs): dag bzod// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di ltas nas// gang zhig don du gnyer ba de dgar 'gyur// gang zhig byang chub nga lam mos pa/ blo chung de ni nyes pargya yang skyed// / yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag/ 
243b7(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i g.yangs s+ho// bzhi gang zhe na// yul 'khor skyong ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong byas pa myi gzo zhing g.yo la lta snyam pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yangs
243b8(dkon brtsegs): dang // yul 'khor skyong rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang // yul 'khor skyong tshul 'chos pa dang // kha gsag gis rnyed pa dang // bkur sti sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ 
244a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yang ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsalang ngo // 'phags pa bla ma rnams dpapa
244a2(dkon brtsegs): mngag de dag rtag tu gus pas myed pa yi lade dag byas pa skye 'i zegayon can te// rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams spyod cing tshangs// rnyed ba rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste// de dag tshu 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyong dag ma// btsag
244a3(dkon brtsegs): drug khrims dul grags ji las kyang / 'din bdag dang mtshungs pa myed ces smra// de dag par nun sdang bar sems pa ste// glags tshol ba la rtag tu bcom pa yin// de dag zhing gi las dang tshong la dgang// de dag dge sbyong
244a4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan shin tu ring // phyi ma'i dus nas 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i// dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab ring dang // de dang 'chang dru ba dang 'thab pa dang // 'phrag dog dbang kyis chos 'ang nub par byed// byang chub lam las rtag rdo rje
244a5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu ring // 'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin tu ring // 'phags lam gya nom rnam par spongs nas nis// de dag 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyam da par 'gyur// / yun 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni// byang chub sems
244a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dmas kyi byang chub la the babyed pa chos te pa'i ga she na/ sus 'khor skyeng sde'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byung chul brtsegs byed du chos dang / yul 'khor stong pa dang 'byang
244a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' kyi byang chub la bstegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor myong nga rgya byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor spyod pa meng gi mchod pa la ma dog dang ser sna'i sings dang spangs/ 
244a8(dkon brtsegs): bya rgu sem pa ba nams kyi byang rlob la bgags byang ba'i tshas to/ yul labor myo dran pa de dag phyi chu ba sems dpa dmas kyi bying chubal brtsegs byed tshomapa rko/ nas bcom ldam das kyis ri'i tshitshigasu ma gyi
244b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bka' stsa lang to// ma dang le lo rtag tu mongs pa'i sems/ de dag mngon pa'i nga can rtag tu 'khor// bzod ldan rtag brtson dge slong mthong nas ni/ gtsug lag khang nas 'gro tshe dbyug pas rngog/ pha rol mchod phyir 'dir/ 
244b2(dkon brtsegs): ni phra dog skye// de dag sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin// grags lnga byed cing 'khrul pa tshol ba tsam su la 'khrul yod gang gleng bya snyam// de dag nga'i bstan pa 'di las ring // de dag yon tan sdung zhing ngas song gzhol// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan
244b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor nas ni// nga song 'id tu myi bzong 'bar bar 'gro// de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spang pa dang / chas kyin ldan 'gro ba sdig 'di thos nas// rtag tu 'char mas byang chub las la sbyor// ngan 'grong skyes zhing gdung bar gyur
244b4(dkon brtsegs): ta re// sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che// bsal pa skye mang po rgya lam byung bar gyur// da ltar nga 'dam pa rnyed pa la// gas te/ thar 'dod bag myed spang gyis// yul 'khor skyong gang zag pan/ 
244b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par myi bya ba ste// gang byazhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gau gang zag bsten par mya bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems
244b6(dkon brtsegs): dpas dmyigs par lta ba can gi gang zag bsten par myi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag bsten par myi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas zang zing la rkam pa'i/ 
244b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zag bsten par mi byab ste/ yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po de dag na byang chub sems dpas bsten par myi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// // gang dag sdig pa'i bshes
244b8(dkon brtsegs): nyen rnams spong zhing // gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byed pa// de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel// deper na mkha' la zla ba yar ngo bzhin// / dmyigs par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang // bdag dang srog la gso bar zhen
245a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag/ de dag dug phyis bzhin tu rtag tu spangs// gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don myi gnyer// gang dag myi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos// 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi 'thun spang ba// de dag dper na ngan skyugs
245a2(dkon brtsegs): rdza ba bzhin spang // gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags// rtag tu khyim la 'dres par byed brtson pa// de dag rtag rnams dang 'dris par myi bya ste// de dag mye'i 'obs bzhir spa
245a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya// gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang / 'khor lo das pa bu skyed bskong ba dang / di ltar sems can dan sangs byed 'dod pa// des ni sdig pa'i bzhis gnyen spyang bar bya// gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dzod/ 
245a4(dkon brtsegs): ngo yis neng dang sdug dang mya sdug dang // grags dang 'chang 'dru 'drag dogangs spangs te/ sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya// / yul 'khor skyong bzhi pa 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
245a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sdug bsngal rnam par spyod pa'i chos te// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul lar skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa byang chub ses dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang // yul 'khor skyo/ 
245a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phra dog dang // ser sna dang ljon pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par spyod pa'i chos dang // yul 'khor sbyang ma mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul loni
245a7(dkon brtsegs): skyong yongs su ma dag pa shes pa dang / bzod pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngol rnam par smin pa'i chos te// yul 'khor skyong po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnas
245a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi sdug bsngal rnam par sbyin pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag bka' su lang ngo do// / gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba/ de la
245b1(dkon brtsegs): myi shes pas ni brnyes byed na// des na de ni sdug bsngal mthar yas rnyes// / yang bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshol// shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod// / gang zhig rtag tu nga rgyal 'khengs gyur la// bla ma 'phags// 
245b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye bo myi 'dud cing // sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod myin la// chos dang tshogs la de ni smos pa myed// bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de myi mos// sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa// de ni myi nang 'di nas shi
245b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phos nas// las kyi dbang gyis myi mkhas rnams par rmongs// dmyal ba 'am 'on te dud 'gro rnams sam/ yi dgas 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed// // gang zhig 'jig rten sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing // myi'i dpal
245b4(dkon brtsegs): bo sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa// de yis den song lam rnams rab spangs te// byang chub lam ni rtag tu bsten par bya// / bam po gnyis pa'o// / 
245b5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ kyi 'ching ba ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rolang la brnyes pa byad chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis
245b6(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa la sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dang / rnams kyi ching ba dang // kun 'dzin pa'i sems dada' ldan pa dang / ye shes dang bral ba dang / bag myed pa la sem pa byang chub ses
245b7(dkon brtsegs): raba' rnams kyi 'ching ba'i bar dang / phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o// 
245b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsalang to// rtag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyes byed cing // rtag tu 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan sgom// lta gyur da 'di dag gyis ni de bcings te/ glang po
246a1(dkon brtsegs): 6lus ring 'dam du song ba bzhin// khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang // gang zhig bag myed rtag tu kun 'dzin sems// ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa// myi rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams
246a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bcings// gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'di dag dang // skye rga 'ching las sogs las grol 'dod pa// brnyes par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni// byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur// sdug
246a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mtha' yas ma lus bzod bya ste// bde ba kun la chags po myed gyur nas// sdug dang myi sdug gnyen pa lus dang // brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur// pha rol phyinang drug sa dang yon tan da
246a4(dkon brtsegs): skabs dang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyar// yon tan kun dang rtagatu ldan 'gyur nas// rga ba'i dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyu ra// bskal pa bsam myi khyab par sngon spyod tshe// sems can
246a5(dkon brtsegs): par phyir byang chub mchog don du/ sbyin dang dul dang nges la rtag tu spyad // gnyen pa spangs nas byeng par gnas par 'gyur/ bas mtha' nags su rtag par dadaga' ste// byang chub cheng du bsam pa
246a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par sbyangs// brgyal na yang brtson 'grus nyams mgyur// skyes cher rnams kyi ye shes de 'dra'o// sbrid pa'i brtson rang 'gro ba lnga ma khyams pas// sems can 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni// sngon car 'di dzin ste/ 
246a7(dkon brtsegs): rje rgya cher nga skyed/ granga'i don du byang chub ngam pa bsgrubs// bos la pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol 'ang // rang gi nu ba bu mo rlung ma sdug/ 'phags pa'i srog da zhin du 'byor ngas dang / me tog 'bras bu chu byong / 
246a8(dkon brtsegs): nyams dga' bar// nags su grub par ni bzod dgar bu ra// sumachan rgyal pos lag brkang pa bcang // de rtse ni sdang ba'i ying ma gyur// nags dang sul na sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i// thub pas bla ma rgas pa gso ngar/ 
246b1(dkon brtsegs): khyi'i dbang pos sra ba'i mangs bstan kyang // yid ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur // legs par gsungs pa'i nang du g.yangs nas// lus la ma bltas rab tu 'chongs par gyur // nga ri byang chung / 
246b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi rgyu'i phyir// lus dang srog la ltas par ma gyurang to// stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir// lus btang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas// nam mkha' las ni lha'i tshogs rnams kyis// skyes chen brtsan
246b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtan pa legs shes sgrags// grang tshe sngon cad srid pa spyod pa na// sbyin la rab dga' bram ze khye'u gyur tshe// rin chemached du rgya mtsho bskams nas ni// nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas// rgyal po zla
246b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bu zhes bya gyur te// brjod pa grags shing nga ni spyod pa'i tshe// nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgya// gsang bar byas pa myur du thar bar byas// dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba'i myi mthong nas// nga yis 'phangs
246b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lus ni btang byas te// nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas// de tshe nga ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyur // / nga 'dir myi'i rgyan dpor gyur pa'i tshe// skyabs su 'ongs pa'i phrug nor mthong nas ni// 
246b6(dkon brtsegs): rang gi lus sha yang bcang byas te// rang lus ngas btang 'jigs byas 'phongs ma btang // rgyal po ral pa cam zhes sngaragyur no// sman pa mchog gi nga'i ched du ni// mtshungs myed sman nas/ 
246b7(dkon brtsegs): ma lus sbyar ba yang // srog btang ngas ni de dag gzhan la byin// 'gro ba'i don phyir sngon cang spyod pa na// rgyal bu mche ba bzang zhes byar gyur tshe/ chung ma ma dri khyod las mya 'phyo ba// bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma ltas btang
246b8(dkon brtsegs): ka/ gang che brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya gyur tshe// nga sngon lo ni stong du tshang bar yang // bya dka' brgya cu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas// nor dang dpal yang sngon cang ngas btang ngo // rgyal bu gzi brjid dri mar gyur pa'i tshe// nga yis rgya
247a1(dkon brtsegs): ring srel mchog rten bdun dang // mchog tu gus pas lus la mye btang ste// stobs bcu mngar ba rnams la mchod pa byas// / nga ni rgyal po zla 'od gyu rang pa'i che ta/ lci bzang myig can 'khros par gyur
247a2(dkon brtsegs): nas mi// de yis nga'i mgo bslangs pa na// de tshe nga yis mgo bcad de byin// nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes bya gyurang tshe// grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam spang sgo thams cad du yang rgya chen sman gyi rnams// de dag
247a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can don phyir ngas bzhag/ srid pa rnams na spyod pa gang gi tshe// sngon rgyal po dge par gyur pa na// bud myed gzugs bzang gser dang mu rig gyis// lus brgyan stong dag ngas ni btang ba byas// 
247a4(dkon brtsegs): gang cheng sngon myi'i rgyal po no// rin can gtsug pud gyur che me togra dang // spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa yi// cod par dpal ldan dam pa ngas btung ngo // nga sngon rgyal po mos ldan gyu rang du'i
247a5(dkon brtsegs): rmecheka/ shing bal 'dab pa 'jam pa lta bu dang // pad ma'i mdab mnyen lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i// lag pa rkang pa ngas bA da // ded dpon seng ge 'dzin du gyur pa ma// snying rje myed cing gyi
247a6(dkon brtsegs): bzang rab gdum pa// srin mo brgyad dag shin tu tshar btsang nas/ rgya shug gling du myi rnams bkod par gyur // gang tshe n+ya bzangs shes byar gyur // byis pa 'dod par lhan zhing yid rmongaso pa/ 
247a7(dkon brtsegs): srin mo dag la cung 'du shes pa// tshong pa lnga brgya de dag thar par byas// gang tshe bsod nams 'od gzer gyur pa na// lha'i bu mo lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa// bud myed bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su// rgyal ba'i
247a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la ni rab tu byung // sems can don phyir nga ni spyod pa na// dri myed dag pa'i gser gi mdog can gyi// rgyal por gang tshe nga ni gyur pa na// sor mo dra bas 'brel ba rgya chen btang // rgyal po ud pa la myig zhes/ 
247b1(dkon brtsegs): bya bar gyur pa'i tshe/ pad ma sran po babang po mdog 'dra'i myig/ yid du'os zhing snying du sdug gyur pa// 'gro ba'i don dung yis padang 'a byas// smar pa'i rgyal po sgra 'drar gyurang ba'i rtse// sdug dang bral sa
247b2(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa mthong nas ni// bung byed chu byas gzugs dang bro nyams pa// ngas ni snying rjes yongs su tha rang bar byas// sngon gi srid pa kun mthong gyu rang ba na// nad kyis btab pa nang pa'i myi mthong nas// nga yis rang
247b3(dkon brtsegs): gi khrig kyang byin gyur te// myi dngas ni nang dang bral bar byas// rgyal po me tog bzang zhes bya gyur tshe// nga'i lus las rus byung nas ni// nad kyis ring por gyur la rkang byin te// ngas ni nam yang sems can btang ngo // 
247b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po don drub ces bya sngon gyur tshe// rang gi mdzod rnams thams cad ngas btang zhing / ka'u phangs shing yid du 'ong ba'i srog btang ste// 'phongs par gyur pa'i myi ni tha rang bar byas// / rgyal po
247b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi rtog tu gyur pa'i tshe// byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// 'khor lo mtshan can pad ma lta bu'o// lag pa phrugs kyang ma lngas rab tu byin// rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur pa'i
247b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe// snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don phan 'dod de// skyes pa bud myed dag gas rgyas pa yi// gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang ba byas// rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur tshe// 'jam zhing mnyen la dri myed dka' ba'i brla
247b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis bcad nas ni// rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no// bud myed gzugs ldan zhes ni bya gyu rang tshe// bud myed bkres sgomanyam thag ngas mthong nas// gser ltar ser zhing shin tu bzhon
247b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yi// nu ma snying du sdug pa gnyi ga btang // rgyal po dpal grags zhes byar gyur pa na// shin tu nyams dga' ba'i rgyan mchog dang / rin chen du ma gos dang shing rta bzhon// btang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma btang // 
248a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal du byas pa bzo bar gyur pa'is// rgya mtsho las ni byas pa myi bab sngal// rin cen phyir ni de yis dmyig byung // 'on kyang ngal 'bros pa'i sems byed do// sroganags gi dang sran srid gyurang ba'i rje/ 
248a2(dkon brtsegs): thog srung dag ni 'chi bar gyur dogs nas// lus kyi dam pa ma lngas btang bar byas// de che ba'i sems ni gso ba myed// spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe bya grags gyu ra ba na// rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar bdag dga' ste// nga rmi
248a3(dkon brtsegs): rim thus la rab tu dgang // rgya ba ldan pa ma yin 'das pa byeng // sangs su 'angs pa'i don bya nga man ni/ rlung rdzo basbyang pa byas nas lus btud ste// gangs ba rtsi'as mad rnams bstan kyang ni// sme 'gyur/ 
248a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsod dang // tshul ba dang du gyur ched yis ni/ nga pamanan du ldam 'arnams te// shi tshu 'ang pos kyangangs ma dzes// de ma blang ba dag nyid b.rang bar gyur // bgrod do// 
248a5(dkon brtsegs): gangs can ri la dred dbang gyur// nga yis zhag bdun par du bsrungs pa'i myi// de yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang // da ni de che khong 'khro bas pa myed// kha ba kun 'da' 'dra ba'i glang por gyur/ 
248a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshel// dug dang bcas pa'i mnga' yis sman kyang ni// mche dam pa byin gi khros pa myed// dum bu glang du tshags tshal spyod yul ba// sreg pa'i phru gu byams la gnas 'gyur/ 
248a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe// mthong ba tsam gyis me ni zhi 'gyur nas// lha tshogs dag gi me tog rnams kyang gtor// ri dwags gyur tshe gang gi rlabs shugs kyis// khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas pa// de yis gsod pa nga gan khrid de 'ongs
248a8(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang de yang ni yid myi 'khros// rgyamatsho'i dbus su son te mgon byang // chong ba lnga brgyad dag ni/ bsgrub byas nas// bkres pa de dag rnams kyis gsang gyur to// rus sbal skyes gnas gyur kyang byangs dang
248b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan kang ni byang chub spyad pa spyod pa ni// sngon can chu na rgyu ba'i nyagyurang tshe// sems can pan phyir nga yis lus btang skye// srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur // srog chags nges par gang tsher gyur
248b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma// nad brgyas gzer ba'i 'gro ba'i mthong nas su// lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur byas te// sems can badre zhing nad kyang myed par byas// ri dgas rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe// mthu stobs ldan pa
248b3(dkon brtsegs): gyu rang ba'i tshe// mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rje ldan// mda'i yis bsnun kyang khros pa'i sems myed de// de tshe bsod la nga yis byams pa byas// dung dang ba mo lta bu rta rgyal du// nga sngan rgya mchongs su
248b4(dkon brtsegs): gyu rang pa'i tshe// srin ma'i nang du son pa'i tshong pa rnams// nga yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyang spyod tshe/ mdab chags kun lar ni nga gyur tshe// 'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs
248b5(dkon brtsegs): nas// bung myed dbang du nga ni song ma gyur// gel ba nags tshul ri/ byor gyu rad pa'i tshe// longs spyod ri bong tshigs gyur de la/ bstan// thub pa nags la gnas pa bkres 'phongs pa/ de'i tshe
248b6(dkon brtsegs): rungs ni gnas kyang btang // sdong po me tog 'bras rgyas me co'i tshe/ sdong po skams kyang ngas ni de mo btang // de tshe brgya byini byas ga zo mthong nas// sdong po de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas// nga ri spu'i rgyal
248b7(dkon brtsegs): khor gyur pa'i tshe// myi'i rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste// spu'i tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas// rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas bton to// nga sngon ne tsor gyur te pha ma'i phyir// sa lu blangs tshe myi yis bzung nas ni// 
248b8(dkon brtsegs): rje tse phyir nga'i sa su lon// me tag spying 'di ma rung sems sam// na tso ngas smras bzang po gas du gsol/ bdag ni chubs khyod kyis 'bras mya len// ba ma rga gron gnyis mi gso ba'i phyir// de la snying rje bdag kyis sa lu drangs// 
249a1(dkon brtsegs): dgang che thog mas bor 'debs pa'i tshe// gro ba kun la ga nas skyon mo nas// de sang tshig sA de ni bdag thos te// des na bdag ni su bar gzhar myi 'gyur// no legs so sa su ci gar byed// bsri 'u 'di ni myi'i ring
249a2(dkon brtsegs): radakor// nga myo sa na 'dir dung 'gro yin// legs sa khyed ni dug zhing yang dag sngams// byang chub rdul thal dam pa chol bar// sngon kyang myong pa las sogs pa rnams// spyod pa'i tshen dka' ba brgyal yang / 
249a3(dkon brtsegs): mi yid stobar gyu ba myed// nang gi dag gam 'od phyi mang rung // nga yis dngas po me btang gang yang byed// rdul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan thongs dang shes rabangs spang ngo // 
249a4(dkon brtsegs): dang bags pa de bzhing gang dang khrag/ de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas/ bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyo ba'i tshe// ngas ni de tshe lus ni skams par byas// gang la sbyar na rgyal bar 'gyur ba yi// sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal
249a5(dkon brtsegs): sasanam jug/ sbyangs pa de la ga tu cos te/ sngon stong nang nIrtag tu 'jug/ srung ba'i rming yim gang bsnyen pa/ tul zhugs rgya chen de 'du de dag dang / spyad pa 'di bas nasum
249a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams tshig cig la yang 'dun par myi 'gyur ro// 'di thos gyur/ nas de'i chen ni// bstan pa 'di nying la ni 'phya bar 'gyur// de dag zas dang 'khrig pa lhur len cing // rtag tu gnod nom lnga ltar g.yo
249a7(dkon brtsegs): ngar 'gyur/ gartag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos la snang // bstan pa sum par byed cing yon tan nyams// zhi ba'i chos 'di thos par gyu ra pa ma// 'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pi myin zhes mjed// nga yi spobs dpon thos/ 
249a8(dkon brtsegs): kha rgya mtshor 'gyur// mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yini// de yis 'di ni rnam pa ji ltar yang // sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas// / pha rol las kyang rgan par gyur de yi// bla ma de ni bag myed yon dam chung // 
249b1(dkon brtsegs): des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyis// 'di la ma 'jug 'di ni nor ba yin// gang la bdag yod ma yin srog myed dang // rnam pa cis kyang gang zag myed bstan pa// tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la// gang 'dang de'i ngal ba// 
249b2(dkon brtsegs): don myed 'gyur// gal te theg pa chen po yid na ni// 'di la bdag dang sems can shed skyes myed// gang la bdag dang sems can myi dmyigs pa// de la bdag gis ngal byas don myeng 'gyur// sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan
249b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pas// rang gi blo yis rang bzo' byed pa ste// dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni// tshig 'di gsung bar nam yang myi 'gyu ro// ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang // khwa ltar spyi rol tshe la rgol gtum zhing // 'phra dog pa
249b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal brgyags pa tshig pa yi// dge slong dag ni nga yi stan la 'byung // lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdob byed cing // chos gos gra rnams kyang ni dkyog par byed// chos gos thogs shing chang dang rgyags myos nas
249b5(dkon brtsegs): grong dang khyim du ni rnam par rgyu// de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed// bstan pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs nas// de dag rtag tu 'phrin yig khyer byed// 
249b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag pa lang rta dang bong bu dang // de dag phyugs dang // bran po bran mo sel// zhang gi las dang tshong gi sbyor ba la// brtson yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin// de dag 'phags myin tshig kyang myi smra byed// bya ba ma yin pa yang
249b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yang myed// de dag rnams la mchod rten nor dang ni// dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag nor de mtshungs// dge slong yom tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni// de dag la yang myi stan brjod byed de// tshul khrims 'chal ba sru bzhugs nas ni// 
249b8(dkon brtsegs): bud myed 'jig rten myi bzang rab zhes brjod// rab tu byung ba de dag rkam pa ltar// rab tu byung ba de dag rkam pa de ltar myin// khyim par mtshungs pa de dag chung ma dang // bu dang bu mo dag kyang yod par 'gyur// gang gi khyim du de dag/ 
250a1(dkon brtsegs): chos gos dang // las dang longs spyad dag gis bsnyen bkur ba// de'i rlung ma lan yongs chags shing // nyon mongs dang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa sbyin// 'dod pa 'di dag bsten bya ma yin te/ dud 'gro yi dgas
250a2(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba ltung byed ces// de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing // de dag bdag nyid ma dul nye bzhi myi// ji ltar de dag bdag nyid mdul ba// de dag slob ma tshogs kyang rab ma rul// kha zas ngag dang 'khrig pa'i gtam rdzas
250a3(dkon brtsegs): la ngade dag nyin dang mtshan du 'gro bar byed// bsten pa'i phyir gyi yon phyir myin te/ de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin// 'gro las rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas// rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor// de dag
250a4(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rnams la smra ba ni// bdag gis snying rjes 'di dag srung byed kyi// slob ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni// rim 'grodan du gnyer ba skyed ces smra// de la nad kyis non dang 'dzun par mang // lus lag bkra can dang gzun
250a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug/ rtag tu 'bigs sbyin byi ga kha cig kyang / 'ongs shing lpags b.rab tu 'byin par 'gyur// lung non pa dang sdom pa rnam da nyams/ de dag dge slong yon tan rtag kyi brtson// de dag khyim pas
250a6(dkon brtsegs): ngang gi khyim pa rgyu yin dge slong phyin// de dag sangs dur khrong shing dang mnu ngas// de dag so sor bar dang bslab pa dang / 'dul ba la yang gus par byed myi 'gyur// de dag rab nam rang dbang 'gro ba ste// lugs kyu
250a7(dkon brtsegs): btang ba'i glang po dbang po 'dral// de dag nag su gnas par gyur kyang ni// sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste// nyon mongs myi yis rtag tu rab gdungs la// de dag sems kyang gnas pa myed par 'gyur// de dag sangs
250a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yom tan thams cad dang // bslab dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang brjed nas ni// rgyags dang rgyal grags pa yongs rgyas te// de dag myi bzang mnar myed ltung 'gyur// de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag tu dga' zhing // rkun po'i gtam
250b1(dkon brtsegs): kha ton po la'ang rab tu dag du// nye du bsnyen la rab tu dga' ba ste// de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed// bsam gtan dang ni kha zon btang nas su// rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson// gnas la rkam
250b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'khro gnyer 'byin par byed// de dag slob ma'i 'khor kyang ma dul ba// nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag gi bla// bdag gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te// dge slong gang dag nga'i rjes mthun pa kagatsug lag khang 'dir de dag
250b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas yod do// gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan// chos 'dzin skye bo ngan la mngon brtson la// dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag bcom// de dag rnams ni srud par myi byed do// 'di ning yi gnas su bskos pa ste// 
250b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ring mi ldan cig gnas bu yin/ 'do na nga yi dga' bar byed pa yin// khyod kyis gnas ni gang yang spyod kyis song / 'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de// ma ma che rnams kyang ma lus dgos zin la// 'di ni rnyed
250b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'byung ba yod pa yid// 'di ni pazhigi spyad kyis dge slong song // de dag / la nim la san 'go bya ba// nam du'ang srid par 'gyur ba ma yin to// de dag khyim pa la bur srogs 'gyur zhing // tshogs bcas rnas
250b6(dkon brtsegs): rang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus na nga'i bu de dag/ kun tu smad bar byas par gyur nas ni// de dag nga'i tshig ni dran gyu ra te// bas mtha' dag dang nags su re tshe gnas// kyi hud rnyed pas zil gnon yon tam
250b7(dkon brtsegs): sdang // dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa// rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag/ ring por myi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur// phyi dus tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag/ rtag par yongs su brnyas par gyur pa ste// 
250b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams// spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par 'gyur// dbyed dang zur zer 'thab mo dga' ba dang // yon tan nyams la rtag tu sti sdang byed// de dag skye bo ston par grags 'gyur te// 
251a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur// 'dir mi ya bstan pa yon tan gtor// yon tan kun gyi 'byung nas mchog dga' ba 'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phra dog dang // rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig
251a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// ji ltar rin chen 'byung nas brus pa dang // pad ma'i rdzing bu yongs su skams pa dang // rin rkyen mchong sdong chags par gnas pa ltar// phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus kyi
251a3(dkon brtsegs): chen dam pa'i chos// rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu myi bzang che// dge slong dul ba ma yin de 'dra' ba// de dag nga'i bstan 'di 'jig pa yin// spyod pa 'di dag 'a sbyin pa dga' ba rnams// de dag bzang 'gro ga la yang / 
251a4(dkon brtsegs): de ring 'di nas shi 'phos yi dgas 'gro ba dang // dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas// lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa// myi bzang drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur// ji ste de yis myi'i lus
251a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu rnyed kyang // rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngang ldang bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i spyod ba 'dil rtag bsten pa// long ba 'am 'on pa'ama' nga skye bar 'gyur/ lus la rtag tug bkra 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa'i
251a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur// gang zhig ma nga'i spyong pa sbyod pa ni// ngasu yang yang nyon gyi 'gyur te// de'i tshig la yid ches par myi 'gyur zhing // de ni rtag tu smra 'bab par yang 'gyur// de dag na nga dun
251a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal brgya'is gdungs// mtshon dang gong dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun// bces dang rnam pa'i 'jigs pas yongs su gdungs// yang nade ni rtag par rab tu brnyes// sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni// ngas kyi
251a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis sdig pa'i spyong 'or la// legs pa'i spyod la rtag tu bsten par gyis// 'di ni phyini cang 'gyod par gyur ta re// gang zhig sangs rgyas dang ni 'phags tshogs dang // bslab dang spangs pa'i chos la dgar 'gyur ba// 
251b1(dkon brtsegs): nyer nga byed dang granas parjod srong byas la// de ltar rtag tu mtshan par bcom par gyis/ 'dus byas 'dzini sum sa dru / 'dzag par 'gyur rang myil ma bu dang / sdug pakun dang myong 'dral 'gyur zhing / 'a
251b2(dkon brtsegs): ga pa gang yang byed rtogs la/ kha'i mang sbyinang dngas dang slobs rnams la// rtag tu rab tu myur zhing yang par gyis/ ji sring byang chub mchag sangs ma rgyas pa/ de sring btsan 'grus nas yang thams ma byas/ 
251b3(dkon brtsegs): gleng bzhi 'i le'u ste dang po'o/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang gang zag phal cher la// skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te// myi brtsom
251b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dgu ni myi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur// g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur// myi shes pa dag ni myi shes pa dag la sti snang byed par sems par 'gyur la// zang zing la dga' bar yang 'gyur
251b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing chags pa zang ba dang // khyim la ser sna byeng ba dang // gas dang / ldan pa dang / bya wa ltar mu chod spu ba dang / tshul ba chos pa dang / gdu ltar len par 'gyur// ngan nun bsngags pa smra ba rnyed par bsgrub par
251b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// rnyed pa yongs su bcal pa'i phyir// de dag grong du 'jug gi// sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin// sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur// de dag shes bzhin du ji ltar
251b7(dkon brtsegs): na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang // dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes par 'gyur snyam du// bdag shes pa dang ldan dang ldan par khas 'che bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dir myi brtson pa de bzhin du zhes myed par 'gyur// 
251b8(dkon brtsegs): snod chag pa bzhin du 'gyur// gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang // sbyor ba nyams pa dang / myi shes pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun myi 'thun pa'i chos 'gro ba byed pas ye shes la myi rtog pa mang ba dang ka rang dgar byed
252a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor gi skye bo dang / 'gro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur ka yongs su myi 'da' ba'i ngang tshul can dang
252a2(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan pa don du myi gnyer bar 'gyur// myi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur// de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas// rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga'
252a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par 'gyur ro// de dag la nyes pa gshegs pa yang myed par 'gyur na// ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de dag ni sangs rgyas yon tan rnams bor nas/ shes rab kyi khe dang / rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag
252a4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ngo zhes bdag nyid khas 'che bar 'gyur te// yul 'khor skyong nga ni gang zag de lta bu de dag la// rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang myi smra na/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lta ga la zhig/ de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring nu/ 
252a5(dkon brtsegs): ci byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos// yul 'khor skyong gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste// brgyad gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang / mtha' khob pa'i myi'i
252a6(dkon brtsegs): nang du skye ba dang / dbul ba'i khyim du skye ba dang // rigs dma' pa ra skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes nyen dang phrad pa dang / nang mang ba dang / la nga ba ma spangs pasa'itsho
252a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus byed pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong chos cha rgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub kyi bar bachad byed par brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshig gis khas 'che ba lang byang chub ces myi smra'o// tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs
252a8(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa zhes myi smra'o// g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes myi smra'o// zang zing lhur len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes myi smra'o// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa zhes myi smra'o// shes rab
252b1(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa la the tsom gcod pa zhes byad myi smra'o// ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes da myi smra'o// myi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs thob ces da myi smra'o// yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba la bde
252b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro 'thob pa zhes nga myi smra'o// khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongasu dag pa zhes nga myi smra'o// spyad lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang phrad pa zhes nga myi smra'o// khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga myi smra'o// 
252b3(dkon brtsegs): mgus pa la sems yongs su dag pa zhes nga myi smra'o// cho ba myi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes nga myi smra'o// lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes nga myi smra'o// yul 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes bu blun po
252b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag la smad par ltar// ston pa drug la de ltar de myi spong do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni gzhan du smra ba la gzhan du byed pa'o// lha dang bcas/ dpa'i 'jig rten la smra ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su
252b5(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsa lang to// yang dag ma sngams rgod cing 'khengs pa can// mgus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che// nyon mongs/ zil non tha ba nyon mongs bcas// de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring // 
252b6(dkon brtsegs): chags pas zil gyis rnon na le lo 'phel/ le los zil gyis non ne dad pa nyams// dad pa nyams no// tshul khrims rab tu nyams// tshul khroms 'chal par gyur na// bzang 'gro nyams// dbul por gyu rang pas rab tu
252b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung 'gyur te// mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol bar 'gyur// de dag gser gi khur ni bor nas su/ gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs// rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro// der song nas kyang gos dang/ 
252b8(dkon brtsegs): du tshol// mngoran shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs// bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin// mongs nas nga rgyal dbang gyis ngan sang sa// myi khyim 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang // dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long ba dang / 
253a1(dkon brtsegs): cag/ mdog ngan pa dang mthu rlung de dag 'dzin// de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos// bag myed rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams// g.yang sa chen por myi bzang ltung mar 'gyur// de nas bskal pa bye bar thar
253a2(dkon brtsegs): ba myed// gal te 'dir ni thos pa byang chub na// de phyir lha sbyin gyis kyang byang chub 'phob// rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya ltung ltar// chags pas kyang ni de ltar myi rigs so// bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gi chung ma
253a3(dkon brtsegs): chags chug khrims ma dag dge ba rnams lhas nyams// byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang ma thos// de dag bstan la myi dgos drar shing bzhin// byang chub don gnyer sangs chos tshol ba// dper na thar pa de bzhin myi gnas/ 
253a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam byas ltar// nga rgyal zil non byang chub de 'dra'o// byang chub don tu gnyer bas chos tshig phyir// nga yis rang gi srog ni 'phangs pa'ang btang // chos de btang nas brtson dang myi ldan pa// don myed gyurang
253a5(dkon brtsegs): nas bstan la ltung bar 'gyur// da ni sngon cad legs par bshad don phyir// g.yang sa chen po mye lce ltar 'bar ba mchongs// de thos nas ni sdug dang myi sdug pa thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan
253a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas// bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la de dag nam yang 'dod pa myi skye na// chos myin 'dod la byang chub ga la yod/ dper na long ba lam gsal myeng dang mtshungs// yul 'khor skyong sngon 'byung
253a7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'das pa'i dus na// bskal pa grangs myed pa'i yang ches grangs myed pa// rgya cher ba/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa// mtshungs pa myed pa/ dpag tu myed pa// tshad myed par gyur pa// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
253a8(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas// rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba// bla na myed pa lha dang myi rnams kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas
253b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ron grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan ni// 'dzam bu gling dpag
253b2(dkon brtsegs): tshang khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed do// yul 'khor skyong de'i de'i dus na// 'dzam bu gling de ni grong khyer nyi khri dang // khrim bye ba phrag stong yod do// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan de// rgyal po'i pho brang gnas pa rgyal po'i
253b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od gser ldan de'i grong khyer/ rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba shar nub tu chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ lho byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir rim pa bdun dang // myig mangs ris su bres pas
253b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par byas pa yod do// de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag bcu thug gyu rad to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od gzer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes
253b5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ zhig yod de// de btsas ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gi gter stong byung bar gyu rang to// rgyal po'i khang bzangs kyi nang du yang // rin po che
253b6(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gi gter/ myi bcu'i tshad tsam byung bar gyu rang to// yul 'khor skyong bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer de btsas ma thag tu/ byadzam bu gling pa'i sems can thams cad yid rangs par
253b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// sems can gang dag btsor na 'khod pa de dag kyang // btson ra nas tha rang por gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer des// nyi ma bdun gis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu su lang ji snyed
253b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ nam gi gung gi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer la/ gzhon nu khyod bag yod
253b9(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shig/ myi rtag par so sor brtag pa la mkhas bar gyis shig/ gzhon nu myi rnams kyi srog ni chen po myed pa ste/ tshe 'phos par 'gro ba yin gyis// 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta bar bya zhing // las
254a1(dkon brtsegs): gdang bya ba dang / myi 'gal bar gyis shig ces bskul te// de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag kyang smras so// gzhon nu bag myed par gyur ta re// bag myed dbang du song bur gyur
254a2(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa bag yod rab bstod cig/ bde bar gshegs rnams kyis bag myed rnams kyang smad// nges pa gang dag 'di na bag yod cing // legs sdom dga' la sen byed pa dang // sems can kun la snying
254a3(dkon brtsegs): rje byams yid ldan// de dag ring po myi thogs myi mchog 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang / 'di na da ltar dag dang gang ma byon// de dag thams nad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags// khag yod lam
254a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid la yang shin tu gnas// bza' dang gdung dang gos dang kha zas dang // gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tig rgyano// bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang // byang chub dam par 'dir ni don tu gnyer// rkang pa
254a5(dkon brtsegs): lag pa de bzhi marna dang sde// slong ba rnams la rab tu dgas byin na// byang chub yon tan gyis bsam rdzogs nas// de dag ring por dmyi thogs myi mchog 'gyur// / rgyal sring bde dang srog
254a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bud myed dang / rdor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te/ 'dus byas gar la sa dang sgyu ma 'das// 'dod pa myed par dgon par gnas par gyis// srog ni brtan pa myed de rtag tu g.yo/ 
254a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can// brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu ther zug myin// gzhon nu 'di la rtag myed dge ba yin// ngan 'gro ltung ba'i tshe na 'di na ni// pa dang ma yang 'dzin par byed pa myed// myi yis dge
254a8(dkon brtsegs): dang myi dge gang byas pa// de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyus yis bskal mang rgya mtshor ni// don myed par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de// khyod kyis myi phan ma byas ci yang myed// don myed du nying
254b1(dkon brtsegs): dza la bsten par 'gyur// da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chub zhing // mtshungs myed go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir// rkang dang sha dang pags pa de bskams kyang // de ltar na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems// 
254b2(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// zhi ba'i chos zos pa yang shin tu dka'// bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi phyogs bsal nas// sangs rgyas ye shes ring bar myi thogs 'thob// bshes nyen bzang
254b3(dkon brtsegs): la rtag tu yongs sten cig/ sdig pa'i bshes nyen yongs su spang bar gyis// de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed// lam grol las kyang rtag tu bzlog par byed// brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa legs byas
254b4(dkon brtsegs): te// lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnam spangs nas// rdo rje lta bu'i snying gi bsam gtan 'bar// sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas pa ra gyis// sngon gi myi mchog dam pa 'od byed pa// kun
254b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'gro 'phang dam pa bla myed pa// tshol ba'i tshe na spyod yul dgon pa dga'// khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs// dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis// pha dang ma dang ba
254b6(dkon brtsegs): rang sdug pa'i gnyen// skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spangs la// lus dang srag la sred par ma byed par// bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gnon nu bsod nams kyi
254b7(dkon brtsegs): nga gzer thos// ngangs gzung ste/ lo bcu'i bar du na ma yang zhugs pa dang / gnyid kyis chen par du gyur// nam yang nod par ma gyur// ces par ma gyur da// doga' bar byed par mgyur na/ yongs su su
254b8(dkon brtsegs): par mgyur// rnam yang byud mo sa chams du ma song // rnam yang grags po mthong nas ngo mchar du byo 'dzin/ nas yang kyul dga' bar mgyur// rgyal srid da nga dang / khyim dong / grong khyi rnams la 'dzi rje
255a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mgyur te/ de ltar dngos po thams cad la phyis bar gcig tu sems shing gnas par gyur to// nang du mang dag 'jog ltar len cing 'jig rten la snying po byung ba dang / 'jig pa dang
255a2(dkon brtsegs): dbugs 'byin pa myed pa dang / myi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / byis pa 'bring ba dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba dang / ro bro ba myed pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde ba bslu ba'i chos can dang / srid pa la
255a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' bas chos myi shes pa dang / so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu myi 'thun par rnam par sems shing / bdag ni byis pa'i skye myi bcom pa'i nang na gnas kyis// bdag gis cang myi smra bas 'da' bar bya'o snyam
255a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de phyogs gcig tu cang myi smra bar gyur te/ bag yod par nyasashing / sdug pa dang bral bar gcig pu gnas par gyu rang to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od gzer ldan gyis/ gzhon nu'i wang
255a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod kyi phyir// sa phyogs shig tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byas te/ lho dang byang gi ngos su lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so// rin po che sna bdun gi phyir/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres
255a6(dkon brtsegs): po// mu tig dra ba dang / rin po che'i srog shing dang / bla re dang ldan pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor te// lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin po che'i srog shing stong btsugs so// rin po che'i sgrog shing thams
255a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang / rin po che'i skud pa drug khri spel to// rin po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas// shing ta la'i 'phreng bye bas spel to// de dag rlung gis skyong de bskul na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rol mo sil snyan brgya
255a8(dkon brtsegs): stong gi sgra snyan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa/ dang po dpal bab pa/ skye bo thams cad kyis spyad 'os su gyur pa// lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// de dag thams cad la// rgyal po
255b1(dkon brtsegs): rnags du sa dang sa ma ga ngas byags pa sems mas pa sa rgyashi / ngas ga gyung ba sa su skyed
255b2(dkon brtsegs): khang/ 'das ga'anas byed ci/ sems canas pa sa ma me du kyi'ang ba ma snyams nas pama'o// lam thang de dag tharas cang kyi skur srung / bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la babyung po// 'dung ba 'dri ba rnams pa
255b3(dkon brtsegs): btung bar gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa nas gos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / drug pa dang / mal cha dang / rgyab rten dang / 'tsho ba'i yod byad dang / gser dang dngul dang / nor bu dang mu tog dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung
255b4(dkon brtsegs): mAr shel dang khyi ru dang / sa le snum dang / dngul sil ma dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / nor dang / rgyan thams cad byin zhing / skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su spyad pa'i phyir// rin po che
255b5(dkon brtsegs): 'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur da// de'i tshe grong khyer gi dbus su/ gzhan nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir// khyim 'khor yug tu dang / ga tshad tsamo yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun myig mangs ris su bres pa/ 
255b6(dkon brtsegs): 'a rabs rgyas rab tu brgyan par byas so// de'i nang du khang bzangs cig byas te/ da gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir// mal bye phrag bzhi bshams so// de'i dbus su bskyed mos tshal byas te/ me tog gi ljon pa
255b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i bkod do// yul 'khor skyong bskyed mos tshal de'i dbus su/ rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing / rin po che/ 
255b8(dkon brtsegs): khasna bzhi'i bem skas dang ldan par byas pa la/ 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang / shel lo// gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge'i ba brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs so// rdzing de'i seng ge'i kha brgyan
256a1(dkon brtsegs): ga gabargyang po de nas kyang chu 'bab bo// me tog ud pa la dang / kun mu dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po rnams cag par rgyun tu rgyas so// 'khor yug tu yang ring po cha'i shing ljon pa yongs su bskor to// dus/ 
256a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad pa'i mi tog dang / 'bras bu'i zhing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so// rdzing de'i 'gram na/ rin pa che'i shing ljon pa'i rgyad brgyad bskyed de/ rin pa che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang ring pa ma'i skud pa rjes
256a3(dkon brtsegs): spel cing / thams cad du yang shing ta la'i 'phreng ba bye bas spel to// de dag kyang rlung skyod cing // de dag kyang rlung gis bsgul na// 'di lta ste dper na// rol mo sil spyan brgya snyeng blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // gzho mo nu'i
256a4(dkon brtsegs): lus la sa dang rdul gyis reg tu 'ongs zhes// rdzing de'i steng rin po che'i dra bas bkang bar gyur to// de'i tshe khang bzangs der/ rin po che sA bdun gi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te/ khri thams cad kyi steng du yang
256a5(dkon brtsegs): ras bcos bu lnga brgya lnga brgya bting bar gyur ngo // gang du yang rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer 'dug par 'gyur ba/ khro rin po che sna bdun la byas pa// pang du myi bdun tsam yod pa bshes
256a6(dkon brtsegs): pa// dbus ma der ras bcos bu bye ba phrag brgyad brgyad cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to// khri thams cad kyi drung du yang // pog bor nas a ka rus bdugs shing / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog 'gres
256a7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// gser gi lA ldi bris so// gser gi pad ma rab tu sbyangs so// mu tig dang / nor bu'i dra bas bres so// nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang byas so// rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rib tu sbyangs so// rin po che'i zhing
256a8(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa thams cad la yang // ba dan brgya brgya bshams so// bskyed mos tshal kun tu yang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa/ 'bum phrag dgu bzhag par gyur te/ de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten thams
256b1(dkon brtsegs): snang par gyur da to// yul 'khor skyong bskyed mos tshal de na/ bya'i tshogs myi'i skad du smra ba/ ne tso dang / ri skyegs dang khrung khrung dang / khu byug dang / rma bya da / ded pa dang / dur pa dang / ku na la dang ga ka la bing ka
256b2(dkon brtsegs): dadzin shang shang de'u 'khod do// de dge skad 'byin cing sgra smag na/ dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rgyags par 'gyur bo la bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // gzhon nu'i longs sud kyi phyir ri'i rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa/ 
256b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa lnga brgya ba'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par gyur to// de'i tshe gnon nu lo bcu drug yon na// ma nye shu lon pa'i steng dang ldan pa dag/ grong khyer thams cad ras bsdus nas// grong khyer der bcung
256b4(dkon brtsegs): khams cad kyang bzo gnas dang / las kyi gnas kyi bya ba shes pa thams cad kyang // 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / mtshon chas kyi bya ba zhes pa / bye ba phrag brgya na grong khyer der bcung bar gyur to// thams cad
256b5(dkon brtsegs): pha ma gnyis kyis de la bu mo bye ba byin no// nye du'i tshogs kyi bye ba dang / grong / rdal ba'i myis bye ba dang / rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba/ byin par gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang
256b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa kha lta na sdug pa sha skrag go// thams cad kyang tshod lo brtse drug lon po/ glu mkhas pa/ rol mo'i sgra mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa/ dgod mkhas pa/ skyes pa'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa/ 
256b7(dkon brtsegs): rung ba/ bzhon pa/ man pa/ yarna lag 'jam pa/ gcod pa smra ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ tshum mkhas pa/ sgra stsal thams cad kyi bya ba la mkhas pa/ a cad myi rnying ba/ a tsang ma kyi thung ba/ a cang yang
256b8(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa/ a rbang yang myi sdom po/ a cang yang myi dka' ba/ a nad yang myi sngob/ kha nas me tog ud pa la'i gsung 'thung ba/ lus rnams las can 'das ga dri 'byung ba/ lha'i bu mo ltar gsas pa/ shin tu
257a1(dkon brtsegs): tshugs can pa dang / bdag go dag ma rgyas yongs sunyams par byed 'byung ste/ ya bar rgyu byar snyam pa'i seMsas paskyed nga/ da'i 'a di sa skye nga / gsang ba bya sems mthong ba'i phyim
257a2(dkon brtsegs): myi bskyed pa de bzhin du/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer yang / bud myed de dag mthong rang mtshar du myi 'dzind to// grong khyer de la yang grags dang lhan cig ngo mtshar du 'dzir to// lo bcu pa 'di dag ni
257a3(dkon brtsegs): ba nga bdag nas zhig / sbyim pa ba'i choms rnam pa 'di lta nA'i nang nas par par 'gyur snyam pa dang / bdag nas zhig nA blanas da par spang spyod cing/ des bdag par 'gyur ba zhig zun pa pad
257a4(dkon brtsegs): du sems 'jug pa ma gdags par/ nam yang gzugs kyis can ma brdung bar mgyur te/ sgra'i mtshan sa dang / dri ma ram nga/ ro mtshar ba dang / reg gi brgya pa bzung bar mgyur te/ 
257a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo de dag gis/ rgyal po 'od gzer ldan la/ lha gzhon nu ni myo ro lang to// dgyes par mdzad do// dgyes dgur myi spyod do// zhes smras so// bam po gsu pa ste/ mam mi'o// 
257a6(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de ni rgyal po 'di gzer ldan/ rgyal po brgyad khri dang ldan cig tu/ rgyal du gzhon nubasod nams kyi 'od gzer glal ba der song ste/ phyin nas gang las mchi ma jig
257a7(dkon brtsegs): cing lus 'dar te/ mya ngan sa las langs nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams 'od gzer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bu cig rin chen dam pa nga la ltos shig smos// nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nang sa la 'gyel su yis khyod
257b1(dkon brtsegs): myi dga' byas de myur nga la smos// de 'dir de'u re 'chad pa chen po gcad par bya// khyod kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis gang smras pa// lha'i khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer de ltar ltos shig// 'di la yan lag ma tshang ci
257b2(dkon brtsegs): yod de myur smos// brgya byin lha'i 'byor pa di ring khyod la bstan// pad ma'i myig can myig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa// lha'i bu mo lta bu'i bud myed tshogs spros ltos// mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang di ring rtses// ci phyir
257b3(dkon brtsegs): zug rngu zug bzhin lus ngama' na sems shing 'jug/ de dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag sbyar// glu dbyangs pheg rnga bo dus kyi rnam par nges shes/ khyod dag 'a dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig/ pad ma rnyis pa 'o
257b4(dkon brtsegs): bur ci phyir dang lus dmam// me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas bskyed mos tshal// sna tshogs bsten bzhag lta'i sna tshogs shing rta 'dra'// soms shig khyod kyi mchod 'di ni thog ma yin// dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis
257b5(dkon brtsegs): deng 'dir bu dga' gyis// khyod kyi khrus ched rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra'o// ung pa la dang pad ma dag gi tshul gyis gang / pad ma rnams kyang bud myed brgyags pa mchog gis brgyan// de lasas
257b6(dkon brtsegs): su zhig 'di la dga' bo byed// ngang ba rma byen mo 'u zug ri skyegs dang ka la bing ka shang shang de'u dang kun la// yid 'ong sgra ldan gangs nyo so dang ldan 'dra' ba// thos nas myi gang 'di la dga' ba 'thob myi 'gyur
257b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhal myed khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsug/ gser dang bu dUr+yar spras rnam rgyam khang pa 'dra// rin cen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba// gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i 'phreng ba sgra snyan pa// zab
257b8(dkon brtsegs): cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra bsgrags pa// khyod kyi ched du srang rnams su yang skyon rgya che// bu mo steng dag gru mchog snyan pa sgra 'byin pa// dga' tshal lha'i bu mo rnams kyi dra ba sgrog/ mtho ris 'dra ba'i
258a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas yang 'angs car byed// rnam par g.yed pa'i sems kyis dag gyi byed// gzhon du byed kyis rkyen 'grogs ltar sna 'dra ba// do dag rnams dang lhar cig byed mo gyis// khyod kyi pa dang
258a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yang mchis mas rnangs shing 'dug/ skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje myed ngam ji// 'dus byas yid byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod don myi gnyer// yon tan bstsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong nges smras pa// 'khor ri
258a3(dkon brtsegs): dra bar chung ba'i 'gro ba ltas 'di nas// thar ba don gnyer pha la smras pa yab gson cig/ lha gcig sus kyang bdag la myi dga' bgyis ma mchis// bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyon
258a4(dkon brtsegs): rmongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar ltung byed pa la sdug pa thams cad dag dang mtshungs te rjes myi srung // myi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud myed de dag dga'// bdud kyi zhags pa'i yon tan 'ching ba g.yang sa che// 
258a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad// sems dmyal // ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba'i phyir bsten// bud myed 'di dag 'phag gas pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam// bdag ni rus rgyu 'khrul 'khor
258a6(dkon brtsegs): myi gtsang don myi gnyer// khrag dang gcin dang myi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag/ gsal ba dur khrod 'dra la ci ltar bar gyis// glu dang ga ra dang rol mo'i dbyings sgra bzung myi bgyi// dga' ba rmi
258a7(dkon brtsegs): lam 'dra ba myi mkhas rmongs/ khaMr bgyid kun du rtog pa sred gyu rang myi mkhas 'dir brlag gis// ci'i phyir byis pa'i skyed bo lta bur nyon mongs khol/ shing lkug 'di dag thams cad kun gyi dus byung na// dgon 'dud
258a8(dkon brtsegs): shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags// myi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad bshig gyur da te// srog g.yo gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag myed 'gyur// sems ni rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed myi nus/ 
258b1(dkon brtsegs): srid par rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dud// 'dod rgyus phan tshun gsod pa'i phyir 'gro la bltas nas su 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gyis myi bskyod bzhin// rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang
258b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen gi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs myin// bdag cag thams cad rtsa rtse'i zil ba 'dra ba ste// sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur dang bag yod mdzod// myi dbang ngar la myi rtag cing myi rung // srog kyang ri'i
258b3(dkon brtsegs): chu ltar myur 'gro ciri myi rung // 'dus byas 'di zad glog sprin 'dra ste cir myi rung // rgyal po mkhas la srid sum 'dod la chags pa ngan// lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub
258b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' yul la tshogs pa myin zhes bskul// 'jig rten phan pa snying brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi// rgyal na po bag myed spyod la byang chub yod ma lags/ rgyal po gang zhig
258b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas g.yen spyo sems 'khol ba// 'di ni bsod nams cung zad dga' zhing mtho ris ldog// 'tshe ba shin tu rgyas pa nam yang spyad myi bgyi// skom par bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs
258b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'gyu// khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 'dra// zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems ni don myed grong stong mtshungs// rgyal po 'di ni dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dri'i lus// chu bo rnams kyis bdas na
258b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'dir ci ltar dga'// rab tu gsal gnas 'dar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang / 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas// rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag 'gro ba dang / gnyid log sang par bgyi dang na
258b8(dkon brtsegs): gso ba dang // zug rngu rtsa nas gdon dang lam log zlog pa'i phyir// bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni myur du sbyar// stong chen du ni bcings pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba
259a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bgyi// ngan 'gro'i lam du ltung ba dag kyang gdon par bgyi// long ba myig sbyin sred pa'i khrir gong skems par bgyi// rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar me byas// de misu sring
259a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum gar la lta ba 'drar mthong 'gyur// byams dang snying rtse snying rje'i pha rol du phyin pa sprin// sems don 'brug lhag mthong glog gi 'phreng ba dang // byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun 'dra ba yis// / gro
259a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi// rgyal ba dag ni dran gyur nas 'dir mchis ste// bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis// byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi// gcig
259a4(dkon brtsegs): hU~M tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis// rgyal po 'do mo shes pa'i ngan su zhig dgra khrong gnas// blo ldan su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro// myig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sur ltung // byang rlu
259a5(dkon brtsegs): lam shes nas ni su zhig bag myed 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad rgyu/ na 'gro bdag ni rgyun zlog pa// rgyal po'i tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob myi nus// lhun po'i rtsi nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mche je sa
259a6(dkon brtsegs): yi/ bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de ltar myin// rgyal po dam pa rang gnyer cig myur tu bzhud// yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsal// gang dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs
259a7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'chi bar 'gyur// yab bdag ni nga rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags// bud myed tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang // grub bde bla myed gnas ni thob myi nus// dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas brnyes pas na/ 
259a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi// yul 'khor dris nas/ rgyal bu gzhan nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer khang bzangs kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du/ yod byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis// bud myed de// 
259a9(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang lhan cig 'chag cing // de spyod lam gsum gis gnas so// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid yongs su spangs so// khang pa'i steng du song ste/ sa brgyad la
259b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas de nas gi gung labab pa'i dus kyi che/ gnas gcang ma'i chis kyi lha rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing / bar snang la 'grob dang / chos dang dag 'du gi bsngags bu rgyu cher brjo
259b2(dkon brtsegs): cing 'gro ba thos so// thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ mchi ma gzug cing skye ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar nas lha rnams la tshigs su bcang de
259b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa// lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje brjed nas ni/ gal te skyo myi mdzad na cung zhig zhu ba bgyi// su yi yon tan brjod cing bar snang 'di las bzhung // tshig de thos bdag 'dir yid ri bde bar gyurapa/ 
259b4(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de nas lha de dag gis// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad bas slar smras paka/ gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam// don grub blo zhes bya skyabs myed
259b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi skyabs dang // de gzhan spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan mchog/ de'i tshe dge 'dun khrag khrig stong bcu bsam// gtan pa// bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis smras pa// bdag ni rgyal ba
259b6(dkon brtsegs): blta 'tshal de'i gzugs ci 'dra// de'i kha dog ci 'dra thams cad ga/ stsol cig/ ji ltar spyad na sems can kun gcig 'gyur ba/ byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dri// de nas lha de dag gis// 
259b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa// de'i gtsug tor ro'i rtsil gser mdzes bzhin// dbu skra 'dzam zhing mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil pa ste// de'i mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ma/ 
259b8(dkon brtsegs): lham me lha/ nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing g.yas su 'khyil/ spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ud pa la sngon po 'dra// myi dbang seng ge'i 'gram pa rang byung bim pa'i spros// sems can lhan cig 'od gzer bye ba maH/ 
260a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yas 'gyed// stong gsum rgyas par 'gyengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skems// de'i tshems ni rab dkar dngul ltar dag bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thams bzangs rmad byung legs par grub// rgyal ba dam
260a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog de'i rnams kyi mche ba bzhi// de yi ljags ni rab yang sA rang gi zhal mdog khyebs// rgyal ba'i de'i gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don// shin tu tshim byed 'brel cing gya gyu myed pa ste// tshangs dbyangs shin tu rigs sil
260a3(dkon brtsegs): snyan stong 'dra ba// yid gnyis 'jom pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa// rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha'i sgra skad tshim byed pa// yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lag 'thun// chos kyi 'phreng ba yid 'ong brgya stong rab rgyus
260a4(dkon brtsegs): ba// sil snyan dga' ba bsgrags pa lta klu nyams dga' da myi tsi ki la bing ka khu byug ngur pa dang / rma bya ngang pa sgra snyan kun la'i sgra// tshungs pa'i sgra dbyangs myi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra// ma 'khrul sdig myed don
260a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa// rmang byung shes ltar 'jam zhi// nga mkhas pa'i yid 'ong // bskul ba 'dul bar 'gyur ba sbyong dkar 'gyur ba// gzhan gi spyod dang 'thun pa zhus na tshim byed
260a6(dkon brtsegs): ga chos kyi dbang phyug ro'i gsung gi yon tan 'ang // ston pa'i gul mdzes drung dang 'dra zhing dpung mag zlum// dbyug pa ste br-ir phyag ring de'i bdun yang mtho// phyog sadzes sna tshugs sor mo
260a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni ring zhing zlum// rgyal ba de'i sbyi ni btso ma'i gser gi mdog/ ba spu g.yas su 'khyil cing gyen du re rer skyes// lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta yang 'dra// rab 'byung e ne'i byin pa glang po
260a8(dkon brtsegs): sA 'dra'i brla// zhabs mthil mdzes pa'i bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo'i mtsham// glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros stabs seng ge'i rtsal gyi stobs// khyu mchog bsgyings pa'i stabs can dbang po'i mi tshung sdong rgyas// mkha las
260b1(dkon brtsegs): 9mas sdud// zhems pa ma dpa da rdza/ nga da nga nga da// rnags da ma shA spyang smra
260b2(dkon brtsegs): chuthar thams pa du yang gus pa myed// mya'i seng ge de 'dra ma rung smra pa'i sems can byed// yul lakhor spyod de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi'ang zer gyis// sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa 'is zhing // rlos
260b3(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gi bsngags pa zos nas// tshim 'di mgul yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste// dga' ba dang / yong bang ba skyes par gyur te// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nubasong nams kyi 'od zer 'ji snyam du sems
260b4(dkon brtsegs): te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba dang // de'i dge 'dun daphun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang // des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang / de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang // 
260b5(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ji ltar 'khor ba yang ba dang phrad pa dang / byas pa myi bzo ba dang / ji ltar 'khor na byis pa so so'i skyeng po dag byis pa myi bcwa ba dang / ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi
260b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas nyes dmyigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag myed pa smad pa dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun gnag rmongs ma dang // ji ltar 'du byed rnams rtog par
260b7(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems gdul dka' ba dang / ji ltar mying dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mched drug dbus 'byim pa myed dang / ji ltar reg pa yongs su ma shes te/ sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang
260b8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmyigs mang ba dang / ji ltar sred pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar len pa las byung bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags ma yin pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na/ skye ba/ 
261a1(dkon brtsegs): ga gzun gas dpa' ba dang / jiH dga' ba rnam par myur ba byed pa dang / jig mang kyis rnam par rig par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'dzu ba rjes su su srung ba dang / ji sar 'jug par tho ba chung na
261a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar srid par 'grub pa nyes dmyigs mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan pa nyams dga' ltar myi nus ste/ 'dod pa'i khol po// nyon mongs pas rmongs pa/ sems tha ba can bag myed pa la dga'
261a3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/ tshul bzhin ma pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pas na// bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par sbyang bar myi nus
261a4(dkon brtsegs): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta ga la 'gyur/ snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems ste/ bdag sgo nas byung na ni nye du'i tshogs kyi sa bar chad byas
261a5(dkon brtsegs): su 'ong gis/ bdag khang steng 'di nas thur du mchod ngo snyam mo// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod rnams kyi 'od zer/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de
261a6(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de logs su phyogs te/ khang pa de nas mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs she na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
261a7(dkon brtsegs): de bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes kyang smras so// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ 'od
261a8(dkon brtsegs): phung nas 'od des rgyal bu gzhon snang ba chen por gyur nas snang ba des/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod rnams kyi 'od zer
261b1(dkon brtsegs): pad ma'i de la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
261b2(dkon brtsegs): lo zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des 'od de brtul ba dang / gzhon nu de sdong po bcang po bsgyel bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zha
261b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
261b4(dkon brtsegs): pa don grub blo la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// bdag ni ring nas ste ring nas gdong // tshogs ches sman pa'i rgyal po rnyed do// ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas ni ni// bdag gis
261b5(dkon brtsegs): thob 'gyur mgon po stan du gsol// 'dren pa dag gis bag mchis thos pa ni// mtshan mo bar snang lha lis thos lags te// thos nas skyo ste bdag ni 'chis ma// myi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ci lta bu
261b6(dkon brtsegs): lam nyams pa la di ring ston gyur cig/ ldongs par gyur la'i myig tu deng gyu ra cig/ dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan// g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung shig/ dbul por gyur pa bdag ni bsdu
261b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzod// mgon po bcings pa bdag ni deng sgrol mdzad// so ma nyid bcang ba'i yid gnyis bcad du gsol// byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung stom// chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol// mud pa bdag
261b8(dkon brtsegs): sgron ma mdzad du gsol// rmar gyur bdag la rma myed mdzad du gsol// sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zug rngu phyung // khyed kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzod// srid par dmyigs par 'dzin pa gcang du gsol// ya
262a1(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam cher gyis// mya ngan chu cher pa ros paska lang du gsol/ srog ni bang pa'i chos ca tshe yang drung // dge ba bar chang mang ba 'byung ba ste// bsod nams rnam srin ring por myi thogs pan
262a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grub bdag gis ngal ba gad rnyed gcig des gsungs// byang chub sems dpa'aji ltar bag mchis 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa mchog spyang na// 'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las thar 'gyur ba// 'jig rten dgor po dngan
262a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag yub stom// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub zlos// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod rnams kyi 'od zer ga lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyend nas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po yang dag par bstan
262a4(dkon brtsegs): to// rgyal bu gzhon du bsod nams kyi 'od zer de thos nas// rnam bar tha ra pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo// mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste/ de nas de nam mkha' la gnas nas/ me tog rnams mngon par
262a5(dkon brtsegs): sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor mngon par gtor to/ yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
262a6(dkon brtsegs): don grub thong la/ tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa// mchar mchog ldan pa dri myimyeng zla ba'i zhal// gser mdog 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul bral khyod 'angadra srid pa gsum ma mchis// mnyam/ 
262a7(dkon brtsegs): myed mkhyen cer khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang // khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di nir rgyal bzhim// gtsug tor myi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// thub pa khyod smin mtshams mjed
262a8(dkon brtsegs): sku mdzes// kun 'da' zla ba kha dung ltar dkar// thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa// spyan mchog bzang po ud pa la sngon po 'dra// rgyal ba dri myed spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// ljags yongs srab la zangs
262b1(dkon brtsegs): drug// de yis dang gag lag gdang nga khyebs// chos gsung bas ma ma la dul par bgyid/ ngam skum gsung ldan kyang 'a phyag 'phrul lo// rnangs pabang du ga dbyung rdzu / 
262b2(dkon brtsegs): sum bcu snyoms shing thag bzang ba// 'dzum pa mdzad na 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis// 'od kyis zhing brgyad / 
262b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang snang bar bgyid// 'jig rten ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag/ bcom ldan khyed kyi 'od kyis zil du rlag/ e ne'i byin pa mnyam myed bcom ldan 'das// glang po rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs// bcom ldan
262b4(dkon brtsegs): gnya shing gang du gzigs shing gzegs// sa dang ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis/ rgyas pa ste// khyod kyi pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra// 'gro
262b5(dkon brtsegs): ba gzugs 'di lta ba ngoms myi 'gyur// khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan// khyod sngon bskal pa brgya re ni dka' thub spyad// khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes/ 
262b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan// mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// khyed ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes// khyed ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan// khyod ci
262b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gdan shes rab 'od zer mangs// mtshungs myed ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// khyed ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshigs can 'joms// khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs// khyed ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri
262b8(dkon brtsegs): masum sem// mchog tu dga' badzang kyang la phyag 'tshas lo// thug pa sku gsung thugs ni nas par dag/ pangs chu lar srid pa gsum phyogs// khyod tshamangs dbyangs ka la 'a kar srang // sr-ing
263a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa ro lang gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang // gar la lnga dang rmyilam 'dra ba dang // bdag myed sems can myed cing srog 'gro myed// chos rnams spyir rgyu
263a2(dkon brtsegs): chu rdza 'dra bar mkhyed// stong pa zhi bskyed pa myed pa'i tshul// ma shes pas na 'gro ba 'khyam 'gyur te// thugs rjes pos tshul rigs pa brgyad dag gis// de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags// 'dod chanas
263a3(dkon brtsegs): lus stsogs nang mang brgya dag gis// sgrog par gu rang pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te// bde gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grol cing // zla myed spang ba lta bu rnam par rgyu// skye dang rga dang 'chi mya ngan nono// sdug
263a4(dkon brtsegs): dang bral dang sme bsngags 'don pa rgyas// rtag tu na pa'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu// dud 'gro yi rigs dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su// 'gro kun shing rta'i pang lo bzhin du
263a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khom// glen pa dmyigs bu ma mchis mgon ma mchis// de la lam gyi das paston pa mdzad// gtso bo mtshungs pa myed pas gang bstan pa// 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon cad kyi// chos kyi dang
263a6(dkon brtsegs): thug 'gro ba don mdzad pa/ rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// 'jam zhing mnyen la ying du 'ong ba'i mchog/ tshangs las lha par mchog tu dga' bgying ba/ dri za myi ni lha'i bu mo mchog
263a7(dkon brtsegs): sgran zil gyis mnan nas gsung ba mdzad// bde dang dran pa myi bzang thabs tshul gyis// yongs spungs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung // de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag/ theg pa gsum gyis mchi bar bgyid/ 
263a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod la mchog pas lha'i bde ba ni// rnam pa mang dang de bzhin myi yis thob// myi'i bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa phyug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por 'gyur// mtshungs myed khyod la dad pa skyed pa ni// gleng bzhi bdag po
263b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los sgyur ba mchog/ 'gro la dge ba bcu po kun byed pa// rin cen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni// tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang // yongs su dga'
263b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan lha'i dbang po dang // gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'thab bral rab bdag 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nam mang sel mdzad pa// mnyam myed khyod la mchod dang mchod dang mthong ba dang // thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis
263b3(dkon brtsegs): lags te// gnas mchog rga shi myang ba 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das lam mkhas shing lam mkhyend pa// 'jig rten 'di ni rin po'i lam las zlog/ bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam// mde bzhi
263b4(dkon brtsegs): ba rdul dang bral la 'god// bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i// bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu myi bas pa ste// byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni// bskal pa bye ba mang por bas myi
263b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa// yongs su dag cing mdze sA pa 'thob par 'gyur// dam pa zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal po'i
263b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa myi yis 'di las stsogs// yon tan rnam pa du ma 'thob par 'gyur// mtho ris ther be'i bde ba dang 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter 'thob 'gre ra// khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po// phyogs rnams kun
263b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis// rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba ni// bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs// rims nang bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa// mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa/ 
263b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhes dgyes pa// myi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas// mngon par zhen pa lnga 'thob mkha' la gnas// dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag
264a1(dkon brtsegs): ma / / um rdzu pa nga sa [।] nga bsnangs chu / gas
264a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phang thob par shig/ yul 'khor sbyang de nas/ mtshan mor nas nangs pa dang / rgyal po 'ang gaper ldan gyis// gzhon nu'i bud myed kyi 'khor du ba'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis
264a3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer dga' mchog ga la rer song ste/ phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ci'i phyir du// de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer myi gda' ba'i srad du'o// yul 'khor de nas rgyal po 'od zer
264a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan gzhon nu'i phyir shing bcad pa bsgyel ba ltar/ sa la 'gyel te/ langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal to// yul 'khor skyong de nas grong khyer de na// grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des// rgyal po 'ong
