264a5(dkon brtsegs): zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ni/ de de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang // phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir// shar phyogs logasu song
264a6(dkon brtsegs): ngo yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu bcul ba'i bya btsun mo'i'akhor dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ga brgya cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig du shar phyogs chag la 'der song ste/ 
264a7(dkon brtsegs): da bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag pa bajug se pa'i sangs rgyas dor bu rdzogal ba nga song nas byin pa dang / bcam pa zangs kyi sabs la 'as thos byas 'tshas te phyogs gcing du 'dug go// phyogs
264a8(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dug nas kyang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa// srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la~M mchos// sems can dam lha dbang lha kun rgyal pos
264b1(dkon brtsegs): yang byalabs// byugs rnams ldan rgyal ba'i bu yang gdang/ ba gshegs rnams kyi sna'i chang ga pa ma lags// khyod/ de dag 'i rdzas dag shigs sa zhugs par na
264b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad cing rab dkar gling por gyur nas ni// dpa' bo yum gi lhums su gshegs par gda' du mdzad// thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs// / bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltam par ston pa 'ang
264b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzang ste// sa 'ga' dag tu gom pa bdun 'dor gda' bar mdzad kang ni lha myir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin tu lta// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung // thub khyod chos gang la yang the tsom myi mnga' yang // ye ge/ 
264b4(dkon brtsegs): klas pa slob lhar 'jig rten drag na gda'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba brnyes 'gyur kyang // kha cig tu ni bud myed nang na bzhugs par gda'// yab dang yum dang sa dang bud myed rnams kyang btang // gnyen rnams
264'a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan non tanam par brgya la zhing du// sems can dam pa brgya ltas yengs bu skon nas// nags gnas gnas gcig pa nas byung bar gangar ba'ang mdzad// khyed ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzang nas
264'a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dushes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// mya ngan ba zla zhes 'khor ga reng du tshig tu gsung ga/ rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gra ba gzigs nas ni// khyang nag pa bsil 'gyur mya ngan las 'das pa gsung/ 
264'a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs myed// thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung // kun tu spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la
264'a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag/ 'tshal lo// sems can kun gyi bgyi bar sgyu ma ltar brda yang thug pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa'ang byon ma lags// sgyu ma'i chos tshul
264'a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas la mngon par byag 'tshal lo// gro ba'i don tu gang gis byang chub mchog zab pa// lam mtshag gyi dpa' bo byed migs gsung // dag gis chos nyid 'di ni mung tu sangs rgyas
264'a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya'i dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi// myi'i dpa' bo thub pa kun ma khyen rims bral ba// sring gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig/ bdag gis 'dir bstang bsod nams gang bsgrubs ngos
264'a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jog rten byang chub bla myed zhi mchog thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dron grub blo ngas// rgyal po 'od gzer ldan de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyend nas// ci nas thams cad bla na myed
264'b1(dkon brtsegs): po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar chos bstan to// yul 'khor de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
264'b2(dkon brtsegs): pa don grub blo de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang ba mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer
264'b3(dkon brtsegs): las thugs rtse bar dgongs te/ cang myi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis pha ma do gnyis dang 'grogs/ de dag dang / bud myed de dag la smras pa
264'b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig// ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te// ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du ring bar gyis shig/ de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang ngo
264'b5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi/ 'od zer gyis/ ci nas kyang grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te// ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// re bro ba bkod pa
264'b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi/ dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to// dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir// rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang // 
264'b7(dkon brtsegs): nor bu'i chags bshams pa// steng du rin po che'i dra ba bla rer bres pa/ g.yas g.yon du me tog gi ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas par me tog pad ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa// ras
264'b8(dkon brtsegs): bcos bu ma gnyis dri mo myed pa/ brgya bting ba'i lam bshams pa// dge slong re re la goso kha na ma tho ba myed pa gang byin pa de/ phyi de nyid myi spyan gyi nyin cig bzhin gos gzhon dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas so// 
265a1(dkon brtsegs): de la bye brag gsum go bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur do// bdag le dga' ba ma byas// sangs rgyas la mchong ba'i phyir grazhan yid la ma byas so// bar skabs der 'dod
265a2(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par rtog pa dang gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur / rgyal srid la sreng bar ma gyurang te/ lus dang srog la yang myi lta ma/ dngos po gzhan
265a3(dkon brtsegs): la lta smos kyang ci dgos// bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad/ kun bzung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa lan gnyis su ma zhus so// khar
265a4(dkon brtsegs): skabs der khrus ma byas// mar dang 'bru mar gyis lus ma skus// rkang pas ma bkrus// ngal ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed do// zan za ba dang / bshang ci byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyu rad to// 
265a5(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las/ 'das pa de'i tshe/ tsa 'dan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhugs la bzhen pa byas so// gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la
265a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du// 'dzam bu gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams dang / spos thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis// lo brgya stong du ring sel
265a7(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas/ rgyu rkyen thams stsogs te/ phyis mchod rten bye ba brgya rtsa bzhi bar du byas so// mchod rten de dag la yang rin po sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs so// mu tig gi
265a8(dkon brtsegs): dri ba'i bla re dag bres so// mchod rten re re la yeng rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya lnga phul lo// mchod rten thams cad la yang sil snyan brgya stong phul lo// 'dzam bu gling 'khor yul du me tog
265b1(dkon brtsegs): na shing ljon pa sbya ta/ mtshad rten me re la yang / mar skye 'ju ba rgya stong nas/ mar skye zhus so// mar med bor de nas kyang / spos kyi 'bru mar drug bcus bzhi pa spyod gsor ba nus so// smos
265b2(dkon brtsegs): 'greng ba dang / byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'byas so// chub de lta bus ma bye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te/ phyis rab tu phyung ba// rab tu byung nas kyang / chos gos gsung bar gyur dang / tu
265b3(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms spyod pa dang / rtag tu cog cog pu ba ste/ nam yang glos ma phab po / nam yang rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyu rang to// de zang zing myed pa'i sems kyis lo bye phrag bzhi
265b4(dkon brtsegs): bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin te// des gzhan la tha na legs so zhes bya ba tsam la yang re bar ma gyur na// rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de chos mnyan pa 'am/ 
265b5(dkon brtsegs): chos bshad pas ngal bar ma gyur to// de la lha rnams kyong bsnyen bkur byed do// yul gi myi thams dang / btsun mo'i 'khoradang / nang myi thams cad dang / grogs po thams cad kyang rje'i rjes
265b6(dkon brtsegs): su bslabs te rang byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gi rjes su slob cing / yul 'khor myi thams cad rab tu byung gi
265b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gis de la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byas na/ dkon mchog gsum la rim 'gro byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos
265b8(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag drag bcu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te// dge slong bsod kyi 'od zer gyis// thams cad yongs su bzung ngo // / tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba phrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi le// rnam pa de
266a1(dkon brtsegs): dung mchod 'bras sa yus 'ar byung ba dus ma/ rgyam pa 'a stan ces byab na nga na ga yoms sa su spyod de ltar gas sa/ sosasas mas tu
266a2(dkon brtsegs): byos dkar gyi lta'o/ de tso'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed de/ dam mongo 'dus na/ rgyam mi 'a gzer ldan ces bya bar gyur // yul 'khor spyong do ma da dus n+ya rgyal bu gzhon du sa su kyi
266a3(dkon brtsegs): kyo 'od gzer bya bar gyu rang pa de bzhin gzhi gsin snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing na btsom za'am/ ming gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar myi lta'o// ngo ci'i phyir zhe rna/ do'i tshe nga'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu
266a4(dkon brtsegs): bsod rnams kyo bang gir pos bya bar gyur da / grong byer gi sa ga 'dra pa den/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya 'drungs par gyur te/ yu trar mya ngang la bas / byang chub se mas dupa sems dpa' rjo kyi
266a5(dkon brtsegs): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa dang / sdug pa dang myo sdug pa yongs su spangs pa dang / 
266a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ag yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal bu gzhan nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// ngas kyang dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob thod
266a7(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas ni de dag myi brtson pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcang gyur len pa dang / shes kyi khe la chags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyas nyon mongs pa dag gzang ba dang / 
266a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang / rab tu byung ba don myed pa dang / dge slong sun par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dang / lus dang ngag dang / sems myi drang ba dang / ltas lta ba dang / 
266b1(dkon brtsegs): sabs ne ba nor ba dang / rang gi dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na'i ched kyis sman dang / yod byad kyi mtshan ma la chags pa dang / ngo tsha myi shes pa dang / khyel myed pa dang / cho ga nyams
266b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod yul dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba
266b3(dkon brtsegs): gyurd to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas ma/ rnam pa 'ang lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rig pa myed pa// rnyed pa don tu gnyer ba dang / myi sten par myi shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
266b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal te// stabs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag myed na// snying ni thob dang shes kyi khye la song // sa byang chub yon tan brgyas 'khebs bor nas mi// de dag thob phyir
266b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi khyim la dgal// kha 'dra sdang bar khrel dang mos blo bral// shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song // nyon mongs reg lus srid pa'i 'gro ba gzhol// bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhes de skad smra// lus
266b6(dkon brtsegs): ni dgon na dran pa grong khyer du// thob phyir de dag rnam par rtog par spyod// gnam dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste// de 'dra de dag sprul dang ring du spong // de dag sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun yon tan rgyas gang
266b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba yini// mtho ris zer ras ngan pa'i lam du song // sdug pas 'phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro bar 'khyams// nga'i spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'ang bos nas// yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub pas 'di la sbyor// bskal pa
266b8(dkon brtsegs): ba mang pos rnyeng dka' ral rnyed gyis// de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid 'dir brtson gyis// gang zhig theg mchog byang chub dam pa tshang rgyar 'dod// des yis rgyal po'i de'i yon tan dran par bya// bsams te yang dag
267a1(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin tshul bzhi gnas par bya// de ltas bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags skyeng 'grub// yon tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la skyen// rang gis 'dir ni kun du shes pa bskyed par bya// snyams/ 
267a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan snying po 'di 'dra ma spangs shig/ byis pa lta bur 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyams sa re// 'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya// der gnas nas ni bdag myi bsnyems shing gzhan myi smang // sngon cang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
267a3(dkon brtsegs): mnyes ma byas// rjes su dram nas rtag par rgyun tu bdag la spyos// sus dang srog la sred pa ma chags smyung bar bya// gus pas drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par gyis// ngamis mang 'dir bslab pa bshad pa 'dir gnas na
267a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyi phyi nas byang chub rnyed myi dka'// gang dag rgyal po'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa// thos nas phyir zhing yid ni 'jug par bya bar rigs// de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya// rnam par rgyu ba'i chen phyis
267a5(dkon brtsegs): gyu ra ta re// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig pha rol phyi nad pa lnga la sbyor la// yang gang zhig/ bdag 'di la bslab po// bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang / 
267a6(dkon brtsegs): la nan tan gyis bskud na// bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gan na// brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro ste// stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / da pe dang / 
267a7(dkon brtsegs): d+hur sang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon sems mo bskyed pa'i lha dang myi dang // lA ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrig phrag sus bcu// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs ni
267a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu bskyed nas// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par myi gyur to// dge slong bdun stong ni len pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// yul
267b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying ci legs// 'di ci ltar bzung bar bgyi// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor/ 
267b2(dkon brtsegs): skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na// khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa// rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar yang zung shog/ skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol ba dang / byang
267b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam par rol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig po yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal/ 
267b4(dkon brtsegs): nas// tshe dang ldan po yul 'khor skyong dang / lha dang mya dang lha ma yin dang / dri zas bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs ste// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
267b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs // yul 'khor skyong gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste// / bcwo brgyad pa/ rdzogs ste
267b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzin myi tra dang / dan sha~M la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bar 'di ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te// skad gsar chad kyis kyang / abaces nas gtan la phab pa// 
267b7(dkon brtsegs): ga ska du/ ma mug gra thong brnam mangs rba// bad da du// 'phags pa dag yul ba gyis nus pa theg pa chen po'i mang // sangs rgyas dang bya chub sems dpa'
267b8(dkon brtsegs): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na mgor myed zas spyod kyi kun dga' ra ba ra/ dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i
268a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po byams pa dang 'jam dpal dang / ngan song spong ba dang / spyan ras gzigasas dbyang phyug dang / 
268a2(dkon brtsegs): D+yan ma ba las sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ngas/ sems gcig tu bzhugs te// de'i che bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yangs su bskor cing bdud gyis thams
268a3(dkon brtsegs): nas chos ston to// tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ ba mar bar du dge ba kha mar dge pa/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ 
268a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston te// de nas khyim bdag dag shul can g.yog lnga brgya dang / mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon myed zas
268a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ decom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das lan gsu
268a6(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de bzhin du khyim bdag gzhan rnams kyi lha 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag de ga' 'dod dang / khyim bdag grags 'dod dang / khyim bdag
268a7(dkon brtsegs): legs sbyin dang / khyim bdag dga' byed dang / khyim bdag grags sbyin dang / khyim bdag nor brdungs dang / khyim bdag tshul dga' dang / khyim bdag mgon myed zas spyan dang / khyim bdag bde
268a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' dang / de bzhin yang khyim bdag rab tu mang po rnams g.yog lnga brgya dang / mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste// rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang
268b1(dkon brtsegs): com ldan 'das ga la ba de rang ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo thos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod na
268b2(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag de dag thams cad pal cher ni g.yog dang brngas te/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges sde
268b3(dkon brtsegs): debyas pa sha stag go// de nas khyim bdag drag shul can gyis// 9/ khyim bdag gi 'khor chen po de 'dus par shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
268b4(dkon brtsegs): n+yas / pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcomaldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus
268b5(dkon brtsegs): na so zhu ba la lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ 
268b6(dkon brtsegs): dag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gastemed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdagro lho khrag shulnga can la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang to// khyim bdag khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu
268b7(dkon brtsegs): srabres byas/ khyim bdag khyod dong ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shigra dang / de ltar dros pa de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / 
268b8(dkon brtsegs): com ldan 'das la khyim bdag drag shul can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
269a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par bsgrub par 'chal ba dang / theg pa chen po la 'jug par 'jal ba
269a2(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la dam 'cha' ba dang / sems can thams cad gnyer ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa dang / sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i slad du go cha 'tshal ba dang / ma rgal ba rnams
269a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o zhes/ sems can thams cad kyi don du khur
269a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po len pa dang / 'jug pa rlabs po che chen po la rab tu gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dpag tu ma mchis/ ba thos nas// ye shes de yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du/ go
269a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi skyon mang po du ma 'tshal kyang / yid yongs myi skyo zhing / bskal pa grangs ma ma chis par 'khor yang / sems zhum par myi 'gyur ba de dag dang / 
269a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang dag khyim gi gnas nas mngon par byung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub cing // khyim myi
269a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dag dang / gang yang khyim na gnas shing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub ste/ khyim gi gnas nas mngon par myi 'byung ba dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang myi dang lha ma yin
269a8(dkon brtsegs): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di la rjesu bzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gi da rigs myi 'chang bar bgyi ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes yun ring du gnas par bgyi
269b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i yon tan rnam par gzhag pa de legs par bshad du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyir gyis la gnas nas/ 
269b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid cing // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches rnams las myi nyams// yongs su myi nyams ste/ tshe 'di la yang las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis shing / tshe gzhan du yang
269b3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag tu man mchis par 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim gi gnas nas mngon par byung ste/ sdug pa dang myi sdug pa spangs nas/ sku dang kha spu bregs de gos ngur sprugs
269b4(dkon brtsegs): bgos/ yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim ma lags par rab tu byung ba de dag/ tsa tsam du gangs pa dang / rjes su bstan pa gnyis kyis chos spyad pa dang / dge sbyong ba yang dag par rab tu bshid du/ 
269b5(dkon brtsegs): gso lang/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba sa ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ de skad ces gsolang pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdog drag shul can la 'di skad ces
269b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// khyim bdag legs so legs so// khyod la de na 'di dri bar sems pa ni khyod kyi tshul dang 'thun pa'o// de'i phyir/ legs par rab tu nyon la yod la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dang / 
269b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ji ltar bslab pa'i yon tan yang dag par gzung zhing / spyod pa mchog la gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par byangs khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol/ 
269b8(dkon brtsegs): nas// khyim bdag drag shul can/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas// 
270a1(dkon brtsegs): gagasangs rgyas la sbyangs su 'gro bar bya'o// chos la skyangs su 'gro bar bya'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o// de gsum la sbyangs su 'gro bsong ba'i dge ba'i ma de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
270a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sngo bar bya'o// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin ne na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa sangs rgyas kyi sku/ skyes bu chen po'i mthar
270a3(dkon brtsegs): sum bcum gnyis kyis legs par brgyar pa/ yongs su bsgrub par bya'o// snyam dus mas mngar bar 'du byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis/ skyes bu chen pa'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis yang dag par lung
270a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa de dag yang dag par sprul ba'i phyir// brtsom ra 'grus rlom pa de lta bu ni/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag ji ltar rje
270a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos la skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/ khyim/ bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos la gus pa/ dang bcas shing / ri mo byed pa dang bcas pa/ chos don du gnyer
270a6(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dod pa/ chos kyi kun dga' ra ba la dga' zhing mos pa/ chos la gzhol ba/ chos la 'bab pa/ chos srung ba sred cing gnas pa na chos kyi grags pa dang sbed cing gnas pa/ chos kyi spyod pa la gnas pa/ 
270a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbang du gyur pa/ chos yongs su tshol ba/ chos kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i mtshom cha dang ldan pa/ chos kyi bya ba byed pa de/ 'di lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
270a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la/ chos kyi 'og bsha' bya'o snyam du dran pa rab tu 'thob ste/ khyim bdag de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
270b1(dkon brtsegs): skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal khrom pa/ dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba chen
270b2(dkon brtsegs): ga te dge slong rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'am/ phyir myo'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ ma se'i skye bu'am/ nyan pas kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mig padu / theg brgya po
270b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag mthong na/ de de la gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas shing ldang bar brtson la/ bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa yin te/ de yang dag par song ba dang / yang dge par zhugs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byas pas
270b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / nyan thos kyi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston to/ 
270b5(dkon brtsegs): snyam du dran pa rab tu 'thob ste/ de de dag la gus pa dang bcas shing / zhes dang bcas pa yin gyi/ de dag la dga' bar ni myi byed/ de/ de ltar na khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa/ dge 'dun
270b6(dkon brtsegs): la skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa la khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin te/ gzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems myi 'dor/ 
270b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dam bcas pa'i myi 'jig pa dang / snying rje chen po yong su myi gtong ba dang / theg pa gzhan la myi dmyigs pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas la
270b8(dkon brtsegs): skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos la skyabs su song ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos smra ba'i gang gzag rnams la brten cing bsnyen te/ 
271a1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur rnyed cig sti stang byas nas chos nyan pa dang / chos thos nas tshul bzhin mo so mchog pa dang / ji sar bos pa'i chos rnams dang / ji gar khong du chung ba rnams gan du ngag la yang stor cing/ 
271a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu 'chad pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngob ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim po chos bzhi pa de dag dang
271a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ chos la skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa yang dag par skyon myed
271a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la zhugs pa rnams/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems la 'ad pa dang / gang zang zing gis sdud par byed pa de dag chos kyis bsdu ba la sbyor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyir myi ldog pa'i ngan
271a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun la rton gi// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la rton pa ma yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan yang yongs su tshol la/ de'i rnam par grol ba la mos pa yang ma yin pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems
271a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab
271a7(dkon brtsegs): tu thob pa ni/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no// chos thos nas chos rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa ni/ chos la skyabs su song ba yon no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthong nas/ byang chub kyi sems
271a8(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa ni dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa/ sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par smon cing sbyir ba sbyin pa ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su seng ba
271b1(dkon brtsegs): mam gdab pa'i chos la yang dag par srung bar byor/ sbyin baspyod dan chos la sbyangs su ston pa no// smyon pa de than myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su myong / dge 'dun la skyabs su mang 'a mo / 
271b2(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa ni skyes bu dam pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ skyes bu dran pa'i las rnams myi byed do// khyim bdag skyes bu dam pa'i las yin gyi/ skyes bu ngan pa'i las ma
271b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa rnams gang zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos kyi longs spyod tshol gyi/ chos ma yin pa myi tshol lo// mthun pas tshol gyi/ myi mthun pas ma yin no// yang dag par 'tsho ba yon gyi/ log
271b4(dkon brtsegs): pas 'tsho ba ma yin te/ de chos kyis longs spyod pa thob de yis gzhan la 'che bar myi byed do// myi rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom pa mang zhing snying po len to// 'di lta ste pha mo la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bu dang rlung ma dang / bran po
271b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bran mo dang las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams yang dag pa 'i longs spyod dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams la bkur sti dang / gong du yang chos
271b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'jud pas gtong bar 'phel byed do// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chu ba sems dpa' khyim pa ni 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad du nga po lnga'i khur khyer bas khur blangs pa khur ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom
271b7(dkon brtsegs): mo// 'di lta ste nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'amyi 'dor bas khur blangs pa khur ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems can yongs su spon par bya bas yongs su myi skye ba// bdag bde ba la myi chags pa/ sems
271b8(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa/ rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang smad pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis myo bskyed pa dang // 'jig 'arten go chos las yang dag par 'da' ba
272a1(dkon brtsegs): dang rnyed pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pas myi bsnyems pa dang / rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / brjod pa'i sgra'i ston pa myed pa la yi myi 'chang pa dang / shin tu brtags te las byed pa dang / yang dag par bsgyun
272a2(dkon brtsegs): bkun tu bsrung ba dang / log par bsgrub pa la yod mya smos pa dang / myo gnas pa'i zlas 'byung ba mthong ba dang / shing bal ga 'dab ma lta bu'i sems myed de/ ji ltar dam bcas pa yangs smra rdzogs par byed pa dang / mad
272a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya bya byed pa dang / rang gi bya ba yongs su 'dong ba dang / gzhanal bya ba la yang du par 'dogs pa myor ba dang / gnang bar byabel zhing myi ldang ba dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor dang / legs par bya ba'i las byed
272a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / dbul po rnams la longs spyod yang dag par bged pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa rnams la nga rgyal bcag pa dang / 'jigs pa rnams la myi 'jigs par dbugs 'byin pa dang / dngul po rnams
272a5(dkon brtsegs): las mya ngan gi zug rngu sel ba dang / mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing / dang du len pa dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal rnam par spong ba dang / tha ma rnams la gus pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la sten pa dang / mkhas
272a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la kun dri ba dang / lta ba drang ba dang / gso ba skyed par spyod pa dang / spu skyed pa dang / bcos ma myed par sems can bams cad la byams pa dang / dge ba gang yin ces tshol bas myo ngoms pa dang / mang du bos pa la rlon
272a7(dkon brtsegs): myi shes par byas pa dang / brtson pa rnams la yi dam brtan pa dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo dang / 'grogs pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams la cher snying rje ba dang / mdza' ba brtan pa dang / mdza' ba dang myi mdza' ba la ses
272a8(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la slobs dpon gi dpel ma khung pa myed pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston pa dang / thos pa'i don rjes su sgom pa dang / 'dod pa la dga' zhing rtse ba thams cad la myi rtag/ 
272b1(dkon brtsegs): khar 'dugs pa dang / lus la myi ltar bar 'du shes pa dang / zhing drang khyim srog la zil ba'i thigs pa ltar 'du shes pa dang / longs spyod la sgyu ma dang / smyig rgyal bur 'drigs pa dang / bu dang chung ma la sems can dmyaran
272b2(dkon brtsegs): mnar myed par 'du shes pa dang / zhing dang khyim gi las kyi mtha' dang / gos rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa la 'phongs pa'i sdug par 'du shes pa dang / yongs su tshol ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'jig par 'du shes po dang / 
272b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim gi gnas la gshed ma lta bur 'du shes pa dang / mdza' shes pa dang / yongs blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams la/ sems can dmyal ba'i srungs mar 'du shes pa dang / nyin dang mtshan du bye brag du gyur
272b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ji yid ces yongs su 'jal bar 'du shes pa dang / snying po myed pa'i lus las snying po myed pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa dang / snying po myed pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa dang / snying po myed pa'o longs spyod
272b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa yin no// de la snying po myed pa'i// lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gzhan gi bya'o chog bya'o cho ga bya bar spro ba dang / bla ma rnams la gus par sA
272b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang 'dud pa'i las byed pa ste/ 'don snying po myed pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o// de la snying po myed pa'i srog las snying po blang
272b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jugs pa gang zhe na/ gang sngor byas pa'i dge ba'i ma ba rnams yongs su phyi nyams la/ gong du yang rnam par 'phel ba ste/ 'don snying po myed pa'i srog la stong pa blang bar 'jushes pa zhes bya'o// de la stong po myeng pa'i longs su
272b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe ma ka/ khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang sna'i sems char gcod cong / gtong ba chen po'i sems 'phel bar byed cing / sbyin pa yang dag par 'ged pa ste/ 'di ni/ 
273a1(dkon brtsegs): snying po myed pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa nye bya'o// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang 'di lta bu'i skyes bu dam pa'i las 'di dag byed kyi// skyes bu ngan pa'i las
273a2(dkon brtsegs): ni ma yin no// de ltar byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nyes par brjod pa ma yin te/ rigs par smra ba yin/ chos smra ba yin no// 'di lta ste sngon bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dam bcas pa yang myi
273a3(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa yin no// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin te/ 'di lta ste bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung nas/ des srog gcod pa spang bar bya ste/ 
273a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyig pa dor ba dang / mtshon cha dor ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / srog chags 'byung po thams cad la myi mtshe ba'i rang bzhin can dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / 
273a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu byams sems la gnas par bya'o// des ma byin par len pa// spang bar bya ste/ bdag gi longs spyod kyis chog shes pa dang / gzhan gi longs spyod la mngon par dga' ba myed pa dang / chags pa
273a6(dkon brtsegs): dang brnab sems myed pa dang / gzhan gi nor la 'dod pa myed pa dang / tha na rtsa dang lo ma yang ma byin par myi blang bar bya'o// des 'dod pa log par g.yem pa spang bya ste/ rang gi rlung mas chog par 'dzin pa dang / gzhan
273a7(dkon brtsegs): gi chung ma la 'dod pa myed pa dang / ma chags pa'i myig gos lta ba dang / yid byung ba'i ying dang / 'dod pa dag mi shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du ma chags pa yid la byed pa la brtson par bya'o// gang gi tshe rang girang gi rlung ma/ 
273a8(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa zung de'i tshe yang / nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pas na/ des rang gi chung ma la myi sdug par rjes sul ba dang / skrag pa'i yid kyis 'dod pa bsten par bya'o// zhen pas zin bzhin du nim
273b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang phyi ga bdang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / myi gabang bar 'du shes pa des chonas bdag gis yid kyi dgu la yang 'dongad ba la spyad par myi byad/ mtshan nyis spang ba'am/ yang lag sa
273b2(dkon brtsegs): yin par 'jug pa lta ji smos te/ bdag gis de ltar bya'o snyam mo// des rdzun tu smra ba spang bar bya ste/ bden pa smra ba dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa dang / mya slu ba dang / bsam pa
273b3(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan par bya ste/ ji ltar mthong ba dang / thos pa smra ba dang / chos rjes su srung bar gyur pa des lus dang srog gi phyir yang shes bzhin du brdzun smra bar myi bya'o// des 'a
273b4(dkon brtsegs): chang dang sbyar ba'i 'chad myos par 'gyur ba'i chung ba srung bor bya der ro ba skyed pa dang / myos pa myed pa dang / 'drul pa myed pa dang / tshig ma 'chal ba dang / mya'i phyar ba dang / myi rgong pa dang / myi ga yung badrung / 
273b5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan par byed pa ste/ de nam bdag pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i blo 'jug cing zas 'dod pa rnams la zas/ sgom 'dod pa rnams la skom sbyin pa
273b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par bya'o snyam pa ma/ des gzhan dag la chang yang sbyin te/ 'di snyam du 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i dus yin te/ gang ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin pa'i dus la bab kyis/ bdag gis 'di ltar bya ste// gang
273b7(dkon brtsegs): dang gang la 'di ltar chang yang byin nas/ gang 'di 'khrul pa myed pa'i spyod pa la/ de dang de dag dran pa dang / shes bzhin yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug go snyam po'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ bsam pa
273b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su sbyong ba yin no// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dong / gzhan dag la chang byin yang / de bzhin
274a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyis shes par brjod pa yin pa/ khyim ngas byang chub sems dpa'i byam pades/ ba ba gni lnga bzung ba dge ba bu ba sang dag par rdzogs par byang chub
274a2(dkon brtsegs): lnga bar byed / des bslab ba'i mam lnga po dngag kya zhin tu bsrung bar byar/ grong du yang ngas cu ma kyi bya dang / khyer rnams sa ums bya / ngas ngaganub pa yang myi smra bar bya'ang / des dag 'ab bar sbya rdzo
274a3(dkon brtsegs): ba nga ba lta byur/ cig byas par yang snabar gyi bya dang / dus su sna dang / yod dan por sna ba dang / du su padang / cham s+thA dang rigs po steng / 'dus ba smra dang / / 
274a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'a bas pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed par bya'o// des brda sems su myi bya zhing / sems can thams cad la ldan pa dang / bde bar bsam par bya'o// gnad sems su myi bya zhing / rtag tu bzod pa'i
274a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyog/ cha bgro bar bya'o// de yang dag par lta bar bya zhing / log da phyin ci log tu lte ba thams cad dang bral bar bya'o// ltarasangs rgyas la bsam pa rjes su song zhing / lha gzhan myi 'dzid
274a6(dkon brtsegs): par byo'o// khyim bdag gnan yang byang chub sems dpa khyim pa/ grong 'am/ grang khyer 'am/ greng rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ sngangs kyi phyis sa gang gnas pa der / des sems can rnams la chos gis sa
274a7(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya ste/ gang dag ma dad pa de dag ni dang pa la gzung bar bya/ sems can gang dag myo gus shing / par myi 'dzin pa/ mar myi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du myi 'dzin pa/ bram zer myi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi gtso bo
274a8(dkon brtsegs): rim 'gror myi byed pa/ tshul dang myi ldan zhing / 'chams las 'das de dag/ tha ma la gus pa dang / chos spong ba la gzung bar bya'o// sems can gang dog thos banyung ba de dag mang du bos pa la sbyor ba dang / ser sa ca
274b1(dkon brtsegs): nams ni gtong ba la/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams ni tshul khrims ye/ gnod sems can rnams ni bzod pa dang des pa la/ le lo can rnams ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa la/ brjed ngas pa rnams ni dran pa dang shes
274b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin la/ 'tshal ba'i shes rab can rnams shes rang la gzung bar byer// sems can bul po rnams sangs spyod yang dag par bag bar byur// sems ca nang po rnams la spar sbyin par byar// sems can man/ 
274b3(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa rnams kyi mgom byed// sbubs byed pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / dpung nyen myed pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen bya'o// des ljongs dang spangs kyi phyogs de dag thams cad dang / ji ltar 'thun par sems can 'ga' ma
274b4(dkon brtsegs): log par ltung bar myi 'gro ba de ltar chos kyis bsrung bar bya'o// khyin da bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas lan gcig/ lan gnyis lan gsum nas lan bdun gi bar du rjes su bsdam
274b5(dkon brtsegs): khas ka/ sems can rnams yon tan dag la bkod pa las/ yon tan gang yang rung ba la gnas par ma gyur dam/ khyim bdag de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa des/ sems can de dag
274b6(dkon brtsegs): kha snying rje chen po bskyed de/ des thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sachas pa yang bgo zhing / tshig 'di skad ces tsa skyid du sems can gdul dka' ba/ dmu nod de dag yongs su sbyor bar ma gyur pa de stod du/ bdag zan
274b7(dkon brtsegs): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya'o zhes brjod par byar// de ci 'byor zhe na/ bdagra gas ni de dag gi phyir go cha bags te/ sems can drang po rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ 
274b8(dkon brtsegs): g.yo myed pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin// tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin te/ yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir bdag gos go cha ma bgos kyang / ci nas bdag gi rtsol ba don yod par 'gyur ba dang / seMs
275a1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyis bdag mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang / dad pa thob par gyur pa de ltar bya'o// de ltar bsgrub po de ltar brtson 'grus rtsom par bya'o snyam mo// khyim bdag gal de grong ngam/ grong khyer
275a2(dkon brtsegs): ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des/ phyogs der bsgral tam/ dran par ma byas te/ sems can rnams ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba zhig du skye bar
275a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa'i de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis smad pa yin no// khyim bdag 'di lta ste dper na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na
275a4(dkon brtsegs): sman pa mkhas pa zhig gnas pa des/ za na sems can 'ga' zhig gi drug zhi bar ma nus te/ 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur na/ sman pa de skye bo mang pos spang bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag de bzhin du grong ngam/ grong khyer
275a5(dkon brtsegs): ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na// byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa des/ de'i phyogasu tha na seMs/ can 'ga' tsam la yang ma skul tam/ dran par byas te/ ngan 'gro gapa
275a6(dkon brtsegs): yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis smad pa yin/ khyim bdag de bas na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ci nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong
275a7(dkon brtsegs): rdul lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa des/ bdag gyis sems can 'ga' yang log pa ltung bar 'gro bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// de ltar bsgrub bo// de ltar brtson 'grus brtsom mo// snyam
275a8(dkon brtsegs): bi'i go cha de lta bu bgo bar bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas/ khyim na gnas pa'i// nyes pa la mkhas par bar bya'o// des 'od ltar so sor bslab par bya ste/ khyim zhes bya
275b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni dono dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'jom par byed pa/ 'drung bsun 'byo du/ dge bar snang ba'i brel bar byung ba ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o// khyim na gnas pa zhes bya ba dzin ni mongs pa mas ca kyi rnam
275b2(dkon brtsegs): myi dge ba'i sa pa la rnam par dog pa rnams kyi gnas dbyos tha ma ma'i spyi bo mdul ba ma smras pa rnams kyi gnas/ myi dge bsung pa rnams kyi gnas/ skye bong na pa 'dus pa yi / de'i phyir tshum gnas pa
275b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// khyim na gnas pa zhes bya ba 'dzin sdug bsngal gyi chos thams kyi gnas shes brjod pa'o// 'do na sngon goms par byis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nyams par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir khyim na gnas pa/ 
275b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// khyim zhes bya ba 'di na ris gnas nas bya ba'i mya rigs pa byed pa'o// des gnas nas pha ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze la gus par myi 'gyur ba yin te/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o// khyim zhes bya
275b5(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni srid pa'i khro shing la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde/ ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o// khyim
275b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba 'di ni/ gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gtso ba dang / mya snyan pa dang / gshed pa dang / ngan du brjod pa de nga / ngan tu bya ba'i tshig gi lam rnams 'du ba ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o// 
275b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa myi 'dzugs pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa rnams rnam par 'jig pa'o// mkhas pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos thams cad kyis smod pa'o// 'di la
275b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa nang na 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'di la gnas pa'i 'dod chags kyi 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro'o// zhes sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba ste/ de'i phyir khyir khyim zhes bya 'o// 'di ni tshul
276a1(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi phung po kun myi srung ba'o// ting nge 'dzinang gi phung po 'dor ba'o// shes rab kyi phung po la myi 'jug pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i phung po myi 'thob pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po myi
276a2(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o// 'di la gnas pa ni pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza ba shes dang / blon po dang nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams
276a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / g.yog yongs su 'dzi nang pa la sred pa yin no// khyim na gnas pa 'di ni/ rgya mtsho la chu bran ltar dgang rkaba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni kha zas bzang po dug dang 'dres pa ltar 'dres pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni myi mdzar
276a4(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du 'thur pas ma yin pas rtag tu sdug bsngal ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni 'phags pa'i chos bsgrub pa la bar chad byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni phan tshun gi rkyen gyis 'bab pa'o// khyim na gnas/ 
276a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni gcig la gcig gnod par sems pas rtag tu myi mthun pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni legs par bya ba dang / nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' la sbyor bas gnod pa mang ba'o// khyim na gnas pa
276a6(dkon brtsegs): ni las kyi mtha' thug pa skyed pas rtag tu brtson pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni yur ring po nas bsags pa rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can gyi phyir myi rtag pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni dngos po kun du tshul zhing yongs su srung / 
276a7(dkon brtsegs): bas sdug bsngal ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni dgra ltar mya mingam rtag tu 'ag cha yong/ khyim na gnas pa ni phyin ci log gis zin pas bdag myeng ba'o// khyim na gnas pa 'ini rang gi spyod pas rnam par bsgrubs te/ ngas ni
276a8(dkon brtsegs): ston pas gar mkhan ga chen dang 'dra'o// khyim na gnas pa ni myur du phan tshun 'gyes pas mthar chud cing 'gyur ba'o// khyim na gnas po ni skye bo glo bur du 'dus pas/ rtag tung ba nyid myed pa'i phyir/ sgyu ma la lta ba dang / 
276b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni pun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang mthar chung bar 'gyur bas skyes dang / mtshungs so// khyim na gnas pa myur du bral bas zil ba'i thogs pa dang mtshungs pa'o// khyim na gnas pa
276b2(dkon brtsegs): nor bro ba chung ngus yongs su 'jal bas/ sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa dang mtshungs so// khyim na gnas pa ni gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyis yongs su gzer bas cher ma'i dra ba dang / mtshungs so// 
276b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa ni myi dge ba'i la rnam par rtog pas// yongs myi skyo ba'i phyir kha kha ba tsam gi srog chags dang mtshungs so// khyim na gnas pa ni gcig la gcig 'drang bas srog rnam par 'jog pa'o// khyim na gan/ 
276b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni sems rlog pa can du byed pas rtag tu 'khrul pa'o// khyim na gnas da ba ni rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / mye dang chu dang / mgo skal la de spyod pas rnam par 'jom pa'i phyir thun mong ba'o// khyim gnas pa ni
276b5(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmyigs mang bas ro bro ba chung ba'o// khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas khyim ra gnas pa'i nyes ba la mkhas par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
276b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim pas khyim na gnas pas sbyor ba dang gdul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa mang du bya'o// des yang 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ gang byin pa de ni bdag gi yin no// khyim na bzhag pa'i de ni bdag gi ma yin no/ 
276b7(dkon brtsegs): gang byin pa de ni stong pa can no// gang khyim na bzhag pa dri ni snying pa myed pa'o// gang byon pa de ni gzhan la bde ba'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni da ltar byung na bde ba'o// grang byin pa de ni yang bsrung bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// nga
276b8(dkon brtsegs): khyim na bzhag pa de ni bsrung bar bya'o// gang byin pa de ni sred pa zad par gyurd pa'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni srid pa rnam par 'phel ba'o// gang byin pa de ni bdag gi ba myed pa'o// khang khyim na bzhag pa de ni bdag gi dang bcas
277a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// gang byin pa de ni yongs su myi 'dzin pa'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o// gang byin pa de ni 'jigs pa myed do// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'o// gang
277a2(dkon brtsegs): byer pa de ni byang chub kyi lam rngon pa'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni zang myo shes pa'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni zad par 'gyur ba'o// gang byon pa de ni bde ba'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni kun srung dgongs pas sdug
277a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba'o// gang byir pa de ni nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba'o// gang byin na yod pa de ni nyon mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa'o// gang byon pa de ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni longs spyod chen
277a4(dkon brtsegs): bor myi 'gyur ba'o// gang byin pa de ni skyes bu dam pa'i las so// gang khyim na gnas de ni skyes bu ngan pa'i las so// gang byon pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'o// gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni byis pa'i
277a5(dkon brtsegs): skye bos bsngags pa'o// snyam du rtag par bya'o// khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas snying po blang bar bya'o// khyim// bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na/ 'du
277a6(dkon brtsegs): shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa dang / tshe rjes nas longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar 'du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar rton par 'du shes ste/ khyim bdag
277a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsu po de dag bskyed par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum skyed par bya ste/ gsum gang
277a8(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ ser sna tshar gcad pa'i 'du shes dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i 'du shes dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la lta ba'i 'du shes te/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong
277b1(dkon brtsegs): na/ 'du shes gsum po dag bskyed par byam/ khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ slong ba 'ong ma 'dushes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zheng/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zaga' ba'i ma
277b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba'i 'drugs dang / jung tsha gcang po tugs dang / rnam par sbyin pa la babyed pa'i 'dug sa/ tshum bdag kyang chub thams dpa khyim pa so spong ba ma ma nga/ gas gsus pa skye bar gyu// 
277b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong ma/ 'du shes gsum bskyeng par bya ste/ gsum gang zhem/ slong ba g.yog du 'du shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po myi gtang bar 'dzu zhes padod
277b4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa las byung bar 'du shes ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na/ 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub
277b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pas mthong na/ 'du shes gsum skyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang / byams pa bsgom pa'i 'du shes dang / gti mug la myi 'jug pa'i 'du shes
277b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong ma/ 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag 'dzi ltar byang chub sems dpa' mthong na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti/ 
277b7(dkon brtsegs): mug srab mor 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas / mthong na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe nga sdang dang / gti mug srab mor 'gyur zhe na/ gang de'i dngos po de la btang snyoms shing yongs su gtong
277b8(dkon brtsegs): 'ang ra/ de'i 'dod chags srab pa'o// gang spong ba de dag byams pa nye bar sgrub papa 'di rozhe spang srab pa'o// gang dngas pa byod nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'dir de'i gti mug spang / 
278a1(dkon brtsegs): khyim ba ga sar dbyung chub sems dpas byas pas byung ba mdang / 'ad nags dang / de sang dang / rmugs ma pa gyu/ khye bdagagazha yang byung chu sems dpa rgyu smra
278a2(dkon brtsegs): kha rolang du phyinang pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas dngos dngo gang yang rung zhig bslabs ma thag tu dngos po de la sems kyis 'dzin par myi byed de// de ltar
278a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang byang chub kyi sems dpa' khyim pos dang las rten nas yongs su gtong ste/ de ltar na de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgom pa yongs su
278a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang slong ba de dag la byams pa nye bar sgrub ste/ myo 'khro zhing gnod sems myi byed de/ de ltar na de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// g.yede byon ma
278a5(dkon brtsegs): spang snyam du 'ang ltar sems dpa' g.yo bas sum pa myed de/ de ltar na de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lang tu phyining ba bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang slong ba la byin te byin nas kyang gdung babyed
278a6(dkon brtsegs): cing 'gyor pa myed pa yin/ gong du yang dga' zhing rab tu mgu ste/ bde ba dang yod dade bskye zhing gang byang chub sems dpa' la gnas nas gto ste/ de ltar na de'i bsam gtan gi pa ro lang tu phyind pa bsgom pa songs
278a7(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// byon nas kyang gang chos thams cad myi dmyigs shing / rnam par smin pa las myo ste/ ji ltar mkhas pa de dag chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa myed pas/ bla na myed pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i rtsa/ 
278a8(dkon brtsegs): chub du sngo ste/ de ltar na de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyu ro// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na/ pha rol du phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs pa 'gyuro// 
278b1(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis po'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas rjes su chags pa dang / khong 'gro
278b2(dkon brtsegs): pa myed pas 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad la mnyam pa nyid thob par bya'o// des longs spyod rnyed dam/ bu rnyed dam/ nor rnyed dam/ 'bru rnyed kyang khyengs par yang myi bya/ dga' bar yang myi bya/ thams cad ma 'byor kyang / des
278b3(dkon brtsegs): shum par yang myi bya/ yi mug par yang myi bya/ des 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ 'dus byas thams cad ni sgyu ma byas pa/ rnam par bsgrubs so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do// 'di lta ste pha ma dang bu dang / chung ma dang
278b4(dkon brtsegs): bran po dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gis nyen mtshams de dag ni las kyi rna ma par smin pas grub pa yin te/ de dag kyang bdag gi ma yin/ bdag
278b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dag gi ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha ma las stsogs pa de dag/ ni mgon nam/ skyabs sam/ dpung gnyen nam/ gnas sam/ gling ngam/ bdag gam bdag gi ma yin no// gang bdag gi zin pa'i phung po
278b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag kyang bdag ma yin/ bdag gi ma yin na/ gang bdag gi pha ma las stsogs pa de dag/ bdag dang bdag gir 'gyur ba dang / bdag kyang de dag gi yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
278b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang las bdag gir bya ba/ las kyi mgo skal la spyod pa yin te/ las dge ba 'am/ sdig pa 'am/ gang dang gang byas pa de dang / de nyid kyi bgo skal la spyod par 'gyur/ de dang de nyid kyi 'bras bu so sor myong ngo // 
278b8(dkon brtsegs): de dang de nyid kyi rnam par smin pa spyod do// 'di dag las kyang bdag gir bya ba/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa yin te/ las dge ba 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ gang dong gang byas pa de dang de nyid bgo skal la spyod par 'gyur/ 
278b9(dkon brtsegs): de dang de nyid kyi 'bras bu so sor myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi phyir myi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/ 'di dag ni 'ang tshe 'di la bde ba'i bdag gir bya ba yon gyi/ tshe gzhan la bde ba'i bdag gi ra
279a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni ma yin no// bdag gi gang yin pa de la bdag 'jug par byas/ 'ad lta ste skyon po dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bag yod pa dang / byang
279a2(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag sdud cing mngon par sgrub pa'i dge ba de ni bdag giyon te/ gang du bdag 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam der 'di dag kyang 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de srog gi phyir ram/ bu dang chung ma'i phyir yang sdig pa'i las
279a3(dkon brtsegs): mang par 'du myi byed de// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa des ka rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum skyed pa bya ste/ gsum gang zhen/ myi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / 'gyur ba'i 'dugs gsum bskyed par
279a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ni dga' zhing rtse ba'i grogs yin gyi/ 'jig rten pha rolar gyi grogs ni ma yin no// 'di ni bza' ba dang / gtung ba'i grogs yin gyi/ 'di las kyi rnam par smin pa'i myong ba'i grogs ni ma yin no
279a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bde ba'i grogs yin gyi/ 'di sdug bsngal gi grogs ni ma yin no// snyam ste khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang / ga chung ma la 'du shes gsum po de dog bskyed par bya'o// khyim bdag
279a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gang gsum gang zhe na/ myi gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / dri nga bar 'du shes pa dang / myi mthun par 'du shes pa dang / khyim
279a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gang gsum gang zhe na/ dgrar 'du shes pa dang / gshed mar 'du shes pa dang / phyir dgol bar 'du shes pa dang / khyim
279a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sha za mor 'du shes pa dang / srin mor 'du shes dang / gzugs myi sdug pa re 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag
279b1(dkon brtsegs): gan yang byang chub sems dpal khyim pas/ rang gi drung ma la du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsuMm gang zhe na/ dbang dag 'jugs pa dang / gdu 'dugs pa dang / byas pa rtsig na pa jugs so'o// khyim bdun du nga
279b2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi rdung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bye ste/ gang gsus gang zhen/ sems pa na dbyi bar gro bar drugs pa dang / dung rgyam sa dngas su gro bar drugs pa dang / gso
279b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'dugs gsum skyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ khur du 'dushes pa dang / srid par 'dushes pa dang / sring ba
279b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin par 'dushes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'dugs gsum bskyod par byas/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi ma yin par 'jugs pa dang / yongs su 'dzin bskyed
279b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'du shes pa dang / brnyan mar 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum skyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'i
279b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas su 'du shes pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyod pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa dang / yid kyis nyes par 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum
279b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa'o// khyim
279b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gags yang byang chub sems dpang byim bas/ rang 'i chung ma la 'dushes sa sus bsrung bar bya ste/ gsun gang zhe na/ rgyad du 'dugs pa dang / gsos par zhushes pa dang nga bar dushes so// khyim bdag ga
280a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas// rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ tshul khrims bar du gcad par 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin par du gcang par 'du shes pa dang / shes
280a2(dkon brtsegs): rab bar du gcad par 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ khog cher 'du shes pa dang / snyir 'du shes pa dang / 
280a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyur 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ yams kyi nang du 'du shes pa dang / gnod semasu 'du shes pa'o// khyim
280a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'thab par 'du shes pa dang / byur du 'du shes pa dang / ser bar 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan
280a5(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsu skyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ nang du 'du shes pa dang / na/ bar 'du shes pa dang / 'chi bar 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang
280a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdud du 'du shes pa dang / bdud la rten par 'du shes pa dang / 'jigs par 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag
280a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mya ngan du 'du shes pa dang / smre sdigs 'don par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug par
280a8(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ srung mo chen mor 'du shes pa dang / chu sran chen mor 'du shes pa dang / byil chen por 'du
280b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum skyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sbrul nag mor 'du shes pa dang / chu srin byis pa gsod du 'du shes pa dang / mdangs
280b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrog par 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa 'a khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'dugs gsum bskyed bar bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mags myed par 'dushes pa dang / skyabs byed pa bdunas dang / gnas
280b3(dkon brtsegs): myed par 'du shes pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ gang bar 'du shes pa dang / bri bar 'du shes pa dang / na bar 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag
280b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ chos rkun du/ 'du shes pa dang / bcom bsrungs su 'du shes pa dang / sems can dmyal
280b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i srungs mar 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub se mas dpa' khyim pas// rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskye nga bar bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ chu bor 'du shes pa dang / sbyor bar 'du shes
280b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mdud par 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas ka rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gang gsum gang zhe na/ 'dum du 'du shes pa dang / chags par 'du shes pa dang / 
280b7(dkon brtsegs): grong du 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ zag par 'du shes pa dang / khong sbrul du 'du shes pa dang / rlung du 'du shes pa'o// 
280b8(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi rlung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mye ma mur du 'dushes pa dang / ca skye'i smon ma lta bur 'dushes pa dang / chu dri lta bur 'dugs pa/ 
281a1(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa ga 'am sang byang chu sems dpa pas/ nga gyi nangs su sa thas bad pa sgyu/ gsas ku nas/ don da par mashes pa dang / dam gas su
281a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum skyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ lhag par smre 'dogs par 'du shes pa dang / lhag pa kun tu gas pa'o
281a3(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'du shes pa dang / lhag par chags par 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ shar gnyer bar
281a4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa dang / chad pas gcod par 'du shes pa dang / mtshon cha 'dzin par 'du shes pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim bas/ rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum skyed par bya ste/ gsum
281a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'gyed par 'du shes pa dang / rtsod par 'du shes pa dang / rtsod par 'du shes pa dang / 'tshang 'dru bar 'du shes pa'o// khyim dang / nyeg gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ rang gi chung ma la
281a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ myi sdug pa dang / phrad pa'i 'du shes pa dang / nyam nga ba'i 'du shes pa'o// mdor na thab mo'i dri mir 'du shes pa dang / thab mo'i'i rnyog pa thams cad du 'du shes pa dang / 
281a7(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa thams cad nur gyur bar 'dugs pa dang / myi dge thams cad kyi rtsa bar 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pas/ 'du skyes yid la byed du'ang go rlung ma ldanas
281a8(dkon brtsegs): bar byor// khyim bdag gan yang byang chu sems dpa' khyim pas/ phul lhag par mug pa ni sems bskyed par bya'o// khyim bdag gi 'di ngas bu la thug pa'i sems bskyed la/ de bzhin du sems can gzhan lam yin na
281b1(dkon brtsegs): des skyo ba gsu gyis rang gyi sems la skyo bar bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ byang chub ni sems snyom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon gi/ sems myi snyoms pa'i ma yin no// byang chub ni yang dag par sbyor ba'i byang chub
281b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' yon gi/ log par sbyor ba ni ma yin no// byang chub ni dad pa myed par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin gi/ tha dad du spyod pa ni ma yin pa ste/ sbyor ba gsum po de dag gis rang gi sems la spyos nas/ 
281b3(dkon brtsegs): bu de la myi sdug pa'i 'du shes par bya'o// 'di ni myi sdug pa ste/ bdag gi snyam du sdug po yin na/ gang bdag gis de'i don du bu de la ni ldog par sdug pa bskyed la/ sems can gzhan la ni de lta ma yin na/ sangs rgyas
281b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bka' stsa lang ba'i bslab pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// bdag gi sa de'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang gnod par byas/ srog la yang brag myed de/ gnod par gyur pas 'di ma 'i dag la gnod pa myed pa'o// 
281b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag de'i phyir byang chub kyi lam dang myi mthun pa'i lam la spyod pas 'di ni bdag la phyir myi rgol ba'o snyam du 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o// des bu de rgyur byas te/ ji lta ji lta bur bu de la/ 
281b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug par sems pa dang ldan pa bzhin du/ sems cam thams cad la byas pa bskyed pa dang / bdag 'phangs par sems pa dang ldan pa bzhin du byams pa spyod pa de lta de ltar bur des sems bskyed par bya'o// des yang
281b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od ltar 'di yang gud nas 'ongs la/ bdag kyang gud nas 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can thams cad kyang sngon bdag gi bur gyur la/ bdag kyang sems can thams cad kyi bur gyur te/ 'di la ni bdag gi 'am/ gzhan
281b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'am/ su'i sems gang yang myed do// snyam du tshul bzhin brtag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi 'thun pa'i phyir te/ 'gro ba lnga rnams su mdza' ba las kyang myi mdza' bar 'gyur bas/ bdag ni ji ltar su dang yang mdza' ba/ 
282a1(dkon brtsegs): nam/ myi mdza' bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi mdza' ba bzung na ni/ thams cad kyi thams cad du byed myi 'dod par 'gyur// mdza' ba bzung na ni/ ha cang byed 'dod par 'gyur te/ 
282a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes surnags pa dang / khang khro ba sems gnyis kyis nachos seM pa 'i phying bdung bar byed kyi nus ma ka/ tso'i phyir nan/ myi mnyam par spang ba'i phyimakhas pa'i ma bar 'gyur/ mnyam par skyed par mi
282a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'o// de la bdag gis ni myi mnyam par spyod pa myi bya'o// sems can thams cad la mnyam par spyad na/ thams cad mkhyend pa khong du chud par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyir
282a4(dkon brtsegs): pas/ dngos po gang la yang bdag gi snyam du sems su bzung bar myi bya chags par myi bya'o// g.yo dang sred pa'i bag la nyal myi bya'o// da khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa'i drung du slongs pa
282a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs la/ dngos po zhig bslangs pa las/ gal te des dngos pom btang na/ des 'jo ltar dngos ma bdang na/ des 'di ltar dadzus bo 'di btang yang rung / ma btang yang rung ste/ bdag ni dngos po
282a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dri pa mngon mi za bar 'bral bar yang 'gyur myi 'dod bzhir du/ 'chi bar yang 'gyur zhing / dngos po 'das kyang bdag 'dor bdag gis kyang dngos po 'dir 'dor gyi/ dngos po 'di btang ba dang / yid dga' ba dang / 
282a7(dkon brtsegs): snying po blangs te/ 'chi ba'i dus bya'o// 'di yongs su btang na yang bdag 'chi'i dus kyi tshe/ sems kyi nanas zin te/ gnas par myi 'gyur/ 'dis ni bdag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga'
282a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rangs pa dang / 'gyod pa myed par skye bar 'gyur snyam du nges par smra bar bya'o// gal te de ltar bsams kyang dngos po de gtong kum nus na/ de slong ba la kun go bar bya ba gsum gyis bgo bar bya ste/ bdag
282b1(dkon brtsegs): chung dang / ngan pa mangs su brnya / ses pa can pa las dang sa pa gan phyog la thams kyi snang du nga / ra ma pa sa
282b2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa la gnas pa lags kyis/ skyes bu dam pa bzod par mdzad cing / yongs su gdung bar myi mdzad du gsal// ji ltar khyod dang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs
282b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bgyi'o// de ltar bsru po// de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam mo zhes/ khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ spong ba kun go bar bya ba gsum gis go bar bya'o// khyim
282b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas khyim na gnas pas// rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas par bya ste/ gal te de ston pa 'das pa'i gsung rab yod la/ sangs
282b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'byung ba yang myed/ chos ston pa yang myed/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang phrad pa yang myed par gyur na/ des phyogs bcu'i/ sangs rgyas phyag bya ste/ gang de dag sngon gyi spyod pa dang / mtshungs
282b6(dkon brtsegs): bar spyod pa dang / dge pa spyod pa dang / bsam pa dang / lhag ma'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub thob pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su grub pa de des rjes su dran por bya// rdzas su sa/ 
282b7(dkon brtsegs): rang bar bya'o// des yang 'od ltar nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang / gtsang ba dang / bsam pa dag
282b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byams pa bsgom pa la mkhas pa dang / gos gtsang ma dang / jo tsha shes shing // khrel yod pas legs par brgyan pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsegs pa dang / mdzes pa dang / byang chub
283a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems la rab tu dga' ba dang / nges pa dang / 'grogs na bde ba dang / legs par byed pa'i las byed pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / bka' lo bde ba dang / nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / drags/ 
283a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yang dag par chad par myi dge ba'i las kyi nyes pa thams cad bshags pa dang / phyin cad kyang bsdam pa dang / bsod nams thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang / mtshan bsags pa rab tu rdzogs par bya
283a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba 'dab pa dang / chos thams cad gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa rnams su tshe yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ phung
283a4(dkon brtsegs): po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kha thon du bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas// yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen par gnas par blang bar bya'o// des dge slong
283a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa rnams la bsnyen par bya/ bsten par bya// bsnyen bkur bya'o// de dag la bsnyen cing / bsten ste/ bsnyen
283a6(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed cing / spyod pa 'khrul pa myed par rang gi nyes pa mthong b.rabya'o// des dge slong gi spyod pa las nyams pa'i dge slong mthe ngan yang / myi gus pa'i bag chung zad kyang myi s+ya ste/ 'di ltar
283a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyog pa myed pa nyon mongs pa pa'i rnyog pa thams cad dang bral ba de'i dur smrig ni tshul khrims kyis yongs su sgom pa/ ting nge 'dzin
283a8(dkon brtsegs): dang shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba'i dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su sgom pa/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi drang srong gi rgyal mtshan yin no snyam du/ sems skyed par bya'o// 
283b1(dkon brtsegs): des de dag parab tu gus pa bskyed nas/ dge slong de la snying rjechen po bskyed par bya'o// sdig par spyad pa 'ang ni ma lags so// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa 'dzin pa lags so// di ltar bcom ldan
283b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa dul ba/ zhi ba smras pa/ tsong shes pa de'i drang srong rgyal mtshan bgos kyang / 'don ma byang ma zhom smras/ mdul ba ste/ cing shes pam
283b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i spyang bsrung da// banam ldan 'das des ma bslabs pa la/ ma brnyes zhig ces gsungs pas na/ 'dis nyes pa ma yon gi/ nyen mongs pa glang gis myo dge ba/ 'di dag sbyor ba'i nyi mongs zhes so/ 
283b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni 'byung ba dang bcas pa ya/ na zhes/ gang nyon mongs pa 'dri dag khong du chud nas/ tshul de bzhin so sor tog na/ dang po 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te// de zla
283b5(dkon brtsegs): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur pa'i gnas yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ ye shes kyis bsal ba yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
283b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gis gang zag la chod gzung bar myi bya ste/ gang zag gis gang zag la tshong bzung na/ nyams par 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rab tu mkhyend pa/ bdag ni rab tu shes pa ma
283b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no snyam nas/ des dge slong de la gnod sems myed pa dang / zhe sdang myed pa dang / khong khro myed pa dang / 'khro ba myed pa 'am bskyed par bya'o// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpal khyim de/ gtsug lag tu 'jug par
283b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod na/ cang shes kyi sems dang / las su rung ba'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / zhe sa dang bcas pa dang / dad pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pas gtsug lag khang gi sgor 'dug ste/ gtsug lag khang
284a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yan lag lngas phyag byas la/ de nas gdong gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'gro bar bya'o// des yang 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i gnaso// mtshan ma myed pa la gnas par
284a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa myed pa la gnas pa dang / byams pa dang / shing rje dngapa dag ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa'i gnas so// bsam gtan brnams kyi gnas te/ gnas thams kyang yang dag par nad pa rnams kyiganas po'i
284a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni yang dag par spang ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi gnas so// bdag kyang rdul gyi gnas khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ste/ nam zhig na/ 'di lta bu spyod par 'gyur// bdag kyang nam zhig chag
284a4(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gi las dang / gso sbyong gi las dang / bdag bya ba'i las dang / 'dud pa'i las de la gnas par 'gyur snyam nas/ des 'di ltar rab tu byung ba'i sems la dga' bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' khyim la gnas te/ 
284a5(dkon brtsegs): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni gang yang myed de/ de dag thams cad kyang khyin/ gi gnas nas mngon par byung nas/ dgon pa la sems/ dgon pa
284a6(dkon brtsegs): la gzhol/ dgon par song nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// tshogs de yang yang dag par bsgrubs so// khyim na gnas pa ni kun tu gnod pa
284a7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rdul 'bab pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang / de'i nyan thos rnams kyis bsngags pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni nyes pa'i skyon chags pa mang ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa mang ba'o// khyim
284a8(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa ni nyam nga ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni bag yangs pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i dri ma can no// rab tu byung ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol lo// khyim na gnas pa ni nyes par spyod pa'i gzhi
284b1(dkon brtsegs): 8/ sbyin na gnas pa ni dul gyi nang na gnas pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni rdul gi nang na myi gnas pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni 'dod pa'i dam du bying ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni 'dod pa'i 'das nas 'byir ba'o// khyimar gangs pa'i sa
284b2(dkon brtsegs): ma ba'i thugs pa'o// rab tu byung ban skye bo mkhas pa'i zhugs par// khyim na gnas pa tsho ba srung bar dka' ba'o// rab tu byung ba'i 'tsho ba smyung bar sla ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni 'gyur zlumang bal// dung du byung ba ni babyung
284b3(dkon brtsegs): zla myed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni 'phongs pa mang ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni 'phongs pa myed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni mya ngan gi gnas so// rab tu byung po ni dga' ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni ngan song gi them smras so// rab tu byung bani
284b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mtho ba'i thim skas so// khyim na gnas pa ni bcings pa'o// da rab tu byung ba ni thar pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni 'jigs pa myed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni
284b5(dkon brtsegs): chad pa dang bcas par spyod pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni chad pa myed par spyod/ pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni mtshon cha'i spyod pa dang bcas pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni mtshon cha myi spyod pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni yongs su
284b6(dkon brtsegs): gdang ba dang bcas pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni yongs su gdung ba myed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni kun tu tshol bas sdug bsngal ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni kun tu tshol ba myed pas bde'o// khyim na gnas pa ni rgod pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni nye bar zhi
284b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jo// khyim na gnas pa ni 'jungs pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni myi 'ardungs pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni zhan pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni myi zhan pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni ma rabs so// rab tu byung ba ni ya rabs so// khyim na gnas pa ni kun tu
284b8(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba'o// ga tu byung ba ni bar bzhi ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni gzhan gi don no// rab tu byung ba ni gnyi ga'i don to// khyim na gnas pa ni rim chung ba'o// rang tu byung ba/ ngan che ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ri ga'i chung ba'o// ba tu
285a1(dkon brtsegs): ma / tsum gnas pan kun nas can mos byas dru sa // gang byung ba sa dpar rlung sru // khyim na gnas pa sna // na nga
285a2(dkon brtsegs): ma ra gnas zin nas chung du dang phran pa'i// rab tu byung ba ni mas chen po ldan par// khyim na gnas pa mi khrus pa ma yin pabyed pa ni// deb byung ba'i dul babyed pa 'o// khyim na gangs zin 'byung ba'o/ 
285a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ni myi 'gyod pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni mchi ma dang nu zho dang / khrag gi rgya mtsho 'phel ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni mchi ma dang / nu zho dang khrag gi rgya mtsho skems pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
