285a4(dkon brtsegs): hatan+ta thos kyis spang ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyis bsngags pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni chog myi shes pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni chog shes pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni
285a5(dkon brtsegs): zudung dga' ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni bdud mya ngan byed pa'o// khyim nag/ nas pa ni rnyog pa chen po'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni rnyog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mthar thug pa
285a6(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa ni kun tu thul ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni kun tu myi rdul 'o// khyim na gnas pa ni bran gi las byed pa'o// rab tu byung ni rje bo byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni 'khor ba'i mthar 'gyur/ 
285a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 'gyur ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni g.yang sa'o// rab tu byung ni g.yang sa las 'das pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni mung+ga o// rab tu byung ba ni snang ba'o// khyim na gnas/ 
285a8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni dbang po la dbang myi byed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni dbang po la dbang byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni dregs pa skyed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni dregs pa 'dul ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni dam pa ma yin pa skyed pa'o// 
285b1(dkon brtsegs): rab du byung ba mi ngam pa skyed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni ngar song skyed pa'o// rab tu bya ni bde 'gro skyed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni blta bar myi 'os pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni blta bar 'os pa'o// khyim na gnas
285b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rtsom pa che ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni rtsom pa chung ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni brtsalha chung ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni 'bras bu che ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni gya gyu can no// rab tu byung ba ni drang ba'o// khyim na gnas/ 
285b3(dkon brtsegs): ma ni yid myi bde ba mang ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni yid bde ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni zug rngu dang bcas pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni zug rngu phyung ba'o// khyim na gnas na gnas pa ni che ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni nad myed par
285b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni chos rkos par byed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni dar ba byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni bag myed pa'o// rab/ tu byung ba ni bag yod par byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni 'chal pa
285b5(dkon brtsegs): 'i shes rab kyi 'byung gnas so// rab tu byung ba ni shes rab 'phel ba 'o// khyim na gnas pa ni shes rab kyi bar chad byed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni shes rab kyi srog byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni slu
285b6(dkon brtsegs): khar so sor nye bar gnas pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni myi slu bar so sor nye bar gnas pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni byed pa mang ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni byed pa ni nyung ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni dug dang bcas pa'i btung ba lta/ 
285b7(dkon brtsegs): 'o// rab tu byung ba ni bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i bdung ba lta bu'o// khyim na gnas pa ni gnod pa can no// rab tu byung ba ni gnod pa med no// khyim na gnas pa na 'dres pa'o// rab tu byung ba ma 'dres pa'o// khyim na gnas pa/ 
285b8(dkon brtsegs): no kim ka'i 'bras bu lta bu'o// rab tu byung ba ji bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu lta bu'o// khyim na gnas pa ni mo sug pa dang phrad par byed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni sug pa dang bral/ 
286a1(dkon brtsegs): ga par byed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni sdug pa dang phrad par byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni gti mug gis spo ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni ye shes kyis yang ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni sbyor ba rnam par 'jig pa'o// rab tu
286a2(dkon brtsegs): bani sbyor ba rnam par sbyod ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni dpung gnyen myed par byed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni dpung gnyen byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni mgon myed par byed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni mgon byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni
286a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas myed par byed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni gnas byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni skyabs myed par byed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni skyabs byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni gnod sems mang ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni byams pa mang

286a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni nyon mongs pa myed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa'o// rab tu byung ba mi zang zing myed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal myed pa'o
286a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa ni nor snying por byed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni yon tan snying por byed pa'o// khyim na gan/ sa pa ni yams kyi nang do// rab tu byung ba ni yams kyi nang zhi bar byed pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni 'bri ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni 'phel

286b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ni rgyun las zlog pa ste 'gro'o// khyim na gnas pa ni chu ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni gzings so// khyim na gnas pa ni mongs pa'i chu'o// rab tu byung ba ni bam pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni tshu rol gyi ngos so// rab tu byung ba ni pha mangs

286b4(dkon brtsegs): ni zab ma'o// khyim na gnas pa ni grogs mod pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni grogs dkon pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni chung ma dang 'grogs pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni mos pa dang 'grogs pa'o// khyim na gnas pa ni rgyu dang 'dra ba'o// rlung
286b5(dkon brtsegs): na ba'i rgya chu ba // khyis nAgangs pa'i gzhan ra / pagams su kyil / ra gyu bajiga'an gas/ ga ces sa sri pa // khyi na gnas pa'i rang 'dzin sbyin parjod che
286b6(dkon brtsegs): ther/ rab tu byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rgyam mtshan 'dzin pa'o// khyim ma'i nas pa ni sdug bsngal gyi gzhi'o// rab tu byung ba ni sdug bsngas gi gzhi yang dag par 'jom pa'o// skom na gnas pa ni spong po 'phel ba'o// 
286b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba ni phung po thams cad nges par 'dor ba'o// khyim na gnas pa ni thibs pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni thibs pa po las thar pa yon te/ khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rab tu byung ba la gzhol bar bya
286b8(dkon brtsegs): des yang 'di ltar gal te bdag gis nyi ma du mar gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mchod sbyin byas te/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba byas pa de dag thams cad ni// legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba'i
287a1(dkon brtsegs): yang sbyin pa sbyin par byed / nga 'ang sbyor bani dmam pa yin no// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa 'khyim pas/ 'di ltar bdag gis spyo pa'i snying bas chag par myi b+ha mi bdug gis chu ga khrings dang / sa pa
287a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par spyod pa yang snying por bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya// de bcug ldang du 'ongs nas/ dro ba ni ma gshegs pa'i mtshan ma lo brag 'tshal// de dag phyag byos nas 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsung
287a3(dkon brtsegs): nga she na/ bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar mdzad pa'i 'os su 'gyur bor/ bya ba dang / sems cam la snying sa pa'i phyir bdag gi lus kyang byin kyis brlabs pa dang / bdag ci ltar myur du bla na myong ba yang dag
287a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mya ngon las 'das pas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya de ltar slo
287a5(dkon brtsegs): cing / de ltar nam tan bya'osam pa'o// gtsug lag khang du zhugs na/ des dge slong mang du thos pa ni gang zhe/ dge slong chos brjod pa ni gang / dge slong 'dul ba 'dzin pa gang / dge slong ma mo 'dzin pa gleng / dge slong byang chub
287a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa ni gang / dge slong dgon pa pa ni gang / bsod snyoms pa ni gang / phyag dar khrod pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa ni gang / dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa ni gang
287a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong bsam gtan pa ni gang / dge slong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ni gang / dge slong lag gi bla ni gang / dge slong zhal ta byed pa ni gang / dge slong dpon sna byed pa ni gang / yin zhes dge slong gi dge 'dun gi spyod pa
287b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la rnas par rtog par bya'o// des reg gi sreng pal rnam par rtags pas/ thams cang dang 'thun par jug pa'i phyir/ ci rigs par 'jur par gnas par bya'o// des gzhan gi mthun du spyod bga' na bas
287b2(dkon brtsegs): myi bya'o// de tso'i phyir zhe na/ gtsug lag khang du ni grong gi gi sang ngo // grong du ni gtsug lag khang gi gsang ngo // ngag gi las shin du bsdams pa dis/ grong du gtsug lag khang gi gsang bu dang / gtsug log khang du grung gis
287b3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyad par myi bya'o// dge slong gang chos gos ma tshang 'am/ lhung bzed ma tshang ba 'am/ na ba'i gse sman dang / yo byad ma tshang ba de la des ji ltar gzhan dag gshe ba 'am/ 'gro ba skyed par myi 'gyur ba de ltar sbyin par bya'o// 
287b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyi ri zhe na/ lha dang myi rnams kyi kun tu sbyor ba ni/ phrag dag dang / ser sna yin te/ de bas ni so so skye bo rnams la ni rab tu srung ba'i phyir/ dgra bcom pa la ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so'i skye bo rnams las ni
287b5(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa skye'i/ bgra bcom pa rnams la na ma yin no// de bas nam rkeng du thos pa la sten te/ zos pa yongs su btsal ba la brtson par bya'o// chos brjod pa la bsten te/ rnam par nges pa'i gdam
287b6(dkon brtsegs): la brtson par bya'o// chos brjod pa la bsten te/ rnam par nges pa'i gtam la brtson par bya'o// 'dul ba 'dzin pa la bsten te/ nyes pa 'dul ba dang / nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la brtson par bya'o// ma/ 
287b7(dkon brtsegs): mo 'dzin pa la sten te/ lus dang ngag dang yid sdom pa la brtson par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa la bsten te/ pha rol tu phyinang pa drug dang / thabs mkhas pa la brtson par bya'o// dgon pa la bsten
287b8(dkon brtsegs): te/ rab tu dben pa la brtson par bya'o// bsod snyoms pa la bsten te/ rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis myi sgul bar brtson par bya'o// phyag
288a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug/ dang khrod pa la bsten te/ chos kyis cha dang / rgyan la mngon par myi dga' ba la brtson par bya'o// 'dod pachung ba la brtson par bya'o// chog shes pa la bsten te/ chog shes pa la brtson par bya'o// rang tu/ 
288a2(dkon brtsegs): dben pa la brtson par bya'o// rab tu dben pa la bsten te/ rab tu dben pa la brtson par bya'o// rnal 'byor spyod pa la bsten te/ nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / nang du
288a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag 'jog pa la brtson par bya'o// bsam gtan pa la bsten te/ nyon mongs pa bsal ba la brtson par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la bsten te/ smyon pa dang / snyan par smad dang / don spyod pa dang / don dru
288a4(dkon brtsegs): kha dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pa rnams la brtson par bya'o// lag gi zla la bsnyen te/ ji ltar dngos po yongs su gtong bar spro ba la brtson bya'o// zhal dbyed po la bye sten te/ bya'o chog byed pa la brtson par bya'o// dben
288a5(dkon brtsegs): sna byed pa la bsten te/ yod yongs su myi skyo bar bya'o// khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas/ spyod pa ji ltar ba bzhin du rjes su 'jug pa la brtson par bya'o// dge
288a6(dkon brtsegs): slong gang yang dag pa skyon myed pa la ma zhugs pa/ chos gos rgya sdud pa 'am/ lhung bzed kyis sdud pa byed na/ des dge slong bla na myang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
288a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zang zing gis sdud pas/ chos kyi bsdu ba bskyed pa gnas yod pa'i phyir ro// khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas dge sbyong gi spyod pa la
288a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas par bya'o// des yang dge sbyong myo 'dum pa rnams kyi sdums kyang bya'o// dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa na/ des srog kyang yongs gtong zhing dam pa'i chos kun tu gzung bar bya'o// khyim bdag gang / 
288b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas/ dge slong na ba zhig mthong na/ des rang gi sha dang khrag kyis kyang / dge slong de nad de las gso bar bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gtong zhing sbyin
288b2(dkon brtsegs): bas gzhan dag mgron du gnyer bar bya ste/ byin nas kyang 'gyod pa'i sems myi bskyed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi sngon du yang / byang chub kyi sems 'gro bar bya'o// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'/ 
288b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim tha khyim gos la gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin byed po yin te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las myi nyims yongs su myo nyams so// tshe 'di la yang kha na ma tho ba 'o las myed cing
288b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du yang bye phrag du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag drag/ shul can dang / khyim bdag gzhan de dag kyis kyang mgrin gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
288b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolen to// bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim na gnas pa'i nyes pa dang / sdom pa yang spyod pa dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan gi phan
288b6(dkon brtsegs): yon 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'dir khyim na gnas pa la/ nyes pa'i sbyin chags pa ji snyed pa dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon mtha' yas pa mngon gsum
288b7(dkon brtsegs): du gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams rab tu byung ste/ bde bar gshegs pas legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol// de skad gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
288b8(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag rnams rab tu 'byung ba ni 'byung bar dka' ste/ spyod pa shin tu rnam par dag par bsgrub par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsald pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khyim
289a1(dkon brtsegs): par gsog ba gcag bcam lam ngas byom bstan pa la nam na gyis bsgru par 'chaba'o// cam ldas 'das kyis byam padag de dag larab tu byung ba'i sabs bya ste/ de nas pamami smra pa sa byas bya
289a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dra pa' byams pa dang pa byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag pa 'di skad ces bka' su lang ngo to// skyes bu dam pa khyer gnyis kyis khyim bdag 'di rnams rab tu byung le/ bsnyen pa rdzogs
289a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas khyim bdag dgu stong rab tu byung ngo // byang chub sems dpal spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag par ni/ khyim bdag bdun stong rab
289a4(dkon brtsegs): tu phyung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i rgyun bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni/ srog/ chags stong du tshang ba dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du

289a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i khyim pa rnams kyi khyim kyis dang / khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa dag ni bshad lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bar
289a7(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa rnams kyi/ rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos dang / sbyangs pa'i yor tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / spyod pa dang / cho ga phun sum tshogs pa de legs par bshung du gsol// bcom ldan 'das/ 
289b1(dkon brtsegs): danAng ces gso la dang dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drugatul can la 'di ga ga stsa med te// skyem dag byung gang bya'in gshegs pa rab tu byung gA sgru pa dang / nus tsha sa dang / thos pa //

289b3(dkon brtsegs): lhung bar gtogs pas ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub bar bya ba ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ khyim bdag drag shul cam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sta
289b4(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa/ da to// khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu drung bas/ 'di ltar bdag su'i ched la/ khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu
289b5(dkon brtsegs): byung snyam du gzhal bar bya ste/ des mgo dang gos la mye 'bar ba bzhin du/ ye shes yongs su btsal ba la/ brtson 'grus brtsom par bya'o// de de ltar yongs su 'jal bas// thog ma nyid du 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag
289b6(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas shing / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' bya'o// khyim bdag ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag la rab tu gnas pa yin zhe na/ khyim
289b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni/ chos gros ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ chos gos ngam ngon gis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod pa yin te/ de chos gos kyi phyir tshul dang myi 'dra bas
290a1(dkon brtsegs): chamagasas ma sa myi ngas sus gad // rgyas pas sa sa skyed/ spya byung/ smra smye/ 'ang skyes na
290a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen dmyigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas/ chags pa skyed par spyad de/ chas gas ngan ngarigs chag par 'dzin pa des bdag sa myo snyed cing gzham po myi spyod do// khyim bdag gnon yang byang nabasams
290a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba ni// bsod snyoms dran ngon gyis chog par 'dzid pa yin/ bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod pa yin te/ des bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ rdul dang myi 'dra bas tshol bar myi byed
290a4(dkon brtsegs): kha ma na kyi ma ga kyi 'du ma la byud/ byad kyis sa smra
290a5(dkon brtsegs): khar rab du 'dzin pa yi mam tsha chags nas cams parnyed/ bar rung / bsang rnams pa ngon gyis nug par 'a 'i bdags kyi ste stong gnon pa myi spyod do// khyib dag ga
290a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni/ mal chang mngon gyis chog par 'dzi na pa yin/ mal mang nangon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags ba yang brjod pa yin te/ de ma/ la tsha'i phyir tshul dang myi 'dra bas rdzo/ 
290a7(dkon brtsegs): bar myi byed do// mal cham rnyed na yang yi myi'i chad cing yongs su gdung ba myed do// mal ma med na yang chags pa myed ni rmongs pa byed/ dga' ba byed/ zhen paskyed cing / zhen par myi 'gyur te/ nyes dmyigs mthong sa/ 'drung ba
290a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes nas chags pa myed par spyod de/ mal changar ngon gis chog par 'dzin pa de/ bdag la myi stod cing gzhan la myi smod do// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni / gan ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byas
290b1(dkon brtsegs): ngamangon gis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ na ba'i gso smang dang / yo byad ngan don gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod pa yin te/ de na pa'i gso smad dang / yo byad kyi phyir tshul dang myi 'dra bas tshol bar myi byed do// 
290b2(dkon brtsegs): maba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ma rnyed na yang yi myi 'chad cing / yongs su gdung ba myed do// na ba'i gsos smad dang / yo byad rnyed na yang chags pa myed/ rmongs pa myed/ dga' ba myed/ zhen pa myed cing zhen par myi 'gyurate
290b3(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmyigs mthong la 'byung bar rab tu shes nas chags pa myed par spyod de/ na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad den don gyis blar 'dzin pa de/ bdag la myi stong cing / gzhan la myi smod do// stong ba la dga' ba yang
290b4(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ spong ba la mos shing / spong ba la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson no// de sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos rnams spangs pas/ dga' bar 'gyur te/ ma spangs pas ni ma yin no// de sgom pa la dga' ba yin to// 
290b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson no// dge ba'i chos bsgom/ pas dga' bar 'gyur te/ ma sgoms pas ni ma yin no// spong bal dga' ba/ spong ba la mos pa/ spong ba la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtsom
290b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa la dga' ba/ bsgom pa la mos pa/ bsgom pa la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pa de/ bdag la myi stod cing / gzhan la myi smon do// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa
290b7(dkon brtsegs): 'i rigs bzhi po dag la gnas pa yin no// ci'i phyir 'phags pa'i rigs shes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'di gnas pas/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i rigs shes bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub
290b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rab tu byung bas/ phan yon la dga' ba bcus chos gos lus la bcang bar bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha shes shing 'dzem pas dkri ba dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gis reg par 'gyur
291a1(dkon brtsegs): bas g.yog pa dang / dge sbyong gi kha dog dang / rtags bstan pa dang / ngur smrig de dag ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten yin no snyam nas/ mchod rten gi phyir yang dag par gzung bar bya ba/ 
291a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / de dag ni yid 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas kha dog bsgyur ba yin te/ 'di dag ni 'dod 'chags kyis kha dog bsgyur ba ma yin pa dang / 'di dag ni nye bar zhi ba dang / 'thun pa yin gyi/ 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa 'bar ba
291a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'thun pa ma yin pa dang / ngur smrig 'di dag gis dkris shing g.yogs nas ka sdig pa'i las ldog par bya ba dang / legs par bya ba'i las bya ba dang / chos gos kyis cha bar sbyor ba la brtson pa yin pa dang / ngur smrig 'di dag
291a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshogs dang / 'thun par yin par shes nas/ ci nas skad cig gcig la yang / rnyog pa dang 'grogs par myi bya bar/ dur smrig rnams bcang bar bya ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas
291a5(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dod yon la dga' ba bcu po de dag kyis chos gos lus la bcang / par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu/ byung bas/ phan yon bcu mthong nas/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsad
291a6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms spyod pa btang bar myi bya ste/ bcu ga she na/ rab dbang du gyu rang ba'i tshul gyis 'tsho bar bya yi/ gzhan lanag lus pa ma yin pa dang / sems can gang dag padag bsod snyoms 'dod pa la/ bsod snyoms byin
291a7(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag kyang / dkon mchog gsum la bkod do// byos bsod snyoms blang bar bya ba dang / sems can gang dag gsod snyoms 'dod pa la bsod snyoms myo ster ba de dag la snying rje chen po bskyed nas/ sems can de dag gtong ba la gzung
291a8(dkon brtsegs): nga'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang bya byas te/ bsod snyoms bza' ba dang / bdag gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / 'thun par byas par 'gyur ba dang / dgang sla zhing gso sla bar bya ba'i phyir/ bdag gis rgyu skyed
291b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis nga rgyal bcag pa bsnyen par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis spyi gtsug ltar myi mthong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsegs par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mthong nas de bzhin du slob par 'gyur zhing / bdag skyes pa dang
291b2(dkon brtsegs): rangs kyis brgyal bcag pa ster par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis sa bud myed dang / khye'u dang / gu mo la sted par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsod snyoms yang dag par blang ba'i spyod pa yang / bdag sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas
291b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyed pa'i ye shes kyi tshigs su 'gyur ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon btso po de dag mthong nas/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i mtha' bar du bsod sobs spyod pa myi gtong bar bya'o// gal te dril la
291b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis mgron tu bos na/ des lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dad pa dang / dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste/ 'drid pa dang / 'chos pas/ ma yin no// gang la la bsod snyoms blangs te/ bdag dang gzhan gi don
291b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed nus na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' de mgron du 'gro bar gnang ngo // khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu mthong nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du/ sman bkus
291b6(dkon brtsegs): bas chog shes par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gi ngong lta bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gyis myi sdug pa'i 'du shes bstan par 'gyur ba dang / bdag rtsi mthun pa'i 'du shes so
291b7(dkon brtsegs): sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ro bro ba la chags pa yang / bdag gis tshogs chung ngus spangs par 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad bdag la yid rton par 'gyur ba dang / bdag kha zas bsnyungs pa mngon du gyur
291b8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas/ yon yon sman yongs su tshol ba'i/ 'phongs pa myed par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis sems la nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gnod par myed par byas par 'gyur ba dang / de
292a1(dkon brtsegs): ga/ ltar zhugs na mur tu nyon mongs pa'i nang dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas/ phan yon bcu po de dag mthong nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du sman bkus pas
292a2(dkon brtsegs): chagashes par bya / khyim bdag gzhanas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas/ pam mon bcu'i mthong nas/ ji srid 'che ba'i mtha'i bar du/ dgon byal gnas pa yongs su mi gang bar bya ste/ bcu gang zhen
292a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ginyam rangs pa dang / bdag gi dbang du 'gro ba dang / nga yi myed cing yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / rgyal che lhag par gtong ba dang / dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba dang / ma bral ba dang / gnas rnams su don nyung zhing
292a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa nyung ba dang / g.yog gi tshogs 'dor zhing / lus dang / srog la myi lta ba dang / dben par dga' zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su sbyong ba dang / las byas pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon yon yongs su gtong ba dang / ting
292a5(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzind dang / 'thun pa'i sems rtse gcig pa dang / yid la byed pa bla gab myed pa/ yid la byed pa sgrib pa myed pa ste/ khyim bdagagazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas/ phan yon bcu po
292a6(dkon brtsegs): dag mthong nas/ ji srid 'tshe ba'i bar du dgon pa la yongs su ga myi gtong bar bya'o// khyim bdag g.yod byang chub sems dpa' dgon tham gnas pa ches nyan par 'dong ngam/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po bzla bar
292a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod dam nya na ba dri ba'i phyir grong gi gnas su 'ongs na/ des dgongs su slar ldog par bya ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de gal te lus mnod pa dang / kha bor bya ba gzhan la rag lus te gtsug lag khang
292a8(dkon brtsegs): roganasun yang dngas dgon pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyis/ gang dngos po thams cad la dgon par 'du shes pa dong / chos tshol bas mying mas pa de nyid dgon pa la gnas bu min na sum du sems so// khyim bdag
292b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas kya thamams dpa'ang rna pa ga pal gnas sa saso// pas bas pa ga di gyung ba na/ na/ 
292b2(dkon brtsegs): ma dul ba dang / myi 'gugs pa/ rab tu myi bcan pa/ 'di lta ste ri rigs dang / spre'u dang / bye mang po dang / chom rkun dang / gdol bdag kyang mang du gnas te/ de dag kyang dge sbyong gi yon tan dang ldan pa ma yirdi pas/ 
292b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gi phyir bdag dgan pa la gnas pa 'di lta ste dge spyang gi der yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sum du na ga bar bya'o// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rangab tu byung ba'i dag sbyong gling gang zhe na/ di lta ste dranas
292b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes bzhin dang / myi g.yeng ba dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / byams la bsten pa dang / snying rje bsnyen pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la dbang sgyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su
292b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems so// ngas su myi gtong ba dang / thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes bsgom ba dang / sems can yongs su bsdu ba dang / sems can mongasu spyar
292b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yongs su myi gtong ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'gru sa myi 'dor ba'i drang / tshul bzhin chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dzi
292b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rnam par grol ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa rnams shes pa dang / skyon myed pa la 'jug par gnas pa dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas yang
292b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par blta ba dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu chad pas/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / mos bya ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas yang dag pa'i ngag dang / las zod pa yongs su rdzogs pas
293a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcom pas/ yang dag pa'i tshor ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub khong du chung bas/ yang dag pa'i tshol ba dang / rjed pa myed pa/ 
293a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ichos nyid kyis/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su thob pas/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stong pa nyid kyis myi skrag pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa la myi zhum pa dang / spen pa myong ba'i/ 
293a3(dkon brtsegs): myi gong ba dang / bsams bzhin du ye shes kyis srid pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / don la rton go/ yi ge la myi rton pa dang / ye shes la rton gi/ rnam par shes pa la myi rton pa dang / chos la rton gang zag la myi rton pa dang / 
293a4(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi/ drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la myi rton pa dang / thog ma nas ma byung zhing myi 'jig pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi ngo bo nyid la myi rton pa de ni/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab du byung ba'i/ dge sbyong
293a5(dkon brtsegs): gi don ces bya'o// khyim bdag gizhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas/ 'grogs pa myed pa mang bya'o// des 'di ltar ya nga bdag ni sems can dang / 'dre bar myi bya ste/ bdag gis sems can ga
293a6(dkon brtsegs): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par myi bya yi/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o// snyam du brtags par bya 'o// de lta mod kyi khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i 'grogs pa
293a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnang ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos nyan pa'i phyir 'grogs pa dang / sems can yongs su smin bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim 'gror bya ba'i phyir
293a8(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems 'dres pa myed pa dang / 'grogs pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i/ 'gregs pa bzhi pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'o// khyim bdag de bas na byang
293b1(dkon brtsegs): rlung sas dpa'ar ba tu byung bas 'grogs pa las rnas par grol bar bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang nub sa smras dpa rab tu byung ba dgon pa gnas pas/ bdag ci byor dgor pa yongs snyam du rtag par bya ste/ des/ 
293b2(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di ltar bdag ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i phyir dgon par 'ongs so// ci zhig gis 'jigs shing sreg go// grogs pas 'jigs shing skrag go// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang gti mug gis 'jigs shing skrag go// 
293b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya la dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pas 'jigs shing skrag go// chags pa dang / 'phrag dog dang / ser snas 'jigs shing skrag go// gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg byas 'jigs shing skrag go// phung po'i bdud kyis
293b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing sreg go// nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go// lha'i bu'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go// mr-iHga pa la rtag par phyin ci ldog pas 'jigs shing skrag go// sdug bsngal ba
293b5(dkon brtsegs): la bde bar phyin ci ldog pas 'jigs shing skrag go// bdag myed pa la bdag tu phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go// myi gtsang ba la gtsang bar phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go// sems can dang / 
293b6(dkon brtsegs): yid dang rnam par shes pas 'jigs shing skrag go// sred pas 'jigs shing skrag go// 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag go// sgrib pa drang chod pa dang / kun nas ldang bas 'jigs shing skrag go// 'jigs tshogs la lta bas 'jigs
293b7(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag go// bdag du 'dzind pa dang / bdag gir 'dzind pas 'jigs shing skrag go// rgod pas 'jigs shing skrag go// 'gyod pa dang the tsom gyis 'jigs shing skrag go// sdig pa'i 'grogs pos 'jigs shing skrag go// rnyed
293b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bkur stis 'dzags shing skrag go// myi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis 'jigs shing skrag go// ma mthong bar mthong ngo snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go// ma thos par thos so// snyam du 'dzinang pas 'jigs zhing
294a1(dkon brtsegs): skrag go/ ma dran par dran no snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go// bye brag ma byed pa bye brag byed do// snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go// myi shes par shes so snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs
294a2(dkon brtsegs): ging skrag go ka dge sbyong gi dri mas 'jigs shing skrag go/ gcig la gcig gnod par sems pas 'jigs shing skrag go// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyis
294a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzegs shing skrag go// sred pa'i 'gro ba thams cad 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye bas 'jigs shing skrag go// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / 'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul du 'gro bas 'jigs shing skrag go/ 
294a4(dkon brtsegs): myi khom pas 'jigs shing skrag go// mdor na myi dge ba'i chos thams cad yid la byed pas 'dzegs shing skrag go// bdag de lta bu'i 'jigs shing skrag pa de dag gis 'jigs shing skrag go// dgon par 'os
294a5(dkon brtsegs): te khyim na gnas pa dang / 'du 'dzil gnas pa dang / mya 'grus shing rnam 'byor de la myi brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa la yid la byed pa la gnas pas ni/ 'di lta bu'i 'jigs skrag pa de
294a6(dkon brtsegs): ngag las yongs su thar bar myi nus so// gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam
294a7(dkon brtsegs): bar grol te/ 'di lta ste bla na myed pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa myed pa thob po// gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa
294a8(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas na 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol ste/ 'di lta ste bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa myed pa thob par 'gyur ro// gang dag da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa'
294b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po ldan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas pa nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 'di lta ste ra byed pa yang dag pa
294b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa skyed pa thong po// de bas na bdag kyang 'di las 'jigs shing skrag ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las na shin tu 'das bar 'do // myi 'jigs pa rjes su thob bar 'a bas// dgon pas
294b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas par bya'o// snyam du yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'jigs shing skrag nas/ dgon pa'i gnas la gnas pas/ 'di la grang chung zad 'jigs pa skye ba dag
294b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las skyes so// bdag tu mngon par rdzogs pa dang / bdag tu yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdag gi gzhi dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu smra banye bar len pa dang / bdag tu lta po dang / 4
294b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi gnas dang / bdag tu yongs su rtog pa dang / bdag srung ba las/ skyes te/ gal te dgon pa la gnas la/ bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su ma spangs/ bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang / bdag tu yongs
294b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / bdag gi gzhi dang / bdag la sred pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa dang / bdag gi tu lta ba dang / bdag gi gnas dang / bdag tu yongs su rtog pa dang / bdag srung / 
294b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma spangs ra ni/ bdag dgon pa la gnas pa don myed par 'gyur ro// snyam du bslab par bya ste/ bdag tu 'du shes pa la ri/ dgon pa la gnas pa myed do// gzhan du 'du shes pa la yang myed do// ngar 'dzin pa dang / 
294b8(dkon brtsegs): yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa la ni dgon pa la gnas pa myed do// dmyigs par lta ba ni dgon pa la gnas pa myed do// phyin ci log tu lta ba ni dgon pa la gnas pa myed do// khyim bdag mya ngan las 'das par 'du shes
295a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang dgon pa la gnas pa myed na/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi 'du shes can lta ci smos// khyim bdag dgon pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad la myi sten par gnas pa'o// / 
295a2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la myi 'dzinang par gnas pa'o// mtshan ma thams cad la myi tshogs par gnas pa'o// gzugs thams cad la myi rten par gnas pa'o// sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg bya thams cad la myi rten par gnas
295a3(dkon brtsegs): bo'o// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang myi 'gal bar gnas bya'o// sems shin tu zhi bas shin tu sbyangs par gnas pa'o// 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pas myi 'dzugs par gnas pa'o// nyon mongs pa thams
295a4(dkon brtsegs): cang las rnam par grol bas chu bo las rgal bar gnas pa'i// brtan par gnas pa'i// ngan ngon gi chog shes par 'dzin cing 'dod pa chung bras/ 'phagaso pa'i rigs rnams la rab tu dga' bar gnas pa'o
295a5(dkon brtsegs): gang bar sla zhing gso bar sla bas chog par 'dzin par gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi phyir tshul bzhin sbyor bas thos pa la gnas pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
295a6(dkon brtsegs): sman pa myed pa la so sor rtog pas thar par gnas pa'o// bcings pa bcad pas rnam par grol bar gnas pa'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / 'thun pas/ ma dul ba rnams nye bar zhi bar gnas pa'o// 
295a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rnam par dag pas bya ba byas par gnas pa'o// khyim bdag 'di lta ste dper na dgon pa la rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal gnas kyang 'jigs pa myed cing / myi skrag skrag par myi 'gyur ro// khyim
295a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas kyang // lus la rtsa dang shing dang gel dang / sman dang rtsig pa dang / shing dang myig g.yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par
295b1(dkon brtsegs): d+hAb+h+ya/ 'ams par 'gyur// ngas su sa gsas pa mamasam ma'i rims skyed pa bya// 'jigs gang sgrug smra sbyar/ 'di ltar sa 'a n-i/ rgyun du seMng / smo
295b2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shad las skyes sam/ shed bu myed de/ 'di ltar 'jigs pa zhes pa 'di tshe// yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa/ ngal brtag par myi rgya ma snyam du lus yi nul bzhin gag
295b3(dkon brtsegs): khor bya'o// dzig dgon pa la rtsa dang / shing gal ba dang / sngo dang / nams chas gnas rnams mi bskyed/ yongs su yidzad pa myed pa de bzhin du/ byang chu sems dpa' yang ba'i byed pa yongs su chen pabyung pas / 
295b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dgon pa nyid do snyam du shes nas/ nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgon pa la gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa gcod pa ste/ nga yo ba myed pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang
295b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas/ 'dol dgon pa skal gnas pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang 'thun pa'o// dgon da pa la gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la gzhol ba'o// dgon pa la
295b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni shes rab kyi phung po tshogs pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'grub pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa nirnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po skye ba'o// dgon pa la gan
295b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rab tu bsten pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis po dag sdud pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni bden pa rnams rtogs pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni phung po rnams
295b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su shes pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni khams rnams chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par 'jal ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni skye mched rnams sel ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub kyi sems myi brjod pa'o// dgon pa la
296a1(dkon brtsegs): gaganas pa ni stong pa nyid la so sor rtog pas skrag pa myed pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni chos kun tu 'dzin pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni dgon pa'i rtsa ba thams cad chung myi gson pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni
296a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsngags pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ston pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyis bkur ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis
296a3(dkon brtsegs): bsten pa'o// dgon pa'i la gnas pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud bar bya ba'i phyir bsnyen pa'o snyam du bslab par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba/ dgon pa la gnas pa ni chags
296a4(dkon brtsegs): chung ngus pha rol tu phyind pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ra ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dgon pa la gnas pa'i byang chub se dmas dpa' ni/ lus dang srog la yang mya lci ba yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la
296a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung // dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom
296a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pani/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad sbyangs pal la rab tu gnas nas/ sdom pa gsum gis yang dag pa
296a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub ste/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu gnas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa
296a8(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu gnas pa ni sems gnod sems myed cing / sems can thams cad la byams par byed la/ de thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la ya
296b1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa yin te// de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus/ 
296b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni/ myi skye ba la bzod pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag dgon pa 'di las ldog par myi
296b3(dkon brtsegs): 'o snyam du slob ste/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i
296b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhe na/ khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni/ bsam gtan gi pha rolong tu phyind pa rab tu 'thob
296b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa yang yal bar myi 'dor/ la/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang stsogs par 'dod pa'i yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa
296b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs por 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung dgon pa la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag
296b7(dkon brtsegs): gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni/ 'di la lus ji lta ba dgon pa yang de bzhin no// lus ji lta ba byang chub kyang de bzhin no snyam du slob cing / de bzhin nyid kyis myi tog/ rnam par myi rtog ste/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas
296b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuro// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba/ dgon pa la gnas pa tshogs chung ngus pha rol tu phyi nang ba drug bsgom pa yangs
297a1(dkon brtsegs): ga ga rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba chos bzhi dang ldan pa na/ dgon pa la gnas par gnas pa yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
297a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba mang du thos pa yin te/ thos pa 'dzin pa chos rnam par nges pa la mkhas pa/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtsom zhing chos dang chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa bslab pa des/ dgon pa la gnas par
297a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa'i shas che na/ des nyon mongs pa rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ 'grogs pa myed par dgon pa la gnas par bya ste/ des nyon mong/ 
297a4(dkon brtsegs): kha tshar gcad par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni/ mngon par shes pa lnga po dag thos pa yin te/ des lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams yongs
297a5(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya ba'i phyir/ dgon pa la gnas par bya'o// khyim pang ga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgon pa la gnas par bka' stsa la par shes nas
297a6(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas par bya ste/ der dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan nas/ phyis grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang
297a7(dkon brtsegs): pho brang 'khor dag du zhugs te chos bstan par bya'o// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba chos bzhi po de dag ldan na/ dgon pa la gnas par gnang po// khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' dag
297a8(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba lung dang khe thon mnad pa'i phyir/ tshogs kyi nang du 'jug na/ de der gus pa dang bcas par bya ste/ slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams dang / gnas brtan dang / bar ma dang / dge slong gsar bu ba rnams la zhes
297b1(dkon brtsegs): rang khacas par bya tshul mkhas par bya'o snyom las myed pa rang gis bya ba dang / gzhan la gdung ba myong / b+hu ro// des bsnyen bkur la gdung bar myi bya'o// des 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
297b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang btsas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshungs pa dang sa pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu bcos pa dang / la dang myi dang sgram yi du bcas pas mchong ba/ sbyi gnas
297b3(dkon brtsegs): su gyu rang ba de yang / sems can thams cad la/ gang las kyang rim 'gror bya ba/ bdag gir myi 'dzin na/ bdag cag ma bslabs po/ slob 'dod pa rnams lta ci smos te/ bdag gis ni sems can thams cad la bsnyem bkur bya'i/ 
297b4(dkon brtsegs): gang las kyang bsnyen bkur bya/ bdag gir ni myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag dge slong bsnyen bkur la gdung ni/ yon tan gyi chos rjes su gzung ba chud gson pa yin te/ des gang dag sdud pa de dag kyang / 'di snyam du sas
297b5(dkon brtsegs): de/ bdag cag ni bsnyen bkur gyi phyir sdud kyis chos kyi phyir ma yin nos/ ste/ de bdag nyid kyi rang pa chun gson te/ gang dag de la bsnyen bkur byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa de dag gi yang don chen po
297b6(dkon brtsegs): myo 'gyur ro// 'bras bu chen por myi 'gyur ro// des slob dpon dar/ mkhan po yi gan du yang 'gro na yang / spobs dpon dang / mkhan pos ma dad pa'i bag gang yang rung ba zhig las brtags nas/ bdag la lung 'bog
297b7(dkon brtsegs): kha dang / kha zon bya ba dang / rjes su bstan pas pan 'dogs par myi 'gyur du 'ong zhes/ lus dang sems las su rung ba dang / sems ca shes pas 'gro bar bya'o// des lung mdod pa dang / kha zon gi phyir lus dang srog la yang myos
297b8(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// chos 'dod pas slobs dpon dang mkhan po rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// yon tan don du gnyer bas rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / tshig su bcang ba thams cad don du myi gnyer byar bya'o// khyim bdag gal de byang
298a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' lung mnod pa dang // kha zon du gnyer bas gzhan dag las tshig su bcang btsam 'am/ sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtsom 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / 
298a2(dkon brtsegs): sngar pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam go tshogs bstsags pa/ mnyan tam/ lung mnos sam bzung na/ des spobs ripon la chos kyi phyir gus par bya'o// mying dang tshigs dang yi ga ci snyed kyis tshig su bcang pa bstan pa sa
298a3(dkon brtsegs): gal te de snyed kyi bskal par slobs dpon la/ g.yo myed pa ste bkur dang g.yogs byas shing rnyed pa dang / bkur sti thams cad kyis mchod pa byas/ su zin kyang khyim bdag da tung du des spobs dpon la/ slobs dpon du ri mo bya ba
298a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par myi 'gyur na/ chos la rim 'gro bya ba lta ci smos/ khyim bdag dad pas mnyan cing bsgom pa dang / kha thon la 'jug pa'i sems las byung dge ba dang ldan pa 'am/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa 'am/ chos dang ldan pa 'am/ 
298a5(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun pa 'am/ skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa 'am/ byang ba dang dul ba dang / zhi ba dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ji snyed pa// gal te de/ snyed kyi bskal par slobs dpon la bsnyen bkur byas su zin kyang
298a6(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag dadung spobs dpon la/ slobs dpon du mo bya byas rdzogs pa'i na no// khyim bdag rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar rnam par spyo pa'i chos tshang myed cing / ye shes khong du chung pa chang byed par byed ltar
298a7(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o// khyim bdag de lta bas na rnam par spyod pa'i chos chad myed pa/ ye shes khong du chud pa tshad myed pa dris pas/ bdag gi slobs dpon yod tshad myed do// snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' chos la ro mo tshad myed par bya'o// 
298a8(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas/ rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa la gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba/ rab tu byung sgrub pa la gnas pa yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la
298b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dang 'arab du byung bachub khrims yong su dag pa thos nas/ de la slong ste/ dran po 'di dgan myo ga khrims yang su dag pa'o// nog zhe na/ 'phags pa'i gas rnams la gnas pang / sbyangs pa'i ya du da
298b2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba rnams dang myi 'dre ba dang / tshul 'ches pa myed pa dgon pa la gnas ste// bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o// khyim bodag gzhan yang tshul khrims
298b3(dkon brtsegs): yong su dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus bsdams pas lus myi dmyigs pa dang / ngag bsdams pas ngag myi dmyigs pa dang / yid bsdams pas myi dmyigs pa dang / lta ba dang bral bas thams cad mkhyen par sems bsgreng pa ste/ bAni
298b4(dkon brtsegs): bde dag ni tshu khrims yongs su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhanaya rdu yong su dag 'a bani ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dam dzin pa spangs pad / nga yir 'dzin pa pang ba dang / chang pa dang / drug padang bras dog rter ba'i
298b5(dkon brtsegs): chos la 'jug pa ste/ bzhi pa de dag ni tshul khrims yong su dag pa'o// khyim bdag / gzhan yang tshul khrims yongasu dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phung po rnams la/ 'byung ba dang / 'dzag par rtog pa dang / khams dza/ 
298b6(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi dbyingasu yongs su 'jal ba dang / skye mched rnams la grong stong par 'du shes pa dang / tha snyad btags pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa ste/ bzhi pa de dag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims
298b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag la bdag myed par 'du shes pas/ bdag la myi stong pa dang / gzhan la myi dmyigs pas/ gzhan la myi smod pa dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pas/ rlom sems myed pa dang / chos thams
298b8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid pas g.yo ba myed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yong su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan ma myed pas myi skrag pa dang / sas
299a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la cher snying rje ba dang / bdag myed la bzod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab du byung bsha ting nge 'dzinang yongs su
299a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa thos nas ka de la slob ste/ ting nge 'dzind yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad la rtsol ba myed pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pas gnyis su dbyer myed pa dang / sems las su rung ba dang / sems rtse
299a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa dang / sems nyes par 'byung ba dang / sems myi 'pho ba dang / sems kun du myi rgyug pa dang / sems myi gnas pa dang / sems nges sngar sems par byin gyis rlob pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba dang / sems 'dod
299a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yon tan rnams la myi chags pa dang / sems chos la sgyur mar rtog na pa dang / ji ltar chos kyi dbyings mngon par 'du myi byed pa dang / ji ltar myi skye myi 'byung zhing / mnyam pa nyid de ltar/ khyim bdag byang
299a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa la so sor rtog to// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pa thos
299a6(dkon brtsegs): de la slob ste/ shes rab yongs su dag pa de gang zhe na/ de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ chos thams cad mngon sum du shes pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye bar shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / 
299a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan dag la chos gos par byed pa shes pa ste ka khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba/ shes rab yongs su dag pa la so sor rtog go// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
299a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba 'di la shes rab 'di ni lus myed pas/ thogs pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid do// rgyu ba myed pas gzung ba myed pa'i mtshan nyid do// skye ba myed pas gnas myed pa'i mtshan nyid do// nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid pas mngon par
299b1(dkon brtsegs): 'du myi byed pa'i mtshan nyid do// snyam du rab tu slob po// khyim bdag de ltar na gang 'di ltar chos las ser rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
299b2(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na/ srog chags brgya stong gis ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// khyim bdag de dag thams cad las phal cher ni/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// srog chags sum
299b3(dkon brtsegs): khri nyis stor ni chos rnams la chos rnams la chos myig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma rnam par dag go// de nas khyim bdag drug shul can dga' la yid rangs shing dga' nas/ mgu ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ brgya stong ri'i ngas
299b4(dkon brtsegs): bcos bu'i zung bcom pa ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad stsal to// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems
299b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa/ ci ltar bcas pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang lags pa de dag gi chos yongasu rdzog par gyur da cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar byang chub sems
299b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bslab pa bcas pa yang de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gang dag lags pa de dag gi chos yongs su rdzog sa par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das la yang zhu bor 'tshal te/ bcom
299b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar khyim pa khyim na gnas chos du zhig dang ldan na rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa'i la slob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drug shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang ngo to// 
299b8(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos lnga dang ldan na// rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub ses dpa' khyim pa khyimi na gan pa myi ltar bar dngos po thos cad yo su gtong
300a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yidi ci/ thams cadas byed panyid kyi mas dang ldan pas/ rnam par sbyi bya la re bskyed pa dang / khyim bdagra gdung yang byang nab sems dpa' khyim pakhyim na gnas batshangs par spyong cing gcang ba yin te/ yi kyi sa
300a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mang 'dod pa myi stong ma/ mtshan gnyis spong ba'am/ yan lag ma yin/ bar 'jug pa lta ji smos pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa yang dag pa skyon myed myed pa la myi rig cing / 
300a3(dkon brtsegs): nyim stong bar zhugs nas/ thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa pas mi gtan bani ba dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpara' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa sems can thams cad bde bar
300a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa la brtson pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pas nges par 'thung ba brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa bdag kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing
300a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang dam pa'i chos la sbyor ba byed pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos lnga po de dag dang lnga na na/ rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin no// de nas bcom
300a6(dkon brtsegs): lngam ngas pa khyim pa sa gra thul bar gis 'digad ces gnod to// bcom ldan dus pa ga de ba'i de gshegs pa rnams kyi ga' bzhin du balci bar 'tshal lo// rab tu byung ba'i sgrub bslod do// 
300a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid 'di lta bu la yang 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi
300a8(dkon brtsegs): zhal gyi sgo nas 'od de 'phro ba kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang // dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa rnams su
300b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyi snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gi bar mngon par 'phags rje/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas che/ 
300b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldar ba kun dga' ba'o// gsangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs nas/ bla gos 'drag gcig tu babar te/ brus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo spyod ba badzud de/ 
300b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa myi mdzad na/ 'jum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces
300b4(dkon brtsegs): gsolang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang to// kun dga' ba khyod kyis khyim bdag drag shul can 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ chos sgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i sgra
300b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa mthong ngam/ gsol dra ba bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa kun dga' bo khyim bdag drag shul can 'di ni gang dag
300b6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la rim 'gro byed par 'gyur ro// sti stang dang / mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// gangs pa'i chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 
300b7(dkon brtsegs): ga tu yang khyim bdag tu gyurang nas ka rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub de yang rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces smras so// 
300b8(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag chu gang dang rkyen gang gis/ gang khyim na gnas shing rdul la gnas pa la dga' bar byed/ drag shul can gyis spras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo rdul cung zad kyang myed de/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/ bdag bde ba la myi re ba yimanod/ 
301a1(dkon brtsegs): ma sa sa ltam kyi pa nga/ sa sa kyis dang / den kyis smram / mas
301a2(dkon brtsegs): sum // dga' sa snyi'i ga gsu bram de kyis kyis la gsangs/ bsgrul pa ba zang ba la sems can rab tu mang po 'ang sa sbyin par byed par gyur// te btu byung ba'i byeng na ba sems dpa 'a dris pa
301a3(dkon brtsegs): stong ngam/ skal ba da stong du yang de ltar gyi nus so// ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar khyim 'di la yod pa'i yon tan rnams ni/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa stong pa yang byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ nga lngan
301a4(dkon brtsegs): bkun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnams grangs 'di myi ni lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ kun dga' bo de'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag
301a5(dkon brtsegs): shul can gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ khyim bdag rab tu byung bslab pa la bsgrub pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ lhag pa'i bas ma pas bla ma snyen bkur bya ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ kun dga'
301a6(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi ma tha ma 'di kyis mA gtu/ byang chub mas dpa yin tan dang / bcom lda dang rnas mang pos ca / bcas lus gnapas banas pa brgyar mas par spyad ba la gnas pas ni dgas yin // sa
301a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo de bas na bdag kyang 'di la brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang brtson 'grus la gzung bar 'dod pa dang / bdag kyang yon tan gyi chos mnyam pa nyid thams cad la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang yon tan
301a8(dkon brtsegs): khyim chos mnyam pa nyid thams cad la yod pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma nyam par bya/ kun dag chu bar bya/ gan dag la yang rgyacher yang dag par rab tu snyan par bya'o// kun dga' bongs chos kyi drang grangs 'di sang dang sa
301b1(dkon brtsegs): 'a yang ga pa du ma pa tu ba byed/ byangasasasag dang / nga byas / gas la rdzo tu cas ca thas pa bden bshegs pa sangs kyi pa grangs bya bu mas/ 
301b2(dkon brtsegs): sa kyinam ngas 'diding byi bral bar gnas 'a/ sangs rgyas rung ba dang phyi 'phral lo// kunangs na tud nad ma rmimi pa bad chos kyi rnam grangs 'a she ma/ 'am sa thog pa dang / phyi thal bde/ langs rgyas lung ba dang / 
301b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cid mthong ba dang phyi 'bral lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo ches kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nga du/ yon tan thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bsgrub pa bsgrub pa'i lam gyi yon tan thams cad 'dus par de bzhin
301b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag par rab tu bshad pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yang dag par rab tu rdzogs pa'i byang chub ngon du gnyer ba dag gis/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams myes rab
301b5(dkon brtsegs): tu gang yang 'bogs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyam par bya/ kun chung par bya'o// dgu dga' bo stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang btsam yang / ri mo byas te/ slobs
301b6(dkon brtsegs): dpon la phul nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mchod rten/ rin po che las so sor byas te/ mchod thams cad kyis
301b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod la/ de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing / gang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang
301b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bran dang / slob mar khas blangs te/ bsnyen bkur byas su zin kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myi 'dzin/ myi 'chang / myi klog/ kun chub par mya byed 'jug par myi byed cing / bsgrub pa 'di la yang myi gnas na/ kun dga' bo byang chub
